La pasamos muy bien en bcn y en lo de sonia, tiene todo muy limpio y equipado, el departamento es hermoso, cerca del metro asiq podes ir  a todos lados, nosotros hicimos todo caminando y sin problema. Sin duda lo recomiendo. Gracias Sonia x tu amabilidad sobre todo con emilia.bso
Todo muy bien, la habitación y la casa limpia y en zona tranquila. Baño privado y Sonia es una muy buena host.

El dúplex de Sonia es muy nuevo. La habitación y el baño, que ha sido solo para nosotros, estaban limpios y eran confortables. Sonia es una anfitriona muy agradable, silenciosa y respetuosa, hemos estado muy cómodos, nos ha hecho sentir como en casa. Muy próximo a la Meridiana, con la parada de metro de Fabra i Puig a 3 minutos andando, donde coges la línea roja y vas directo al centro sin transbordos. Muy recomendable.

Sonia es agradable y nos ayudó en todo para movernos en Barcelona, la atención fue increíble.

El barrio está muy cerca del Metro y del centro, además el apartamento es limpio, agradable y súper equipado.
el barrio era muy tranquilo solo que a cierta hora de la noche y del día pasan los camiones de basura y hacen mucho ruido.
Sonia is a great host, open-minded, helpful and nice. The apartment is clean, close to the metro and shops. Certainly one of the best place to be in Barcelona. Thank you for everything Sonia!

Sonia was a very nice guest. Very kind and very helpful for us. I really enjoyed stay at her home.  it was very comfortable also. The bedroom had air conditioners and it was very clean. The Bathroom was only for us. It was not so far from metro and there is very good restaurants near there. Thanks you very much Sonia!

The trip did not start in a very comforting way as our previous host cancelled our months old booking 2 weeks before our holidays. This solution really saved our trip to Barcellona. Sonia’s place was walking distance from the metro, very easy to get to and just few km away from the very center if the city. The room was nice and clean just like the private bathroom. The first time for us in a room rather than full apartment and were nicely surprised about Sonia’s kindness and confidence. Really recommend this room.

Sonia was very kind. I approciated the bottle of water on arrival and cup of coffee for a breakfast. This small things make the life better :) as well as willingness to accommodate us sooner and let us leave later. Her appartment is clean and very quite. I fully recommend it.

Sonia is very nice host.  I really enjoyed stay at her home. The apartment was clean, near to shops and metro. Bathroom was only for us. When we arrived we got a bottle of water. It was very nice gesture!
Excelente anfitriona, muy buena ubicación, colonia tranquila y con muchos lugares para comer, cerca del metro. Muy recomendable.

name: Porto-amazing room with ensuite
space: One room available. It's my flat (I live there) and I have 1 spare bedroom (double with ensuite) that I rent out sometimes.The flat has a spacious shared kitchen/dining room and only 10 min of Sá Carneiro airport,perfect location to explore Porto.
description: One room available. It's my flat (I live there) and I have 1 spare bedroom (double with ensuite) that I rent out sometimes.The flat has a spacious shared kitchen/dining room and only 10 min of Sá Carneiro airport,perfect location to explore Porto.

host.host_about: I am portuguese easy going And i like a lot traveling And make friends ...

reviews.comments: We had a fantastic stay at Maria's home for four nights. The room is lovely and spacious with beautiful decor, a big window with a view, and an immaculate en-suite bathroom. The location is well linked by public transport (20 minutes to town centre by bus), in a quiet and pretty area of Porto. Maria very kindly offered us many things for breakfast in the morning, and an occasional glass of Port wine in the evening! It was lovely talking to Maria and her daughter Cristiana in a mixture of languages (French, English, Spanish and Portuguese), and they were both so kind and helpful and made our stay in Porto really special! We would highly recommend staying at Maria's flat, and hope we will have the chance to visit her again!

Maria is amazing! She made our stay wonderful. 
When we could not find our way to her house, she walked 15 minutes to meet us!
Not only is she able to communicate in Spanish, French and Portuguese, she is very knowledgable about her amazing city of Porto.
She welcomed us into her beautiful home with a wonderful glass of Port wine.
The room we rented was clean and spacious. In addition there is a private ensuite full bathroom with a bidet and a wonderful shower.
Maria was our personal tour guide for the trip.  She gave us a map and she spent an entire day with us driving around and showing us the sights.
She welcomed us every morning with great coffee and breakfast.
When we returned late in the evening, she also prepared dinner.
Maria is kind.  She is very interested in her guests feeling at home, and goes out of her way to accommodate.
We met her wonderful daughter as well, who took time out of her busy schedule to make sure we arrived at the famous Lello Bookstore by driving ahead of us and showing the way.
Thank you.
I highly recommend Maria's place to anyone visiting Porto.
Thank you Maria!
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

host.host_about: Nos encanta Barcelona, conocemos la ciudad y algunos de sus secretos. Podemos ayudarte a planificar tu visita.

reviews.comments: This flat is really spectacular. Large, tall ceilings, expensive furniture, walking distance from the center, perfect!

Excellent apartment! We loved our stay in Barcelona.  Great location and very easy check in process and parking.  Very friendly and helpful with information regarding transport, attractions and what to avoid

Mariana and Tomas are perhaps the most accommodating and professional hosts I've had the pleasure of staying with. The apartment is amazing (truly, it is both larger and more impressive than even the pictures show, which is rare). It was quite warm the first night we were in Barcelona and by the following morning, they had installed a portable A/C unit in the second bedroom – after which my kids slept soundly. The location of the place is *perfect* and we would feel lucky to be able to stay there again.

My husband and our two children (ages 8 and 5) liked that this apartment was very close to grocery stores, restaurants, and Passeig de Gracia.  Check-in was smooth and the apartment was roomy.  There is one AC unit, which cooled the living room and master bedroom very well.  There was also a portable AC unit provided for the smaller bedroom, but it was cumbersome to set up.

One couldn’t ask for a better apartment and sweeter hosts. The location is perfect and the bed linens and towels are of five start hotel quality as are the beds. What a delightful experience it’ has been for all four of us.
the room is awesome and great location
Amazing apartment, well located, very comfortable beds. Highly recommended
Apartamento muy elegante y confortable. Excelente ubicación Atentos dueños encantadores. Bravo!!!

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay as the apartment was very clean and had all the amenities that we needed.  The beds were very comfortable and it was nice to have 2 bathrooms. The elevator made it easy to transport our luggage.  The location is great as there is a small grocery store and bakery nearby, and is within walking distance to many shopping and dining areas.  Mariana met us at check in and gave us all the necessary information to make our stay enjoyable.  We would be happy to stay here again in the future.
Very spacious, stylish and comfortable apartment to stay in Barcelona! Great combination of price and quality!

Nice, spacious and well equipped apartment. Super comfortable bed and pillos for a good night rest which was important given the amount of walking we did in Barcelona! Awesome location; love the tree lined streets and lively cafes in the neighbourhood. Highly recommended!
Fantastic apartment in a great location. Sparkling clean and well presented. Friendly and helpful hosts who are quick to respond to messages. Highly recommended.
모든 면에서 좋았습니다. 숙소는 깨끗하고, 멋있었습니다. 위치도 정말 좋았습니다. 다만 체크인 과정이 복잡한데, 전화로만 해결해야 하는 점이 어려웠습니다. 메세지로 전달 받으면 더 좋을 것 같습니다.

We had a great stay at Mariana & Tomás’s place - lots of room for our family of 3 to spread out.  Clean, well-appointed and everything worked as it should (wifi, the two A/C units, clothes washer/dryer).  Appreciated the quick & detailed replies to my questions.  Check-in was smooth and location was convenient.  Would definitely stay here again next time we return to Barcelona.

A perfect spot for a visit to Barcelona. The apartment truly is even better than in photos - so much space and excellent amenities (dishwasher, AC, Washer/dryer all came in handy!) Quiet and charming hood in a great central location; close to popular Metro stops and a nice walk to the Born and Gothic. We traveled with our 8 mo old for the first time and the crib and high chair (and dark shades) were all perfect. We would stay here again in a heartbeat.

Our stay at Mariana & Tomás’s place was perfect! It was an ideal layout for our family of 4 and had everything we needed. 
Well appointed, sparkling clean and spacious. Also, Mariana gave some very helpful suggestions and she responded quickly to questions . 
We would return in a heartbeat when we visit Barcelona !

Mariana and Tomás are so helpful, and responsive. When you have any issue with how things work in the house / getting around in city they are there. The apartment itself is also very nice, fancy and bathroom is lovely.
We had a great time in Barcelona. The apartment is fantastically well located. Mariana was super nice and helpful.

Lovely space. Quiet and spacious. Metro makes its very convenient to get to this location from airport (a little tedious but definitely doable) depending upon which train you take, you’ll either have anywhere from 5 - 15 minute walk.
Water pressure decent, amenities just right. Building equip with lift. 
The host was in constant contact with me prior to the travels to answer and address any concerns. We arrived late after host/concierge hours and we were left with very easy to follow instructions.
We’re definitely stay again.

Excellent apartment for staying in Barcelona. Close to many beautiful places and easy access to public transportation.

Many excellent restaurants near by.

Check in was phenomenal,
Huge space with great light and windows that open to a beautiful street. Clean, soft beddings, decent bathrooms, great feel and vibe. Nice touches that make this an elegant space. Great hosts and genuinely fantastic stay. 5 star hotels could learn from this place

私たちは夫婦で泊まりましたが､二人には広すぎる位で､家族や友人数人でも十分な広さでした｡ｾﾝｽの良いｲﾝﾃﾘｱ､清潔なお部屋､大きくてﾌﾜﾌﾜのﾀｵﾙ類､全てが完璧｡到着時の説明も懇切丁寧で､教えてもらったｼｰﾌｰﾄﾞのお店は､気取らず､美味しくｺｽﾊﾟも良かったです｡ｱｸｾｽも総じて良好(ｶﾀﾙｰﾆｬ広場からは少し歩きます)｡
とにかく､ﾏｲﾅｽ点が見当たらず､今までのAir bnb体験(3回目)の中で､ｽﾍﾟｯｸ､おもてなし共に最高でした｡さすが､ｽｰﾊﾟｰﾎｽﾄです｡(ﾗｯﾌﾟや布巾､調味料はないので､持参をお勧め)

Beautiful apartment in the heart of Barcelona

A Queen size bed and all the amenities to enjoy the city with pleasure. We expect you to enjoy your stay with us to the fullest, making sure that you'll be provided with all of the modern amenities and supplies necessary for a wonderful stay. If you need any more information please let me know, I will be glad to help you.

host.host_about: Love travel and meet people!

reviews.comments: Klein aber sehr fein! Sehr gut gelegen mitten in der alten "Oberstadt" von Porto. Pedro wie Laura waren sehr hilfsbereit bei kleinen Fragen und waren sehr nett und hilfreich mit kleinen Tipps wo es gute Restaurants und Sehenswürdigkeiten gibt. Sehr zu empfehlen diese Unterkunft!! Reto

El sitio es perfecto para pasar unos días en Porto!! Es un apartamento muy bien posicionado, desde el que puedes llegar andando a cualquier punto de interés de Porto. El apartamento es precioso, con lo básico para cocinar y comer allí y con cama muy cómoda, muy tranquilo para descansar por la noche... 
Y la terraza comunitaria es preciosa y perfecta para desayunar en los días con primaverales con sol.
La única pega es el pequeño ruido que hace la calefacción por la noche que, por otro lado, se arregla apagándola.
Hemos disfrutado de nuestra estancia al máximo, sin duda volveríamos al mismo apartamento!!

We loved this place, very central to everything, but also so very quite, especially the garden, felt like a paradise. The apartment itself is very clean, modern, tasteful, with all high qualities amenities. Pedro and Laura are the perfect hosts and we would love to come back some time in the near future.
Thank you both again for everything.
Kind Regards
Elen & Darwin

name: Kiahuna 307: Corner Condo Over The Moir Gardens
summary: Kiahuna 307 Beautiful one bedroom condo at the wonderful tropical Kiahuna Plantation. Wonderful interiors, sleeps 5. Short walk to beaches. Free midsize rental car.
space: *Free mid-size car while cars are available. Not valid with any other special offers. Car can be upgraded for minimal fee, unlimited mileage and taxes included, and is picked-up and dropped-off at the airport. Cars are on a 24 hour basis so if flight arrival and departure times exceed the number of days reserved, there will be an additional charge. KIAHUNA PLANTATION 307 Experience a rare slice of tropical serenity when you stay at this one-bedroom plantation condo with room for five. Not only are you steps away from fun in the sun at Kiahuna Beach, but you’ll also have exclusive balcony views of world-class Moir Gardens. Wake up to the sounds of exotic birds, then sip morning coffee on your private lanai while admiring rare cacti, orchids, and succulents in the botanical gardens below. With lively island décor, comfy furnishings, and a breezy, open living space, it won’t take long to settle into vacation mode. The chef of the group will love cooking in the perfectly appointed kitchen.

With lively island décor, comfy furni
neighborhood_overview: Located on the gorgeous island of Kauai on the south shore Poipu. Gorgeous sunny sandy beaches. Awesome shopping and restaurants.
notes: Start your day off with a latte from local favorite Little Fish Coffee across the street, then pop into a few boutiques for an island souvenir at Poipu Shopping Village. From there, the world is your oyster. Tee-off at Kiahuna Golf Club a half a mile up the road, or grab a towel and some sunscreen and make the short 5-minute walk to award-winning Poipu Beach for paddle boarding, snorkeling, or sunbathing. Depending on the season, you may even spot some breaching whales! Once you’ve soaked up enough rays, head to Plantation Gardens Restaurant & Bar for a handcrafted cocktail and some regional Pacific Rim cuisine while watching the sun sink into the ocean. If you’re looking for a resort-style stay, we have you covered. You`ll receive complimentary access to the Poipu Beach Athletic Club, home to a fitness center, hot tub and sparkling pool with a waterslide and sand-bottomed kiddie section – everything you need to work out, cool off or wind down, just across the street.
transit: 1. Family-Friendly: At Kiahuna 307 you`ll be within a few minutes walk to family fun: Stop by the beach activity center to choose your water sport for the day, check out the live entertainment at Poipu Shopping Village, or make a splash in the pool at Poipu Beach Athletic Club. 2. Plantation Perks: Not only does your rental come with a vacation membership to Poipu Beach Athletic Club, but a free midsize car rental for exploring the island too! 3. A Rare Retreat: Along with offering a rare view of Kauai`s famous botanical gardens, very few properties on the island have such a rich history dating back to Hawaii’s sugar plantation days and front an award-winning beach. Public transport is limited. Rental car is recommended.
access: BBQ area Beach Hut On site coin operated laundry facility Poipu Beach Athletic Club across the street for pool, hot tub, gym and more
interaction: Text us at (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)
house_rules: 1. Great Vacation Retreats is not affiliated with the onsite management. Please contact us directly with any questions, maintenance issues or concierge requests. 2. Hawaii has a new smoking law which allows smoking only in designated areas outside of any building, 20 feet away from doors. Our units and lanais are all non-smoking. Please use the designated areas if you wish to smoke. They are usually located in the parking lot of the building. There is a $300 fine for smoking in our properties and the State of Hawaii may also impose a fine for not smoking in the designated areas. 3. Please wash off all sand from beach gear and your body before re-entering the units. Outside showers are available at most beaches and outside of most properties. Please do not hang beach towels, swimsuits, etc. from lanai railings.  4. Because we are in a tropical environment, there are insects. Please keep all food covered and stored properly. This will help to discourage roaches, ants, geckos and spiders

host.host_about: We are a boutique property management company on the islands of Kauai and the Big Island. We are here to help you plan your Hawaiian Experience. All of our properties include free WiFi, free parking, fully equipped kitchens and more great amenities. Our team checks our account very frequently to make sure all of your questions are answered as soon as possible. Once on island we are available to help you 24 hours/day. Need a rental car? Where is the best place for a sunset dinner? Where do the locals go? Let us know how we can help you experience the vacation of your dreams!

reviews.comments:
¡¡EXCELENTE!! Recomiendo este departamento y Great Vacation Retreat. El personal me respondió inmediatamente a todas mis dudas. Recogimos el auto en Enterprise sin problemas, y luego las llaves. El departamento es muy acogedor y está muy bien ubicado. La playa del resort es preciosa, y si bien hay muchas playas hermosas en Kauai, nosotros pasamos casi todos los días disfrutando de ésta. También un día aprovechamos el servicio de la piscina, que se encuentra enfrente e incluso se puede acceder caminando. Hay varios supermercados cerca. Algunos (los más económicos)  se llega en 5 minutos de auto.
El departamento tiene de TODO: toallas, shampoo, jabón, secador de pelo, detergente para platos y para la ropa... No se necesita llevar nada. ¡Tiene hasta los snorkel para disfrutar en la playa! 
¡Hemos pasado unas vacaciones estupendas! ¡Muchas gracias! Thank you so much!

ECCELLENTE !! Vi consiglio questo appartamento e Great Vacation Retreat. Il personale ha risposto immediatamente tutte le mie domande. Abbiamo preso la macchina ad Enterprise senza problemi, e poi le chiavi. L'appartamento è molto accogliente ed è  ben posizionato. La spiaggia del villaggio è bellissima, e sebbene ci sono molte belle spiagge a Kauai, abbiamo trascorso quasi tutti giorni in questa spiaggia. Anche un giorno siamo andati in piscina la cui si trova di fronte e ci si può arrivare a piedi. Ci sono diversi supermercati nei dintorni. Alcuni (i più economici) si possono raggiungere in 5 minuti di macchina.
L'appartamento ha di TUTTO: asciugamani, shampoo, sapone, phon, sapone per i piatti e vestiti ... Non c'è bisogno di portare nulla. Ed anche lo snorkel per godersi la spiaggia!

Abbiamo trascorso una vacanza splendida! Grazie! Thanks!

Great location at reasonable cost, right on one of the best beaches on the island! Magnificent sunsets every night! The units are well equipped and ok for a family of five (although it may feel somewhat crowded after a while). We can fully recommend unit 307 which was nice and quiet. However, we also spent a few days in unit 335 which faces the main road/intersection. Traffic noise can be very annoying late at night (party people) and early in the morning (construction trucks). We did not make use of the "free" rental car as the upgrade to full size plus insurance would have been more expensive than the package we booked online.

O apartamento é uma graça! Cabem 5 pessoas, mas acho que não mais do que isso. A cozinha estava super equipada, tudo o que precisávamos estava a mão! Eles deixam no apartamento uma pasta com todas as informações que você venha a precisar. Disponibilizaram sabonete, shampoo, até lâmpadas extras e binóculos!! Apartamento pequeno, mas com tudo o que a gente precisou. A localização do condomínio é ótima! Perto de mercado, restaurante, próximo da praia e um shopping do outro lado da rua. O clube de Poipu fica super perto, dando pra ir a pé! O concierge do condomínio é super educado e acessível e nos ajudou em tudo o que precisávamos! Escolha excelente! Com certeza se voltarmos a Kauai ficaremos hospedamos lá novamente!
We loved staying here. The kitchen was incredible and the whole thing felt spacious. We would've loved to stay longer and check out the beach & athletic club.

Room 307 is a great location within a great resort. The plantation style of Kiahuna resort (lots of wood & shutters) is so much nicer in my opinion than the surrounding Sheraton & Hyatt hotels. But the Sheraton has a nice buffet breakfast and there is a shopping village just across the road - everything you want in Poipu is an easy walk. Only drawback for us (1 couple & 2 adult children) was having to partially pack up the two sofa beds to fully use the living space but this worked better than expected. The attention to anticipating all your needs in this unit was exceptional.
Great communication and service

This apartment at Kiahuna Plantation was wonderful for us and our three teens. It's very close to the ocean - just a nice walk through a garden to get there. The apartment kitchen was well-equipped to make our own dinners and other meals, and we enjoyed them on the lanai together. We loved the beach, and the huge, green, grassy area in the central part of Kiuhuna Plantation, where families BBQed, kicked the soccer ball around, and lounged while looking at the ocean. The management - Great Vacation Retreats - was super nice, and provided free rental car, free parking, and free beach towels. We also enjoyed a day at the nearby athletic club, which is also provided free, playing in the fun pool. The area where the apartment is located - Poipu - feels like the center of a fun and active scene on Kauai. I highly recommend this place.

This condo is amazing. It is so close to the beach, and situated in a very nice resort like area. There are so many restaurants located within in a small walking distance. The condo itself is beautifully decorated and has soaps that smell amazing. We came to this condo as a part of our honeymoon trip and they even included some champagne and Hawaiian sweets. We had a small issue with finding our key in the provided lock box, but when we contacted them, we had a manager come to the place within 5 minutes to solve the issue. We were very impressed. I would definitely recommend this place, and it won't be our last trip here!
Super helpful staff! Very accommodating! Had a great time! I would highly recommend this location! Amazing snorkeling! And the car is super helpful! :)
Awesome stay - the condo is exactly as described, terrific location, and the host communication was really good. Great visit!

This condo is located in a fantastic location. Although we were in one of the blocks back from the beach the view overlooking the gardens was lovely and only a 5 min walk to the beach. Great Vacation Retreats were so easy to deal with and checknin was a breeze. Loved staying here, place was very comfortable and clean and provided everything we needed.

The location in the South Shore was perfect. The condo is walking distance to the beach, restaurants, stores, and a club. Entry to the Athletic Club is a definite plus with a swimming pool with a slide, ping pong table, gym, tennis courts. They also held our luggage after we checked out. The unit is well equipped and the grills outside are great. It's also very private and quiet. Our host was amazing. Everything from making the reservation to checking out was easy and stress-free. She provided us with very helpful information about the area. I had mentioned that we were there for my mom's birthday and she left us a bottle of wine and balloons. The only reason I did not give this listing five stars is because the unit is a bit small for the number of guests allowed. I would definitely recommend this listing for a family of four where two are children but a bigger group or one with more adults might not be comfortable.
Great location, perfect size for 4 and a great value for a single mom on a budget. Book it and you won't be sorry!

This condo was perfect for our family of 5. The master bed was large and comfortable with plenty of pillows. The couch beds are couch beds, but the kids didn't complain. The view from the patio is beautiful. There was plenty of utensils and tools we used to cook. The location was perfect!

We loved this little place! We were 2 sisters traveling together for diving (Seasport trip to Ni'ihau), surf (Nukomoi surf shop), hiking (go everywhere!), beaches (Queens Bath) and eating. Super convenient location, peaceful setting, great amenities and wonderful suggestions in the guest book. Bar Acuda for dinner in Hanalei is indeed not to be missed! This could fit 4 people though it would be a bit tight.... we would have been willing for our kind of trip (out and about all day). The hosts were super communicative and the Airbnb comes with free car rental! A true bargain. One note - no aircon only fans but there were plenty of them. If you are the type to hang inside midday you may find it a bit too hot but at night it was totally fine.

We loved our stay at this condo and didn't want to leave! It was clean and spacious with a great deck that had views of the ocean. A short walk to the beach and a wonderful big lawn area with sun loungers and chairs.  The free car rental through Alamo worked out well for us. Right across the road from the Poipu shops where it is easy to nick up supplies and grab inch or dinner. Little Fish Coffee is also great for breakfast. We would definitely recommend this condo and Great Vacation Retreats as a host! Thank you.

The place was overall great and well located, just a quick walk to the beach. The condo is perfect for a couple and had everything we needed. GVR was very helpful and quick to address any requests. The only downside was the acoustic between the suite, especially the upper suite. The people renting above us were very loud and noisy, however, GVR was very quick to address the issue. We recommend this place.

A great property with all the amenities. My only reason for not giving 5 stars  is that it is not really a one bedroom, as the bedroom pocket door does not shut and we were really looking for a one bedroom. A one bedroom  the main search criteria we had. Loved the rental car, and checking in and out was easy and convenient. A well stocked kitchen was a huge bonus, as we enjoy cooking. I would recommend and would definitely stay here again.

We really struck gold with this booking! Since this was our first trip to Kauai we didn’t know what to expect and only knew that we wanted to be at or near Poipu Beach because we’d heard it was beautiful and we had friends who had booked into the Sheraton. The location was perfect within easy walking to the beach and a five minute walk to the Sheraton. The rental car, included in our booking, was ideal as it allowed us to explore the entire island during our stay, and to head to dryer land when it threatened to rain.

The unit itself was clean, well equipped and very comfortable. We were easily able to cook anything we wanted with the fully stocked kitchen. The views of the garden easily made up for the lack of an ocean view. There are communal gas grills scattered about the property which were so clean we assumed they were rarely used, but we were wrong on that score as we had some fun conversations with our neighbors around the grills as we all prepared our dinners. 

All in all, this place was perfectly situated and our hosts made the experience truly care-free.

Amazing value, and the included car rental made a big difference. Location was just fine, and the suite had everything you need for a family or 4. Enquiries were responded to quickly and we were well taken care of.
Great beach for swimming, snorkeling and surfing. Easy access. Great shops and restaurants nearby. Truly a relaxing get away!

Hilfsbereiter Kontakt mit schnellen Antworten. Herzlicher und freundlicher Empfang mit Geschenken für die Kinder und uns Erwachsene. Gute Lage in Fussdistanz zum Poipu Beach. Schnorcheln dort war fantastisch mit tropischen Fischen, Meeresschildkröten und Seehunden. Tolles gratis Angebot im Athletic Beach Club. Frühstück im Little Fish Cafe ist empfehlenswert. Wir waren von unserem Aufenthalt begeistert! Empfehlenswert. Vielen Dank für die tollen Erlebnisse.
Great

Appartement conforme aux photos et au descriptif.
Propre mais vieillissant. Correctement placé, des attentions à l'arrivée mais il manque des ingrédients de base pour cuisiner (huile par exemple)
L'appartement est globalement agréable mais il est dommage qu'il manque d'entretien et de suivi (poignée dévissée, porte de chambre ne coulissant plus, vaisselle manquante, salon sur lanai usé et taché, etc...) 
On attend mieux pour le prix.
La location de voiture proposée ne comprend aucune assurance même pour les détenteurs d'une carte premier et les assurances sur place sont chères.
Le matériel de plage est complet et de très bonne qualité (fauteuils par exemple)
Les nombreux ventilateurs sont suffisants pour la nuit mais un peu justes pour la journée.
L'appartement reste recommandable, mais il le serait vraiment sans hésiter avec un peu de remise en état.

Nice condo, well situated in Poipu. Very well equipped, A/C would have been nice, however several fans let us sleep well. 

Would come again, if it wouldn’t be so far away from Germany

The accommodations were very sufficient.  I forget that there is no A/C in many condos, etc. but the fans were a little insufficient.  Overall we had an excellent trip and the condo was clean and well cared for!  I would stay again!!
Great space for 2 people. More than that could be a bit crowded. Super close to the beach which was convenient and easy. The membership to the athletic club was also a huge perk.
Great location and good place.  Only issue was there wasn't enough towels when we arrived, but they took care of it.  Would definitely stay here again!

name: Private Room in Hong Kong Golden Coast
summary: Private single room. 5-10 mins to Restaurants, markets and convenience store; McDonald, HK food restaurant, Spain food restaurant, Bar/Pub, etc 10 mins walk to Golden Coast beach A bus route Golden Coast - Airport is available (paid separately). Public transport includes 962 to Central, 52x to Mong Kok. MTR/subway shuttle is available too (paid separately).  The room have 1 single bed and TV; shared living spaces and bathroom, Wifi, Towels,
description: Private single room. 5-10 mins to Restaurants, markets and convenience store; McDonald, HK food restaurant, Spain food restaurant, Bar/Pub, etc 10 mins walk to Golden Coast beach A bus route Golden Coast - Airport is available (paid separately). Public transport includes 962 to Central, 52x to Mong Kok. MTR/subway shuttle is available too (paid separately).  The room have 1 single bed and TV; shared living spaces and bathroom, Wifi, Towels,

host.host_about: Hi this is kwan from LA.

name: 3 Quartos Ipanema c/Piscina
summary: Apartamento de luxo com três quartos localizado na área mais famosa de Ipanema, próximo da praia, Lagoa e dos melhores bares e restaurantes da cidade.
space: O apartamento é grande e aconchegante além de contar com uma estrutura incrível. A existência de piscina, sauna e academia no condomínio torna a sua experiência de hospedagem ainda melhor. A proximidade com o metrô e diversas linhas de ônibus faz com que sua locomoção para os diversos pontos turísticos do Rio seja rápida e agradável.
description: Apartamento de luxo com três quartos localizado na área mais famosa de Ipanema, próximo da praia, Lagoa e dos melhores bares e restaurantes da cidade. O apartamento é grande e aconchegante além de contar com uma estrutura incrível. A existência de piscina, sauna e academia no condomínio torna a sua experiência de hospedagem ainda melhor. A proximidade com o metrô e diversas linhas de ônibus faz com que sua locomoção para os diversos pontos turísticos do Rio seja rápida e agradável. Os hóspedes terão acesso a todas as comodidades do apartamento e do condomínio, isso inclui maquina de lavar, piscina, sauna, academia, além de três vagas na garagem. A minha interação com os hóspedes dependerá integralmente deles. Inicialmente eu só irei me encontrar com os hóspedes no dia da chegada e da partida, porém sempre estarei disponível para sanar qualquer dúvida e resolver qualquer problema. Além disso, será um prazer dar dicas sobre o Rio e acompanha-los em passeios turísticos. O que eu mais amo
neighborhood_overview: O que eu mais amo no bairro de Ipanema é a grande diversidade de coisas presentes lá. Existem muitas lojas, bares e restaurantes, de variados preços e para satisfazer todos os gostos.
notes: Não é permitida a entrada de visitantes. O custo por hospede extra é de 100 reais.
transit: Uma das melhores coisas de Ipanema é a grande quantidade de linhas de ônibus que vão para os mais variados locais e o metrô.  O apartamento é bem próximo da estação Nossa Senhora da Paz
access: Os hóspedes terão acesso a todas as comodidades do apartamento e do condomínio, isso inclui maquina de lavar, piscina, sauna, academia, além de três vagas na garagem.
interaction: A minha interação com os hóspedes dependerá integralmente deles. Inicialmente eu só irei me encontrar com os hóspedes no dia da chegada e da partida, porém sempre estarei disponível para sanar qualquer dúvida e resolver qualquer problema. Além disso, será um prazer dar dicas sobre o Rio e acompanha-los em passeios turísticos.

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: The apartment is very comfortable and has excellent facilities in the building. On top of that the location is amazing and you can go walking to the beach, stores, supermarket, bars, etc. Lucas was an amazing host, very easy to connect with and always ready to help. I will definitely come back!
Muy buen departamento con todos los servicios, a 4 cuadras de la playa y a 2 del centro. La atención del anfitrión excelente y de destacar !!! Muy recomendable !!!

O apartamento é extremamente bem localizado, confortável e possui tudo que é necessário para uma estadia plena. O Lucas foi desde o começo super solícito e prestativo. Eu e minhas amigas adoramos o período que passamos no apartamento e já queremos voltar!
Todo muy bien
Great place and perfect location!

name: Ranch Abode Loft in Bushwick
summary: Simply appointed and centrally located 1st floor apt with 20 ft. ceilings, a loft bed, and exposed brick in the bathroom.
space: The space is an open layout with amazing natural light, 22 ft. ceilings 1 brick wall and 1 stone wall which keeps things extra quiet (a rarity in NYC!).  There is a private bathroom (shower and bathtub), full kitchen, 1 full sized sleeping loft with an air mattress and extra pillows/blankets and 1 full size bed downstairs. You will arrive to fresh linens and a clean, functional space, perfect for artsy travelers and working creatives. The Kitchen is small but functional with a working stove and oven, microwave, full set of cookware, dishes, flatware and basic cooking supplies (oils, vinegars, and basic spices). The Bathroom has basic amenities and plenty of fresh towels.  There is a gym, game-room with a pool table and ping pong table, television with full cable, dance/ yoga studio, and private rooms for music practice in case you decide to bring your clarinet, as well as coin operated washer and dryer- all downstairs.   THE NEIGHBORHOOD,  ART:  Bushwick has been described as the new W

neighborhood_overview: THE NEIGHBORHOOD,  ART:  Bushwick has been described as the new Williamsburg or what the East Village of Manhattan was in the early 90's. The New York Times recently described the area as "The Next Gallery District in New York."  FOOD: Anyone still invested in framing Bushwick as a scrappy outsider in New York's food scene'll need a new axe to grind: the 2014 Michelin Guide for New York is out, and includes almost all of Bushwick's major restaurants. The Vietnamese restaurant Falansai, the French bistro Mominette, the eclectic eatery Dear Bushwick and the addition to Roberta's pizza Blanca — all of which have opened in the last year — landed in this year's guide of recommended city spots. Also on the list were the more established Northeast Kingdom, El Mio Cid and Roberta's. FASHION & FILM:  Bushwick is rich with turn of the century architecture and hosts a thriving film community. The characters of HBO's "Girls" attended a warehouse party here and the show regularly shoots in apartmen
notes: One train ride from JFK airport on JMZ subway lines (Myrtle Ave station). Check-in after 2pm Check-out by 12pm (noon) Note: other times can be pre arranged, please just ask! The Myrtle Ave. stop on the JMZ line. It is a five minute walk from the apartment. The J and the M trains stop every 10 - 15 minutes on weekdays. During evenings and weekends the trains may take a bit longer. Also, both the Montrose and Morgan stations on the L line are a 10-15 minute walk away. The total ride time into downtown Manhattan from any of the stops is 15 minutes. It takes 45 minutes to get to Times Square.
transit: The Myrtle Ave. stop on the JMZ line. It is a five minute walk from the apartment. The J and the M trains stop every 10 - 15 minutes on weekdays. During evenings and weekends the trains may take a bit longer. Also, both the Montrose and Morgan stations on the L line are a 10-15 minute walk away. The total ride time into downtown Manhattan from any of the stops is 15 minutes. It takes 45 minutes to get to Times Square.
access: Everything the apartment and building have to offer:)
interaction: I'm available any-time via phone if you need me.
house_rules: - Enjoy yourself and please ask any questions you may have!  - Please be respectful of the neighbors and community. This is their home.  - Turn off lights and heat or AC when you are out of the apartment and make sure to turn off when you leave:)

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: Hello! I am a Brooklyn based film, television, video producer and director. I am originally from a small town in New Mexico. I travel all of the time and have had a wonderful time renting to other traveling airbnb'ers! Looking forward to meeting you!

reviews.comments: Shannon's apartment was left lovely and clean with plenty of towels and bedding, the place was huge and it was a pleasure to stay there.

Shannon was very helpful and flexible, available for questions whenever I had them. Her apartment is gorgeous, just as described and very clean and spacious. The apartment complex is also really cool, and we were lucky enough to meet some of the other lovely residents during our stay. The location near the myrtle JMZ train station was so convenient. We had a fantastic time here.

I only hope that every airbnb host is as friendly and efficient as Shannon. We couldn't have asked for a better stay in her lovely apartment. It was clean, spacious, fully stocked with linen/bathroom supplies and super close to the JMZ train line. Thanks so much Shannon, it made the trip that much easier.

we spent a great time in the appartment of shannon. everything we needed was there- perfect kitchen, lots of fresh towels and sheats, very interesting building with billiard, ping pong,etc.downstairs. perfect subway station to everywhere nearby. nice delis around. perfect for a new york brooklyn trip - not the snobby one.
thank you shannon

Shannon is so cool ! And her loft is conveniently located for almost everything. Very close to the subway station,bars.restaurants,and delis. She helped me,and my girlfriend to find things to do nearby, She also took good care of us. I would stay at her place again and again.
Wonderful apartment, great hostess.
Great space in an amazing area. Very unique.

Appartement très bien placé, au carrefour de Brooklyn (Bushwick-Williamsburg) et Manhattan. Très bien déservit par le métro et les bus.

Ce qui nous a plu est la vie de quartier très populaire sans aucun souci, gens sympathiques toujours près à aider ou renseigner (comme partout ailleurs à NYC )

I had a really great time at Shannons Apartment. Everything was perfect and everything was there to feel like home. Shannon is a very nice person and i hope to be there very soon again. Thank you for all.

Shannon's Appartment is amazing. 

The place is in a great location within walking distance from two subway lines, great restaurants, 24 hour fresh produce and deli, close to good clothing shops and a quick 15minute subway ride to everything manhattan has to offer. 

The bed is comfortable, the kitchen is well stocked, the games room is good fun and the rooftop is jaw dropping. 

Shannon is a great host, she had plenty of good recommendations to help us get the most out of bushwick and it's surrounding neighborhoods. And she was incredibly accommodating towards our crazy 2am arrival! (Thanks for waiting up Shannon!)

If your looking for a more unique stay in New York, away from the swarms of tourists in Manhattan then this is the perfect place to base yourself. 

10/10 could not fault the place.

My boyfriend and I really enjoyed our stay at Shannon's loft. Shannon was extremely friendly and considerate, and she was very reachable when we had questions. I felt safe in the building, and the room suited the two of us just fine. Loved the book collection. No pool balls in the common room, but we just played ping pong instead. 

The location is extremely convenient - just a couple minutes walk to subway. We were able to get all over NYC easily and it was great to come back, relax and cook a nice meal at the end of the day at the loft. We would definitely stay here again - wish I lived here!
Perfect. Great location. Great host.

Shannon's place was great, just like the home I would want in NYC. I used to live in Manhattan years ago and I was visiting with my girlfriend for the New Years. It was her first trip to the U.S. and she wanted to see New York, a real, authentic, and old New York. Bushwick is that right now. It's hip, arty, and with just enough grit to make it feel like you're in New York not the theme park that tourists end up going to. Her apartment is close to trains, some great restaurants and grocery stores, and the building is really cool. We mostly stayed out, but when we stayed in we could cook and watch Netflix like we were home. I can not stress how comfy she has made it. I really felt like I was home. I would highly recommend Shannon's place and would love to stay there again

Shannon's place was perfect.  Not too sparse, not too cluttered.  A great loft experience.  Location is great - subway two blocks away and the Citibike station only 3 blocks away.  Shannon was very easy to deal with, quick to respond and was a pro at hosting.  Hope to stay here again!
OK:)

Shannon était en déplacement, mais nous avons pu facilement la contacter, et avons été reçu par une amie qui nous a donné les clefs. Nous avons pu avoir les informations qui nous manquaient par mail ou par téléphone avec Shannon.
L'appartement correspond à la description, un des couchage est sur une mezzanine au dessus d'un lit 2 places. Le Building est très sympa, c'est super pratique de pouvoir faire ses lessives, et de pouvoir répéter son instrument (pour les musiciens) au sous-sol!
Le quartier est typique, c'est agréable d'être les seuls touristes, de pouvoir se sentir immergé.  C'est un quartier authentique et populaire, mais on s'y sent en sécurité. Il y a des commerces à proximité.
The place is very nice, big, clean and stylish. We really enjoyed our week and Shannon helped us very quickly when we had questions, thanks a lot!

For our first time in New York, it was somewhat courageous of us to live like locals, deep in the neighborhood of Bushwick, Brooklyn.  It took some adjusting for us to hang out in the area.  The area is considered 'gritty' which is extremely true. I cant stress that enough. It is dirty, you might be bothered for spare change, you might be asked to swipe your metro card for someone,  however the area does have some of the coolest restaurants in the city. But you must go looking for them, otherwise you will only find corner deli's that don't take international credit cards and random pawn shops etc.  We actually loved our experience at Shannon's though. Shannon's studio was great. Lots of space for two. The only complaints we had were that the walls were paper thin and it was all around a bit dirty. We washed the dishes before using them since they were dusty and just kept a fan at night to block out noise. We also could not reach Shannon until the day of our reservation and had to wait past check in time to get the keys. Once we were in contact, Shannon was super nice and helpful. The roof top is amazing! You can see some of Manhatten's skyline. The subway takes about half an hour to get to Manhatten , once you are there, probably another 15 to wherever you want to go. It is nice to get away from the zoo of Manhatten, I strongly recommend staying in Brooklyn, it's gives you more of a well rounded experience.  For us, this was great, we loved the experience of what it would be like to live there.

Shannon's apartment was fantastic. A great location super close to the subway and to plenty of delicious spots to eat and drink, this apartment provided us with a very relaxing place to take a break from the hustle and bustle of the city while still remaining close enough to get back it when rested. A great price for such a fantastic location would make this apartment a no-brainer for any future trips we take to New York. Thanks for such a great place!

The accommodation was very good, we liked the neighborhood very much even though is a little gray in contrast to other areas. Brooklyn, however is a neighborhood that is being transformed. It takes about 30 minutes to get to Manhattan, but worth staying in Brooklyn and explore this part of the city. Shannon's attention was good although not met, although slow to respond to messages so you have to take that into account. The apartment was clean, but the building was not.

Undoubtedly it is a good option to stay especially if you're a tourist and you want concoer both Manhattan and Brooklyn.
The host canceled this reservation 8 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Great apartment, with tons of space and good value, especially for New York! 

I stayed in Shannon's place for a little over a month. The apartment has a big bed as well as a lofted bed so it offers lots of sleeping space. The living room is huge and it's attachment to the kitchen make the entire space very livable and great to have people over. The bathroom is comfortable, has enough storage, and well functioning. The kitchen is well equipped and Shannon left a wide supply of food which was super nice and convenient. 

Besides it's convenience the apartment has a very unique kinda vintage artsy style which adds a special touch to staying in New York. Only caveat here is that it may feel a bit old and unkept, especially the kitchen floor which needs a little fixing. But if you're cool with a little vintage style, then you'll love the place. 

In terms of the neighborhood, Bushwick is definitely up and coming, so it's really cool to discover some of the cool restaurants and coffee shops around. It's also great to be so close to the subway and the trip to manhattan is smooth and short. However, do note that this is still a gritty area, especially around the subway station so it may feel a bit edgy for some folks. Also, while getting to lower manhattan is very easy, the trek to other areas uptown may take up to 50min or so. But overall it's a great place to stay to get good value for your buck.

Beyond the place and area itself, Shannon and Nez were PHENOMENAL hosts, readily available via text, easy check in and check out and they even helped me out with some mail I needed to get, so thanks so much to both of them. 

Overall, awesome experience with a great place with tons of space and style, a cool neighborhood and great hosts.

I stayed in Shannon's place for a little more than 2 months and I can testify that her place is really great.
In fact, I really think the pictures in the listing don't give enough justice to the size of the place. It was really not clear just how spacious and comfortable the apartment is.

The building is quite old (I think around 1880) so obviously it is the type of apartments that need a lot of care so you will have to be ready for that.

Apart from that Shannon is very friendly, and although I never met her she was always receptive to my questions/calls.

I really recommend staying at Shannon's place
Arion place was a great location for exploring both Brooklyn and Manhattan. The loft itself was a bit rough and ready and not very clean.

Very low price and surprisingly spacious. The heater is very loud when it turns on and blows very hot air (almost uncomfortable), but at least it works. The lofted bed can get very warm, so try and have the fan circulate air up to there. Shannon's recommendations were great and she was easy to communicate with!

Leider unsere schlechteste Erfahrung bei AirBnB seit 10 Jahren. Zum einen kamen wir nicht rein in die Wohnung, weil wir erst als wir vor der Tür standen, erfahren mussten dass das Keybox defekt ist und wir warten müssen, dass jemand zufällig das Gebäude verlässt, damit wir in das Gebäude reinkommen. Und dass um 10 Uhr abends und dieser Gegend mit einem kleinen Kind! Viel schlimmer war jedoch die Tatsache, dass die defekten Gasleitungen in der Wohnung frei lagen und man keine 30 Minuten drin bleiben konnte ohne eine Vergiftung zu riskieren. Möchte nicht wissen, wie hoch die Gefahr einer Explosion war, hätten wir das Gasherd angezündet (Bilder vorhanden, falls dies jemand wünscht). Da wir in dieser Gegend nicht nachts raus wollten, haben wir die ganze Nacht bei 5 Grad Celsius die Fenster offen gehabt und kein Auge zugemacht. Am nächsten morgen wollten wir die Buchung stornieren und das Appartement verlassen, was wir auch getan haben. Und die Höhe war, das Shannon mir versprach die Bezahlten Beträge zu retournieren, aber am Ende sowohl die Cleaning fees (die Wohnung haben wir unsauber angetroffen, Bilder kann ich gerne zur Verfügung stellen) als auch für die erste Nacht zahlen mussten. Lächerlicher Service, sowohl von Shannon als auch von AirBnB. Guter Grund eigentlich, nicht mehr darüber zu buchen.
Great space in the heart of Bushwick with a fun community room in the basement!
A very nice almost hidden place in a very nice and cool neighbourhood!

Un bon quartier, un bel immeuble, de la vie partout autour.
Séjour agréable, on peut faire les courses facilement ou manger dans les petits
restaurants.
Appartement confortable pour qui aime l'esprit "vintage".
Le métro à 2 minutes.
Shannon peut être un peu longue à répondre par mail, mais rapide au téléphone.
Je retournerais avec plaisir chez Shannon.

Shannon’s apartment is very well located, 2mn from the main subway lines going directly to Chinatown, the financial district... 
Even though it’s in an old building, the apartment is very clean and comfortable for 2 to 4 people. 
Shannon let us bottles of water and fruits which was very nice of her and has been very reactive to our questions.

L'appartement de Shannon est idéalement situé à Bushwick. Transport rapide et pratique vers Manhattan, même s'il y a déjà beaucoup à faire aux alentours de l'appartement (bars, concerts, clubs, etc.). L'immeuble dispose d'une salle de sport, de détente, et de studios de répétition libres d'accès au sous-sol (ce que j'étais venu chercher). Il y a eu une fuite d'eau au plafond pendant mon séjour, mais Karima, qui s'occupe également des voyageurs, à fait son possible pour minimiser ce désagrément et était particulièrement réactive à mes messages. Je suis parti juste avant les grosses chaleurs, et il est à noter que la climatisation était en panne, ce qui constituerais le seul point négatif. Mis à part ceci, je recommande cet endroit!
The host canceled this reservation 6 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Great value for money and location to public transport makes getting around New York easy.

We had a great time at Shannon’s place. The apartment has a cool desert vibe, it’s also super well connected to public transport, supermarkets and we fell in love with the rooftop. Shannon and Rachel were super responsive and helpful. Thank you for letting us stay!
Great place, great location, great host. Really easy to get to and from the airport and into manhattan. Really helped us enjoy our stay that much more. Very stylish, too, in a very Brooklyn fashion.
Shannon es una excelente anfitriona ! El loft es bastante espacioso, muy bien ubicado, cerca del subway y mercados. Totalmente recomendado.
Shannon is a great host, available when you need it and the apartment is exactly what you can expect from Bushwick. Get the Brooklyn vibes at Shannon’s!

Très bien situé ,dans le pur esprit New yorkais.. super espace commun en sous sol ,
nous avons eu cependant très froid  dans l'appartement le soir en ce début d'hiver ..dommage ..shanonn a été très réactive  ..nous avons passé malgré tout  un bon séjour ! une bonne adresse.

Shannon's place was even better than we imagined from the pictures. It's huge, and in a really great central area of Bushwick surrounded by cool bars, restaurants and coffee shops. There are two nearby subways that make it easy to get around Brooklyn and into Manhattan. The space was clean and nicely appointed, and it was a real plus to have laundry and a gym in the basement. We did stay in January during the polar vortex days and so often it did get very cold - but at night we were fine in the bed at the top of the ladder. Didn't get to enjoy the rooftop as it was winter but it looks like this place would be an awesome flat to stay in during the sunnier months as well!

name: Very nice location, cozy home!

Utilizar o elevador de serviço ao voltar da praia ou piscina. Utilizar a lixeira ao final do corredor, se necessitar. As plantinhas agradecem se forem lembradas.

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about:
Sou casado, tenho uma mulher muito especial e quatro filhos - dois casais. Os filhos moram fora do pais (USA) e as filhas - com os meus netos - vivem nesta cidade maravilhosa. A leitura. meu principal hobby, disputa a preferencia com o xadrez que jogo há muito tempo e agora por pura diversão. Morando ao lado da praia, as cidades hidrominerais em Minas e São Paulo são nossas constantes visitas, quando não estamos com os netos nos Estados Unidos. 
Meu neto de cinco anos adora o apto. que estamos alugando e desde pequenino já sabia quando estávamos chegando, dizendo - estamos na Barra, estamos na Barra...
O Airbnb é nossa primeira experiência, e estamos um pouco preocupados. Ficariamos muito contentes de alugar para pessoas que tivessem os mesmos cuidados e carinho pelo lugar onde moram.

reviews.comments: Incredible location at a quiet neighbourhood right by the city center. The apartment is very cozy and comfortable. Highly recommended! Thanks a lot for the Porto wine and all the attention and help :)
Nice time in Gilberto's house,in a quiet place with a good location,the host was so careful with us, good experience!

Our stay was perfect. The apartment is truly fully equipped, we didn't miss a think. We were greeted with great hospitality - and fruit and port wine, when we arrived. The location is also great - and so is the view from the little terrace.  We can highly recommend it!

Nous avons été très bien accueillis par Nelson , très sympa ! De plus une corbeille de fruits et un traditionnel Porto trônaient sur la table ,le logement était très propre , fonctionnel, tout l'équipement pour bébé à disposition.
L''emplacement idéal a quelques minutes a pied du Metro , des commerces mais tout en étant au calme avec une petite vue du Douro de la terrasse . Nous reviendrons !

We had a great stay at Gilberto's place. They have picked us up from the airport and welcomed us with a bottle of Porto - how often do you get that? :)

The apartment is perfectly arranged and every little detail is taken care of. There is a beautiful view at the city from the balcony - you can see the bridge, old town and the panorama of red tiled roofs. The flat is just walking distance from the city center and Porto caves.

If you are looking for an extraordinary stay in Porto this is the flat you need!

Cheers Gilberto!

Super séjour à Porto! Gilberto nous a très bien accueilli ! Appart très confortable, bien placé et parfait pour un séjour entre amis ! 
Gilberto a été incroyablement gentil et nous a bien aidé! Merci beaucoup ! Obrigada !
It was very nice to stay in the apartement ! It is close to the center of Porto and although we arrived very late, Nelson still showed up to give us the key! Thank you for being the perfect host!

A szállást kissé nehezen találtuk meg, de segítséget kaptunk, elénk jött a házigazda az angolul tudó barátjával. Nagyon kedvesen fogadtak, még egy portói bor és finom gyümölcsök is ki voltak készítve számunkra. Ez a kicsi lakás tökéletes szállás Portóban, közel van a metro, és a belvárosi látnivalók akár gyalog is elérhetők.

Adoramos a estadia, a casa é muito  acolhedora  e tem uma vista soberba para a cidade do Porto.
As fotos representam exatamente a casa, ideal para famílias com crianças tendo em conta o pátio que também possui bem como todas as comodidades disponibilizadas pelo anfitrião, quer desde computador a playstation :)
Recomendo e certamente voltaremos

This apartment is very well located by the Ponte Luiz. It's easy to get around the city by foot because everything is fairly close together. The host offered complementary wine as a housewarming gift. When the electricity cut off, they helped fix the problem as soon as possible. I highly recommend this place to anyone looking for a great time in Porto!
Super appartement, très bien situé à quelques minutes du centre ville à pied. Merci beaucoup Gilberto de nous avoir accueilli même à une heure tardive, ce fut une super expérience !

Gilberto nos ha brindado un excelente lugar donde alojarnos, con buena ubicación, bien cuidado y de una forma detallista. Además el trato personal ha sido inmejorable. 100% recomendable. Ya volveremos!

A casa é bastante próxima (de tudo) e ao mesmo tempo suficientemente longe tornando-a pacífica e acolhedora. A casa é impecável e com tamanho suficiente para 6 pessoas, quintal ótimo para um jantar fim de tarde e com vizinhança muito simpática. Encontrava-se limpa e em ótimo estado de conservação.
Foi muito fácil comunicar com o nosso anfitrião e bastante disponível para nos receber e nos entregar as chaves do apartamento.
Muito obrigado por nos ter recebido.
Só posso recomendar e atribuir 5 estrelas a esta casa/anfitrião.
Accueil chaleureux, appart bien situé, bien équipé et belle vue!
Très bon accueil ! Parfait pour un séjour à porto
La ubicación del apartamento esta estratégicamente bien situada, cerca de todo el casco antiguo,con buenas vistas.Cerca del mirador que divisa toda la ciudad.
Um apartamento confortavel, otimo localizado. Recomendo!!

Quiero agradacerle a Gilberto por su comunicación, todo pasó muy bien y nos ayudó muchísimo cuando nos costó encontrar el lugar (que está en una zona de callejones pequeños, muy preciosa). Lo recomendo totalmente!
Great flat for two couples, near to the cellars and the old city center.
We did not personally meet with Gilberto, but he accommodated our late check-in at midnight (with a delay of 1 hour) very well! The house is a little small, but enough for a short stay (:
Muito bom mesmo. Voltaremos. Está bastante central para quem quer visitar o Porto.

The Hosts Nelson and Miguel are very very help full and nice people. They gave us very good practical tips and points of interest and replied very quickly when we asked something. Thank you. 
Excellent place to stay, close to the locals and very close to the Historic center. Nice and well equipped apartment. We recommend.
A perfect location for seeing the real heart of Porto. Everything that you need to explore a fantastic city.

Gilberto y Nelson fueron muy amables, nos estuvo esperando en la puerta de la casa, nos indicó sobre los sitios mas cercanos y nos dejó una botella de vino de bienvenida, todo un detalle. 
Muchas gracias por todo

L'emplacement de l'appartement est idéal pour visiter porto. Tout ce fait à pied inutile de prendre la voiture (bien évidemment il faut marché quand même).
L'appartement était propre, en revanche nous étions 4 adultes et 1 enfants et du coup c'était un peu exiguë. Par contre tout le nécessaire pour notre crevette . Merci pour tout. 

Petit mot pour Gilberto : la grosse poussette a les roues dégonflé
Nelson foi atencioso., nos deu dicas de restaurantes e locais próximos da habitação. Adoramos a estadia.
Emplacement parfait pour visiter Porto. Nelson est très réactif. logement conformes aux photos. Allez y les yeux fermés
This apartment was a good location for walking and exploring , 10-15 minutes to Porto, close to the port wine cellars and grocery and bakery only a short walk away.
Alojamiento muy comodo, con una muy buena ubicacion
