host.host_about:
Amigo de sus huéspedes.
Viajero habitual.
Profundo conocedor de la vida cultural de la ciudad de Barcelona. Facilitador de buena información sobre la Ciudad. Ayudo a "integrar" al viajero en la Ciudad.

reviews.comments:
We stayed for a week in Manuel's beautifully furnished apartment and had our best time in Barcelona! Manuel is a very courteous and helpful host. 
Highly recommended for young and old!
Thank you Manuel!
The reservation was canceled the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Manuel has been an awesome host. He organized a driver who picked us up from the airport for 30 € only (a common airport shuttle would cost about the same for two persons). Besides he is a really friendly host and helped us out where ever it was required. The apartment was very clean and looks the same as on the pictures! The area arround the apartment is just perfect to explore barcelona. There is a grocery store just arround the corner with very helpful employees and you can walk within 15 minutes into the center of the city. However we can highly recommend this place to everyone who would like to explore Barcelona!

Kind regards Ben & Tony

My family and I stayed for 14 nights and were pleased with Manuel's lovely and beautiful apartment and we had our wonderful time in Barcelona, Manuel was very kind, helpful and friendly host.

Thank you so much for your warm hospitality. 

Regards Ahmad 

 (Website hidden by Airbnb) December 2013
I would highly recommend Manuel's apartment. The accommodation was clean, modern and spacious. Manuel was excellent to deal with and always more than happy to help.
Muito boa. O Manuel foi extremamente simpático o apartamento tem tudo o que é necessário e está muito bem localizado.

L'alloggio è grande, confortevole e ristrutturato di recente. Si trova all’ultimo piano di un palazzo posto in una via tranquilla alle spalle della più movimentata Calle Muntaner. Nelle piccole vie intorno si trovano molti bar e ristoranti oltre al bellissimo mercato. Siamo stati solo due notti e Manuel ci ha accolto al nostro arrivo. Si è reso disponibile per qualsiasi cosa abitando lui al piano di sotto. Siamo stati molto bene, grazie Manuel!

Manuel is a great host, his apartment is wonderful. Everything is new, clean and cozy. Lactation is good and convenient. We were very enjoyed in Barcelona. Highly recommend to everyone! Hope i could go back to Barcelona soon!!!

Este alojamiento ha cumplido ampliamente mis espectativas. Es confortable y acogedor, todo estaba muy límpio y su localización en la ciudad de Barcelona es magnífica. Pienso que la relación calidad-precio es adecuada.

Très bon séjour dans le logement de Manuel.Son accueil a été parfait.Disponible et sympathique.Appartement refait à neuf et idéal pour 5 personnes.Confortable et bien équipé.Très bien situé dans un quartier calme et assez chic en dehors du centre (St Gervasi).Commerces et restaurants très proches.A recommander pour découvrir Barcelone en famille, en laissant la voiture.(Marche à pied et métro).
房子非常好,位置距离观光巴士的蓝线和红线很近｡住在居民区中,很符合我们的想想和需求｡房东特别nice,帮忙派了车(司机特别帅),并在公寓中等待我们｡房间隔音稍微不好一点｡厨房和厕所的设施很齐全｡有一个非常好的阳台,可以呼吸新鲜空气和用早餐｡非常舒适｡下次如果人数合适,我们还会选择Manuel的公寓!赞!

Manuel was a wonderful host - he is very responsive and reliable. When my family arrived to Barcelona, he offered transportation service from the airport to the flat which made it easy them during their first trip to Spain!

The flat itself is spacious, clean and in a nice and peaceful area of the city (also accessible to the metro and quite central). All in all, the time spent in Barcelona was great and Manuel's flat felt like a home away from home.

Our host Manuel was helpful and flexible. The flat is nicely decorated and very clean, with a lovely terrace. The neighborhood was quiet and you really felt you were living in Barcelona and not just a tourist visiting.

The flat is good located, near subway station, in silent place. There is a good aquipment inside, enough place for 4 persons. There are shops and cafeterias near the apartament. The host was in permanent contact with us some time before our arrival. He oferred his help with delivering us from airport to the apartament. We can communicate with him in English without any problem. We are very enjoyed and we recommend this apartment and the host.

The place is nice and convenient. We bought the Barcelona Bus Turis tour and 1 of the main stop is just 10 mins walk from the apartment (I'm a slow walker). The host is responsive and accommodative. I would recommend this place to anyone who would like to pay a visit to Barcelona

Manuel is a very kind and accommodating host. Our family stayed in this this apartment for three months, with different family members leaving and arriving at different times, and he was friendly and helpful to everyone. When something needed fixing, he was there immediately with his handyman, who is also very sweet and helpful. The apartment is just like in the photos, though it is hard to capture how awesome it is to sit on the terrace and watch the birds and (on some nights) fireworks in the sky.

The air conditioning is in two rooms, the living/dining room and the master bedroom. This was plenty for the time we were there, but I bet it gets hot in August in the smallest bedroom. The kitchen could use a few more plates and utensils, as a family of four ended up doing lots of dishes, but that is minor.
The neighborhood is quite nice, shops and restaurants and groceries everywhere. The buses, tram, and taxis are at most a couple of blocks away, and the subway an extra block in the other direction. Very convenient and perfect for families. 
Thank you Manuel for a marvelous stay!
Such a great apartment! Manuel was a friendly and helpful host. We really liked to stay there.
Nous sommes tous satisfaits , propre, bien situé, très clair, espace suffisant

Manuel was a great host. Made sure to receive us earlier than the check in time and let us stay past the checkout time which was very nice. Super organized operation. The place was very nice and clean. Ton of space for a larger group. Only setback was spotty wifi but could be an issue since there were 3 of us. Location was good with a lot of good restaurants just across the street and around the corner.

Very quiet location. Not much social action around the neighborhood. But the metro is very near and can easily take you to las rambles in 5-10 min. I would recommend this apt simply for its cleanliness and low key environment

A very nice apartment! We ( a sweish family) stayed for 5 nights and had two teenagers with us, great they could have their own rooms, a modern apartment, clean and tidy, we really recommend this place to stay. If you decide to go, don't miss out to visit the fantastic restaurant just across the street, on the opposite side of the entrance to the apt.
/L

Wir hatten eine sehr schöne Zeit in diesem hellen über die Dächer blickenden Apartment. Es liegt in einer ruhigen Wohngegend mit den nötigen Geschäften und Cafes/Restaurants gleich um die Ecke. Es gibt auch einen schönen Park mit Kinderspielplatz ein paar Ecken weiter. Das Apartment war sauber , es hat alles gut gepasst! Wir konnten über die angegebene Checkout-Zeit ein paar Stunden länger Bleiben. Danke! Zum weiter empfehlen.
Apartamento bem localizado, limpo, grande, todos os quartos bem arrumados e novos. Quem recebeu a gente nao foi o Manuel, foi a Lucia que foi uma pessoa bem atenciosa, educada e muito simpatica.

The host was easily accessible.  He sent a very nice representative to greet us and show us the apartment.  It was very nice, warm and centrally located.  The listing stated 5 beds and there were 5 beds but two were together to make a queen bed.  This could of been clarified as the pictures from this one room was taken in two different directions that led us to believe that there were more beds. The apartment was well equipped.  It was spacious and the master bathroom was very spacious. The apartment was clean and the ac worked very well.  It had a nice balcony terrace.  We enjoyed our stay very much.  Would highly recommend this apartment to anyone looking for a place in Barcelona.

We had a wonderful stay in this apartment. Manuel was an excellent host, kind, attentive, and very helpful. The moment we had an issue with the hot water heater, Manuel was there within minutes to resolve the situation. The apartment was exactly what we expected clean, modern, and comfortable for four adults and an infant child. The location is excellent and we felt very safe walking around the neighborhood.     The only issue is that we decided to take the metro which is about a 12 to 20 minute walk depending on your stride and stamina. We had vehicles, but we lucked out with parking so we decided not to take our cars to go sightseeing. All in all, I would definitely stay in this apartment again! Muchisima gracias Manuel!

Vine con mis esposa y mis hijos. Barrio muy lindo. Fácil el transporte. Muchas tiendas y resturantes cerca. Las fotos coinciden con lo recibido. La cocina limpia, moderna y con todo lo necesario. Gracias , pasamos bien ! Excepto por el internet, no nos funcionó sino una hora el primer día.

이동에 편리하고 주변에 괜찮은 식당들이 있는 위치적으로 뛰어난 곳입니다. 
아침 햇살을 느낄 수 있는 조용한 가족 여행을 원하는시는 분들에게 추천 합니다

Abbiamo soggiornato per sei giorni, in questo bellissimo, luminoso e silenzioso piso! Ben arredato e fornito di ogni confort, corrispondente esattamente con le foto e la descrizione dell'host. In un quartiere molto bello fornito di tanti negozi, ristoranti molto caratteristici. La vicinanza con la diagonal, e con tutti i mezzi di trasporto, lo ha fatto apprezzare ancor di piú. Manuel non abbiamo avuto il piacere di conoscerlo, ma in sue veci, Lucia é stata molto puntuale, gentile e solare, fornendoci indicazioni dettagliate. La consiglieró vivamente ai miei amici.
Generally, its a nice accommodation. Its comfortable and my friends and I really satisfied. But, the sound-insulated effect need to improve.

Voilà un appartement conforme à la description. Son emplacement proche de la "Diagonale" est idéal pour partir rapidement à la découverte de la ville. 
Une bonne boulangerie au coin de la rue et un peu plus loin un petit magasin de fruits et légumes / produits alimentaires... 
Pour le parking si vous venez en voiture : à prévoir en avance (15 jours d'anticipation nécessaires pour un bon rapport prix/emplacement/disponibilités). Pour ce-faire, rendez-vous sur les sites de type (Website hidden by Airbnb) par exemple. 
L'accueil a été très bon et des amis ont déjà l'adresse de notre formidable séjour !

The apartment was as expected - clean and spacious, good location with a friendly neighborhood and a balcony perfect for having breakfast outside. We met the girl who showed us around at the agreed time, however the check-in timing could be more flexible, she could only meet us at a specific time, so we needed to adjust to her schedule.
Very nice place. Clean and exactly as in the ad.

Very good house, spacious clean and convenient, we really enjoy the journeys in the house. The host is really nice and friendly, the transport around house is very convenient and the surrounding is very beautiful and safe. Strongly recommended!

Alle voorgaande reviews kunnen wij alleen maar beamen. Het is een keurig appartement met goede matrassen. Problemen met het rolluik en een kapotte waterkoker werden binnen een dag verholpen. De hop on hop of bus vinden wij een aanrader (2dagen gedaan). De halte (Placa de Fransesc Macia) bevindt zich op 300m van het appartement en wordt aangegeven door een bord met daarop Barcelona Bus Touristic (even zoeken). In de bus ontvang je oortjes en kan je in het Nederlands info beluisteren. Metro is ongeveer 15 min lopen.

Wir hatten einen wunderschönen Aufenthalt in Barcelona.
Das Appartement ist sehr sauber und absolut ruhig gelegen.
Hoch über den Dächern die Aussicht geniessen und auf der Terrasse frühstücken war ein highlight.
Auch ist das Appartement sehr zentral gelegen und die Metro oder der Bus ist zu Fuss schnell erreichbar.
Trotzt der späten Ankunft 23.30 Uhr hat uns Luzia freundlich und kompetent empfangen und uns den Schlüssel für das Appartement übergeben.
Wir haben uns gut aufgehoben gefühlt und wir können Manuel nur weiter empfehlen.
Besten Dank

Great apt close to Gracia and Plasa del Sol, shopping. Not right next to a metro/tube station so a little (aprox 5-10 mins) walking is required but that is just great way to see the area and explore. 
Not right next to the tourist traps but where the Spanish live and enjoy life. PERFECT! We prefere that and really enjoyed the area and all that it had to offer. 

We loved the apt. Is just like it looks in the pictures. Great beds.  Reccomended!

Manuel met us at the apartment on time. The description and photos of the apartment were all correct. The location and neighbourhood where the apartment is located is excellent. Within walking distance of a Metro, close to plenty of shops, cafes, bars etc.  The apartment block was quiet most nights.

Wow, during this trip we have stayed at several Airbnb places but this one was by far the best: we were met by Lucia, on behalf of Manuel. She is a warm, lovely lady who offered lots of great recommendations on restaurants and places of interest. 
The place itself was exactly as described and, in our recent experience, this isn't always the case. The location of the place is great with wonderful restaurants just opposite our apartment buildings and the main shopping street nearby. The apartment was so comfortable with great finishes and we found it really clean. I would definitely recommend this place if you are thinking about visiting Barcelona.

3 of us stayed at Manuel's during our visit in Barcelona and found the apartment to be a great size. Although not walking distance from the Gracia metro, the Muntaner tube station is easily accessible in addition to quite a few bus stops.  The neighborhood is lovely and we felt extremely safe at all times, and also had a great choice of restaurants / pharmacies / supermarkets / shopping.  Our flights were delayed and we really appreciated Lucia's flexibility in meeting us later.

This flat is spacious , clean and well situated. Manuel ensures that everything is taken care of. We did some cooking at the flat and the equipment was good.The area has some good local shops and bars, and is close to the metro.. as well as being only 10 euros from most places in the city...if taxis are your thing. Buy tickets online for Gaudi exhibits as this will save heartache...but expect to spend if you wish to see it all.  Recommended!!

The house is fantastic, spacious, clean, well furnished and connect.
I don't agree with the late check in policy

Cet appartement est proche de l'endroit où nous avons suivi une formation durant 10 jours. Agréable et pratique avec son balcon, ses 2 niveaux et 2 salles de bain. Quartier tranquille, proche de toutes commodités, de Diagonal et du centre ville.
Notre séjour fut agréable.
Nous remercions Manuel pour sa gentillesse et tous ses conseils.

Casa magnifica, limpia, amplia y muy cómoda. Buena localización. Hemos ido con coche de alquiler y hemos podido aparcar sin problemas en los alrededores. A parte dispone de varios supermercados muy cercas para la compra.
Con Manuel, todo genial, buena comunicación y sin ningún tipo de problemas y ofreciendo su ayuda para cualquier cosa.
Sin duda alguna, TOTALMENTE RECOMENDABLE!!!!

La próxima vez que vaya, repetire.

Nabolaget virker trygt, hyggelig med restauranter og forretninger. Leiligheten har en fin liten terrasse der man kan spise frokost og sitte om kvelden.  Leiligheten passer veldig fint til 2 par eller en liten familie. Leiligheten manglet skriftlig informasjon om teknisk utstyr og området rundt. 
Vi møtte aldri verten, men ble møtt av en kvinne som nok er ansatt for å ta imot gjester. Hun var hyggelig og imøtekommende. Jeg har kommunisert med Manuel via epost og fått svar på mine spørsmål.

We really enjoyed our visit to Barcelona and Manuel's apartment didn't disappoint.  It is located in a lovely neighborhood.  We had 3 adults and 2 kids and we were able to live in the apartment for a week without discomfort.  Manuel was a gracious host as well.

This is a great and spacious apartment. Very clean, very well organized. We were 4 friends and we enjoyed it hey much. The location is great, not in the very center but not so far. You also have a lot of supermarkets and restaurants next by, cheap and great !  The host is great and very flexible. Barcelona is gorgeous, enjoy your stay as much as we did !

Ubicación perfecta, en una zona tranquila, residencial, pero con muchísimos restaurantes cerca de la zona.
Metro y tranvía bastante cerca.  Los baños muy bien.
La terraza es un plus.
Une petite perle dans un quartier très agréable

Clean, complete, comfortable, central. Ideal for short stay-overs.
Be aware of an additional tourist tax on the spot.
La vivienda está en perfectas condiciones, con todo tipo de detalles,amplia y muy cómoda,tal cual se ven en las imágenes, en una zona céntrica. Muy muy recomendable.

Appartement très agréable, dans un quartier calme, résidentiel, avec des cafés très sympa (cf. celui sur career de amigo). Très agréable balcon, on imagine la Barcelone des années 30 avec les anarchistes qui se baladaient de toit en toit pour se battre (cf. livre de Kessel).
L’ascenseur qui nous parle en catalan, c'est bien sympa aussi! Bref, un très bel appart pour un voyage professionnel ou en famille!
The prive is high for the value of apartament

Manuel's apartment off Montaner is a great stay overall! The apartment is clean, spacious and well-equipped. 
Although the location is slightly away from the city center, the neighborhood is very nice and has a great selection of shops, supermarkets and eateries.
Our check-in/check-out experience was great! Both Manuel and his assistant went to great lengths to help us get acquainted with the area and with travel arrangements when we left.
The only issue we had was with the WiFi that was not working 100% but I'm sure that Manuel has had it sorted out.
Thanks for an amazing stay in Barcelona, we will definitely come again!
Muy buen apartamento!! Terraza, muy recomendable, y confortable!!!

Manuel was very helpful and kind. The apartment was nice with a lovely balcony. Walkable distance to public transport, shops. We were 4 persons together and felt very comfortable especially with 2 bathrooms. I recommend this place for staying in Barcelona.
The house is quite large and bright, we can enjoy the sunshine at balcony, there are three lovely bedrooms, the beds are really comfortable. we would say it is an excellent experience.

Die Wohnung ist im 5. Stock, es wohnt keiner darüber. Das ist sehr wichtig, da das Haus sehr hellhörig ist. Die Wohnung ist hell und in der Küche sind alle wichtigen Dinge vorhanden. Es gibt ausreichend Platz, die Bäder sind ordentlich und zweckmäßig. Die Lage ist sehr gut: eine gute Bäckerei und eine große Markthalle sowie ein kl. Supermarkt um die Ecke, Bushaltestelle an der nächstliegenden Querstraße, Metrostation in ca. 10 Min. erreichbar. Restaurants und schöne kleine Geschäfte in unmittelbarer Nähe, nachts absolut ruhig (kein Verkehrslärm). Bei einem Problem mit der Klimaanlage kam Manuel sofort und konnte das Problem lösen. Er fragte nach, ob alles in Ordnung sei und ob wir noch etwas benötigten. Er organisierte uns einen Shuttle vom Flughafen und war dann wie verabredet an der Wohnung. Die Kommunikation lief jederzeit perfekt. Alles in allem ein schöner Barcelona-Aufenthalt und zu empfehlen.
the location of the apartment is fantastic, central but quiet. It was very clean, modern. Manuel is very helpful and responds very quickly. We liked our stay a lot !

Very kindly host~^^
Nice room~~^^
We enjoyed our stay and everything was well organized

We were shocked by the size of the apartment. Location was fantastic. Close to bars, shops and restaurants. The apartment has all the home comforts you would need. Just wish we'd stayed longer. Thank you Manuel for arranging transport from the airport and for the communication on the lead up to our trip. Check in was very quick.

The apartment is in a quieter mostly residential neighborhood with some nice Cafes/Bars and boutique shops around.   In fact one of the best Tapas restaurants that we visited on our entire trip (covering Madrid, Valencia and Barcelona) was just around the corner from the apartment.

The nearest metro/train stop is about 7-8 min walk and same for the major bus stops, so if you're looking to spend a lot of time around the typical tourist neighborhoods (Las Ramblas, Gothic Quarter etc.) you will have to plan for about 20 mins travel time.  Overall we found the apartment quite comfortable and reasonably well appointed and Manuel and Lucia were good hosts with a timely check-in process and good explanation of how to get around Barcelona for first time visitors such as us.
We had a very comfortable stay at this Airbnb and would recommend to others.

Manuels Apartment ist ruhig gelegen und ist besonders für vier Personen und Familien geeignet. Die Kommunikation und der Check-In sowie Check-Out verlief angenehm. 

Die Ausstattung der Küche ist okay. Einziger Kritikpunkt ist die Sauberkeit, da der Boden recht dreckig und verstaubt war. 

Alles in allem würde ich die Wohnung aber weiter empfehlen. Ich würde jederzeit wieder kommen.
Manuel is very helpful.  He responded to our questions quickly before and during our four-day stay.

Duplex très bien agencé pour une famille de 4 personnes et très bien situé dans un quartier proche de toute commodité. Ideal pour visiter Barcelone en laissant la voiture. Vue sur les toits de Barcelone et charme authentique. Manuel fait tout son possible pour satisfaire ses hôtes. Je recommande vivement ce logement et nous reviendrons avec plaisir.
Gute Unterkunft. Sauber mit eingerichteter Küche. In ca. 10 Minuten erreicht man die nächste Metro und ist binnen 15 Minuten mitten in der Stadt
We chose this place because we wanted to be away from the more touristy areas and it fit the bill.  Close to a wonderful market and grocery stores.

1층엔 더블침대 2층엔 독방과 트윈베드룸이 있습니다. 집주인과의 대화는 빠르게 잘 오갔습니다. 수압도 좋고 뜨거운물도 잘 나왔으나 위아래층이 동시에 샤워기를 사용할경우 찬물이 나오거나 수압이 약해졌습니다. 집은 대체적으로 깨끗하지만 부엌의 가전제품들은 선뜻 사용할수있는 상태는 아닙니다. 동내도 조용하고 집앞 식당들도 맛있습니다. 슈퍼나 옷가게도 많으니 구경하시길. 택시운전사가 굉장히 좋은 동내라고 하더군요. 집앞 공원은 가볍게 산책하기에 좋지만 아름답게 꾸며둔 편은 아닙니다. 발코니쪽 활용을 기대했으나 테이블이 사용하기엔 좀 꺼려지고 뷰는 별로더라구요. 수건도 부족했던 점이 아쉬웠으나 집주인과 루시아가 굉장히 친절하게 체크인도 해주고 번거로웠던 일들도 처리해주어 무척 감사하게 생각합니다.

Ett fint boende i ett trevligt kvarter. Många härliga restauranger och barer. 
Lägenheten var väldigt fin, ren, bra planerad med en liten balkong där frukost eller ett glas vin kunde intas. 
Manuel var en bra värd. 

Vi rekommenderar boendet.
We had a great stay at Manual's place. It's a beautiful apartment and everything you need is next door or close by. We can recommend the bars in the area Gràcia, really great.

Not as large as it appears in the pictures
Upstairs is a queen bed in BR1. Also a very small BR2 upstairs with a twin.  Upstairs bath is great. 1BR downstairs with twin bunk beds and a small full bath.  Good family space, kitchen, and best balcony.  Top floor 5 with easy elevator.  Get a taxi in 10 secs outside. Cafe Vigo is great...say hi to antonio.

Manuel was great!
The apartment was fantastic ! Clean , cosy and nice view.
Manuel answers was quick and we gonna visit there soon!

We really enjoyed our stay, Lucia made great recommendations on local restaurants, night spots and directions to get us started at check in. Our only problem was that the Wifi was intermittent and did not always work, I think it was the DSL provider. Manuel was kind enough to send a taxi for our trip back to the airport. (He is correct it does save lots of time and was not that expensive.) We would come back.
Great Host! Manuel helped me with the taxi transport situation both times going to and from the airport. Spacious space. Would recommend.
Excellent rapport qualité prix

A group of three stayed at this apartment for 4 nights over the Barcelona Marathon weekend, and had a great time.

The apartment is within easy walking distance of the Metro and local bus routes into the city centre.  Also, there were some fantastic bars and restaurants nearby so it was a great location for a short break.

Communications with Manuel were really prompt and when we arrived Lucia checked us in and gave us some local tips of where to eat etc.

The apartment had plenty of space, was clean and tidy and the beds were comfortable, so we've absolutely no complaints and would stay here again if in the city.

Everything went perfectly. Manuel was great  host!

Location was exellent, there was very good restaurants nearby.

Highly recommend! :)

Check in was very easy. Lucia was great. She gave us some very valuable information regarding the metro, restaurants, and sightseeing locations.  The place is a bit smaller than pictured, but it was extremely comfortable (especially the beds).  It was a great, safe location.  The place also has a washer/dryer combo that came in very handy. The WiFi was the only thing that was not working properly. Overall our experience was great!

Everything was as described in the posting; the apartment was excellent and in a central location.  Manuel and staff were very accommodating and helpful.  Would recommend to anyone with a group of people.
Great little apartment in a trendy area of Barcelona with good shopping and restaurants. Away from the touristy area but great transportation links to the city. Would recommend staying here.
Très propre et bien situé
El depa muy bien ubicado. Nos lo entregaron muy limpio y con indicaciones muy claras. El WiFi funcionó perfecto. Muy recomendado.

El piso de Manuel es más grande que lo que muestran las fotos.  Tres dormitorios,  dos baños y un balcón terraza ideal para tomar mate observando el atardecer. Luminoso,  a trescientos metros de la estación del  metro, en un vecindario elegante y rodeado de supermercados y restaurantes.   Cuatro personas pueden estar  muy cómodas.  Absolutamente recomendable.

Nice apartment, well situated, near groceries, metro, bus.
Very quiet place.

We enjoyed!!!
Excellent apartment. Would highly recommend.
Tout c'est bien passé, le rendez vous  pour obtenir la clé a été bien respecté, Manuel répond rapidement à nos courriels. Logement bien situé et tranquille

Fantastic location in an area with lots of restaurants and shops.
Great hosts who helped with lots of advice and questions.
Super comfy apartment, very nice and quiet.
Would recommend this apartment to any family visiting Barcelona.
nice place
This was a great place to stay, it was close to all the places we wanted to go to and the apartment was everything expected
Apartamento moderno, muy cómodo, limpio y bien cuidado. Localizado cerca de mercados y la estación muntaner del metro. Manuel fue muy amable. Ampliamente recomendado!
Un appartement agréable et bien placé - un grand merci à Dani pour sa réactivité pour la remise des clés

El apartamento de Manuel es espacioso para 5 personas. Limpio y cómodo. Los 2 baños son muy útiles si viajas a 5 personas.
El transporte público, a 10 minutos a pie te permite tener Barcelona a tu disposición en poco tiempo .
very nice flat in a very nice city !
Very nice apartment in BCN located in a not very touristic area. Nice small and sunny balcony.

name: Mahalo Aina Sanctuary, Dreamtime Room
summary: Epic views and Peaceful setting allow for deep, dreamy, restorative sleeps.  The Dreamtime room is an ocean view room that shares a bathroom and balcony with the Banyan room. See Mahalo Aina Sanctuary, Banyan room listing for Photos and more info.
space: We block off dates when the whole house/sanctuary is booked for retreats and events.  If you are staying in just one or two of our rooms, you will have shared access to the public areas within the main house as well as over 5 acres of gardens, orchards and walking paths.  We set out breakfast for our short term guests, we offer locally harvested coffee and teas and you are welcome to gather seasonal fruits and vegetables and herbs from our orchards or gardens for your own personal consumption. In the kitchen, there is designated shelves in the cupboards and refrigerator for each room and plenty of space/cookware/blenders/vitamix/juicers/cutting boards for up to 5 people to be cooking comfortably at the same time, so if there happens to be others staying in rooms when you are here, there is no shortage of space or tools for you to have a comfortable and convenient stay.  The owners suite is independent of the main area of the house and at the farthest end from the guest rooms.
description: Epic views and Peaceful setting allow for deep, dreamy, restorative sleeps.  The Dreamtime room is an ocean view room that shares a bathroom and balcony with the Banyan room. See Mahalo Aina Sanctuary, Banyan room listing for Photos and more info. We block off dates when the whole house/sanctuary is booked for retreats and events. We set out breakfast for our short term guests, we offer locally harvested coffee and teas and you are welcome to gather seasonal fruits and vegetables and herbs from our orchards or gardens for your own personal consumption. In the kitchen, there is designated shelves in the cupboards and refrigerator for each room and plenty of space/cookware/blenders/vitamix/juicers/cutting boards for up to 5 people to be cooking comfortably at the same time, so if there happens to be oth
neighborhood_overview: Papaaloa is a creative farming community utilizing many organic, biodynamic and farm to table practices...Papaaloa Country Store and Cafe is just down the road from us and has everything you need from groceries to breakfast to the best pizza on the island to gifts made by local artists to music nights every Friday and friendly service. Papaaloa is lush and tropical with breathtaking views of the ocean and a central location to visit some of the most breathtaking locations on the planet. From our home you can watch Hawaiian Hawks (io) surfing our air currents and teaching their young aeronautics. You can see whales breaching and epic sunrises and moonrises a and you can watch our horses grazing, playing and sleeping.  Though we have pets, our house is very clean and, even those with strong allergies have not had reactions while staying here.
transit: There is a bus route less than a mile,away from our home that will take you anywhere on the island.  Also we can recommend car rental agencies that usually offer better discounts. Mahalo
access: Guests have access to all rooms except the Master Bedroom. We have organic gardens, orchards, horses, and small hike to a beautiful waterfall.
interaction: One of us is always available for any guests interactions.

host.host_about: We love travel, music, dance, family, growing food for ourselves and our community, sharing horse wisdom and skills with keiki and horse enthusiasts,  living in harmony with the Aina, and continually learning and growing with this beautiful Hawaiian community.  We are thankful to be living on 15 epic acres, pouring our hearts and souls into developing our organic gardens, orchards, medicinal herbal patches, forging pathways to our waterfalls and secret healing garden and spa.  We co-create with master artists, musicians and healers to realize our vision of providing a peaceful and inspiring landscape for earth travelers to come, rest, be nourished in so many ways and leave refreshed, inspired and hopefully with a deeper appreciation and love of this magical place we call home.

reviews.comments: Stunning location full of warmth, space, time to 'be', and an experience of Hawai'i you would never otherwise find! This is a special place... Steven and Fabi are full of the aloha spirit, and it feels like a palace. The mustangs, and the land, will take you in. Waking up each morning to the 180 degree ocean view changes your heart. Having a sunset horse ride with my family, while whales are breeching, is something I will never forget. Fabi is a horse whisperess and there is much to learn from spending time here... A special gem.

We could not have asked for better hosts. Steven & Fabi were so generous for welcoming us into their beautiful home for 3 months! A great location for anyone looking to heal and soak up all the beauty of the Big Island. Even better to interact with the locals & other house guests who made our experience extra special (especially the animals!). A perfect place for a travel nurse & full-time online student to relax and get work done! If you have ever dreamed of visiting Never Never Land--- this is it. Aloha & Mahalo! -Gaby, Justin & Izzy

We stayed 2 days and the house is so beautiful.
Fabi provided healthy breakfast every morning and we enjoyed to talk with host.  We want to stay again later for longer time.  Thanks.

Fabulous location with beautiful views and peaceful area.  Steven and Fabi were extremely hospitable and welcoming -made me feel st home immediately.  Very well kept room, great breakfast, and perfect place for a relaxing getaway.

Greatest hosts ever! The home is spectacular. The view is 180 degrees ocean and the view of 15 lush acres with 6 horses. Nice to wake up to everyday. Loved the country store. The walk there and back is good exercise. This place is especially good for people who like the country feel. You can drive to Hilo or Honokaa for the closest towns. Akaka Falls is near by. Would highly recommend this place. I stayed a month and thoroughly enjoyed my stay.
Steve and Fabi have a beautiful home and are such great hosts.  Their knowledge of the island and things to do was a great unexpected bonus.  We also met wonderful guests staying there as well.
Steven and Fabi have a beautiful home with an outstanding view of the ocean. We had a great time with our 6 month old. We would love to stay there again.

Staying at Steven and Fabi's home was without a doubt one of my best experiences I have had while travelling! When you stay here, you will be spoiled with freshly picked fruits and homemade yogurt for breakfast and great tasting coffee. They will share with you their local knowledge of activities in the area, and what they are not familiar with, they will go out of their way to obtain enough information for you to feel comfortable about the adventure. At night, you will witness a magnificent display of stars and sleep peacefully throughout the night. In the morning, you can see the sun rise from the window, as well as see their horses running free on the property. Be prepared for great conversation and company while staying here.

Terrific place and people
Easy to find
Great view of the ocean
The facility has amazing wood work and amenities.
And cats and other animals.
A very good experience.

name: Premium Exclusive house & garden Rua Almada
summary: In the historic center, this XIX century exclusively renovated house keeps the traces of historical Porto. Brightness and design make it an exceptional place. Terrace and garden are a haven of peace in the vibrant city center, at the top of Almada street. It has a sunny and elegant living-room, a modern fully equipped kitchen with a terrace and access to a private garden. In the 2nd floor, two suites provide the comfort for a perfect stay. A premium place for an extraordinary experience!
space: On the first floor of the house, a 36 sq m (388 sq ft) living room, bright, combines a sofa with a chaise longue and a large table with chairs and bench with a book shelve. On the other side of the interior staircase, the kitchen (26 sq m or 270 sq ft) is custom designed by a local master carpenter. The kitchen block, with a dishwasher and a ceramic hob integrated, is covered with Silestone (natural quartz) and illuminated with a hanging lamp created by designer Christian Haas. An oven integrated, a washing machine and a dryer are housed in the main cabinet. Porcelain tableware is also designed by Christian Haas. The kitchen is extended by a 10 sq m (106 sq ft) terrace overlooking a small private garden (50 sq m or 540 sq ft) accessible by a wide metal staircase. You can take your meals in 4 different spots: in the lounge, around the kitchen block, on the terrace or in the garden. On the second floor, two bright bedrooms are displayed on either side of the central staircase. Each is eq
description: In the historic center, this XIX century exclusively renovated house keeps the traces of historical Porto. Brightness and design make it an exceptional place. Terrace and garden are a haven of peace in the vibrant city center, at the top of Almada street. It has a sunny and elegant living-room, a modern fully equipped kitchen with a terrace and access to a private garden. In the 2nd floor, two suites provide the comfort for a perfect stay. A premium place for an extraordinary experience! On the first floor of the house, a 36 sq m (388 sq ft) living room, bright, combines a sofa with a chaise longue and a large table with chairs and bench with a book shelve. On the other side of the interior staircase, the kitchen (26 sq m or 270 sq ft) is custom designed by a local master carpenter. The kitchen block, with a dishwasher and a ceramic hob integrated, is covered with Silestone (natural quartz) and illuminated with a hanging lamp created by designer Christian Haas. An oven integrated, a wa
neighborhood_overview: At the top of Rua do Almada, this renovated house keeps the typical atmosphere of the historical center of Porto (stone, interior shutters, ceiling height...), classified as a World Heritage site by Unesco. The district is in the heart of downtown : shops, design or vintage boutiques, bars and restaurants and metro are all nearby. In a few minutes walk, you can reach emblematic historical places of the city re : Praça da Liberdade, Rua das Flores, Sé Catedral, Clérigos, Lello bookshop ... The Douro river is about 10 minutes walk.
transit: From the airport, it will take you around 20 minutes by taxi to reach the house. We may book a taxi for you is wished, and the driver will wait in the arrivals area with the guest's name (fixed price 22€). The metro runs every 20 minutes, and takes 30 minutes to arrive. Each guest needs to buy an Andante Card, and charge with a Zone 4 (Z4) trip. Don't forget to validate before entering the metro. Please take metro line E, direction Estadio Dragão/Campanha and exit at Trindade metro station.  Then, you just need to climb the street Alferes Malheiro until Almada street, and turn to your left. The house is a couple of meters down, on the left side.
access: From 1 to 4 people, you have the entire house for you! Equipped for cooking, resting but also to work quietly (fiber optic internet connection), this charming place is a source of inspiration.
interaction: The house is managed by Alexandra Oliveira which will organize your welcome. She will provide you with valuable information to make your stay in Porto a memorable trip.
house_rules: Availabe in the house

host.host_about: I'm a publisher and an author based in Paris. I have set up and managed the French office of Lonely Planet during 10 years. Beside the 6 years I've spent in New York where I worked for the United Nations, among other things, I have travelled all over the world. Especially in Asia. Three years ago, I fell in love with  Porto where I bought my house and renovated it. I love to go there whenever I have a chance. What makes me really happy ? Travelling, cooking, books and films and share time with my friends.

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments:
Dès notre arrivée, et l'accueil chaleureux d'Alexandra, on se sentait "chez nous". Elle nous a donné des instructions facile à comprendre sur tous les gadgets (wifi, sound dock, television et lecteur de dvd, machine à laver et sèche linge ) suivi par les bons tuyaux pour profiter de la ville en peu de temps, où manger localement (Mundo deli ---top) et comment se rendre à la plage en metro. 
La maison sur deux étages est superbe. Nous avons aimé le mélange de la pierre et des parquets en bois. Tout est neuf.
Elle est équipée avec tout ce que l’on peut vouloir. La cuisine est fantastique. Elle se prolonge par une terrasse où l’on peut prendre le petit déjeuner ou déjeuner. Cette terrasse donne sur un petit jardin plein de plantes et de petits arbres.
Tout est décoré avec goût. C’est sobre et élégant. Tout ce que nous aimons. Des lampes et des meubles design ou vintage dans chaque pièce. Un salon immense, haut de plafond avec des volets intérieurs, donne la sensation de l'espace mais reste intime. 
Nous avons aimé la possibilité de manger ou prendre un verre dans le salon, ou la cuisine, ou le terrasse ou le jardin. 
Confort des chambres et les salles de bains: simplement parfait. Et les draps sont si confortables que je pensais être dans un hôtel 5 étoiles. 
Située en pleine ville la maison reste tranquille et bien placée.

Nous avons passé un moment merveilleux à Porto. On peut voir que cette ville est en pleine ébullition. Et la maison était comme une oasis de paix à quelques minutes du centre-ville. Tout d’abord, la rua do Almada, où elle se trouve, est une rue passionnante. Des boutiques vintage ou design, sont à côté d’autres endroits qui vendent des produits électriques pour artisans comme nous n’en voyons plus à Paris. Nous avons été si bien accueillis par Alexandra qui s’occupe de la maison. Elle parle un français parfait et l’anglais aussi. Elle nous a donné plein de bonnes informations pour profiter de Porto. La maison, elle-même est magnifique. Elle vient juste d’être rénovée. Nous avons adoré la pierre que la propriétaire a sauvegardée sous les fenêtres et autour des portes et les volets typiques à l’intérieur. La décoration est très soignée. Là aussi, un mix d’objets très design, comme la superbe lampe dans la cuisine ou dans le salon et des petits meubles vintage un peu partout, très beaux. La cuisine est un bonheur. On pouvait prendre notre petit déjeuner sur la terrasse qui donne sur un petit jardin adorable où l’on peut descendre par un large escalier. Nous avions un grand choix de vaisselle magnifique. Les chambres sont aussi très confortables. Chacune avait sa salle de bains. Mais le must, c’est les draps. Nous avons eu l’impression de dormir dans un hôtel 5 étoiles. Douillets et soyeux à souhait. J’aimerais avoir les mêmes chez moi ! La bibliothèque du salon contient plein de livres intéressants et une bonne collection de dvd. On s’est senti chez nous, avec un certain luxe en plus ! C’est sûr, nous reviendrons à Porto et dans cette maison qui nous a touchés. Le séjour était trop court, comme toujours…

We loved staying at Zahia's place.  Alexandra welcomed us very warmly and gave us good tips about Porto. The house ist very well furnished and there is nothing at all we were missing. More – we loved the design and everything  including the dishes of villeroy & boch. We felt like at home! 
Everything is new and clean. Also the beds are very comfortable - in addition it's a quiet neighborhood and we slept very well. We were very lucky to find a place like this and can recomend it to everyone. 
We'll be back...

This was the best house we have stayed so far for the Portugal/Spain trip. Zahia house was really very neat, tidy, spacious and tastefully decorated. Her friend was there for the check in. He was such a great help and host. I highly recommend Zahia house if u and your friend are in Porto and would like to do some cooking and enjoying by the backyard with wine.  Also not to mention, u can walk by foot to a lot of places from Zahia house between 15-20mins, and a lot of eateries just 2-3mins walk from her place.

The appartment is very well located, very conveniet, fully equipped.
We have been welcome, and provided with lot of tips (best locations to have lunch, to go shopping or to enjoy pasteries and drinks.  So much that we preferred not use the kitchen so as to enjoy the portuguese food (even the vegetarian!).
We warmly recommend this location.

I would return to Porto just to repeat the experience of my visit to Zahia's home in the old city of Porto!

Every step of the process, from making first contact to sadly having to say goodbye, was a pleasure.  Such beautiful energy and style. Thank you so much Zahia, Alexandra and Diogo for your kindness, care and assistance. Also very much enjoyed meeting some of your lovely friends in the neighbourhood at Mondo Deli. 

A word of warning though when staying at Zahia's home, her beds are so comfortable, they will wrap their silky sheets around you and not want to let you go  : ) zzzz

Could not recommend more highly to visit Porto and Zahia's home.

Obrigado

: ) errol

Exactly as described. Communication was excellent and host was flexible with check in & out with regard to leaving our bags at the house. V clean in general with a very well equipped kitchen. Great location for exploring Porto.

Wir waren zu dritt, zwei Erwachsene und ein Kind. Es gibt zwei Schlafzimmer. Das Haus ist traumhaft! Genau so grosszügig und wunderbar eingerichtet wie auf den Fotos. Es hat uns an nichts gefehlt und Alexandra hat für uns vorab sogar einen Parkplatz um die Ecke reserviert. Wir wurden herzlich mit einer Flasche Wein empfangen. Danke an die Gastgeber!

Zahia and her wonderfully helpful friend Alexandra provided the most fantastic welcome via their friend Diogo. He gave us all the best restaurant tips and was so helpful. The house itself was absolutely gorgeous, and in a fabulous area, close to the city. The garden also was a lovely place to relax in. Would wholeheartedly recommend staying in this memorably beautiful home!

Nous avons été très bien accueillis par Alexandra, qui nous a donné d'excellents conseils en matière de lieux à visiter et de restaurants sympathiques. Elle a été toujours facile à contacter durant notre séjour. Cette maison de ville est agréable et très bien située dans le quartier historique de Porto. La maison était très propre à notre arrivée. Sa situation permet de visiter  la ville à pieds ou en transport en commun facilement. Porto est une belle cité qui monte et descend en permanence.   Très bon séjour, nous recommandons cette jolie maison à qui veut visiter Porto.

Nous avons été très bien accueillis. Nous avons eu de très bon conseils (restaurants, lieux de visite, etc.) pour agrémenter notre séjour.

Le logement est très bien placé dans un quartier encore peu touristique. Quelques restaurants et bars branchés se sont installés dans le quartier. Ce n’est pas forcément la peine d’aller loin pour sortir le soir.

Le logement est très bien équipé et tout est neuf. La literie est très bonne.

This is a roomy, light, and well-equipped apartment. There is a lovely private garden area and a balcony over-looking the garden. Everything was as described, including very comfortable beds.

The neighborhood is within walking distance of everything in the historic area of the city and is also a few blocks walk from the Metro. There are several grocery stores and cafes, bakeries and restaurants close by.

Our host, Zahia, and her assistant, Alexandra, were gracious and helpful. Alexandra made certain that we had a taxi waiting for us at our 4 AM departure. 

Great apartment, great city, and great hosts.

The stay at Zahia's place was just perfect. The house is charming .. the neighbourhood was what we where looking for .. quiet, far from the crowds still very much in the old city, with lovely restaurants and coffee places nearby ... we loved it !!!

Wir haben tolle Tage in Porto verbracht. Das Haus von Zahia ist wunderschön renoviert, perfekt ausgestattet und liegt sehr zentral in der Altstadt. Da es teilweise schon kühl war, waren wir auch froh um die Heizung. Das Haus hat alles was man braucht. Alles im Zentrum war gut zu Fuss zu erreichen und für Orte weiter weg, wie der Strand etc, ist die Busstation nicht weit weg. In der Nähe sind Supermarkt, Restaurants, Bars und Cafes und viele kleine Geschäfte. 
Alejandra hat uns herzlich empfangen und uns sehr gute Tipps und Empfehlungen gegeben. Herzlichen Dank für Alles!

Zahia's house is warm, quiet and confortable. The decoration and furnitures will make every one feeling home. The terrace and the whole house is perfect to chill after the walks through the up and down city of Porto.

The house is perfect with a spacious, beautiful interior and a magical small garden. The location is ideal with everything in walking distance including good food shopping and restaurants but the block is just far enough from the center to feel calm.

Accueil sympathique, localisation sympathique.
Appartement extraordinaire, beau, grand, propre, de bon goût.
Merci Zahia et Alexandra!

La casa è ancora più bella di come sembra nelle foto, è molto spaziosa, luminosa e silenziosa e soprattutto è originale e con grande personalità. La zona e  vicina al centro ma tranquilla. Le collaboratrici di Zahia attente e sollecite. Ottima esperienza, se torneremo a Porto torneremo qui!

An old house in the centre of Porto that was converted one year ago. Beautifully converted with good sized accommodation on two floors - a large kitchen, and separate lounge on the first floor, and two good sized en suite bedrooms on the second floor. Very clean and perfect high quality accommodation for visiting Porto. We had a great time and we would recommend highly this property.

La anfitriona fue muy amable, nos recomendó varios lugares para salir y comer, y fueron todo un acierto. 
La casa está muy bien ubicada, cerca del centro histórico (menos de 5 minutos andando) de forma que te permite recorrer toda la ciudad sin necesidad de utilizar el transporte público.  Además, la casa tiene encanto.

The flat is perfect, well equipped, nice terrace, stylish, and close to nearly everything. Supermarket, bakery etc. are reachable in 3 minutes. A good bakery - cristo rei - is a lit bit away, direction Mercado Balhao (the Mercado ist closed until at least 2019, due to a complete renovation), while my family was still sleeping I had an expresso here every morning, a small breakfast snack and always good conversation with the locals. Public transport is nearby, 3 minutes by foot to Trinidade, the main metro station, all metro lines pass this station. 

The house is amazing and you feel at home immediately , if the weather is bad or you just want to chill a few hours there are lot of books, movies and a music box. The flat is very clean and everything is in a very good condition. There is enough space for four adults, or a family of four / five, two bathes and a third toilet are luxury, and useful. 

Alexandra who represented the owner Zahia is very helpful, charming and made it possible that we could check in very late at 23.30. Her advices are very useful. Patricia, the architect, who renovated this small and outstanding house, runs her bureau on the ground floor in a small office. If you need any advice or help, Patricia will help you immediately. 

You won't find a more pleasant flat for your days in Porto - you can also discover the north of Portugal with a base in Porto: The railway station Sao Bento is a 9 minute walk away (downhill) and is very good connected to Braga, Douro Valley, surf beaches and so on.

This was the second time that my husband and I stayed at Zahia's house because we fell in love with it the first time (which was two years ago), and we couldn't resist staying again! The house is gorgeous; it has spacious rooms, bright skylights, and a wonderful back garden. We slept in the master bedroom, which is situated on the top floor at the back of the house, so it is quiet at night. Alexandra is the manager of the house, and she is very responsive, professional, and kind. This is a gem in Porto!

name: Eco Hale Hawaii in the Rainforest Lots Of Aloha
summary: Experience your own Private Cottage in lush native Ohi'a trees, hapu'u fern & tropical gardens.  Enchanting romance, solitude, "Old Hawaii" style Aloha. NO CLEANING FEES. Uniquely designed for the INTREPID & Adventurous on the Road Less Traveled.  Eco Hale enkindles nature lovers, romantics, retreat seekers, adventurers & kind souls.  1 Acre, Secure, gated, solar power comfort & peace. East Hawaii, Puna triangle, no 4-W needed nature, hikes, hot tub, stars, birds & sun. Rates vary.
space: Hale (pronounced ha-lay) is the Hawaiian word for dwelling/home.  Eco Hale is a separate standing cottage; cozy, comfortable studio ensuite layout with separate enclosed indoor bathroom and Japanese Soaking Tub on the covered deck.  Accommodates no more than 2 INTREPID travelers or the Solo adventurer. NO additional cleaning fees. -Your retreat is surrounded by lush manicured native vegetation providing a sense of closeness to our natural ecosystem, seclusion, privacy and magic.  Windows are positioned to allow the surrounding rain forest view and morning sun rise/evening glow to light and enhance your stay.  A chorus of birdsong announces the day and the soft chant of frogs serenade the night.  Hawaiian rains provide the comforting patter upon the roof. -Delight in a small footprint designed and furnished with special comforts; sustainable bamboo flooring, custom tile work, re-purposed materials and lots of personality. -On demand H2O provides hot showers. Please see the reviews. This
description: Experience your own Private Cottage in lush native Ohi'a trees, hapu'u fern & tropical gardens.  Enchanting romance, solitude, "Old Hawaii" style Aloha. NO CLEANING FEES. Uniquely designed for the INTREPID & Adventurous on the Road Less Traveled.  Eco Hale enkindles nature lovers, romantics, retreat seekers, adventurers & kind souls.  1 Acre, Secure, gated, solar power comfort & peace. East Hawaii, Puna triangle, no 4-W needed nature, hikes, hot tub, stars, birds & sun. Rates vary. Hale (pronounced ha-lay) is the Hawaiian word for dwelling/home.  Eco Hale is a separate standing cottage; cozy, comfortable studio ensuite layout with separate enclosed indoor bathroom and Japanese Soaking Tub on the covered deck.  Accommodates no more than 2 INTREPID travelers or the Solo adventurer. NO additional cleaning fees. -Your retreat is surrounded by lush manicured native vegetation providing a sense of closeness to our natural ecosystem, seclusion, privacy and magic.  Windows are positioned to al
neighborhood_overview: The Puna district is a huge triangle area encompassing territory between Hilo, Volcano, Pahoa and Kalapana.  Kilauea's latest eruption began on May 3, 2018 with lava flowing continuously until August 6, 2018.  The affected Puna area, in the southeast corner of the island comprises ONE PERCENT of the island of Hawaii, which is larger than all of the other Hawaiian Islands combined.  We are in UPPER PUNA and had No Lava.  Pele will determine her future timeline, longevity and destination path.  View new lava fields by air or by hiking to our newest black sand beach, Pohoiki.  We have additional information on the Kilauea Flow in our Profile.   The area also contains the largest remaining untouched Ohia forests in the islands, currently being threatened by Rapid Ohia Death as scientist scramble to discover the source and cure.  This is a unique area and is relatively undeveloped maintaining it's origin.  Agriculture is still a large part of the subsistence economy.  We are located close e
notes: Broadband fiber provides Internet to our rural rain forest location and is currently at No Charge.  Media/Streaming limited to one device at a time.  Please conserve our resources.  Various free Hotspots in Hilo, Volcano and the greater Puna area are additional options. Guest must bring their own lap top or NotePad. OFuro Soaking Hot Tub is strictly limited to use between (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) hrs and (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) hrs, operating within our solar powered system. Last Pour is at (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) hrs. As a rural development "off-the-beaten track" your Holiday can be one of a kind but please remember, this is a Country Living location-Hawaiian style.  Read our Getting Around Section for additional details. This is a tropical climate. We co-exist with the frogs, birds & bees, chickens and watch animals. Items Left Behind will cost $40 of my time, plus appropriate postage & insurance if you require.  Payment will need to be before mailing with a ca
transit: Normally distance/mileage matches drive time in East Hawaii Island due to the smaller population base and distinctly less traveled paths; with the exception of early morning drive time, 6am-8am. Hawaii Island public transportation bus service is limited to the major roadways around the island and as such does not service this neighborhood; 5 miles off Hwy 11. 15-20 miles in any direction from Eco Hale you typically will find much different weather patterns and vegetation growth.  Eco Hale is HALF WAY between Hilo and Hawaii Volcanoes National Park.  Hawaii Island is larger than ALL of the other Islands combined therefore a consideration for those with limited time.  Historic Hilo offers shopping, memories of days gone by, history, provisions and mostly three to four star dining at two to four star pricing.  HVNP offers inspiration, unmatched landscape, skies,adventure and 3-4 Star dining at 4-5 star pricing. Stargazers info: a 4-wheel drive is required to visit the Observatories atop M
access: This 1 acre slice of Paradise is located 1/2 way between Hawaii Volcano National Park (reopened Septemb (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) and historic Hilo town; 20 miles either way.  Our rural neighborhood is designed on one acre lots in upper Puna with access 5 miles off Hwy 11, asphalt 1 and 2 lane entry roads and graveled roads  This is an option for eco-travelers, trekkers, hikers, glampers and gampers or tenting.  Farmers markets weekly and weekends: Kea'au Village Farmers Market-Mon thru Sun, Makuu Farmers Market Sundays in Pahoa, Hilo Farmers Market-Mon thru Sun and Volcano Village Market Sundays.   Check-in is between 3pm and 7pm. Hawaii Does Not observe Daylight Savings Time so 6pm can be DARK.  Other times can be arranged prior to arrival via email although we prefer no check-ins past 8pm.  We understand Kona flights are late arrivals. Please research Saddle Road, south via South Point or North thru Waimea and the Hamakaua coast. We recommend each as a Unique Beautiful Day dri
interaction: Privacy is mutually respected. We are familiar with the Island of Hawaii and are passionate about the lifestyle and culture. Let us know pre-arrival of your special interests.  We certainly have our opinions post arrival for destinations and activities; although our active lifestyle may not allow for daily commentary.  Retirement eludes us.
house_rules: -NO additional guests at any time.  We REQUIRE your travel partner's name. -You MUST receive pre-approval from us to smoke Outside in designated area on the Property. -Check in is between 3pm-7pm.  Special instructions are required for check in after 7pm.  We prefer no check-in after 8pm; HOWEVER Kona flight arrivals can be late so please let us know what time your flight is scheduled to arrive. -We REQUIRE your ETA/estimated time of arrival 48 hours In Advance. -Complimentary evening pupu? You MUST advise us of Dietary restrictions 48 hours pre-arrival. - Hot Soaking Tub Hours are ONLY between 3pm-10pm.  No exceptions. -Quiet hours are 9pm-8am, although you may come and go as you wish.  You have your own private driveway/parking. -Nightly rates Do Not include HI State tax of 14.31% which is Payable On Arrival. -The honor system is observed in regards to conservative electrical, wifi and hot water use. -Special rates apply during the two week holiday of Christmas and New Years. -Secure

host.host_about:
More about us below but First a Lava and Park Update as of 1.16.19
Hawaii Volcanoes National Park has reopened on Septemb (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) However due to the Government shut down limited areas within the main Park are accessible. Still very much worth the visit.  The Kahuku Units remains open.

After three months of eruptions in lower Puna punctuated by a damaging wildfire that burned nearly 3,800 acres of forest on Mauna Loa and Hurricane Lane lashing the Island with heavy rains and strong winds at the end of August the Island of Hawaii is in recovery mode and regaining normalcy.  AND we have a new Black Sand Beach at Pohoiki which IS accessible.

The USGS and Hawaiian Volcano Observatory are reporting that sulfur dioxide emissions at Kilauea summit and in the Lower East Rift Zone in Puna, where lava flows were occurring, have fallen drastically since the start of August and are at their lowest combined level in more than a decade.

Kilauea's latest eruption began May 3 with lava flowing continuously until Aug. 6. The affected Puna area, in the southeast corner of the island comprises one percent of the island of Hawaii, which is larger than all of the other Hawaiian Islands combined.  We are in Upper Puna and were not affected by the flow.
Visit Hawaii Volcanoes National Park   OR  USGS Kilauea for future updates.

KAEO is an enthusiastic gardener,occasional travel agent, sometimes Hula Girl, Hawaii born, ambassador to the culture, caregiver, former Ad exec and sometimes 'pretty good cook'.  She has lived on Oahu, Maui and now the "best"-Island of Hawaii.  I've hiked hundreds on miles on ALL the islands, in past days:  Mauna Loa, Waimanu, Polipoli, Waihee, Wailau, Hauula, the Koolaus & Wainae Mountains.  A kayak trip to Kalalau circumvented the difficult 10.8m hike.  KARL is a master tile setter and works on all phases of the Carpentry, Remodel & Building Industry.  He built Eco Hale; we estimate using at least 60% re-purposed materials.  He also built our home in Mountain View and worked with his family numerous times on the Mainland and Hawaii to build their homes.  He is a Huge sports fan (Raiders in particular).  Karl comes from a family that simply needs their toothbrush when someone announces "Road Trip"; hence thousands of miles visiting U.S. parks, cities and sights.  Our romance began on the island of Maui and our adventure, commitment and curiosity to/for one another continues.
We love the entrepreneurial, independent alternative lifestyle and very much enjoy sharing our slice of paradise in the rain forest.  Our lives have been enriched by the many guests from around the world who enjoy privacy and nature.

reviews.comments: WoW! Thank You hosts Kaeo & Karl for making our stay extra special on our anniversary. Everything was just as you promised and more. The little details and love you put into everything really showed. The grounds are lovely with more varieties than we could count. The Ohana was private, cute, clean, private, comfy, did I mention private!  Our hosts are warm, fun, interesting folks with lots of Aloha. We'll be back for more staycations in the future. We highly recommend  this little slice of the forest. Thank You, Christina & David

Great hosts and great accommodations ! Very helpful and welcoming hosts! The rental was very comfortable and private. Has anything you need for a vacation getaway on the big island, they even let us borrow boogie boards and snorkels for the beach. By far the best value on the island. We look forward to returning one day soon!! Thank you again for a wonderful experience and memories!

This was one of my best stays. The cottage was well set up and priced fairly. A lot of thought had gone into small things. The hosts were very warm and helpful and made me feel like a very welcome guest. I was able to come and go at any time as I pleased, which was handy for the volcano viewing.

***German review below***

We absolutely loved our stay at Kaeo & Karl's hale. Actually, we both agreed that it was the best accommodation we have stayed in on all of the Hawaiian islands so far (hadn't changed yet either). Kaeo & Karl were so nice & welcoming and made our stay even nicer and more memorable by giving us great tips on local activities & beaches, and sharing their garden-grown fruits with us. The hale was clean & comfortable with many nice touches & attention to detail. The "outdoor shower", which I was initially afraid of would mean showering on the lawn being bitten in the butt by mosquitoes, turned out to be a clean and beautiful separate room with a large window for good views into the rainforesty garden. You definitely need a car to get there, it's a little out of the way, but we enjoyed that most and the privacy the hale and our hosts allowed us. Waking up and feeling as if you're alone in a rainforest is pretty cool & special. Thank you Kaeo & Karl for the lovely time! We'd come back in a heartbeat.

Wir haben unseren Aufenthalt in Kaeo & Karl's Gästehaus total genossen. Wir sind uns sogar einig, dass es unser schönstes airbnb Erlebnis von allen auf Hawaii (nicht nur der big island) war - und das hat sich auch bisher nicht geändert.
Kaeo & Karl sind super nett, haben uns herzlich empfangen und unseren Aufenthalt noch schöner gemacht indem sie uns tolle Tipps für Aktivitäten und Strände gegeben und die leckeren Früchte aus ihrem Garten mit uns geteilt haben. 
Das Gästehaus selbst war super sauber und hatte alles, was man so braucht, mit vielen schönen Details. Die Außendusche, von der ich erst annahm sie würde bedeuten 'duschen auf dem Rasen mit lauter Mücken' ist ein sehr schöner Raum mit Toilette, Waschbecken, Duschkabine und großem Fenster mit Blick in den Regenwald-Garten. Toll! Ihr braucht definitiv ein Auto, ohne kommt man nicht hin, aber die Privatsphäre, die uns unsere Gastgeber gegeben haben und das Gefühl morgens alleine im Regenwald aufzuwachen (sehr schön!) war genau das, was wir uns gewünscht hatten. Wir würden sofort wieder hin fahren!

The room is cozy, where cozy really means cozy and is not just a euphemism for small.  It's not just cute, but also comfortably and thoughtfully set up.  We found everything we needed tucked away, from pots and pans for cooking to fresh fruits to flashlights and even jam for breakfast.  The property is like a big garden, with flowers and fruits everywhere.  Kaeo is friendly and attentive to details, but also respectful of our privacy.  She even made us cookies, very thoughtful.  If we come to the big island again some day we want to stay here again!

Kaeo and Karl are great hosts. They'll help you with anything if needed and let you be at the same time. The room is perfectly equiped, and we even got some delicious fruits and homemade sweets! Staying there allowed us to discover the tropical part of the island, and we loved the peace we found in the eco hale. Definitely recommend it.

Everything about the Eco Hale was perfect! The space is super comfortable, and Kaeo's provisions were more than generous. She even shared homemade pie and cookies with us! I would recommend that anyone looking for the ideal peaceful, comfortable place to stay book with Kaeo and Karl. Thank you both again for an excellent stay.

Staying at EcoHale was amazing! The location is secluded, the property is beautiful and peaceful, the studio room is lovely and comfortable. Karl and Kaeo are very friendly, but they respected our privacy. 

I've almost never been able to relax as completely as at EcoHale!

You definitely should not miss to stay at the rainforest in Big Island - what a unique experience and the natural music starting with dusk is invaluable! You can easily explore the volcano from there and get a very good feeling how live is on a tropical island. We unfortunately just met Kaeo, she is wonderful host and we got everthing to feel like home in their new built garden house! The bath/restroom is amazing, it is inside but it felt like having a shower directly in the rainforest. Additionally we could taste all fruits, most fresh from the garden, and Hawaiian food! Choose for Big Island and this unique stay at Kaeo´s and Karl´s place!

We had a lovely stay at Karl and Kaeo's cabin.  It was very quiet and cozy with all the little details thought of including bug spray, chocolates, nuts, beach gear, flashlights.  Every time I thought "it would be great if we had ____"  we would find it somewhere.  They left us fresh fruit for breakfast too.  We didn't see them much during our stay but it was obvious they've put a lot of thought into the experience and are very gracious guests!

This was our absolute favorite place we stayed during our trip to Hawaii! The cottage was a bit outside of town, and honestly, on the drive out there I was not too thrilled that my husband had booked something so remote... but that feeling went away as soon as we pulled into the property! Kaeo met us outside and was so warm and welcoming. The cottage is SO lovely. It was clean and the kitchen was very well-stocked for its small size. Everything was so well designed and organized. The bathroom was beautiful - incredibly bright with floor to ceiling windows.

There were so many wonderful treats waiting for us when we arrived! Homemade cookies, nuts, trail mix, and a cooler with papaya, rambutans (make sure to try these while you're in Hawaii - so delicious!), longan berries, passion fruit... truly amazing and generous! There was even a Hawaiian Christmas stocking with some treats.

We loved listening to the different Hawaiian music CDs on the boom box. There were some great books, as well (both novels and ones about Hawaiian sights and natural history). 

I really just can't say enough good things about Eco Hale and Kaeo (we didn't meet Karl during our stay). It was perfect for us. We highly recommend it to anyone and everyone and can't wait to go back!!

We stayed at Eco Hale and had a fabulous time exploring the island!   Dido to what others have said about the space being beautiful and clean with many wonderful details and amenities to use if we needed.  I was worried about a separate bathroom, but it's right next door and very well done.  We didn't stay long enough to take advantage of everything Eco Hale had to offer, but it was a perfect retreat in the middle of the rain forest to start our adventure.
The craftsmanship and the comfort of the Eco Hale is exceptional.  I especially liked the bathroom and the kitchen area. Kaeo and Karl are also wonderful hosts.

Eco Hale seemed welcoming from the moment we arrived, and Kaeo's personal welcome, which included a tour of the rainforest garden they've helped create around their property, furthered the impression. We ended up dividing our time roughly between sleeping, meal-making/eating, and reading there at the cottage and seeing Hilo (buying the food we needed from the Farmers Market) and the Volcanoes Park, where we did as many hikes as we could. Rainforest is an apt appellation: We saw a lot of rain during our week! 

Karl and Kaeo are attentive but never intrusive hosts, a balance much appreciated. The coqui frogs sang us to sleep, or that's the way we took it. Kaeo would make the perfect guide to all things Hawaiian. Karl's artisanry is evident in the cottage's details; notice particularly the bathroom's fine tile work.

All around we felt welcomed at Eco Hale.

We loved this cute off the grid cabin surrounded by the tropical rainforest. Kaeo was a great host and really fun to talk to. Absolutely loved this taste of Hawaii, and it was perfectly located to travel the southern and eastern parts of Hawaii. We would absolutely stay here again!

The Eco Hale was an amazing rainforest getaway! As other guests note, every little detail has been considered, making this the most "all inclusive" Airbnb properties I've ever encountered. Despite its petite dimensions, everything I could want was packed into this pleasant stand-alone cabin, and Kaeo was a lovely host.

It was a wonderful home base for adventures at Hawai'i Volcanoes National Park and exploring the southeast corner of the island. I loved the sound of the frogs and birds and even thunderstorms for bedtime music. I picked fresh tangerines for the best-ever breakfast juice right from the lanai, and when I asked Kaeo about how to enjoy the fresh coconut, she got out her tools and helped me crack into it - there's nothing finer than fresh coconut water for an evening cocktail in the rainforest.

This isn't a beach resort, but in fact, I liked it better. It was fairly quiet, private, and truly exotic, but almost as comfortable as home. I hope to return someday with my husband in tow!

We had a great stay at Ecohale. Its a well designed and beautiful cabin in a lush tropical setting, obviously a lot of time and thought went into making everything perfect. The location is convenient for day trips to the Volcano or Pahoa. Kaoe and Karl were perfect hosts, warm and welcoming, happy to answer any question but also gave us our privacy. We would be happy to stay here again.

The Eco Hale Cottage is very charming and private.  The cottage accommodations were very nice and the surrounding gardens were lush and beautiful.  Kaeo did a great job of providing a lot of little extras that were most welcome as we arrived and were helpful throughout our three-night visit.  The location, though remote in feel, is only 10 miles from the national park and so we could stay to see the  lava glowing at night and still be able to drive back to the cottage before too late.  There are no restaurants or grocery stores close by, so it might be advisable to stock up and/or eat before arriving (The cottage is 4-5 miles after exiting the main road.)   We would recommend staying here to anyone who was interested in exploring Volcano National Park.

Words aren´t enough!
We have loved this gorgeous place and of course we love Kaeo & Karl. We felt like home immediately!!!!!
My english don´t includes so many superlatives for this awesome experience!!!!
 formidable, excellent, fantastic, delicious, mind- blowing etc. etc. etc.

If you like this kind of experience....
THIS IS THE PLACE TO GO!!!!!

Kaeo & Karl with on a beautiful rainforest acreage.  Kaeo wasn't home when we arrived and the gate was locked.  Luckily she drove up 5 minutes after us.  

The Eco Hale was a quaint granny flat at the next to the main house.  Although nestled in the rainforest and offers complete seclusion and privacy.  Upon arrival we were welcomed with home baked cookies, apple bananas, nuts, juice in addition to the fruit trees just outside.  And a big binder full of information about the area and island.  There is also beach equipment available to use.

Eco Hale is only about 30minutes from Volcano National Park.  And about 30 minutes to Hilo.  Great location to Pahoa.  We truly enjoyed our time at the Eco Hale.

We stayed at Eco Hale for 3 nights and are very glad we did. Kaeo went above and beyond to make sure my daughter and myself were comfortable and happy, and she provides all the amenities one could ask for in a rental cabin~ there is even beach gear available to borrow, much appreciated! Eco Hale is in a great location with easy access to Pahoa, Hilo, and Volcano. I will recommend Eco Hale to my family and friends for sure.

Let me put it this way: Eco Hale is located where Eve and Adam lived until they were expelled for making a bad choice. Seriously, it's paradise: The rainforest blends perfectly with the garden that Kaeo keeps so beautiful. You have to see it -and hear it, because after sunset, the coquí frogs perform a real symphony throughout the night. 
Kaeo and Karl are natural hosts -attentive, friendly, generous and helpful. Chatting with them is a joy, as they have so many insights and ideas to share about making the most of a visit to the Big Island. Their cabin is comfortable, clean, attractive and cozy, a perfect place for a couple or a solo traveler looking for a natural haven. Breakfast, dinner or a drink at the lanae is a must.
I love apples, but if I were offered to bite it at Eco Hale, I would never do it in order to stay in that paradise forever.

Kaeo and Karl are fantastic. They have such great vibes and their cottage expresses the amount of love that they have for Hawaii. There are different snacks and details that make the place cozy and authentic. It is probably one of the coolest places that I have stayed (and I have stayed in castles in Europe and other awesome places). Their place is in the jungle, requires flashlights to get around the grounds when it is dark (which they provide), and has a tranquil atmosphere with bird sounds (leave the iPod at home). It is really clean and fresh space with an outdoor seating area (don't miss the only giraffe on the island). Overall, really warm people with a beaitiful cottage. They will make you feel like Ohana (family) from the moment you  drive up to their Eco Hale cottage.

Kate was experiencing some respiratory problems because, we think, of ash in the air.  Kaeo and Karl were concerned, checking in the next morning to see how we were doing.  And - that was emblamatic of their care.  They were wonderful.  The place was just as described.  A retreat in a cultivated jungle!  We did a lot of exploring from this base.  We loved it.  When we left and left behind a kindle, Karl and Kaeo were most helpful in getting it back to us.. Thank you!

My visit in Hawai'i was nothing short of enchanting, having beginning our stay in Hilo at Eco hale cottage. Kaeo and Karl are the kindest souls I've had the pleasure of meeting; and their hidden oasis in mountain view is something I will not soon forget.  Being completely new to the island I was pleasantly surprised with a surplus of information and tips provided in the cottage (including first hand experiences, anecdotes and menus!). I felt more than at home, welcomed and warmed with hospitality. I will be dreaming of the lullabies of the coqui for weeks to come. :)

We had a great time in Kaeo and Karl place!!
The little cottage is beautiful, very well made, very cleaned and well equipped. 
Open our eyes in the morning with the sunlight that goes through that beautiful rain forest garden was an incredible experience, unforgettable!!!
Kaeo and Karl are incredibly nice and friendly, very helpful and have respect for the guests privacy.
This is absolutely the place to stay in Big Island if you want to explore Hilo, Volcano National Park and Puna area.

My husband and I spent four nights in Eco Hale and enjoyed the chorus of frogs and gentle patter of rain on the roof--in addition to the beautiful garden of fruit trees, flowers and tropical plants. The cozy cottage had everything we needed for our rainforest stay and Kaeo and Karl were wonderful hosts. Day trips into Hilo, Volcano National Park and all points on the southern side of the Big Island were easy from the cottage's central location. The fresh fruit and delicious bread provided were an extra special treat!

This was by far our favourite place of the three we stayed in and our only complaint is that we didn't book longer here! The place is absolute paradise, not only in a beautiful location in the rainforest, close to Volcanoes national park and within easy reach of Hilo (try the kava bar and Pineapples restaurant in downtown Hilo!) but also really nicely decorated and with more amenities we thought possible in such a small space - and the bathroom was like a five star hotel, immaculately clean and with gorgeous decorative and luxurious touches. Kaeo and Karl were wonderful hosts - warm, friendly and helpful, and incredibly generous with their gifts of fresh fruit and home-baked muffins that we found outside the Hale every evening of our short stay.
