house_rules: No smoking place

host.host_about: Spanish guy living in Barcelona, working in the retail field. I like sport and I'm very healthy person, when I have free time I like to go to the swimmpool. Happy to give to my guess information about Barcelona city and the best things to do.

reviews.comments: El piso es ideal y muy bien situado en una zona tranquila y llena de facilicidades.El trato con Marcos fantastico, muy servicial y atento en todo momento .Merci Marcos.

I had a busy 5-day stay in Barcelona and Marcos provided me with a great place to stay. The location is good, not touristic but where local people live, very safe and clean neighborhood. It was easy to get from the airport to the apartment by train and metro, costing just one trip. Metro station was quite close. The apartment was nice, Marcos was very helpful and flexible and let me use his wifi. The room is small but cosy, just enough for one guest, so it's great value for the price!

I stayed Marcos' flat for 15 days and it was great. The flat is clean and comfortable. The neighbourhood is quiet and safe. Easy to access tram and metro. You can find supermarkets, shops, bars, restaurants nearly. Marcos is very friendly. He is always ready to inform about Barcelona and help about any issue.

I really enjoyed my holiday while I was staying at Marcos's place. He's so sweet guy who's willing to help you whenever you need. The room is clean as well as the entire flat. This tidy flat shows how great this guy is!

Marcos is a very polite, friendly and respectful host.  He welcomed me with a map and useful directions, patiently answered all my questions, and in general was very accommodating whenever I needed something. His apartment is small but cozy, and the area is indeed quite charming and very well-connected. The metro is a few minutes away, and all "tourist attractions" are accessible within 15 minutes to maximum half an hour. The night bus stop is also nearby. I really enjoyed my stay in Barcelona, and would definitely like to stay in Marcos' apartment when I visit again. I recommend all travelers to do so!

Nice city, nice flat, very nice Marcos! :)
So its perfect place for really great holidays.
Although we didn't spend much time together, everything was ok and the apartnent is pretty nice located!!! Thanks
Marcos is a friendly host and it's really a nice stay at his place. The room is clean and quite. It's in a very safe neighborhood and very close to the metro stantion. Highly recommend it!

Marcos was a great host! very helpful and went out of his way to provide me with anything I needed to know

sincerely recommend this listing, if you're staying in this amazing city.

The neighbourhood is relatively safe and is about a 10 minute subway ride to the city centre

La estancia en casa de Marcos fué genial. La casa esta situada en un barrio muy tranquilo de Barcelona, y tienes el metro  muy cerca para ir a cualquier sitio de la ciudad. La habitación, aunque es pequeña, es cómoda, y no tiene ruidos, con lo que se duerme muy bién.
Y con Marcos, coincidí sólo un día, pero es una persona atenta, amable, y que seguoro que hará vuestra estancia en Barcelona sea muy agradable. Os lo recomiendo!!

Muchas gracias, Marcos


My stay at Marco´s house was great. The flat is located in a very quiet neighbourhood in Barcelona, and metro station is very close, so you can go easily to any part of the city. The room is small, but comfy and peacefull, and will help you to get a good sleep.
Marcos its a very nice, helpfull and very kind, im sure he will help you with any doubt you had in Barcelona, and will make your stay easier.

Highly recommend, thanks, Marcos!

From the moment you arrive, Marcos does an excellent job getting you situated to get the most out of Barcelona. He had great suggestions of what to try out, and was always on hand if you had any questions regarding navigating the city.
Where he's located is convenient to shops, a market, public transport and very close to a lovely plaza with surrounding neighborhood with friendly locals.
And I couldn't have been happier with the room and hospitality! Marcos will make you feel at ease immediately and that definitely has a wonderful affect on your time in Barcelona!
I had stayed for a weekend in BCN. Also, I was pretty familiar with the City, Marcos was really helpful in specific details. In general he is very flexible, very polite and awesome person!

Marcos was a great host during my short stay in Barcelona. My previously booked accommodation fell through and I found myself needing a room at 8pm! Marcos was prompt and helpful, and I made a good decision to book with him. he was even accommodating when I turned up a little later than planned.

The room itself is basic - it has everything necessary but not much more - So it's suited to a budget conscious traveler. The area is quite nice, and well located. I can highly recommend this room and this host.
I stayed with marcos for 4 days. Marcos is an exeptionally friendly, welcoming person and very helpful if you need some informations about the city. I can warmly recommend to stay with him!
Marcos è il top...sempre disponibile x qualsiasi cosa!!posizione ottima x visitare (Website hidden by Airbnb) consiglierei a tutti!!!quando tornerò a Barcellona,saprò dove andare

Все очень понравилось. Удобное расположение: рядом метро  (ветка проходит через самый центр, легко добраться до всех достопримечательностей), рядом несколько торговых центров, кафе, супермаркет. В общем всё, что нужно. Комната небольшая, но уютная и чистая. Рядом санузел (чистый), что тоже удобно. Отсутствие кухни - не проблема. Белье меняется, 2 полотенца, каждый день в холодильнике вода. Всем рекомендую. Мне понравилось! И Еще, очень приятный хозяин, отзывчивый, всегда поможет!

Schöne kleine Unterkunft in sehr guter Lage. Sehr gut angebunden! Marcos ist ein sehr freundlicher und zuvorkommender Gastgeber. Es war ein toller Aufenthalt und ich würde das Zimmer sofort wieder buchen.

name: Charmante chambre - Berri Uqam
summary: Au sein du village de Montréal. A moins de 5 minutes du métro Berri UQAM et/ou Beaudry. Proche de toutes les commodités (Dépanneur, IGA, Dollarama). Juste à côté de la rue Ste-Catherine. Vous pouvez rejoindre le vieux port en 15-20 minutes à pied.
space: Charmante chambre au sein d'une grande colocation de 5 appartements, avec terrasse commune. Vous trouverez une aide précieuse en tout temps. Cet appartement se compose de 3 chambres où vivent 5 colocataires.
description: Au sein du village de Montréal. A moins de 5 minutes du métro Berri UQAM et/ou Beaudry. Proche de toutes les commodités (Dépanneur, IGA, Dollarama). Juste à côté de la rue Ste-Catherine. Vous pouvez rejoindre le vieux port en 15-20 minutes à pied. Charmante chambre au sein d'une grande colocation de 5 appartements, avec terrasse commune. Vous trouverez une aide précieuse en tout temps. Cet appartement se compose de 3 chambres où vivent 5 colocataires. Vous avez accès à votre chambre, le salon, la cuisine, la salle de bain et la terrasse commune. Même si je ne suis pas présente, mes colocataires se feront une joie de vous aider. Je reste joignable par téléphone au besoin. Quartier vivant et coloré! Vous trouverez beaucoup de restaurants, bars et épiceries en tout genre! A 3 minutes à pied de la station Berri Uqam, la station la mieux desservie de Montréal!
neighborhood_overview: Quartier vivant et coloré! Vous trouverez beaucoup de restaurants, bars et épiceries en tout genre!
transit: A 3 minutes à pied de la station Berri Uqam, la station la mieux desservie de Montréal!
access: Vous avez accès à votre chambre, le salon, la cuisine, la salle de bain et la terrasse commune.
interaction: Même si je ne suis pas présente, mes colocataires se feront une joie de vous aider. Je reste joignable par téléphone au besoin.
house_rules: Respect des autres, garder le logement comme vous l'avez trouvé.

reviews.comments: Maelle a été facile à joindre.  L'appartement était propre, la chambre spacieuse et le lit très confortable.  Malgré l'emplacement près du quartier latin nous n'avons pas eu de difficulté à trouver un stationnement à proximité.  Nous y retourneront assurément ! Nous recommandons fortement.
Cute flat, nice housemates and close to a big metro hub to get you anywhere in Montreal. Thanks guys!

Même si nous n'avons pas eu l'occasion de rencontrer Maëlle, elle a tout fait pour que notre séjour se passe au mieux. Elle est très attentionnée (à la fin de notre séjour, elle nous a envoyé un dernier courriel pour savoir si tout s'était bien passé et si nous étions bien rentrés). Comme prévenu, on a été très gentillement accueilli par un de ses colocataires, Gautier, qui n'a pas hésité à répondre à nos questions lors du séjour. Les autres colocataires sont également très sympa. Bref, c'est une bonne adresse remplie de personnes gentilles et accueillantes.

Ce fut un agréable séjour, on a adoré la proximité des lieux, la chambre est bien confortable et la terrasse est magnifique.
Merci beaucoup Maëlle et à bientôt

name: Renovated Modern Apartment with Cathedral Views
summary: Sit with an espresso in the extensive open living space and take in the city through floor-to-ceiling balcony doors. The quiet, sunny flat boasts modern furnishings and sits on the corner of the building with cathedral views.
space: Квартира площадью 100 м2, имеет 3 спальни и салон-гостиную. В главной спальне имеется двуспальная кровать и в двух остальных комнатах односпальные кровати, которые могут быть сделаны как двуспальные и также в гостинной есть диван-кровать, как дополнительная возможность для размещения. В квартире потрясающий вид на местный собор, много света. Городской транспорт в пешей доступности. Рядом достопримечательности.
description: Sit with an espresso in the extensive open living space and take in the city through floor-to-ceiling balcony doors. The quiet, sunny flat boasts modern furnishings and sits on the corner of the building with cathedral views.
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is right by the metro, a five minute walk from Passeig de Gràcia, and 10 minutes from La Sagrada Família. Venture out and explore the hip restaurants, bars, and nightlife in the iconic Gràcia neighbourhood nearby.
notes: Я живу в Барселоне, и я всегда рядом, чтобы помочь Вам с вопросами и запросами.
access: Вся квартира доступна для гостей.
interaction: Я буду очень рада помочь Вам с вашей поездкой. Могу подсказать интересные места, рестораны и т.д.
house_rules: Dear future guests, Let me know your arrival time as soon as possible so that I may arrange a smooth check-in. Check-in time is from 17:00/5pm; in case of early arrival we will try to store your luggage (depending on availability of cleaning staff and prior groups). Check-out is at 11:00/11am. For your ease, I will meet you directly at the property. There is an additional fee of 20EUR for check-ins after 20:00/8pm; 30EUR for check-ins after 22:00/10pm and 50EUR fee for check-ins after 24:00/12pm (paid in cash). I ask you to treat this place the exact same way that you would want a guest to treat your own home! HOUSE RULES -	I do not host groups who are all 25 years of age or younger. If your group is 25 years of age or younger, please do not place a reservation without written pre-approval from me. Failure to do so will result in termination of your reservation and full charge of your security deposit. -	All guests entering the apartment at any point during the time of your reservation

reviews.comments: Sophie was an amazing guest. We were her first guests ever and her apartment in Barcelona could not have been any better. It was very clean and in a great location. She was incredibly flexible with check in and check out times. We couldn't have asked for a better place to stay.

A generous and warm welcome from Sophie. The apartment is newly furnished and decorated, light and airy, comfortable and spacious. The kitchen is well-equipped (even a Nespresso machine!) and beds very comfortable. It has some great views of the old city and is perfectly situated for exploring Barcelona - if only we had stayed longer!  Next time...

Appartement fantastique en plein centre de Barcelone, à proximité de la Sagrada Família. L'appartement est vraiment conforme à la description et nous y étions vraiment à l'aise avec deux enfants, dont un en bas âge. Grâce à la réactivité de Sophie, nous avons pu organiser notre voyage en moins de 48 heures. Sophie à aussi été très prompte à régler un petit problème de chauffe eau en quelques heures. Communication vraiment facile. Séjour sans encombres. 

Les jouets, les livres pour enfants, ainsi que le mobilier pour bébé (chaise haute, baignoire, lit parapluie) ont vraiment été la bonne surprise qui nous a permis d'organiser notre séjour en toute simplicité.

Nous recommandons chaudement cet appartement pour une famille. L'appartement était suffisamment grand pour deux enfants/personnes supplémentaires. Nous y retournerons sûrement!

Sophie was very quick with responding and made us feel very welcome. The appartement was fantastic: bright and sunny, very clean and complete. Good beds, enough towels, nice kitchen. Very nice for us, a family with 3 children. The locating was also very good: close to a metro station and the Sagrada Familia. Nice neighbourhood with lots of shops and nice small parks.

Sophie was an impeccable host, and her apartment is by far the nicest I've ever stayed in in Barcelona. It's large, light, well equipped, beautifully decorated and very well located. Sophie also went the extra mile, ensuring that the apartment had a cot and high chair for a our son, and even letting us take the travel cot with us for a couple of nights, as we still needed it. Such amazing hosting! Highly recommended.
Sophie's apartment was a lovely spacious and very clean place with great soft towels! Perfectly situated for walking to the Sagrada and with metro stops nearby a good base for exploring Barcelona.

Спасибо, София! Ваша квартира нам очень понравилась. Бронирование было очень оперативным.
Также отдельная благодарность за то, что когда мы забыли ключи в квартире, София очень быстро приехала и помогла нам. Ресторан который вы нам порекомендовали так же оставил отличные впечатления. Мы с радостью вернёмся в Барселону ещё раз и остановимся в вашей квартире!

Огромное спасибо, София!

Notre séjour à Barcelone s'est très bien passé. L'appartement de Sophie est très bien situé et très agréable. Il ne manque rien. Sophie nous a beaucoup aidé à organiser notre arrivée (parking...). Je recommande vivement ce logement à d'autres voyageurs.
The place was very nice. Spacious and it had all the things we needed in an apartment. Definitely somewhere I wanna stay again

A estadia no apartamento da Sophie foi ótima!
O apartamento era exatamente igual às fotografias e a cozinha estava muito bem equipada.
A Sophie é uma anfitriã muito disponível e atenciosa. Ajudou nos com a reserva de estacionamento para o nosso carro durante a estadia.
Aconselhamos vivamente! 
Obrigada por tudo :)

The first thing to note about this apartment is just how impressive it is on first entry. The current photos really do not do it justice. It’s large, filled with sunlight in the day and extremely comfortable. Sophie has decorated it tastefully and with a lot of thought, providing a lovely selection of art and deign oriented coffee table books for you to peruse. 

Location wise it’s perfect, being a 5 min walk from the Sagrada Familia and there are a number of nice bars and restaurants in the direct vicinity of the apartment. It is also within easy reach of two central metro lines although we never once used public transport instead opting to rent bikes from a nearby rental shop (Barcelona is simply one of the best cities to ride in with you pretty much never having having to ride on the road ever!). In any case the main sites of the city are all within easy reach on foot. Its’s a 20 min walk to Place de Catalunya and Gothic Quarters and we very much enjoyed our gentle stroll’s home after a night of eating and drinking. 
 
Sophie herself could not have been more accommodating. She’s was great to communicate with on the lead up to our stay and welcoming on our arrival. We didn’t want for anything on the trip at all. 

If you book this apartment you will not be disappointed!
Good food, great sites. Location had a beautiful view. Clean. Large space.

Lovely apartment in a great location in Eixample, very close to the Sagrada Familia, Girona metro and good bars and restaurants. Great host who was really friendly and helpful with us getting to know the city. Thank you Sophie!

Je recommande vivement ce logement !
L'appartement est superbe, spacieux et confortable.
Sophie est très sympathique, et nous a donné de précieux conseils sur Barcelone.

Excellent location in Barcelona
Spacious apartment with great view
Guests are greeted promptly
Refrigerator has staples left from previous guests which prevents the need to buy sugar, salt etc. for a short stay

Sophie was an amazing host. We was firstly met by Inna who invited us on behalf of Sophie. She was very helpful and welcoming. We received a customised booklet before our arrival which pretty much had everything we needed such as all the local restaurants and so on. All our needs and more was catered for. The location was also perfect and a 10 minute walk to Sagrada familia. I would highly recommend Sophie's spacious apartment.  

A very happy Airbnb'er :)

Absolutely wonderful apartment with the most quaint view of an old church right out the window. Very well appointed, clean, organized. Sophie went above and beyond with an informative packet of how, where, and what to do. Wish we could have stayed longer. Thank you Sophie and Inna!
Einfach nur großartig!

The apartment is spacious and very well kept. It was great for our family , with a large parents room and two double bedrooms for the kids. Being close to the metro makes it very convenient to go everywhere

Appartement impeccable, vraiment spacieux, au cœur d'un quartier hyper vivant. Légèrement bruyant à l'avant, mais les portes fermées avec la climatisation, c'était très bien. Pour les autres chambres, très tranquille. Et puis on reste au cœur de Barcelone, pas en banlieue dortoir... L'hôtesse a été d'une aide précieuse, et a même pensé à trouver des jeux pour notre bébé. Merci Sophie et Inna!

Notre hôte nous a contactés plusieurs fois afin de préparer notre arrivée et s'est montrée disponible et bienveillante au bon déroulement de notre séjour. L'appartement est très agréable, lumineux et spacieux. il est très bien situé, en centre ville, près de la Sagrada Familia, de la casa Battlo, de la casa Mila  et à proximité d'une station de métro. Adresse à recommander.
Muy buenas localización y cumplió todas las expectativas.

El apartamento está de sueño! Muy iluminado, con mobiliario en excelente estado y una ubicación inmejorable, Sophie es una excelente anfitriona nos recibió con una canasta con aperitivos y una cava española deliciosa, además de una gran cantidad de información sobre la ciudad para hacer más fácil tus decisiones de a dónde ir. Estuvo al pendiente de todo lo que se nos ofreciera y cumple con todo detalle y más de lo que puedas esperar. Súper recomendable!
Excellent.

Amazing experience in Sophie's beautiful flat!  She was a top notch host and a great communicator.  Sophie helped us with our luggage drop off early in the morning before check in and gave advance suggestions about what to do and see in the area.  The flat was very clean, comfortable and beautiful.  Lovely views out the front windows.  This very short stay by far exceeded our expectations, thank you Sophie!!  We wish we could have stayed much, much longer.

Nous avons réservé l'appartement de Sophie pour une nuit, pour six personnes. L'appartement est très spacieux et lumineux, décoré avec goût, avec une très belle vue. Sophie a tout prévu pour que l'on puisse passer un excellent séjour (serviettes de bain et de plages, livres, guides touristiques, panier de bienvenue...) L'appartement est dans un quartier animé, avec restaurants, parkings surveillés et metro à proximité. Nous avons été régulièrement en contact avec Sophie avant notre séjour, ce qui nous a permis de préparer notre arrivée au mieux.
apartamento amplio, confortable y bien ubicado. sohpie siempre estuvo atenta a nuestras consultas. excelente anfitriona y piso. lo recomiendo

We visited Barcelona with three older kids and spent five wonderful nights in the apartment. The apartment is everything and more that is described on Airbnb: spacious, great location  with easy access to public transportation, shops and sightseeing landmarks. Sophie and her assistant Inna were wonderful hosts providing an information guide to the flat and the city in advance and a welcome package upon arrival. Communication was seamless and they were helpful above and beyond the regular duties of a host providing help with information, arranging a large cab to the airport and many other things. We truly enjoyed our stay and hope to return some day. Highly recommended!

As a family of 5, we had a short and pleasant stay in this very well furnished and equipped apartment. 
Easy to access from airport by metro and nearby Sagrada familia.
Very friendly and effective welcome with plenty of documentation available. 
A place to recommend.

I don't even have words to describe how great was to stay at Sophie's place. I went with my family and it was better than what we expected. Sophie is a very great host, helpful and kind-hearted and we felt home at her place. She helped us with our luggage until we got to her place. Well located, even better than what is shown it the pictures! There was a small problem in the bathroom where the drain was clogged but she immediatly went there to fix it. We asked if she had a spare fan for us because Barcelona was a bit hot, and right after she came with it. This place is absolutely worth staying. I recommend this place for everybody who is looking for a great place in Barcelona. I would easily stay there again and again! Thank you, Sophie!

Sophie contacted us prior to our arrival with a very well made guide to Barcelona.
Upon our early arrival, we met with Innes that stored our luggage till the apartment will be ready for us.

When we came back in the afternoon we discovered a beautiful and spacious apartment, sparkling clean ready just for us. 

Innes made a huge effort and brought down all of our luggage so we won't need to do anything but rest, after a long day.

The kids loved the games they found the books and the environment and so did we.

Strong Wifi, Large LCD, endless cable channels, great location, well-equipped kitchen, great location, phenomenal communication.

Overall flat is great. 5 minutes walk to Sagrada Familia but more importantly 15-20 min from Passeig de Gracia and Ramblas. Also metro close-by. The building is absolutely typical and you get to feel like a local.
The apartment was beautiful and even more spacious that I expected from pictures. The location is great and check in and check out were a smooth process. The host is very friendly and helpful.
The apartment was very nice and clean. It's perfect. Near the bus stops and has a great view. Absolutely will come back there again if I go to Barcelona. Thanks Sophie!

très bel appartement , tout était conforme aux descriptions . Sophie a toujours était disponible et réactive à mes demandes et interrogations . panier garni offert à notre arrivée , très appréciable . nous retournerons dans cet appartement lors de notre prochain séjour .
very nice house . nearly L5,L4 station.Sophie was a landlord~She give us a lot of help.

Sophie is a great host, always responded immediately and gave all the instructions needed before traveling. She kindly asked me if I would like to have a cot for my 2 years old boy, I didn't wanted to make too much trouble, so I said no. But when we arrived, the cot is in the large bed room, make our stay more convenient. The welcome basket and card is more than a nice gesture. The apartment is spacious for 6 travelers even only three of us stayed during our travel. Every room is exactly like they are in the picture and also very clear and tidy. My husband and I likes the Sophie's decoration, make you feeling calm and artist. the apartment equipped everything you needed. Sophie also prepared the animal toys and wooden track and car for my boy to play, he loved it and spent hours on them. The location is convenient to walk or take a bus or metro everywhere. We walked to lots of attractions and also walked to Le Remble street in 30 minutes ( we walked very slow with baby boy together). All in all, it is a nice stay and nice holiday for us and will stay again when we come back. Thank you Sophie.

Sophie's apartment is exactly as pictured. Bright, spotlessly clean and in a great location. 
We arrived prior to check in and were allowed to leave our bags at Sophie's for s few hours to explore the city. 
Our checking was easy and much to our surprise Sophie had provided a welcome basket for us.
Sophie was always available if we needed anything and when I sent s message re a venue for a televised sporting event from Australia I received a text with all the info .
What's more after we left the apartment and were very disappointed with next accomodation I again messaged Sophie hoping to return to her. Unfortunately she was booked. 
I cannot recommend Sophie and her apartment highly enough.
Will be telling everyone .
L'appartamento è molto spazioso e ben strutturato. Sophie ha fatto in modo di accoglierci bene e tutto è andato per il meglio.

Sophie's apartment was such a wonderful place to stay. A short walk to everywhere we wanted to visit. The apartment was gorgeous: bright, spacious and comfortable. Sophie was extremely helpful even before we got to Barcelona. I would highly recommend Sophie as a host and would love to stay at her apartment next time we are in Barcelona.

We had such a wonderful time at Sophie's apartment!! The day of our arrival she allowed us to have early check in and we were met at the apartment with keys, a beautiful welcome basket and guide book to help us navigate the area. Since we were traveling with our 2 yr old son, she even provided a crib, high chair, books and plenty of toys which he loved! This was such a special touch for us and for our son. 
Half way through our stay Sophie arranged a cleaning service to come at a time that was convenient for our family. 
The apartment was exactly as it looks in the photos, clean, spacious and bright! The location was perfect!! We were centrally located and found it easy to get around by walking, taxi and metro. 
Sophie and Inna answered all of our texts and emails very quickly before, during and after our stay. 

We would highly recommend staying here! We absolutely loved our time in Barcelona! The city itself is so beautiful and interesting, but the added touch of a comfortable place to stay made it an exceptional vacation for us!

We had a fantastic 9 days in Barcelona due in large part to the fact that we had such an awesome apartment. The whole experience could not have been better, from the helpful planning guide we received from Sophie before the trip to the early-morning  taxi she arranged when we departed. In between we received early check-in, a personal tour of the apartment, a gift basket, maps and tour books to use during our stay, a mid-stay cleaning and regular text messages asking if we had everything we need. 
The apartment is beautiful, clean, comfortable, spacious and well-appointed. The central location is ideal, making it possible to walk (our transportation method of choice) to every major area of the city.  Buying coffee every morning at the cafe downstairs, discovering the best nearby places to buy wine, cheese, ham and bread, and being the only tourists in the apartment building helped us to feel like true Barcelonians.  We ate dinner at several of the restaurants that Sophie recommended and were never disappointed.
I can not recommend Sophie's apartment more highly!

A lovely, spacious, clean, comfortable and well located apartment. We loved it! Perfect for toddlers and young children too, with thoughtful additions of toys and books, along with large cot and high chair. It's up several flights so the lift is useful for little legs and cases. The building is quiet and is walking distance from some great sights and shopping. The Creyon Cafe next door is great for breakfast and lunches. Sophie was incredibly helpful from start to finish and communication was prompt and comprehensive. She also left a lovely welcome hamper and provided many household essentials which was very much appreciated. We had a fabulous experience and would give the host and apartment 10/10.

La casa es igual o mejor de lo que aparece en las fotos, epectacular. Y ademas esta perfectamente localizada!. Sophie e Inna te reciben con una cesta de bienvenida. Cuando vuelva a Barcelona intentare venir aqui 100%. Un 10.

En week end entre collègues, nous avons séjourné 2 jours chez Sophie. 
L appartement est parfait: très spacieux, parfaitement entretenu , très agréable à vivre. Tout le nécessaire est à votre disposition.
Cerise sur le gâteau: un panier d accueil rempli de pleins de bonnes choses nous a été offert à notre arrivé. 
Sophie s est montrée très attentive à nos demandes et à notre confort. 
C est un hébergement que nous recommandons vivement.

Notre séjour dans l'appartement de Sophie était parfait, petit panier de bienvenue, Inna (une amie?) était là pour nous accueillir. L'appartement est très agréable même si nous avons regretté qu'il y ait une seule salle de bain, mais cette remarque est à relativiser car en fait nous étions 6 filles (coquettes) ... 
L'appartement est très bien situé et nous avons pu découvrir de bonnes adresses recommandés par Sophie à moins 1/4 d'heure à pied. Alors vraiment n'hésitez pas!

Our Experience at Sophie's place was wonderful. We spent a long weekend in Barcelona and we found the perfect place. Location is just perfect. We went walking from the flat to the Sagrada Familia (about 10 minutes), and to the Passeig the Gracia (in about 10  minutes too). Metro is quite close. The neigbourhood is very quiet but has several very nice restaurants and shops in the sourrounding blocks.
The flat is amazing, very comfortable, and fully equiped. We were there with our two kids and the house was great for them. Sophie left some toys for them and the living room and the rooms are very spacious so they had plenty of space to play around.  The flat was clean and the beds are comfortable. It is ideal for a family or for a small group of people traveling together.
Sophie was a great host, she even left a basket with some wine and tipical products to eat. She is easily reacheable. I would definitively recommend Sophie's flat .

Rafael

Sophie has an absolutely gorgeous apartment in a fabulous location. Inna was so gracious and kind when we came much later than expected. We even extended a day. Everything was in the apartment that we could have needed. There is a wonderful cafe just next door where we enjoyed breakfast and lunch. We loved staying here and would love to come back again some day!
Great place! The apartment is large and Sophie/Inna did a great job communicating with any problems we had.

This place has it all, beautiful, centrally located, Inna was waiting for us she explained everything to us, were a family of 6 and the apartment is spacious that it didn't even feel like here was 6 people in there, the place is equipped with absolutely everything you can think of for your stay, defenetly great and amazing place to be in!!!

Tres bel appartement que nous recommandons.Emplacement idéal pr profiter pleinement de la ville,Notre hôte tjrs en contact pour s'assurer de notre bien être.,super sympa et un joli panier 
d 'accueil.
Michel et Françoise.

We were greeted by Inna the apartment. Communication was fast and easy. We arrived late but Inna was very nice to wait for us. The apartment is exactly like the pictures. Very clean apartment :)

The view from the apartment is spectacular. The location is great! By walking, 5 mins to sagrada familia and 10 mins to passeig de gracia. 15 mins to arc de triomf. Plenty of supermarket and restaurants nearby for convenience. Safe neighborhood.

Facilities in the apartment is great. Our family of 5 lived very comfortably. 

Thank you for such a lovely place to stay! :)) highly recommended.
Je vous recommande ce bien. Il est parfait pour passer quelques jours à Barcelone entre amis ou en famille.

My family and I (6 adults) stayed at Sophie's place for 4 nights and it was one for the best airbnb's we have ever booked. Right from booking, Sophie was easy to communicate with and provided us all useful information about Barcelona. When we entered the apartment a large welcome basket was waiting for us on the table. The place was very clean, spacious and gorgeous just like you see in the pictures. The apartment is very centrally located close to supermarkets and all public transports. The bus stop is just below the apartment which makes it easy to travel around Barcelona. 
I would definitely recommend this beautiful place to anyone looking to stay in Barcelona. 
Thank you Sophie for making sure we had a wonderful time.

Sophie was a great host. The apartment is very nice and nicely situated. We loved staying there. Sophie provided us with a guide with tips what to do beforehand, which proved valuable. We will recommend her and the apartment to friends.

This spacious apartment is in a brilliant location near to Sagrada Familia, restaurants and shopping. 
Super clean and nicely decorated, the apartment has everything you would need and more. Although it's above a busy junction we were not bothered by noise - just close the shutters at night. Three sunny balconies for people watching and the fab Cafe Creyon for breakfast right downstairs. There's a good market just a couple of minutes stroll along the street. 
Sophie was in touch from the beginning and though we didn't meet her she messaged us to make sure we were enjoying our stay. 
We liked the apartment so much that we really didn't want to leave. Thank you Sophie and Inna.

We loved staying at Sophie's apartment. Spotlessly clean, comfortable beds, bright and airy and a great location. We would definitely stay here again. Sophie provided a ton of information about restaurants and things to do.
The house was great. Sopie and Inna were great hosts. Would definetely stay there again.
The appartment was big great, comfortable clean and really looked like on the pictures. Sophie was a great host, paying attention to the details and caring about us. Strongly recommended!!

Sophie's appartment is really perfect!!!! The location is ideal, and the appartment is amazing. I came with our 9 months old little baby and Sophie organized everything with a lot of care: she left toys, a bath tub a baby cot so we did not have to transport all these. Everything is well furnished, and thought for the guests weel-being. I did not have the chance to meet Sophie in person but we met Inna who is kind, available and adorable. I can not recommand it more!!!

We recently stayed at Sophie's apartment for 10 days while our son attended a soccer camp at Camp Nou.  We were thrilled with the apartment - particularly the location.  Walking distance to many interesting sites and very close to the subway. The neighbourhood is bustling and offers a variety of good restaurants, cafes, bakeries and shops, but also has a safe, residential feel. There is a market, grocery store and pharmacy within a 10 minute walk. The apartment is quite big with high ceilings, tons of character, and lovely light.  It is spotlessly clean and well maintained.  Beds are comfortable. There are interesting books, music and movies available for guests. The building was quiet and we rarely saw any other residents. There is a lovely cafe next door that is open early in the morning and late at night - it was a favourite for our kids because the menu includes pizza and hamburgers.  Our host was easily accessible throughout our stay for advice and suggestions.  We loved our stay and are so glad we chose this location.
Fantastic place and awesome host - loved it!
A wonderful place with great facilities. I'd recommend this apartment highly and would definitely come back. Thanks Sophie!

This appartment is absolutely beautiful, spacious and airy. Sophie has done a wonderful job with the renovation, clean and white with simple furnishings in soothing colors. We were very comfortable here and it has made our stay in Barcelona more wonderful than we could have imagined! It is perfectly located within walking distance to most of the famous landmarks and museums in Barcelona. Sophie and Inna were very helpful providing a packet full of information for a great stay in Barcelona. It is a beautiful sun filled place to stay with a very gracious host!
Thx
Absolutely loved our stay in this apartment. It has everything and the hosts are fantastic, would 100% come back to this place if we visit Barcelona again!
Excelente lugar! Fotos reales, súper limpio y ordenado con canasta de bienvenida, todos los detalles hicieron de nuestra estancia excelente, seguro volvemos!!

This apartment was perfect for us, a family of 5 adults. It was clean, comfortable and had everything we needed. The kitchen is the perfect size to rustle up a meal with the bonus of a dishwasher so no arguing over who washes up!

It's located within easy walking distance of all tourist attractions. Across the road is a small supermarket which is perfect for essentials. A 5 minute walk down the road is Mercat de la Concepcio which has fresh meat/fish/bakery etc it's worth a visit if you're cooking and want fresh ingredients. 

I would highly recommend this apartment for a group like ours looking for a spacious base.
A beautiful spacious apartment in a great location. 5 star treatment with an incredible host. I would stay here again in a second.

An absolutely stunning flat in a great part of town, conveniently located near plenty of shops bars and restaurants and walking distance from the main attractions. I cannot recommend this place enough. The flate is just great, very clean and nicely set out. Sophie was a tremendous help in making us feel welcome and to answer any questions we had. A truly pleasurable stay.

흠잡을 데 없이 청결한 내부와 웰컴박스가 반겨주었어요. Inna의 친절함과 배려 덕분에 스페인 도착부터 떠나는 날까지 매우 편리하게 여행했습니다. Sophie의 여행가이드북도 큰 도움이 되었어요. 사랑스러운 집에서 이틀을 보내게 되어, 함께 간 부모님도 너무 행복해하셨습니다. 성가족성당에 걸어서 6분, 지하철역 3분. 위치도 나쁘지 않았습니다. 람블라스 쪽과 달리 조용하고 현지 주택가 분위기를 느끼기에 적합한 숙소입니다.

This was our first visit to Barcelona and our first Airbnb rental.  We arrived very early in Barcelona and Inna helped us store our bags until check in.  When we returned for check in the bags were in the apartment and the transition was seemless.

The apartment is on the top floor and you can take the stairs or the elevator.   Our group of six was very comfortable.  The apartment is sunny with a great breeze in every room.  Nice view of the neighborhood from the living room.  

The location is in the Eixample area with anything you need and very walkable.  Cabs are readily available to take you anywhere in the city.   You can hit most places within a 25 minute walk or a few minute cab ride.  We enjoyed the walks as Barcelona is a very easy city to move around.

Thanks to Sophie and Inna for their help.  Again, highly recommended.

Great apartment, just as described, perfect location, very family friendly, we travelled as a family with an 8 month old and it was just like being at home with everything we needed for the baby. Sophie was a great host, with nothing being too much trouble. Thank you very much.
Great location, beautiful neighborhood, charming apartment with helpful and friendly host. Most definitely recommend it and would stay there again.

Completely enjoyed our stay at Sophie's place. We were travelling with 3 generations (grandparents, teen, parents) and all of us had space to relax and regroup after our stimulating days in the city. We love to walk and could walk downtown (20 min along very interesting streets), Saga Familia (5 min), Come In English book store (15 min), etc, so the location was excellent for us. Multiple cafes, grocery stores etc on the ground level steps away. You can tell that this is an area where families actually live. Loved that. The apartment was very well equipped, quiet, airy, bright and clean. Thank you Sophie!
This apartment met all of my expectations and was true to the description. Highly recommended.
Beautiful apartment. Well maintained. Great location. Sophie was accommodating and helpful. Would stay here again!
Simply wonderful place to stay. Our hosts were so accommodating from letting us drop our bags early, calling us a cab when we left and everything in between.

If you can book this apartment, I would highly recommend it. It is well equipped, clean, comfortable, airy and bright. It is close to many convenient stores and nice restaurants, as well as Barcelona attractions.
This is a great apartment and suited our needs perfectly .  It was just as described and all arrangements were as Sophie promised

This apartment is in a great convenient location. There is plenty of space and amenities and comfortable. Sophie's recommendations are great. The view is lovely and an easy neighborhood to walk around. Creyon cafe is delicious! The outdoor bar just around the corner is hip with young kids enjoying the evening outdoors but never bothered us and never noisy past 11:00-12:00. Sophie and her assistant are just a text away and very helpful. I highly recommend this apartment!

The apartment was in a great location. It was spacious and had everything we needed.Sophie was excellent at communicating before and during our stay. 
She left a lovely welcome basket and her recommendation for a tapas bar nearby was fantastic. We hired bikes and came home hot and sticky and were really thankful for a shower and a late check out. Also we parked out rental car in the street as it was a weekend which was really convenient. 
Thanks Sophie for all your help and we really enjoyed our stay in Barcelona.
A great place for your stay in Barcelona ... friendly, clean and in a good position. Thanks, Sophie ... we'll be back!

Fantastic apartment in a beautiful location. Sophie was a wonderful host, and the welcome basket was such a lovely surprise! We, a group of 5 friends, stayed for 4 nights and it suited us perfectly. Absolutely no complaints about the apartment. 

There are metro and bus stops in close proximity to the apartment, and a few handy small supermarkets nearby too. We walked to Gracia and the Gothic Quarter and El Born from the apartment. We would like to point out that there is aircon but it is in the living room and hallway, not in the bedrooms. This was fine, we just slept with the doors slightly  open.

Fin og rummelig lejlighed - alt hvad man skulle bruge. Fedt med aircondition i Barcelonas varme. Central beliggenhed med mange seværdigheder og spisedesteder. Stranden er inden for gå afstand, men tager en god halv time.
位置很好,在各著名景点之间｡房间清洁,设施齐全,装饰漂亮｡房东非常热情的提供帮助,还把自家的儿童推车借给我们｡很适合带孩子的家庭｡很愉快的体验｡
Place was fantastic just like the pictures, Sophie was great all the way through, a very good experience thanks for having us, the whole family enjoyed it!!

Thank you for being such a thoughtful and kind host. The gift basket was a lovely gesture and your understanding of the broken lamp was beyond forgiving and generous.   The apartment was smartly decorated and spotless. And it was so comfortable with updated fixtures and amenities.  The dishwasher and the laundry were very convenient. And the air conditioning was divine given the heat. We would love to come back and stay again.

Centrally located with lots of style. Great comfortable apartment with most tourist destinations within easy reach. Lots of nice features and touched by attention to detail of host. Lovely welcome basket for the family upon arrival. Child friendly. Thank you for a lovely stay Sophie. And to the people of Barcelona

Un très bel appartement bien situè pour visiter barcelone
Une hotesse très sympathique je le recommande pour une famille metci aussi à inna
L'appartement est magnifique, spatieux, très propre et surtout bien équipé. Je remercie Sophie pour le panier d'arriver, le service est top. Très bonne nuit, je recommande cet appartement!

The flat was perfect for our family's stay in Barcelona!  It is exactly as seen in the photos, bright, airy, spacious and impeccably clean.  Attention to detail was evident everywhere, from the well-stocked kitchen, the welcome basket, and the tourist information.  The location is fantastic, close and walkable to everything, but just far enough away from the busier sections of the city.
We would definitely stay here again!
We really enjoyed our stay in this lovely apartment! I would definitely recommend this apartment to fellow travelers

What a wonderful apartment! We stayed 4 nights with our 2 children under the age of 3yrs old. The apartment is very homely, clean, & had everything one would need to enjoy there stay. Sophie was more than helpful, even stored our luggage when we arrived early in the morning. Nothing but great things to say about the apartment, Sophie & Barcelona.

Sophie's place is amazing - the flat is very spacious, clean and very nicely decorated. It has everything you need and the location is just perfect (a short walk to Sagrada Familia, the city centre and has a metro stop very close to the flat). I went there with my family and the flat was perfect for the six of us. Sophie's welcome basket was a great surprise :) I would definitely recommend Sophie's flat and we have decided with my family that we will definitely stay there next time we are in Barcelona. Thanks for everything, Sophie!
Great place - would definitely recommend it to anyone staying in Barcelona!

Spacious and clean flat in a good location about a 5 min walk from Sagrada and 20 min from Placa de Catalunya. Sophie kindly left a generously filled gift basket which was very much appreciated. 3 bedrooms all with enough space to easily fit us 5 adults. Highly recommended.
100% recomendable, tal y como se describe en la info.

Very happy with our stay. This place suited our family and we would recommend it to anyone travelling to Barcelona. Sophie and Inna were so helpful with recommendations, getting us a large taxi to the airport and letting us leave our luggage at the apartment after check out time.

Really nice and cosy place. Very central location and at a walking distance from sagrada familia and other landmarks. Our acommodation was really easy. Perfect place to stay when planning a trip to Barcelona.
Cozy amd homelike flat for 3-generation family.  Nice, polite and responsive landlord Sophie. Thank you very much!

Rigtig dejligt sted. God beliggenhed. Rent og pænt. Gode værelser. Flot udsigt. Nem kommunikation. Familievenlig og tæt på alt! 
Alt i alt meget anbefalelsesværdig!

Sophie and Martha, who welcomed us in the apartment, were great hosts! Very friendly, supportive and flexible with our check-in/-out needs! We really enjoyed staying in this nice and clean apartment that offered anything we needed!
Excellent apartment, very spacious and great location. Thank you !
El apartamento es tal y como aparece en el anuncio. Es espacioso, luminoso, decorado con detalle y bien situado.
We stayed three nights at Ninas place and felt like at home. The flat is great and is very central located. Our kids loved it. We can definitely recommend it.
Beautiful view from the balcony. Very spacious. Good location. Late night grocery shopping options close by. Great!
Good spot.
This was a wonderful place, truly just as the photos showed. Three full bedrooms, one and a half bathrooms and everything was incredibly clean. We stayed there for four days, and loved every minute.
This is a wonderful Airbnb: clean, spacious and located right around the corner from the Sagrada Familia! 10/10
Nina’s place really is truly special. Incredibly roomy, cool in the heat of the summer, beautiful, well located with an incredible view. The perfect home to enjoy Barcelona from.

We had a great stay in Barcelona, and a big reason for that was Nina’s apartment. It was perfect for the 5 of us. The location is ideal, in a great neighborhood, close to two Metro stations, and a short walk to La Sagrada Familia. The views out the large walk-out balcony windows in the front are great. The three separate bedrooms, two bathrooms, and very functional kitchen made us very comfortable. Nina’s friend David also helped us by booking our taxi when it was time to leave. No complaints at all. We would definitely stay here again.
Amazing location!! Everything is so close and walking distance. 5 of us enjoyed the stay a lot.

Nina was so helpful! It was perfect for our family!  We stayed for 5 days.   It was so nice to come back to after a long day of visiting the city.     It is located where you can either walk or take the metro. or bus  Everybody was so nice and helpful in the neighborhood.   We enjoyed the view from our balcony looking out towards the church.  Loved being able to open the windows in the morning to feel the cool breeze.    Everything was super clean and perfect.  We used the washer and dryer.  

We went to many of the sites and took a tour of Costa Brava, which takes you to several Mediterranean towns along the coast.  There are so many things to do, we will have to come back.
地理位置优越,大厅阳台望着教堂,很有感觉,可步行至附近景点,楼下的海鲜面也很不错啊,附近的水果市场更是每日必逛!不错的体验!

This apartment is amazing!  The 10 foot ceilings are beautiful and it has every single amenity a person could want.  The kitchen is gorgeous and big and the entire apt. was sparkling, sparkling clean.  It is so close to Sagrada Familia - 3 or 4 blocks only and the views from the balcony were beautiful!  The neighborhood was so safe and clean and close to metro stops.  The bed linens were so crisp and clean, modern bathroom and kitchen and laundry room.  The living room had to be decorated by a designer.  It is spacious, clean and in a great location.  Do not hesitate to book this apartment!

Great place to call home, even more beds then we needed and lots of space for our family of four. We appreciated the coffee machine, washer and dryer and clean environment. The kitchen was well equipped to help keep hungry teens happy. The neighbor was perfect and offered a express mart and close eateries .  Great choice!

This apartment was amazing with its location and amenities.   The shower had such good water pressure and the air conditioning was so great after a hot day outside.  I was there with my two teenage daughters and felt super safe the whole time.  Would definitely recommend this place.
Beautiful and spacious apartment
Fantastic location and great view of the cathedral. We went with our young family and there was plenty of space. Parking is a little way away but you don’t really need a car in Barcelona anyway.

The stay was absolutely wonderful!! Perfect setup and above and beyond amenities. Nina and David were MORE than helpful and accommodating during the check-in, even when we arrived at a different time than planned due to delayed travel schedule. Definitely recommend! Also the view is truly amazing. Between 4-6 minute walk to two different metro lines. So great!!! If I’m back in barcelona I’m staying in one of their properties for sure.

I highly recommend Nina’s apartment. It is just as the pictures show, and even better. We were greeted within 5 minutes of our arrival. The apartment is very large, airy, and clean. There were 5 of us and we fit very comfortably. The views are beautiful. There is a full kitchen along with washer and dryer, large lining room, one full bath (great water pressure!) and 1/2 bath. Location is great, within walking distance to La Sagrada Familia, Arc de Triumph, and a beautiful park. About a 30 minute walk to La Rambla and Gothic Quarter. Taxis are available right outside the apartment (a little difficult for parties 5 or more, you have to get lucky to find a large one). Perfect location and great apartment!!
Nina’s place were beautiful, spacious and comfortable. The location is really good, near to lost of attractions. Check in and out were both easy and smooth. Recommended.

Nina/David are very nice host overall. Good communication and tips especially when we first landed in Barcelona and has nothing in our mind about the best transportation to the flat. The flat location is good and very close to Sagrada church and other popular tourist sites. Inside the flat, you pretty much got everything you need and it is clean and spacious.
Definitely recommendate! Thanks Nina and David.

Nina’s place has an excellent location right in the heart of Barcelona everything you can think of In walking distance and very family friendly area.  The apartment was very large and specious however it was lacking some amenities and personal touch like toilet paper blackout curtains no Air conditions in the bedrooms etc... we expected more for what we paid and being a “plus” property that has been verified by Airbnb was disappointing having that said The apartment was very clean comfortable and big so if that’s what your looking for this apartment will do.

Beautiful turn of the century appartment and building. The apartment is spacious and the living room is great for entertaining and has beautiful view of a church outside. The area has an upscale feel with some hip coffee shops and restaurants nearby, we where recommended a fantastic tapas restaurant called El Viti Taberna.

Together with our 3 children, we really enjoyed our stay at Nina’s apartment. It was perfectly clean at arrival, very spacious, well equipped and above all, perfectly located to visit different parts of Barcelona, by metro and even on foot (f. ex. Sagrada Familia at only 10 min walking distance ;). In the surrounding streets, you have several shops where you can buy some food and drinks. After a long and warm day outside, it was a real pleasure to come home in the air conditioned apartment! We would certainly recommend this place for a comfortable and unforgettable stay in Barcelona city!

This place is fantastic. Suited for up to 6 without problems. Spacious and clean and a really nice location. Fits the description very well. Good coms with the host and hasslefree. We had three different airbnb in brc during a week. This one was outstanding.

Location was great. Easy walking distance to all attractions. Apartment was clean & spacious.
Expected more for the price & it being a “plus” Airbnb. Personal touch was missing. Coffee, biscuits, jam etc. was not provided, but always welcome after a long travel day. Host was late to greet us and the introduction was brief & rushed. Lacking in personal amenities such as toilet paper, extra comforters & pillows. Guide provided was outdated as some suggestions were permanently closed. A map would be nice as well. 
Overall seemed more like a corporate business then a friendly Airbnb.
Great apartment and as described. Very spacious for a family of four.   We walked to most locations and felt very safe in the area. Perfect choice for your family trip.

Это отличная квартира для большой семьи или компании. Совершенно невероятная гостиная с очаровательными окнами со ставнями и потрясающим видом. Рядом есть много кафе для завтрака, в пешей доступности супермаркеты и аптеки. Удобно располагается относительно всех ключевых достопримечательностей-можно передвигаться пешком. В квартире есть почти все необходимые девайсы для малышей-кроватка, стульчик, подставка в ванную, целый ящик игрушек и много книг.

Nina’s apartment was exactly what we were looking for! It’s in a very central location and easy to get to any busses or metro station. 
There’s a 24 hour supermarket just across the road for any needs. Some lovely bars and restaurants just a short walk away. 
Nina was away at our time of check in, however she organised for a friend to check us in who was equally as friendly and accommodating. 
Both Nina and her friend were speedy at replying to any messages or queries we had. 
5 stars, would definitely recommend!!

Todo perfecto. Limpio, bien ubicado, amplio, agradable. A tres calles de la Sagrada Familia. Un poco de ruido en la sala principal por estar en frente de la avenida pero nada grave, el apartamento es muy recomendable. Tuve un poco de problemas en comunicarme al inicio, hablé con 4 personas para organizar la llegada pero parece ser que nunca les había pasado antes y al final Danny quien nos recibió con mi familia fue una persona muy atenta y adorable y contestando cuando la necesitábamos. Pasaran una buena estancia en este apartamento. Confíen, los trataran muy bien. Gracias Nina y Danny!

For anyone looking to visit Barcelona this location is central to all the sights! We were able to walk everywhere. Also anything you need is right in the immediate neighborhood.. The neighborhood is residential and very safe. The apartment is large, clean and nicely decorated without being cluttered. Having 1 1/2 bathrooms also made it convenient for four adults. We were met as soon as we got out of the cab and Nina was nice to allow us to leave our luggage in the apartment until check in. That enabled us to go find a local spot for lunch. To be honest we only had two small concerns. We were told prior to check in the washing machine was broken. That was inconvenient, especially having only one towel per person for six nights. Otherwise this is a fabulous apartment!
Friendly host and easy check in. The apartment was lovely, large and with a great view from the balcony. Everything was clean and tidy and a very relaxing space to unwind after a day in the city.

Nina is really helpful. We arrive Barcelona in the morning, she helped us put the luggage in the apartment. Bobi helped us check in, she is very enthusiastic. The apartment in a central location, we could go to everywhere easily.
Big apartment in a really good location.

The apartment is just like what pics show, warm, cozy and has great view right to the church, we really enjoyed sitting at the table watching the view having breakfast. A little disappointing that they don’t have hairdryer as promised. But will recommend to others.
Great location. Lovely, airy apartment, which was spotlessly clean and very smooth check-in. We loved Barcelona and the apartment!
Nice and warm apartment in the core of BCN. Walking distance to most major sightseeing districts. Strongly recommended!

We loved our stay at Nina's flat!  Everything was extremely comfortable !  It's a very spacious flat with large bedrooms.  Beds very comfortable and all appliances worked extremely well! ( especially washer and dryer).  It was so nice going home with all clean clothes!  Stove and microwave / oven cooked very well.  Refrigerator/freezer were awesome.  

The location was ideal!  The local market was only a block or two away!  We never walked more than a block before we were able to get a cab.  We woke every morning to beautiful views of the cathedral- Francesco de Sales- lots of windows and natural light. The air conditioning worked so well that we had to turn off and just open windows sometimes.  There was a fan for back bedroom too since it was back and away from the direct air conditioning unit.  Decor was sparse but had all you needed to make the flat feel like your own personality and home.  Very comfortable!

Check in went smoothly-Dani was waiting there for us with keys as we exited our car from airport.  We were able to check in right away since they had no tenants the night before.  The elevator to flat on third floor worked perfectly!  We were able to get settled and start our adventures right away.  Lots of good restaurants and cafes around Nina's place.  It was located in a very residential area ( we felt like locals) - all neighbors very friendly and kind- even in stores we went to.  We felt like a local but we were about 3-4 blocks from sagrada familia and the other direction was about 6-7 blocks from the most expensive street in Barcelona - passeig de gracia.  We walked about 20-30 minutes to placa de catalunya square everyday- I could write forever but think you get ideal!  I would love to stay here again on our next stay.  Thanks again Nina for your wonderful hospitality!!! We loved our choice of using your apartment!
Outstanding view from the window, spaceous apartment, all amenteties are availeable. Thank you!

Our family of four enjoyed this apartment immensely. With three bedrooms, everyone had their own space and the shared spaces were perfectly adequate as well. The location has a beautiful view of a church and the main floor-to-ceiling windows are situated to take in this view. The apartment is close to metro and bus lines plus taxis pass by regularly so getting around town is a breeze.
Près d’endroits sympas et notamment de la Sagrada Familia. Spacieux et très bel appartement.
Great place to stay. Although pretty hard to find out how the heaters were working. But great location, chrck in nice and easy. If you are travelling with a child, everything is there for her/him!

L’appartement de Nina est idéalement situé près des principaux lieux à visiter. Un quartier familial, avec des commerces et de nombreux squares pour les enfants. 
Nous avons apprécié tout les équipements pour enfants dans l’appartement et les nombreux jouets!

Nina’s place is perfectly, centrally located! What a value for our family of 4, we were able to each have our own room!  I highly recommend Nina’s apartment for families traveling to Barcelona!  Nina is great to work with too!

We truly enjoyed our stay in this spacious, quiet, clean apartment in a very central area (Exiample).  The pictures represent it perfectly, and the host made sure we had everything we needed.  Communication was clear and consistent, and they checked in on us via email within 24 hours of check in to make sure we had everything we needed.  When we found one item missing (a hair dryer), they brought us one immediately. The kitchen allowed us to have snacks and light meals available and there was space for our family of 4 to relax.  The neighborhood was lovely and the metro stop was very nearby (two short blocks away) and a bus stop was steps away.  I would definitely recommend it to friends or family visiting Barcelona in the future.

Very happy with our stay! 
Beautiful apartment with all the necessities. 
Wonderful view of the cathedral! 
Strongly recommend this apartment!
:)
Perfect
Good location, perfect apartment, great city. But there is no shower shampoo here, a little bit awkward.

A spacious, clean apartment that was perfect for our family. It was fairly central to the main tourist attractions. We liked to walk but others may want to get taxis which were also easy to get from outside the door. There are plenty of nice restaurants nearby, our favorite was Kook which was about 50 m away!!

Our family of four persons stayed ar this aparment between the Christmas and New Year`s Day and liked this roomy and light apartment, which fully met our expectations. The view from windows/balcony was beautiful, and the location is excellent - we were able to walk everywhere without a need to take a metro or taxi.
Nice, spacious place in a great location.   Easy walk to all the sights without being in the thick of it.  Good for families.
very nice,  very nice apartment,  nice view of the church as well

Very good location, safe and quite quartier! Very recommand for family or friends trip! Big and clean house and a point of view of a jolie church in front of de house! Thanks nina and very good check in for our arrivail! Wish to come back again !
Nina is a great host very responsive and the communication was very smooth, the apartment is amazing, in down town but extremely pleasant and quiet at night!

The house is in a good location, 10 minutes walk from the Sagrada Familia, and the subway station is very close. There are supermarkets, fruit shops, flower markets and many nice Mediterranean restaurants nearby. The interior of the house is well lit and the infrastructure is perfect. I will definitely choose this house next time.
Apartamento excelente en la mejor zona de Barcelona, en nuestro proximo viaje a Barcelona, ya tenemos un lugar para quedarnos!  Gracias Nina!

Nina was an exceptional host who communicated great from the onset. She was very polite and hospitable, with a beautiful apartment accommodating lovely views, very spacious and at reasonable value. I would highly recommend to anyone wishing to visit Barcelona.

Gorgeous, spacious apartment with lovely balconies and a stunning cathedral view. Great location with lots of nearby places to eat. The apartment provided us with everything we needed for a Barcelona mini break.

The appartment is very good located right in the middle of Barcelona. This was the second visit for me in Barcelona and the best ever and that is also because we loved your place and your friendly help when we arrived. I can say only this: congratulations and we will be back for sure.  Mieke Belgium
가족끼리 이용하기 너무 좋은 숙소입니다. 사거리에 위치해 뷰가 좋습니다. 숙소가 조용해서 외출후 휴식하기 좋습니다. 근처에 마트와 식당들이 있어 좋습니다. 편하게 잘 쉬다가 왔습니다. 숙소를 고민하고 있다면.. 이곳을 선택하세요..후회하지는 않을것입니다!

We loved our stay in this amazing place! This apartment is very beautiful and cozy, well equipped and in a perfect location. We enjoyed staying at the heart of Barcelona while having a great sleep at night as it was not loud inside the apartment at all. Nina gave us many great tips where to go and what to see in the city, we really appreciate it! Feel free to ask Nina anything, she is a true host who cares about each guest! Check in and check out was very smooth, we were able to leave our luggage after the check out. Amazing place with amazing host!

name: Rent All Apartament (100m²) netx to BRT station
summary: Apartamento com um quarto com frigobar, sala moderna com home theater e TV de tela grande, are gourmet de café,  cozinha moderna com gelada e freezer. Mesa de sinuca, área de leitura e um amplo bar. Ônibus Público e estação de BRT próximo (3 min) One apartment with fridge, modern living room with home theater and large screen TV , gourmet coffee area , modern kitchen with cold and freezer. Pool table , reading area and a large bar . Public buses and BRT station near ( 3 min)
space: Apartamento totalmente decorado com entrada individual com uma decoraçāo tropical/rústica que torna o espaço agradável e aconchegante.

Mesa de sinuca, área de leitura e um amplo bar. Pool table , reading area and a large bar . Acesso total ao loft de 100m² onde poderá usufruir de uma ampla área com sala moderna com aparelhagem, salāo de jogos, bar temático e uma área de relaxamento para leitura. Um espaço gourmet com cafeteiras diferenciadas e ainda uma cozinha moderna, onde contém freezer aparte alem da geladeira.
