neighborhood_overview: Bairro de Jacarepagua (Praça Seca) é um ponto de fácil acesso pois é próximo a estaçāo BRT e minutos da estaçāo de trem e metro.
transit: 3 minutos da estaçāo de BRT, 15 minutos da estaçāo de metro e 10 de trem.
access: Acesso total ao loft de 100m² onde poderá usufruir de uma ampla área com sala moderna com aparelhagem, salāo de jogos, bar temático e uma área de relaxamento para leitura. Um espaço gourmet com cafeteiras diferenciadas e ainda uma cozinha moderna, onde contém freezer aparte alem da geladeira. Quarto com ar condicionado splinter com cama casal, closet e moderno frigobar. Os hospedes terāo direito a uma privada área de lavanderia.
interaction: Sim, estarei disponível a qualquer e eventual ajuda para proporcionar uma melhor viagem.
house_rules: Manter qualquer objeto e cômodo em ordem durante a estadia. Qualquer avaria será ressarcida pelo locatário.

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments:
I was in Brazil for the Summer Olympics as a volunteer and I needed to be close to the Olympic Stadium (Engenhão). This home was perfect only 25 min by bus.

Kayanh and his family were awesome. He was great in making me feel at home, I left feeling like family. He took me on a tour of Rio on my first day and showed me everything to do in Rio. He was so accommodating and made me feel at home when I first arrived. Kayanh far exceeded my expectations. The home is so beautiful (I called it the tree house). The bedroom has everything- TV, fans, zoned air conditioning. The bathroom was awesome too. Everything was very well decorated and very clean. The neighborhood was great. It was in a very private, quiet neighborhood, close to the BRT and the area is very convenient, everything is in a walkable distance if you like walking. 

Kayanh home is 35-40 min from the airport by car and 1 hour from Centro Brazil, if you do not mind travelling by public transportation all the tourist areas are accessible.   

Kayanh and his family are the best hosts that you could ever ask for. I only speak English, and Kayanh spoke Portuguese and English which was a tremendous advantage. 

Kayanh and his family are 5 star hosts.

name: Apartment in Ipanema with Balcony
summary: Apartment in Ipanema with a large balcony and a barbecue, two blocks from the beach. Ideal for families, couples with children. A space for demanding people, as the apartment is fully equipped with first grade furniture and appliances.
space: Sala com TV Curva de 65 Polegadas 4K, quarto com cama de casal e cama Queen size, quarto com cama de solteiro, banheiro, cozinha moderna e espaçosa e varanda com área externa, churrasqueira e chuveirão.
description: Apartment in Ipanema with a large balcony and a barbecue, two blocks from the beach. Ideal for families, couples with children. A space for demanding people, as the apartment is fully equipped with first grade furniture and appliances.
neighborhood_overview: Ipanema
notes: Seja bem vindo à Ipanema.
transit: A pé, de bicicleta, uber, moto ou carro você estará bem em Ipanema. Fora o ônibus com corredor expresso e uma quadra da estação do metrô.
access: Elevador e Garagem coberta no prédio
interaction: Disponível 24/7 por telefone ou (Hidden by Airbnb) .

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about:
Olá, Sou o Armando Machado.

Sou carioca, apaixonado pelas cidades do Rio de Janeiro e de Florianópolis. Sou amante de viagens, e gosto de andar de moto e fazer Snowboard. 

O projeto do Jurerê Loft nasceu de muitas idas à Ilha da Magia, e decidi que precisava de um bom motivo para voltar mais vezes. Decidi investir nos apartamentos assim que os vi. O Alex me apresentou cada um dos 4, me apaixonei e pensei: Porquê não transformar esses lofts em uma experiência mágica para os hóspedes do mundo todo? Até hoje o Alex me ajuda com a gestão do Airbnb e a cada comentário elogiando o local e nosso atendimento, me sinto de fato realizado.

Tudo que temos aprendido nesse tempo de Airbnb tem nos ensinado muito, e espero sempre oferecer uma excelente experiência na estadia dos nossos hóspedes!

Estou sempre disponível para dúvidas sobre qualquer uma das cidades, dicas e sugestões (Sempre bem vindas).

Um Grande Abraço!
____________________________________

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments:
O apartamento do Armando é lindo, muito bem localizado e super bem equipado. Não senti falta de nada e foi muito confortável estar a duas quadras do posto 8 em ipanema. 
O Armando é uma pessoa muito fácil de lidar, não tive nenhum problema com ele nem com a hospedagem. Ele é muito disponível e tudo foi resolvido facilmente. 
A porta com fechadura digital traz comodidade pra gente não precisar carregar chave e também nem precisamos nos encontrar pessoalmente para isso. 
A varanda com churrasqueira e ducha também foram um plus, um ambiente muito gostoso prum dia em que a família chegou bem cansada!

Eu e meus amigos alugamos o Ap do Armando durante um final de semana e estava tudo perfeito. O apartamento é muito confortável, com tudo que se precisa, a área externa é ótima e a localização está próxima de tudo. O Armando foi muito atencioso e solícito com tudo. Todos adoraram.
Ótimo apartamento, todo decorado, com wifi, varanda grande. Armando sempre disponível para ajudar. Recomendo!

Todo cierto!  Espectacular departamento! Ubicación ideal, cerca de todo, tiene un equipamiento de primera y todo funciona bien. Armando estuvo siempre pendiente y atento a cualquier necesidad. Pasamos 10 dias muy cómodos y confortables. La seguridad de guardia 24 horas da mucha tranquilidad. Todo genial! Aparte, como siempre, Brasil y su gente nos trató muy, pero muy bien! Atentos, amables, educados y correctos (y muy divertidos)

El departamento esta muy bien ubicado. Y tiene un balcon divino.
Pero el departamento es para 5 personas, tiene solo un dormitorio grande con dos camas matrimoniales y despues un cuarto muyyyyy chico con una cama individual.
La comunicacion con armando fue muy buena y la predisposicion para arreglar el problema ya que me confirmo que entrabamos 9 personas por como dice la publicacion. 
Sacando de lado eso, que se soluciono trayendo colchones, lo demas bien

Everything was wonderful, I highly recommend this place. 
It's one block from the beach and near supermarkets, drug stores, atms, stores, bars, etc. Very convenient! Armando was always available to answer questions, very thoughtful throughout the whole booking process and also when we were there and after we left. The apartment is lovely, everything is new and clean!
Muito bom! Otima localizaçao e o proprietario nos recebeu mto bem
El departamento es muy lindo y cómodo. Un poco chico para 10 personas y no se puede hacer mucho ruido, más allá de eso todo genial.
Apartamento bem espaçoso, muito limpo e arrumado. Utensílios domésticos de última geração, com uma varanda muito agradável.
Apartamento top e muito bem decorado com uma área externa espaçosa e aconchegante. Anfitrião super atencioso. Voltarei com certeza !

O Armando é super atencioso, prestativo e simpático...amamos o apartamento, tem uma localização( do lado do metro, praia e com restaurantes, supermercados no mesmo quarteirão) e infra estrutura (imóveis modernos e bem cuidados) maravilhosa...sem contar a varanda com churrasqueira que faz toda a (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza voltaremos mais vezes.

Fantastic apartment in an amazing location. Armando couldn't have been a kinder host. I stupidly left my wallet (with a sizeable amount of money) behind, and he went above and beyond to return it to me. Top marks, top host!
Excelente hospitalidad por parte de Armando. Muy buen departamento, muy moderno y comodo

name: Central apartment in Almada street
summary: Cozy, restored very central apartment in Porto's heart. .free wi-fi.  .Very central: walking distance from main touristic points .2min walk from "Aliados "metro station .Big public parking just across the road with special price agreement
space: This is a very cosy apartment located in one of the most central streets of Porto: Rua do Almada. This flat was restored recently and furnished with all comodities including washing machine for clothes, expresso machine, water boiler, fridge, hooven and electrical cooking dish. Walking distance from all major touristic points you will feel like living the city as a true local as the apartment is on the heart of the city and near all kinds of tipical comerce, shoping area, restaurants, pubs etc...! If you need there is a public parking garage just across the street where you can put your car...we have a special price so ask us about this :)
description: Cozy, restored very central apartment in Porto's heart. .free wi-fi.  .Very central: walking distance from main touristic points .2min walk from "Aliados "metro station .Big public parking just across the road with special price agreement This is a very cosy apartment located in one of the most central streets of Porto: Rua do Almada. This flat was restored recently and furnished with all comodities including washing machine for clothes, expresso machine, water boiler, fridge, hooven and electrical cooking dish. Walking distance from all major touristic points you will feel like living the city as a true local as the apartment is on the heart of the city and near all kinds of tipical comerce, shoping area, restaurants, pubs etc...! If you need there is a public parking garage just across the street where you can put your car...we have a special price so ask us about this :) All the apartment is yours to enjoy. Before check in we will be in touch to help you, advise you or just organize
neighborhood_overview: Tipical and central neighborhood in Porto+s heart! This was not long ago the street for the  locals to by electrical gear, as well some antiques and lockers... Tosay you can still find some of these tipical shops mixed with many modern concept stores , restaurants and cafés!
transit: You can walk everywhenere! If you need you have the metro just 2 min away. Closest station is "aliados" but the central station " Trindade" is only 5 min walk! The old Tram also passes in front of the apartment so you can enjoy an old and tipial ride in Porto!
access: All the apartment is yours to enjoy.
interaction: Before check in we will be in touch to help you, advise you or just organize your check in...whatever you prefer! On the check in we will meet and help you with anything you may need, showing you the place and pointing the main places on the neighborhood and the city ;) During your stay we will be always reachable by phone, email/airbnb or even whaapp... but we will only come if you request...we want our guests to enjoy full privacy! :)
house_rules: Treat everything well and with care. Smoking is just allowed outside. Please respect the neighbours No loud noise allowed before 10h00 am or after 10h00 pm Respect the check  in and check out times: CHECK-IN Check in or bagage drop can be maid from 12h30 on but in case there were guests leaving that morning the house may be in cleaning process. We will try to make the cleaning as soon as possible but this process can be made till 16h30. Regular check in os from 12h30-20h. Late checkin: In case you want to arrive later no problem but you need our confirmation for this at least 24h before your arrival, otherwise late check ins will not be possible to make (unless this is a same day reservation. in this case on the booking this must be mentioned). If you arrive later than 20h without previous notice it will be consider no-show.  20h-23h30- FREE from 23h30 on: late check in fee (30euros)- to be paid on your arrival. You must provide a chek in time at least 24h hours before you arrival.  We

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments:
Rosa/Ana foram extremamente receptivas.
O apartamento é excepcionalmente bem localizado e confortável em um primeiro andar bem sobre um restaurante com ótimos sucos naturais, onde tomávamos nosso café da manhã.
Fica a um minuto da Avenida dos Aliados, numa esquina com uma visão privilegiada. As noites são silenciosas.
Mais que recomendado.

Rosa's friend Phillip met me at the apartment and was super friendly and went out of his way to tell me where I should eat,sites to visit and even a little history on Porto. Very nice guy.  
The apartment was in a prime location and was very clean with all amenities. The apartment was so lovely as it had the classic windows with the large wooden doors that you can close to eliminate street noise. The old classic tram goes by the apartment. I loved seeing it.  Basically everything is within walking distance and the apartment is located in an ideal location
I loved staying here and would gladly come back

Mimo późnej rezerwacji (na dzień przed przyjazdem), apartament był w pełni przygotowany i Rosie udało się załatwić łóżeczko turystyczne dla naszego dziecka. Kontakt z Aną, która przekazała nam klucze, był sprawny. Opis apartamentu w pełni zgadzał się z rzeczywistością. Położenie w samym centrum, wszędzie mogliśmy dotrzeć piechotą. Jedynym minusem jest to, że bardzo słychać kroki osób mieszkających na górze, ale jest to zrozumiałe biorąc pod uwagę stare budownictwo, w jakim znajduje się apartament. Bardzo dziękujemy za gościnę!

Rosa's apartment is super-centrally located, and in close proximity to everything you could want from Porto, both eating, drinking, public transport (both buses and Metro), sights, tours etc.

I have only good things to say about Rosa and the way she handled my stay, and her friend provided me with some good pointers when I arrived (quite late) on the first night.

One thing -- if you like to keep some windows open at night and you are super-sensitive to noise, there is some traffic in the streets outside, but for me it was not a problem.

El piso está estupendamente situado, en puro centro de Oporto, a 5 minutos andando de la catedral, a 5 minutos andando de la Torre dos Clérigos, a 15 minutos andando de la ribera del Duero, con locales para desayunar y comer justo abajo. Nos pilló en etapa de mucho calor y quizá le falte algo para luchar contra el calor dentro de la casa. También está tan céntrico que hay algo de ruido ambiental por la noche (sobre todo si hace calor y quieres abrir las ventanas). Pero en general muy bien todo

Estuvimos alojados en el apartamento de Rosa en Agosto y la experiencia fue muy positiva. El apartamento se encuentra muy bien situado para disfrutar de Oporto, ya que todos los puntos de interés turístico están a 5-15 minutos a pie. Además, el apartamento está bien equipado. Philippe, la persona que nos recibió en nombre de Rosa, nos dio una agradable bienvenida, proporcionándonos diversas recomendaciones que hicieron nuestra estancia aún más interesante. 
Gracias por todo, Rosa y Philippe.

Première fois à Porto et première expérience Airbnb. Bilan plus que positif! L'appartement est conforme aux photos, l'emplacement est parfait : tout est à proximité. L'accueil était sympathique, de bons conseils ont été donné pour profiter au maximum de Porto. Expérience à refaire

We had such a great stay at Rosa's place! Her friend was very welcoming and gave us nice tips for exploring beautiful Porto. 
The location was more than perfect- main attractions, bars, restaurants and supermarkets are just a few steps away. The apartment itself is situated in an old lovely building and nothing was missing inside. Street noise can be easily reduced with closing the wooden shutters :) 
We were very happy choosing this flat and we can truly recommend it!
Very pleasant stay, I would happily come back!

Rosa's apartment is lovely - really well located, well equipped and very comfortable. Easy to find and Flavia welcomed us well and showed us all the great places to visit. It's a bit noisy as on a main road but nothing some earplugs won't fix. Well recommended!
Rosa's apartment is in a perfect location! Also, we traveled wirh our infant son, and she provided a crib. We did not meet Rosa, but her friend Silvia warmly greeted us and gave us some great tips!

The apartment itself is small but perfect for 2. It gets a little noisy because the road in front of the building is constantly busy. But we enjoyed staying here because it's so accessible to everywhere! Fairly easy to locate too. Warning though, the water of the toilet isn't strong so.... It's not easy trying to flush some things :/

De verhuurder was flexibel met het inchecken. Doordat mijn verwachte aankomst tijd onzeker was, was dit al een fijn welkom. Het welkom was zeer hartelijk en voelde als thuis komen bij familie. Op de plattegrond van Porto had de verhuurder aangegeven wat de plekken zijn die het bezoeken waard zijn (ook de niet toeristische plekken). Hiermee heeft de verhuurder mij in korte tijd mij wegwijs gemaakt in Porto. 

Naast een geweldig gezellig appartement in het hart van Porto was de service helemaal super.

La experiencia fue muy buena. El chico encargado de recibirnos nos espero incluso al retrasarnos. Nos doy unas ideas muy útiles para pasar allí unos días. El apartamento es exactamente igual que en las fotos y está localizado en un lugar privilegiado para el acceso a todos los puntos turísticos de la ciudad.

Un joli appartement, bien situé, proche de la gare San Bento. Nous avons été très bien accueillis par Silvia qui a pris le temps de nous expliquer ce qu'il y a à voir à Porto. Rosa a été très flexible pour que nous ayons accès à l'apartement dès 13h, très pratique! La rue peut être un peu bruyante, en tout cas les soirs de weekend.

Nous avions 1/4 d heure de retard notre hôte nous a patiemment attendus  et à pris le temps de nous indiquer les lieux à voir à Porto ,plan à l'appui c' était sup bien.
L appartement est très central nous avons pu faire toutes les visites à pied. Appartement très propre bien équipé
Et nous avons eu un temps magnifique

Super accueil ; des explications pour découvrir Porto.
Très bien situé.
Très joli appartement.

Very good location for this appartment, right in the center of Porto. Many cafés/restaurants few meters away. All mains attractions at walking distance.
Appartment is spacious, confy and well decorated. A bit noisy at night because of the area, however.
Good check-in and great advices from Flavia, thanks.
I would recommend this place for a short stay in Porto

Lugar maravilhoso, ficamos na casa da Rosa do dia 14 a 17 de outubro, o apartamento é  excelente... cama muito Boa, chuveiro e banheiro ótimos, sala bem aconchegante... recomendo este lugar para todos, fica numa região  bem central e próximo  de tudo. Fizemos todos os pontos turísticos caminhando pela proximidade da casa. Se voltarmos a PORTO com certeza ficarei no apartamento da Rosa, super atenciosa e mostrou muitas dicas interessante!!!! Muito obrigado Rosa!!!!!!!

Excellent acceuil, chaleureux et avec de nombreux conseils fiables et utiles. Logement conforme à l'annonce, sans surprises, lumineux et agréablement aménagé. Très bonne situation, à proximité des transports et centres d'intérêt. Un peut bruyant bien sûr, mais rien de méchant. D'ailleurs être proche de tout et n'entendre que le chant des oiseaux est chose rare et chère. Si nous devions retourner à Porto c'est sans hésiter que nous prendrions à nouveau ce logement.

El apartamento es igual que en las fotos. Está muy bien equipado, limpio y muy bien situado. Lo único negativo fue el ruido de la calle (sobretodo las motos). Nos recibieron a la hora convenida muy amablemente y nos sugirieron lugares que visitar.
Un auténtico 10. Piso muy acogedor, en todo el centro de Porto. Una gozada!!

Apartamento situado en un primer piso del centro histórico de Oporto, a 50 metros de la Plaza de la Libertad. Justo al lado, hay un churresqueria donde se come barato y muy bien. También hay a 20 metros un parking para el coche donde nos cobraron 15 € diarios . Para visitar Oporto no necesitais ni metro ni autobuses. la zona mas alejada está a 20 minutos andando.
Spot perfeito no centro histórico do Porto!

Logement bien situé, à proximité des principaux sites touristiques, bars et restaurants. L'accueil a été chaleureux avec l'ami de Rosa, qui a pris le temps de nous conseiller pour notre séjour à Porto. Bien apprécié.

Cela dit, le logement étant situé à deux rues des bars les plus fréquentés du centre historique, les fêtards sont parfois bruyants (cris, rires...). Nous nous sommes faits réveiller 2 nuits sur 3. Les planchers du voisin au-dessus craquent également beaucoup, ce qui peut-être particulièrement dérangeant tard en soirée.
Cozy atmosphere, great location, clean and with all the necessary amenities! Great tips on how to explore Porto from a local's perspective. Will be definitely recommending it to my friends!
Céntrico, límpio, atentos con nosotros. No se puede pedir más.
ubicacion perfecta y el apartamento muy comodo y bonito
Super appartement

Conveniently located, within walking distance from all Porto's attraction. It was easy to stop at the house to rest whenever I felt like to. It is an historic building recently renovated and equipped with everything for longer stays (including a washer, a microwave, a full size electrical oven, electrical stove).  Upon check-in I was given a map and suggestions on where to dine and where to go. Bonus: the coffee machine! I'd book it again in a heartbeat! Thanks Rosa! My time in Porto was amazing!

O apartamento é bom, contém o necessário e a localização é ótima. Um grande ponto negativo ao nosso ponto de vista é o barulho, por estar localizado em uma esquina movimentada, conter varias janelas e estas nao terem vidro duplo, entra muito ruido ao apartamento, tanto durante o dia quanto a noite.

Rosas Wohnung liegt sehr zentral im Herzen Portos, sodass man die Stadt bestens erkunden kann. Alle wichtigen Sehenswürdigkeiten sind fußläufig zu erreichen. Restaurants, Bars und Cafés sind zahlreich in der Umgebung zu finden und auch bis zur Metro ist es nicht weit. Das Apartment ist wohnlich eingerichtet und alles, was man braucht, ist vorhanden. Man fühlt sich direkt Zuhause. Da wir über São João in Porto waren, war es in den Nächten natürlich auch etwas lauter auf der Straße, aber wenn man so zentral unterkommen will, muss man sich dem bewusst sein. Wenn die Fenster geschlossen sind, ist es in Ordnung. Der Mailkontakt mit Rosa war freundlich. Persönlich haben wir sie leider nicht kennengelernt. Bei unserer Ankunft hat uns ihr Freund Ricardo erwartet und uns alles erklärt. Insgesamt auf jeden Fall empfehlenswert!

We were thankfule for have an opportunity to stay in Rosa's apartment. On our arrival we were a bit late as the bus we arrived with was late, and Rosa's frined was so kind and waited for us. Even he kindly asked  guests in another apartment to wait a bit. Thank you Ricardo for that and thanks to other guests for their patience. :) We liked the spirit of the apartment and its location very much. Definitely recommended for a nice and pleasant stay in Porto. :) Thank you Rosa one more time. Martina

Rosa's place was amazing. Check in was smooth and Pedro (a friend of Rosa's) gave us lots of helpful information and even came back when we got a bit stuck with the keys. Then location is excellent. Next to lots of good bars and restaurants and within walking distance of all major attractions. 
The apartment itself is perfect for a couple. Good facilities in the kitchen and a great shower. The bed is also VERY comfortable. Would definitely recommend staying here!

Fantastic host and location! Close to everything. A great home for our time in Porto. Communication was excellent. The apartment was as advertised - plenty of space and very "homey". Only small complaints: the area is very lively, so if you are a light sleeper, bring ear plugs (small price to pay for the great location). Because of noise, we could not sleep with windows open, and there is no AC, so it was very hot. A fan would solve this issue. Also, only one roll of toilet paper was provided, which seemed strange. Otherwise, we highly recommend this apartment!

La casa está muy bien ubicada, a un paso de todo (casco histórico y zona de restaurantes). La única pega es que se encuentra en una zona muy transitada por los coches y no se puede dormir con la ventana abierta. La limpieza del apartamento es perfecta y el trato con los anfitriones tambien muy bueno.

La casa di Rosa è centrale e comoda per raggiungere praticamente ogni zona della città a piedi. Essendo affacciata sulla strada è un po' rumorosa ma per noi non ci sono stati problemi. La casa è come nelle foto dell'annuncio, molto pulita e con tutto il necessario. Consiglio vivamente di soggiornare nella casa di Rosa.
Nice central appartment. Rosa is very nice and always tries to please guests. Very convenient and close to restaurants and nice bars!

Muchas gracias por el recibimiento, el piso está muy bien ubicado, limpio e iluminado. La persona que nos recibió fue muy atenta y nos dio mucha informacion sobre la ciudad. Además de ser puntual para el check-in. 
Ubicación muy próxima a los bares lo que es genial para aquellos que piensen ir de fiesta en porto.

Séjour mitigé. 
Voilà les points positifs : appartement très propre et bien équipé, lumineux, bien placé pour visiter Porto. 
Les points negatifs : entrée dans les lieux très compliqué et l'appartement n'était pas prêt à l'heure. Il est aussi bruyant même les fenêtres fermées (bruit strident quasiment en continue du signal du feu de passage pour les aveugles, beaucoup de bruit de pas du voisin du dessus qui avait apparemment un chien). 
Déçus des difficultés rencontrées à l'arrivée, et surpris parle bruit, à part ça l'appartement est très bien.
Bel appartement bien situé en plein cœur de Porto. Vu son emplacement l'environnement est très bruyant jour et nuit surtout. Pas cool mais on ne peut pas tout avoir. Literie excellente.

Centrally located, and good value. Couldn't ask for much more! Thanks Rosa. 

 Bring earplugs for noisy motorcycles zooming by at night!

A localização não poderia ser melhor: próximo aos principais pontos turísticos e com farta oferta de restaurantes e vida noturna. O principal problema do apartamento vem também de sua principal vantagem: exatamente por estar numa área bem central, o barulho é intenso. Às sextas e sábados a impressão é que se dorme no meio de uma pista de dança animadíssima. Além do barulho externo, o prédio é bem antigo e qualquer movimentação nas escadas ou em outros apartamentos é facilmente percebida. Eu, que tenho sono pesado, tive bastante dificuldade de descansar.

Rosa's Unterkunft entsprach zu 100% der Beschreibung. Sie organisierte sogar extra eiben Transfer vom Flughafen zur Wohnung für uns. Check in nach 23 uhr kostet zusätzlich 30,00€. Die Lage ist absolut top,dafür allerdings auch sehr laut. Mit offenem Fenster zu schlafen war nicht möglich,das weiß man aber bei der zentralen Lage. Ab 19.00uhr ist kostenfreies parken auf der Straße aber auch in der Nähe; wir fanden immer einen Parkplatz. Kurz und knapp:zu empfehlen:-)

The location is fantastic and close to many sites, cafes and restaurants.  We had no trouble getting around on foot.  Rosa and Vasco provided great tips and were readily available to answer questions. I would come back and stay here.
Good location, good apartment, great WE in Porto.
In a word, location. This is a great apartment for anyone who wants to be in the centre of town and close to bars and restaurants.
Situación perfecta

It is a really recommendable apartment, right in the heart of Porto and fully equipped. Rosa and her friends, Vasco and Inês, were very friendly and helpful. We were offered lots of information about the city and useful things for our baby. We would always come back!

Gran estancia en Oporto, la ubicación es genial, no hace falta coger transporte publico para nada.
Justo al lado hay un parking 17,5€ por día para dejar el coche tranquilo.
Mil gracias, se lo recomendaré a mis amigos sin dudarlo.

What can I say that has not already been said?  The location is good, downtown, near a metro stop, easy walk around major tourist areas.  However, it is noisy (above restaurant, at busy intersection, and neighbor playing music at night/early am), and Rosa was poor at communicating after I checked in.
It's a nice place in Porto center, I'll choose to stay here when I come visit again.

Encantadora casa, muy bien decorada y con todos los utensilios que necesitarás para tu estancia. Una ubicación perfecta, en todo el centro de la ciudad, a 1 minutos de Aliados. Rosa es muy amable, todo facilidades tanto a la hora de llegada como de salida. Perfecto para una pareja que quiera visitar Oporto a pie. Posibilidad de Parking por 17.5 euros al día al lado de la casa. Recomendable 100%
great location for a city break in Porto. everything you might want is in easy reach.
Nice apartment on a great location

We spent two weeks in Porto. The flat is great for tourists. It is really central in the city. The flat is as described and on the pictures. If you want to cook yourself, that‘s great too. It is, as other pointed out as well, really very loud. If you are not used to it, it might be a problem. When opening the window it is very loud in the flat during the day and at night due to traffic and people walking by. 

Another minor thing: The bed in the sleeping room is very small. It is ok for two people, when you are used to sleeping close to each other. We felt it was a bit to small for us though. Besides that we can totally recommend this place. Really lovely. Thanks.
The apartment is located in the city center, near a cafe and supermarket. in the evening very noisy, the apartment is conveniently located, there is everything necessary

name: Shining view in the city heart 5
space: Recently renovated apartment with modern architecture in an old building, in the heart of Oporto, with the Douro River and the wine cellars of Porto on its feet. Upon arrival you will feel the comfort of a real home prepared specially for your needs. The apartment is located in an iconic building 2 min walk from the famous Ribeira with its restaurants, bars and boat trips, 2 min from the cathedral and 7 min from São Bento station. host.host_about: Just feel at home in our apartments!!

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments: Apartamento limpio, bien ubicado, bien acondicionado y con buenas vistas. Anfitrión muy amable y disponible para cualquier duda/ problema.

The best apartment in Porto! You cannot be better located to visit the historic part on foot. The appartment on the top two floors (with elevator) is spacious, comfortable, immaculately clean, well equipped and decorated with taste. Everything was in perfect condition. I thoroughly enjoyed the tranquility of the apartment, you can hear the seagulls and not the cars as the apartment is located at the back side. The highlight is the panoramic window with the breathtaking view on the Douro. This allowed us to have a direct view of the fireworks on the Douro because we were lucky to be there during the Sao Joao (Saint John the Baptist). 
David is a responsible and effective host who answered all our questions. Before booking, I needed a lot of information and he always responded promptly and patiently. Upon arrival, we were on the end of a canicule and he bought an air conditioner for us. This was very much appreciated and allowed us to sleep well. I recommend it.
David was a great host and the shining view is in an amazing location 5 mins to the center definitely going bk again
Wonderful apartment with beautiful views of the river and city. Fantastic location to all the fun that Porto has to offer; it was the perfect long weekend getaway!

It was an incredible place!! The location was perfect, right next to a lively neighbourhood with everything we needed but nice and quiet at night. The apartment was spotless and everything in perfect order. Definitely staying there again when I come back to Porto.

Très bien situé. Accueil chaleureux et efficace. Appartement spacieux. Petit café chouette en face tenu par des russes « Hungry biker », bons petits-déjeuners, smoothies et café. Jolie parc en haut de la côte pour aller boire un verre et regarder le coucher du soleil sur le Douro. Je recommande!

David’s apartment in Porto is a MUST BOOK! In such a convenient spot, and incredibly clean and comfortable. The kind of place you don’t feel guilty staying in for a lazy afternoon to read! The view, the amenities, the accessibility to the host - all bonuses. Porto was the highlight of my trip to Portugal and I would go back to this apartment in a millisecond! I also checked in after 11pm and it was a breeze to self check in - a huge bonus.

name: BEST HOME in the BlueMosq area!
summary: - Best location in the old city touristic center! - Washing Machine, Dish washer, Microwave and fully equipped with the daily basic needs! - 125sqm, Sapacious and comfortable! - Brand new, Neat n Clean! - 3Bed Rooms, 1 Hall room, 2 shower n toilet
space: WELCOME to our 3 Bedrooms +1 Hall spacious apartment (125 Sq.meters with 4 Kingsize beds & 4 single beds, 2 Sofa bed, can comfortably accommodate 9-10 people, ground floor) with a gorgeous view of church & mosque together, located on the coast of the Bosphorous in Istanbul Old City (Ancient Peninsula). It is a charming flat (renovated in 2017) with modern facilities.  There is a spacious balcony behind, open air and sunshine are always available inside the whole home! Wifi, luxury sheets, towels, big satellite TV,  toys, games, furniture, fully-equipped kitchen with all facilities (so that guests can cook & eat as they wish), fridge,washing machine, iron & iron bed, including 3 bedrooms, 2 bathroom,  large living and dining room, 2 seperate shower & toilets. YOU will have the house to yourselves but we will meet you to welcome and hand over the keys and show you all the features of the house and area, give useful information whenever you want.  Note: We do not live in this house. We ke

It is a charming flat (renovated in 2017) with modern facilities.  There is a spacious balcony behind, open air and sunshine are always available inside the whole home! neighborhood_overview: WİTHİN a 1 minute walk is;  -Famous Kumkapi Fish Restaurants Alley -Grocery, bakery and mini markets -Restaurants with Turkish and European Cousin WİTHİN a 10 minute walk is;  -Beyazid tram station (tram crosses all historical places of the city),  -Beyazid Grand Bazaar, -Laleli Shopping Malls, -Aksaray Shopping Malls, -Istanbul University, -Several banks,  -A pharmacy,  WİTHİN a 5 minutes walk are;  -Marmaray (Intercontinental Undersea Subway) -Sultanahmet - Blue Mosque, -Suleymaniye Mosque,  -Hippodrome square,  -Çemberlitaş hamam -Suleymaniye Ancient Library, -Aga Kapi (Famous Alley of Cafes & -Nargile(Hookah)) -Sultanahmet tram station,  -A Hamam (Turkish Bath),  -Little Hagia Sophia,  -Sokullu Mehmet Pasa Mosque,  -Supermarkets (BIM and DIA),  -Hagia Sophia Museum,  WİTHİN a 15 minute walk is;  -Ataturk Airport - Aksaray Metro(Subway) Station -Museum of Turkish and Islamic Art,  -Mosaic Museum,  -Basilica Cistern,  -Topkapi Palace -A post office,  -Hagia Irene Museum,  -Archaeolog
notes: -FREE Cleaing: daily/once in 2 days/upon request. -7/24 service available in emergency. -Free consultancy about tour to all over Turkey
transit: 1. Take Airport-to-Aksaray metro. Get off at Aksaray Station. Walk to Yusufpasa, get into tram and come to sultanahmet station. Ask for Marmara University Rectorate, this unit is on a street close to rectorate. 2. We can organise a pick up from Ataturk Airport for 30 Euro, Sabiha Gokcen for 60 Euro (per a car). As this is one of the central point of the city, there are convenient public transports (Metro, Tramway, Marmaray undersea line, buses, Mini buses, taxis etc) available. We will provide a map with details and useful information.
access: YOU will have the house to yourselves but we will meet you to welcome and hand over the keys and show you all the features of the house and area, give useful information whenever you want.  Note: We do not live in this house. We keep it just for our guests.
interaction: We dont stay with guests to make our guests feel home. YOU will have the house to yourselves but we will meet you to welcome and hand over the keys and show you all the features of the house and area, give useful information whenever you want.  Note: We do not live in this house. We keep it just for our guests.
house_rules: -We thank our guests for not smoking in the house. You can always just walk out and smoke in the balcony fresh air. -Please let us know about the broken things, so we can fix it for our next guest. -No unexpected guests are welcome to stay overnight for safety reasons. -Our cleaning time is 11:00 am-13:00pm, please inform us before when you don't need. -There is a pair of keys, please do not forget to put it back when you check out. NEVER LEFT THE KEYS BEHİND THE DOOR!!! -Towels and bed sheets will be changed upon request.

host.host_about:
We, Ali & Argen, are two young enthusiasts who love Istanbul. We are both university graduates and currently studying MS in İstanbul Universities you probably have not heard :) We have been living here for more than 10 years. During those years we have worked in different sectors of tourism and gained a great experience (as a guide, receptionist, interpreter, seller of turkish delight in Eminonu) We are eager to do our best to make you feel home. Hope you will enjoy your stay with us here in Istanbul. Take care and see you.
Argen & Ali

reviews.comments: We stayed at very nice apartment, well located in Istanbul's Old City, near many attractions and restaurants. We felt very safe and comfortable.
Fantastic place. Value for money. Very clean, excellent location, will recommend using again. Our host Ali was fantastic too bloke.
Great location. Outstanding hospitality.

We (just like lots of others hosted by the boys) ended up with another apartment. 
That being said, the pace we were given was large, very clean, in a perfect location.

Огромное спасибо Али! Отличная квартира! отличное расположение. 7-10 минут до Голубой мечети и основных  исторических достопримечательностей. Очень дружелюбное отношение: встретили, разрешили оставить чемоданы до время заселения, очень чистая квартира, большая обеденная зона. Мы ездили с подругами - 8 девушек. всего хватило) всё понравилось) от души рекомендую!
That flat was on the first floor but clean and nice and very spacious, it is next to the blue mosque and the tram. Loved the place and the location

Location is good. (Entire are is on up hill_historical places also are in up hill) Amenities are good, Ali and his partner are well behaved. Any one can select this property without any hesitation. (Except one wash room small, kitchen is small)

The location of this house and the hospitality of the host (Ali) cannot be beat. The best host I have ever had among my stays at airbnb homes. The house is within walking distance of blue mosque, grand bazaar, and many shops. 
We really enjoyed our stay at this house.
The host canceled this reservation 95 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Verifiquen que les estan entregando el apartamento que efectivamente contrataron. Comi anfitriones son excepcionales gran seres rumanos.

This place was great! Extremely homey, easy check-in, a beautiful 5 minute walk from the tram that connects most of the must-see tourist attractions, and Ali was extremely nice and helpful
Special thanks to Ali and Argen
Ali的房子位置非常棒,因为在高地,出门就可以看到远处的大海;出门走5分钟就可以到蓝色清真寺,附近还有各个景点,非常方便;因为在老城区,房子不新,但还干净,作为旅途中休息的地方,已经很不错了;房子附近有土耳其餐厅和中餐,很方便;最让我们印象深刻的是我们入住和离开时,因为我们人多,行李也多,Ali专门安排了两个人帮我们搬行李,谢谢Ali

The property is in an outstanding location for anybody who wants to see the highlights of Istanbul. Ali was an outstanding host arranging airport transfers and providing so many helpful suggestions on what to see and do. You cannot go wrong with booking this property.
The place was clean in a great location. Perfect communication and well organized.

When we ariived, Ali and his friend helped us with our luggage’s and gave us information about the city and places to visit. His place was very close to Blue mosque, restaurant, and many attractions. Ali was very quick with communication through (Hidden by Airbnb) . He was very respectful and nice. His friend even helped us take our luggage’s to a new apartment that was 5-10 minute walk. 

The reason why I give this a three star is because it was not as advertised. The number of bedrooms, bathroom, and pictures did not match. Also, they were queens size beds and not king. 
2 bedroom had 1 Queen bed 
1 bedroom had 1 Queens and 1 twin bed 
And rest were sofa beds. 

And one full bathroom and 1 was half bathroom (only toilet and sink) 
 
Another reason I give this place a three star was the fact it was cleaned only once in our entire 1 week stay. 


Other than that this place was great.

Ali was an awesome host. He went out of his way to make sure our family was comfortable. There was this tea kettle that my mom and I loved at his apartment, and I wasn't able to find it anywhere, so he went out and bought it for us! He was always there for communication and tips on where to go and what to eat. My niece was sick, so he even took my brother to the hospital and had her checked up. He stayed with him until they were discharged. If I could recommend a place to stay to atone visiting Turkey, it would be with Ali and Argen. Thank you for making our stay easier in a foreign country!

Ali was superb and he really took good care of us.
The apartment was old but fine, really well located and clean.
I recommend without  a doubt to rent with Ali & Argen.
Thanks for everything.
It was a perfect place it is a very clean and lovely

name: Tamarama Penthouse apartment
summary: If you want to be close by Tamarama and Bondi, this is the Beach Pad for you. Tucked away in a quiet cul-de-sac and only a stone's throw to the beach they call "Glamarama" and minutes walk away from Bondi and Bronte Beaches.
space: This unique penthouse apartment hosts colourful flavours of Morocco, is situated across the road from Tamarama Beach and has a spacious living and dining area opening to a verandah with spectacular views. Relax in the 1930's Huon pine boat daybed in front of floor to ceiling windows or just BBQ on the verandah. The kitchen combines elegance, functionality and a touch of Spanish. It has a double oven, Ilve stove top, steamer oven, dishwasher and microwave. The main Moroccan style bathroom has a double sink and combined bath/shower. The main bedroom has a queen size bed and build in wardrobes, the 2nd bedroom has a queen size bed and ensuite, the 3rd bedroom and study has bunk bed (double on bottom & single on top). There is one off street car park and the apartment is walking distance to local shops, Bondi and Bronte beaches.
description: If you want to be close by Tamarama and Bondi, this is the Beach Pad for you. Tucked away in a quiet cul-de-sac and only a stone's throw to the beach they call "Glamarama" and minutes walk away from Bondi and Bronte Beaches. This unique penthouse apartment hosts colourful flavours of Morocco, is situated across the road from Tamarama Beach and has a spacious living and dining area opening to a verandah with spectacular views. Relax in the 1930's Huon pine boat daybed in front of floor to ceiling windows or just BBQ on the verandah. The kitchen combines elegance, functionality and a touch of Spanish. It has a double oven, Ilve stove top, steamer oven, dishwasher and microwave. The main Moroccan style bathroom has a double sink and combined bath/shower. There is one off street car park and the apartment
neighborhood_overview: Nestled between two rugged headlands, Tamarama is a small coastal neighbourhood  that sits in the middle of the great coastal walk from Bondi to Coogee. Tamarama Park, which flows down to the much loved beach, is regarded by locals as their private reserve. Tamarama Beach has plenty of cosy barbeque spots, a playground and a café.
notes: HOUSE RULES - JUST A FEW THINGS TO GET OUT OF THE ROAD & THEN PLEASE ENJOY YOURSELVES. Please treat this apartment as if it were your own home and treat it with respect.  Please leave the apartment in the state you found it in. We will take care of washing, standard cleaning and vacuuming. If you would like to leave the last load of dishes washing in the dishwasher, that is fine. Please transfer all rubbish to the outside bins. *red/general rubbish, yellow/bottles, plastic & tin cans, blue/paper &cardboard). Please leave all dirty linen on each bed so we don’t get it mixed up. Dirty towels can be left in the bath. Please do not leave any acquired goods on the property (e.g. scooters, children’s toys, surf boards etc without consulting owner).  Any excess cleaning or rubbish removal will be charged. If you have an animal travelling with you please ensure they do not sleep on the beds and do not leave them for long periods alone and let them bark. There is a small patch of grass just to
transit: Street parking available (it can get busy on hot summer days), close to transport and walking distance to Tamarama, Bronte and Bondi beaches.
interaction: I am happy to assist you during your stay. Just give me a hola on the mobile should you need anything.
house_rules: Respect our neighbours (no parties or loud music late at night), smoking on only the balcony only and keep the apartment clean and tidy. Treat the place as if it were your own.

host.host_about: I am a Executive Producer based in Sydney that works in advertising and cross-media entertainment.

reviews.comments: Lizzy's Tamarama pad is a truly outstanding property.  It's amazingly well equipped, spacious, with stunning outlook (from an enormous terrace) and its beautifully maintained.  Lizzy is an absolute pleasure to deal with.  This is a unique property with a wonderful relaxed feel to it.  Also a perfect place to get some serious work done - its quite inspiring.

Lizzy was the best host, and we fell in love with her beautiful home in the best spot in Sydney.  
Her home is beautifully equipped with everything you need for a beach holiday, and Lizzy is just downstairs if you need anything. Tamarama beach is literally a 2 minute walk, and our kids spent a lot of time playing in the grassy patch if they weren't catching waves! We have had the best holiday and will definitely be back.

What a place!! What a host!! It s a dream, watching the beach earing the see lying on a dayboat bed. The place is huge and very close to amazing beaches and beautiful costal promenades... lizzie was a super host, very helpfull and carefull about us having a good time. 
The terrasse is superb
This place is marvellous!! We had a fantastic family time there we wont forgett

The big question for me is would I want to stay here again, and the answer is yes - in a heartbeat.

To watch the sun rise over Tamarama beach from the comfort of all the cushions in the 'boat' in the sitting room was a delight. Not an early riser? Don't worry, the lorikeets will have you up in plenty of time....!
Set between Bondi beach and Bronte beach which are easy to walk to. Superb local beach for family and easy to grab an uber to the city. really enjoyed the location and weather.

This place is pure magic! I had the most wonderful time with family and we had everything we needed in the house. The location the quiet and friiendly neighbourhood and the spectacular view of the ocean day and night makes this place a MUST to experience. Add to that a gracious host to welcone you and who is always around to assist. Highly recommended for families!

We had an fantastic stay in Lizzy's apartment. The location was excellent and Lizzy was so helpful and accommodating (making sure we had some breakfast provisions after we arrived late at night which was so very much appreciated). The apartment was more than spacious enough for our family of 5. The worst thing about this apartment was having to leave those amazing views behind when we left! I would definitely recommend this apartment to anyone else and would stay here again.

Great place right on Tamara Beach. Very cosy and great host who kept in contact prior and through our visit making it very comfortable for us. Easy check in, nice walking areas & very close to cafe's Bondi and surrounding beaches, Bondi Junction for shopping and an easy drive to City. Big spacious apartment with beautiful views and good entertaining areas. And a nice day bed (boat) overlooking beach for the perfect afternoon nap.

We could have really beautiful time with my family in Lizzy's apartment.
The view was so wonderful that we enjoyed day and night at balcony.
For my 3 years old baby,everything is perfect. We wanna be back someday.
We really appreciate Lizzy's kindness and helpfulness.
Thank you for everything.

This is a fantastic apartment. The view is to die for. It’s very large. It has great facilities. And Lizzy is really helpful. We couldn’t have asked for a better place to stay. We came with 2 very small kids looking for a chilled out holiday in a cool area - this was perfect. Can’t wait to come back.
Lizzy's place is fantastic! Beautiful view of Tamarama beach and only minutes walk from lots of shops and restaurants on Bondi road. Apartment is full of beautiful touches. Highly recommended!

Great host, hospitality and place to stay at. We had a group of 5 and there was plenty of room. Would definitely recommend for anyone looking to visit Sydney and the eastern beaches.
Thanks Lizzy!

If you’re looking for a truly magical stay in Tama this is the place. During our week long stay we never wanted to leave the apartment that was peaceful and zen like. We enjoyed our mornings checking the surf from the balcony and then walking barefoot to the beach for multiple swims. 

Truly it’s a slice of heaven.

Lizzys house is an amazing spot in sydney.
Tamarama is so nice and close to bronte pool that i personally lovee
Also lizZy have alot of details with us. She is always responding in a small time!
The house is just perfect!
We are looking forward to come back
I really love this place and fully recomend it!!!!

Such a wonderful stay! Lizzy’s apartment is the best place to  stay in the Eastern Suburbs. Convenient, very clean, perfect for families and just above the beach! Last but not least, Lizzy is a great host, making sure we had all what we needed and very responsive. Thank you again for a wonderful stay!

This apartment is excellent - location is a stone's throw to the beach, coastal walk and great cafes, fantastic view, and a really well kept, comfortable and complete apartment for a family.  Thoroughly recommended

Lizzy's place is just perfect! It is beautifully decorated and has a lovely calm and airy atmosphere. Very well appointed with everything you would need and a lovely balcony and day bed boat over looking the beach to chill. We took our two small children and it is a very baby/child friendly space. We were very comfortable and I would definitely recommend Lizzy's place and should we be in Sydney again we would definitely stay there.
The house was beautiful and Lizzy was the most attentive host. The view from the house was heavenly and the neighborhood was perfect. Highly recommend!
Lizzy is a wonderful and kind host,  her plac is walking-distane to a great park and beach, fifteen minute to bondi beach as well
We loved staying at Lizzy’s place!  The location was fantastic!  The view from the apartment was spectacular!  Super cool Home and we especially loved the boat “couch” in the living room!

Lizzy's place was perfect for our family - it's open, airy, with a balcony, some toys for the kids, plenty of entertainment options and so close to the parks and beaches. Lizzy was an awesome host with great communication, some really nice touches (amenities and some food items) and we're really grateful that she was able to accommodate an earlier-than-normal checkin time which we appreciated after 30 hours of planes and airports. We could rave on for ages, but quite simply... we'd never stay anywhere else on a trip to Sydney.

We thoroughly enjoyed staying at Tamarama from the spectacular view to the furnishings of the apartment which made our stay so special. We were greeted by yummy bread, fruit and other essentials which was greatly appreciated. The location was ideal for exploring Sydney with many great walks and beaches close by. Lizzie was a delightful host and we are already thinking about our next visit .

Lizzy was a fantastic host and we absolutely loved her Tamarama penthouse, it really exceeded our expectations. Here apartment was clean, fully stocked with everything we needed and more and the location was amazing, close to the beach and a quick walk or bus ride to Bondi Beach. Lizzy went above and beyond to accommodate us and made us feel so welcome, she was wonderful. We have 3 small children and the apartment was perfect for our family, safe, clean and had plenty of toys and other amenities for the kids. We can't say enough great things about our stay.

Location......view.....location.....view .... sums up our stay at Tamarama. The park next door was perfect for the our pet dog, we walked lots as Bondi was very close, lots of eating and shopping options around. Thank you Lizzy, we hope to be back, you are a great host, communication was perfect which made our stay easy and memorable.

Lizzy’s Place is fab! Amazing location with a really fab view. So easy to walk down to beach and close walk to both Bronte and Bondi. You feel like a local in this relaxing and spacious apartment. We loved it!

Lovely apartment in a fabulous location.  Best location in Sydney in our opinion! The photos don’t do it justice. The view to the beach is lovely from the spacious terrace. The kitchen was great, with everything you could need plus.... great for foodies. The bed was extremely comfortable,  especially nice after a long trip from the UK. Also there are ceiling fans everywhere which kept us nice and cool in the heatwave temperatures. We didn’t need to use the air con. Ice machine was a real plus too. We felt instantly at home and much preferred it to the flashier looking apartments on offer on Airbnb. Would be great for families too. Thanks again Lizzy for being so helpful and accommodating.

A truly amazing place!
Spacious, with a moroccan feel to it, and of course views to die for.
On top, Lizzy is a very considerate, helpful and responsive host, who'll do whatever she can to make your stay as enjoyable as possible.
If you're looking for a luxurious 'base' that's close to all the southern beaches, and provides easy access to Sydney centre, look no further. You'll never wanna leave...

name: Apto Olimpíadas praia Barra Tijuca
summary: Apto amplo, confortável, em frente à praia da Barra da Tijuca, 190m2, com 4 quartos (Duas suítes). Mobiliado e com utensílios.  Fácil acesso à transportes. Bairro próximo ao Parque Olímpico. Aluguel para grupo fechado 15 a 30 dias(negociável)
space: Apartamento ventilado, com uma área de 190m2, com uma varanda em L que contorna todo o espaço. Muito confortável . Cozinha ampla e toda equipada com móveis e utensílios. Sala ampla e mobiliada, com TV 60´e internet(wifi).
