neighborhood_overview: O bairro da Barra da Tijuca é muito agradável, acesso fácil à praia, shoppings, bancos, restaurantes, cafés, mercados, farmácias e transportes públicos, etc. Se precisarem podemos auxiliar durante sua estadia. Possuem bicicletas em toda orla da praia para aluguel, através de um aplicativo no celular. Delivery de comidas e medicamentos.
notes: Estou alugando o apartamento todo por uma temporada de de 15 à 30 dias, no mês de agosto/2016, durante as Olimpíadas no Rio de Janeiro, para um grupo de amigos ,empresários ,ou uma família.
transit: Fácil acesso transportes públicos,  táxis em domicilio, e aluguel de carro próximo.  Fornecerei contatos dos táxis e aluguel de carro. Possui estacionamento dentro do condomínio, 3 vagas .
access: Podem ir à praia caminhando em 5 minutos. Terão acesso à piscina, academia.
interaction: Estarei disponível para auxiliá-los, com dicas  e esclarecimentos de dúvidas.
house_rules: Proibido música  alta e barulho. Não é permitido festas com muitas pessoas. Área externa, também não é permitido barulho.  Proibido animais de estimação. Podem fumantes, mas mantendo a higiene do local. Os hóspedes serão responsáveis pela limpeza e a manutenção do local. Serão também responsáveis por qualquer móveis ou utensílios danificados. Aluguel somente com grupo fechado(empresários,família, amigos,etc). Período das Olimpíadas(de 15 à 30 dias),negociável.

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

name: Allotja't en un elegant i lluminós pis modernista al costat de Passeig de Gràcia
summary: Deixa't seduir per l'encant dels paviments de mosaic i els alts sostres artesonats d'aquest elegant i lluminós apartament modernista  ubicat en un edifici classic rehabilitat i  a tant sols 30 metres del Passeig de Gracia
space: BCN license apartment number: HTUB-007858 This is an elegant 110 m2 apartment located in a classic eixample building  with its facade recently restored at 30 mtrs from Paseo de Gracia. It has high-ceiling and fabulous modernist hydraulic mosaic traditional of "Eixample". The apartment has 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms which can accomodate up to six people. It is a suite with its own bathroom equipped with shower, a bathtub and a toilet. The others 2 bedrooms also have 2 beds and share the white bathroom with shower and a toilet.All rooms have wardrobes and double glazed windows. The living-room is furnished with design and confortable pieces, There is a stylish comfortable sofa and a fantastic black chaise longue,with flat screen TV, satelite channels, a CD compact stereo (made for Ipod,Iphone & USB) and of course free WIFI. There is also a full equipped kitchen with cooktop, microwave, oven, fridge and all the utensils you may need during your stay that will make you feel like home (Nesp
description: Deixa't seduir per l'encant dels paviments de mosaic i els alts sostres artesonats d'aquest elegant i lluminós apartament modernista  ubicat en un edifici classic rehabilitat i  a tant sols 30 metres del Passeig de Gracia
neighborhood_overview: Estaràs ubicat al cor de Barcelona a tant sols 30 metres del Passeig de Gracia, l'avinguda mes important i glamurosa de la ciutat on hi trobaras desde els edificis Modernistes de Gaudi a les millors botigues , cafes i hotels.    Gaudeix BCN!
notes: Places to visit: La sagrada familia Modernism buildings at paseo de gracia Casa batllo, La Pedrea, La casa de les punxes El parc Guell La Barceloneta neighborhood, close to the beach El Port Vell El Born, the old neighborhood of the city, full of bars,modern shops, and people Las Ramblas Picasso musuem MACBA at Raval Miro foundation at Montjuich Palau de la Musica Do you like football?  Ask us for Barça tickets FCB musuem
transit: As it is in the center of Barcelona it is very well conected. Close to the flat you have metro stations (L3,L5), also train station if you want to go out of the city, Bus and full of taxis. From Prat airport to the flat: 1.by taxi it will cost around 40 euros 2.by comfortable aerobus, 7 eur/person which will let you at Catalunya square, 10 min walking from the appartment. Visit (URL HIDDEN) to look for any information about public transport at Barcelona.
access: Premium location, close to paseo de gracia Free wifi Cleaning fee includes sheets, nordic, and 2 towels/person We can provide extra towels (each extra set 20€) Comfortable beds up to 6 peo we like hosting all type of families kids under 2 years old do not pay We provide a crib and a high chair for babies. Baby bedding is not included. cost of renting the crib bed linen: € 25 (is the extra that the laundry charges us) baby carriage: 30€ Nespresso Mineral water Full equiped kitchen, Oven,microwave,cooktop, fridge Toaster,tea maker, fruit squezer etc... Modernism flat, mosaic floor, high ceiling typical from the Eixample buildings. AC and heating in all rooms Ask for Barça tickets
interaction: Check in done by ourselves or by our friends of barnacheckin Restaurants and cafes recomendations Barcelona information.  NEED TO KNOW: If you arrive at the evening there is aLate check in fee:   >19.55 10€.   >21.55 20€.   >23.55 30€. >1.00 ask for availability Tourist tax to be paid at arrival (2,48€/person/night,  people older than 16) Due to some bad experience we reserve the right of admission to groups of boys or girls of less than 30 years without good references.
house_rules: Please take care of apartment like yours In the apartment you will find some instructions on using electrical appliances. Do not throw towels, napkins etc ... in the toilet Smoking is NOT allowed in the apartment. Please respect the hours of rest of the neighbors (22.00 to 8.00) Private parties NOT allowed Help us save energy. Turn out the lights and AC when you are not in the apartment. Decorative fireplace, forbidden to light fires Tourist city tax to be paid on arrival day: 2,25€/person/night.  People older than 16 Thank you En el apartamento encontrarás unas instruciones sobre el uso de los electrodomesticos. No esta permitido fumar en el apartamento. Por favor respeta las horas de descanso de los vecinos ( 22.00 a 8.00) Fiestas privadas NO permitidas Ayudanos a ahorrar energia.Apaga las luces y el AC cuando no estes en el apartamento No tirar toallitas, compresas etc... en el WC! Chimenea decorativa, prohibido encender fuego. gracias

host.host_about: Hi we are Lluis and Lali, we have rehabilitated this luminous apartment at heart of Barcelona. If you come to our city, this is a fantastic option, premium located, to enjoy your stay. See you at BCN :)

reviews.comments:
The appartment is situated near the public transport and the great shopping street "Passeig de Gràcia" with a lot of shops, cafés and restaurants.
 
Due to the central proximity the appartement is perfect for a sightseeing trip in Barcelona (10 min to walk to Plaça Catalunya, 2 min walk to the taxis and the bus stops).
 
The appartment is newly renovated, with modern furniture and a beautiful old tiled floor and stucco work in some of the rooms.
 
The automatic air conditioning for manual temperatur setting is very comfortable.
The conservatory (winter garden) is a additional room with a view in the courtyard (the view is not very spectacular but it is very comfortable there). Since the appartment is in the city center there is no fabulos view from none of the windows - but this does not matter at all.
 
There is also a Nespresso coffee machine in the modern kitchen (bring the capsules by your one or there is a Nespresso shop 100m away).
 
We can fully recomand this special appartment and Lluis as perfect host in this wunderful city.
Muchos gracias Lluis!!
 
Marcella and familiy

 *   * 



Das Appartment ist in unmittelbarer Nähe vom öffentlichen Verkehr und der grossen Einkaufsstrasse "Passeig de Gràcia" mit unzähligen Läden, Cafes und Restaurants.




Ideal für einen Sightseeing-Aufenthalt in Barcelona, da zentral gelegen (ca. 10 min zu Fuss zur Plaça Catalunya, 2 min zum Taxi-Stand und Bus-Haltestellen).


Wir waren zu 5. für drei Tage in Lluis Wohnung und haben uns sofort sehr wohl gefühlt. Lluis war bei der Schlüsselübergabe bereits vor Ort und hat uns gute Tipps für Barcelona gegeben. 



Die Wohnung ist neu renoviert, modern eingerichtet und hat wunderschöne alte Böden und Stuckaturen in manchen Zimmern.

Es hat eine automatische Lüftung: Die Temperatur kann manuell eingestellt werden (sehr angenehm).

Der verglaste Raum („Wintergarten“) ist ein zusätzlicher Raum mit Aussicht auf den Innenhof (die Aussicht ist jetzt nicht wirklich atemberaubend, aber es ist sehr gemütlich). Eine schöne Aussicht gibt es von keinem Fenster aus, da sich die Wohnung Mitten in der Stadt befindet - Stört aber nicht.

Es hat eine Nespresso-Kaffee-Maschine (Kapseln selber mitbringen oder 100m von der Wohnung gibt’s einen Nespresso-Shop).


Wir können die Wohnung und Lluis als Gastgeber nur weiterempfehlen.

Muchos gracias Lluis!!!


Marcella and familiy

Apartment´s location is top, just off Passeig de Gràcia. The apartment has a good & simple restauration preserving the original modernist floors & ceilings yet with modern kitchen and bathrooms.
Lluis was a great helpful host & proved to be very professional. 
Highly recommended.

Lluis is the perfect host, with great communication beforehand and a very warm welcome, he was also really flexible and understanding at check out too.

The apartment is really well located and as shown in the pictures very clean, tidy and stylish.

The apartment has great facilities, the kitchen is fully stocked (not the we needed to use it with so many great restaurants) and the shower was fantastic.

The beds are really comfortable, and the rooms very quiet (if you have the windows closed) and there is air con.

I would definitely book this place again and look forward to returning.
Huge thanks!
Very nice place to live...

The apartment is perfect. Great location, close to the metro station on ‘Passeig de Garcia’. 5-10 min. walking distance to many attractions such as Gaudi’s casa mila, Plaça Catalunya, Rambla st. and more.
The apartment is very big with all the needed facilities. It’s just been renovated and it’s clean and comfortable. 
Lluis was a great host. Help us with all our needs, even with ticket to Barcelona FC game. He was very flexible with our check-in and check-out times, and gave us tip for good restaurants in the area. 
Highly recommended. I’m sure you’ll enjoy its as we did.

Lluis' place was clean, well equipped and perfect for our four day stay in Barcelona.
The location of the apartment is fabulous and dealing with Lluis was seamless.
The photos and descriptions match reality to the T.
Thank you Lluis for having us.

Lluis is great. He was very responsive and accommodating. His apartment is even better than pictured. It is in a lovely area with many good restaurants near by (paco meralgo for example). Morning and evening coffees from his nespresso machine in the gallery were a treat. I would stay there again. Perfect for up to 6 people.

Lluis is a perfect host in every respect.
The apartment is lovely furnished with an eye on detail and good quality. You will find everything you could possibly need in there, starting from equipment (wlan, hairdryer, kitchen equipment etc.) to things like guides and books of Barcelona and Gaudi (in spanish) as well as  brochures on tourist attractions.

Lluis is very attentive and provides you with all kind of information.
Thank you as well for the flexible check-in/out.
The 6 of us were all happy to have chosen this apartment for our weekend-trip.
We can highly recommend it!

Me and my friends had a wonderful time at Lluis' apartment. The place was neat and clean, spacious and comfortable. A nice surprise was that the 'gallery' is really a balcony when you open the outside doors, so you can enjoy the afternoon sun. Lluis is a straightforward and very friendly host. The location is perfect for a weekend trip and I would definitely recommend this apartment to parties of 4-6.

I traveled to Barcelona with 3 other adults and my 2 young girls. The house was fantastic (as was Lluis); I would gladly stay here again. Everything was great, the only thing I would warn you about is the Master Bedroom being loud at night as it faces the main street (noise of cars driving by etc.).

We loved staying at this amazingly located, clean, spacious and hip apartment. We travel often and are very picky so trust this review. They thought of all the details and amenities and the kitchen was very well equipped (they even thought of paper towels, tin foil, plastic wrap) and all appliances were new. The beds were very comfortable and the bathrooms roomy for Europe. Our hosts were friendly and willing to help in any way to make our trip enjoyable. Two of our children got ill and the host even made an appointment for us with their pediatrician and emailed to check up on how the kids were feeling after. Now, that's service! Our only regret was that we didn't stay longer...

We were warmly welcomed by our host on arrival even though it was quite late at night.  The apartment was well set out, clean, tidy and large enough to accommodate 5 adults. Our host emailed us with suggestions for day trips.  The maps provided about local restaurants and nearby supermarkets were appreciated. This apartment is in a great location in Barcelona, although a little noisy some nights. Barcelona is a wonderful city to visit and we can recommend taking the time to venture further out of the city.

Lluis was a great host and very helpful! He met us as soon as we arrived, and showed us around the apartment, which was exactly as seen in the pictures. During our week's stay he e-mailed me info on local restaurants to visit, as well as was responsive to questions I had about the city. We traveled with our 6 month old, and he helped provide us with a crib on request. All in all, a great place to stay with a great host!

Thank you for having us again Lluis.
As on our previous visit, everything ran smoothly and we very much enjoyed your beautiful apartment, hospitality and flexibility with our late departure.
See you in Barcelona sometime soon.

Nous avons très bien été reçu par Lluis, le quartier est vraiment très sympa. L'appartement est vraiment très bien décrit et très agréable.
Lluis est vraiment très disponible et très gentil.
Nous avons passé un très bon moment.

Lluis is very prompt in providing information and responding to questions.  We were not urged or required to check in at any certain time, he is very patient and understandable.  There are more amenities than other places, We really did not expect the nespresso, made us feel very welcome!

La experencia ha sido fantastica, la casa esta muy bien situada, muy limpia y muy bien amueblada, no le falta ni un detalle. Lluis se ha portado muy bien con nosotras, ha sido muy hospitalario y muy atento.

Lluis and his wife are very nice hosts.The apart is stylish and cosy,very clean.Another advantage is perfect location.Just one thing to know it was a bit noisy at night from the street.But it couldn't change our impression from the stay!Next time we will choose the same apart!

Lluis' lejlighed er meget hyggelig og rar at være i. Lejligheden indeholder alt, hvad man har brug for - og lidt til :-) Beskrivelsen af lejligheden stemmer overens med virkeligheden. Lluis tager godt imod sine gæster og sørger for relevant information om lejligheden og omgivelserne.
Vi kan varmt anbefale andre at bo i lejligheden.

We had a wonderful time in this modern and clean apartment which is perfectly centrally located, nice shops in the neighborhood. The beds were very good. We liked the rain shower and the bath. Everything was very good and we would like to come back one time. Lluis is very helpful.

Wir haben unsere Zeit sehr genossen. Das Appartement ist wie beschrieben und auf den Fotos zu sehen. Lluis war sehr nett. Für unsere kleinen Kinder hatte er kostenlos Babybetten und Hochstühle organisiert. Er hat sogar eine Spielecke mit für das Alter passendem Spielzeug eingerichtet. Es gibt eine Waschmaschine und einen Trockner. Für Familien sehr gut geeignet! Es ist tatsächlich etwas laut. Es gibt nach ein paar Stufen einen kleinen nostalgischen Aufzug. Vielen Dank an Lluis für diese schöne Woche in Barcelona.

We had a great 3 night stay at Lluis's apartment. 
The communication was excellent throughout the process.
Lluis gave us a tour of the apartment. He had a little map showing all the necessary information we needed in the area. 
The apartment was very comfortable clean, welcoming, beautifully decorated, lots of attention details and well appointed. 
Comfortable beds, rain shower and central heating was superb. Nice terrace with nice setting. Well equipped kitchen with welcoming fresh drink in the fridge and some coffee capsules!  
Location was perfect for us. Close to beautiful avenue Place Gracia and all the shops. 
The apartment truly made us feel home and we didn't want to go out! 
We highly recommend the apartment. Wish we stayed longer and hope to stay at your apartment again.
Thanks a lot for making our stay very special.
The apartment was perfect for us.  Everything from the location to the amount space to the ease of checking in and out was great.

We had a great stay in this very elegant flat. Exactly as per pictures and description.
Location was perfect and host always very reactive and helpful.
Will definitely recommend it.

Wonderful appartment very confortable for our family of 5 :it was perfect . We felt like "home" .
Very well located in the heart of Barcelona .
Lluis was very kind with helping us parking our car ....and exactly in time : all was very well organized .Thank you for all , we'll keep your adress and hope we'll come back again !!
Sophie Thierry and family

Our stay at Lluis and Lali's beautiful apartment was perfect.
It is decorated really nicely in a clean modern vibe but with really nice furniture and objects, and the kitchen and bathrooms are brand new and beautifully done. The kitchen has all the plates and things you will need to really cook and there is an open market down the street, organic stores close by and beautiful produce available everywhere. The ceiling and floors were old style turn of the century so the contrast was really nice with the modern. I loved it!.
The apartment is very well situated so all of our favorite restaurants and boutiques were within walking distance.
Lluis was very easy to get in touch with and available for questions and he was accommodating for our departure. We really would love to stay there again. I highly recommend this perfect spot in Barcelona!

Pro: Lluis is so nice and responsive.  He even arranged our cab ride to the airport.  Location can't be beat; the apt is literally in the Block of Discord, the best part of the Passeig de Gracia.  Apt is well equipped with dishes and other home equipments.  Con: In the master bedroom, the street noise can be little much on a saturday night, but I suppose that is part of city living.  Second bathroom had a bit of sewage smell issue but it was mitigated by the air freshener.
The apartment is really well located if you want to explore Barcelona. Rooms are nice but not huge. Perfect for a couple with 2 kids.

Wonderful apartment, fantastic located at the best part of Paseo de Gracia, just 1 min walking to la pedrera and 10 min walking to las ramblas. Its is really elegant, bright and very clean. We liked the contrast between clasic mosaic floors and high ceilins, with modern and styish furniture. The beds were very comfortable and we liked also very much bathrooms with relaxing rain showers. The kitchen was also modern and very nice and it has fully equipped with everything you may need. We also liked nice gallery with nice setting which we enjoyed. Lali is very friendly and was very flexible with our check in &out times, she also let some drinks in the fridge ans cofee capsules.
I highly recommend to stay at this apartment, thank you very much Lali, I will definitly repeat when coming back to Barcelona

I rented Lluis&Lali's apartment  for my parents & my brother who came to BCN to visit us.
They really enjoyed the flat: the location couldn’t be better just one block from Paseo de Gracia and very well connected to the city by bus or metro. 
No trick: The apartment is like the photos. 
A pleasant surprise: The building (There's no photo of it) is a very nice classic block with the facade recently restored. 
The kitchen and bathrooms are very nice and brand new.
My mother found that everything was very clean, and the kitchen very well equipped.
My parents specially enjoyed the nespresso, toaster and tea maker for their breakfast.
Special mention for beds!!
My brother  enjoyed sitting in the gallery in the evening (with a beer and windows opened) .
Smart design: the modernist mosaic floors and high ceiling  are mixed with modern objects.
Lali was really nice and gave a very warm welcome to my family and she explained everything about the flat .
I definitly recommend  this wonderful spot at the heart of the city!!
Thanks very much Lali for your hospitality!!!

I staying in Lluis and Lali's apartment for a week with 2 friends.  It was perfect!  Great location close to good restaurants, cool shops, Metro and easy walk to sights.  The apartment was very comfortable for 3 adults.  I loved the design in the apartment.  Lluis was great host - he met us and showed us around and was available if we had any problems, but we had none.   I highly recommend the apartment to anyone coming to Barcelona.

We had a wonderful time at Luis' apartment. The location is phenomenal - really couldn't have been more central, safe and close to all the amenities and restaurants. The space itself is beautiful and well appointed. We were very comfortable with three adults and an 18 month old. Luis kindly set up the house with a travel cot and toys for our son which was much appreciated. I couldn't recommend this apartment more. We hope to come back!

Lluis was at the apartment to greet us when we first arrived, so we felt welcome right away.  He provided a map of the immediate  neighborhood, so we could find coffee shops, restaurants, grocery, and transportation stops with no problem.
  The apartment was immaculate and just as described.  A beautiful place with a perfect location!  We loved our week in Barcelona.

Fantastic location. Nicely furnished, clean and well equipped. The apartment was just right for our family group of 3 adult couples. Large kitchen/dining/living space was great for eating and conversation. Some building construction going on during the day which wasn't a big deal since we were gone most of the time. Host was readily available.

Great apartment very well located, 20 meters from Passeig de Grácia and 5/10 min walk from Praza de Catalunya.
Apartment has a small terrace with an open view, great light and is very quiet.
Lluis called me as soon as I landed and check-in was very smooth.

My partner and family had a wonderful time at Lluis's apartment - it really is an incredible location - close to the heart of the city and Barcelonas fabulous public transport - the recommendations for local restaurants and markets were spot on - Lluis made us very welcome and responded with any queries en route immediately !!! After a hard day of touristing in the heat returning to the glorious showers was a delight - we could cook in the fabulous kitchen or head out to one of the many restaurants - great fun

Luis was a super accommodating host, the apartment location was fantastic. We visited with our family (2, 4 and 6 years old). They loved it, and the central location made it really easy to visit local sites and attractions. Only minor point is that parking is only available for small or mode size cars, but there is very easy economic local parking for bigger cars. Again a great visit and accommodation and I would definitely recommend it to anyone looking to explore the heart of Barcelona! Thanks Luis for making our trip a memorable and enjoyable one! 5 stars....

Luis's apartment is lovely, and exactly as described.  It's in a great location, and we (4 adults and a 15 month old) were very comfortable there.  Luis was able to provide us with a crib, high chair, and lots of toys for the baby to play with.  The water pressure in the showers is wonderful, and we never had an issue with hot water.  The gallery turns into a balcony with the doors open, so we were able to enjoy our evenings out there with a glass of wine.  Luis was very responsive both before and during our stay, answering any questions we had.

A couple of potential issues:  The interior of the apartment is very quiet, but there is quite a bit of street noise in the two main bedrooms.  Luckily, none of us had an issue with sleeping through it.  (The third bedroom is located along the interior atrium, so traffic noise wasn't an issue in there.)  The elevator is quite small - we had to collapse the stroller to get it in, then only one person and the stroller could ride the elevator, while someone else would have to carry the baby up or down the stairs (or wait for the elevator to come back).  Neither of those things bothered us, though, and we would still recommend this apartment to anyone staying in Barcelona!

(One trick we learned towards the end of our stay - even though the Passage de Gracia Metro station is a bit closer, it's a mess to navigate.  Try walking an extra block to the Diagonal station - so worth it!)

This was possibly our best air BnB accommodation yet. The location was PERFECT! Just off the main road and walking distance to la rumbla. Bus stops and taxi ranks on the corner. Hotel Majestic 20 metres away for awesome rooftop drinks. A unique little bar across the road with a great vibe. The apartment itself is very funky! One of the owners is an architect with extremely good taste so we felt really special hanging out in the apartment. Super clean, all modern facilities, fantastic furnishings and features. And the wifi was really good! (we had experienced some really slow connections in other cities of Europe this trip). 5 of us slept very comfortably. The day before we arrived we were told they had just installed double glazed Windows in the bedrooms as some previous guests mentioned they could hear street noise. This has obviously worked perfectly, as we could not hear a thing at night. Lluis left us a detailed laminated map with all the recommended places for supermarkets, breakfast locations bars etc which really helped us find our way around. 35€ in a taxi from the airport which wasn't too bad either, with Lluis waiting out the front to greet us upon arrival. I would highly recommend this place to anyone who has never been to Barcelona before as it made our stay so memorable.

Its a simple and efficient experience. The apartment is really central, with a lot of amenities nearby. The three rooms are spacious, with a great living and kitchen area. I would actually stay at that place again if I were to return to Barcelona.
THE BEST location. Huge clean well appointed aptartment. The guide sheet with map included is Michelin/Rick Steeves level of recommendations. Super guay!

Luis was a very communicative host and very helpful.  He was very patient with us even though we had problems at the airport and was delayed.  He was even thoughtful enough to leave some toys to entertain our two young children!  The apartment was exactly as described.  It was a huge apartment (will easily fit 6), very well appointed and very comfortable.  The location was awesome as well and very safe.  We were able to walk to all the main sites even though we had 2 young children.  Definitely very happy with our choice and had a great time.
Emplacement parfait, appartement de très bon gout et très propre, accueil parfait : rien à redire, à hauteur de nos espérances. Merci à Lluis et Lali

Lali was very welcoming and helpful and the apartment was just like the photos. Spacious, comfortable, well equipped and quiet - especially given its proximity to the central location. I would definitely recommend this apartment and go back again. Lali helpfully let us have an early check-in upon arrival and I had access to the apartment where I could leave my bag on the day of departure as my return flight was no until the evening. An excellent find!

Super séjour!
Rien a redire, l'appartement est exactement comme décrit, il est très spacieux, bien aménagé et fonctionnel et surtout très agréable.
Quant à lluis, c'est un hôte idéal, j'avais de nombreuses questions il a su répondre à toutes...
Vivement recommandé !

This apartment is EXCELLENT! Best location, bright and airy, stylishly furnished to a very high standard, with kind and friendly hosts, what more can one ask for?

Some background: I have stayed in perhaps a dozen Airbnb apartments before: 1 in New York, the rest all in Europe. This is possibly the best apartment of all the ones I stayed in. In doing research I see many guests say their apartments are well located -- well that's because they havent stayed at THIS apartment! Not only is it close to 2 metro stations and several bus lines, it is just half a block away from Passeig de Gracia and within 4 minutes walk of 3 modernist buildings (2 of which are Gaudi landmarks), and close to a throng of good restaurants.  I didnt even take the metro on most days and just walked instead. Extremely safe neighbourhood and apartment. 

The apartment boasts high ceilings and original signature tiles and *beautiful* ceiling relief details (from like 90 years ago but all well maintained and kept very well and EXTREMELY CLEAN). Makes you feel like living in a historic building, renovted with latest modern comforts. Kitchen all fitted with BOSCH appliances. Master en-suite bathroom is 5-star hotel standard and large, with good water pressure and plentiful hot water. Entire apartment tastefully furnished and decorated (Luis works in construction and his wife is an architect, it is obvious they both brought their professional expertise in refurbishing this apartment). I stayed during December so the enclosed terrace was fantastic as it allows full benefit from the light but one can still enjoy the lofty space without being cold as it is enclosed by glass. In the summer the floor-to-ceiling windows can be opened to fully enjoy the weather.  

Well equipped, heating works well. Cleaned by a professional cleaning company and is Very Clean (explains the high cleaning fee!). This apartment can truly host 6 people and not feel crammed and still leave adequate social space (some apartments claim they can hold 6 people but actually cannot comfortably host more than 4!). 

Some older reviews talked about noise issue. About 3 months ago Luis put in triple glazing (yes, the third layer, hence TRIPLE glazing) so the bedrooms are totally quiet now. From talking to other travellers in Barcelona I understand many well located apartments suffer from noise issues (quite inevitably), but this apartment doesn't! 

The building has a lift but there are 9 steps before you get to the elevator. Not a problem unless someone in your party has mobility issues. 

I would definitely want to stay here again should I return to BCN. Highly recommend!

We had a fantastic stay in Barcelona, our first trip to this magnificent city! The apartment was just as pictured and the location was amazing! We were there the week before Christmas and it was a lovely, relaxing trip, made so much better by Lluis and Lali's thoughtful restaurant recommendations and overall responsiveness. We tried numerous eateries suggested by them and we're thrilled every time. There are great places right around the corner, a fabulous flower market down the road, and excellent supermarkets a couple blocks away. We can't wait to go back!! Thank you Lluis and Lali!

Lali was a great host and the apartment was great! Communication was always there if we needed anything. The location was perfect and walking distance to everything we wanted to do. They even put two single beds together since we were 2 couples and initially only one bedroom came with a queen bed. I would recommend this place to anybody staying in Barcelona!
It was nice place

We could not have been happier with the apartment and our entire experience. It was our first time renting an Airbnb so were a little nervous but Llui's put us at ease from the start. We were a diverse group, divorced parents traveling with our 17 year old daughter to visit our son who is studying in Barcelona this semester. As you can imagine the 3 bedrooms and living space was key. The apartment is exactly as pictured and the location everything Llui's said it was. Llui's could not be there when we arrived but he arranged for the very nice and helpful Jose to fill in. He was great and guided us from the airport and showed us around and made us feel very welcome. He was a great source of restaurant info and we used his top two recommdations and they were great. Our whole visit was beyond what I imagined and the apartment was such a key. I can not recommend it high enough

The flat was exactly as described and very clean and spacious. The building has a lot of character which was what we were looking for. We felt as if we lived in Barcelone. the area is great and very central.
A little noisy saturady night.
After a long day visiting the city we were happy to come back to the flat in the evenning to cool out.
Great apartment! Highly recommend!
Great location near major attractions in eixample. Easy to walk everywhere. Helpful recommendations for restaurants and local guidebooks. Apt nice but common areas a little dated.
El apartamento es muy agradable, tal y como se ve en las fotos, todo estaba muy limpio Lluis ha sido muy amable y atento desde el principio. La localización es inmejorable. Totalmente recomendable.

Lluis was easy to contact and met us at the apartment after we took a taxi from the airport. He explained the details of the apartment(washer/dryer/TV remotes/thermostat/stove etc). The apartment was nice and clean with plenty of space for our family of four. The neighborhood was upscale, quiet at night (usual city noises) and has plenty of places to eat within walking distance (try Emmas a block away for dinner and the epicerie across the street for breakfast) . The apartment is very conveniently located and nearby to most of the major sites or tour buses that will take you there. Thanks for a wonderful time.

Lluis was very friendly and flexible with regard to our arrival and departure. The apartment is very well located and modern with nice light in the living room/kitchen areas. There is a lovely sun room as well.

This is an absolutely perfect apartment. The high ceilings and tile floors and tasteful furniture made it feel like we were really living in authentic Barcelona.  Lluis and Lali were great hosts, and it made it effortless to get the keys.  Great neighborhood. We walked everywhere. Will definitely rent this place again the next time we're in Barcelona.

We kept in touch with Lali from the booking of the appartement to our leaving through pleasant messages very useful to organise our trip. We loved the apartement which mixes character (very nice high molding ceiling and floor tiles...) and trendy decoration. It is in the center of the elegant modernist historic area, very close (5 min) to main Gaudi buildings (Pedrera, Casa Batllo...) and near to a central station (train to the airport and underground). It is also quiet, perfectly clean and well-equipped.
We really enjoyed our stay in Barcelona. The apartment was just perfect, in the best location in town. It is clean and well equipped. We recommend it for a family up to 6.

Luís apartment is very well located, close to passeig de gracia. It is near metros, coffe shops and bakeries. It is also well equipped, clean and new inside. Luis is also very attentive host. Always available when we need. 
I have just a few comments on the stay. The pillows could be better or have more options. For us, it was a little hard. 
The other observation is regarding the shower. We were in 4 adults and 2 children. About the third bath, water becomes warm, almost cold.
Besides it, we loved to stay there.

Lluis-Lali were great. They responded promptly to emails and were flexible with check in and check out times which helped my family immensely. When my mother required medical attention, Lluis was very helpful by directing us to options of care. Very much appreciated. 
The apartment was amazing. Beautifully appointed comfortable, clean and so central to everything. It was an excellent haven to return to at the end of a busy day. It was perfect for our family group of 6. 
I would highly recommend Lluis-Lali's apartment to stay.
Excellent location. Wonderful apartment. Host was very easy to deal with.

Great location & apartment. The pictures were the same in reality as those posted online. Decent sized bedrooms and 2 good modern bathrooms. Apartment's location was close to many restaurants and the main road through the city centre which includes many of the international and Spanish designer brands. Unfortunately we didn't meet the owners during our week's stay. But they did provide easy collection of the keys and gave us loads of information about the area via a printed letter.

We had an excellent time at this apartment. The location was wonderful and within walking distance of everything we needed. As for the apartment, it was clean, spacious, and had many excellent amenities that we used daily such as the hairdryer and espresso machine. Luis welcomed us to the apartment and even let us drop off our luggage before check in time so we would not have to store it elsewhere until the afternoon. We would highly recommend this property to anyone looking for a place to stay in Barcelona.

Luis made us feel at home from the start.  The apartment was spacious, comfortable, & very clean.  It is walking distance to attractions, shopping, restaurants, & cafes.  I definitely recommend their apt & would love to stay here in the future.  A++++

Evde çocuklu bir ailenin ihtiyaç duyabileceği her türlü araç gereç mevcuttu. Hatta oyuncağa kadar düşünülmüştü.
Mutfak son teknolojiye sahip ev aletleriyle donatılmıştı. 
Evin konumu mükemmeldi ve şehrin görülmesi gereken tarihi ve turistik her yerine, tüm noktalarına yürüyerek ulaşılabilecek konumdaydı. Ayrıca evin bulunduğu semt oldukça nezih, sessiz, kaliteli restorant ve cafelerin olduğu bir yerdi.
Web sitesindeki evle ilgili açıklamalar birebir uyumluydu. Ayrıca ev sahibi tarafından seyahatimizi kolaylaştırıp, güzelleştirecek ipuçlarının bulunduğu açıklama notlarının verilmesi çok işimize yaradı.Ev sahibine her an ulaşma imkanımız oldu.Ayrıca Evin bulunduğu apartman binası da tarihi dokusunu koruyan bir binaydı.Bu evi her yönden Barcelona şehrini ziyaret etmek isteyen tüm arkadaşlarımıza tavsiye edeceğiz.
Fantastic location!! Beautiful flat. Beautiful buying and lobby, the lift is just wonderful... You'll see why it's special if you stay here.

Great apartment and location.  Lluis met us in front of the apartment and helped us unload the car.  We had a larger car (minivan) that could not fit in the apartment garage so we parked in a nearby garage.  Lluis came to the garage with me to purchase a multi-day pass at a reduced parking fee.
房東很主動協助行程,放於屋內的資訊亦很多,包括周圍地圖,景點｡
Great experience, fantastic location & wonderful interiors!

Whenever we go away, the apartments we book online never live up to expectations, but this is a truly lovely apartment with everything you need for a comfortable stay away. Fantastic location and really helpful owners. We loved our stay here!

Fantastic stay in this elegant apartment, with its lovely combination of modernism and old-world charm. Location was ideal for us, and logistics made so much simpler by our hosts' careful instructions and thoughtful recommendations. Central A/C was a great gift after day of urban sightseeing in the August sun. Appreciated the well-equipped kitchen complete with Nespresso machine.  We would definitely stay there again!

Great location near to Gaudi sites, main shopping strip and a short walk (20min) to the gothic quarters. Clean, well designed and spacious. Loved the original tiles and elaborate ceilings. There is a very cool old lift, but very small (ie 2-3 people or 3 suitcases only).

I would highly recommend Lluis's place - you simply cannot beat the location.  You are one-half block off Passeig de Gracia right between Casa Batllo and Casa Mila (the two must see local Gaudi designs).  Even with this proximity, it is relatively quiet due to double windows.  The apartment is very well appointed with lots of space, high ceilings, and casual elegance.  Very comfortable and would highly recommend staying here.
Great place. Great location. Very helpful and accommodating host. Everything is exactly as depicted. Would definitely rent from again.

From the very beginning of the booking Lluis made me feel very comfortable from the other side of the world in Australia , your biggest fear is no communication being far away , however Lluis was brilliant in every way . He even helped with our sight seeing options.
The apartment is perfectly located and fantastic for a family of 5 - very quiet whilst very clue to all the action ! 
I would highly recommend it to any one .

Our host, Lluis greeted us right away when we arrived from from the airport.  He provided lots of good information about local restaurants and sights.  

The apartment was very spacious and exactly as described in the listing.  It is located in a very lively area with easy access to endless restaurants and access to the top Gaudi sights.  The apartment is located near a large transportation hub, providing access to the entire city in minutes.
Fantastic apartment, exactly as described, great space and location. If available will use on our next visit to Barcelona.
Great apartment exactly as depicted, fantastic location , very comfortable and would highly recommend staying here.
Lluis was available immediately when ever I needed him. Great apartment and good location.

Communicating with Lluís and Lali was easy.  Lluís met us during check-in and show us the use and features of the apartment.

The apartment was comfortable for 4 adults. It had a well equipped kitchen, we only used it for breakfast, spacious and clean bathrooms and a nice terrace of the living space.

In terms of location it cannot be beat, just around the corner from The Majestic Hotel, between both Casa Milà and Casa Batlló and a couple of blocks from one of my favorite tapas bar (Tapas 24) in the city and two blocks south of Praktik, one of my favorite bakeries.

Lluís was diligent and helpful in terms of coordinating transportation back to the airport and giving us suggestions around the neighbourhood.

I'd recommend this apartment to future guests.
Very helpful host. Great location.

Lluis was great to meet us at the apartment. He explained things to us well. Great location with lots of restaurants around. The streets were a little loud, but nothing out of the ordinary for an urban setting.

Lluis met us at the apartment when we arrived and gave us all the necessary information about the flat and neighborhood. The flat is decorated with a great taste, so comfortable  . We had our breakfasts at home and kitchen was very well equipped, we had everything we needed.
The location is perfect, walking distance to restaurants, shops and major attractions. Metro station is 3 min from the apartment. It was perfect for our family of three.

The two families had a great stay at this nice apartment. The location is superb! Two minutes to the subway, 50 meters to the Gracia street, four minutes to Casa building, we even walked back from Nou Camp stadium after the  game. The room is clean and has a well equipped kitchen, we did breakfast every morning, and late night snack for the kids after a long touring day. The two families sitting together to have a meal in a foreign apartment was really nice experience.

And there are three bedrooms and there is a window in each and every room, we all had good sleep in the 6 days of our stay. 

I will definitely recommend this apartment to all. The host is very responsive and considerate, very easy to communicate. 

The rest is for my Chinese folks. :) 这个公寓很赞!在巴萨最繁华的地段,从机场转一趟地铁就可以到,大约40分钟,下地铁走几百米就到了｡走一条街就有一家中餐馆,味道还是可以的,我们连吃了两晚｡从这里去米拉之家和巴特罗公寓只要5分钟,走到圣家堂和毕加索博物馆只要25分钟,走到波盖利亚集市可以坐地铁,两站路,走路也只要25分钟｡看完巴萨的球赛,我们走回来花了50分钟,边走边逛也不累,打车过去也只要10欧不到吧｡出门到格拉西亚大街的Armani店门口就可以坐outlets的大巴车,很方便｡

公寓有三间房,一件大床代独立的卫生间,两间小房间,有两张单人床,如果是两个家庭,有点小尴尬,因为有一家两口子要分开睡单人床｡:)厨房里啥都有,佐料和油都提供,电磁炉其实还是比较好用的,习惯就好｡我带了方便面,早餐都是鸡蛋,面包,方便面｡

祝你们入住愉快｡

Nice apartment very close to Paseig the Gracia, the heart of "chic" Barcelona. Spacious, clean & well equipped. Photos are very representative of the reality of the apartment. All went perfectly well. Would stay there again with pleasure.
You can't beat the location!
Fabulous place in a wonderful location. Perfect for a family.
Beautiful apartment in a very good location. We stayed there with three kids ages 11, 15 and 17 and it was just perfect. Wish we could have stayed longer!
Loved the location as very central. Very clean and a great size - we were a family of 5 and had lots of room. Check-in was good and they were very easy to deal with. Would stay here again for sure!!

My husband and I loved this place. It was v centrally located, had great amenities, a nice bathtub and close to restaurants and shops. The bed was comfortable and Internet speedy enough. We would definitely recommend this place.
Everything was perfect, location was perfect and the apartment was beautiful. Would definitely recommend.

Appartement très bien situé et confortablement  aménagé. très agréable en famille. 
Nous avons  passé un excellent séjour.

This is a very nice apartment in an excellent location and is exactly as described.  It was a nice mix of modern and traditional elements.  The elevator is small but useful.  Shopping is convenient and we cooked several meals ourselves   The host/owner communicated with us throughout the process and met us for check-in to explain everything.  I would highly recommend this place for a family traveling with children.
Perfect location. Excellent communication and a great stay.
The host canceled this reservation 231 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Luis & Lali's apartment was lovely. The character of the space made us feel like we were living part of Barcelona's incredible history. The location was wonderful and very convenient. We'd highly recommend!
Lluis' house is very nice, great location. All modern amenities. Anyone would do great renting his place.
Great location!

Logement bien placé, bien décoré et propre mais sans vie. Il s'agit d'un appartement qui ressemble à une chambre d'hôtel. Avec ma famille, nous privilégions des logements différents, habités le reste de l'année par les propriétaires. Nous ne sommes restés qu'une nuit et n'en garderons pas un souvenir inoubliable.
This home is good for family with kis.

This is a very nice unit and despite being on or near two main roads is very quiet. When we were there, there was some construction noise that stated relatively late so not an issue and host had told us about it in advance and offered a change to a different location which we declined and were glad we did.  The location is perfect and the unit is quite large.  There is everything supplied that you might need for a few days stay.  The host is very responsive to questions and the people that help with check in are very flexible.  I would recommend this unit highly and would stay again when in Barcelona.

We really enjoyed staying at this flat for our Barcelona vacation. It was large enough for our group and well laid out. The bathrooms were nice and I was glad to have the soaking tub in the master bedroom after days of 15+ miles of walking (soaking the feet were the only thing that helped!). We barely used the kitchen as we ate out at all of the fantastic restaurants so close by, but we appreciated that it was stocked. Having a washer and dryer in the unit was amazing. We hadn't planned on washing anything but after an accidental spill of coffee down my jacket while walking one day, it was nice to have.

The beds and pillows were comfy -- which is incredibly nice when you are traveling and exhausted each day. 

Location can't be beat -- walk out your front door and you are at Passeig de Gracias and 2 blocks from Casa Batllo. You can also walk a mile to the Gothic District which was pretty quick.

Area is super safe and felt fine walking home very late at night.

Highly recommend.

PS. We had a snafu with the key to the apartment and the battery died for the door. Called Lluis and he promptly came to the apartment around 8pm. Had to get a locksmith out and everything. We were tired and exhausted but we went downstairs and got a few beers and within an hour and a half, it was fixed. Lluis picked up our tab and got us into the apartment so we could shower and go to bed. I was pleased with how he handled it and was very nice and helpful. Highly recommend him as a host.
El apartamento es moderno, cómodo, limpio y súper bien ubicado. La comunicación con sus dueños muy bien también. Lo recomendamos.

Logement parfait pour notre petite famille et idéalement situé dans Barcelone pour se retrouver très rapidement et simplement n’importe où.
Mis à part le problème de literie que nous avons eu, le très sympathique propriétaire nous a assuré qu’il réglerai la chose à notre départ...pour les futurs locataires.

Great place for a family of four (or five). Perfect location, tastefully decorated and quiet. The property description is faithful and so are the previous positive reviews. Clear and quick communication with the owners. Would not hesitate to return.
市中心的位置,闹中取静,安全的公寓｡就在米拉之家和巴特拉之家边上,名品一条街背后｡公寓非常干净,配置一应俱全,住的很舒服｡租车的边上saba停车非常方便,可以跟管理人员购买几日停车卡｡房东很热情,很好沟通,有很多建设性意见,帮到我很多｡
The apartment is great. The location is superb - very central but quiet. The amenities are also very good - we didn't lack anything. The host was very responsive to our requests and ready to help.
Great place in a great location.
Great location,close to eateries,sight seeing,taxis,public transportation.Very responsive host.

Luis-Lali had a wonderful apartment that was clean and modern. We had everything we needed for our family of 4. We appreciated the location of the apartment as it was local to everything, but still very quite.

Lali was super responsive and pleasant to work with and check  in was easy. 

We’d highly recommend any of Luis-Lali’s apartments.

We couldn’t have stayed in a better place! The apartment had the old world charm with high ceilings , large windows and fabulous Spanish tiles , but still had the amenities of a very modern apartment . Located in the prime area of Barcelona but still it was so quiet . The metro is a 3 minutes walk , but it was just easy to hail a cab as everything is really very close by . It was convenient to have a grocery shop just round the corner . 
The check in process was very quick and simple . Easy to communicate and he was waiting for us with the keys .  Luis and Lali have really thought of everything . It was almost like staying in an hotel . They had even put a cold water bottle for us in the fridge . Every time we come to Barcelona we would like to stay here

This a beautiful apartment in an upscale neighborhood. The apartment is upstairs from a tapas restaurant, and within feet of several highly rated restaurants and cafes. It is within walking distance to several attractions and the owners are friendly and very quick to reply enjoying your stay is comfortable. The washer and dryer is an added bonus. Perfect!
We have has a really nice stay in this lovely apartment. Everything was fine, and the locations was perfect.
Beautiful apartment in a great location, it’s a perfect apartment for a stay in the city with lots of space and everything you could need.  We had a wonderful stay!

This is a large apartment in the best location.  You are right next to the 5th Avenue or Champs Elysees of Barcelona. Excellent access to everything on foot or by metro.  The apartment is a great value!

This apartment is beautiful, well appointed, and in a perfect central location.  It is close to everything but on a quiet street.  You can walk everywhere, but there is also a taxi stand and a metro stop just a few steps from the apartment. We loved sitting in the sunroom and having our coffee in the morning or a cava in the evening. The tile floors and plaster ceilings were spectacular.  Rooms were very comfortable.  This was our first time using an airbnb.  Louis and Lali were gracious hosts in both the planning and during our vacation.  Thank you so much!
Location, location, location! Can’t make Barcelona any more accessible than this central location. Clean and comfortable home away from home. Highly recommended!

Check in and check out were easy. The hosts also communicate well and respond quickly. Check in is through a third party. 

The apartment is located in an excellent spot just a minutes walk away from Passeig de Gràcia where you can find plenty of high street and also designer shops. Plaça Catalunya is about a brisk 10-15 minute walk away - this is the meeting and drop off point for most group tours. 

There are lots of food options around as well as several convenience stores. 

Overall, the place was comfortable although it is definitely shows some wear in real life compared to the photos. The master bedroom was comfortable but the other 2 bedrooms would be a little tight if two people with large luggages each stayed in either. 

The kitchen had sufficient equipment for making simple meals. The coffee machine with some capsules provided was a nice touch.

We were given a warm greeting on our arrival at the very beautiful and spacious apartment that had all the requirements for our stay in the great city of Barcelona. The proximity to the very heart of Barcelona made everything so accessible and easy for us and we would not hesitate to take up another booking at Lluis and Lali’s place. Absolutely no complaints and just wish we could have made use of the excellent kitchen facilities but we were on a “Boy’s weekend” and took advantage of some excellent nearby restaurants in particular The Boca Grande which shouldn’t be missed.
Loved the apartment and the location was extremely central to shops, restaurants and transportation.  I would definitely stay here again!

The apartment of Lali and Lluis, is a pretty flat, well equiped and well designed in the city center of Barcelona!

We went it for few days, 6 people and everyone enjoyed it !

We recommend !

We very much enjoyed our stay at Lluìs & Lali’s apartment. It was sparkly clean, very stylish and in an excellent central location. Highly recommend & we look forward to returning. It was a fabulous few days!
This space is GORGEOUS and huge. It's a beautiful home in a perfect walking location to everywhere cool in Barcelona - can't recommend it enough.

It was our pleasure to stay in this listing in Barcelona during our family trip. We recently stayed in this place for 6 days and, in short, we enjoyed this listing a lot. Location, facilities, communication and host's hospitality were all good for us. I strongly recommend this place to all airbnb guests!!

name: Clean, Gay Friendly Room,in Harbiye
summary: clean. single room. 10 minutes walking to Taksim. high ceilings. rum architecture.
space: Walking distance to taksim. room for rent. I m a clean and organized host. I have a cat . I have a very busy and demanding work schedule. and my house is very close to Taksim Square, on the main street. Also the location is very centered you can travel every part of the city easily such as the golden horn, istiklal street, Cevahir shopping mall, etc.

name: Bondi Apartment with Stunning Views
summary: Stay at our beautiful two bedroom apartment, which has superb views over the Eastern Suburbs of Sydney. Perfectly located in a quiet dead-end street, in front of Waverley Park & near Bondi shops and beaches. Best location!
space: Our two bedroom apartment has superb views over the Eastern Suburbs of Sydney. Perfectly located in a quiet dead-end street, in front of Waverley Park and near Bondi shops and beaches. Best location for short commute to city via easy bus or train. Bright sunny top floor apartment with panoramic views in a great location! The apartment is fully furnished with everything you need to complete your holidays in Sydney! Every room has amazing uninterrupted panoramic views!! Equipped for short or longer stays, perfect for two couples or a family.  This two bedroom apartment is on the top floor of a quiet secure building with every room having amazing uninterrupted panoramic ocean and harbour views, large balcony, decent sized family and dining area, and newly renovated separate kitchen (with everything including dishwasher) and new modern bathroom with shower and bath, along with separate laundry with washing machine and dryer.
description: Stay at our beautiful two bedroom apartment, which has superb views over the Eastern Suburbs of Sydney. Perfectly located in a quiet dead-end street, in front of Waverley Park & near Bondi shops and beaches. Best location! Our two bedroom apartment has superb views over the Eastern Suburbs of Sydney. Perfectly located in a quiet dead-end street, in front of Waverley Park and near Bondi shops and beaches. Best location for short commute to city via easy bus or train. Bright sunny top floor apartment with panoramic views in a great location! The apartment is fully furnished with everything you need to complete your holidays in Sydney! Every room has amazing uninterrupted panoramic views!! Equipped for short or longer stays, perfect for two couples or a family.  This two bedroom apartment is on the top floor of a quiet secure building with every room having amazing uninterrupted panoramic ocean and harbour views, large balcony, decent sized family and dining area, and newly renovated sepa
neighborhood_overview: Happy to give you the ins and outs of Sydney from a local perspective.
transit: Great location! Less than 1 minute walk to Bondi Road, where there is a bus stop for the 333 and 380 - which go directly to the City centre and Circular Quay (where the famous Opera House & Harbour Bridge are located), these buses also go directly to Bondi Beach & Watson Bay on the other direction. Only 5 mins walk to Bondi Junction Interchange where there is an array of cafes and restaurants, and the famous Westfield Bondi Junction Shopping Centre. Right in front of Waverley Park, and a 15 minute stroll to Bondi and Tamarama Beaches; as well as the beautiful Centennial Park. Free off-street parking is also available though may not be needed with great accessibility to public transport!
access: Guests will have access to the whole apartment and building facilities.
house_rules: You will be staying in our home so please treat it how you would like your home to be treated! We only ask that you keep the place tidy and you are welcome to cook and use everything in the place freely just clean up after yourself. The house is carpeted with light coloured carpet so you must take your shoes off before entering the apartment. Smoking is not permitted in the apartment or on the balcony.

host.host_about:
Hi there!

We are an easy going couple from Spain and Australia and love living in the Eastern Beachside Suburbs of Sydney!

We are fun-loving, sociable, and active people who love enjoying what Sydney has to offer! Spending time at the beach, enjoying walks and runs along the coast, while trying out amateur photography. We also love cooking and trying new recipes, mostly on our friends!

Travel is an absolute passion so we understand the need to have a great place to stay with the inside information!

Feel free to get in touch with any questions about Sydney or our apartment.

reviews.comments:
We stayed at Eduardo and Yvonne's apartment for a week. For us it was perfect, my partner and I had our two teenage daughters with us for a "shopping" trip so each day we were heading off and out all over Sydney. The convenience of the flat was brilliant, we could just jump on the bus at the end of the road and head straight to town on the 333. Because we were blessed  with a week of blue sky and sunshine ( in July !!! ) most mornings we would just walk to bondi junction and grab breakfast / coffees then head for the trains. We felt really at home and relaxed each night taking in the views. The kitchen has everything you could ask for to whip up an evening meal which we did most nights. Both runners my partner and I ran most mornings around the park ( directly opposite ) then down to the beach tracks and back up bondi road to the flat, great work out and really fun running around the bays.  Would love to stay again if we get the chance and would recommend to all. Lovely couple and a great home. 
Cheers Craig and Claire

This place is in an amazing spot! The top floor, corner spot of a nice Bondi Junction building opposite Waverley Park. From the pictured balcony you get views from Coogee to Vaucluse and from the bedrooms you can see 180 all the way to the city. 
Location wise, you can't do better with a trip to Sydney. You're only a couple of minutes walk to the train station while not being far from a bunch of beaches including Bondi. 

The place itself is nice, the lounge is big with really comfy couches and good TV set up. Decorations are all really cool giving it a good vibe. The kitchen has more frypans, pots and utensils than a Masterchef final and the hosts offered that we could use their spices etc. They even left chocolate biscuits and a bottle of wine! 

Bedrooms are spacious and heaps of linen and towels provided. All in all, a great spot for a visit to Sydney!

Ollie

We stayed for two weeks at Eduardo and Yvonne's great apartment.   They were very communicative and helpful, and set the place up to be very welcoming to our family. The apartment is very clean with beautiful views of the ocean and Sydney. The location is great! It is directly across the street from Waverley Park, which quickly became our kids favorite hang out spot. It was great for my husband and I too, because we were able to get coffee and great quality breakfast at the kiosk there. We were also walking distance to the shopping center, grocery shopping, and restaurants. It is also in the delivery zone of some really great restaurants. Bondi Beach is close and was a total hit with the kids. Having laundry in the unit was very helpful for us for our long stay. In addition to television options, there were also many movies including movies for our kids to watch, which was helpful.

The location is great, and doesn't require the use of a car to get around. If bringing a car, it is helpful to know that the parking on the premises is labeled as visitor parking with a four hour time limit during the day. It seems like it isn't really enforced and we had no trouble parking there for longer. There is also street parking on the block, which can be crowded during some hours of the day, but parking generally is pretty easy to find either on site or close to it. 

When we first arrived, the elevator was broken and we had to take the stairs up the apartment. Eduardo and Yvonne were very communicative regarding this issue, which ended up being resolved very quickly and was not an issue at all for rest of our stay. It seems that Eduardo and Yvonne are very responsive to guest issues as they arise.

Overall, our stay in Sydney was a great experience, and I think that Eduardo and Yvonne's apartment was a great base from which to explore the city.
The reservation was canceled 34 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Myself, wife and daughter spent three great weeks in Sydney staying at the apartment of Eduardo and Yvonne.They were both prompt and easy to deal with when it came to organising our trip and answering any queries which arose. Both greeted us on arrival at the apartment and could not have made us feel more welcome.
The apartment itself is top floor, modern, nicely decorated, clean and well maintained. Two large bedrooms, a well equipped kitchen and bathroom with both bath and walk-in shower. A fabulous lounge/ dining area with large comfortable couches for just relaxing and taking in the wonderful panoramic views. Getting up in the morning and walking into the lounge is a great start to any day, looking over Waverley Park to the ocean, fantastic. 
If you plan on seeing Sydney and the surrounding area you could not pick a better location. A short walk to Bondi Junction station where trains and buses will take you wherever you want to go. Both Bondi beach and Tamarama beach ( a bit quieter) are only 10-15 mins walk away. Plenty of shops, cafes and restaurants within the immediate vicinity with the easy option of going further afield from the Junction. 
All in all we had an amazing three weeks and there is no doubt the apartment for both its interior and location helped make that possible. 
I would highly recommend this apartment to anyone looking for great accommodation in a fantastic location.

Erinomainen sijainti. 
Hyvät kulkuyhteydet Sidneyn keskustaan bussilla ja junalla sekä Bond Beachin bussilla ( kävellen 12 min). Asunnosta on hyvät näkymät Bondille ja Sydneyn keskustaan.
Asunnon varustelu on erinomainen. Asunnon kunto on hyvä ja asunto on siisti.  Edu ja Yvonne ovat erinomaisia isäntiä. SUOSITTELEN

Eduardo gave us a very warm welcome when we arrived and helped to carry our many luggages up to the apartment even though we insisted he didn't have to trouble himself. He also provided us with extra blankets since it was winter. The apartment was very cosy and nicely decorated. Both rooms came with stunning views. The beds were so comfortable we almost couldn't bear to leave the beds in the morning. :p In terms of location, it was quiet and we could hardly hear any traffic. Overall, it was a very wonderful stay for my group of four and we are really grateful for Ed's hospitality!

The place was very cosy and clean. The view from the balcony was awesome. It was a bit noisy at night as there were people driving with very loud engine nearby. Overall, my baby and I had great time in the apartment. Thank you Eduardo & Yvonne!

Great flat in a perfect spot. Close to Bondi Junction for travel, easy access to busses that take you either to Bondi beach ( if you don't want to walk down the hill) or into the city on either the 333 or 380. 

Flat is exactly as described and the hosts were in constant contact leading up to the arrival to make sure we had everything sorted. 

Great place would easily stay there again. 

Mark

Enjoyed our stay at Yvonne and Edu's apartment. Excellent position within easy walking distance of Bondi junction and the train. The apartment was very clean and airy and we enjoyed the views. We found the bedroom a little noisy especially when the window was open. Great to have visitor parking in the basement and very convenient to drive into the CBD or to the beaches. Eduardo and Yvonne were easy to deal with and Edu met us on arrival and helped us up with our bags.

Our stay at Eduardo & Yvonne's apartment was brilliant, the size, location and ammenities in the apartment were great for our stay. They provided great tips and helpful advice about what to eat/do in the area. Really nice top floor apartment with great views and good sized bedrooms.

The apartment is located near Bondi beach, bus services into the city and as stated has good views. Fans were provided to accommodate for no air conditioning. Generally okay and provided a base and adequate. We did find a number of shortcomings which, from a basic starting point left us disappointed. A bottle of wine and some biscuits were there to welcome us.

The place listed a single bed that converted into a king size bed. It doesn't and is more of a child bed. Not great for our adult son who stayed with us. Rather a long list of do & don'ts (don't wear shoes, don't open certain windows, do put on humidifier, do open doors,  caution with worktops etc) suggested a higher standard of apartment than  it turned out to be. The cooker and facilities were not brilliant and no seating on the balcony as shown in the photos).

While not bad it is basic and we were very put off cooking when we found rotting food in the microwave. No TV unless you have iphone. Can be noisy if windows left open. We paid a high price, accepting it was over New Year, it was not the standard we thought we had booked.

name: Appartment 5 minutes walk from the beach
summary: The apartment is composed by one bedroom, one bathroom, a living room with an open kitchen and a nice terrace. It is located 5 min walk to the famous Bondi Beach and footsteps from the door to great cafes, restaurants, bars and shops.
space: Come and stay in our bright and airy apartment! Fully furnished and equipped you wont need anything except yourself! Our 1 bedroom apartment is a 5 min walk to the famous Bondi Beach and footsteps from the door to great cafes, restaurants, bars and shops.  The apartment is set well back from the street to the rear of an upgraded security block. *1 bedroom with queen sized bed *1 bright living room with one large L-shape sofa *Recent bathroom with shower and bath *Recent open kitchen with oven, dishwasher, blender and all you need *Unlimited wifi with Telstra *All day free parking on Blair Street and small streets around
description: The apartment is composed by one bedroom, one bathroom, a living room with an open kitchen and a nice terrace. It is located 5 min walk to the famous Bondi Beach and footsteps from the door to great cafes, restaurants, bars and shops. Come and stay in our bright and airy apartment! Fully furnished and equipped you wont need anything except yourself! Our 1 bedroom apartment is a 5 min walk to the famous Bondi Beach and footsteps from the door to great cafes, restaurants, bars and shops.  The apartment is set well back from the street to the rear of an upgraded security block. *1 bedroom with queen sized bed *1 bright living room with one large L-shape sofa *Recent bathroom with shower and bath *Recent open kitchen with oven, dishwasher, blender and all you need *Unlimited wifi with Telstra *All day free parking on Blair Street and small streets around We will not be in the property for your stay, it is all yours. Please contact me to arrange receiving the keys - you will have your own s
neighborhood_overview: Plenty of good restaurants and bars around the corner ! •Our favorite restaurants…  -Brown Sugar – Very busy for breakfast and lunch – no reservation but worth it / Very recommended for diner – reservation necessary  -Rice pot or Bangkok bites (Thai restaurant) – Hall Street, BYO wine -Macellaria -Tony Burger (Burgers) – Corner Glenair & Roscoe street – Best burgers of Bondi  -The Vue (tapas) – Campbell parade – great view on the beach -The Iceberg (to take a drink or to eat casual food)– Campbell parade – one of the best view of Bondi ! •Our favorite pubs… -Bucket list – just in front of the beach -Beach Road Hotel – beautiful terrace and sport bar  -Bondi Hardware – on Hall street, nice atmosphere, good wines and delicious food •Shopping center next to the flat: -Woolworth – Campbell parade – open from 6am to midnight -Harris Farm – Hall street – open form 8am to 10pm -In Bondi Junction – Woolworth / Coles / Aldi
notes: This is our home, so our clothes and personal items will still be in the property - albeit discreetly - there is an empty wardrobe which you are welcome to use.
transit: From the airport: 25min by taxi / 45 by train + bus Bus to access to Bondi Junction / city 389 – in Glenair street – every 10 minutes (PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN) – in front of the beach on Campbell Parade – every 5 minutes
access: We will not be in the property for your stay, it is all yours.
interaction: Please contact me to arrange receiving the keys - you will have your own set of keys to enter the property. Check in and out times are flexible, just let me know and we will try and accommodate. We will not be in the property for your stay, it is all yours. We will be available to contact 24/7 Close to everything you want and need in Bondi!
house_rules: • No parties or events • No smoking Please leave the property as you found it, and respect our home. Please do not smoke inside and on the balcony. Please no parties. We are all for having a good time but please be respectful of the neighbours.

reviews.comments: Gwen was a fantastic host. She was very accommodating of our late arrival and very early departure. The apartment was exactly as we imagined with a lot of natural light, sleek "beachy" decor and only a 5 min walk to the beach, everything you need for a perfect weekend away. I would definitely stay with Gwen again.
Great location, lovely helpful hosts.

Gwen is very sweet! met with her briefly and she gave me good tips. The flat was cozy and clean, 5 mins walk to the beach and amazing restaurants: I loved BrownSugar right in front of their place. Staying here depends on what you are doing in Bondi. If it's to party and enjoy the nearby festivities until the wee hours of the night then this is perfect for you. I have to say that this place was a little too loud for my taste. Loud music from neighbors late at night and the busy street wasn't all that fun for an early sleeper like myself dealing with jet lag but it's out of Gwen's control so I just put my earplugs in and hoped for the best. Other than that, their place is perfectly located in safe area, and very close to the beach. Like I said it all depends on what you want out of your stay!
Great location, very close to the beach. Gwen and Jim were very helpful.
Great

Best location, the apartment was lovely and super close to the beach, shops and restaurants. Would recommend  Gwen's apartment to anyone and everyone that's wanting to go somewhere funky and fun! Gwen was super helpful with places to go, things to do and with questions and communication was great. Thanks Gwen for the best weekend!

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Gwen and Jim's.  Both were great communicators and made our 11pm arrival a breeze!
Good little place in an amazing location, only very short walk to the water.  Thanks for having us!

House is really close to bondi beach to walk! And many restaurants are near to house;-) 
Host is also kind! She explained about nice places to visit!

Gwen and Jim went out of their way to provide me with information on the apartment and neighborhood. They were fast to reply to communication and did everything they could to make sure my stay was comfortable. 
The location is out of this world. Close to good restaurants and bars and a 5 minute walk to the stunning Bondi Beach. 
The apartment is easy to access and comfortable. I would definitely stay here next time I am in Bondi.

Gwen provided great information regarding the apartment and also the surrounding shops and cafes. 10/10 

Was also contactable 24/7 as described. :)
This property is next to a busy road with a landing walkway the other side. Very hot with no a/c or fan. A very basic apartment with a wooden create as a coffee table!
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Great location, and very easy to deal with. 
Thanks.
Beautiful location. Lovely unique apartment. Highly recommended
Great location close to Bondi, perfect for us and our puppy. The hosts were wonderful.
Great location right in the middle of Bondi. Gwen was so helpful and made the whole process really easy. 100% would recommend.

This apartment was absolutely perfect for a holiday in Sydney. It's a fantastic location-right in the heart of Bondi, 5 minutes away from the beach. Gwen was extremely communicative, and left us some great tips for things to see and do in the area.  I wish we could have stayed longer!
Gwennaelle was very helpful in providing lots of recommendations, house was clean and in a great location

This place was adorable.  I️t was perfectly located and has everything you could want.  The outside balcony was really nice to wake up to and read.  I couldn’t have asked for a better experience!!  The hosts were also very responsive at all times, which was key.
Lovely clean apartment opposite the best nightlife in bondi walking distance to everything and great balcony

We had a fantastic stay at Gwennaelle's place. Check in was smooth and easy. It is a lovely, clean and spacious apartment in a great location close to the beach and cafes. We would definitely stay again.

Great location, with a lovely big balcony.  

Host was extremely helpful & accommodating, especially as we only booked at very short notice.
Great location, can be noisy on weekends as busy street. Gwen is lovely though.

Gwennaelle's has been an amazing host to us for the 2 nights we stayed in Bondi, she had been so  accommodating to our needs: due to circumstances we had to stay another night and she was more than happy to host us which was so kind of her! Her place is stunning and super clean with great amenities! Overall we had an amazing time at her appartment, which was also a short walk from Bondi Beach and really nice restaurants! Would come back, highly recommend to stay here if you're looking for a great host in Bondi.
Great spot. Close to shops. Close to beach. Plenty of room. Pet friendly! Clean! Gwennaelle was a great host! We would stay again!
Great location
A wonderful little pad in a great location. Gwen is a fantastic host, communicates well and gives great suggestions. Easy and enjoyable. Highly recommended.

Great location walking distance to the beach, bars, restaurants and shops. Expect a little noise at night from nearby bars.  Beautiful cute clean space with wonderful local tips from Gwen and great communication throughout our stay.

Wish we could’ve spent more time here! 

Thank you!

Whitney and Jamie

Our one night stay in Gwennaelle’s apartment was perfect being 5 minutes from the beach! 

The apartment was clean, tidy, with lots of natural light. 

The balcony was great for an afternoon wine. 

We would definitely recommended this apartment and would stay in it again. 

The check in/out process was easy and convenient :)
great location,  walking distance to everything near Bondi. Excellent restaurants and drinks very close to apt.
Great location, great balcony, nice apartment and comfy bed! Gwennaelle gave us a lot of god info on what to do and where to eat.

Loved staying at Gwennaelles place! She couldn’t have been more responsive or given more local tips - so helpful! It was a short walk from the beach and I just enjoyed spending my time at Bondi. This area has a great vibe in the summer and has everything you need for a great getaway. The space is exactly as shown, comfortable, and with plenty of space.

name: Room with a gorgeous Bosphorus View
summary: My flat is located Yeldeğirmeni which is a lovely district of Kadıköy. It is very close to Kadıköy square, Rıhtım, Nautilus Shopping Mall and it is 10 min to reach ferry and Metro by walk.  The room is looking over Haydarpaşa and Bosphorus view.
