description: My flat is located Yeldeğirmeni which is a lovely district of Kadıköy. It is very close to Kadıköy square, Rıhtım, Nautilus Shopping Mall and it is 10 min to reach ferry and Metro by walk.  The room is looking over Haydarpaşa and Bosphorus view.

host.host_about:
Living and working in Kadıköy since 2009. Cinema is my passion and profession. My place shows my way of life: minimal and cozy. Istanbul is full of stories and Kadıköy is the best place to experience it. Come and enjoy the great view. ;) 

Hope to see you and welcome already. :)

name: 907A -Clean, Close to Beach
summary: This is an amazing Studio with all cooking materials needed.  Studio is just a Block from Beach!!  Also,  upgraded with large kitchen sink, cabinets and Full fridge!  Queen bed and private lanai,  with flat screen tv & FREE WIFI.  FREE BREAKFAST!!  As well as Free BEACH GEAR!:)   Enjoy the Hawaiian beaches with the stocked Boogie Boards, Snorkel equipment, Beach chairs/Beach umbrella! CHECK IN anytime after 3pm, key in lockbox:)
space: GREAT, COZY place, just a block from beach!  There is a Queen size bed. Cable TV is available on large 40" flatscreen TV, mounted on wall for easy viewing. The bathroom is equipped with extra towels and toiletries. The balcony can sit 2-3 people. This is great for people who want to be steps away from beach and heart of Waikiki.- Also- Free Continental Breakfast for ALL guests, everyday 6-9am (available downstairs at 24hour Mini Mart).
description: This is an amazing Studio with all cooking materials needed.  Studio is just a Block from Beach!!  Also,  upgraded with large kitchen sink, cabinets and Full fridge!  Queen bed and private lanai,  with flat screen tv & FREE WIFI.  FREE BREAKFAST!!  As well as Free BEACH GEAR!:)   Enjoy the Hawaiian beaches with the stocked Boogie Boards, Snorkel equipment, Beach chairs/Beach umbrella! CHECK IN anytime after 3pm, key in lockbox:) GREAT, COZY place, just a block from beach!  There is a Queen size bed. Cable TV is available on large 40" flatscreen TV, mounted on wall for easy viewing. The bathroom is equipped with extra towels and toiletries. The balcony can sit 2-3 people. This is great for people who want to be steps away from beach and heart of Waikiki.- Also- Free Continental Breakfast for ALL guests, everyday 6-9am (available downstairs at 24hour Mini Mart). Located on-site are a 24-hour convenience store, laundromat, tour desk, surf shop and public parking are available on-site. Thi
neighborhood_overview: Location, Location, Location! We are in the middle of it all. Much to see and do in Waikiki. The World's most famous beach is just two short blocks away. Watch the sunsets from nearly any vantage point along the beach and see the Friday night fireworks from the Hilton Hawaiian Village. The nearby neighborhood includes several major hotels and numerous large and small restaurants and nightclubs that cater to every nationality. Ask the kamaaina (locals) for their tips. The Royal Hawaiian Shopping Center and other “World Class Shopping" may be found on Kalakaua Avenue (the street fronting the beach). A few blocks away you will find famous Kapiolani park and the Waikiki Shell, Honolulu Zoo, Waikiki Aquarium, Diamond Head, golfing and many tennis courts.
transit: For Parking, you can park below building.  Their rates are $25/24 hours, and lessor amounts for shorter time.  You need to pay yellow box and get white ticket.  Must put White ticket on your dashboard, or car will be towed.  With this ticket, you have THREE places to park, if lot is full. 1- underground parking on Kuhio Ave.  2- underground parking in back of building on Prince Edward St (identical to Kuhio ave. parking).  3- at the tall condo (Pacific Monarch) on corner of Kuhio and Uluniu St. A block away is Waikiki Banyan, their rates are $20/24hours (entrance on Kuhio Avenue).  There is also Free street parking along Ala Wai Canal 2-3 blocks away. Towing on canal is 2 days, Monday and Friday 6-10am. But who needs a car in Waikiki? Everything is in walking distance. But if you have an itch to venture out, the island's bus transit system is awesome.
access: Located on-site are a 24-hour convenience store, laundromat, tour desk, surf shop and public parking are available on-site. This property is elevator accessible with trash chutes are located on each floor.
interaction: We live in building, with Keoki and Tsuki in the store, and are accessible 24/7.   They are happy to help you anytime you need, and to hold bags if early arrival/late departure, at $4/bag..
house_rules: No smoking  Not suitable for pets  No parties or events  Check-in is after 3PM  Per community house rules, all guests must register with the on-site resident manager or security. A photo copy of valid government issued identification is required for all guests in the unit.  All residents are required to sign-in their guests at the Security Desk in the main lobby for every visit. Guests are not permitted unescorted above the lobby level and may not be in possession/and or use of key set. Use of key set is reserved for the express use of residents only and may not be used to allow access to anyone other than the resident and guest. In general, all guests are asked to be a good neighbor and to also comply with the following: -Loud music or TV playback is generally not allowed. -Trash chutes are located on all floors. Please adhere to posted signing. If you have items too large for the trash chute, please use the dumpster in the garage. -Items may never hang over or from a lanai ledge. -In

host.host_about:
Aloha!
I Love traveling and meeting new people.  My work takes me around the world, seeing exotic life, and amazing creatures, I'm a scuba instructor.  I love diving the many secret spots on Oahu and abroad.  
Days that I may be diving, Keoki or Tsuki will be able to help with check in, and help answer any questions you might have.  We work as a TEAM, to help ensure you that your stay goes smoothly.  Some of us live on property, and are able to be contacted, and help with any questions or conners 24/7, every day.

Much Mahalo!:)
Chris

reviews.comments:
It was our first time in Honolulu.
Chris answered all our questions,  very good communication.
Condo has great location, close to the beach, very clean, tiny efficiency.

This place is in a privilege location in Waikiki. In the middle of the town, walking distance from shopping stores, restaurants, bars, few blocks to the Zoo and only two blocks away from Waikiki Beach. 
The room, although little, is super confi. Also provides beach towels, snorkeling kits, beach chairs, boogie boards.
Chris took really good care of us. He always respond fast and very nice.
This place totally rocks and worth the price. We totally recommend it!
Much Mahalo Chris!!
Nice ,clean room !wonderful place !  Hope see you soon!

I did not meet the host during my stay. I only met the person helping the host. The helper runs the convenience store downstairs. There wasn't much of a problem checking in with the helper.

The room was what I expected for the price I paid for that location. It was small but manageable with my wife and child. Kitchenette with refrigerator and portable stove top were definitely a plus. The bathroom however, specifically the bathtub, could probably use a replacement. I was a bit disappointed by the "continental breakfast." It was just convenience store made coffee and a choice prepackaged pastries like the donuts you see at a liquor store. I did appreciate the complementary beach items for us to use from the room, including boogie boards, snorkeling gear, beach mats and chairs. The location and price were the main reasons for my choice of stay. It's close to Waikiki beach and relatively cheaper than what I've seen in the same area.

My overall experience was decent. Nothing too bad but nothing extraordinary. I would give it 3.5 stars.

Thank you Chris for opening up your studio to my daughter and her roommate.  The accommodations were clean and convenient – perfect for their needs while they transitioned from their student housing to a new rental.  I appreciate that you were able to handle this very, last minute booking.

Chris is a great host, he replies very fast. The condo location is great, literally 5 min walk to the beach, and 10 min to main shopping area. The parking is the only problematic area, it's at least 20$ per night, and there's only 10 parking spaces for over 100units of families, or you would have to park 2 blocks away. Overall, good experience. Thank you, Chris!

We had a fantastic time staying at Chris's apartment. He was a great host, and communication was excellent! The unit is located very close to the beach, shops and amenities. Only too happy to recommend,and would love to come back and stay again!
Much Mahalo Chris,
Craig and Karen

We had a great time, apartment was great. Chris was awsome host. Very fast resonder to texts, whatever we needed it would be in the aparment right away.Thank you Chris, maybe we will see you next year!!!
Great neighborhood. Close to food and the beach. Very clean. Good internet. Chris was very responsive

Though we didn't have the opportunity to meet Chris in person, we had a great experience with Kioki (the on site coordinator). The place looks exactly like the photos. The space is a bit small but the short walk to Waikiki Beach makes up for it. We were pleased by how clean the room was.

The room was really cute and good. Everything what we need was in the room. The host, Chris is really nice too. He always answer me quickly.But clean up of washroom was not enough. And I saw many cockroaches.

My stay in Waikiki was great! Chris provided very thorough information on how to locate and access the space. He was very quick to respond to my questions as well. The unit was clean and in a walkable location as well as close to bus lines. I definitely would rent the space again should I return to Oahu!
It was very easy to check in and out. Great location, just minutes from Waikiki. Great amenities in the building. Pretty small space, but has everything you need.
Chris was very welcoming and the unit was very clean and inviting. Very close to the beach and walking distance to restaurants.
Chris is very welcoming and it's pretty easy to check in. The best thing is that the location is good very close to the beach.

I very much enjoyed my stay here, it was clean with free Wifi, close to the beach, laundry on site and a convenience store on the bottom floor.  There was even parking underneath for an additional daily cost.  The check-in was smooth as well as the check out, very detail in providing exactly what to do.  The room itself was great as I was there for a week, it would fit two comfortably but for just myself it was perfect! I very much recommend staying at Chris's airbnb as they provided all the basic necessities to visiting Waikiki!

The room was as described. Useful information was provided in the room. Keoki and security were very nice. The use of beach gear(Snorkeling gear, chairs, umbrella, etc.)was an added bonus! The buildings other tenants, residents, vacationers were pretty quiet.  Close to the beach. Scooter/car rental near by.
Chris is very kind.  He can speak japanese and he has been very helpful. This room is great location. We had good trip. Thank you.

Our stay at Chris was ok. Checkin was last minute on our part but Chris made it easy for us. .....The location of the Airbnb is great, just a 2 minutes walk to Waikiki and in the middle of Cafes, restaurant, shops, bus stations. That also means that it was pretty loud sometimes during the night, but especially in the morning. So bring your earplugs....Another good thing was, that there is snorkeling gear provided......  In the pictures the airbnb appears bigger than it actually is, more modern and cleaner. I would not title the Airbnb "clean". There was hair laying around, one day we had some insects, dust/dirt underneath the kitchen and the bed, old tub/doors/walls that didn´t make it seem hygienic....We have stayed for two weeks. Cooking was a challenge with two burners on the stove and a small kitchen. We couldn´t find all kitchen utensils we needed (e.g. saladbowl).... So there are both pros and contras. Depends on what you are looking for!
My entire week's stay's experience was nightmarish.
Chris was easy to communicate with and accommodated my early arrival well. The room is as-advertised, small but exceptionally convenient to the beach and restaurants/shopping.

In the heart of Waikiki, close to everything. 
very good value for your money.
Comfortable stay in Waikiki. Central to everything, and a short walk to the beach :)

Centered in Waikiki, everything is at a walking distance. Very close to the beach. Check-in and check-up was easy. Security in the building was very good. Free parking can be found along the canal. The cleanliness of the room could be better. Chris was very prompt to answer everytime. Would rent again.
Great value for money
This is a great place to stay. Everything you need is very close, and only a block from the beach. It's a great value
Great place, small but the location was amazing! Would definitely book this again
Great location and well equipped kitchenette

I thought the free coffee/pastry daily  and free smoothie are great offers and enhanced our stay. It was great being able to use of chairs and beach gear.  It is a fantastic location! 1-2 min walk to Waikiki! 
The apartment is a bit tired.  I think you need to upgrade the bed or get mattress topper it is rather uncomfortable. Not bad for a couple nights, but 10 nights was too much. Also think you need to improve your cleaning service. There is no reason someone showing up at 10:30pm after an 11am checkout, should be arriving at a dirty apartment. Chris answered me instantly and remedied the situation. So no fault of his.   If you want a very basic accommodation in an amazing location this place is  great.

Save your money for mai tais on the beach and stay here! This studio apartment is exactly what a budget-conscious traveler needs for a stay in Waikiki. It is not a luxury room and does need updating.   So if you're looking for fancy, pay $200 more a night and go 1 block up. However if you are looking for a place to rest your head (WITH AIR) after fun days checking out the island, this is the place. The location can't be beat. Cheap eats all around and easy walk to shopping, car rental and activities. The beach is literally 2 blocks down. The studio has all you need to eat in if that is your plan but we only used the fridge.  The studio also has a tiny lanai with a partial mountain view. It's sufficient for a nice break to read or drink coffee. The minimart was great for quick drinks and a smoothie. And they even held our bags while we spent our last day enjoying the beach due to our late flight out.

Our first night was kind of a mess where we showed up late (can check in anytime after 2) and the keys weren't there - apparently the cleaners put them in the wrong box! We couldn't get ahold of Chris after calling multiple times and ended up having to walk to a Holiday Inn, dragging all of our luggage. When we finally got ahold of him, he was very apologetic and quick to rectify the situation to the best of his ability. He was a great host and overall, we would be so happy to stay here again! This place is in such an AMAZING spot! Literally walking distance to EVERYTHING! We're talking 2 minutes to Waikiki Beach, 8 minutes to the zoo, less than 10 minutes to countless restaurants! It's a great space! I wouldn't suggest more than 2 people as it is VERY small but it's really pretty! Definitely worth every cent! There's a small balcony to hang up wet swim gear (they loaned us snorkeling gear and boogie boards!) Which is super helpful! I wish there had been more towels (2 beach, 4 room) since we were there for a week but that's okay! We loved this place and like I said, we'd happily stay again! :)

Chris the place is great. It's only one block from the beach. It's very convenient. You want to go on vacation and swim. The bus stop is on the side, and there are many restaurants. The apartment is small, but the daily necessities are available. It's a good deal for the tourist. The toilet drain is not very smooth, so you need to press the button for a long time before you can work. This is a lot of trouble.

Thanks to Chris, let's go into the apartment early.
Great place to be, 2 mins walk to the beach and all the restaurants. Free smoothie, and daily coffee and muffin is a nice touch.
Clean, communicative, accommodating, economical. Overall a great experience

The best thing about this apartment is the amazing location. It is at the heart of Waikiki and walking distance from many restaurants, beautiful beach parks, zoo, etc. The apartment is the same as seen in the pictures and for us was very nice because Chris has baby gadgets (crib, stroller, high chair) and also umbrella, bodyboards, beach chair… However, we had a major issue during our check in process. The keys were not in the lockbox as directed by Chris and it was 10 pm. We informed our late checkin since the beginning. We tried to reach him many many time and he didn't answer the phone. AirBnB solved the issue once we found a nearby hotel to sleep that night. It was a challenge because it was Friday, almost midnight, on a holiday weekend with a baby waiting outside. It took us more then 2 hours to find a place. The next day, Chris send a message with new directions, but it was wrong again - wrong key in the lockbox. We called again and his partner showed up with the keys finally getting us inside the apartment. The remaining days were OK. Airbnb payed our night at the hotel and Chris offered a discount - he refunded a little bit over the value of the first night that we did not sleep in his place.

Room was exactly what we needed, and the AC was great in cooling the space. It was nice to have access to an umbrella, and chairs for the trips to the beach. Chris was very responsive, and sent a nice note about activities happening in the city during our stay.
Great location( minutes away from shops, dining, the beach) , small and clean! Chris gave really detailed directions on how to check-in and everything was very smooth.

Location is great. Literally less than 5mins walk to the beach! There is a laundry room on the fist floor which is very convenient. Didn't need to use it since my stay was short and not sure if coin operated or not. Communication with Chris was also very good. However, as most of the reviews mentioned, the check-in process was a hassle and I had to be on the phone with Chris to get the right key to my room as the cleaners had placed the wrong one in the lock box. Hopefully, Chris will improve the check-in process in the future. I also felt the cleaning fee was a bit high for an old building with a bathroom in clear need of a remodel. In addition, there was cigarette smoke seeping through the bathroom window every day making it difficult to breath. Therefore, if you're allergic this may not be a place for you. I realize this is not the host's fault. I just wish the building had stricter rules about smoking on the balcony and enforced it with penalties.
The place was awesome and very clean, centrally located easy to find. The host will always reply back to you and will give you many helpful tips.

Great location and price! Me and my husband were close to everything and the beach was only about a 5 minute walk away.  His place was very clean and had all the necessities that we needed.  The only complain would be the noise off the street in the morning, because it sounded like there was a garbage man passing by every morning and the pillows were too flat for my comfortability.  Other than that we loved our stay and would recommend staying here!
The host canceled this reservation 10 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

The place was in central Waikiki which was perfect, it’s small but a place to lay your head. Bathroom could do with a serious revamp, it’s a well used apartment, a tad expensive for what it is but Waikiki overall is like that so can’t really complain! 

Muffins and coffee in the morning were a nice addition. Also very helpful with checking us in earlier, Chris was great to deal with!

Perfect located, like 5 min by foot to the middle of Waikiki beach 
Check in with lockbox, easy going 
Was a nice stay there
Thank you so much!!
Great spot, thanks!

Es un buen lugar muy céntrico a sólo 3 minutos de la playa de waikiki, está todo muy cerca. Cuenta con una buena seguridad en el edificio.
El departamento es lo ofrecido, es cómodo para una persona o pareja, cuanta con aire acondicionado que ayuda mucho y bueno todos los utensilios de cocina para poder cocinar, ropa de cama etc.

Volvería sin duda otra vez.

Saludos
Fantastic Location, limited parking, limited views, great security.

We recommend Chris’s apartment because it is a great place to stay in Honolulu. The apartment is located near to Waikiki beach, just we need to walk two blocks. 
The apartment is clean and the amenities are comfortable. 
Chris has a lot of tips about things to do during your staying at Honolulu, including topics about transportation, beaches, foods and adventures activities.

I really enjoyed this unit as well! Always quick responses to the questions I have and units are clean, comfortable, and have great views! You always get free breakfast every morning which is very nice. Really felt welcomed and cared for there!

Very cozy space, I was genuinely surprised that the noise level from outside want audible at all. The sleeping space was very comfortable too! I personally felt like I was at home there. I would 10/10 recommend it to anyone looking for a quick stay-cation  or mini trip

Once again, I enjoyed staying in another one of Chris’s units! Always very clean, comfortable, and check in process is smooth. I really love the set up and I was close to everything. Also, Chris and Keoki are great hosts, and always respond super fast. So if you’re looking for an awesome place to stay, I always recommend Chris’s units! Thank you again for everything, Chris and Keoki!
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Location, location, location. Host is cool af. Everything else... well. Yea - “eh?”

name: 710A -Bamboo Beauty!! Ocean view!
summary: This is a great studio on TOP floor! Very conveniently located with Large, Queen bed and great Kitchenette equip, with built-in cook-top, pots & pans, microwave, coffee maker. All the basics you need! As well as Free BEACH GEAR!:) Enjoy the Hawaiian beaches with the stocked Boogie Boards, Snorkel equipment, Beach chairs/Beach umbrella!:) Relax with FREE WIFI!! This has a Large Queen bed, and Large cooking area, with stove, pots/pans/coffee maker/microwave and large fridge.Cable TV available on large 32" flatscreen. Outdoor balcony can sit 1-2 people. More information PARKING Parking is available onsite and is located in the below street level garage. Daily parking fees are approx. $25 per 24 hours. Payment options may be selected at the vending kiosk located at the bottom of the ramp. Please remember to put white ticket on dashboard, or car will be towed. Also, White ticket is good for both front and back parking lots (they are identical). Free Parking is available along Ala Wai Canal
space: COMFORTABLE! Cozy BAMBOO room!:) place, just a block from beach!  There is a Queen size bed. Cable TV is available on large 40" flatscreen TV, mounted on wall for easy viewing. New, large, Ceiling fan.  The bathroom is equipped with extra towels and toiletries. The balcony can sit 2-3 people. This is great for people who want to be steps away from beach and heart of Waikiki.- Also- Free Continental Breakfast for ALL guests, everyday 6-9am (available downstairs at 24hour Mini Mart).
description: This is a great studio on TOP floor! Very conveniently located with Large, Queen bed and great Kitchenette equip, with built-in cook-top, pots & pans, microwave, coffee maker. All the basics you need! As well as Free BEACH GEAR!:) Enjoy the Hawaiian beaches with the stocked Boogie Boards, Snorkel equipment, Beach chairs/Beach umbrella!:) Relax with FREE WIFI!! This has a Large Queen bed, and Large cooking area, with stove, pots/pans/coffee maker/microwave and large fridge.Cable TV available on large 32" flatscreen. Outdoor balcony can sit 1-2 people. More information PARKING Parking is available onsite and is located in the below street level garage. Daily parking fees are approx. $25 per 24 hours. Payment options may be selected at the vending kiosk located at the bottom of the ramp. Please remember to put white ticket on dashboard, or car will be towed. Also, White ticket is good for both front and back parking lots (they are identical). Free Parking is available along Ala Wai Canal
neighborhood_overview: Location, Location, Location! We are in the middle of it all! Much to see and do in Waikiki. The World's most famous beach is just two short blocks away. Watch the sunsets from nearly any vantage point along the beach and see the Friday night fireworks from the Hilton Hawaiian Village. The nearby neighborhood includes several major hotels and numerous large and small restaurants and nightclubs that cater to every nationality. Ask the kamaaina (locals) for their tips. The Royal Hawaiian Shopping Center and other “World Class Shopping" may be found on Kalakaua Avenue (the street fronting the beach). A few blocks away you will find famous Kapiolani park and the Waikiki Shell, Honolulu Zoo, Waikiki Aquarium, Diamond Head, golfing and many tennis courts.
notes: There will be additional charge of USD  for Parking and USD  for Internet, collected during the time of stay.
transit: For Parking, you can park below building.  Their rates are $25/24 hours, and lessor amounts for shorter time.  You need to pay yellow box and get white ticket.  Must put White ticket on your dashboard, or car will be towed.  With this ticket, you have THREE places to park, if lot is full. 1- underground parking on Kuhio Ave.  2- underground parking in back of building on Prince Edward St (identical to Kuhio ave. parking).  3- at the tall condo (Pacific Monarch) on corner of Kuhio and Uluniu St. A block away is Waikiki Banyan, their rates are $20/24hours (entrance on Kuhio Avenue).  There is also Free street parking along Ala Wai Canal 2-3 blocks away. Towing on canal is 2 days, Monday and Friday 6-10am. But who needs a car in Waikiki? Everything is in walking distance. But if you have an itch to venture out, the island's bus transit system is awesome.
access: Located on-site are a 24-hour convenience store, internet cafe, laundromat, tour desk, surf shop and public parking are available on-site. This property is elevator accessible with trash chutes are located on each floor. Interaction with Guest Interaction with guests is generally limited to welcoming upon arrival. I try to respect my guest's boundaries and allow them their experience without interruption. However, I am always available when my quests have requests, need for directions or information about what to see and do. Location, Location, Location! We are in the middle of it all. Much to see and do in Waikiki. The World's most famous beach is just two short blocks away. Watch the sunsets from nearly any vantage point along the beach and see the Friday night fireworks from the Hilton Hawaiian Village. The nearby neighborhood includes several major hotels and numerous large and small restaurants and nightclubs that cater to every nationality. Ask the kamaaina (locals) for their tip
interaction: We live in building, with Keoki and Tsuki in the store, and are accessible 24/7.   They are happy to help you anytime you need, and to hold bags if early arrival/late departure, at no charge.
house_rules: No smoking  Not suitable for pets  No parties or events  Check-in is after 3PM  Per community house rules, all guests must register with the on-site resident manager or security. A photo copy of valid government issued identification is required for all guests in the unit.  All residents are required to sign-in their guests at the Security Desk in the main lobby for every visit. Guests are not permitted unescorted above the lobby level and may not be in possession/and or use of key set. Use of key set is reserved for the express use of residents only and may not be used to allow access to anyone other than the resident and guest. In general, all guests are asked to be a good neighbor and to also comply with the following: -Loud music or TV playback is generally not allowed. -Trash chutes are located on all floors. Please adhere to posted signing. If you have items too large for the trash chute, please use the dumpster in the garage. -Items may never hang over or from a lanai ledge. -In

host.host_about:
Aloha!
I Love traveling and meeting new people.  My work takes me around the world, seeing exotic life, and amazing creatures, I'm a scuba instructor.  I love diving the many secret spots on Oahu and abroad.  
Days that I may be diving, Keoki or Tsuki will be able to help with check in, and help answer any questions you might have.  We work as a TEAM, to help ensure you that your stay goes smoothly.  Some of us live on property, and are able to be contacted, and help with any questions or conners 24/7, every day.

Much Mahalo!:)
Chris

reviews.comments:
The arrival was easy and well described! The apartment itself was clean and very nice with a balcony view to Waikiki.
Overall had a pleasant stay and really liked the accommodation.
The breakfast was very small but alright!

Chris was very welcoming and checked in periodically to make sure things were going well. The room was clean and just as described in the listing. The room was perfect for our one week stay. Would recommend this place for anyone that was a relaxing room near the beach.

HAD AN AMAZINGLY PHENOMENAL TIME! FANTASTIC location. Right directly in the middle of ALL DEALS, RESTURANTS, & Affordable TRANSPORTATION. Was there for RIMPAC Military Port Pull in. Had Great Ac. Could go on explaining the great spot but you would have to go there and stay to FULLY UNDERSTAND!

The listing description was very accurate. The pictures were exactly as it seemed. It says ocean view, and you have an ocean view, albeit a small one. However, the best part about this location is that it is literally 3 blocks from the beach. You walk one block over and 2 blocks down, cross the street and you are at the main entrance for the beach in Waikiki. You are a just a few more blocks from shopping. The views are stunning! I honestly couldn't believe it when we arrived. We were beyond pleased with location.

This room was perfect size for me and my friend. The location was amazing, everything was in arms length. Chris was super helpful when we needed him to be and overall, staying at his apartment was definitely an enjoyable experience. Loved it!!

A cosy and clean little apartment with a fantastic location for traveller's on a budget.  So close to the beach and many of the great eateries on Kuhio Ave. (Especially the food truck right outside!!) The complex itself has many conveniences such as a laundry and store, which make staying here a breeze.  Its also on the bus routes for all the major attractions that are a bit further away from central Waikiki.  Maholo, Chris!
Great little spot - apartment was clean, looked like the photos, and was super close to Waikiki.
We were given a little coffee and all the amenities we would need for a Beach get away.

Our stay was great! The apartment is 2 blocks from Waikiki beach, it was clean and tidy and came with all the beach essentials, a tv and fast internet. Chris was an awesome host, this was our first time using airbnb so we had a few questions and Chris was very quick and helpful in responding. Can't beat it for the price, highly recommend staying here.

The studio is perfect for solo travel (or a couple). The location was great with both the beach and shopping/restaurants nearby. The check in process was super easy and the place was nicely renovated. My messages were responded to promptly, which i appreciated. The bed was surprisingly comfortable and the balcony was a great bonus. I will definitely be staying here the next time I visit.

The location is great if you want to stay in Waikiki and the place is pretty clean and in decent shape. Otherwise it is a small, run-of-the-mill room, so  there is nothing to particularly recommend it nor any reason to dissuade anyone from staying there versus the other rooms in this area.

Perfect location and a great size for a couple. We loved Hawaii and this accommodation had a lot to do with it.

Finding the accommodation and key lock box was easy. Room was clean and more than met our expectations. Even though we were in the heart of Waikiki it was a quiet location. 

Wifi and cable tv worked well the whole time. Great value.

Chris maintained constant communication with me throughout the entire process and check in was smooth and easy. 

When there was an issue with the microwave, Keoki was there in a flash with a new one.
This place was great. Amazing location, less than 2 blocks from the main Waikiki Beach. The view was pretty good too. The space was clean and was nice.

This was a fantastic little find for me as a single traveller!  Cozy, but had all the essentials.  Bed was really comfy as well!  And you really could see the ocean from the great little balcony.  Overall really quite wonderful to be so close to the beach and all the action, yet still feel like you could retreat back to a somewhat quiet space if needed.  Really lovely!
Very good experience ..

The location is perfect And that is just about the only thing good about this place .. The noise level both from other residents as well as outside was horrendous .. the air conditioner as well was very loud.. first time using airbnb and probably my last .. the place I stay at is as much a part of the vacation experience as any  thing else and the place did not in any way contribute to making the experience a great one unfortunately !!!

Chris was able to accommodate me last minute on New Years Eve. He responded to all my messages very quickly. The room is very clean and his place in a great location. In addition, it's a great place to sleep and recharge the batteries. Overall, it was an awesome experience!

The room is clean and cozy with a little veranda. The location is really nice.  Keoki is super helpful!

24 hours convenience store is downstairs where you can grab coffee and pastry in the morning.
Great room in popular area. Communication and check in were a breeze. Much more satisfying stay than at nearby hotel due to value and privacy of unit.
The aparment is located pretty well. Only 2-3 minutes to the beach and shops and restaurants are located close.

Great location! 2 blocks from the beach and a few blocks from downtown shopping as well. Plenty to do within walking distance! Very quiet at night - can't hear any nightlife which was great for early to bed! Bedding was comfortable - it's a firm mattress. Everything you need is provided for you which was great (beach use, iron, kitchen supplies). Only downside was the A/C was a bit loud and 5:30 am there was construction or dumpsters right outside - but with my time change I was getting up around that time anyway! 

Great first bnb experience! Super convenient - Chris was great with updates and very accommodating! Would recommend this place to everyone!
Everything was nice and neat. Helpful and nice. Stay was good.

Chris' response time is amazing. We were in a tough situation and we are greatful for his efforts. He has beach stuff and he offers a continental breakfast. Chris also has a few fact sheets and suggestions in the suite which was really nice. We are staying in another one of his unit's next week and we are looking forward to that because he's a great host! Clean unit and close to the beach...a three minute walk!

This apartment was in a great location near to beach, shops and restaurants.  Chris left some useful information about places to go and where to eat. Definitely go to Tiki's  and experience the live music and great food.
The apartment is small and in need of freshening up. There was only one beach towel, one wine glass and an old fridge sat out on the balcony and although we mentioned this to Chris he did say he would sort it, but nothing happened.
Everyone has their own personal tastes and standards and sadly this place didn't match up to mine.
Wonder quiet little room, real close to the beach, bars, and some of Waikiki best little private owned restaurants. Perfect for a couple on holiday! Chris and his team were great hosts.
Perfectly central located but nevertheless very quiet! Nice little apartment, perfect for 1 traveler or a couple.

This small studio apartment is great for single travelers or couples. It's less than 5 minutes from the beach, with all the shopping, dining, and activities a person will need while staying in the island. While it is close to the activity it's far enough off the main roads to have a quiet and calm feeling. The road it is located on is one way and lightly traveled compared to others in the area. If you are looking for a clean, safe place to stay close to the activity but secluded enough to be able to relax this is a great option.

The location is excellent walking distance to the beach 1.5 block away and The Bus stops less than a block. The room is great for its price if you are in a budget like myself. Keoke our host is available if you need him for any concerns. The building have its laundry area and mini store for any item that you may forget. This place is so affordable and convenient. Highly recommended for a budget friendly and to a no fuss traveler!
Wifi would drop out sometimes and would need to reconnect, other than that stay was good
enjoyed the location.  Everything was convenient and clean as described.  will be wanting to come back again next time...
Great stay! Would visit again, great value!

Great place to stay. We finished up our Hawaiian adventure at Chris's place and it was perfect. It is right in the heart of Waikiki, 2 min walk to the big duke statue (main beach of Waikiki) so it is extremely central. Check in was a breeze, so simple. The unit is perfect for a couple, plus a fold out bed if you have too many beers and get in trouble you got somewhere to have a nice sleep haha. Great place, great price, it's perfect for travellers who want the best of Waikiki for a good price.

Wenn man beste Lage direkt am Waikiki Beach haben möchte, sollte man sich vorher im Klaren sein, dass man für den Preis nur wenige Quadratmeter sein Eigen nennt! Wenn das Zusatzbett ausgeklappt ist, ist quasi fast der gesamte Raum belegt. Dafür ist das Appartement aber auch mit allem, was man für kochen, schlafen und Strand braucht, prima ausgestattet. Außerdem ist es ruhig. Sogar zwei Buggys haben wir bekommen.
깨끗하고 좋음

We greatly enjoyed staying at Chris's apartment. It's comfortable, very close to the beach and a good value. We made good use of the beach equipment on the patio. I unfortunately lost the apartment keys while on the beach, but Chris responded very quickly and got us a new pair within 30 minutes, on a Saturday morning! Would definitely stay again!
Die Unterkunft war super!!!
Everything was great. Streamlined check-in, free morning coffee, right by the beach with snorkel and bodyboarding gear. Highly recommended.
It was so close to beach. Thank you so much.

Chris was very helpful and was quick to respond to me. The room was lovely and clean and in a very easy spot to access the Beach, Zoo, main shopping precinct and restaurants. Very happy with my time there.

Great location close to the beach.  Room had everything we needed.  Best of all, Chris and his team were friendly and super fast to respond when we needed assistance.  Sure the a/c is a little loud and the bed could be more comfortable, but we were happy with our stay and would definitely come back again.

Thank you Chris for your awesome place in Honolulu.

My partner and I had a great stay, close to Waikiki, downtown and more.
It was great.
This is a nice place to live if you want to stay in Waikiki. The location is great. and the room is cozy and clean. The host is very helpful.

I've stayed at the Kuhio Village Towers before and  loved it, this time was no different.
Chris's place was just what I was looking for, everything worked, close to everything, it was neat and tidy and a great size for what I needed.
Sure it's  one of Waikiki's older building but who cares,  you're in Hawaii and you don't need a 5 star suite.  A++

ｵｰﾅｰともいつでもｺﾝﾀｸﾄがとれて､何かあればすぐ対応してもらえたことに感謝します｡
ｵｰｼｬﾝﾋﾞｭｰの可愛いお部屋でした!
ありがとう

Listing location is absolutely killer. The flat itself if just fine, a little hokey (a ceiling panel was jury rigged in place with masking tape and a broom handle) and contacting host was challenge, but we worked around it. Directions on checkin require some kind of map. Otherwise, the location is worth it 100% and the experience overall was great.

Amazing location!  We really enjoyed the proximity and convenience to the beach and there were several ABC stores within a 2 minute walk for food and drink, etc. Also highly recommend Wang Chung’s for karaoke around the corner and Honolulu coffee at the Moana Surfrider for the best coffee. The suite is rather small. For folks on a budget, it will be fine. Check in was easy.  This was not my favourite building in Waikiki by any means, but we spent most of the time at the beach anyway, or shopping and not in the suite. Air conditioner was loud, and bed not all that comfy. Liked that Chris provided us with little soaps, and such. Fluffier pillows and cotton sheets as opposed to microfiber would have made the sleep a bit better. Enjoyed the sun and sand and Waikiki atmosphere. So close to the heart of it all! Mahalo!

AMAZING LOCATION!!! Right in Waikiki--perfect location to walk to all the restaurants and shops. We booked some tours which require a hotel pick-up but there were several hotels right around the corner. Convenience store held our bags before check-in and after check-out (for $4) which was great. Apt even has a partial ocean view. But seriously, GREAT LOCATION!
Muy recomendable la ubicación, la limpieza y la atención! Todo excelente

Perfect place for a single person or couple visiting Waikiki. Hospitality was great and the pricing made the trip even more enjoyable. Central to many great good places (in fact food truck is about 5p feet from front door). Parking can be a challenge but overall, way better then I expected. Mahalo for everything.
Chris’s place is great! It’s less than 5 minutes to the beach, restaurants and shops. Would definitely stay again!

Great value - the studio flat is a bit small and dated, but clean and very conveniently located, so you can't complain at this price! It has everything you need, and the complimentary snorkelling gear, beach inflatables and beach towels, as well as the complimentary breakfast are a lovely touch. 

The only criticism I have is that we had arranged an early check-in with Chris, but he forgot on the day, so when we turned up, the key was not in the lock-box. We had to call Chris and wait while he quickly made some arrangements to get the key to us - he did efficiently and swiftly, but after a 32 hour journey, we would still have preferred not to have to wait.
Quite small but clean. Good location.

Good place ,convenient to beach

Only thing is that the wifi is Spectrum (local internet provider) not so reliable at times and we could only see view of hotels and we heard construction sometimes.

Still worth your money though! Good stay

Great spot, cozy room. It felt like a tricked out hotel room with all the things you need for a short stay. Efficient & stylish way of implementing these extras. Really appreciated the balcony but most of all, the communication with host as well as being accommodated for an early check-in and late check-out. Already know where I'll be staying when I return to Waikiki!

A good condo in a really convenient location, close to eateries and shopping, really can't be beat from that perspective!! Air conditioning was noisy but bearable. Not a big condo but has everything you need!
Chris communicated well and quickly. He made sure everything was working and accommodating. I enjoyed sitting on the lanai to work on the personal room WiFi connection.

立地もとても良く､買い物･食事･ﾋﾞｰﾁどれも徒歩圏内でした｡
室内は思っていたより狭い感じはしましたが､外で過ごすことが多いので問題なかったです｡ﾀｵﾙもかわいく畳まれておりﾎﾃﾙみたいでした✨
ｼｬﾜｰの水圧もいいし､ｴｱｺﾝもちゃんと効いてたし､とっても快適に過ごすことができました♪
Small, intimate space that immediately felt cozy and welcoming. Amazing view, GREAT location, and Chris was responsive and thoughtful! Stop looking for a place in Waikiki and stay here.
Located in an apartment building, walkable to the beach and shops. Took advantage of the beach gear in the apartment. Great place to stay!
Very comfortable! We can walk to Waikiki Beach just 2 blocks. Nice!

가격대비 시설 및 위치가 너무 좋아요
작년에도 이용했고 기억이 너무 좋아
다시 이용했는데 정말 너무 좋았어요
와이키키 비치도 가까워  너무 편했어요
크리스 감사합니다  또 이용할께요^^

Perfect location for getting around Waikiki and surrounding area. Easy check-in and check-out with clear instructions and useful information in the lead up. Very comfortable and well equipped room. Chris has thought of everything! The perfect stay!

Great little spot to stay. Host was quick and responsive. Close enough to the beach and all the activities, but secluded just enough it is peaceful and quiet if you want it. Would definitely recommend others to stay here. Free coffee and muffins each morning was a nice added touch.
Great little gem in the middle of it all. You won't find a better deal. Clean, very convenient and everything you'll need is available. I would highly recommend this great studio.

This is quite a good little apartment actually. Great location. It’s got a nice comfy bed, a handy, well-stocked kitchenette, good hanging and cupboard space for clothes, and aircon that works well.
Chris had thought of all the little nice touches as well, like providing a beach towel and sunscreen.

You can’t beat the proximity of this place to everything Waikiki has to offer!  The unit is decent and the location feels safe.  The building itself is a bit junky and appears to be in disrepair.  Overall pretty good value for a place just two blocks from the beach.
it was perfect for me...

Chris' place amazing. To be located where it was, and be so close to so much, many times walking distance, reminds me of my old neighborhood. Whatever issues I had, he met them quickly. Amazing host, and recommend him anytime you want to visit Waikiki.
Great place to stay! Super close to the beach, food, and convenience stores. The room had everything we needed for a week long stay and was beautiful! Would definetly stay here again.
Good location, but a bit small and older

Great location; quick response and quick correction of TV and door knob repair and detailed check in and out information.  Very polite and professional manager and owner. Morning free coffee and muffin are great treat from host. Lots of towels even sun lotion. The Frig and microwave are very convenient to us.

Just notice that the building first floor layout is little confusing. We got into building 1 by accident a few times. 
I highly recommend this list to all the travelers to Hawaii.
Everything was perfect! The location is really ideal and Chris was very accommodating when i requested a last minute late check out. I would definitely stay there again! Mahalo!!

Such a lovely place and amazing location. It is the perfect spot! The muffin and coffee in the nor ing were a great touch and the place itself was very clean and stylish. Having beach towels and beach gear was next level! Saves much time and money. Small note is that if you are driving a tall or long vehicle parking on site was difficult and or not possible due to height issues. But plenty of places to park all around with similar rates. I very highly recommend this cute little condo and would love to stay here again!!

The location is amazing! A few minutes walk from the beach, popular food spots and not too far from zoo or aquarium. We did not need a car in this location. The extra amenities such as the beach towels, beach chairs, and sunscreen were much appreciated. The internet and TV worked well. Lowered rating to 4 stars because we couldn't figure out how to close the bathroom window so there were bugs in the room. It would have also been nice to have an indoor eating area. But the bed was super comfortable and the AC worked very well.  All in all it was a great place for the price.

Great Location! Literally a 2 minute walk to the beach!  Super easy to catch the bus right by the tower to go to diamond head!

Me, my wife, and our two young (<1 and <3) had a great time. I would recommend this place for anyone willing to be cozy in the same room as there children.
Chris’s place was cute! Great location and all you need for a few nights in Waikiki!!
Great spot!
Great ! Thank so much!

Thanks Chris! This little apartment was perfect for us. Great value for budget travellers like us. One block from the Waikiki surf beach and close to surf board hire, cafes, night life and shopping. We loved having beach chairs, boogie boards and beach towels included!! The glimpse through to the ocean was a bonus too! Thanks so much.  Mahalo! 
We’ll be back!
Kate and Rob

The location is the biggest draw. It's cheap and in the middle of everything. The space itself is small, a bit downtrodden and not the tidyest. You have access to a small balcony which looks out to the ocean and the bigger hotels around Waikiki. A good place if you're on a budget.

You really can't beat this place for the location and amenities for the price that it is! It's the perfect little spot for 2 people. We stayed in Waikiki for 4 days, the last night, everything is conveniently located, and you are such a short walk from the beach! It was hot, but the AC worked wonders, and we were able to keep cool! The wifi worked great, and we enjoyed our ocean view from the Lanai. What a great stay!!
Chris's place was clean and cozy. It's conveniently close to the beach, great food and shopping. It's a great base to explore everything Waikiki, and ultimately O'ahu has to offer.

This well-loved and pretty condo is in a GREAT location!  Chris is a terrific host too. And what a fantastic price for a place in central Waikiki. While the building itself is older, the condo is great!  I really I appreciated all the thoughtful touches, like the dishes, beach equipment, table & chairs on the lanai where I could see the water, and the air conditioning!  A great bargain and a fun place to stay!
位置很棒,楼下很多吃的和商场,早晨偶尔有垃圾车的声音,两个人住刚刚好｡

This place was so cute, clean, and close to everything. The beach is just a block away, and you can walk to all of the great restaurants and shopping centers. Chris (the owner) is very accommodating and he will repond to you quickly if you have any questions. I definitely recommend staying at this place.
First time using airbnb and sum up as a great experience

name: Artsy Downtown Studio!
summary: Downtown, convenient, cosy and bright semi basement. It is both my home and art studio. Perfect for one but could fit 2 people. Near museums, bars, atwater metro and guy-concordia station. One street away from St-Catherine but surprisingly calm! Also; an equipped, separate kitchen + wifi is included.
space: Artsy and cosy; a live-in studio
description: Downtown, convenient, cosy and bright semi basement. It is both my home and art studio. Perfect for one but could fit 2 people. Near museums, bars, atwater metro and guy-concordia station. One street away from St-Catherine but surprisingly calm! Also; an equipped, separate kitchen + wifi is included. Artsy and cosy; a live-in studio Whole Studio; main room, seperate kitchen and bathroom with bathtub I won't be in town, but a friend will be my ambassador :) On the western edge of downtown in the lovely Shaughnessy Village, this neighbourhood is a street away from busy St-Catherine. Less than a kilmoter away from many museums, bars, restaurants, two different metro (subway) stations, parcs, bike paths, cafes, Concordia University and all the expected downtown shopping, movie theaters, as well as grocery stores, pharmacies, laundromats, banks and more. 2.5 kilometers to Mount Royal, 1.5 kilometer to the Lachine Canal and its amazing bike path and Atwater Market. Very close to Atwater Metr
neighborhood_overview: On the western edge of downtown in the lovely Shaughnessy Village, this neighbourhood is a street away from busy St-Catherine. Less than a kilmoter away from many museums, bars, restaurants, two different metro (subway) stations, parcs, bike paths, cafes, Concordia University and all the expected downtown shopping, movie theaters, as well as grocery stores, pharmacies, laundromats, banks and more. 2.5 kilometers to Mount Royal, 1.5 kilometer to the Lachine Canal and its amazing bike path and Atwater Market.
notes: There is no laundry within the building, but a laundromat is 1.5 streets away.
transit: Very close to Atwater Metro (subway) station, also Guy-Concordia station, Georges-Vanier station (one station from train station). Various bus routes, bike paths and bixi stations as well as taxi lines.
access: Whole Studio; main room, seperate kitchen and bathroom with bathtub
interaction: I won't be in town, but a friend will be my ambassador :)
house_rules: No parties, no events, just please respect the neighbours and the space

reviews.comments: Great spot. Small and cozy- perfect for one person. The hostess is friendly and welcoming. I had to leave early and she was very accomodating despite having arranged to only come back to the city after I had left.

Nous nous sommes sentis les bienvenus et Marie-Amelie était très disponible en cas de besoin. L'appartement correspond tout à fait à la description et la localisation est parfaite (rue résidentielle très calme à seulement quelques pas de Ste-Catherine). Nous y retournerions sans hésiter !

name: artra teracce room ................
summary: artra teracce room is in the historical old  istanbul area which easlyo can go to the centers of istanbul.     there is two teracce in the room one is at the side of room the other on the top ready for using
description: artra teracce room is in the historical old  istanbul area which easlyo can go to the centers of istanbul.     there is two teracce in the room one is at the side of room the other on the top ready for using

name: Berk Guesthouse Superior Double
summary: Berk is offering a cozy garden and a rooftop terrace with a great view of Istanbul, It is in Old Peninsula, SULTANAHMET, only One Block South To St. Sophia. All Touristic points are walking distance :)  Berk House has free Wi-Fi and Buffet Breakfast.
space: Berk is offering a cozy garden and a rooftop terrace with a great view of Istanbul (free entrance to our guests) , It is in Old Peninsula, SULTANAHMET, only One Block South To St. Sophia. All Touristic points are walking distance :)  Berk House has free Wi-Fi and Buffet Breakfast.
description: Berk is offering a cozy garden and a rooftop terrace with a great view of Istanbul, It is in Old Peninsula, SULTANAHMET, only One Block South To St. Sophia. All Touristic points are walking distance :)  Berk House has free Wi-Fi and Buffet Breakfast. Berk is offering a cozy garden and a rooftop terrace with a great view of Istanbul (free entrance to our guests) , It is in Old Peninsula, SULTANAHMET, only One Block South To St. Sophia. All Touristic points are walking distance :)  Berk House has free Wi-Fi and Buffet Breakfast. Our guests will be able to enjoy a great sea view combined with an amazing Blue Mosque and Hagia Sophia view at our Roof Terrace. Guests can enjoy breakfast in the courtyard, which is decorated with traditional pots and souvenirs. During sunset, the rooftop patio offers a romantic setting for a drink. Berk Hotel staff; is ready 7/24 to help you and make you feel yourself at home with a warm family touch. Many restaurants and cafés are situated just around the cor
neighborhood_overview: Many restaurants and cafés are situated just around the corner from Berk Hotel. Grand Bazaar is a 15-minute walk away, while Hagia Sophia can be reached in a 3-minute walk.  The Old Peninsula ( Sultanahmet ) is a great choice for travellers interested in museums, monuments and architecture. This is our guests' favourite part of Istanbul, according to independent reviews. (Website hidden by Airbnb) berkguesthouse
notes: Smoking is forbidden inside the Hotel. Check Out Time is 11 am sharp please.  24 hours luggage storage as required.
transit: Berk Guesthouse is located at the heart of İstanbul.  Our guests will have no doubts and concerns about travelling. We are just 5 minute walk from Sultanahmet Tram Station.
access: Our guests will be able to enjoy a great sea view combined with an amazing Blue Mosque and Hagia Sophia view at our Roof Terrace. Guests can enjoy breakfast in the courtyard, which is decorated with traditional pots and souvenirs. During sunset, the rooftop patio offers a romantic setting for a drink.
interaction: Berk Hotel staff; is ready 7/24 to help you and make you feel yourself at home with a warm family touch.
house_rules: Due to our Hotel Policy, we would like to inform our guests that; - No Pet's are allowed - Smoking is forbidden inside the rooms

name: Rustic Gaudí - Sagrada Família
summary: New, modern, bright and fully equipped. Has two bedrooms, one bathroom, living and kitchen,  a terrace and a balcony. Metro in 1 minute and Sagrada Familia at 5. Speed WIFI. Up to 5 people. Fully refurbished! You rent the whole apartment, not shared.
space: Modern, new and fully refurbished. Ideal location, 1 minute from the metro, 10 minutes from the streets of Gracia, and 5 of the Sagrada Familia. Walking distance to Paseo de Gracia (main monuments of Gaudí) in just 20 minutes and Plaza Catalunya in 30! The apartment is bright and comfortable, perfect for families, small groups or couples. A double bedroom with two single beds with private balcony and one single bedroom. The sofa bed in the lounge is new and wide! The kitchen is fully equipped with coffee machine, microwave, oven, ... and a NESPRESSo coffee machine also! You will also have hair dryer, iron and washing machine. Ah! and a large TV with DVD and some movies. We have Guides (also LONELY PLANET SPAIN!) Maps and Tourist Information. We understand cleanliness and guest service as the most important things. Me and my wife we are always available and we try to advice you the best on eating places, visits, ... Before your arrival, we always go over every detail. We are avid travel
description: New, modern, bright and fully equipped. Has two bedrooms, one bathroom, living and kitchen,  a terrace and a balcony. Metro in 1 minute and Sagrada Familia at 5. Speed WIFI. Up to 5 people. Fully refurbished! You rent the whole apartment, not shared. Modern, new and fully refurbished. Ideal location, 1 minute from the metro, 10 minutes from the streets of Gracia, and 5 of the Sagrada Familia. Walking distance to Paseo de Gracia (main monuments of Gaudí) in just 20 minutes and Plaza Catalunya in 30! The apartment is bright and comfortable, perfect for families, small groups or couples. A double bedroom with two single beds with private balcony and one single bedroom. The sofa bed in the lounge is new and wide! The kitchen is fully equipped with coffee machine, microwave, oven, ... and a NESPRESSo coffee machine also! You will also have hair dryer, iron and washing machine. Ah! and a large TV with DVD and some movies. We have Guides (also LONELY PLANET SPAIN!) Maps and Tourist Informatio
neighborhood_overview: In our opinion is the perfect place to stay in Barcelona! Crowded of shops, wineries, spanish ham shops, supermarkets just close tot the apartment; also close to the main tourist attractions and the Metro stop (just one block!). Also a bit apart of the most crowded and noisy areas. Be sure it's a perfect place to stay!!
notes: Somos un apartamento legal :) , con licencia turística HUTB, es por este motivo que los huéspedes que se alojen en nuestro apartamento deben abonar una tasa de 2,50€/persona/día (2,25€+IVA).  Dicha tasa no está incluida en el precio del alquiler y debe abonarse a la llegada al apartamento. Ley 5/2017 de la Generalitat de Catalunya, para estancias con entrada a partir del 1/4/2017.
transit: The Metro stop (Sant Pau Dos de Maig) is just at one minute walking. You have direct access to the Tourist Bus, and the main local Bus lanes (The beah, The Barceloneta, Camp Nou, ...); also served by night buses. But you can reach the most important places by walking!!
access: Al apartamento se alquila entero, y no se comparte con ningún otro viajero.
interaction: We'll get in touch some days before of your arrival, and we'll give you our 24h phone to help you on making your stay in Barcelona unforgettable!!
house_rules: Recordar que esto no es un hotel y que no hay señales ni carteles de ningún tipo en el exterior. Es un edificio en el que vive gente y familias, y donde algunos espacios han sido adaptados para turistas. Es por éste motivo que os pedimos amablemente que simplemente lo tengáis en cuenta! POR FAVOR ENVÍANOS TU HORA DE LLEGADA AL APARTAMENTO por demos adaptae-mail a (EMAIL HIDDEN) para saber cuando esperar vuestra llamada. La hora de llegada estándar (Check-In) es a las 15:00h. La hora de salida estándar es a las 11:00h. Somos flexibles peor si la llegada es mas tarde de las 10 de la noche tendrá un cargo de 30 euros

host.host_about:
Hi! Me and my husband Cesc, we are both teachers, prouds of our beautiful city. Our hobby? Our city! We try to know always the best places, the best plans, the best tips, ... just what your need to plan a special trip to Barcelona.

We take care of our apartment until every detail, and cleanliness is one of our maximum goals.

We are avid travellers, and is for this reason that we know exactly what you need when you are out of home.

We'll do our best to make your trip unforgettable!

reviews.comments: This nice and cozy apartment is located near Sagrada Familia. It has 2 bedrooms that are suitable for 2-3 people. The owners are really friendly and welcoming. A pleasant, recommended place.
Elisabet and Cesc have a great appartment, comfortable, in a great location. It's well equiped, clean and cosy. Thinking of visiting Barcelona again, it would be my first choice!
They made it realy uncomplicated to welcome us, especially when our flight was delayed an we couldn't be at the appartment on time. The appartment is nice and clean.

Cesc,  Elisabet's helpful and uncomplicated husband, welcomed us at the apartment and introduced us to the surrounding area and to their lovely flat, where we really felt comfortable and at home. The residence is perfectly placed in the centre of Barcelona (near Sagrada Familia, metro + bus stations), it's an excellent starting point for sight-seeing trips. Everything you need is nearby (bakery, restaurants, pharmacy, SuperMarket,  some shops and public transport). The bedrooms are located in the backyard, and were really quite (only at the first night the neighbours were ab bit noisy; the following nights we slept with opened window without problems. The bathroom is small, but cute and functional. In the kitchen nothing lacked to our needs. For 2-3 person and some couple of days/week  it's perfect, we would rent it again.  Everythink went well. Thanks to Elisabet & Cesc, best wishes.
Very nice, comfortable, clean and cosy appartement. Ideal location. Really nice and warm welcome thanks to the owners Elisabet & Cesc!!
Vår värd höll kontakt med oss via mail hela tiden. Helt perfekt. Då vi kom till Barcelona mötte han oss och var mycket hjälpsam och vi kunde nå honom lätt genom telefon under hela vistelsetiden.

Charmant appartement fidèle aux photos
Chambre au calme
Accueil chaleureux
Transports et commodités à proximités
Séjour très agréable

We enjoyed our stay in this apartment, the space was cosy and comfortable. Within walking distance to lots of Barcelona's attractions and super easy with the metro station. The bedroom was quiet for a restful sleep. Elisabet was a friendly host, we would recommend the apartment.

Thank you for sharing your apartment with us! It was very comfortable -- and perfect for our group of three. Elisabet and Cesc were very nice to work with. When we arrived (a little tired from the travel), Elisabet was very helpful in showing us the apartment. I found the larger bedroom great for sleeping -- back from the street and therefore nice and quiet. We enjoyed sitting in the living room together after a long day of walking and sightseeing. This was my first time using an airbnb apartment and I enjoyed feeling I was "at home" rather than at a hotel. I also really liked the neighbourhood. I felt that I was living among the locals and enjoyed picking up coffee in the local pastry shops. Although the apartment is located pretty close to the Sagrada Familia, I didn't feel I was in a touristy area. The apartment is very close to a couple of metro lines, and we used the metro a lot. It was fast and efficient -- and got us wherever we wanted to go in the city.

Great place to be!!!
Very warm welcome at 2am in the morning :-)
很好的居所,交通方便,房間整潔,空間寬敞,thank you for sharing the apartment, very nice place to stay, hope to see u soon

Una estancia genial, el apartamento muy bonito y acogedor a escasos 5 minutos de la Sagrada Familia y muy cerca del metro.

Sin duda para repetir!

Elisabet and Cesc are very helpful. The apartment is just as beautiful as in the photos. It's very well located in a safe area, close to sagrada familia and hospital sant pau. The metro is just 1 block away and we used that a lot. At night there are lots of delicious places to eat very close to the location. The only conns are the small bathroom, typical in this type of apartment,  and 2 single  beds in the bedroom instead of a double bed. It was very quiet at night. I recommend this lovely apartment :)

It was a really pretty nice and clean apartment like in the pictures. Everything you need like a supermarket, bank, restaurants is close by. Cesc our renter was really nice and reliable.
I would love to book this apartment the next time again.

Very nice lady. Very patient to explain every questions. We arrived late, so Elisabet's father wait for us and open the door. The apartment is convenient to go everywhere. The facility is quite good. Recommend it.
Great appartment! Just perfect ...

Our experience at this apartment couldn't have been any better. Cesc arrived later to meet us and explained the area and apartment to us. All the amenities are there and we easily felt at home. The apartment itself is ideally located as there are very good travel links nearby (metro and bus) and it's also a 5 minute walk from the Sagrada Familia. I would highly recommend this place to stay - it was perfect!

Nous avons passé une magnifique semaine à Barcelone! 
Et quel plaisir, après avoir parcouru la Ville de long en large de se retrouver dans ce havre de paix qu'est l'appartement d'Eisabet (nous y étions pendant la deuxième quinzaine du mois d'août).
L'appartement est véritablement idéalement situé, proche des stations de Métro et proche de nombreuses commodités (boulangerie, supermarché, restaurants).
Accueil parfait .... avec le grand grand grand sourire de Cesc!

Un superbe séjour dans l'appartement d'Elisabeth. Nous avons été extrêmement bien accueillis. L'appartement est très bien situés proche du métro du bus des commerces et des restaurants :). De plus les chambres sont au calme ce qui est important à Barcelone !

My visit at Elisabet & Cesc's place was perfect to see any of Barcelona or just relax into the culture of the neighborhood.
Elisabet accommodated me by letting me come early and Cesc took me to the airport 4 days later.
Excellent food from coffee to paella and grilled meat and veggies all near by. 
The apt is clean and cozy with all the necessities. Very nice kitchen and able to do some laundry!
Plenty of information with maps and I felt safe ....
I hope to come back someday thank you

We had a really good time in Elisabet's apartment! She and her husband gave us a lot of information to make our trip wonderful. The apartment is comfortable with all necessities, making me feel at home! Also, it is located well!! I would strongly recommend this apartment for stay in Barcelona

Excellent spot- one of the highlights of our trip to Europe and Asia. Spacious and fun space in superior neighborhood. The hosts were very helpful and made sure we were taken care of. I had inadvertently broke the toilet and they were very helpful to make sure everything was okay.

We were greeted by Cesc - Elisabet's husband. He speaks perfect English and was very welcoming and friendly, taking the time to give us a tour of the apartment and making sure we were well oriented in the neighborhood complete with a customized map showing all the local attractions as well as the nearest supermarkets. He also told us about a nearby cafe that was amazing! The apartment was super clean and looks exactly like the pictures - very nice place to stay. I would definitely stay again. And the location is absolutely perfect!

The flat is nice and located near the metro station (150mt). The living room is really cosy but in general the flat seems to be renewed without too much details and attention. The rest of the flat is  not tidy as the living-room and the bedroom are a bit poor of furnishing. It's worth for price/quality rate (i've paied 90 per night all included).

Rustic Gaudi was very much as pictured. It is recently renovated, tastefully simple, and a very good base for exploring Barcelona. The apartment is only one floor up and there is a teeny lift we used to hoist our heavy baggage up and down. The neighborhood is excellent - all services you could desire. The apartment is surprisingly quiet for a city apartment. You are a five minute walk from the Gaudi Cathedral.  We were met as promised so the entry was smooth. Something didn't work right with subsequent communication as we never heard back from the hosts to our email and messages while we were there but there were no urgent issues so it didn't adversely impact our experience.
Increible la atención, muy amables y el departamento mejor de lo que esperabamos. Muy comodo ideal!
Excellent accueil. appartement conforme à nos attentes. quartier résidentiel à 2 pas de la Sagrada. A recommander.
Appartement très bien situé. Dormir dans le salon était sans doute plus difficile, car plus bruyant.
Le logement avait été bien décrit. Très bon emplacement

This was a very comfortable property! Cesc was a perfect host and we fell in love with the neighborhood!  We were a little embarrassed by the cash tourist fee needed when we checked in but Cesc let us pay when we left. The place was nicer than the pics and we had a nice stay!

Elisabet and her husband Cesc were welcoming. They were at the apartment when we arrived, putting the final touches on the apartment. It is a very cozy apartment with two bed rooms and three total mattresses. The location is great, just down the road from the metro and the Sagrada Familia. We had a nice comfortable stay and couldn't have asked for anything more. Cesc was also very nice and gave us a map and directions and places to check out! Would definitely recommend this place!

Es un apartamento muy simpatico, también muy tranquilo aunque en el corazón del barrio de la Sagrada y San Pau. Tiene todo lo que necesita y está limpio y listo para vivir una Navidad de calidad. Las fotos refletan bien la realidad y el anfitrión, Cesc, es un chico estupendo, amable, trata con mucha atención los huéspedes y responde rápido a todas la preguntas. Entre las experiencias de airbnb en Barcelona, el Rustic Gaudí es la mejor! Una dirección a mantener en el futuro para todos los amigos que visitan Barcelona. Gracias Cesc y Elisabet!

Ótimo lugar para ficar. Muito bem limpo bem (Website hidden by Airbnb) 2 varandas, ótima localização e 5 minutos do metrô. O anfitrião foi muito cuidadoso e muito prestativo, mesmo alugando no mesmo dia, com 1 hora de antecedência, o apartamento se encontrava limpo e perfumado. Deu várias informações do bairro com mapas e pontos turísticos. Ótima sala de estar, cozinha bem equipada e o quarto do casal muito bom com camas duplas unidas bem confortáveis, apenas usamos 1 quarto. Apenas não gostei de serem 2 camas unidas no quarto do casal, faz um pequeno vão entre elas. Bairro tranquilo e seguro, possui estacionamento a metros de distância. Parabéns pelo apartamento e pela recepção. Recomendo sem medo.
Great location, safe area, attentive landlord & landlady, neat  apartment.

Le logement correspond exactement aux photos. Il est spacieux et lumineux très adapté à des vacances en famille. 

Le quartier est calme et le parking privé situé à proximité (payant) est très pratique.

A friendly welcome from Elisabet and Cesc, who kindly pointed out great places to eat and left us with a lonely planet guide to explore. The apartment is spotless, with some great character features, and is in a great location which was the perfect base for our visit to Barcelona.

Cesc had a great command of the English language and was very friendly and accommodating.The apartment was just as described on the website, if not actually better. Beautiful modern decor with lots of wood and brilliant storage. Comfortable beds and the bedroom was wonderfully quiet despite the location on a busy intersection. Shower was nice and hot. Kitchen really good, easy to use and clean. A perfect apartment!

This is a convenient value priced rental , best for a couple , or a couple and one to two children . landlord was very helpful and met us for late evening checkin. Great neighborhood feel , with Avenida Gaudi  ( no cars ) out (Website hidden by Airbnb) an easy stroll to Sagrada Familia

시설도 매우 깨끗했으며 위치도 조용하고 만족스러웠습니다. 
그 무엇보다 낯선 여행객에 호스트께서 매우 친절하고 충실하게 안내해주셔서 저를 비롯한 가족들은 매우 고맙게 생각합니다. 멋진 스페인 바르셀로나를 경험할 수 있게 해주셔서 감사합니다.

We had a lovely welcome to the flat and the area from Cesc. We hadn't realised that we would be so central to some of Barcelona's fabulous buildings but ended up walking to many of them. All of Cesc's recommendations were spot on and that meant we could really enjoy a bit of Catalan life for a few days. The flat was very comfortable and had all that we needed. Elisabet and Cesc were on hand if we had any queries and were warm and friendly hosts. We would love to go back.

We were made very welcome when we arrived at Rustic Gaudi. Cesc was very helpful and spent time explaining the local area and good places to visit. We had an excellent paella at one of the restaurants he recommended. The apartment is homely and well equipped and really convenient for the metro.

Great cozy apartment very close to the Sagrada Familia but also in a quiet neighborhood. Perfect for a couple of days of sightseeing and eating out. The beds are nice and firm, the bathroom is small but completely outfitted, and the place was incredibly clean. It might be more difficult for those staying longer who want to cook a lot at home. There is no kettle or major range of utensils. It's more of a perfect place for breakfast and afternoon/evening meals out, which if you're visiting Barcelona, you should do anyway. There's a great tapas place around the corner called Firo Tast. So good, and pretty reasonable! Also, I was visiting BCN with my dad, who arrived on an earlier flight than me, and Elisabet and Cesc were both very accommodating about meeting him when he arrived.

Beautiful apartment! We thoroughly enjoyed the space, terrace, and kitchen.  It was fun to explore a new neighborhood in Barcelona. Would definitely recommend Elisabet's apartment to friends and family.

The apartment was lovely and a perfect size for five people. The two separate bedrooms gave everyone enough space. The apartment is a short walk from Sagrada Familia, which was absolutely spectacular. Elisabet's husband was there upon our arrival to show us the apartment and give us recommendations for food and drink in the area. Overall, a great experience!

Our stay was perfect! Elizabet's husband Cesc met us as promised and told us all about the apartment and the neighborhood. The apartment was airy and very comfortable and the neighborhood was a great location to eat and shop and do our sightseeing.  A wonderful Barcelona experience.  I would recommend this apartment to everyone.

We enjoyed staying at Rustic Gaudi. Elizabeth's husband Cesc met us and made us feel immediately at home in Barcelona.  The apartment was clean and comfortable and we felt the premises was very secure.  It was very quiet at night.  The neighbourhood has all the shops you'll need and is convenient for transport around the city.
Brilliant location and apartment. So close to Sagrada Familia and a short metro ride to the other fabulous sites in Barcelona. We loved every thing about the place and would definitely return here!

Gorgeous little apartment in the perfect location. Cesc and Elisabet have made a lovely job of setting up this charming apartment to meet all the needs of a home away from home. Cesc met us on arrival and made us very welcome with lots of information on the best places to visit. The location of the apartment is perfect, only a very short walk to Sagrada Familia the metro, restaurants and other sites of interest.

Elisabets very welcoming husband Cesc met us at the apartment and had some great tips for our stay. Fx Puiggros around the corner for breakfast. We ended up going there every morning for four days. They make the most amazing croissants :-) 
The apartment fit the description and was perfect for us. We would definately recommend staying in the apartment.

Elisabet's husband Cesc met us at the apartment and made us feel very welcome, he also equipped us with lots of useful information for our visit. The apartment was exactly as described, well equipped and clean. The surrounding area was great, very handy for the metro and full of good bakeries and nice places for a glass of beer and a bit of people watching - there's a big supermarket very close too. We were in Barcelona for Primavera so it was great to have a nice homely place to relax, but we also had a few extra days to enjoy more of the city - a brilliant holiday and a great place to stay!

If you're looking for a place in Barcelona and this flat is available then book it now!! The location is superb! The bedrooms incredibly quiet and beds comfortable. Your hosts will bend over backwards to assist with all your needs!!

Elisabet met us at the doorway to the apartment, over an hour late. We had trouble figuring out the buses, and didn't arrive on time. We had a cute little elevator, and the apartment was on the second floor, with little balconies front and back. We were able to make ourselves at home, and enjoyed the little kitchen, two bedrooms and the location was terrific. The apartment was clean, and relatively quiet at night. We felt good about being at the place, and Elisabet had reassured us that if we were to need something we could call. The apartment is furnished with linens and a towel each, and while simple and spartan, had most everything we could want. We enjoyed a lovely week there.
