We were not 5 people, and I would hesitate to put five people in, with two on the pull out, but it could be done. We loved the outdoor evening activities, so lively, within walking, and the  close and convenient bus service that Barcelona offers.

Die Unterkunft ist gut gelegen. Es gibt mehrere kleine Supermärkte, Shops aller Art und viele Cafés und Restaurants in der direkten Umgebung. Man geht nur 5 Minuten bis zur Sagrada. Selbst zu den Ramblas kann man gehen (dauert ca. 40 Minuten). Obwohl die Wohnung zentral gelegen ist, kann man nachts ruhig schlafen, da beide Schlafzimmer zum Innenhof hin ausgerichtet sind.
Der Gastgeber war sehr freundlich und hilfsbereit. Die Kommunikation hat sehr gut geklappt.

Location, location, location.  Close to all transit, connecting to routes all over city.  Safe, lovely neighborhood with wonderful small restaurants, shops, bakeries, and markets right there.  Great outdoor restaurant seating on tree lined boulevard.  A true taste of a Barcelona neighborhood and culture.  Apartment was clean and comfortable.

Elisabet's husband welcomed us. Information about the area about shops and eating places were also provided. The neighbourhood was reasonably quiet during  the night. Great to be so close to the Sagrada Familia.
Accueil parfait (en français...) , chaleureux et de très bon conseil ( alimentation, stationnement et site principaux à visiter). Un seule envie : y revenir pour profiter à nouveau de Barcelone!

Nous avons été reçus par le mari d'Elisabet qui était très aimable et enjoué, et parlait très bien le français ! L'appartement est ravissant et fonctionnel ! les deux balcons sont un véritable plus ! l'appartement est également très bien situé, avec en bonus le parking en face de la porte, ce qui est assez précieux !

Appartement très agréable à vivre et très bien situé. L'aération naturelle grâce aux deux portes fenêtres a été une vraie bénédiction en plein mois d'août !  Pour l'utilisation du parking en face, attention les grandes voitures (4x4..) ne rentreront pas et prendre une carte forfait 5 ou 7 jours, sinon le parking sera très très cher ! Voir avec le gardien très sympa qui parle anglais également. Quartier très agréable, Barcelone est à découvrir et à vivre. Nous reviendrons !

The apartment is in a family neighborhood, a very short walk to La Sagrada Familia!    An easy commute via taxi or city bus to any part of Barcelona.  A nice neighborhood to walk around.  The owners gave us great recommendations for buying food at the local charcuterie and bakery.

Elisabeths husband did the late check in and was very friendly. He gave some good tips about the lovely bakery around the corner and where to find the metro, supermarket and things like that. And he was just very enthusiastic, which made me feel happy:)

Wir haben uns in der Wohnung wohlgefühlt und die unmittelbare Nachbarschaft mit den kleinen Cafés und Restaurants geschätzt.
Die Gastgeber Elisabet und Cesc waren sehr hilfsbereit und freundlich. Wir empfehlen die Unterkunft weiter!

We had an amazing time in Barcelona! Elisabet & Cesc were friendly, easy to communicate with & quick to respond to our queries. The apartment is in an excellent position, so close to La Sagrada Familia, metro & buses, supermarkets, shops & restaurants - we couldn't have asked for more convenience! The apartment had everything we needed, was clean & tidy and very quiet once you closed up at night. Thank you Elisabet & Cesc!!!

Elisabet y Cesc son encantadores, la comunicación fue muy fácil y el apartamento era tal y como se muestra en las fotos. Fuimos a Barcelona por un viaje de trabajo tres personas y la experiencia fue inmejorable. La zona es tranquila pero tiene todas las comodidades cerca: supermercados, bares, restaurantes, transporte... Había toallas limpias para los tres y en general todo estaba perfectamente ordenado y limpio.
La única pega podría ser que no había gel y champú en la ducha, algo que sería útil, pero en comparación con todo lo bueno, es algo insignificante.
¡Volvería y lo recomiendo completamente!

Wir wurden sehr nett von von Elisabet und ihrer Familie empfangen und auch insgesamt war die Kommunikation und die Organisation der Schlüsselübergabe etc. sehr gut.
Die Wohnung befindet sich in einem Altbau und hat einen speziellen Charme, der mich etwas an meine Studentenzeit erinnert hat. Wir haben uns jedenfalls im Großen und Ganzen sehr wohl gefühlt.
住宅地址很好就在市中心,距离地铁站和公交站都很近,步行5分钟距离内｡房间布置很干净很温馨~主人法语英语都说的很好!但是地处市中心晚上有一点吵

Cesc and Elisabet were FANTASTIC hosts. Very helpful and always there at the end of the phone to help. Great location and lovely spacious apartment.
Thanks for having us!
Great apt, great location, excellent hosts

Appartement très bien situé dans un quartier animé au niveau boutiques mais c'est aussi un quartier calme. Bien desservi au niveau métro et bus. L'appartement n'est pas très grand mais bien équipé au niveau couchage. Parfait pour un séjour touristique.

Mi padre y yo estuvimos 8 días hospedados en el piso de Elisabet y Cesc y no pudimos haber elegido mejor! La ubicación es excelente, todos los servicios están en los alrededores y está muy bien comunicado. Hay varios monumentos maravillosos a los que todos deben ir para hacer de su visita una memorable! Cesc nos proporcionó un mapa muy atinado y nos dió un montón de tips y consejos muy apropiados. 

Lo recomendamos enormemente!!, sin dudarlo volveríamos a hospedarnos aquí!! (Esperamos volver pronto!) 

Lucía y Juan Diego.

Very cute apartment with nice accommodations. Great communication and response time with the owners. Perfect location--within a short walking distance of La Sagrada Familia, the metro, and many restaurants, stores, and bars. I would definitely stay here again! :)

Hi! It is a pretty apartment. It is very quiet. It is close to the tube system and in walking distance of Sagarda familia and park guell and a great bakery. It is good value. But the bathroom is very small. The beds are OK for a short break. If you visit in winter you might be cold in the evenings and morning as there is no central heating and only little electric heaters. Barcelona is great!
Very well located! Close to the Sagrada familia and metro station. The apartment was very chic and so cute! Loved it.

Cesc and Elisabet's place was a perfect stay for our time in Barcelona. Great location very close to Sagrada, transit and the place is very clean and cozy and has everything you need. Cesc even came back with a baby cot for our daughter which was super helpful. I would definitely recommend staying at their place!
Nice place to stay, just in the centre of Barcelona.
Great location. Tidy apartment with everything you need.
Muy bien ubicada !

We loved our stay at this apartment! The Sagrada Familia is just a short walk away. There are tons of shops and places to eat, have tapas and drinks or dessert right outside your door. The metro is also very close which is helpful. It's a lively area but it was never noisy so it was a perfect combination. Elisabeth and Cesc were wonderful to work with and were so helpful. Barcelona is a beautiful city with so much to do! We cannot wait to come back and would recommend this apartment to anyone who wants to visit.
Very nice stay
Un trato excelente y los dueños majisimos. Una estancia muy agradable
A nice apartment in a great location.  Perfect for the Sagrada Familia and very close to the brilliant metro.  Elisabet was a very good host, she made it very easy and welcoming. Thank you!
A great apartment, in a great location.  Cesc was very welcoming and friendly.  Quiet, clean and accessible.  Everything you could need.
Chouette appartement à proximité de la Sagrada Familia, des transports. Idéal pour visiter Barcelone. parking en face pratique pour stationner.
Good and clean appartment, very friendly host

Great location, close to the Sagrada Familia and the Metro station. 

Quiet neighbourhood.

The flat is beautiful and it has everything one needs for a stay.

Good WiFi connection.

It was easy to contact the owners, Cesc and Elisabet.

Thank you so much Elisabet and Cesc for this wonderful apartment! The location is great, just 5 minutes from the Sagrada Familia and lots of bakeries and restaurants even closer. We could even walk to the Park Guell and Placa Catalunya within 30 minutes. 
The location was the perfect size for the 2 of us and it had really lovely character.
Thank you to Elisabet for answering all of my questions prior to the stay so quickly, and to Cesc for meeting us on arrival, showing us around the apartment and advising us on local knowledge...the bakery you sent us to was great!!
An amazing stay in Barcelona and we would stay here again. Thank you!

Elisabet and Cesc were really nice, the apartment was clean and in an area with a lot of cafes and restaurants to go for a meal or a stroll in the evening. Metro and bus stations are close by and in 15min you're in the centre. Also close in walking distance are la sagrada familia and Sant Pau Art Nouveau Site!
Altogether we had a really nice stay and would definitely stay there again!

Great apartment and great location! Easily can walk to all the famous spots in Barcelona and it's a quick cab ride to the beach! Apartment was a great size and Elisabet was an awesome host. I would definitely stay here again when I come back to Barcelona!

The host is very friendly and helpful. We had a great time staying in their apartment. Most importantly, the location is perfect and in a residential zone which means very safe. The sanity is also good. Highly recommended!
非常推薦給大家,地點好,乾淨舒適安全,而且房子很溫馨,回到公寓很放鬆!

Es un apartamento muy bien ubicado, desde el cual se puede ir caminando hasta la Sagrada Familia y muy rapido en metro o en bus al Park Guell y a la Plaza de Cataluña. La estación de metro queda a una cuadra.  El apartamento está muy bien dotado, cuenta con closets, tendidos de cama y toallas, sillas, tv, sofas y todos los elementos de cocina necesarios. El wifi es excelente. El edificio cuenta con un pequeño ascensor lo cual es muy bueno si traes maletas pesadas. El apartamento ha sido remodelado, sin embargo, es antiguo por lo que huele a humedad y hace frio en las noches. La segunda habitación no cuenta con una persiana oscura, por lo que entra la luz durante la noche y queda hacia el lado interno del edificio por lo que facilmente se oyen los ruidos de los vecinos. Los dueños son amables, faciles de contactar y responden rapidamente a las dudas previas a la llegada por correo.
Appartement calme, malgré sa situation urbaine. Il se trouve  à deux pas de Sant Pau et de la Sagrada Familia. Près du métro et autres des transports en commun. Super.

Cannot thank Elisabet and Cesc enough for their flat - what a gem! The space was amazing, well-equipped, and perfect for what we needed (a place for 5 girls to use as a base and unwind after manic days of sight seeing and beaching). The decor was fab, the place was so clean and had everything we needed - and the balcony was to die for! Elisabet & Cesc were so helpful with check in from start to finish. Thank you!
Very good location

Elisabet and Cesc were great hosts - Cesc met us at the apartment later in the evening & gave us some info and also told us to call him if there were any problems. The apartment was charming and had all the essentials required for our stay. It was also in a perfect part of Barcelona very close to Sagrada familia & close to metro and bus stops. Whilst there was a small problem in the apartment Cesc immediately came & rectified it. I would recommend the apartment to others wanting to see this beautiful city. Thanks Elisabet & Cesc.

Warm and charming apartment that's been remodeled with many lovely and thoughtful details in older residential neighborhood in Barcelona. Close to public transportation and an easy walk to La Sagrada Familia. Cesc and Elisabet were wonderfully friendly and helpful hosts and we felt very much at home in their apartment.

Elisabeth's house was beautiful! In a great location. Only about 2.5 blocks away from the metro and a 10 walk from Sagrada Familia. It was also close to Park Güell. There's much to see, do, and way in the neighborhood. My only issue with this was at times the noise level was high. And the beds weren't very comfortable. They creaked a lot. Other than that this place is ideal for a weekend trip with friends or family.

Die Wohnung war sehr schön. Die Lage ist optimal. Nah zur Sagrada familia, aber trotzdem in einem normalen Wohngebiet. Es gibt Supermärkte in der Nähe, Metro- und Busstationen und direkt vor der Haustür auch ein Parkhaus, und natürlich Restaurants und Bars.
Barcelona ist eine tolle Stadt voller Kultur und immer einen Besuch wert. Trotz der vielen Touristen, zu denen wir natürlich auch gehört haben. Vielen Dank noch einmal an Elisabet und ihre Familie.

L'appartement est idéalement situé.  Un parking à proximité, tout comme le métro. L'appartement est très propre et bien agence. L'accueil est chaleureux et convivial. Une belle adresse pour découvrir Barcelone

It is a detail but more electrical plugs are needed in the bedrooms.
Some bowls for the breakfast may be they were there but we could not find them 

There is a Nespresso machine so bring your capsules 
All minor points we enjoyed the place and the host were very kind an more than helpful 

Marc
Great communication. Perfect location, would not hesitate to stay again. Loved the area.

Highly recommended apartment. Excellent location near Sagrada Familia, convenient location from the metro, very easy to get anywhere in the city. Very clean, spacious and comfortable. The pics and descriptions are accurate.

Elisabet and Cesc are great hosts, they are always in communication before, during and after your trip. They answer any questions you may have and are a pleasure to work with. 

Next time I'm in Barcelona this will be my first choice of where to stay.

Elisabet and Cesc were wonderful and helpful hosts. They answered all our questions and waited up for us even when our flight was delayed and we arrived very late at night. The apartment itself was clean and spacious enough for all our needs - the living room with the balcony doors opening up to the streets outside was our favourite. There were no surprises - everything was as it appears in the pictures. The location was great - a super short walk to one metro station literally just around the corner, and a five minute walk to two others. Good bus connections in the area as well. Supermarkets and bakeries right across the street, so we could wake up every day and go buy fresh bread for our breakfast. We would definitely recommend it to everyone looking for a clean, comfortable place in a central location.

It was a pleasure to stay at Elisabet's beautiful apartment. It was excellently located (a short walk from the Sagrada Familia), clean and tidy and had everything we needed for our stay.  The flat has a cosy, 'homely' feel and the decor is very tasteful. 
We were most impressed by our hosts who were friendly and accommodating. 
We would love to stay at Elisabet's apartment again whenever we are back in Barcelona. 
Thank you for having us!

Very nice place, sensational location. Great host communication and help too!!! 
Will absolutely stay again.
청결하고 호스트가 주변 정보를 제공해 주었고, 비행기 시간으로 새벽에 체크아웃할때 택시를 예약해주었음. 사그리다 파밀리아 도보 8분. 메르카도나 도보3분.

We absolutely loved this apartment and had a great holiday in Barcelona. The flat was perfectly placed for exploring the city and Elisabet and Cesc were really helpful before we arrived and once we were there, we would definately recommend staying here.
The hosts are very nice. The flat is clean, centrally located near public transportation and major attractions, it has all essential appliances.  The mattresses require an upgrade.

Very nice and complete apartment located at walking distance from La Sagrada Familia, restaurants, and cafes. There are metro and bus stations close by, which make moving around Barcelona really easy. There are taxis too, but riding the metro is itself a great experience. When you stay here, ask Elisabet or Cesc for their recommendations on places to eat, they will suggest authentic restaurants to experience amazing Catalan food. Overall, we enjoyed our stay and the hosts' kindness.

This is a convenient location to explore Barcelona. Neat, tidy and cute, rustic as in description. We had four people which could be accommodated but it is more ideal for two or three especially as bathroom/toilet is very small.

There was no spare toilet paper and we couldn't find the sheeting for fourth person but Elisabet and Cesc responded very quickly to all our queries and sheeting was provided within in an hour.

Wifi access was really easy and good and this was helpful, flexibility was provided with leaving luggage in the apartment after check out time and hosts checked in to make sure we arrived and got in safely.

There is lift access to the apartment but please note the lift is very small ie can only fit one large suitcase and one person at one time! 

Overall, it was a very good value stay and met our needs in a nice area and handy location to amenities, restaurants shops, tourist sites and public transport with communicative hosts in Elisabet and Cesc.
Siamo state molto bene, la casa è in un quartiere molto bello e vicinissimo alla Sagrada Familia. La casa nel complesso è carina, il bagno abbastanza piccolo, ma per il resto siamo state contente

We recommend this place for a stay in Barcelona. It is very centrally located, and you will find everything you need just around the corner. The appartment is charming and well equipped. The bathroom was quite small, but this was not a problem for us as a family of four. Cesc gave us a warm welcome and gave us a lot of information of things to do and where to eat. We appreciated that.
Heel knus typisch appartement in de grootstad. Heel dicht bij Sagrada Familia.

Entre amis, nous avons passé un très bon séjour dans cet appartement charmant et bien situé. Il y a tout autour, métro, commerces, bars, restaurants, et bien sûr la Sagrada Familia. 
Les hôtes sont à l'écoute et disponibles, merci encore !
Excelente ubicación, apartamento limpio y con todas las comodidades. Muy recomendable.
I love this cozy apartment, easy traffic to all tourism and helpful advise form Cesc. Good and smart choice here.
A very good place to stay!
Really enjoyed our time here, helpful local info, friendly and welcoming. Would happily stay here again.
Appartement tres agréable à vivre , très bien situé et desservi , je recommande !!

Great location and a lovely apartment! Elisabet and her husband were very nice and helpful :) 
The place has everything you need and just outside there are lots of restaurants, cafe's, groceries etc. Metro station is about 5 min walk. 
It really felt like home away form home for us- we used the kitchen and even did our laundry there. Thanks again for a lovely stay!
Nous avons passé un très bon séjour à Barcelone chez Elisabet, l'appartement est très propre et super fonctionnel !
Clean,great location, Elisabet and her husband were very helpful. Lots of good restaurants near by.

Elisabet and Cesc were the most helpful and hospitable hosts!  Their check-in time was reasonable, and when we got there, Cesc gave us wonderful recommendations for food, wine, and activities.  We had no idea that we had booked this trip right in the middle of one of the biggest festivals in Barcelona (La Merce), and he told us of all the great free events going on.  Elisabet even went the extra mile, and booked a taxi for us for our (very) early morning flight as we did not have phone service.  We really appreciated their hospitality.

The flat  is a great location,  very tastefully  furnished and decorated and had everything I needed. 
The hosts were the very essence of Airbnb - welcoming, informative  and interesting.

The host family are really enthusiastic!And their babies are so cute!The house is modern and super clean. My most favourite thing is the view of front balcony. If come back to Barcelona someday, I will choose here again.

Great location, which is near Sagrada Familia, buses and metro stations, bars and restaurants... And very peaceful and silence area for staying there. Thanks for Elisabet's father very kindly guide for checking in. There's a remind for someone who wants get public transit from airport. The easier way to get there is Train - Metro(L5). The train station is near Terminal 2. If u arrive in T1, take the transfer bus to T2B, U will find where the train station is.

We really liked this place, which is clean, cute, quiet and in a great location.
The hosts are very friendly and helpful. We highly recommend this place!

This is a perfectly located apartment in an historic building, which provided gorgeous hardwood floors, a beautiful brick ceiling, and natural air flow from the double balconies.  The living room balcony opens to the street, with the accompanying street noise, which we loved during the day, and closed out at night.  Because the main bedroom in this two bedroom apartment has a balcony to the quiet interior courtyard, we could leave it open for air without noise.  The bed was pretty uncomfortable and wiggled on the frame with any movement, but there was a nice closet and a full-length mirror in the room.  The kitchen is nicely laid out, as is the bathroom.  The bathroom is a tight squeeze between the toilet and the cabinet, and the entry door only opens to about 15 inches, but is just fine for an average size person and the cabinet had enough space for our toiletries.
Отличное место, все достаточно близко, удобные апартаменты. Вне сезона достаточно холодно ночью, запасайтесь тёплыми вещами! :)
Perfect location for visiting Barcelona
Très bon situation, appartement fonctionnel, au calme , chaleureux , à deux pas de la  segrada.

Elisabet & Ceske’s apartment Is located nearby Sagrada Familia.  There are loads of cafes, bakeries and places to eat.  The Metro is about a 5 minute walk from the apartment.  The amount of space throughout the apartment was perfect, with the exception of the bathroom, which was a bit small.
We were there in November, so we very much appreciated the automatic turn on/turn off heat pump, which made spending time in the living/dining room area very comfortable.  The kitchen facilities were fine.  The bedroom was very comfortable when the portable radiator was turned on in the evening.

Hallo, die Wohnung liegt super zentral, mit Bus und Metro gut zu erreichen, sehr ruhig, bis auf eine Nacht, da kam Technomusik bis in die Morgenstunden  irgendwo her. Außer dem ist um die Ecke ein super tolle Frühstückcaffee.

L'appartement est bien situé, proche de la Sagrada Familia. Très propre et fonctionnel. Correspond à l'annonce. Elisabet et Cesc ont bien voulu nous remettre les clés plus tôt ce qui a été très gentil de leur part et nous bien conseillé pour le quartier.

Très bien pour tout
Vivement conseillé

It is a lovely and charming place.  My daughter and I had a wonderful stay.  We look forward to getting back there and would definitely stay again.  Both Elisabet and Cesc were very responsive if we needed anything.  Thank you again for being gracious guests.

We had a lovely stay at this stylish apartment - Lovely hosts and easy check in. Only minor issue was the Wi-Fi wasn't working, and the apartment can be a little cold, but heaters are provided. Definately reccomend.

Ich mag es absolut nicht, schlechte Bewertungen abzugeben, doch in diesem Fall bin ich gezwungen! Das war die siebte Unterkunft in Folge, auf unserer Spanienreise. Die Wohnung von Elisabet ist eine Absteige und das Geld nicht wert! Wir sind sehr enttäuscht und haben die Unterkunft nach einer Nacht verlassen, obwohl wir 3 Nächte bezahlt haben. Es roch unheimlich penetrant und durchdringend nach künstlichem „Jasminduft“, wohl von einem überdosierten Raumspray..! Grauenhaft! Die Wohnung verfügt zwar über eine Klimaanlage im Wohnzimmer und über je einen portablen Heizkörper in den Schlafzimmern, doch war es nicht möglich, diese auf eine angenehme Zimmertemperatur zu kriegen, es war deutlich unter 20 Grad Celsius, für Februar ein NO GO! Die Sauberkeit allgemein lässt zu wünschen übrig. Die Küche war schmuddelig, die Frottétücher zwar gewaschen aber stinkig. Vorhänge und Sofaüberwurf haben ebenfalls schlecht gerochen. Überall viel Staub unter den Betten, in den Ecken und unter dem Fernsehmöbel, hier wurde, wenn überhaupt, nur sehr oberflächlich gereinigt! Auf den Fotos im Inserat wird geflunkert. Die Fenster im Zimmer mit einem Bett, der Küche, dem Bad und dem Entree gehen in das Treppenhaus, es gibt also kein Tageslicht und keine Luft. Was an dieser Unterkunft gut ist, ist die Lage und das WLAN. Zusammengefasst, ein Flop, nicht empfehlenswert.
Added to our special stay in Barcelona! Close to everything and very concerned about making your trip as great as possible... THANKS
Superb appartment  in safe and convenient  part of city.  Stylish, comfortable and immaculately clean.  Good value for money.  Highly recommended .
지하철이 아주 가깝고 근처에 아주 저렴한 슈퍼가 있습니다. 시설도 상당히 깔끔합니다.
The place is decorated beautifully. I really enjoyed my stay. And they were very patient with me.

Die Unterkunft ist zentral gelegen und gut erreichbar. Die Schlüsselübergabe erfolgte unkompliziert nach detaillierter Anweisung unserer Gastgeber in einem nahe gelegenen Café. Die Wohnung war für unsere Bedürfnisse ausreichend eingerichtet und mit allen wichtigen Utensilien ausgestattet; die beiden Balkone liegen sowohl zur Straßenseite als auch zum ruhigen Hof hin, so dass gut gelüftet werden kann. Besonders toll fanden wir das warme Bettzeug (für verwöhnte Märzmenschen), nicht ganz optimal das quietschende Einzelbett, weshalb der dritte (erwachsene) Gast lieber auf dem Sofa übernachtete - was als Alternative super funktioniert hat. Zur Zeit ist nebenan eine Baustelle und daher mit Baulärm zu rechnen. Barcelona ist eine tolle Stadt mit tollen Menschen und lässt sich auch zu Fuß gut erkunden; unser Tipp: jenseits der Touristenattraktionen durch die Viertel oberhalb von Eixample schlendern und entspannen.
Nice apartment, conveniently located. Thanks Elisabet!
It was a very lovely comfortable place to stay situated in one of the best possible neighborhoods in Barcelona.

Everything was totally nice. Both are very friendly and they try to help in all situations. Elisabet gave us also some
Tipps for tappas and bars. We would book the apartment again!

Elisabet and Cesc are thoughtful and attentive hosts, with a well equipped apartment and plenty of local knowledge. The apartment is very comfortable and close to shops, restaurants, metro and of course Sagrada Familia. It’s quiet at night too, which meant we all slept well. Thank you Elisabet and Cesc - we had a wonderful time!
Clean apartment, very friendly, great calm location super close to Sagrada Familia!

Stayed 4 nights in Barcelona and really enjoyed our stay. This flat is exactly as advertised and in a great location. Close to the metro , and a taxi stop, or just walk. Great restaurants within walking distance. Was greeted by the host who also had many suggestions for us for food and sights to see. We had a great stay.
Nice place, Elisabeth and Cse was great to work with.

Han sido unos anfitriones muy atentos y simpáticos. Se esfuerzan y hacen todo lo posible para que la estancia sea de lo mejor y de lujo, preocupandose y atendiendote en todo a todo momento. El apartamento está súper limpio y ordenado. También está súper bien ubicado y tiene muy buena conexión de metro. Sin duda alguna ha sido una estancia estupenda y vamos a repetir en nuestra próxima visita a Barcelona.

The host were extremely helpful and they reply messages very efficiently. I had no worries about contacting them. Once I arrived they were already there and even helped us with our bags! They have us tips on where to eat and where to go. The place was easy to find and food was everywhere. The place is quaint and I love the ceilings of the living room that dates back a 100 years. Very lovely!
Lugar muy bien ubicado que cumple al 100% con la descripción y expectativas creadas. La comunicación con los dueños fue excelente en todo momento.

Das Appartement liegt super! Man kommt überall gut zu Fuß hin und wenn man nicht laufen möchte ist die Metro und der Bus nicht weit weg! Super viele Restaurants in unmittelbarer Nähe und bla allem die Sagrada Famiglia, einfach nur schön! Cesc hat uns super lieb empfangen und hat auch viele Tipps parat. Danke für die tollen Tage!

Elisbet and Cesc’s place was great. Just a five minute walk to la Sagrada Familia, A LOT of food options only seconds away from the apartment, and very close the metro. The location is central- takes less than 15 minutes to get to most main attractions by metro. The neighborhood is alive but not noisy, we felt very safe walking around.  The apartment itself is just as expected- clean, quaint, and perfect for a group of four. Elisabet and Cesc we’re very responsive and helpful whenever we needed anything, and they also suggested some great places to eat nearby. Would definitely recommend staying here!

Die Wohnung liegt nahe der Sagrada Familia, eine lange Fußgängerzone führt direkt hin und man kann in den unzähligen Cafés frühstücken oder abends mit Aussicht Paella essen. 
Besonders geeignet ist die Wohnung für 2-3 Personen, wir waren fünf und haben dann auch auf der Couch im Wohnzimmer geschlafen. Das war völlig okay, aber die Straße untern ist schon befahren, das sollte man wissen, wenn man gern bei offenem Fenster schläft. Die anderen Betten sind hinten raus, da ist es still und es gibt einen weiteren schönen Balkon. 
Wir können die Wohnung nur empfehlen!
Nice and clean appartment, in between the Seggrada Familia and the Hospital de Sant Pau. Elisabet is a friendly and welcoming host :-)
Great location and communication!
Schöne Wohnung, gute Lage, sehr nette und hilfsbereite Gastgeber... insgesamt also sehr empfehlenswert!
The flat is beauitful, great locaiton yet not too noisey (which can be an issue in Barcelona). Host was also thoughtful and responsive.
Elisabet was super responsive and helpful!! It was a great apartment!

This was an amazing flat within walking distance to the Sagrada Familia,great restaurants, and the metro. Cesc and Elisabet were very understanding when our flight arrived late, and were waiting to welcome us several hours later. They had some helpful tips and advice. Would stay here again, and highly recommend.

This apartment is perfect for your stay in Barcelona. It feels just like home. It is clean, spacious and has everything you need. It has 2 balconies, both of which you can sit out on. The bedrooms are at the back of the apartment so it is very quiet at night. The location is great being close to shops and cafes as well as being near the metro and bus stops. You are met by your host who tells you everything you need to know and you can contact them anytime of the day or night but we had no need to at all. I would definitely go back and can't recommend it enough. Thank you both.
Fantastic location, so central and yet a nice calm apartment, very fast communication and great tips from our hosts on local breakfast places!

Our group of five had a wonderful stay. The apartment was stylish and suited our needs perfectly. It was pretty noisy for those sleeping on the sofa bed as there was also construction going on next door but it just meant we we up early to explore! Elisabet was very attentive and friendly, highly recommend:)

This was a great location to stay in- Perfect !
The hosts were so welcoming and helpful but also not too much. The apartment is clean and cute, tiny bathroom but for a short stay its all good.
Lots of things to do in the local area aswell as it being only 20mins away from the centre.
Would stay again!

This was my first trip to Spain. I found their place easily and loved that I could park rental car across the street. The apartment was comfortable and centrally located for all we wanted to see. Cesc met us in person to give us the key and shared great places to eat and see in the city. He shared extra tips about beaches north of Barcelona for later in our trip. I highly recommend this place for many nights in Barcelona.
Great location. Loved being in a local neighbourhood.  Great location for sights Segrada Parc Quell etc.
Pleasant stay in a well located apartment.  Responsive and helpful hosts.
We had a great stay. The apartment was cosy and clean, and had a good public transport connection. Thank you, Elisabet!

A lovely spacious apartment in a great location.  Cafes, supermarkets and metro stops all a stones throw away and a short walk to the Sagrada Família.  A fantastic place to stay if visiting Barcelona.  
Also great communication from the hosts.
Well recomended.
There was noise from the construction site next door from 8 in the morning which we were unaware of but otherwise quite ok
La comunicación inmejorable, tanto para el check in como para la salida. El apartamento limpio, cómodo y su situación perfecta. Volveremos sin dudarlo.

This place is a treasure. The location was perfect. We were near to two metros, there were little supermarkets all around, and we could see and walk to the Sagrada Familia as soon as we stepped out the door. Elisabet was a great host and very responsive through email. She graciously allowed us to leave our bags there early so that we wouldn't miss any time exploring the city..  The apartment is clean and adequately furnished. The kitchen and bathroom are small, as others have said, but perfectly adequate for our purposes.  We didn't really prepare much food in the kitchen, but we did eat breakfasts at the apartment and had wine and cheese in the evenings. I highly recommend this place.

This apartment was charming with a great location. Easy walk to La Sagrada Familia and the metro station which is very easy to figure out. Also located close to many great restaurants. The apartment was sparkling clean and communication with Elisabet was alway quick and efficient. I highly recommend staying here.

Cesc was such an amazing host! He was proactive with communication, and responded immediately at all times. He even made suggestions on places to visit that were super helpful, and helped us decide on the must sees during our first stay in Barcelona! The location is so close to everything. This was key as taxis were on strike during our stay, and we took public transit everywhere. The bakery across the street, and the restaurants nearby were so convenient. La Sagrada was about a 7-minute walk away, we couldn't have been in a better location. We really enjoyed our stay, and highly recommend Cesc's flat!

Een fijn appartement om te verblijven als je Barcelona wilt verkennen. Ligging is ideaal daarvoor. Eigenaren delen met liefde leuke lokale tips. Airco alleen in de woonkamer, de ventilator in de slaapkamer was geen overbodige luxe tijdens de hete zomerdagen die we hadden.
casa accogliente , pulita e vicino ai mezzi pubblici x spostarci .  la consiglierei x un soggiorno a Barcellona.

Viaje con mi esposo y mis dos hijos por una noche para conocer Barcelona y tuvimos la oportunidad de llegar al apartamento de Elisabet nos recibió su esposo y muy amable en todo momento, las respuestas rápidas y dispuestos ayudar el apartamento se  encontraba muy limpio y amplio, el baño un poco incomodo y pequeño, el aire acondicionado refresca solo la
Sala hacia los cuartos nada, por lo que para dormir hacia bastante calor, las escaleras para subir muy estrechas y el ascensor también por lo que si vas con coche
Y niños pequeños para subir al apartamento puede resultar incómodo. La ubicación del apartamento excelente muy cerca de la sagrada familia, de la estación de metro y de la Parada Del City tour.
L’appartement est fonctionnel, l’emplacement est idéal, métro, commerces, restaurants, places de parking. Je recommande l’endroit.

This neighborhood was the best! Close to everything, but not overrun by tourists. We felt very lucky to have chosen the apartment from all the many choices available in Barcelona. The apartment is just off of a pedestrian street by Sagrada Familia. There were many bakeries and tapas bars to choose from and it was very easy to find great and affordable food. Because of this, we didn't use the kitchen once. 
Some reviews mention street noise, but that was not an issue AT ALL as the bedroom was set in the rear of the apartment and well off the street. We even slept comfotably with the windows open.

I probably shouldn’t write such a glowing review as I’ll never be able to book this space again :)

Elisabet’s apartment is the perfect family location. We were 6 people including two small children. The location was great, near several restaurants, pharmacies, and supermarkets, and of course Sagrada Familia. It is also very close to the subway system and there is a taxi stand around the corner. The apartment was clean and more importantly quiet at night. The host is awesome and communication was never a problem. Have no fear when booking this listing.
Excellent location to explore Barcelona. Nice simple flat with everything you need for a pleasant stay

We had a great time at Elisabet and Cesc's apartment! It was a perfect location as the shops and restaurants were close by. Sagrada Familia was also about a 10 min walk away and we enjoyed our nightly strolls around the area. The apartment itself was very clean and neat, and we had the whole place to ourselves. If you needed anything else, both Elisabet and Cesc was quick to respond! We will def recommend them to our friends!
Excelente ubicación y apartamento imepcable

An incredible all-around experience! Elisabet and Cesc are such kind people who were very helpful with providing information about the apartment, local recommendations, and answering any of our questions. The apartment itself is much larger than expected and felt really comfortable to call home. The location was great, short walk to La Sagrada Familia and easy access to the Metro. We hope to be back soon!
Ha sido una estadia muy buena.  Estaba todo excelente. Fueron muy atentos. La ubicación genial. Muy atentos en todo. Volveriamos.
Elisabets place is a real gem! It's very clean and cosy. Elizabet and her husband are great hosts and easy to communicate with.

Elisabet and Cesc's apartment is ideally located for any one wanting to tour Barcelona. We found the Metro station to be very convenient as it is around the corner from the apartment. Since we mainly walked all day it was always a pleasure to use the elevator to go up to the apartment at the end of the day. This is also useful when taking bags to your room as so few apartments seem to have elevators.
The supermarket is only two blocks away and had everything we could possibly want. We had enough equipment to cook meals had we decided to but with so many wonderful little cafes we only ate breakfast at the apartment.
The communication was great and prompt and all our questions were answered immediately.
I would highly recommend this Airbnb for its wonderful location. We always felt safe in the neighborhood when we went out in  the evenng.
Great place!
excelente atencion, ubicacion inmejorable!!! el apartamento es hermoso!!!
Nice, exceptionally clean apartment in a great location - metro only few steps away. Just perfect for exploring Barcelona. Helpfull ghost, quick to respond.
Elisabet’s place was in a great location and easy to walk everywhere from. We loved the bakery they suggested nearby and went every morning for breakfast. Overall an amazing trip!

The location was fabulous for the Sagrada Familia and Hospital San Pau. Hosts were kind and gracious. A little basic for us we like a little more space and comfort but perfect for young travelers and young families. Definitely recommend for location.
Nice apartment in a great location
제가 에어비앤비 를 이용 해본 햇수가 매우 많은 편인데 여긴 일본인가 싶을정도로 깨끗했어요. 정말 완벽합니다 위치도 인테리어도   집에서 요리도 해먹고 너무 잘 쉬다가네요. 마치 바르셀로나에서 살다 가는 느낌이에요. 언젠가 꼭 다시 찾고 싶은 곳이에요. 호스트도 매우매우 친절했습니다 ^^

Such a great place!! Located smack dab in the middle of two UNESCO World Heritage sites, Sagarada Familia and the Sant Pau Hospital. We really enjoyed being able to walk to both and the nearby metro station which got us everywhere else. The place is very charming and quiet. The hosts are lovely and happy to make any recommendations for what you might want. We highly recommend!!!

Elisabet and Cesc's place is just as advertised; a beautiful apartment with nice art and touches (amazing brick ceiling!!) and the perfect amount of space for a couple or even a group of 4+ friends! What airbnb doesn't tell you is how NICE they are, and how much thought they've put into making sure you enjoy their neighborhood and their city. They made wonderful local recommendations, and were super accommodating and flexible with check-in and check-out. The apartment is in a great neighborhood with some local-feeling places, and a quick walk to the famous Sagrada Familia. We ended up getting a multi-pass metro card and used it every day to zip down to El Born, Gothic Quarter, La Rambla, (Website hidden by Airbnb) if you don't mind the metro and like the feeling of coming "home" after a day of tourist attractions, this is the perfect place!

This is a cute apartment located very close to the Sagrada Familia. Unfortunately, there was very loud construction in the building that woke us up around 7:15am. We were not aware there would be construction during our stay. The hosts were very understanding in helping us rectify the situation.
Great location! Just 7min from La Sagrada Família! Place is super cute and stylish. Communication was great! Metro is about 3min walking and bus stops near. Highly recommended this place!!

This bright and cozy apartment in a peaceful neighborhood of Gracia was the perfect home base for our first trip in Barcelona. The apartment is a few minutes walking distance to two Metro stops (less than 5 minutes walk to L5 metro; about 10-minute walk to L2 metro). Cesc was a wonderful host who helped us get settled in and was super responsive to our questions. Would definitely come back for a future stay!

Nous avons passé un agréable séjour dans l'appartement d'Elisabet et de Cesc. Cesc nous a accueilli en personne et nous a donné des adresses locales et des bons conseils sur la ville. Ils ont été très arrangeants et accueillants. L'appartement et son équipement étaient conformes à leur description. Tout était propre. Le quartier était parfait pour nous qui voyagions avec un bébé car plus au calme. Un peu excentré si on veut faire le tout à pied. Sinon le métro est juste à côté de l'immeuble. L'isolation de l'appartement en terme de bruit et de température est conforme à celle en Espagne donc pas très bonne, mais sans surprise car c'est la réalité du pays.
Merci Elisabet et Cesc !
I am happy with the location of this apartment as the metro is within 3 minutes away & is just a few stops away to Barcelona town central like la rambla.

Such a great space beautiful and modern. Perfect for me and my friend! We met Cesc who was very nice and helpful. Front and back balconies are amazing too, view of street and then a private balcony in the back. All amenities provided! Location is good, right by La Sagrada Familia. I would 10/10 recommend this Air BnB! :)
Excelente piso muy bien ubicado. Cesc y Élisabet muy atentos y amables.

The location is fantastic and convenient! 10-mintues walk to Sagrada Familia; restaurants, coffee shops and bakery around. The flat is tidy, comfort and a little bit Spanish style. Elisabet is very friendly and helpful. We did have a great time here, and I would definitely recommend it to friends whoever wants to visit Barcelona.

Our stay In Elisabet’s place was amazing! She was very helpful the whole time and was always answering any questions we had about Barcelona. The place was very big and was perfect for the 3 of us. Highly recommend.

Elisabet & Cesc are wonderful hosts! They are very communicative and care about the quality of your stay very much. The space is lovely and comfortable. The location couldn’t be better! Only minutes from the Sagrada Familia and steps from public transportation. The neighborhood is safe, which was important to me. The location and comfort of the space really helped us get the most out of our stay in Barcelona! This home is a great value for the location. I’d highly recommend a stay here!
Great location and wonderful neighborhood. I was traveling with my mother and the apartment has easy access and great views. Really a perfect space to stay in Barcelona.

We arrived in Barcelona earlier than check in, so we found a great place called Barcelona Locker where you can drop off your luggage for a small fee to travel the city. We had great communication with the hosts, so finding the keys and the place was easy. 
The apartment looks like the pictures, and the location is great for  visiting Sagrada Família and walking to restaurants. I loved the small balcony to view the city life. The bedroom was in the back so it was quiet. It was a little cold because it was winter (Feb.), but they had portable heaters in every room. They provide travel books and maps with recommendations. They are a quick phone call away if you have any questions. 
Overall, we enjoyed our first trip to Barcelona.

Our stay at Cesc's and Elisabet's place in Barcelona was lovely, with everything we needed in the flat.

The flat is accurately depicted in the images: modest, clean but compact. 

We had some trouble with the key on arrival but Cesc, despite it being 10pm, quickly came over to help reposition the lock, explaining that the issue was probably because the locks had been changed recently.

We happily recommend Cesc's and Elisabet's place, and it deserves 5 stars. That said, you should know:
- the location is fine for getting around and there are nice bakeries, restaurants etc. nearby but if you haven't been to Barcelona before and money isn't much of an issue, the Gothic Quarter is probably the best place to stay
- the flat interior is nice but the building that the flat is in isn't great, just to manage your expectations!
- everything in the flat is well thought out, which it has to be because of the small space. Just beware if you are clumsy like me! I was too heavy handed with some things but thankfully nothing was broken in the end
Fantastic location and very helpful hosts.
Lovely apartment in a great location. Cesc was very helpful to us upon arrival. Really enjoyed our stay.
Amazing stay!

name: Luxury Apartment in Instambul
space: Raven Istanbul Apartments are convenient, cozy and specially designed apartments located in the heart of Istanbul - Taksim.  Location : Apartments are located on Süslü Saksı Street which is the parallel of always busy pedestrian Istiklal Street ( the most famous Street of Istanbul ) . Also there is just 2 minute walking distance to Taksim Square and all transportation points like metro station, tram and bus station.   The apartments overlooks ; - Istiklal street with plenty of live music cafe ,  restaurant and shopping options. Moreover , there are rich mixture of antique shops and craftmens work places. - Cukurcuma where become known as  Art Walk" from Istiklal via many small galleries to Istanbul Modern on the banks of the Bosphorus which is a short walk down the hill from the apartment, where the tramway to Sultanahmet (Hagia Sofia) and beyond to the airport is located  -Cihangir where is   local and elegant area to walk around and explore.  Facilities : Raven Istanbul Apartments
description: Raven Istanbul Apartments are convenient, cozy and specially designed apartments located in the heart of Istanbul - Taksim.  Location : Apartments are located on Süslü Saksı Street which is the parallel of always busy pedestrian Istiklal Street ( the most famous Street of Istanbul ) . Also there is just 2 minute walking distance to Taksim Square and all transportation points like metro station, tram and bus station.   The apartments overlooks ; - Istiklal street with plenty of live music cafe ,  restaurant and shopping options. Moreover , there are rich mixture of antique shops and craftmens work places. - Cukurcuma where become known as  Art Walk" from Istiklal via many small galleries to Istanbul Modern on the banks of the Bosphorus which is a short walk down the hill from the apartment, where the tramway to Sultanahmet (Hagia Sofia) and beyond to the airport is located  -Cihangir where is   local and elegant area to walk around and explore.  Facilities : Raven Istanbul Apartments

host.host_about: Our boutique flats and cafe&pub is waiting for you to serve for best Istanbul experience.

reviews.comments: Begum was such a great host! The aparment was exactly same as on the pictures, incredible apartment! Highly Highly Recomend!!!

Very nice and new place. Good location near Taksim. Nice bars and restaurants around which are not too expensive. Very lively neighborhood. It also appeared to be safe. But you have to accept some noise on weekends. 

Our host Begum was very friendly. Unfortunately, she left the company who operates the apartment house, so I can't really say something about the others. 

If you're concerned about the protests on Taksim square and in the neighborhood, take a look at the (Hidden by Airbnb) groups the protesters use for their planning or just ask some Turkish people on the street. Like this we were able to evade the protest on Saturday during our stay. We met with a friend and spent the night at his place. 

Despite this, Istanbul is an incredible city and was well worth the 'risk'!
Great space in a great part of town. Serap and the staff were very friendly and helpful during my stay. Taksim is a great neighborhood to stay in for people looking to enjoy Istanbul's nightlife.

Awesome place. It is exactly like on the pictures, all new. Most of the furnitures are custom made, nice job. 
The apartment was cleaned, bed was made every day which was unexpected, in a good way; great service. Good Wifi too. 
Super location, you can easily walk everywhere. 
Definitely recommending it!

Extremely good experience ! 
Very very very friendly and communicative people  !
Very comfortable and beautiful room ! 
And in the heart of the city ! 
When I go back to istanbul , RAVEN will definately be my first choice  !
I had a wonderful time at the Raven, nice neighbors and above all, I felt at home. Thank you Serap

I am very happy that I was able to find a place like Raven Istanbul. 
I stayed there for three nights.
The room was exotic and beautiful, Serap helped me book a ticket to Ankara (which was difficult for non-Turkish people to reserve), and the place was convenient for sightseeing.
Even my Turkish friend seemed to love the place after I told her where I had stayed.
I recommend the place to everyone who's visiting Istanbul.

Raven is a cozy residence in a cool location. People working at Raven are friendly and helpful.
In the neighborhood there are plenty of bars, restaurants, pubs, music and people till 4 in the morning. It’s a little noisy too.
Not the best choice unless you want very loud music coming from the bar until 2:00 AM and 4:00 AM Friday and Saturday.

Great experience and nice staying in Raven. Just a bit noisy from our room since there was a lack of soundproofing in the building. We missed too some kitchen and cleaning utensils. On the other hand, guys running the pub and in charge of the rooms were very nice!

This is our fourth visit to Istanbul and our family enjoyed the suite and hospitality. It was comfortable to have the two separate spaces and the kitchenette was ideal for us to prep food for long days out wandering. Yes, the space is incredibly loud from the bar below, but everyone including out 3.5 year old was able to sleep comfortable.  Taxim in general is a 24 hour area, so if you are seeking quiet, I would suggest you book in a different neighborhood.

We really enjoyed staying in our apartment with Raven. The owner was very attentive to enduring  we had everything we needed and that everything was as expected. The apartment looks just as good as the pictures make it seem. The location was a great alternative to staying in the tourist saturated old town area. There is some noise from the bar below each night, so if you are a light sleeper you may want earplugs. It was no issue to us at all and we slept well!

We stayed here for a few days and loved it so much we went back for another couple of days at the end of our trip.  Raven Apartments are a great place to stay to experience Istanbul.  Just off the busy Istiklal Street in a lively and vibrant area.  The noise really didn't bother us - you have to expect a bit of noise in a city like this!
The apartments were clean, spacious and great value, but the best thing about our stay was the great hospitality from the super friendly staff.  We couldn't have asked for better hosts!  They were so helpful in suggesting places to go - nothing was too much trouble for them.
Thanks to Cemre and the boys for a really great time - We will be back!

We really enjoyed our stay at the Raven. Perfect neighborhood. About a 25 minute walk to the "New Mosque" downhill. Steep uphill walk on the way home.
Pros: 
-Raven Pub downstairs
-Awesome neighborhood near Taksim and Istiklal (great nightlife)
-Balcony was great for a drink and to relax
-Bars are nearby but its not loud at night 

Cons:
-A little hard to find at first ( (Hidden by Airbnb) Raven Pub)
-Lots of stairs
-Looks a little different from the pictures (slightly smaller) but was still a great space

The Raven is in a brilliant location if you want to make the most of the many bars, restaurants, pubs and clubs in Istanbul.  Its close to dozens of great places to eat, drink and shop as well as to lots of transport links to the rest of the city.
The apartment itself is nice and is as pictured in the photos.  We didnt have much contact with the host in advance or during the time we were there but they did answer all questions we had quickly and were pleasant to deal with.
The only downside is the noise level from the bar below and from other residents coming in and out as there is pretty much no sound proofing in the apartment.  However, we were aware that it was above a bar when we booked - its something to consider if you are planning on having a relaxing evening in Istanbul.  We were out and about most of the time so it was fine!

Beautiful and centrally located place, but very noisy - it is at  the top of a pub and the walls are thin (feeling on sleeping right on top of the sound system) so we were waking up several times in the night.

This suite looks exactly as it does in the pictures. Overall, it was clean, and the furnishings were comfortable. It's a hotel, not at all a home, so it was much less personal than my other Airbnb experiences. As someone else noted, there is no kitchen--just a refrigerator.

Using (Hidden by Airbnb) Maps, I had no trouble finding the Raven. It's a very short walk (less than 10 min) from the Point Hotel, which is the main Taxim stop for Havatas, the shuttle to and from Ataturk airport (which is cheap and excellent).

I wish I had heeded other reviewers' warnings about the noise. I'm not a light sleeper, but I stayed on a Saturday night, and the volume of the music from the bar downstairs was extremely loud. I did not sleep at all. Also, I found the ventilation of the room to be very poor. It's a non-smoking unit, but smoking from down below fills the room, even with windows open. All of my belongings reeked of cigarette smoke the next day.

The intentions behind this place seem good, and it looks great. The experience of staying however is far, far from ideal.

Location is perfect, easy access to the major highlights of Istanbul. The quality of the apartment is reasonable / but you may expect that downtown Taksim. The noise from the bar below is terrible (!) and certainly able to keep you awake until 03.00 - totally not adequate . unless you party yourselves until 3 AM.... The metals stairs will than wake you up again at 07.00 when other guests arrive ( or leave ) or the light on the hall way .. on my complaint the answer was very kind : I can bring you some cotton for you ears...(!) ...Reason for me to leave early and NOT finish my stay! and if you think after reading thos ...well...think (Website hidden by Airbnb) really that (!!) noisy !!

The apartment was nice, comfortable and a good amount of space.  We liked the location near Istiklal Street which was very convenient for going out, and for transportation options.  

However, the room smelled of smoke (which we think was coming up from the bar and street below).  And the hot water was not reliable, lasting only a few minutes before turning cold.

We only stayed for a night here as part of a layover, but our stay was welcoming and cozy. There's so much to do around the apartment it's easy walking distance. Restaurants, bars, and shops are all very close. Location was a plus. The room was very nice, as described by the pics. If we ever return to Istanbul, I will not hesitate to stay here again! Overall, great experience.
Great room, and managed by really nice people. Very central location 5 mins from Taksim Square. There can be loud music till late at night sometimes but that didn't bother me. Recommended!

Flat were very well located, people were nice but if you are two and want separated bed, let them know before. Because the flat is on a very dynamical street, it s very (very) noisy. I think it s good for less than 5 nights. Anyway, thanks to the host.
The place is good. It's a little bit noisy but it was fine for both of us after a big walking day of visit in Istanbul. The location is perfect.
The location is great, and the room is tidy and clean. Recommend it for others.

I had a great time in Istanbul.  The staff at Raven is very friendly and responsive to any questions and/or concerns.  The apartment is really quaint and in the most happening neighborhood.  With that said, it is not for everyone.  We stayed on the second floor and the music from the cafe downstairs is pretty unbearable if you're not a spring chicken.  And I am talking about every night of the week until 2:00 or 3:00 am.  The apartment is perfect for people who are young or who are young at heart, but if you are looking for a quiet relaxing place to lay your head then you should keep looking.  If you want to be in the middle of all the excitement, book this place right away.  It is surrounded by the best nightlife in the city.
See previous review

Unfortunately I missed my original flight to Turkey so I only got to stay here for one night. I say unfortunately because the place is great, has everything you need and the location is utterly brilliant! You will immediately feel the 'vibe' of Taksim when you arrive. I guarantee it! :)
The staff were very friendly and helpful. The wifi wasn't working when I arrived and they fixed it straight away. I really feel like I missed out not staying longer.
One warning - This room is above a bar on a very lively street. It gets pretty noisy up until till the early hours of the morning. If you can handle that then I can't recommend this place enough. If you are a light sleeper or go to bed early, best look elsewhere.

We loved staying at Raven. It was a short walk from the Taksim train station and really easy to find. It's located in a great area, surrounded by very local feeling bars and restaurants. There is a small bar down-stairs but noise wasn't an issue. Staff were friendly. The rooms were really cool - spacious and nice design.

We could not have asked for a more wonderful host and place to stay. Istanbul is a truly magical city and Raven Suites made it even more so magical. Miray was a superb host. The location is key , very close to Taksim square. We literally walked everywhere and the Metro station was also close. I wish I had the time, we would have liked to increase our stay...We will be back.

This listing at the Raven was great! We were only there for a night, but were able to easily check-in with the bartender (it sits above Raven Pub, which helps make it an easy location to find). 

The suite had AIR CONDITIONING, which was a rare and wonderful find. Beds/sheets/towels were comfortable and clean. 

Per other reviews, it was noisy due to the surrounding area, but we felt that this helped add to the atmosphere and honestly with the AC on, you couldn't even hear it. 

Last, but not least the bar gives you one (huge) beer upon check-in which was a great nightcap.

Nice and cozy place. It kinda feel that room is bigger than it is when you watch on photo. However it is still enough place to sleep (: Friendly stuff in the Raven pub will always help you to find your way through the Istanbul

Really amazing apartment in a great neighbourhood. Right next to Istiklal street where everything is you need. Great restaurants, bars and shops within a few minutes walk. The bar downstairs is relaxing as well and invites for a drink or two.

Nice little quaint spot located in a great area of Istanbul just outside of Taksim. The flat was nice, clean and a perfect size for 2 people. It is located above a little cafe/bar which can be noisy at times.

Pros: 
- The place is really really good. It looks exactly as on the pictures.
There is everything you might need. 
The size is really good for 2 persons.

- The location is great, right next to Taksim, very central and 10mn from the Havatas shuttles to the airport.

- There is a nice cat chilling in the stairs.

Cons: 
- We had a huge check-in problem and complete lack of communication from Raven. I sent an email on the day prior to our arrival, telling them that we would arrive very late. We didn't hear from them and when we arrived at 3am, the bar was closed, with no way to get to the rooms, and their phone written in AirBnB was off.
Hopefully people in the street helped us and the owner of the liquor shop in front of the hotel called a guy, who called a guy, who took us to sleep at another place (belonging to the same group) until the next day.
When we arrived the day after at Raven we explained the thing to the staff but didn't get any apologies from their side.

- Noisy 8.30am bar deliveries
- No hot water on the first day

However the place is really great and I highly recommend it. I would just warn you about late check-ins...

Das Apartment ist klein aber gemütlich. Was in einigen Bewertungen breite bemängelt wurde ist tatsächlich der Lärmpegel. Da man direkt über einem Pub wohnt ist bis teilweise spät in die Nacht laute Musik zu hören. Eine Küche öde Küchenutensilien gibt es bis auf einen Wasserkocher nicht. Bestimmt ok für 1 bis 2 Nächte jedoch für länger eher anstrengend.
位置在独立大街旁边,交通很方便｡房间设计风格很现代,我很喜欢｡楼下是Raven自己开的一个小酒吧,没事儿可以喝两杯｡

Great place in a wonderful location. The bar downstairs is fantastic and was a great way to end each evening. They aren't the best at communicating in regards to check-in but don't worry; just go there and as long as the bar is open you should be able to access your room.

The best thing about the B&B is the location. If you are a lone female traveler, wouldn't have any safety issues.Right on the Istikal Street and 3 minutes from the Metro as well as the Airport pickup station. 
The rooms are clean and cosy and tastefully done though too compact. There is a nice buzz on the road which would further pick up your holiday spirit.
Word of caution: Please try and confirm the check in and check out time previously beforehand,they did try to trick us on this.

Ein sehr schön restauriertes Haus in mitten des Party-, Ausgeh- und Szeneviertels.

Im Erdgeschoss befindet sich eine Bar und dann jeweils auf einer eigenen Etage die drei Appartemens, die mit Liebe zum Detail und schönem Design eingerichtet sind.

Alles für ein verlängertes Wochenende ist vorhanden: Kühlschrank, Wasserkocher, Föhn, zwei Fernseher, Klimaanlage (!), W-Lan, Handtücher, Pantoffeln, Seife, Schampoo, Bettwäsche usw. Somit guter Hotel-Standard. Dabei deutlich geräumiger, schöner und gemütlicher als ein "normales" Hotelzimmer. Und das zu einem relativ günstigen Preis.

Die Lage ist nahezu optimal. Mit öffentlichen Verkehrsmitteln, auch vom Flughafen aus, sehr gut zu erreichen (Haltestelle Taksim-Platz). In direkter Nachbarschaft unzählige Bars, Restaurants, Geschäfte und Clubs, die zu Fuß problemlos erreicht werden können. Selbst die Sehenswürdigkeiten in der Altstadt kann man mit einem ausgiebigen Spaziergang (ca. 30 - 40 Min.) zu Fuß erreichen. So erhält man einen schönen Einblick in das Stadtleben der einzelnen Viertel. Kann ich nur empfehlen! 

Check-In und -Out absolut problemlos. Einfach in der Bar melden. Das dortige Personal ist total freundlich und jederzeit um das Wohl der Gäste bemüht. An dieser Stelle noch mal vielen Dank an die gesamte Mannschaft!

Einziger Wehmutstropfen ist etwas der Geräuschpegel. Die Fenster sind zwar gut schallisoliert. Aber der abendliche und auch nächtliche Trubel in dem Viertel, wie auch die Bar im Erdgeschoss, gehen nicht geräuschlos vorbei. Wer also die Abende ruhig mit einem Buch oder vor dem Fernseher verbringen will -> schwierig. Wir waren aber jeden Abend unterwegs und es hat uns kaum was ausgemacht. Daher ok!

Also, absolut empfehlenswert!!!

Vielen Dank!

The stay was disappointing. The room smelled strongly of smoke.  I could hear people's conversations in the bar whilst I was in the bedroom because the room is directly above the bar.  The stairs are very loud and being in the room above the bar meant I could hear whenever another guest arrived to go to the apartments on the higher floors as the wall between the stairs and the room is very thin.
The bar closed at midnight (this was on a Monday so may be later at weekends) so this wasn't a problem. However if you go to sleep earlier, then it will be difficult as the music is loud.
Although I knew it would be loud and lively above a bar, I was not prepared to be woken up by other guests arriving during the night because of the thin walls, and to stay in a room constantly smelling of smoke. Unfortunately I cut the stay short and went elsewhere.
If the room was on a higher floor, then it may have been better but I'm not really convinced. I only recommend this place if you are not planning to sleep, and want a good location near to the busy pedestrian street.

Lokasyon olarak İstiklal Caddesi'ne 2 dakikalık mesafede olması en sevdiğim özelliklerinden biri oldu. Daire küçük olmasına rağmen güzel dizaynı ile oldukça kullanışlı ve şeker görünüyor. Ev sahipleri ise oldukça sıcakkanlı ve yardımseverdi bize karşı. Genel olarak tavsiye edebileceğim memnuniyette kaldığım bir daire oldu. Herşey için teşekkürler. 
Sevgiler

Look exactly like the picture, feels a little small but pretty comfortable. Great location with decent night life and lots of food downstairs. However acoustic is not so good especially you are a light sleeper. But it is ok for me and my friend.  
One big problem is that it always small like smoke - no matter it comes from tobacco or the grill smoke down stair.
Other than that it is generally a good stay

Great location and very nice appartment. Especially for this price. Downstairs there is a small cafe where you can drink coffee or a beer for again a good price. The owner was friendly and helpfull. We enjoyed it very much. Best thing was the shower. Amazing!

Thank you so much for the oppotunity to stay in one of your apartments. 
The apartment was Small But really comfortable and clean. I even would say the size was perfect, not to big and not to Small.... its a very nice place in the middle heart of taksim! And one more thing: Raven is a friendly nice man Who Made for us the best stay in istanbul possible... he Takes care of his guests (Website hidden by Airbnb) sum it up: recommend! recommend! recommend! We will come back!

if you come to Istanbul don't hesitate to go to Raven's suits, very very nice location and a lot of fun outsides for great night pubs and bars. And the host is very helpful and like a big brother to give you whatever suggestion you like.  Come on, or you will be regretful!
Great Rooms in a convenient Location, just around the corner for the Taksim Square. The rooms are very clean and the Pub is a cozy place to stay.

It was really great, Raven is very welcoming. As soon as we arrived he gave us great tips for the city, and was very helpfull.
The appartment was very clean and modern.
Would highly recommend it to anyone!!!

Raven was a very lovely host. Everything was taken care of and the location was in a perfect place if you want to explore Istanbul with its many attractions, dining and nightlife. The room was very cosy and the shower was definetly the most amazing part !!

Amazing place in the middle of city center. Location is near Istikal street (the most famous one in Taksim), but it's not so crowded! The hotel is looking exactly like on the pictures! Very clean and private. We really like our host . He was there all the time to help us and answer on all our questions! We would definitely recommend this hotel! Thank you thank  you ❤️

This place was an amazing location that was also very safe. Also public transportation was easily accessible which was awsome. The hosts were very helpful with regards to information needed to get around town. The space was very clean and comfortable which made the experience even more enjoyable.
We loved our stay even it was just one night. Raven is a wonderful host, we also enjoyed a bit social life in his pub downstairs. Definitely recommend if you want an authentic airbnb experience.

L'accoglienza è stata ottima così come la permanenza a Istanbul. L'host è sempre stato prsente, gentile e ha risolto subito un piccolo problema. l'appartamento è come nelle foto e assolutamente pulito. La posizione è ottima e centrale così come descritto.  E' la prima volta che mi rivolgo al vostro servizio ed è stato un ottimo inizio. Ribadisco la gentilezza e la presenza dell'Host e dei suoi collaboratori. Esperienza sa ripetere assolutamente

This place was perfect! We only stayed one night but I would love to come back for a longer period of time. The bar downstairs is fun, and the restaurant across the street was delicious. Raven was very welcoming, kind and gave us great recommendations
Great atmosphere, good area and nice host. recommended

L'appartement est vraiment bien situé, au coeur d'Istanbul et vraiment pratique pour se balader .Le personnel vraiment agréable et disponible.  En revanche , j'ai logé dans une chambre du premier étage situé au dessus du pub très bruyant . J'ai profité merveilleusement d'istanbul avec cet appartement mais je n'ai pas pu me reposer .

Easy to find, easy check it , fast internet, clean , in the heart of istiklal night life. 

I've stayed there for one night and it was very convenient for me because of the location.

What I didn't like we the fact that the cigarette smoke from downstairs came into the room , extremely thin entrance door and walls.

I like the fact that you could hear the nightlife buzz directly in the room, but if you want a quiet place - this hotel is not for you.
I had a wonderful stay.
Todo muy bien.

Raven est très accueillant, il nous a offert un verre de bienvenue dans son bar, un café le matin...
Il nous a suggéré des restaurants, et était toujours prêt à  nous guider lors de nos questions. 
L'appartement est sympa, surtout entre amis festifs, car un bruyant. Il est très bien situé, à proximité de commerces et transports.

Me and my girlfriend had an excellent time staying at Ravens apartment in Istanbul. Location was ideal - easy walk (5 mins) to the main shopping area and lots of cool restaurants and bars. It's also a few streets back from the main street so other than general hustle and bustle it wasn't too noisy at night. The appartment has a funky / urban feel too which we liked. Cool little bar downstairs too. They were excellent hosts being flexible with timings and providing helpful information before our trip. Would happily stay their again.

It was a nice stay at the Raven Suite Istanbul. I arrived very late due to the late flight plus delay with the notification. The communication was prompt and Nuri was very nice to welcome me even after midnight. 

The property is just look the same as the photo and very well situated, just 2 mins walking distance from taksim square and few steps away from istiklal cad, the famous walking street with shops, restaurants and everything you need during your visit to istanbul. 

The facilities works well, and very comfortable, even Nuri told me that i may check out a bit late with no extra fee. And there is a raven cafe just under the apartment, in case you need a refreshment.
Un accueil très chaleureux, et en plein centre de Taksim!
Nuri was a great host! Very friendly, a real gentleman and he helped us with everything. The room was very clean, and near everything. We loved the Istanbul atmosphere.

We had such a great time in Istanbul. The apartments are set in a really vibrant area, so much going on and so much to see! They are a short walk from Beyoglu, an area with lots of amazing windy streets filled with cute little cafes and antique shops. Raven was an amazing host, our flight was delayed 3 hours but he waited for us until the early hours of the morning and it wasn't a problem. Thank you! Katy x

Danke Nuri,

für die zu 100% weiter zu empfehlende Unterkunft. Die Gastfreundschaft, Hilfsbereitschaft und die Zimmer haben uns begeistert. Die Lage sucht wirklich seines Gleichen !

Très bon accueil chaleureux de la part de notre hôte. 
Nous étions aux petits soins. Je recommande fortement. Sauf pour les amateurs de calme :)
房间很洋气 楼下就是bar 喜欢high的少年少女一定会喜欢

The location was exactly as advertised and the host was exceptional.  Our host spoke with our cab driver to ensure we arrived at the correct address and met us where/when the cab dropped us off ( a few blocks away from the hotel) .  On arrival, he treated us to refreshments and shared with us the best places to visit.  He even shared with us his public transit card!  He treated us to refreshments on our departure then walked us to a cab and spoke with the cab driver to ensure that we weren't charged too much for the trip to the airport.  I would highly recommend this location/host.

Nuri was a perfect host and a very pleasant person as well.
We arrived very late but he made us feel welcome nontheless!
The aparment offered everything we needed for our stay in Istanbul.
Amazing host and a great property in an ideal location in lively Istanbul. Couldn't have had a better host in Nuri, we would happily stay again.

The worse thing about this appartament are bugs. A lot of bugs! It was terrible staying. 

Appartament is tiny even for 2 persons so don't believ the ad saying that appartament can host 4 persons. 

Among the good things are location and balcony. Also the maid was very kind.

Our host at Raven was very nice and kind! The whole place is very cosy and equally modern. The home is very well-situated; walkable. Also the Raven bar is really hip and a nice place to have a drink in the evenings.
the place has a lot of charm and the host makes you feel special. thank you !

Great location; close to everything. Very authentic Turkish experience. Raven is an amazing host, and greeted me with open arms. He was available to assist with every request. Very clean and well kept. Awesome bar with a great vibe just downstairs. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED.

Raven is in an extremely convenient location near Taksim Square. Upon arrival, our host welcomed us and gave us a cold beer to enjoy as he explained the space and gave us some advice for our time in Istanbul. The room, itself, was quiet, clean, and comfortable. I would stay here again.
Nuri is a great host and very accommodating. The apartment is in a nice location and convenient for shopping and dining

Fantastic host and perfect location
Cozy apartment. Ideal for friends and young people who would like to stay in the heart of Istanbul.
Kaldığımız teraslı odayı çok sevdik! Beyoğlu gürültüsü çok fazla olsa da burada kalmaya değdi

We have stayed at the Raven in the past and loved the location, vibrancy of the street below and the kindness of the hosts.  Since we stayed there previously we had requested a specific room and were told our request would be granted.  However when we arrived our requested room was not available and it was the only one with a balcony.  The hosts went above and beyond to try and accommodate us including finding another place to stay with a balcony.  We only stayed one night and ended up switching hotels, but they even helped us with our luggage and carried it on a 15 minute walk to the other hotel.  They did not have to do this and I was really surprised at how accommodating and friendly they were.  Even though we ended up switching places I would still come back and stay at the Raven again since the hosts are first class and I don't fault them for the mixup.  Our remaining fee for the other nights was refunded and they even followed up a week later to make sure our funds had cleared to make sure we got our refund.  You just don't see this honesty every day and we hope to come back and visit next time.

Strongly recommended. Nuri and all the staff at the Raven provided an awesome service. We stayed on the 3rd floor for 4 nights. Location is very close to taksim square. Would stay again. Thanks Nuri and staff.

Great stay in a great location of Taksim. Very local and packed with life, not far from everything you want to do. Our host was awesome and has his own cool pub downstairs of rooms.  Thanks for the hospitality Raven pub and staff!

Raven calisanlari ziyaretimiz sirasinca oldukca sicakkanli ve ilgiliydi , Oda ve teras resimlerdeki gibi temiz genis ve ferahti , Yer taksimdeki eglence mekanlarina , gezilecek yerlere ve restorantlara oldukcada yakin , 
Oda icerisinde hem oturma alaninda hem yatakta tv bulunmasi da kalicaklara ayri bir rahat ortam sagliyor

In one word: Great! 
Location: right in the lively Taksim area, the apartment belongs to a nicely modern designed building. 
Cool and relax bar on the street floor.
To/From IST airport, take the cheap Havatas bus, it gets you near Taksim square, walking distance to Raven suite. 
Host: Nuri and his staff are wonderful and genuinely helpful.
I will come back for sure)
Boris

I loved the place, and the persons who working there, they are very helpful and awesome people, they was very welcome when i been there, to be honest i did not stayed for more than 1 night because there are stairs and it was not comfortable for my father because he is old, but i would like to say Thank you very much revan for the sweets welcome,
Great place, amazing host. the bar downstairs was really cool. wish I stayed longer!

Located in the meandering street of one of the busiest areas, Taksim. Nori's bnb is definitely one to NOT be missed. 
On top of the cleanliness and convenience his bnb provides, he's also one of the friendliest and most caring hosts we've met. He was helping us with all directions and places to visit, often offering us beer from his pub and tea from the street eatery beside! When I twisted my ankle, he bought medicine for me along with my boyfriend and even offer to take me to the hospital.
The room we stayed in looked exactly like the picture; a house keeper came to clean our room within the 3 days of our stay. 
We really enjoyed our time in Istanbul with Noris hospitality!
