We will definitely stay here if we visit again!

We absolutely loved staying at the Raven. The apartment was clean, modern and affordable and in a great location. Just minutes from Taksim square and surrounded by really great restaurants.
The host was warm and friendly and provided us with a beer on arrival and lots of great tips for our stay. We look forward to staying here again next time we travel to Istanbul!

Raven is a really cool place to stay in the center of Istanbul. Its on the main street Istıklal. Lots of pubs and bars around. The apartment was exactly the same with the pictures. Very clean and cozy. Enjoy Raven!

Great location, great people managing the place, really helpful and friendly. It is in the middle of the vibrant Taksim life and possibly could not be any better in terms of location. The place is really cosy and comfortable with great wi-fi, clean bathroom and very eccentric design. This has been a great experience for me. It would be even greater for people who look into making new like-minded friends in the town as this building also hosts a very nice pub/cafe. Definitely recommend it :)
房间设计完美 体验舒适度非常高 靠近塔克西姆广场是一个非常不错的入住选择

Perfect location. Close to the main shopping street. Excellent for solo or small groups looking for nightlife. Tons of bars and clubs in the area, and most important they seem to be open all night! Lots of places to grab a late snack. Nuri was awesome, he gave us good advises on how to get to the old city and invited us some beers from his pub the first night.

Great location and fantastic host , Raven was very polite and helpful , place located at the heart of everything.
Only problem if you sleep early it will not be possible as location is surrounded by night clubs, its music can even reach to your ears in a bedroom. 

Overall Fantastic for live and love in Istanbul. .
Very friendly and helpful. Excellent location.

A few finishing touches to the apartment and a bit of noise from the tiny bar downstairs are the only things that are holding this place back from a 5 star rating. The location can not be better, 1 min walk to Taksim Sq! The area is really nice to walk around and all attractions on this side of Istanbul are easily reachable on foot! In fact we really enjoyed the walk from Suleymaniye on the other side of the bridge to the apartment with our 5 yr old son (took about 45 mins with some small breaks).  Unlike some other parts of Istanbul, we felt very safe here.

The host is fantastic, always helpful and providing all the guidance you need without being intrusive. He even let us check in early and check out late at no extra cost! And I have no doubt he will help all guests anyway he can.

탁심광장과 가까운 위치로 여행시 편리합니다 주인 레이븐이 매우 친절하려 체크 아웃 시간도 연장해 주셨습니다 덕분에 편안한 여행되었습니다.
다음번에 터키를 오게된다면 꼭 다시 방문하고 싶습니다.
Great location and comfortable accommodation. I would stay here again.
Very easy meet and greet. Welcoming host and warm, cozy apartment (we happened to be here during a huge snow storm). Clean and comfortable. Would absolutely stay here again.
Tnx for everything))
Lovely hosts :)
Perfect location amd warm and welcoming people. If you plan to stay in the heart of the city, which of course comes with some noises at night, this is the ultimate place for you!

Nice little apartment in a very centrally location near Taksim and Istiklal. Great value for money! However light sleepers should be aware that this is right above a bar and you can clearly hear the noise not just from the bar but adjacent clubs (bring earplugs!)
Harika bir mekan. Kesinlikle tavsiye ederim.

We spent 3 nights in the Raven and although the rooms were smaller than expected, the location was good and Nuri was a brilliant and very helpful host. The bar downstairs was a great place to hang out but was very noisy throughout the night. If you're in Istanbul for the nightlife, then this is the place for you.
It's perfect
Nice place above a bar, only one real bed and a couch that is difficult to fold out. Allow a cat in the hallway which meowed overnight and my friend was allergic.

Amazing place, really close to Taksim Square. A block away from the craziness that is İstiklal Avenue, this small little place is a really nice base from which to explore the rest of Istanbul. Really great hosts, they let us check in a bit early, took care of our bags etc. Would recommend 100%

Great location. Bartenders are sweet and very hospitable. Bring ear plugs and you will sleep well. We were very fortunate to have the top (4th floor) balcony room. Note: this is the only room without a divider to separate the living room sofa bed from the actual bed in the bedroom. Floors 3, 2 and 1 have a moveable partition down the middle making it "2 rooms".
Amazing place, lively and hip. Perfect bar downstairs and not too noisey. Right in the coolest area of Istanbul.
Amazing place, friendly staff and great bar.
İstiklalin göbeğinde küçük ama inanılmaz şirin bir apart fotoğraflardakinin tıpatıp aynısı. Küçücük bir alanı mükemmel değerlendirmişler. Çok memnun kaldık tavsiye ederiz :)

If you're looking for a central location and close to nightlife this is the place for you. Its cheap, central, convenient. Host was very kind to let us check in pretty early before 12pm. Was welcomed with turkish tea and even provided us with free welcoming drinks. Great host great apartment! Value for money definitely!
탁심 광장에서 도보 5분 거리인 위치가 굉장한 장점입니다. 하지만 1층이 Raven pub이고 방음은 귀마개를 해도 소용없을 만큼 형편없기 때문에 예민하신 편이라면 힘들 수 있습니다. 마지막날 아침에 물이 잠깐 안나오긴 했지만, 에어컨이나 냉장고 모두 문제없었습니다. 소음 문제만 아니면 가성비 괜찮은 숙소입니다:)
Good location right off taxim square
Great location & hosts! Located over a bar - very good for partying.
装修很现代  很适合情侣  楼下就是Raven的酒吧  他说可以下去喝免费饮料  不过我们都是女孩子就没有去了  Raven和店里小哥人非常好  一开始没有转换插头也是找他们借的  房间很干净  民宿位置也是繁华地带  旁边商店饭店都很多  但是会有一点点吵  介意的话就不推荐咯  很好的住房体验~
Helpful staff, central location. No lift which is a pain but rest was fine!
Really nice place if u like staying around local urban vibe.(too much noise). But really nice vibe
照片看上去挺大,挺好看的,实际房间会小一点,现代感很强

Brilliant location. It could not be more central. This is a great spot if you want to party and enjoy yourself until early in the morning. This is a lively neighborhood, so not for those that need absolute quiet and an early bedtime.

This place is in a great location! Right in the thick of the nightlife of Taksim. My only feedback is that the apartment is not "luxury" as the listing notes. It is comfortable, but basic. 

The hosts from the Bar downstairs were great and super friendly and helpful at all times.
Great location, were helpful when asked.
Convenient location, interior design finishing true to pictures and the hosts were friendly.
Отель хороший. Рекомендую!!!!

The apartment is beautifully designed and located very close to Taksim. The area is vibrant and noisy till late at night. One thing to note is that there is no door between the bedroom and the living room.

It was okay. It's located in the busiest part of the city. There was a small hiccup checking in but the hosts were very nice. We checked in around midnight, and we were just dead tired from traveling. So to be held up at the bar downstairs for a good 15 mins did not make things better. I just wanted to go in, shower, and pass out. The place overall was decent. It looked a lot better in photos. It's clean but the place reeked of smoke. I didn't mind the noise from downstairs that much but don't book here if you're looking for a quiet place.

Our stay was delightful. 

I checked other comments before booking here, as they say it’s quit small place but architect used every area functional and well. And also the place is very close everything you need ! I think it’s a good place for touristic visit and if you like nightlife the place is very close to some good night clubs. Although it can also be noisy to stay... on Monday we had to left early morning and couldn’t get our last sleep well. 

They have also pub at the ground level. Staff were amazingly friendly. In our last night we had time to hang out a bit with them, they offered us free tea and popcorn. That was nice. 

Thanks :)
工業風房間位在小酒吧的樓上,整體風格很喜歡,位置非常好

Perfect spot for sightseeing in Istanbul, in the middle of the night huzzle. The apartment was clean and of perfect size for two persons exploring the city. Only minor point is the noise from the bar downstairs.
Great location !!

Location is perfect for those who’s into late night shenanigans ;) you will get everything in a walking distance. Keep in mind that you probably won’t be able to get any rest when you stay anywhere close to Istiklal. Raven is also a lovely, cosy and inexpensive bar!

The lodge is basically a hotel/hostel above a bar, huge space for the price I paid. Don’t send a message to host in Airbnb apps/site, better to contact him through (Hidden by Airbnb) . Otherwise, the place is centrally located about 10 minutes of walk from Taksim metro station, in the middle of Istanbul night life scenes.
Отличное место в самом центре города. Рядом много пабов, баров и ресторанов. Музыка не стихает 24/7!!! Стильный интерьер! На первом этаже веселый пивной бар!
It was amazing
Nice, clean accommodation with great location to walk to the sights or enjoy the local nightlife ☺️

Location near to Istiklal Caddesi, the centre for Istanbul's nightlife. Hence, don't expect it to be quiet at night. However, very convenient to get around and nice food places around the vicinity as it is very centralised. 5 minutes walk to Taksim Metro. Host is a bartender at the bar below, very friendly and helpful if you have any queries.
Good place, good host but really really noisy. 3 night spent and i only slept 7hours.

숙소위치도 탁심광장에서 멀지않고 필요한것만 딱 있는 느낌입니다.
대신 밤에 노랫소리나 말소리로 시끄럽긴합니다.
그정도빼면 괜찮았습니다.
Çok güzel bir daireydi. Çok teşekkür ediyorum.
Nice apartments in very good location. Host is super friendly

Ev bulunduğu konum itibariyle fazlaca gürültülü. Canlı müzik, kareoke ve barda oturanların sesleri geliyor sürekli. üstelik gece geç saate kadar.
Dinlenmek ve uyumak için ideal degil..

Bunun dışında temiz ve gayet modern dizayn edilmiş odalar, fiyat olarak uygun..
入住还是很愉快的,感谢房东帮我们订了接机车~ 房东很绅士帮忙提了行李箱~^_^唯一的问题就是楼下比较吵,但是看评价也有心理预期的,但从住宿讲和另外一家比还是逊色一点~

Lokasyon çok iyi. Her yer çok temizdi. Işletme sahibi çok kibar ve ilgili. Sadece daire fotoğrafta daha modern görünüyor. Eşyalar yeni değil. Duvarlar bakımsız görünüyor ama belki de tarzı  oyle. Iki televizyon olması çok kullanışlı olmuş. Teşekkür ederim
Great spot and great hosts. Super noisy till circa 6am if room is located on first floor.

탁심광장에서 가까워 이동하기 너무 좋았습니다. 숙소도 깨끗했구, 1층 펍에서 맥주 한잔하기도 좋습니다.
평일에는 괞찮지만 주말 밤에 조금 시끄러웠던게 조금 아쉽네요. 전체적으로는 만족 합니다
Great experience!

Right off the main avenue, Istiklal, with café/bars very near and minutes from Taksim Square with a little park and transport links.

Small space, nice design, clean and cool. Not soundproof, but an easy stop for a citybreak weekend. 

Thanks
Kleines Zimmer direkt über einer Bar gelegen. Ziemlich laut, aber wen das nicht stört, der ist da gut aufgehoben.

Raven’s place was amazing. If you are looking to socialize, party or just visit istanbul, it is the perfect place for you. Close to shops, bars, pubs and the most central street in the old town of Istanbul. The only reason I might not find it suitable for everyone is because there is loud music and party around until about 4:00 AM - If you are a light sleeper and want to go ti bed early this might be a problem for you during the weekend.
Interessante

The place is nothing like the pictures shown  I don’t ever write a bad review but this one has to be done  so other people can see what they are booking the place is not safe for a woman they were many drunk men vomiting outside not pleasant to see i had to book another place

Oda çok güzel design edilmişti ve temizliği, internet hızı vs herşey olması gerektiği gibiydi. Karşılayan kişi de oldukça nazikti. Gürültü hakkında yazılanlarla ilgili olarak, istiklal caddesi gibi merkezi bir yerde kalmak istiyorsanız civardaki kalınacak yerler gürültü açısından farklı değil, bu durum bu yere özel birşey değil. Ayrıca aşırı da bir gürültü yoktu. Ben tavsiye ediyorum.

Great little apartment right in the heart of the city. They let us check in early and leave our stuff behind for a bit longer when we had to check out, which was very nice of them. 
The place is anbit smaller than expected however has all of the basics (no shampoo or shower gel though) and is perfect for a quick stay. The location meant there was a lot of noise up until early hours of the morning, so don’t forget to bring ear plugs!

We stayed on the fourth floor above raven bar for 3 nights. Reg was very nice and friendly once we were there, but no communication prior to check in. The apartment is an excellent location, and being in the 4th floor really helped with the noise. Our main issue was the cleanliness, a strong cigarette odor and in visible stains and mildew around the apartment, even still this is a great value, but people with allergies should be aware.
Great apartment in a vibrant area. Perfect if you are in a mood for party.

Host is very helpful with our queries, the place was very near Taksim square and metro, around 5-10 minutes walk. We were 3 girls and they were very nice to offer help to  carry our luggage’s as there were no lift. Very active nightlife area  and safe . Free coffee and tea , clean and stylish place.
We had a great stay at Raven. Reg was extremely hospitable and the location was good night life.
the space was nice and the area was very cool but it was above a bar so extremely loud. they did move us to a higher floor when we complained.

Its cheap, centrally located, and in a bustling neighborhood full of little bars.  

The apartment is above a bar and the walls are _very_thin and the bar downstairs is loud.  But the hosts were great and the place is super cheap.  Great option if you're on a budget and don't mind sleeping  above a  busy place.

Great location near all kinds of amazing food and cafes. Reg (sp?) at the bar was super helpful and great to chat with. We got the top unit with a balcony which was amazing to listen to people watch and see a bit of sunset. As the description says, and other reviewers have mentioned.. you’ll be on a lively street above a bar. It was beautiful weather and people were out past 3am. I loved the place and would definitely stay again if I’m lucky enough to get back to Istanbul.
Very nice and cosy place next to Taksim square.  Will definitely come back!
Worth it!

The apartment is absolutely gorgeous, really well equipped and perfectly located for exploring Istanbul. The hosts were really helpful in advance, the bar downstairs means there is always somone on hand. 
I would definitely recommend staying here, the only downside was the noise levels at night from the bar, although this might have been exacerbated by the world cup during my visit.
A very nice place in the hustle and bustle of Taksim. We had a good time, even despite the noisy evenings.
We just spent one night and had a very good time. The place has a good location and is near to many sights. The host is very nice and helpful. We would definitely come another time.

Would not recommend.

Unfortunately it was super loud in the flat, even with earplugs sleeping was hard:
The apartment is above a bar. That means loud music and people till 3 a.m. The stairs in the stairway are out of metall. Whenever somebody walks up or down the stairs, the whole house will here it. As the stairs are also used by costumers of the pub, it is very loud till late at night. During our stay there were also builders for two days, hammering and sawing for hours. Host was not helpful when approaching him on this.

You smell smoke in the room and the towels, though there is a "please don't smoke" sign.

Pro: Raven's place is located very convenient close to Istiklal and Taksim. Good to reach via public transportation. AC works.
Really cute apartment right near to Taksim, staff are really nice and were so helpful when I arrived really early for check in.

This was the perfect place for us. We had 5 days in Istanbul and we were comfortable, cool (it was quite hot while we were there!) and found Raven to be a lovely host. You will hear the noise from below and on the street so if you want a silent place, this isn't for you. But we really enjoyed listening to the world go by under our stylish apartment and we were very happy with the location as well! Would highly recommend.

Friendly and accommodating staff. The place was nice but not as big as we expected from the photos. There was often loud music however this may be a feature of the general area of Taksim. Overall nice place to stay.
房间所在的街区真的很热闹,没想到就在独立大街旁边,旁边有很多酒吧不过房间的隔音效果很好还是不会吵到｡另外房间很干净哟,应为到的时候还没到入住时间,所以入住的时候我们在外面,房东很热情地帮我们把寄存的行李提上去了｡周围有很多商店和餐厅,并且离地铁公交站以及出租车站都很近｡总之是很不错的入住体验

It’s really nice place. And i hope to stay here again. Host is very nice and considerable
Person.
Great place in a central part of the city

The appartment is nice. But you can hear loud music all night until 6am. Even the bed is shaking. But if you dont mind the noise the quality is good and the hosts very friendly and there is a nice bar downstair.

This suite is really nice, clean and looks as it does in the photos. Staff were very helpful and friendly. However, do not stay here if you want to get any sleep. There's a bar next door that has live concerts every night, starting about midnight or 1am and they go until sunrise. It was incredibly loud and impossible to sleep for my entire stay.
Nice apartment, as described. Excellent location, a bit noisy during the weekend.

The noise is a real issue, we could not sleep anytime during the night. There was a real concert behind our wall, on a Tuesday it lasted until 6 am. It goes beyond regular street and bar noise. It is a shame because it is well located, but for us it was not a good experience, and the worst thing is that the host did not care about it.
The best thing about the place is the location. It is less than a 5 min walk to Taksim Square. The one bedroom apartment is very well designed, and while small, it is still very comfortable.

Apartamento muy cerca de la plaza Taksim, debajo con muchos bares, a pesar de esto dispone de buena aislamiento en las ventanas, el sitio limpio y ordenado, cerca del metro, en fin buen establecimiento

The apartment was in a great location with easy access to transport, bars, restaurants and shops, and easy to find. However, the apartment seems to back onto a night club and we were kept awake on both nights of our stay by extremely loud live music with a heavy bass which we could hear and feel till early morning, even with ear plugs.  There was a lack of towels and bedding, couldn't get the tvs to work, had to ask for wi-fi code . Also the kitchen' is very basic. A fridge and just a kettle and cups and glasses with no plates, knives, spoons or forks provided and no toaster or microwave. It was smaller than it looked on the photos and would be ok for a couple but was a little crowded with the sofa bed in use.
On a positive note it was generally clean and  the bathroom had a good shower.

As the previous guests wrote, Raven is situated at a top location. Flawless check out. Only 3 cons. First, the check in was not flawless since the guys at the pub did not speak any English and the process was really slow and uneasy. Second, there was neither shampoo nor shower gel, there was only a small hand soap available. Finally, the walls and windows' insulation was inaccurate for the music from the bar downstairs playing till 7 in the morning (but I was prepared for that :) ). Overall, a nice experience!

Raven apartments are run by fantastic people whose communication and response times are great. The apartment is quite dark and a bit gloomy (it's not luxury, it's well lived in modern) but it is perfect for two people who enjoy being in the thick of it and go out a lot at night. The bar downstairs is good fun and run by lovely people. Our room was on level two and the bedroom wall is shared with a neighbouring club who play loud music from 11pm - 4am seemingly every night (the city never sleeps!). I live in the inner city back home and normally sleep like the dead but this level of noise made the bed vibrate and we had awful sleepless nights. Following complaints and two restless nights, we were moved off site to another hotel. I can't speak highly enough of the staff at Raven. We were treated incredibly well and it made the experience worth it. So I would recommend Raven for people who love the nightlife amd can tolerate excessive noise from the neighbours.
rahatlıkla güvenılebıle

The apartment is great! It‘s just a few meters to the Taksim square. It‘s a bit noisy at night because it’s in the middle of the nightlife in Istanbul, which is also good for people who want to go out in the evening/ night. The apartment was clean and perfect for two people! We would choose this apartment anytime again!

We were ok with the noise from the bar and expected this based upon previous reviews. However the owners changed the beer kegs at 8am which was extremely loud, which then followed by over an hour of drilling and building work with little thought for the guests which was a shame.
Nice and cozy apartment, missing kitchen but otherwise good.

It was a great location, clean, and really cute.  No one in the building spoke English or knew the correct WiFi password.  Luckily we got it figured out but I took a few hours and I  needed the WiFi for work, which had been made clear to the host prior to staying there.  Also, the bar downstairs/next door is very noisy until really late, so bring earplugs if you’re a light sleeper.

The place is great, noise didn't bother me, infact it me sleep better because the music was relaxing. hosts were lovely and respected our privacy. The only down side is the bad neighbourhood it can be unsafe  but it is close to Taksim and everything else.

Great location, however it should be noted that the street it’s on is extremely noise all throughout the night. There was also an overwhelming cigarette smell 24 hours a day. Finding the spot was another nightmare. Istanbul is a beautiful city, which made up for the issues with this Airbnb!

Turkcesi asagida:

The first three nights that we stayed there I actually thought “I don’t have one bad thing to say about this place”. The location is amazing, I loved the decoration and the place was spotless and wasn’t nearly as noisy as described by the other reviewers. The only thing that really left a bad taste on my mouth was the fact the host entered our room without communicating it to us first. We came back from outside and there were new towels new sheets etc. In an airbnb I don’t expect room service so I just leave my stuff around (underwear, money etc.). If I had been asked I would have said no thank you, I don’t want any room service. This also made me question if they were there before. Maybe other people won’t think this is a big deal but I would have very much liked to be advised beforehand.

Burada kaldigimiz ilk uc gece burayla ilgili tek bir kotu sey soyleyemem diye dusundum cunku yeri harika, dekorasyon da cok guzel ve asla soylenen kadar gurultulu degil. Dorduncu gecemizde beni rahatsiz eden sey su oldu: disardan geldigimizde odamiza biz yokken host tarafindan girilip yeni havlu vs koyulmus oldugunu gorduk. Ben normalde airbnblerde oda servisi gibi bir beklentiye sahip olmadigim icin esyalarimi baskasinin gorecegi kaygisi olmadan birakiyorum. Eger bana sorulmus olsaydi da oda servisi istemedigimi belirtirdim ama sorulmadi. Haberim olmadan odama girilmis olmasi beni gercekten cok rahatsiz etti. Belki bazi insanlar bunun buyuk bir olay oldugunu dusunmeyebilir ama benim icin onemliydi. Eger sizin icin de onemliyse hostla girmeden istemediginize dair konusun derim.
nice place to have a quick nap and continue on with travel plans

Great location in the city, however the flat is quite small and the furnishings are a bit tired. The apartment has a small pub downstairs that has a nice selection of beers available and live HD football. This location is definitely not for a light sleeper, even with earplugs. There is a live music venue directly adjacent to apartment block and you are likely to hear the sound of guitars and drums. Throughout our week here, this noise was present from midnight til 6:00 am every day and in one case til 9:00am on the 2nd Jan. After finally getting to sleep, on 2 occasions I was woken by a delivery of beer kegs that were dropped on the bottom of the metal spiral stairs. Unfortunately this resonates throughout the entire apartment block. You are spoilt for choice in the city with restaurants so don’t feel like you need to jump in the first place you see. You can wander around the side streets and restaurants are in abundance. Our host was extremely helpful and friendly and made us feel very welcome.
Very good location. Right on Taksim. Highly recommended
Good apartment

name: HALE KIPA 2 VACATION RENTAL
summary: Enjoy a cozy room with a country atmosphere over looking our Beautiful Waimea mountains only 20 minutes to the BEACH. Has all the amenities needed to make your stay comfortable.
description: Enjoy a cozy room with a country atmosphere over looking our Beautiful Waimea mountains only 20 minutes to the BEACH. Has all the amenities needed to make your stay comfortable. Country style  neighborhood with horses cows sheep and friendly family dogs. Places to hike in the pastures near us. 3 miles from Waimea town with 4 different  farmers markets on saturdays. Many fine restaurants to choose from
neighborhood_overview: Country style  neighborhood with horses cows sheep and friendly family dogs. Places to hike in the pastures near us.
notes: 3 miles from Waimea town with 4 different  farmers markets on saturdays. Many fine restaurants to choose from

host.host_about:
I am happily married to the man in the picture for 40 years we had 4 kids who have blessed us with 8 grandchildren. We both  keep active with our grandkids  sports and hula event's. Gerald is happily retired while I still work a side job to give him a break from  me putting him to work with my honey do list.
We have worked together to make Hale KIPA 2 a special place just for you. 
We enjoy meeting people from all over the world and look forward to meeting you.

reviews.comments:
We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Hale Kipa! The place was just as described, and so much more. Mary Kay and Gerald are very kind, welcoming hosts, who made an incredible effort to make the space as perfect and comfortable as can be. Mary Kay's thoughtful details are everywhere.

The kitchen area had everything we would need. Even down to everyday condiments like salt/pepper, oil, ketchup,  butter and even soy sauce! Not to mention coffee, creamer, sugar and filters for the machine. I even saw a candy jar;)

Everything was very new & very clean. The decorative touches are great. A vase of fresh hand picked flowers on a table meant a lot to my wife Lisa. 

Each day we had our coffee and breakfast on the lanai overlooking the scenic hilltops and a pasture with a few sheep and a calf. The birds were singing and roosters chimed in too. 

One day we had planned a hike not far from the house, but the weather was quite foggy. However, foggy weather equals romantic snuggle weather! Needless to say we made the most of it with a bottle of wine, a roaring fire, and by enjoying our lovely accommodation!! The next day we woke up early, hiked, drove around on a few side roads to enjoy the scenery of beautiful Waimea and stopped at some local farmer markets. There are stores close by to get a few groceries,  and quite a large array of restaurants too. 

We took this nice little break from our own Vacation Rental, to enjoy Waimea which is about an hours drive for us.  This stay exceeded our expectations...we shall see you again soon! 
Riaan & Lisa
Indeed! Mary Kay was a very kind host who made me feel welcome @ their home. i booked last minute just by what I saw on the listing n it met all stardard-nice n clean!...thank you!

We sure enjoyed our week at Mary Kay and Gerald's place.  Their pride in their place really shows and they've handled all the little details to make the stay outstanding.  The kitchen was well equipped and even had coffee and tea for us.  The bathroom had all the necessities like shampoo, conditioner, body wash and lotion.  It was so nice having our own private space in this lovely guest house.
The room was nice and Mary Kay was very welcoming, we liked chatting with her !

Aloha,
I really enjoyed my stay at their place. Beautiful space, nice touches, great little kitchenette to cook my meals in. Mary Kay was gracious, and let me borrow her blender for my morning smoothies. There was a problem with the toilet, I let them know, and her husband fixed it right away. Location is centrally located, easy to get to the best beaches, or go Hilo, Hawi etc.  I was grateful to the neighbors roosters for keeping me on track, by helping me get up to get the most out of my days on vacation.

Fabolous!, Fabulous! Fabulous! Everything you'd want and more is supplied. Mary Kay's space is large, clean and pretty with a kitchen stocked with every amenity you need - dishes, flatware, toaster, toaster-oven, hot plate, fridge, microwave, cutting board etc . A large closet gives you a place to stow away your luggage and keep the room neat. There are lots of windows for a cross breeze and a nice overhang so you can leave them open when it rains.  A lanai out front looks over the neighborhood and a few goats and cow. I was sorry to leave!  Mary Kay is the friendliest and most charming of hosts too, which is why we go to Airbnb places; for that personal touch. Thanks for letting me stay at your lovely place.

Mary Kay is a wonderful host. She was always available and very nice. Her loft is fantastic - it has everything that you could possibly need. I only wish that my trip was longer so I could have stayed.
My parents loved their stay. Warm welcome. 5 stars rating. beautiful place very spacious and well maintained. lots of extras. thanks again.

This was everything I'd hoped for and more.  The accommodations were as pictured and even nicer in person.  Everything was spotless.  The host was friendly and welcoming.  I didn't have a lot of interaction with Mary Kay as I was gone very often,  but I had the sense that if I needed assistance,  I would be quickly helped.  I loved the area and highly recommend this host.

Mary Kay was extremely friendly and warm. She greeted us as we drove up to the house. Everything was clean and cozy. There's a small deck, perfect for taking in the cool Waimea weather. This home is on the wet side of Waimea. Trust me when I tell you that after a day at the hot and sunny beach or coastal areas, nothing is more refreshing than returning to cool, misty Waimea. The coast and Hapuna are only 25 minutes away! I grew up in Waimea and this has always been the better weather part of town for me. I highly recommend this spot!

This is a great apartment t, good value, very comfortable bed, great kitchen, very clean with great hosts. Must have car, our main complaint was barking dogs in the neighborhood, seems to be out of the control of the very gracious hosts.
Very clean, quite and private space. Twin bed though.

We were looking for a place outside of the town so we can see the country side and get the feel for the how real people live.  This was a perfect place.  Beautiful greens with back drop of mountain and farm animals running around.  The most impressive about the May Kay's place is the suite itself.  It was a huge place with the details of all the comfort.  Mary Kay is a experienced host and very nice.

+ Very clean studio, good kitchen, beautiful location and quiet, near to good restaurants and groceries stores
- Bed for two tall friends a little bit too small

Awesome!!!!! We really loved it!!! Such a big flat, just for us, in the countryside with everything around!!! You're near the nice beaches of North Kohala, Waipio, Kona.... And it is so peace full !!!!! We recommend +++ this place to everybody who wants to discover the north of Big Island. This was our favorite airbn'b in Big Island and if we come back, we'll go there! Thank you Mary Key and Gerald !!!!!!!

Mary Kay's place was comfortable, clean and in a beautiful location. The room had everything we needed and more including a kitchen, patio and board games! We enjoyed our stay in Waimea and hope to return again.

Really lovely space.  I stayed here for 6 weeks, and it had everything I needed - kitchenette and bathroom are well-stocked and modern.  Mary Kay and Gerald respected my privacy but were lovely when I did see them.  I'd definitely recommend staying here.

We enjoyed the quiet, private, and spacious unit! We can’t wait to our return trip! 
Aloha
The house is very nice and has a lot facilities. Unfortunatly the noise of the dogs and chicken of the neighbour are to loudy. This starts at 5.30 and will nog finish till sunrise.
We had great time at their place, both Mary and Gerald were super friendly and kind. We wish we could stay longer. The interior design was gorgeous, we loved it!

The space is roomy and very comfortable. Great kitchen and bath. Comfortable bed. Mary Kay was at work when I arrived and left but her husband was gracious and very helpful. Except for some animal noises (neighbor dogs and roosters that crow throughout the day) this would have been a quiet, relaxing oasis for my couple of days in Waimea. If animal noises don’t bother you I highly recommends Mary Kay’s place.

The place was spacious, clean, private and the host family was very friendly and helpful. We loved having space to spread out and relax and it was in a good location relative to the town of Waimea. The place itself and every interaction with Mary Kay was great. Only caveat is that if you are sensitive to noise, the family across the road seems to have upwards of 10 roosters and several very loud dogs that are always outside and barking. We closed the windows and ran the fan and were able to sleep without any issue, though.

Lovely space on top floor of a neighborhood home a couple of miles outside of Waimea.  This is a comfortable and clean upstairs studio, with full kitchen, good quality bed, flat screen table, recliner to put your feet up and lanai with view to the hills.  The only drawback is that it can get a bit noisy with the neighborhood roosters and dogs, but closing the front windows when necessary mitigates this and there is still plenty of ventilation from the rear windows.  Mary Kay's place is highly recommended for a short or long stay in the Waimea area.
This was a great place to stay in Waimea.

My boyfriend and I really enjoyed the comfortable, clean and cozy studio to unwind and relax. I liked the style and decoration of the place. Mary Kay has good taste for interior design! The family was very kind and helpful. I absolutely recommend staying here!
We loved staying in such a beautiful studio. Everything we need it was provided, communication was very good.
Nice place to stay

name: Honolulu 1 BR/1Bath Condo - Hilton Hawaiian
summary: At heart of Waikiki. It is located at the Hilton Hawaiian Village and access to all amenities. Resort view suite w/ balcony features a master bedroom with two double or a King bed, 50" D TV and spa-like bathroom with a sleek shower, a deep soaking bathtub, private water closet with bidet seat and elegant vanity area. It includes a generous living room with dining area, 55" HD TV, DVD player, and queen-size sleeper sofa, as well as a fully equipped stainless steel appliances w/ washer and dryer.
space: This is a timeshare I own and it is a full condo with kitchen and laundry. You no longer have to pack for every day you and your family will wear. You have a washer and dryer, refrigerator, stove and microwave. You don't have to do the dishes because you will have a made that will clean every day for you.
description: At heart of Waikiki. It is located at the Hilton Hawaiian Village and access to all amenities. Resort view suite w/ balcony features a master bedroom with two double or a King bed, 50" D TV and spa-like bathroom with a sleek shower, a deep soaking bathtub, private water closet with bidet seat and elegant vanity area. It includes a generous living room with dining area, 55" HD TV, DVD player, and queen-size sleeper sofa, as well as a fully equipped stainless steel appliances w/ washer and dryer. This is a timeshare I own and it is a full condo with kitchen and laundry. You no longer have to pack for every day you and your family will wear. You have a washer and dryer, refrigerator, stove and microwave. You don't have to do the dishes because you will have a made that will clean every day for you. Want to treat you and your family like a royalty? To start, you will not have to wait the long line to check in like the Hilton Village. You will you have your own lobby and will be treated wit
neighborhood_overview: Coming on Friday night? You will have access to the Only firework show in Waikiki put by Hilton, your host.
notes: If you have a large family to accommodate, please let me know and I'll see what I can do. I can get from 1-3BR suites.
transit: There is public transportation 24/7.
access: Want to treat you and your family like a royalty? To start, you will not have to wait the long line to check in like the Hilton Village. You will you have your own lobby and will be treated with a lei. You will have access to all the amenities at the Hilton Hawaiian Village like a water slide for the kids and many different pools. Plenty of restaurants onsite like Benihana's, Kobe Steak, Kali Steak House. Need something? It has 2 ABC stores on site that will have basically anything you might need and many more stores on site.
interaction: I won't interact with you as I will just let you check in on your own as if you were the owner of the timeshare while your stay.
house_rules: • Check-in time is 3PM. • Check-out time is 11am(This may vary depending on the location). Like any other place you stay, please be mindful that you will be responsible for any damages caused by your group.

reviews.comments:
Amazing luxury apartment with all the latest furnishings and appliances. 

Cons:
The view from the balcony was nothing to write home about, (a roof with a steam vent pipe) but we were too busy out and about to spend time staring out the window anyway.

The Great Islander tower is quite far from all the main Hilton pools so be prepared to walk a bit.

Pros:
Everything was extremely clean and we enjoyed being able to use the washer and dryer for our clothes.

Great access to all the Hawaiian Hilton Village amenities and activities. Our girls loved the pools and the lei making class. 

Loads of shops to browse and ABC shops to get staples. 

Overall we loved our stay here and would book again with Dimas!

name: Beautiful Barra da Tijuca beachfront apart-hotel !
summary: WEEKLY AND MONTHLY DISCOUNTS AVAILABLE (please contact host for calculation over the announced prices) Please note that price is for two occupants at a time (3rd and 4th guests pay 50% of the period rate each). Complimentary: Wireless internet at Reception & Swimming Pool areas; Full gym; Heated swim pool; Sauna (dry & steam); Hot tube; Playground; Game room; Beach towels & umbrellas. Rates for Holidays, Christmas and New Year's require minimum occupancy. Please ask for details.
space: TripAdvisor great reviews, with five and a half starts for Barraleme Hotel Residencia:  (Website hidden by Airbnb)  Lots of comfort on a 165 sq ft apartment at Rio's famous Praia do Pepe beach point. Ideal for family and kids. Entry hall with complimentary WiFi and full time Reception services. lockable Master bedroom,  Convertible living/dinner room, Open balcony looking at the swimming pools (children and adults), Full bath, Full kitchen. Air conditioning, Heated water, TV, Cable TV, Interphone,Telephone & Covered parking space. Notebook space, 5 elevators  24h in-house security, check-in and porter services. Complimentary extras: Full gym; Heated swim pool; Sauna (dry & steam); Jacuzzi/Hot tube; Playground; Game room; Beach towels & umbrellas. Pay as you  use: Coffee Shop; Beauty parlor; Messenger; Business Center; Laundry - Washer & Dryer; Maintenance; Housekeeping and more.

Complimentary: Wireless internet at Reception & Swimming Pool areas; Full gym; Heated swim pool; Sauna (dry & steam); Hot tube; Playground; Game room; Beach towels & umbrellas. Air conditioning, Heated water, TV, Cable TV, Interphone,Telephone & Co
neighborhood_overview: At Pepê Avenue 600, you have Barra da Tijuca Beach right in front of the building; and very close access to various services and goods providers.
notes: Multilingual chauffeured cars and/or tour guiding also available at very affordable rates.
transit: Located  in Jardim Oceânico - a neighborhood with plenty of commerce and entertainment. 15 minutes to S.Conrado by car or bus (on subway: 13 minutes to Leblon / Ipanema and 35 minutes to downtown Rio). Close to city's Convention Center (Riocentro) & Citibank Hall (best show house in town; Few minutes to Barrashopping / New York City Center (Largest Latin-american  stores / cinemas / restaurants and entertainment complex) and to  Downtown Shopping Center. 3 minutes walking to Pepe Beach Hut - famous surf e kite-surfing point  in Barra da Tijuca.
access: Comfortably accommodates up to four people with complete privacy and full access (wheel-chair friendly building). Price is for double occupancy only, with each extra guest increasing the cost by 50%.
interaction: Fluent Portuguese, Spanish and English telephone guest support, as needed. Especial assistance by experienced international airline personnel available upon request.
house_rules: A 2 day advance notice for booking is not mandatory, but preferable.  Offered rates are for two occupants at a time, with price increasing 50% for each extra guest. For your safety and comfort, this is a No Smoking place. Enjoy your stay.

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

address.street: Barra da Tijuca - Rio de Janeiro, RJ, Brazil

reviews.comments: O ap é muito bom, recomendo a todos, conversei pelo whats o tempo todo com o anfitrião e nao tive nenhum problema, obrigado por tudo

Excelente comunicação com o anfitrião e sua esposa, bem como, a recepção no Barra Leme Hotel Residence, o qual possui piscina aquecida, hidromassagem, serviço de praia sem custo, academia, salão de jogos, cabeleireiros(custo adicional) e o melhor lugar da praia da Barra (entre o Posto e Posto 2). Local seguro e agradável, com preço muito justo. Parabéns aos anfitriões e obrigado.

name: so homey and spacious and comfy room!
summary: Located just 5-10 minutes walks away to Happy Valley Racecourse,  HongKong Sanatarium Hospital and Bowen Road. Female, male,couple welcome to our humble abode. The apartment size is 800 sq ft. Use furnished common areas such as living room, dining area, kitchen with oven, dishwasher microwave Nespresso machine etc and other utilities. Many restaurants to dine in the area, but the apartment itself has a spacious kitchen, this is your home too and feel free to cook! Welcome!
space: Comfy, homey feel with a good space to move around,  2 bathrooms, one of room with its own desk and own bathroom

Comfy, homey feel with a good space to move around,  2 bathrooms, one of room with its own desk and own bathroom Easy access to public transport, main road is just across to where building is located. Car park is also available, on hourly to day rate. Multicultural community, many expats living in area, quiet and decent neighborhood, several good restaurants to cater for international taste buds. Grocery shops. Closest MTR subway is Causeway Bay station, can walk to get there, takes about 20 mins but there are severa
neighborhood_overview: Multicultural community, many expats living in area, quiet and decent neighborhood, several good restaurants to cater for international taste buds. Grocery shops. Closest MTR subway is Causeway Bay station, can walk to get there, takes about 20 mins but there are several mini bus to get there. Takes about 5-10 minutes
notes: We are glad to note that all our guest has been satisfied in their stay. They made it their home and had created good memories, in their HK and apartment stay. Also to note that the apartment also has been hired to shoot commercial videos,  so Dont be surprised if you happen to see it in your television!
transit: Very close to Wanchai and Causeway Bay, just 5 minutes by mini bus which comes too often, can even walk to get there (though takes about 20-30 minutes walk. To The Peak and Repulse Bay ls 5 minutes by taxi, also to Central. There are also busses to get to  Central and North Point. For those who enjoy walks, we are close to Bowen Road. Happy Valley Race Course which are just 5-15 minutes walk.
access: Easy access to public transport, main road is just across to where building is located. Car park is also available, on hourly to day rate.

host.host_about: No fuss, easy going and fun! Charismatic too need to add:)

reviews.comments:
Margie is super nice! She was feel very comfortable in her Apt. It's very spacious also. The location is great! It's very easy to go around with the bus, uber, taxi and metro.
I recommended her place to all my friends and family for sure!
She gave us a lot of tips on where to go and what to do in Hong Kong.
房東非常熱情,讓我們廳裡的洗衣機,廚房隨便用,雖然我們沒怎麼用⋯ 住起來還是很舒服,房間大,很乾淨,比酒店好多了

Marje's is a very good host, she has a very warm personality and is pretty easy going.  Although I did not get to meet her in person, Marje could be reached easily to provide any assistance needed. The apartment itself is exactly the same as the pictures, it is very clean, tastefully decorated and smells great.  It is very spacious for Hong Kong standard. The apartment is located in a very safe. family oriented and rather high-end neighbourhood.  It offers much better value than booking hotel, I do highly recommend and will certainly consider again for future trips.
Marje is a easy going lady, she is always out of home. The house is clean and cozy. Will book again.
Nice host nice apt
The room is big and clean, you can have a lot of space there. The location is near the causeway bay and some shopping malls. Anyway it is a nice choice if you are going to Hong Kong.
Booked for my cousins. Marje is very nice and friendly. They had a wonderful stay.

My stay at Marje's apartments was just awesome - very spacious and bright room with a great view and private bathroom. The host is great! Marje with ease accommodated all my complex requests, for what i'm even more grateful. Having stayed at around 5 aribnbs in HK, I would highly recommend to anybody to stay here - great value! I would stay here next time I need a place in HK
The host canceled this reservation 10 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

The room is big, clean and comfortable which is rare in HK. Marje is quiet easygoing and helpful. She recommended many good places. And happy valley jockey on every Wednesday is highly recommended by me if you live in this apartment.
The host canceled this reservation 7 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Great value. Recommend for everyone..

Great location in Happy Valley, easy walking distance to restaurants and shops, and quiet sleep at night. Wonderful hospitality from Marje, and quick replies from her especially because I booked one day before arrival! Her home is modern and spacious, and having my own bathroom was a plus. Marje gave good tips on HK and was the best host - would stay with her again!

Marie’s place is suitable for family stay and very homey, especially when I opened the Refrigerator and closet. The rooms are spacious, unlike regular HK apartment. And the security guy is very helpful and hospitable. I enjoyed my stay a lot.
Perfect! recommend to anyone who want to stay in hk for couple days!

Marie’s place is conveniently located at Happy Valley, about 5 mins walk from the nearest tram station. Nicely done up and very homely indeed.  Marje is super responsive whenever I had a question and is really friendly and nice.
The host canceled this reservation 29 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
센트럴에서 버스나 트램으로 20분 정도 떨어져있습니다. 트램이나 버스정류장이 근접해 교통은 크게 불편하지 않습니다. 깔끔하고 적당한 크기의 거실과 방2개가 있어 3~4명 단위 여행객들에게 좋을것 같습니다. 불만족스러운 부분은 없었습니다. 추천합니다.

Overall experience: very recommendable! Great location, cozy spacious and modern toons&deco, awesome furnishings. Where you can immediately feel relaxed after a tiring exploring day. And Marje offered quite prompt and timely information, which is really sweet and thoughtful. We’d definitely love to come back again when visiting HK next time.
thanks again Marje, excellent host. Great location with excellent transportation. Cozy and safe area. Will stay again for sure when i am visiting Hong Kong again.
The host canceled this reservation 8 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Thanks again Marje, for extending my stay in Hong Kong. Perfect host and apartment suite, so far the very best Airbnb experience staying here, highly recommended. Will definitely stay again when planning my future visit in HK.

Marje is so kind and thoughtful, replying prompt and helpful. Very recommend for Traveller to cherish the sharing from Marje. Location is Happy Valley which is excellent,  convenient but still a quiet and friendly community. Marje's flat is spacious in Hong Kong and well maintained, the 2nd bedroom as a bonus for us, so that as party of 2 people traveling, we were taking a break sharing bed in Marje's place, thanks so much! Totally perfect experience staying here.
Perfect for a stay in HK

Marje’s place is in an excellent location with good views, local amenities and provisions in the flat eg. plenty of towels, crockery, a washing machine and even a dishwasher in the kitchen. The flat (and lift to get up there) is spacious with comfortable furniture and 2 bathrooms. The building security men are friendly and efficient as is Marje who answers any questions quickly and politely. I would definitely recommend this flat over staying in a hotel. It’s great value and a home from home.

Thanks Marje so much fir everything.

Marje is a wonderful host. She offered me a master bedroom which is totally unexpected. Her place is spotlessly clean and looks exactly the same as the pictures. She lets me have as much personal space possible, trying her best to feel home. 

The location is close to Causeway Bay, just a walking distance (about 20mins for me). It is a very nice residential area too. 

這是一個非常乾淨､舒服的家｡Marje把最好的主臥房給我,自己睡較小的房間,務求給我最多的私人空間｡非常貼心､親切｡

謝謝妳!
Great place!
非常好的房东,发邮件都回得很迅速｡两房一厅两浴室一厨房,装修不错,非常温馨｡性价比太高了,比我之前在香港住酒店的体验好｡小区也很安全｡总之,很推荐｡
The best room and landlord I have meet in Airbnb. Almost everything is perfect. Marjie is very nice.
房东人真的超棒,超热心｡行程中有她的出现真的加分很多

位于铜锣湾地铁站附近1.5km,周边比较安静｡
房主热情好客｡
旅程很满意｡
Marje is very hospitable and the bedroom is very nice!

name: Park Slope Apt:, Spacious 2 bedroom
space: Imagine a quiet, spacious apartment, with beautiful sunlight, just steps from the terrific restaurants and shops of this wonderful neighborhood.  Near many subway stops (including the R train 1/2 block away), easy to get to Manhattan; four blocks from Prospect Park; near to the Brooklyn Botanic Garden and Brooklyn Museum.  You'll have the best of both worlds: you'll be in a fun, hip, laid-back neighborhood, but close to the sights and action of Manhattan! The apartment is a duplex with two large bedrooms, two full baths, terrace, fully stocked kitchen, dw, wi-fi.   Note: On dates the apartment is marked unavailable on the calendar, one bedroom/bath in the apartment often is available (view my related listing, "Sunny, Large, Park Slope Bedroom").  You would be sharing the place with me - and my cat. Extended stays and a willingness to take care of my wonderful cat yield a discount! I'd greatly appreciate it if you would make an inquiry so we can e-chat for a bit before sending an offer.

house_rules: No pets, no smoking. The $25/night for each guest after 2 applies only when one bedroom is being rented.  If the full apartment is being rented, no additional charge per person is imposed.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about:
In truth, I started with airbnb to bring in some additional funds.  In reality, I never knew this could be so much fun!  I love meeting people from all over the states and all over the world, including Croatia, Germany, Israel and Vermont!  

If you're renting one bedroom from me, my bedroom/bathroom are upstairs, so you'll see me around breakfast; but, I work a lot and want you to feel like the place is your own - to enjoy the tv/stereo in the living room, to cook meals in the kitchen, and to come and go without feeling like you need to check in.  At the same time, if you need anything from me, please let me know and I'll do my best to make it happen!

If you're renting the full place, I know you will enjoy your yourselves.  The apartment is big (even by non-NYC standards); comfortable, but not pretentious.  And, of course, there's Allie the cat, who is totally sweet and very people-friendly (though, sadly, she doesn't like other critters).

Let me know if you have questions.  I'll be happy to host you!

reviews.comments: We have had some great experiences using Air BnB to travel to New York, but Liz's place is the best of them all.  It's in a great location in Park Slope, near the subway and many great restaurants and shops.  The apartment is very spacious and clean.  Allie the cat is a good proxy host while Liz is away.  Thanks Liz for a wonderful visit!

Elizabeth was a fabulous host. She picked us out from NYC standby list promptly and we reached a week long deal within a day for a short notice arrangement, great communication.

Her location in Park Slope is prime, only a few stops away from south end of Manhattan. Subway station is literally around the corner, you can only get more convenient if you build a subway entrance directly in her living room. Everyone I have talked to about Brooklyn, they all praise Park Slope area.

Apartment is spacy, full of light at daytime, totally quiet at night time and she has manually operated AC units to take care of the heat. It runs through two floors, with a second bedroom upstairs with a private entrance. Kitchen and bathroom have everything you need, in fully working condition. It literally is home away from home.

Her cat Allie is totally cool and friendly, we took care of her for the week when Liz was away.

Take care, Liz. We had a great introduction trip to NYC. Hope to see you again!

Liz was very communicative and has a wonderfully convenient apartment for a few day stay in the area.  It was no fuss to take our 6 month old into the city as the station is only a half block away, and there are tons of delicious restaurants and groceries  within two or three blocks to come home to!

we stayed at Liz's apartment  for little over 2 weeks, and it was great.
the apartment has a great space and great natural light . the location is very good, close to the trendy bards and cafes of 5th av, and close to the R line going to Manhattan.
the cat was nice and friendly, so much that our 15 months daughter kept looking for him in our new apartment.
Liz was great and welcoming, and really made us feel at home.
As a small family we warmly recommend this location for anyone who wants to enjoy both the hectic side of Manhattan quite neighborhood vibe and privacy of park slope. 
Nany, Tamar and Ariel.
Great place for a family of four (two large bedrooms), and Elizabeth was a very generous and responsive host. And Allie the cat is very sweet!

We've just come back from New York. It was an amazing experience! We had a very pleasant stay in Liz's appartment, which is spacioius and very clean. The location is only  a couple of steps away from the subway, which is very convenient for travellers. On top of all, Liz is very easygoing, communicative, and wonderful. She was always ready to offer information about New York city. Her cat, Allie, is friendly and  very quiet. Our two daughters just adore her.
We feel that we really lucked out with Elizabeth and her Park Slope apartment.  She was approachable, honest and generous with us.  We had a great visit and now are true fans of Brooklyn!

We had a wonderful stay at Liz's apartment.  The apartement itself was clean, spacious and well equiped and her cat Allie was a sweet an unobtrusive presence.  It's in a great and very convenient neighborhood.  Lis was an attentive host despite being out of town.  We wouldn't hesitate to stay there again.

We stayed at Elizabeth's apartment for 10 days and had a wonderful time. Elizabeth is kind and helpful - and the communication was great. Also, the location of the apartment, very close to 5th avenue, was very convenient. We would definitely recommend this!

My family flew in from England and had the apartment for a week and loved it! It's perfectly situated in Park Slope Brooklyn half a block away from the subway and in a very safe neighborhood, the apartment itself was great, very spacious and comfortable. Anyone thinking of coming to NY would be silly to pay the price for a hotel when you can have all the comforts of home at more than half the price. Would highly recommend Liz's apartment to anyone who wants to be near NYC. World trade center, Macy's, Time Square and Central Park are all on the train line less than a block away, no need to even transfer to other trains. And the neighborhood was wonderful with plenty of shops, bars and restaurants there was even  an English bar a few blocks away!,  Liz was great, any questions we had were promptly answered and Allie the cat was so cute, All in all a great place to stay a great location and would go back for sure.

Our family of 4 adults spent a fantastic long weekend celebrating a milestone occasion in NYC, staying at Liz's apartment as our home base.  The apartment is immaculate, spacious, situated in a great location close to the subway, great restaurants and all the basic conveniences.  Liz was a gracious host, warmly sharing her home with us.  Her neighbors are friendly and street parking was relatively easy to find.  And Allie,  her cat, was a welcoming added bonus!
This is an excellent apartment.  Great location, convenient to Prospect Park, Carrol Gardens and all the transport you need.  Super attentive owner.

Liz was very responsive to each of my email inquiries, including following-up once we were actually in the apartment.  This is a wonderful space to serve as a launching point for Manhattan or a home base to relax with Allie the Cat!

Elizabeth's apartment is quite nice, it comes equipped with two large bedrooms, one with a private bathroom, a big living room and a fully equipped kitchen. Both rooms and the living room have big windows that let in a lot of light. The apartment is clean and comfortable, and the subway I'd right on the corner (R line). With only one stop you're in Atlantic avenue station, where you can connect with many other lines.
The only reason I'm not giving five stars is because of some noise from the upstairs apartment. It seems that some children live there and we could sometimes hear they running around. It wasn't overbearing but it did wake me up than I wanted to one morning, so I reckon it's worth one star. Apart from that me and my friends had a nice stay and Elizabeth's personally was very sweet and easy to deal with.

Liz's home met our needs perfectly, being in close proximity to Manhattan but without the crowds.  As a runner, I appreciated it being a few blocks from Prospect Park.  As a family, it has the feeling of being at home without the confines of a hotel room and having the secure street entry door gave my wife extra peace of mind.   All of  her recommendations were spot on, including restaurants and even the car service.  Liz was very communicative and provided helpful feedback for any questions.   We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and given the opportunity, would use her flat again.

L'appartement d'Elizabeth est vraiment parfait : la cuisine est très bien équipée ; les deux chambres sont spacieuses ; les deux salles de bain très confortables . Configuration idéale pour des parents à un étage et les enfants à l'autre. Un balcon donne sur des jardinets où domine la végétation. Nous n'avons pas rencontré Elizabeth, mais elle avait laissé dans l'appartement beaucoup de renseignements qui nous ont été fort utiles et a toujours été très réceptive dans nos échanges. L'immeuble est à quelques minutes à pied de la station Union Street (ligne R qui dessert Brooklyn et Manhattan) et on accède en 15 mn à pied à Prospect Park. Malheureusement, suite à l'ouragan Sandy, le passage sous l'East river est en travaux jusqu'en novembre 2014 et il faut changer de ligne pour accéder à Manhattan. Le séjour fut cependant très agréable, la chatte Allie semblant aussi apprécier notre compagnie, et nous gardons un excellent souvenir des jours passés chez Elizabeth. .

Staying at Elizabeth's place in Park Slope was the first time I have ever used Airbnb. From the very first inquiry I made until the day I was leaving was an absolute delight.  
Elizabeth was very quick to respond and easy to touch base with. My friend and I were able to spend time with her sweet cat while she was away while also enjoying the home away from home feeling  during our visit.  
The photos certainly do not do the house justice.  The view in the morning was amazing.  The water pressure is lovely, the house was so clean and easy to move around in.  Transportation to and from the city and different neighborhoods in Brooklyn was easy.  
I hope to stay in touch with her and visit again.

We had a wonderful time in Liz's apartment. It was comfortable, spacious, clean - and we felt right at home. Liz was super responsive and so easy to deal with. The neighborhood was lovely as well. And we enjoyed Allie :-). We'd definitely stay there again!

Our stay in Elizabeth's apartment was a blast.After traveling all around USA and staying at different hotels it felt so good to feel comfortable as we are in our own home.The apartment is so clean and it has everything you would ever need.The cat Allie was also a bonus to have (she is very easy,calm and nice to have around).
Elizabets was always there to help just a message ahead.Neighborhood is nice and safe and even it is in Brooklyn,the  R train is just at the corner which makes it very easier to get to Manhattan.R was under construction and was not running weekdays when we were there,just our luck! But it was not very hard even with that.We are very glad to stay in Elizabeth's.And will definitely stay with her for the next time.

Everything was great! From the apartment to the neighborhood. Excellent connection to Manhattan via subway. The apartment is cozy and spacious, and Allie (the cat) is just adorable! It was really a great experience. Thank you Elizabeth!

Liz was an accommodating host.  She was easy to talk to an get a hold of.  Her apartment is exactly as described.  It was very spacious, clean, and met our needs perfectly.  Her cat Allie was friendly and sweet we loved her.  Listed instructions were clear.  We would stay again in the future.
What a wonderful "home away from home" for us! Both apartment and Liz were wonderful! We recommend this owner and her home highly. (And Allie the Cat is awfully cool, too!)

Elizabeth is an excellent host!  Her apartment is very clean, comfortable, and in a great location - the Park Slope neighborhood of Brooklyn is a very fun place to be!  Her instructions and suggestions were very helpful, and she was more than gracious in sending back a few left-behind items!

neighborhood_overview: There are many local and chain shops and restaurants within 5 minutes walking distance. There is a Dunkin' Donuts/Baskin Robbins and a local pizza shop just on the corner at Nostrand Ave. Turn south from that corner and you'll see Key Foods and Wolf's grocery stores down the block. You'll also find a florist, a Dollar Tree, the US Post Office, and a local sneaker shop all on the same block. Turn north and see a huge Nike store, Target, local eateries, corner bodegas (that stay open late), Applebees, Home Goods, David's Bridal, AT&T, Duane Reade, local food shops, wine/liquor stores, restaurants, hardware stores, department stores and much, much more. Everything is close by!! The area is FANTASTIC and provides everything you'll need for your stay.
notes: Great News! My fiance and I have purchased our dream home!*Cheering* But our lease for our one bedroom apartment in Brooklyn is over on February 1st!  We have moved all the furnisher and have left our Full Size Futon and wifi for happy and humble guests who would like to use it. For the whole month of January we are opening our lovely doors to YOU!
transit: It is easy to get to and from the apartment via public transportation. Subway 2/5 trains to Flatbush Ave/Brooklyn College Station (5 min) B44 Select and Local busses (5 min) Dollar cabs take you up and down Flatbush Ave for just $2 cash/ride (3 min) Zip car (5 min)
access: Guests will have access to the entire apartment. It will be empty except for you and your friends.

It was a great comfortable apartment, bigger than the photos, and super comfortable bed. I really like the projector as well we were able to use it all with no problems. We really felt as if it was a place of our own

Although I had not see the landlord, but their brother took care me really well. Awesome place, I have a lot of fun in there with my friends. The stuffs showing at photos are real, if I there is next time, I will pick this place again.

Irwin amd Shelly are incredible hosts! Extremely giving, understanding, and communicative! When I checked in late at night they even were there to have the problem fixed immeditely! I would highly recommend staying with them. You will not regret it!

name: Myboat & Yacht rentals
summary: HOW IT WORKS THE SLEEPING MODE:  *Short term boat stay Start times for full nights  are on request, though usually between 21:00 till 09:30 with breakfast include. HOW IT WORKS DAY CRUISING: Each day charter is an 8 hour day. Start times for full days are on request,
space: SMART CHARTER DOURO HOW IT WORKS THE SLEEPING MODE: *Short term boat stay Start times for full nights  are on request, though usually between 21:00 till 09:30 with breakfast include. For sleeping the 2 nights is cost the price on the site 385.00€ This is one of our most popular boats.  It has an open plan cabin, as well as fully functioning bathroom.  On top of this it has large sun beds at both the front and back of the boat making it a great choice for soaking up the rays in style! HOW IT WORKS DAY CRUISING: Each day charter is an 8 hour day. Start times for full days are on request, though usually between 10:00 to 13:00.  Please ask if you would like to see the sunset! It's pretty cool to have a day on the water but even better if you add some toys.  We have extras such as: paddleboards, kayaks, Seabobs, jet skis and more.  We can also offer specialised catering. OUR BOAT INCLUDES: * Complimentary beer, wine, cava, soft drinks and water * Complimentary snacks * Complimentary towels
