host.host_about: Travel lover

address.street: Vila Nova de Gaia, Porto, Portugal

name: Casa da Porta Amarela
summary: Pequeno apartamento, alegre e encantador, situado num genuíno bairro portuense, muito perto de restaurantes típicos e comércio tradicional. Tem um pequeno pátio privado. A 20 minutos do centro é um excelente espaço para férias.
space: Tem um quarto com uma cama de casal, outro com duas camas de solteiro e um sofá cama na zona comum.  A sala de jantar com sofá comunica directamente com a cozinha que está bem equipada e funcional. O pátio com ligação à cozinha e à sala, é ideal para relaxar ao ar livre.
description: Pequeno apartamento, alegre e encantador, situado num genuíno bairro portuense, muito perto de restaurantes típicos e comércio tradicional. Tem um pequeno pátio privado. A 20 minutos do centro é um excelente espaço para férias. Tem um quarto com uma cama de casal, outro com duas camas de solteiro e um sofá cama na zona comum.  A sala de jantar com sofá comunica directamente com a cozinha que está bem equipada e funcional. O pátio com ligação à cozinha e à sala, é ideal para relaxar ao ar livre. O apartamento fica num 1º andar sem elevador (Rua Coutinho de Azevedo, 79 - 1ºAndar (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) Porto) Há sempre lugar para estacionamento grátis nas redondezas, porém a 200 metros existe estacionamento pago privativo . Estamos disponíveis para qualquer contacto ou esclarecimento e queremos dar todo o apoio durante a vossa estadia. Situa-se num bairro tipicamente portuense, muito sossegado e seguro. A vizinhança é tranquila, cordial e simpática.  Esta zona essencialmente freq
neighborhood_overview: Situa-se num bairro tipicamente portuense, muito sossegado e seguro. A vizinhança é tranquila, cordial e simpática.  Esta zona essencialmente frequentada por portuenses tem excelentes restaurantes de cozinha de gastronomia portuguesa e é muito próxima de todo o tipo de comércio tradicional: frutarias, cafés, supermercados, etc.
notes: Este apartamento faz parte de um conjunto de 3 pequenos apartamentos que compõem o mesmo edifício – Casa da Porta Amarela (1º Andar), Casa da porta Vermelha (2º Andar) e Casa da Porta Azul (3º Andar).
transit: O apartamento fica na Rua Coutinho de Azevedo 79-1º- (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) Porto. A 20 minutos a pé do centro da cidade, tem transportes públicos (autocarros) a 50 metros. Fica a 10 minutos de duas paragens de metro – “Marquês” e “Campo 24 de Agosto” - esta última tem ligação directa com o aeroporto Francisco Sá Carneiro e com a estação de comboios de Porto-Campanhã.
access: O apartamento fica num 1º andar sem elevador (Rua Coutinho de Azevedo, 79 - 1ºAndar (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) Porto) Há sempre lugar para estacionamento grátis nas redondezas, porém a 200 metros existe estacionamento pago privativo .
interaction: Estamos disponíveis para qualquer contacto ou esclarecimento e queremos dar todo o apoio durante a vossa estadia.
house_rules: Só é permitido fumar nas zonas exteriores da casa.  Durante a noite deve evitar ruídos e respeitar o descanso dos vizinhos. A casa deve ser deixada nas mesmas boas condições em que é entregue.

host.host_about: Artista plástica, cenógrafa.

reviews.comments:
A quem estiver indeciso em relação à estadia na casa. 
Decidam bem, decidam pela Casa da Porta Amarela (ou vermelha ou azul). Uma decoração personalizada, pensada e acolhedora. 4 pessoas ficam aqui à vontade. Tem tudo o que é preciso e mais. Lençóis e quartos muito cheirosos. Tranquilo.
Localizada a alguns minutos do centro mas para nós não foi problema andar. Vale a pena aqui ficar, pela casa, pelos anfitriões. 
Obrigada por tudo! Hei-de voltar.

Don't look anywhere else. Just stay here, you'll have everything to make your stay even better. A house where you wish you could live. Very quiet, just like the pictures with an  amazing decor. I love Porto and I want to stay here when I visit again.

le logement étant à 10 min de centre, nous étions loin de touriste et nous avons pu plus profiter d'échange avec des portugais. beaucoup de commerce à proximité, restaurants...ligne de bus (305 )qui nous amène au centre donc pas de souci si on ne veux pas marcher. quartier calme. logement confortable , bien équipé même si nous n'avons pas profité de la cuisine ( nous avons déjeuner qu'à l'extérieur) . idéal pour découvrir porto. il y a des azuleros sur certaines façades de maison dans le quartier.

Le logement correspondait exactement aux photos.
Nous avons été très bien accueillis par Sissa qui avait mis à notre disposition de la documentation touristique (plan ville, brochures, livres) l'appartement est décoré avec gout et très fonctionnel. Propre et calme nous nous sommes très vite sentis comme chez nous. Très proche de ligne de bus ou mètro, pour visiter Porto c'est l'idéal

l appartement est situé dans une rue résidentielle très calme en restant très proche du centre.
Nombreux petits commerce autour donc très pratique pour vivre comme un habitant de porto

Très joli appartement bien décoré,très propre et très bien équipé (cuisine avec tout le nécessaire ,machine a laver, wifi y compris une cafetière nespresso)
Le gros plus de cet appartement est une magnifique terrasse fleurie en cours intérieure et sans vis à vis qui permet de se relaxer en extérieur.

l accueil par la propriétaire est excellent,elle a été très disponible .Nous avons reçu plein d information sur les choses à visiter,les bonnes adresses.

Dans le futur je choisirais a nouveau cet appartement

Our experience at this apartment was superb. Sissa, the host, was very nice and incredibly helpful at giving us advice on how to enjoy Porto. The apartment is spatious, very well decorated and provides just about everything you might need to feel at home. The kitchen in especially convenient. The rooms are really charming, featuring dim lights and traditional furniture. While not at the city centre, it is located a 15 minute walk from it and you have bus and subway stops down the road. Highly recommendable.

Sissa, thank you so much for letting us stay in your appartement. We enjoyed it so much. It was clean, tidy and cozy!! After a whole Day walking aroud Porto, The best was sitting in the patio with a glass of port.
Totally recomendable, also for families with children.

L'appartement de Sissa est très confortable et très propre, nous en avons été très contentes. Parfait pour passer quelques jours à Porto. De plus, Sissa a été disponible tout le long de notre séjour pour d'éventuelles questions. Je recommande!

Everything about this stay was perfect! Sissa is an amazing host; she welcomed us in person to hand the keys over, took the time to tell us about where to go and what to see in Porto and even offered us a great snack (delicious bread, cheese, homemade jelly and wine– more like a lunch) when we arrived. Staying there really felt like home. The green and flowery terrace is very intimate. If you wish to cook, the kitchen is very well-equipped. We were only two, but the apartment could perfectly host a family. I would not hesitate recommending this place to even the most picky of travellers!

Sissa est formidable, un accueil,une écoute digne d'un hôtel 3 étoiles.
Un appartement situé à l'écart de l'hyper centre , ( 10 min en bus) mais dans un quartier typique de porto avec des vrais petits commerces ou l'on y trouve de tout pour pas cher, très pratique quand on est en voiture ( il faut 5 min pour sortir de porto et avoir accès aux autoroutes).
Appartement très propre et confortable .

Sissa es una anfitriona extraordinaria. Desde el primer momento estuvo pendiente de nuestro viaje. Cuando llegamos tenía preparado un listado de lugares y restaurantes sin gluten porque nuestro hijo es celíaco y un pan casero de maíz. La casa es tan acogedora y bonita como en las fotos. Un lugar estupendo para visitar Oporto. Repetiremos seguro.

Uvítání bzlo velmi vřelé a přátelské a po celou dobu naší dovolené nám byla majitelka k dispozici. Popis bytu na airbnb.com odpovídá skutečnosti. Byt není velký, je však velmi útulný. Okolí bytu je širší centrum. V dosahu jsou dobré a levné restaurace, supermarket a hromadná doprava. Jediné  mínus spatřuji v hlavní rušné ulici, která je nedaleko.

Sissa a été très réactive quand nous l'avons sollicitée. La description et les photos de l'appartement sont fidèles à la réalité. Le patio est un vrai plus! Etre accueilli par une collation avec des produits de qualité fut bien agréable aussi. L'appartement est bien situé: il y a un petit supermarché pas loin, il est facile de trouver un endroit pour manger à proximité etc.
Nous avons reçu un très bon accueil, Sissa est toujours prête à répondre à nos questions et à proposer des sorties. L'appartement est parfait et correspond totalement à l'annonce. Un séjour idéal !

Accueil avenant et tres agréable.
Grand merci pour nous avoir attendu à une heure tardive.
Appartement fonctionnel.
Parfait pour 2 adultes et 2 ados.
Le patio ajoute un "plus".

Accueil agréable par Constance.Appartement confortable,  bien équipé etu très bien décoré 
Sissa gère son immeuble de façon très professionnelle.

Die Unterkunft war perfekt für uns als kleine Familie, das Zentrum ist mit dem Bus in 15 min zu erreichen. Sissas Tipps bzgl Restaurants und Spielplaetze waren super, die Wohnung war sauber und ordentlich, uns hat es an nichts gefehlt. Danke!

L'appartement est nickel et agréable, aucune mauvaise surprise par rapport aux photos. L'accueil de Sissa est fantastique, elle prend le temps de nous conseiller sur les visites à faire à Porto. 
C'est largement suffisant pour 4 personnes, on ne se marchait pas sur les pieds ! 
Petit bémol, pour les non marcheurs, c'est un peu loin du centre ville à pied.

Gostamos bastante. O apartamento é muito aconchegante e muito bem equipado.
A anfitriã, Sissa, foi extremamente gentil acolhedora.

We stayed in Sissa's apartment for nearly one week and we had a really great time there.
Sissa warmly welcomed us with typical delicious pasteis des nata and grapes and she did give us lots of good tips for our stay in Porto. She was very kind and helpful and if we had any questions she always responded very fast. As well the communication before our trip has been very good and she did pass lots of information to me before so it was very easy to find the apartment.
The apartment is very tastefully decorated  and very clean and we found everything we needed and felt very comfortable.
I would totally recommend Sissa as a great host :) Thanks again for everything!

L'appartement de Sissa est vraiment très agréable à vivre : joliment décoré, bien agencé, très propre et refait à neuf (salle de bain et cuisine top). Le petit patio permet de se relaxer loin des agitations de la ville, et les chambres donnent sur une rue très calme. On y a très bien dormi (la literie étant particulièrement confortable !).
Sissa est très accueillante, gentille, et parle bien français ! :)
L'emplacement n'est pas central, mais permet de découvrir un quartier plus authentique que le centre historique et touristique, avec des boutiques et des restaurants typiques. En deux mots, plaira à ceux qui aiment sortir des sentiers battus ! 
Nous conseillons vivement cet appartement !!
Appartement bien équipé et très confortable à la décoration très soignée. Nous avons particulièrement apprécié le patio et le Porto d’accueil. Très recommandable.

Sissa could not have been more helpful. Our train arrived late but Sissa was incredibly accommodating waiting for us, and gave us so much useful information as it was our first visit to Porto. Her home was beautiful, felt very authentic and safe. Would definitely stay again :)

Je suis partie avec 2 amies début octobre .Le logement de Sissa est très joli ,fonctionnel ,bien équipé,très propre et décoré avec beaucoup de gout.La jolie petite terrasse est un havre de paix pour se reposer après une journée de visite .Il est à seulement 10 .15 minutes du centre ville et on peut s'y rendre a pied,sinon il y des bus juste a coté.Quand a Sissa elle est merveilleuse ,souriante , accueillante et disponible elle est la pour vous aider en cas de besoin.Le petit restaurant en bas de la rue est aussi une très bonne adresse pas cher et accueillant.
Thank you Sissa!

We had the most amazing time at Sissa’s place. Her hospitality was simply amazing!! She is such a great an attentive host. She is always ready to help with whatever you need, and has great tips on things to do in and around the city. Her place is very cosy, well decorated and clean, and the location is quite good as well. We had rented a car, so it was very convenient to have the free parking on the street. Thank you so much, Sissa, for a great stay.

We had a great time in Porto! Sissa's apartment is very cozy with nice touches and an incredible terrace. We did everything on foot from her apartment as location permitted. Restaurants, supermarket, pharmacy near the apartment and the beautiful Sao Roque park in case you have kids. Thank you Sissa for your hospitality - we had a wonderful time in Porto!

Nous avons été enchantés par l’accueil que nous a réservé Sissa, personne charmante, très souriante, qui nous avait préparé une petite collation surprise pour notre arrivée.  Petit plus pour nous qui sommes Français, Sissa s'exprime très bien dans notre langue ce qui a facilité nos échanges. Nous sommes restés 10 jours et ses conseils pour organiser nos visites sur Porto et les environs ont été pertinents et d'une grande utilité. Ses services au court du séjours ont également été très appréciés, nous sommes enchantés d'avoir occupé son logement et sa sympathie à participé à la réussite de notre passage à Porto.

Nous avons passé un superbe séjour chez sissa. Elle nous a accueilli avec beaucoup de sympathie (un petit verre de porto et des pâtisseries portugaises), nous a donné de bonnes adresses pour manger et faire les magasins. L’appartement est très agréable, très propre et fonctionnel et la terrasse est un vrai bonheur. Merci pour tout Sissa !

Appartement aussi joliment décoré que fonctionnel. Rue très calme mais proche de tous les commerces. Parfait si l'on veut vivre comme les habitants de Porto. Et l'accueil était très attentionné. Si j'osais, je dirais que Sissa rime... avec extra !
Encore merci Sissa pour votre accueil.

À recommandé sans hésitation.
Tout y est parfait depuis la prise en charge à l’aéroport,
Les petites attentions à l’arrivée et la propreté du logement

El apartamento es cómodo, bien equipado (sería estupendo contar también con una tetera) y con un patio muy agradable. 
La ubicación es buena y aunque la calle soporta tráfico de coches la insonorización está muy lograda. Algo lejos del centro, a unos 25 minutos andando, pero con autobuses muy cerca. A pesar de que no dejamos nada en el auto sufrimos un intento de robo y la rotura de una ventana del coche, según los vecinos y la policía que acudió no es un hecho excepcional, hubiésemos agradecido una advertencia.
Nuestro checking se demoró más de una hora por un mal entendido con los encargados de nuestra anfitriona el checkout lo hicimos sin que nadie se hubiese personado. Por otro lado la anfitriona nos ofreció su ayuda en todo momento cuando sufrimos el robo, aunque ya lo habíamos resuelto.

Todo perfecto! 100% recomendable! 
Tal vez podría estar más céntrico, pero se puede ir a pie al centro sin problemas

Sissa é muito simpática e quando perguntei-lhe questão, ela respondeu sempre pacientemente. A casa é grande e confortável. Também tem um jardim romântico. Sissa ajuda-nós muito, ficaram bem no Porto. É uma experiência excelente!
excellent accueil et qualité exceptionnelle de l'hébergement.

We are a family of four, 2 adults 2 kids and had a wonderful stay at Sissa's house.
PROS
Perfectly clean, furnished with taste. First glance and you know that the owner has taken care of every single detail, I really appreciate when that happens. Two bedrooms, enough privacy for 4. Big kitchen, nice bathroom. Beautiful and peaceful courtyard, we used it a lot. Sissa is a perfect host, got in touch with us before, during and after our stay to check if everything was all right.
CONS
Difficult to find one. The house is not in the very heart of Porto but we always walked to the centre, it's a nice stroll. Otherwise you can use Uber, 3/4 euros per ride.

La casa completa, impecablemente limpia. Las camas comodisimas, incluso pusieron una cuna para mi bebe.
Tenian toda la informacion necesaria para hacer turismo, mapas, restaurantes, transporte publico... Etc...
Su terraza es el lugar perfecto para una sobremesa despues de un dia largo de turismo. Acabamos encantadisimos con el alojamiento

El apartamento de Sissa es muy comodo para una familia de cuatro personas, esta decorado super bonito con un patio encantador , limpio y tiene de todo lo que puedas necesitar para la estancia. La ubicacion no es super centrico pero se baja enseguida al centro y para subir nosotros optamos por un taxi, opcion rapida y comoda y nada caro.El apartamento de Sissa es de los apartamentos mas bonitos en los que hemos estado. Sissa ademas fue muy atenta en la comunicacion y Marie Luis quien nos recibio super amable.Muy, muy recomendable.

Bellissimo appartamento a 15/20 minuti a piedi dal centro storico. Ristrutturato e arredato con molto gusto e attenzione al dettaglio, splendido patio. La proprietaria ci ha accolti con un bel bicchiere di Porto e delle tartas de nata buonissime! Consigliatissimo.

Notre séjours chez Sissa a été parfait! Les photos ne rendent pas justice à l’appartement. Il est très beau et la terrasse est magnifique. Notre vol a pris du retard et nous avions presque deux heures de retard, mais Sissa nous a attendues. De plus, elle a pris le temps de nous donner tout l’information dont nous aurions besoin pour notre séjour. Elle nous a même envoyé des liens par email pour des restos, des plages, des activités, etc. 
Vraiment, j’y retournerai sans hésiter. 
Merci pour tout Sissa!

A lovely, stylish, well equipped apartment to come home to after a long and busy day exploring beautiful Porto. We especially enjoyed the patio and fresh air flow through the apartment. The only small negative is that the road is noisy so sleeping with an open windows is not an option.
super appartement avec jolie terrasse !! Sissa est une hôte formidable.  nous recommandons  fortement !! Petite attention à l'arrivée et elle avait même préparé un petit lit parfait pour notre bébé .

Our stay in Porto could not be improved upon. Sissa’s apartment is outside of the historic area of the city yet just a short walk from Campanha railway station.  Charming, spotlessly clean and inviting, it is the ideal place to relax in after a day of touring around Porto - it even has an outdoor area in which to unwind.  Our host even supplied some tasty treats upon our arrival.  We have no hesitation in recommending this apartment to others and we would love to return one day.  Sissa we thank you so much - you are definitely a Superhost ❤️❤️

A great apartment, with a nice patio to spend the evening. I stayed with my small family incl a baby of 8 months. Sissa was super accommodating and had prepared a baby cod, chair and even the cutest little rocking horse. The rest of the apartment has everything you need and is really cosy and nicely decorated. 

Communication was very efficient and Sissa really knows how to make you feel welcome. She made sure we had everything we needed and was very flexible with check-out time, which made the trip more convenient for us. 

The apartment is located A bit outside the city centre, so one should be prepared to either walk or use public transportation (which is very close) to get there.
Sissa was an excellent host. I would stay at her house again if I return to Porto.

name: Westin Kaanapali KORVS 2BR
summary: Westin Kaanapali Ocean Resort Villas South timeshare - Pay resort: $14-20/day, stays under 7 night $38/res - Inquire about availability, I review then offer/approve if available :) - READ "The Space" for cleaning/etc AND brief explanation about timeshare reservations - Want guaranteed view for additional cost? Must be weekly rental, other restrictions - Wheelchair accessible / ADA, call resort directly to ensure U receive. If U need ADA U MUST inform us BEFORE booking.
space: This is a timeshare owner reservation. You are under no obligation to attend any sales activity :) PLEASE NOTE for most dates, due to high reservation demand, owners almost always pre-reserve units a year in advance where the reservation is OFTEN 7 nights long with check-in on Fri, Sat, or Sun. notes: AS OF 01/16/ (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) CONSTRUCTION - Construction at the nearby Westin Nanea Ocean Villas is complete and will not impact Westin Kaanapali guests. AS OF 01/16/ (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) POOL CLOSURE - Septemb (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) Octob (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) The pool and deck areas at The Westin Ka‘anapali Ocean Resort Villas North will be closed for maintenance. The North phase Pirate Ship Pool, ALL South phase pools/slides, and ALL Westin Nanea pools ARE OPEN AND AVAILABLE. While the Pailolo Bar & Grill at North phase will be closed ALL OTHER RESTAURANTS at the three resorts will remain OPEN. Workers will be present between 8:30 a.m. and 6 p.m., seven days a week at the North phase pool.
transit: Complimentary shuttle service to the town of Lahaina and sister resorts in Ka‘anapali Once booked, our DIRECTIONS info includes a link to book shared and private shuttles from airport to/from timeshare resort, fees approx $60 to $300 Car Rental Recommended if you prefer self-guided tours to entire island. Taxi Service also available.
access: Check in at this resort in the same way you do any hotel / resort. Full guest privileges at this resort. - The resort WILL REQUIRE your government ID / passport to have the same name as what we provide to them (it's OK to omit your middle name/initial), and more than one Airbnb policy necessitates we require your Airbnb name be the same as that on your ID. If the named guest is under the age of 21, the resort will not allow you to check in, and you will not receive a refund! THIS IS THE WESTIN TIMESHARE RESORT, NOT THE HOTEL. - Guests staying at the timeshare have full access and privileges for EVERYTHING at the TIMESHARE ( INCLUDING the pools and slides). - Guests may charge expenses at the Sheraton and Westin hotels to their timeshare unit. - HOWEVER timeshare guests do not have access to the HOTEL pools NOR the Westin Hotel waterslide park. NO ONE has access to the Westin hotel water slide except Westin hotel guests ... just like no one except Westin timeshare guests may use the Wes

reviews.comments: Awesome location and venue. We loved our stay.
A perfect ocean view apartment in Westin time share resort.
This was a great vacation with my kids! Everything was better than advertised and made for good lodging. We had separate spaces and spaces where we could all interact. Just perfect.

reviews.comments: Fantastic location! Super clean. As described and in picture. Building staff is super friendly and very helpful. Location is central and easily accessible around the area for dinner, drinks etc❤️❤️❤️ will book again. Aloha

Very good communication!  The location is very central in Waikiki.  it's very easy to walk everywhere, and the ABC store across the street or the Starbucks down the block is very convenient for a morning coffee and a walk along the beach.  You are in the center of stores, restaurants and night life, but because of that, it may get a little nosy in the evenings.  Especially the weekends.  This apartment is such a good value, and the tenants and staff are so friendly.  Highly recommend!
Basic place close to waikiki beach.
Departamento con increíble ubicación y con todo lo necesario para disfrutar mis vacaciones en hawai, buen anfitrión, recomendable.
The location is great, close enough to everything, 5 mins walk from the beach. Awesome experience.

The location was ideal! Right off the central shopping district and walking distance from popular bars and clubs. The room was clean and the resident staff friendly and helpful. Overall content with the room and location.

Good location if you're looking to be in Waikiki--somewhat older building but it includes a parking stall, which is essential if you'll have a vehicle as street parking in Waikiki is extremely difficult. Unit was fairly clean, and the AC worked well enough to keep the place comfortable. Large kitchen with a good supply of dishes and cookware. No problems with the wireless internet. Waikiki is not my favorite place on the island, for a variety of reasons, but if you're looking for a touristy experience this unit is a decent place to stay.
La experiencia en Honolulu comenzó algo mal, ya que el anfitrión olvido de dejarme las llaves del apartamento. Recién al otro día pudimos resolverlo. Luego salió estupendo.

Place was exactly as described in the comments. Can't speak highly enough about the location with short walk to beach and good quality food. Amenities and availability of a parking space were also great for the price. 
Just be sure to bring ear plugs for a good nights sleep
Good location

This apartment is in a fantastic spot,  incredibly close to everything.  The room was a good size for the 2 of us and we found it very handy having the kitchen to utilise.  The kitchen contained everything you could need.  Very neat and clean,  would stay here again.
The place was very nice. It fulfilled our needs. We had to extend our stay for one more they and there were no problem with it. Thank you for having us!
Responses to client's call timely!
Good location and a reasonable price when you include the available parking.  Reality office is located a block away.

A perfect place to stay if you wanna live close to the tourist area of waiks but still have a parking spot to be able to rent a car and drive around the island. It's a good place to live. We stayed 3 girls in this apartment and it worked fine

The Apartment and the Condo are very nice and located in the best position that you could find in waikiki (near waikiki beach and 50mt far from the main shopping/restaurant/hotel street)  In the apartment there are two comfortable beds, a spacious bathroom and a small terrace. There is also a small but very full equipped kitchen.  Restaurants in waikiki are wonderful but "a little bit" expensive (we are two people and we have never paid less than 100 $ for a dinner,  eating only main courses and desserts and drinking water ). Fortunately we could cooked at home some food for our breakfasts and lunches saving in this way a lot of money!The reserved parking included is another added value. If you really want to enjoy the Island, you must have a car!daily parking rate in hotel or private garage goes from 15 to 30 $ in Waikiki!Having a free parking just near your house is really convenient.
We didn't meet Lei personally but his instruction about how to get the apartment's key and to leave the house at the end of the vacation have been clear and exhaustive. I absolutely suggest this apartment to everyone who would like to spend some time in this heavenly island.
ｴｸｽﾄﾗﾍﾞｯﾄﾞがあるため､子連れでも利用しやすいお部屋です｡
appartement tres propre proche de tout vue degagee tout est bien peut etre un peu bruyant a cause de la rue mais quartier vivant tres bien

Very great location, central to everything. Super convenient to elevator, laundry and trash access as it's right outside the unit. Parking is a Plus! Easy street access through either side due to the alley next to the building since the property is on a one way street.

we loved the location of the apartment, it has everything required for staying for 3 people. a cute little balcony to sit on and relax as the sun goes down. The place has washing facilities which is good (washer and dryer) and a pool located on level 4 (though we did not use it). The wifi initially we had issues using but was quickly dealt with by the host and up and running by day 3 and refunded a portion for thr days we did not have access to it. overall a great location and property for exploring hawaii and coming back to after some great adventures out

从入住到离开特别的顺利方便!房间非常干净整洁!像回到自己的家一样!位置特别的好!去海边五分钟路程,去商场､免税店也是五分钟路程,附近吃饭的地方很多!只是周五周六晚上十点后附近的bar很吵,警察都出动了来制止喧哗｡
It's very convenience from check in to check out, and I'm loving it. It's nice location that convenient to the beach and shops. Only noisy after 10 PM on Friday and Saturday.

Location, location, location! This is right in the heart of waikiki and the condo is a nice short walk to everything. The few issues we had were the bathtub was clogged and would drain and when I tried to reach the host it went to voicemail. Otherwise it was great for the location, many towels, bedding, etc. Convenient laundry and trash chute right across the apartment as well as a parking spot that comes with the apartment.

初めてのﾊﾜｲ旅行でした｡
妻と幼児と3人で行きましたが､ﾍﾞﾋﾞｰﾍﾞｯﾄもあり非常に有り難かったです｡
場所は本当にﾋﾟｶｲﾁで中心街なのでどこの行くのも不自由しませんでした｡
ﾎｽﾄさんにも色々案内して貰い充実した宿泊になりました｡
また是非使いたいと思います!

It was my first trip to Hawaii.
I went with my wife and an infant with three people, but there was also a baby bed and I was very thankful.
The place was really central and it was not far from where I was going.
It became a fulfilling accommodation that the host was also able to guide you a lot.
I also want to use it by all means!
Super Wohung im Zentrum von Waikiki. Presi-Leistung ist top! mit gratis Parkplatz. Am Abend teilweise etwas laut. Ansonsten perfekt!
Very convenient place! The center of everything. Highly recommend!
You need to spend some of your own money to be comfortable. Towels smelled and the extra bed wasn't too pleasant.

The location was amazing. In the heart of Waikiki near tons of shopping, food and the beach is a 5 minute walk. Parking was great and free and there's lots of public transportation as well. The room was perfect for my wife and I. We stayed 3 weeks and it worked for us.  

The beds were not the best. A little thin but we slept okay. The pool was nice. You can usually get in without anyone else there. The check in process was easy. 

This isn't the typical Airbnb experience. They stated in the enormous email that they may charge you for contacting them. A little weird for Airbnb. 

Decent cleaning fee but be sure to take out your trash and wash and dry the dishes before leaving or you'll be charged, as the enormous email says. 

We loved our stay here. The view is great. We would definitely recommend it for those wanting a budget friendly comfortable vacation.

A nice, clean and cozy apartment. However, there is a serious issue (no one's fault): the downtown area is very noisy in mid night (probably before 0 a.m.) and there is virtually no sound isolation. If you prefer early-to-bed, even earplugs would hardly save you.

Pros: 
  - Clean, full set of kitchenware.
  - Easy and free parking. Free fast WIFI. 
  - Many shopping and dining choices nearby.
  - Close to the beach.
Cons:
  - Very noisy before 0 a.m. . OK in the morning.
  - AC very noisy and ineffective, though you would rarely need it.

This place is in the middle of all of the Wakiki shopping/food destinations and about a 5minute walk to the beach.  The included parking made this AirBnB a great value as there is limited free parking in Wakiki and at least a 10minute walk from the nearest location or would need to pay $20-40 per lot/night.
Good location right in the heart of Waikiki area. Room fits the description perfectly and was clean. Nothing lavish but right on the action.

The place was in a great location and the price was so affordable and reasonable. Its a block away from nightlife and shopping district of Waikiki. Its on a high floor and has a great view from the balcony. Thanks for letting us stay here. 

Theres no negative review but only suggest that this place is more of just using the place to sleep, or more of a bachelor pad I guess. I say this because I was staying with my wife and son. The apartment definitely has awesome potential to make it feel more lively or inviting if they upgraded the apartment, example instead of putting a patio outdoor table set inside maybe have a nice dining table with chairs. Air condition needs an upgrade, a little too noisy. The apartment does look exactly like what the picture shows.  But other than that the beds and sheets were clean and so was the bed. The wifi internet and cable tv was a plus.
とても立地が良くて便利でした!!!

I hate the leave a negative review, but I also feel that being honest is important in this situation. 

My fiancé and I booked this condo for a week to celebrate our engagement. We saw that the reviews were great, however our experience was anything but. Unfortunately, we were in the room a total of 30 minutes before we called air bnb to cancel and get a refund. 

When we walked into the condo, you could immediately smell a strong odor of mold and the air was very thick. We were tired from traveling so we tried to take a little nap, but within 20 minutes of being in there we were both coughing, had sore throats and headaches. Even the sheets smelled like mildew. I checked around the room and bathroom to see if there was any visible mold, and found spores around the A/C unit and a large area of black mold on the wall right outside of the window. It also looked like the corner of the wall, close to the ceiling by the window had been wiped clean and mold residue was sort of smeared around.

I have respiratory issues, so once I realized that there was mold in the unit, I became very concerned. 

We referred back to the host's listing and messages they sent, and they stated "* If you call us, we may be a charge fee."
That in itself is ridiculous. They sent us a couple of messages that were very long and full of all the charges we could potentially expect, which made us feel unwelcome and almost like we had done something wrong before we even got there. So rather than contacting the host, we called air bnb, sent them photos of the mold and ended up getting a credit to find another place to stay. The process took all afternoon so we had to cancel our plans and basically lost a day of our trip trying to get it sorted out.

Two days later, I finally stopped coughing.

I really hate to leave such a negative review, but mold is a serious issue which could lead to people getting sick. Unfortunately, I don't recommend staying here. The price is decent, but what does it matter if you end up spending your trip sick?

Location and free parking are the advantages of this house.

I saw the most cockroaches in my life and my husband actually caught ten. 

The air conditioner is very noisy and the windows can not shut down the outside.
The sound of the concert, the sound of the construction, the sound of the car, and the street sounds perfect inside the room.

For three days, I felt very tired and uncomfortable. It is remembered as the worst room.

Lei Hawaiiさん本当にありがとうございました｡困ってお電話差し上げてしまっても､親切で丁寧な対応をしていただき助かりました｡

Location was absolutely perfect! Check in was easy and check out was fast. I would definitely stay here again. Great bang for the buck!

Old building but very nice renovation and perfect location 
Nice privacy
Great place!

The location is good, public transportation is close. But, it is really noisy in the night and the room is not really soundproof. It would be little difficult to get to the parking lot if you drive. The price is cheap, but the cleaning fee is quite expensive.

The place was pretty much as described. It offered the basic needs and a comfortable place to rest your head. It was clean and a decent size for myself and two friends. We got up and out for the day in the morning and would come home in the evenings to sleep. Overall, good price, good location, basic amenities, easy interactions with host.
Good location
Very good location and they have one of the best seafood restaurant in the lobby do not miss it crackin kitchen
The apartment was in a great location, and felt safe and clean. The host was quick to respond to my questions during our stay. I’d definitely stay here again.

ﾜｲｷｷ中心部でどこに行くにもとても便利でした｡ﾊﾞｽ停も近い｡
1つ難点はうるさいこと｡窓の一部が木のﾌﾞﾗｲﾝﾄﾞだけになっていて､そこから外の騒音が聞こえます｡ほとんど疲れて寝てしまったのでよかったですが､うるさくて眠れない日もありました｡神経質な方は辞めたほうがいいですが､それ以外は本当にとても良かったです!また機会があればお願いしたいです｡
Great location and is walk able to all locations on waikiki. Slightly noisey at night time as patio has a "shutterwall" that can open and close and not a real wall, as well as a sliding glass door.
Highly recommended. Nice place and good location. All what you need to stay on your vacation.

Easy check in process. The condo exactly as described. Great location. Great parking included. The only things I was not thrilled about is the outdoor noise and also there were no iron and ironing board at the condo.
it is really nice place to stay! great location, reasonable price!

Place had a lots of plumbing issues since the day we checked in. Unable to use the bathroom. But had us use another bathroom in another unit that was on a different floor. They did fix it  but there was also water leak issue that happened. And after that bathroom had issues again. Hopefully they fix the issues for the next tenants. Overall location and the unit is nice.
位置在维基基中心,购物和去海滩方便,可以自己去超市日本人开的一家超市(离沃尔玛超市500米)购食材做饭,因为在中心地带周围晚上噪音大｡
立地がとても最高で､The Busのﾊﾞｽ停も近くにあるので動きやすかったです!

great location
掃除もしてなく､ﾀｵﾙ散乱､かと思えば､20時くらいに家族で掃除､かなりいまいちです｡

great place to stay that's centrally located in Waikiki. Lots of places to eat nearby,  close to shopping and a short walk to the beach. The studio is comfortable and ac works well, not to many channels on cable but with the wifi I was able to use my Netflix account by connecting my laptop to the tv with a hdmi cord. It's a great  place in a great location at a very reasonable price. I'd definitely stay here again.
位置很好,离威基基海滩十分钟,楼下公交站到机场和主要景区都很方便,周边有很多餐厅,购物中心｡房间内提供做饭的炊具和餐具,微波炉,冰箱等,设施齐全｡自助入住,比酒店方便,自由,也很安全｡唯一不好的就是空调声音太大｡需要戴耳塞睡觉｡
Really nice appartement in a good location. 5 minutes to the beach. A lot of good restaurants and shops nearby. In the night a bit noisy
A great place to stay!
Great location - walking distance to everything!
Nice place close to Waikiki

Super clean and cute room!! Was a Super Good Deal for us!! 

The room was good size for 3 of us, 2 adults and 1 kid. They got 1 bed for kid between the beds.
The host was super nice. The communication was always on time. Since we had a nice communication before we have stayed, we visited their office nearby the condo. They treated us like a family! 

We did not need to stop by host's office to check in. Just go to the condo before the front gate closed around 8 pm since the keys were in the mailbox inside the front gate. And just dropped the keys inside the mailbox. Super easy check in and out.

I saw some complain in the review, but I guess they all forget how much they paid for the place, i guess.


For the noise from the street from the past review, we thought nothing. I guess since the noisy pubs and clubs in front of this Marine Surf Condo were closed due to the renovation, the place gets more quiet than before. 

For this price, they should thank the hosts and never complain about anything. It was one third of the normal Hawaii low class hotel rate. But the unit was much better than the hotel we stayed before. 

They even include the parking space!
I think this parking lot was the easiest parking space in Waikiki. 

Overall no complain at all. Truly we have stayed many hotel and condos so far, but this vacation rental offered by Lei Hawaii was way better than others. And please Do not trust any bad reviews. People complain even a small thing especially for those who forget how much they paid for this condo.  This is way cheaper than the hotel, so do not complain!! Will be best deal for you.
Great location. Easy check-in and check-out. Having parking included is a great plus in the heart of Waikiki.
Location and parking was everything!!! Nice place to stay and very affordable.

The unit was as expected. Parking and location are the major benefits. The unit was clean with good hot water and pressure. The internet had a strong signal. The outside noise level was quite high due to the gaps by the AC. Also the TV didn’t work but we spent little time in the room. The are many rules to follow after you’ve committed to stay there. I would recommend.
清潔感があり､非常に快適に過ごすことができました｡また､立地が素晴らしく､ﾋﾞｰﾁに行くにも､ｼｮｯﾋﾟﾝｸﾞをするにも抜群のﾛｹｰｼｮﾝでした｡

One thing my whole family liked about the place is the great location,  just minutes walk from Waikiki beach, and plenty of food choices close by. 

We stayed for a week and was provided with plenty of towels, the place was nice and clean with a cozy and comfortable feel. Would definitely recommend to a friend and/ stay again!

It's the perfect place to live in and explore Waikiki, just a quick walk to the beach and in the center of delicious food and great malls. You will really enjoy your stay here, the only thing is the sound of the city goes on pretty late, other than that, a superb spot. Especially if you have a car rental, there is a designated spot for you!
Stellar location! Would stay again and would recommend. 5 min walk from the beach. Mattresses and shower pressure was good. Foam mattress on pull out bed very soft.
Location is great! It’s easy to go from one place to another. The apt is clean and has very comfortable beds. However, the only downside is AC. It makes loud noise.
Mycket högspelande och störande musik från restaurangen nedanför balkongen. Bra sängar.

summary: Our apartment is in the city center and one of the noblest areas of Porto. It is next door (about 50m) to Casa da Música of architect Rem Koolhaas authorship where you can see building uniqueness as well as benefit from quality, diverse and constant programming . It is very close to public transport, shopping and access to and from the city. Despite being very well located and central it is extremely quiet and peaceful, ideal for vacation for two or for a some family days.
