reviews.comments: It was great to stay at this place, it looks like the pictures show, works well for one or 2 people, very comfortable and in a good location. I was able to easily get to where I needed to go, and was also easy to just walk around. The apartment itself was clean and cozy, Rita was very friendly upon arrival and always responsive when I had any questions, before, during and after my stay. Definitely recommend staying here!
very nice and available

Rita no pudo recibirnos en casa, pero envío a una compañera muy amable que nos ayudó en todo lo posible.
La casa es muy acogedora y llena de detalles que la hacen especial (como la fruta o el café)
El barrio es tranquilo y queda a una media hora andando de las zonas más turísticas.
La recomiendo!

Rita fue muy amable y comprensiva ante nuestras necesidades en todo momento ! El apartamento es muy acogedor, está todo muy limpio y en perfecto estado. Se sitúa en una zona muy buena con todos los servicios necesarios próximos.Totalmente recomendable.
The apartment was so well-located and cosy, we loved it! Rita was very nice and attentive. Would definitely repeat!
干净利落的小房子,面积不大,但很温馨,用具用品齐全,房主热情,出行方便,红色大巴站离得很近,音乐厅广场很适合孩子玩,如果有洗衣机就更好了｡

Nos alojamos mi familia y yo, en total tres personas, en el apartamento de Rita durante tres noches.
Rita no pudo recibirnos, pero vino Cristina, que fue muy amable y nos explicó todo con claridad.
El apartamento estaba limpio y provisto de todo lo necesario para el día a día teniendo de todo para cocinar:vajilla, aceite, sal...
A su vez tenía productos de limpieza y de higiene personal.
Está ubicado a menos de cinco minutos andando de la parada de metro de Casa de Música.
Si volviéramos a Porto, repetiremos.

Vérifier s'il n'y a pas de travaux en cours dans l'édifice
Si les lumières de passages fonctionnent bien ?
Ótimo lugar para passar as férias.
Petit appartement, propre, endroit calme pas très loin du métro, mais à une bonne distance des principaux attraits touristiques de Porto.
Rita foi uma excelente anfitriã. Nossa estadia foi maravilhosa. O apartamento é aconchegante, perfeito para nossos 15 dias no Porto. Recomendamos muito. Obrigado Rita!

Bem localizado, espaçoso.
Boa relação custo - beneficio.

Appartement propre et très bien situé pour visiter Porto en quelques jours ! Communication excellente de la part de l'hôte (réactivité). Le logement est conforme au descriptif, vous pouvez réserver en toute confiance. 

L'appartement est proche de tout : commerces, station de métro, bus, casa de musica (je vous y recommande un concert !), aéroport. 
Très pratique pour pouvoir rayonner dans les différents endroits à visiter sur Porto .

I enjoyed my stay at Rita's apartment. It was clean, cosy and the location was great, just 50 or so metres from the nearest metro station. Rita was a good host, easy to communicate with. I would definitely recommend this apartment to everyone who comes to beautiful Porto.

Logement parfaitement propre bien situé près de tous transports (bus,métro) qui permettent de se rendre facilement dans le centre historique comme au bord de plage...bons conseils de rita et plan de la ville fourni je recommande

name: Roof Top Terrace
summary: Roof top of a wooden house, with city view balcony, the apartment is very appropriate for singles/couple travellers. You have kitchen and bathroom inside. Towels & linens are provided.
space: istanbul'un en güzel semtlerinden Cihangir de ve her türlü ihtiyaca yakın konumda çok merkezi ve tarihi bir yerdir.
description: Roof top of a wooden house, with city view balcony, the apartment is very appropriate for singles/couple travellers. You have kitchen and bathroom inside. Towels & linens are provided. very peacefull and quite neighbourhood.
neighborhood_overview: very peacefull and quite neighbourhood.
notes: DİKKAT !!! Yatak odalarının tavanı düşüktür (130cm) !!  ve yer yatağı var !!!! Banyo yarım banyodur ve oturarak duş alınabilir.!!!! Sadece salon yüksek tavanlıdır.
transit: Ulaşım çok kolaydır. Metro, otobüs, vapur, taksi... Hava alanından Havaş servis ya da taksi ile ulaşım sağlanabilir
interaction: misafirlerimiz istedikleri zaman bizimle iletişime geçebilirler.

host.host_about: Zenka Rooms is on service its customers since 2010

reviews.comments: The flat is nice with a fancy balcony/terrace, it was great, I would definitely recommend it
Everything was perfect, strongly recommended
Sessiz, temiz ve merkezi tavsiye ederim

Bir aksaklıktan dolayı konaklayamadım fakat çok  açık ve doğru iletişim kurabildim.  Zenka yardımsever ve kolaylaştırıcı bir ev sahibi
Başka bir sefer konaklamayı düşünüyorum
Teşekkürler

Really nice and clean loft apartment. Not for the tall or those who dont like stairs. It was perfect for our 1 night stay in Istanbul. The location was perfect for us and despite being so tiny, the place still felt very roomy. Would definitely stay here again.
Gayet güzel bir yer fiyat gayet uygun
The perfect location to explore the wonders of Istanbul. Not fir tall people though as the rooms go with the slope of the roof.
Zenka is very helpful and the place is very nice.
Herşey istediğimiz gibiydi. Çok teşekkürler.

We loved this cozy little apartment, the balcony we had breakfast at every morning! It may not be suitable for tall people though, the ceiling is a bit low but otherwise we enjoyed the place and the neighborhood!
Nice, clean, cozy appartement and an amazing view from the terrace. Thanks.
Ev kesinlikle tertemiz ve oldukça şirindi. Tek olumsuz yanı kesinlikle uzun kişiler için çok rahat değil. Duş almak zor. Onun dışında çok memnun kaldım.

The place is cozy and sweet, very clean, in the center of cihangir which is really cool for young people!
The ceiling is low, so you have to be ready to take care of your heads!
communication with the host wasn't there. The view make the apartment.

Make sure you are in communication with Zenka rooms prior to your check in date. After waiting at the address given for nearly two hours, we then heard from them for the first time and were told to go to a nearby restaurant to get the keys for the apartment. No WiFi for the duration of our stay, they did attempt to solve the issue with no luck. Also not a full kitchen if you need that, only a sink counter and fridge. Besides that the apartment is great, clean, beautiful terrace for relaxing on an evening. Not advisable for tall people! Thank you.
Thx!

Overall I am pleased with my stay.  The Cihangir neighborhood is lively and comfortable, one of Istanbul's remaining secular outposts.  When I checked in there was an issue with the apartment I booked - the host was quick to acknowledge her mistake and allow me to stay in another room in the building for the night.  As other reviewers have written - as this is an attic apartment, the floors in the bedrooms and bathroom are sloped, making it difficult to maneuver comfortably.  The bedrooms also get quite stuffy.  It would also be helpful for future guests to know that you will need to pick up the keys from the neighboring restaurant, Otto Cihangir.
Real nice place in central Istanbul. Not loud and with air con. Only thing, the roof is low, quite a problem for tall people.
We had a great time whilst there and all the staff at the bar below were very affable. Nice view of Istanbul at the balcony. I would stay there again.
It's very good flat for some short people, great location, great value for money.
The host canceled this reservation 7 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The host canceled this reservation 8 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

It's been our third time in Istanbul and second time in this apartment. Everything is great: location, beautiful historical house, always helpful host. 
For sure, next time I'll stay there too!!)

Я была в Zenka rooms с 02.08.17 по 05.08.17. Осталась очень довольна.  Очень понравился район,  в котором мы жили.  До метро совсем рядом.  От площади Таксим есть трансферы в аэропорты,  на автовокзал.  Для меня это оказалось очень важным.  Вокруг в районе много кафешек,  магазинчиков,  непосредственно во дворе Zenkarooms потрясающий ресторанчик - великолепнейшие,  очень вкусные завтраки и божественный гриль.  Но имейте в виду,  что вечером там полно народу и найти свободный столик может быть проблемой. 
У нас были две комнаты,  все чисто,  очень аккуратно.  Отдельное спасибо  Zenkarooms,  что разрешили вторую комнату сдать намного позже.
The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
We booked the top floor but in the end stayed in smallish studio on the ground floor due to rain damage. But aside from that everything was fine - neighbourhood really lovely!
Awesome!

Great place close to many restaurants, shops, and nightclubs. I booked the room the same day I arrived to Istanbul and Zenka was extremely helpful in getting myself situated right away. The apartment was very clean and comfortable. Highly recommend it
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Zenka was a great host...very attentive to messages but because of the language barrier, it was not entirely clear that the keys were held by a night watchman at the Otto Cihangir Cafe. Thanks to a Turkish-speaking man who helped with translations at the airport, that this was the case. The cafe was difficult to spot late at night; for others who are arriving late, look for the Savoy Cake shop opposite the alleyway.

My six nights were comfortable though best for short folks like me. Unfortunately an earlier rainstorm seeped through the windows and both mattresses closest to the windows were wet. Good thing I was a single traveller and with a little rearrangement of the mattress in one of the bedrooms made the rest of the stay entirely satisfactory. There was a problem with the light in the bathroom on the first night but Zenka bounced in as soon as he got my message and got an electrician to fix it immediately. Less so with the sensor light that came on on day 3 and would not go off the rest of the stay. Admittedly it was during an important Muslim holiday.

The location was perfect, not far from Taksim and Tophane  for transport links. Lots of cafes and restaurants a short walk from the flat. Surprisingly quiet despite being in the middle of a lively area.

The building, though old, smelt lovely as did the flat. The towels and sheets were super clean. Air conditioner great for cooling the rooms down after a warm day under the eaves. The sloping ceilings can be a problem for some. Even I, at 1.63cm, managed to hit my head a few times.

The balcony was great though don't leave it or windows opened when out, as the roaming cats may decide to stray in.

Be warned that there is very little in way of cutlery or plates but perhaps Zenka will take my suggestion of providing some.

All in all a very highly recommended place because I liked the area and in a building with character, very Parisian in feel, and very safe. Thank you Zenka.

Clean room with two full beds and living space. Apartment is an attic-like space so cannot stand in either of the bedrooms. Very strange check-in process. Getting the correct information about check-in, check out was nearly impossible. I went to a cafe outside and asked wait staff I was there for Zenak. They asked around and finally a woman who "checked me in" took me in through a back door, and practically ran up the steps, and left without saying a word. I understand language barriers but with no info and no welcome, I was not satisfied.

Zenka's place is a very clean accommodation in a central location suitable for the vibrant & traditional/commercial part of the city.
A very smart and ergonomic converted loft.
Highly friendly and approachable host.
Strongly recommended.

As others have noted the ceilings are very low! The only place you can stand fully upright is the living room bit, and there is a stool to sit on when you have a shower. But we spent most of our time exploring so it didn't matter that the room was small, and it's good value for the location. The balcony is really lovely to have and sit on, and the cafe below is a great place to eat or work, really nice vibes. Overall a great stay!

I thoroughly enjoyed my stay in the apartment. It is super clean with a beautiful scenery. The place is also strategically located within walking distances to the Taksim Square and the Galata Tower. The place might not be suitable for tall people, but luckily for me, the small space didn't turn out as a problem. And  lastly Zenka is also a wonderful host, friendly, with almost spontaneous replies and was very helpful throughout my stay.

The apartment is very cute and central in Istanbul. There was a bit difficult to finally get the keys to the apartment since they forgot to give it to us the first time and when we got them the second time the keys to the building of the apartment was missing. But worked out fine in the end. The apartment ceiling is low, so careful if you're over 150 cm you will not be able to stand upwards in the shower :) but overall a good experience though, and the balconies were especially nice.
Güzel bir yer. Güzel teras. Süper manzara ve gün batımı. Tavanın ne derece alçak olduğuna inanmak güç.

It is located in a very central area in Istanbul and it is easy to find. The place is very clean. However the place is a lot smaller than it looks in the photos. It is not possible to stand in the bedrooms or in the bathroom. The beds are on the floor. The cleaning lady tried to enter the room before we checked out which was really disturbing. All in all, the price is a bit high for the service but it was okay since we stayed only for a night.

I don t recommend this accomodation !!!!!
We were 3 french girls, first time in Istanbul. We arrived around 10.30 PM by taxi and the airbnb adress was wrong. The taxi driver tried to call zenka, she didn t answer. We asked other guys in the street to call her. No answer. I found a wifi to text her by airbnb. She answered me and asked me what was the problem. I texted her 2 times to anwer her phone. Finally she answered with a voice very angry. I gave the phone to a turkish guy : the number of the street was wrong (i was printed the reservation) and she explained to the guy we have to ask the keys to a bar . She didn t talk me about that before : recover the key to a bar. Finally we arrived to the accomodation. The wifi didn t work. I asked the waitrer if he can call her. She told him she didn t speak english ... so she didn t want to talk with me. At the end, i texted her by airbnb to know how do we do for the key. She never answered me. The building smelt toilets and the light didn t work everytime in the bathroom.
Clean and nice place in a really good location. Be careful with the low ceiling and you re fine :)

The location is perfect for everything : close to Taksim place, close to Tophane station (Tram), close to istiklal street, neighborhood calm, not tourist.

The entry: for the entrance we had to come behind the building because there is some construction work in front. Anyway It's more easier to find. We kept back the key to Otto Cihangir ( it's a bar). Very helpful people.

I strongly recommend this place. I will come back there.

Thank you
Neat and cozy apartment. We have had some difficulty on finding directions and requested some changes in the room. The owner was very helpful and immediately responding. Thank you.

Ездили отдыхать на Новый год двумя парами. Все понравилось, местоположение отличное! 10 минут пешком от площади Таксим и 20 минут пешком до султан Ахмеда. Да потолки низкие, но это не мешает вообще, очень переживали по этому поводу. Всем советую! 5 из 5

Мы приезжали вчетвером (я, муж и двое дочерей - подростков). Нам нравится этот район. Жилье нам подошло - особенно соотношение цена/качество. Да, низкие потолки в санузле и спальнях, но не критично. Мы были к этому готовы. Есть общая комнатка с диванчиком и кухонным уголком и две небольшие спальни. Хороший балкончик, но мы были зимой и использовали его не часто. Рядом все есть : супермаркеты и много кафе для завтраков и чтобы выпить отличный кофе. Я рекомендую Kahve 6 и Kronotrop. Для обеда - Cihangir Lokantası  и Ozkonak

Good location. Zenka was responsive until arrived when he stopped replying to my messages. You need to get the keys from the cafe next door. The rooms and bathroom are quite small so you need to watch your head.
Nice place and location,  the height make its a little awkward but overall we enjoyed our stay

Le logement était top, pratique (wifi, balcon, sécurisé). Si on fait moins d’ 1m75 ça va. Les endroits les moins hauts sont les chambres et la salle de bain mais on y passe pas sa vie non plus. Seul bémol il n’y pas de glace dans la salle de bain, il y en a une dans les escaliers mais pas pratique car peu de lumière.
Le quartier est vraiment super à 5min de Taksim, vivant (restaurants, bars, supérettes), on se sent en sécurité. Deniz du Otto Bistro est arrangeante et avec (Hidden by Airbnb) translate pas de problème !
Amazing place! It is very comfortable and a view from a balcony is brilliant! But beware of low ceiling if u are taller than 1,7m)

È una casa molto carina ma davvero davvero piccola. Persone troppo alte potrebbero avere seri problemi per via della poca altezza del soffitto. Nel piccolo salottino è possibile stare relativamente in piedi mentre non è possibile farlo nella stanza da letto. Non è possibile cucinare ma c’è un lavello per lavare le tazze. Pur essendo ben attrezzato, il bagno è minuscolo. Il terrazzino è molto carino e d’estate può essere utile. A mio avviso la casa è carina, va bene se non si hanno troppe pretese e se si è elastici per quanto riguardano le dimensioni. 
Il locale sottostante e che gestisce la casa è un buon punto di riferimento e possono fornire informazioni oltre che cibo.

TR: Fotoğraflarda görüleni tam olarak alıyorsunuz. Mekanla ilgili yanıltıcı bir durum yok. Yalnızca binanın gürültü çıkarmaya çok müsait olmadığını ve Cihangir'in yapısı gereği balkonda geçireceğiniz vaktin diğer dairelere ve pencerelere biraz yakın olacağını bilmeniz gerek. Ancak genel görgü kurallarına uyduğunuz sürece sorun olmayacaktır.  Yer tertemiz, sabun kokularıyla karşılanıyorsunuz. Wifi yeterli. Manzara makul. Fotoğraflar ve diğer yorumlardan dolayı, tavanın alçaklığı sizi endişelendirebilir. Biraz zorluk yarattığı doğru. Banyoda ve yatılan alanlarda biraz eğilmek gerekli olabiliyor ancak abartılacak bir şey değil. Büyük bir güvenle tercih edebileceğiniz bir yer. Son bir not: Mekanın yeri aslında adres olarak Sıraselviler caddesinde ancak küçük bir aralıkta kalıyor. Dolayısıyla size iletilen mekan adıyla yeri ararsanız daha kolay bulabilirsiniz.

EN:You will get what you see. Nothing less than expected. You should know the building is old and that means loud noises will travel along thin walls and as a classical Cihangir street, the balcony is very close to other windows but as long as you keep your common sense about manners it shouldn't be a problem. Apartment is clean, welcomes you with soapy smells. Wifi is decent and view is reasonable. You may be concerned about height of the place because of the photographs and other comments. Partially that's true. You may need to do some bending in bathroom and sleeping areas but it's not at a deal breaker level. You can choose this place with trust.
PS: Actual adress is on Sıraselviler St. yes, but it's situated in a narrow street. You may need to use place's name to find it on maps.
Nice Place, very clean and tidy. WiFi speed is very slow

The place is really cozy situated in a side street near Taksim square. One of the advantages is the balcony and comfortable beds. Mind the height of the ceilings as they are quite low and not suitable if one is over 1.70. The people were all helpful and responsive. Overall the stay was pleasant and I would highly recommend it!

Appartement très bien situé et très propre que je reprendrai avec plaisir pour un autre séjour à Istanbul. Il est très central ce qui permet de faire beaucoup de choses à pied. L’appartement est très propre mais ne dispose de rien pour faire la cuisine, il faut donc prévoir de manger dehors. Il y a une pharmacie, boulangerie et petit supermarché à proximité. Merci pour votre accueil et à bientôt !

Great place, very cosy apartment with nice city view
I wanna visit Istambul again soon and definitely will choose same place

Ich hatte diesen Unterkunft für meine Mutter, Tante und Kusine gebucht. Ich selbst bin Erasmus-Student an der Istanbuler Universität. Sie waren aus Tiflis zu Besuch.
Weil wir in meiner WG nicht genug Platz hatten, haben wir uns entschieden etwas über Airbnb zu suchen. So bin ich auf ,,Zenka Rooms“ aufmerksam geworden. 
Um uns einchecken zu können, mussten wir von einem Bistro den Schlüssel abholen. Die Frau, die auch unsere Ansprechspartnerin war, hat uns zu der Wohnung begleitet. 
Das Gebäude ist aus Holz und macht von außen einen sympathischen Eindruck. Auch beim Reingehen hatte ich sehr gutes Gefühl. Unsere Wohnung war im Dachgeschoss. Die Höhe des Daches im Wohnzimmer war c.a 1,80 cm. und in den ,,Zimmerchen“ 1,30 cm. Die Wohnung ist für die Kleinmenschen gedacht und nicht für die Menschen, die mehr als 1,30 groß sind. 
Meine Mutter und Tante, die beide Rückenschmerzen haben, mussten  die ganze Zeit krum rumlaufen. Beim ins Bett Gehen musste man sich schon direkt vor der Tür hinlegen und zur Matratze kriechen. 
Duschen war einfach Katastrophe. Das Bad war vielleicht gerade Mal c.a 3 Quadratmeter groß und 1,40 hoch. 
Als ich die Frau angesprochen habe, dass diese Wohnung nicht den Bildern entsprach, hat sie mir auf ihr Handy die Bilder gezeigt, die tatsächlich in der Wohnung gemacht wurden. Allerdings als ich gebucht habe, waren ganz andere Bilder drin, als die sie mir gezeigt hat. Sie haben mehrere Zimmer, die sie vermieten und auf der Seite sind die Bilder vermischt, sodass man die nicht zu einem Zimmer zuordnen kann. 
Ich wäre nie auf die Idee gekommen, dass man sowas vermietet. 
Es möge für Pärchen vielleicht schön und romantisch sein, aber nicht für 50 jährigen Menschen, die unter Rückenschmerzen leiden. 
Ich finde sowas muss extra groß geschrieben werden, dass die Wohnung 1,30 hoch ist!

L’appartamento è carino e siamo stati bene. L’unico difetto è l’altezza, non è consigliabile per persone più alte di un metro e 80 cm. In ogni caso nella stanza da letto e in bagno non si può stare in piedi, all’inizio é un po’ strano e sicuramente non il massimo della comodità ma poi ci si abitua. La location è molto pratica e a 2 minuti da piazza Taksim. Siamo stati bene e il letto anche se è a pavimento è comodissimo. Tutto pulito!

Не смогли с ходу найти апартаменты, позвонили хозяину, он нашел нас и объяснил куда идти, за что ему большое спасибо. Стильное место недалеко от площади Таксим. Вокруг куча мест, где можно покушать, метро тоже недалеко, так что мы с 2 детьми легко добирались до всех достопримечательностей. Отличный вид с балкона. Из минусов: в спальнях и в душе низкие потолки, приходилось ходить внаклонку. Постоянно пахло куревом из окон. Для тех, кто едет с детьми: Балкон не запирается на ключ, окна тоже легко открываются.

Excellent location, hosts friendly and quick to respond both on email and in person, and to act should problems arise.  Place is clean and pleasant.  Would recommend. 

Just FYI: Not the place if you're looking for tips and host interactions, or cute little amenities.  Wifi is present but unreliable.  Ask for good directions before arriving (don't rely on street number).  Roof of bedrooms is low enough that short people need to bend over/mattress on floor.  Just to keep in mind....But not to dissuade!

Please read my review to the end, it might save your life.

The listing for this flat is very misleading.

I booked it for myself and a friend. We are 183 and 182 cm tall, and there is only approximately 6sqm in the whole place where we can stand up straight. You have to sit down to shower and pee. The bedroom I was in was horribly claustrophobic, and my friends was smaller. It's not "cosy", or "compact" it's just completely unusable. The vast majority of the flat is 160cm high or much less. 

This fundamental problem is mentioned nowhere in the listing.

If you are lucky enough to connect to the wifi, then you will discover that it is completely unusable. The hosts are aware of this, as previous reviews will show.

The listing states there is a half bath. There is not even a half shower.

The intro to the listing says you have a kitchen. You do not. There's just a sink in the living room, with an unfitted fridge handily placed to prevent you from reaching the sink, and to stub your toe in the process.

There is supposed to be a laptop friendly workspace. There is not. But then you won't need that because there's no wifi anyway.

On the first night we stayed here, I woke in the morning covered in bites. I did not see a single mosquito anywhere, so there's a good chance that I was bitten by bed bugs. 

The "curtains" are bits of fabric shut into the windows, so if you open the windows, the "curtains" fall down.

You only get one set of keys with this property. At first this appears merely a little inconvenient, but when you realise that you can not leave the property without a key, in the unlikely event of a fire then this is not inconvenient, it's life threatening.

In short this listing is misleading, and the flat is an uncomfortable, impractical, insanitary death trap. With very bad wifi.
As described. Good location. 5mn from Taksim square. The ceilings are very Low but as advertised. No surprise. Good value for money

Nice apartments with good city location: near Taksim and Istiklal, close walking to Karakoy, Kabatas and Galata bridge. Great view from the balcony, especially in evening. But not for tall boys and girls ;))
Was een prima verblijf voor een weekend trip. Netjes en proper. Inderdaad klein, maar wel fijn.

Le séjour dans l’appartement était parfait . L’appartement est petit mais confortable et agréable. ( par contre les grandes personnes ne peuvent pas être debout car le plafond est à beaucoup d’endroit bas) 
Le balcon donne un charme à l’appartement et un espace agréable si il fait beau.
Il n’y a vraiment rien pour cuisiner donc il faut penser à manger dehors.
L’accès à l’appartement et la communication furent parfaite.
La propreté irréprochable. 
Je retournerais volontiers dans cette appartement.

We had a great time at Zenka's place. She was super helpful and answered always quickly. The apartment is centrally located. The ceiling was indeed quite low but if you know this before it should not be an impediment. Thanks a lot, hope we have the chance to come again.
Всё замечательно! Бронируйте не думая!!
Comfortable place and close to Taksim Street and I would recommend it to everyone
I'm sure that this was one of the best places to stay in Cihangir. Also, staff working in a Otto Cihangir place is very kind and helpful, make you feel like home ;)

This place is quiet & the balcony is wonderful. It is very clean and I felt safe in this area. I’m a petite woman and so this apartment was perfect for me. That said, I can’t imagine it with two guests and if you’re taller than 5.5ft I don’t think you’d be happy here. It suited me nicely. Zenka was diligent with communication and friendly, although she doesn’t speak much English. All was well. I’d recommend this for sure! Just be mindful of the ceiling height.

В целом все неплохо, но есть к чему стремиться. На 3 этаже вайфай очень слабый,на ладан дышит. Беда с зеркалами, удлинителями или розетками рядом с единственным зеркалом. Это принципиально для девушек, краситься, собираться было просто неудобно
Согласны со всеми положительными отзывами! Отличная квартира!

The keys are given at the bar just beneath in the street. The connexion was very weak, the ceiling is very low so you won't be able to stand most of the time; also the equipment to eat (plates, forks etc) is minimal, even though that's more of a detail as it is not among the announced equipment. The balcony is very nice, so is the neighbourhood, and the appartment is clean and well located, near Taksim Square.  It's just a bit weird never to know exactly who you address when corresponding with Zenka but nevertheless it's a good play to stay at and explore the city.
Amazing location and very clean. however if you are over 5'5" it would be uncomfortable. the ceiling is low and the shower is very low. great balcony.
Очень милая квартира с чудеснейшим балконом, расположение идеальное, все находится совсем рядом и стоит отметить приветливый персонал в кафе у дома, который поможет в любой момент:)
I had a pleasant stay in our host's apartment.I recommend it  : -) thanks Zenka...
Все было просто супер! Сперва смущали низкие потолки, но потом это вообще не вызвало никаких проблем, так что если вы не 2 метров ростом не бойтесь! Zenka thank you so much!

Want to feel yourself like Gandalf at hobbit’s house? Stay at the Roof Top Terrace! ))))
Very clean and cozy apartments under the roof in an old part of the city, with all you need (supermarket, pharmacy, numerous cafes and restaurants) close to it. It has two simetrical bedrooms so is ideal for two couples of travelers.
The only disadvantage I found - rather low height of all rooms, especially it feels in bathroom. But all negative is overlapped by the sight from terrace and incredible atmosphere of Istanbul you feel there!

The apartment is located in a liberal district Beyoğlu, where are a lot of restaurants, clubs, shops and other entertainments. Around 1h to go to the city center with all historical places. It’s easier and cheaper to take taxi (~€3,00), if you don’t like walking. The apartment has a low level of ceiling, which can be uncomfortable for someone. But it’s ok, if you don’t stay long in Istanbul. There is a beautiful balcony in the apartment  as well.
Cozy little apartment in the center of town. Expect low ceilings.
Жилье расположено в 5 минутах от площади Таксим. Очень чисто и уютно. Отличный вариант для короткого пребывания. С удовольствием ещё вернёмся.

Thank you for this appartment, we really liked that it was in a great district, very central and calm. House is situated away from main road near the restaurant, which is good, because we didnt hear the noise from the streets. Appartments inside are like on the photos. But the ceilings are very low, which we didn't expect. In main room we could walk normal way, but in bedrooms and bathroom we coud not stand straight because of the roof ceilings.

Хорошее расположение квартиры (Истикляль состредоточие всей тусни в 7 минутах ходьбы). Крутая лестница в квартиру, но нас это не напрягало. Квартира очень маленькая, но нам вчетвером хватало. В квартире есть чайник, миниплитка и посуда. Не хватало микроволновки и столика в гостиной. До остановки транспорта (метро, трамвай,автобусы, фуникулер) 10 мин. Нам понравилось.
The location is just great and the house is a cute little rooftop, definitely recommend it for couple of days :)

Anlatılan ve gösterilen evi tam olarak karşınızda buluyorsunuz. Ev tertemiz ve çok düzenliydi. Yatak ve nevresimler oldukça rahat ve temizdi. Tavanın alçak oluşu gözünüzü korkutmasın, minimum dikkatle büyük sorunlara sebep olmuyor. Güzel bir balkona sahip. Eve girdiğimiz ilk andan itibaren yabancı hissetmedik, oldukça samimi ve şirin bir evdi. Zenka ilgili, güvenilir ve samimi bir ev sahibi.Kesinlikle güvenle tercih edebileceğiniz bir yer.
Прекрасное место, чтобы остановиться. Очень вкусное кафе внизу. Не подходит для высоких людей.
Great location.  Good buy.  Clean room. Enjoyable stay.  Watch your head when you stand up! Low very low ceilings, which you are warned about before you rent the place.

Прекрасная, колоритная квартира. Очень необычная, нам очень понравилось. Низкие потолки, но это небыло проблемой, с душем было немного сложно, но мы приловчились. Хозяин очень быстро отвечает и помогает во всем, о чем просишь. Была в Стамбуле первый раз, квартира стала ещё одним пунктом, по которому я могу с уверенностью сказать, что я люблю этот город! 
К Истикляль идти всего пару минут)
it was good...
Tereddüt etmeden rahatlıkla rezervasyon yaptırmanızı tavsiye ederim.

Было не трудно найти аппартаменты, заселились сразу по прибытии. В номере было холодно ужасно, батареи слабо грели, а та, что в гостиной вообще не работала, туалет не отапливается вообще. Спасло то, что за время нашего пребывание на улице потеплело, соответственно и в номере тоже. Одеяло одно на двухспальную кровать. Я не против, но кровать, это два матраца на плоду соединённых вместе, тут или нужно ещё сверху класть какой-то общий матрац или класть два одеяла, тк или я, или муж, спали в дырке. В первое утро не было воды от слова совсем, из-за этого пришлось сидеть в номере и ждать когда она пойдёт тк даже зубы было не почистить. Далее проблем с водой не было. Интернет ужасно работал, точнее он почти не работал. До поездки связалась с хозяином что бы уточнить этот вопрос, он заверял, что все проблемы улажены и в крайнем случае есть интернет в кафе рядом. В кафе рядом он тоже не работал. В целом об апартаментах...чисто, один раз убрались и сменили полотенца (мы были 4 ночи), все необходимое есть, в ванной надо бы шторку повесить, близко к центру и не шумно, рядом магазин. Действительно очень низкие потолки.

Check-in is very easy as the house is located behind the restaurant/bar where Zenka works and waiters are there to help. Nevertheless, you do have your privacy. The apartment is located on the top floor (attic) room of a house. Tall people should not stay here as the ceiling is very low. The accommodation is basic with one main space with a television, small couch, and sink with a portable electric stove-top and kettle. There could be more pots and pans. Adjoining this room are two bedrooms each with two mattresses which, pushed together, make a double bed. The restaurant/ pub could be a little noisy on Friday and Saturday nights, but it didn't keep me up. It's clean and warm. They had cleaners come and tidy and replace the towels, which was lovely.

name: Modern Luxury-Family Friendly Condo
summary: This stunning condo is family friendly and modern. It boasts vaulted ceilings, beautiful furnishings and is stocked with all the convinces of home. The property is impeccably maintained and is conveniently located across from an amazing beach.
space: Extensively renovated with modern new flooring, all new paint, all new furniture, lighting, three flat screen TVs with cable and dvd players, wireless internet, and a bluetooth speaker. The kitchen and dining area are beautiful with new cabinets, granite, stainless appliances and lighting. Stunning views of the ocean, pool, and mountain from lanai. Two floor design includes main floor with living room, dining area, kitchen, bathroom, and bedroom. Main floor bedroom includes beautiful mahogany king size bed and furniture with closet, large dresser for guests and air conditioning. Room also includes flat screen TV with cable, dvd player and  alarm clock. Bathroom includes a walk-in shower. Kitchen is fully furnished with a new dishwasher, fridge, stove, and microwave. Kitchenware, glassware, toaster, blender and coffee maker included in the completely outfitted kitchen. Dining area includes a breakfast bar with 4 stools and a table which will comfortably seat 4-6 guests. Living room incl
description: This stunning condo is family friendly and modern. It boasts vaulted ceilings, beautiful furnishings and is stocked with all the convinces of home. The property is impeccably maintained and is conveniently located across from an amazing beach. Extensively renovated with modern new flooring, all new paint, all new furniture, lighting, three flat screen TVs with cable and dvd players, wireless internet, and a bluetooth speaker. The kitchen and dining area are beautiful with new cabinets, granite, stainless appliances and lighting. Stunning views of the ocean, pool, and mountain from lanai. Two floor design includes main floor with living room, dining area, kitchen, bathroom, and bedroom. Main floor bedroom includes beautiful mahogany king size bed and furniture with closet, large dresser for guests and air conditioning. Room also includes flat screen TV with cable, dvd player and  alarm clock. Bathroom includes a walk-in shower. Kitchen is fully furnished with a new dishwasher, fridge, s
notes: Rates include a one-time linen & towel setup. An initial supply of soap and paper products is provided.  The unit is professionally cleaned before you arrive and after you leave for the next guest. Daily maid service is not provided.  You will have access to an in the unit washer/ dryer for your personal use.  Upon check-in at the front desk guests must pay a $61.46 resort fee WHICH IS NOT INCLUDED IN THE RENTAL FEE. This fee includes a swipe pass to access gated parking and access to the pool, sundeck, and hot tub area and exercise facilities.  It also includes free lobby cyber café access, free wifi in the lobby and pool areas, access to the complimentary Wednesday Mai-tai party, free local telephone calls and 1-800 access.
access: The Kamaole Sands property  is a great place for both active or relaxing vacations! The pool and kiddie pool with hot-tubs and sun-deck are great, and the 15 acre grounds are the nicest in Kihei with fountains, waterfalls, fish and turtle ponds, and convenient bbq areas. The fitness room is a nice touch, and the immediate area is perfect for cycling, snorkeling, kayaking, surfing, boogie boarding, running, and walking. The beautiful Kamaole 3 Beach is directly across from the Kamaole Sands.
house_rules: Taxes (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) %) are included in the nightly rate. We have been on (Hidden by Airbnb) for 8 years! Check out our very positive reviews on (Hidden by Airbnb) # (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)  Our guests are required to sign a rental agreement.

reviews.comments: Great property!!  Close to the pool, the beach within walking distance.  The kitchen was very well equipped.  The closet had everything we needed - beach chairs, umbrellas, coolers.  Lots of showers outside to clean off gear.  Concierge available by pool to plan excursions.  Nice beach towels.  Nice to have washer and dryer.  Thanks for a nice stay.

Excelent condo. Clean, well decorated and spacious.
It was everything me and my family needed.

The place was clean and tidy. The location was great, a five minute walk to the beach. Everything was organized and keys were ready when we arrived.  However the A/C was not satisfactory. The main unit was hard wired to a 4 hour timer presumably to save hydro. The loft would become very hot and difficult to sleep. The unit would shut off and you would end up walking up very hot and have to get up to turn on the unit again.  The system could not cope to keep the loft comfortable. After a day out the unit would be hot and take some time to cool down. If the ac was better I would not hesitate recommending this place. If you are not going to use the loft bedroom then it's adequate. If you are using it, you will have very warm nights.
Great location and facilities
The condo was exactly as we expected. Well equipped with everything we needed. The location was great.
Everything was great and exactly as described!  Chelsey was very easy to communicate with and was very helpful!  Would definitely recommend and come back again!

This is an excellent updated, well-equipped unit! The building location (building #6) was ideal as the unit overlooked the pool as well as offered a view of the ocean.  We loved the ability to walk across the street to get to the beach (Kamaole Beach III), especially to watch the amazing sunset.  We had two young-ish families in the unit and we never felt that we were tripping over each other.
We really enjoyed the location of the property and the amenities at the complex. It was very family friendly and everything was as advertised!
Great condo, great host. Would return and highly recommend.

Overall great place: Location is great. The apartment oversees the pool and the beach is a walking distance. Everything you need, from beach toys to beach chairs, a trolly, floaters etc. is there. The kitchen is fully equip. If we come back to Maui, we'll definitely book this place again.

The location was great but there was no central air. The loft was so hot we could not sleep at all. There was one very small window air conditioner in the living room but it did not cool down the living room and it was extremely hot. There was a room air conditioner in the other bedroom and that was the only room that was cool. I would never stay there in the summer.

This condo was perfect! The beach across the street was great for snorkeling and Chelsey had everything in the condo to make for a relaxing beach day! (Chairs, umbrella, coolers, and a wagon to haul it all!) 
As far as the interior of the condo, it was very clean and spacious. The AC and Fans throughout the rooms help combat the muggy heat of Hawaii, and leaving the front door and patio slider open gave a nice cross breeze. 
The property is cleanly kept and everyone was super friendly. The pool was clean and pretty big!
Also, Chelsey was amazing at responding to any questions I had throughout my stay! Would definitely stay here again!
Clean comfortable and excellent communication.  Very convenient location.  We felt aloha!
Great condo, lots of space, fantastic trade winds in the afternoon to cool everything down. Stumbling distance to the beach and shopping strip.

The condo fit our family perfectly the layout was great! The best part was the beach is right across the street and the pool downstairs was perfect for the kids. Also, the condo is very clean and well equipped. I would stay again in our future trip!

Must be weekly rental, other restrictions - Wheelchair accessible / ADA, call resort directly to ensure U receive. If U need ADA U MUST inform us BEFORE booking.
space: This is a timeshare owner reservation. You are under no obligation to attend any sales activity :) PLEASE NOTE for most dates, due to high reservation demand, owners almost always pre-reserve units a year in advance where the reservation is OFTEN 7 nights long with check-in on Fri, Sat, or Sun. If you desire check-in and/or check-out Mon thru Thur, we can coordinate any available additional reservation for the nights which are in addition to the 7 night reservation. notes: AS OF 01/16/ (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) CONSTRUCTION - Construction at the nearby Westin Nanea Ocean Villas is complete and will not impact Westin Kaanapali guests. AS OF 01/16/ (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) POOL CLOSURE - Septemb (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) Octob (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) The pool and deck areas at The Westin Ka‘anapali Ocean Resort Villas North will be closed for maintenance. The North phase Pirate Ship Pool, ALL South phase pools/slides, and ALL Westin Nanea pools ARE OPEN AND AVAILABLE. While the Pailolo Bar & Grill at North phase will be closed ALL OTHER RESTAURANTS at the three resorts will remain OPEN. Workers will be present between 8:30 a.m. and 6 p.m., seven days a week at the North phase pool.
transit: Complimentary shuttle service to the town of Lahaina and sister resorts in Ka‘anapali Once booked, our DIRECTIONS info includes a link to book shared and private shuttles from airport to/from timeshare resort, fees approx $60 to $300 Car Rental Recommended if you prefer self-guided tours to entire island. Taxi Service also available.
access: Check in at this resort in the same way you do any hotel / resort. Full guest privileges at this resort. - The resort WILL REQUIRE your government ID / passport to have the same name as what we provide to them (it's OK to omit your middle name/initial), and more than one Airbnb policy necessitates we require your Airbnb name be the same as that on your ID. If the named guest is under the age of 21, the resort will not allow you to check in, and you will not receive a refund! THIS IS THE WESTIN TIMESHARE RESORT, NOT THE HOTEL. - Guests staying at the timeshare have full access and privileges for EVERYTHING at the TIMESHARE ( INCLUDING the pools and slides). - Guests may charge expenses at the Sheraton and Westin hotels to their timeshare unit. - HOWEVER timeshare guests do not have access to the HOTEL pools NOR the Westin Hotel waterslide park. NO ONE has access to the Westin hotel water slide except Westin hotel guests ... just like no one except Westin timeshare guests may use the Wes
interaction: There are activities programs and concierge activities booking services at this resort.
house_rules: No smoking; No Pets; This resort's rules apply. Please call the resort directly to verify details.

host.host_about: Adventurous couple loves to travel :)

reviews.comments: I had a great experience working with Patty and Peter.  Both were very attentive in sorting out the booking details and following up directly when I had questions.  I rented a 2 bedroom unit at the Westin Villas  in Maui and both the unit and property was absolutely amazing.  I think we had the best unit on the resort complete with 2 outdoor patios with direct access  to  the  beach.  I would HIGHLY recommend renting with Patty and Peter.
Peter quickly responded to any questions I had before, and during the trip. Will use again, highly recommend.

We had the perfect location for a room, first floor right in front of the pool. The resort is beautiful, and the staff is so friendly! I enjoyed it so much, we talked about buying a timeshare ourselves.
Beautiful location. Patty & Peter were super helpful and easy to work with!
Great spot for the kids and family and close to beach and everything at the resort. We will definitely be back.

The unit and the Westin offer variety of amenities you can possibly ask for. Sofa beds are very comfortable to sleep in. But there is charge for ocean view upgrade. Overall, I highly recommend to book with Patty and Peter.

We spent a great week at Patty and Peter's place. The place was exactly as shown in the pictures, very comfortable, nice view, with all amenities. The resort is great with several pools, a long beach, many restaurants, and of course a lot of great activities all around.
This place was perfect for my family. We had plenty of room to spread out and the service could not have been any better
We love Westin Kaanapalli

name: Room in apartment with beautiful view, in Botafogo
summary: Large apartment, comfortable room with TV. Separate bathrooms, but complete. TV room. Beautiful views of Guanabara Bay. A place near malls and easy transportation by both bus and taxi. Bakery close by. Next to the bakery called "Pão de Açúcar."
space: I live in the apartment, but there is total privacy. Great infrastructure.
description: Large apartment, comfortable room with TV. Separate bathrooms, but complete. TV room. Beautiful views of Guanabara Bay. A place near malls and easy transportation by both bus and taxi. Bakery close by. Next to the bakery called "Pão de Açúcar." I live in the apartment, but there is total privacy. Great infrastructure. Guests will be allowed to access the apartment in general, except for my room. There is a place for drying and washing clothes. I offer sheets, towels, etc. I live in the apartment and I usually go out. I have two cats that will not enter in your room. In Botafogo. Next to the Urca, Pão de Açúcar and Praia Vermelha (Red Beach). Near Copacabana. Easy transportation to Ipanema and all the South. Nice atmosphere and great view! Positive energy! There is not easy parking for those coming by car. It is best to use taxi. There are bus stops nearby. The subway is less than a kilometer.
neighborhood_overview: In Botafogo. Next to the Urca, Pão de Açúcar and Praia Vermelha (Red Beach). Near Copacabana. Easy transportation to Ipanema and all the South. Nice atmosphere and great view! Positive energy!
notes: Solicito apenas a maior descrição na hospedagem quanto a porteiros e vizinhos. Temos portaria 24 horas e os ambientes comuns são filmados.
transit: There is not easy parking for those coming by car. It is best to use taxi. There are bus stops nearby. The subway is less than a kilometer.
access: Guests will be allowed to access the apartment in general, except for my room. There is a place for drying and washing clothes. I offer sheets, towels, etc.
interaction: I live in the apartment and I usually go out. I have two cats that will not enter in your room.
house_rules: Que sejam discretos. Não poderá haver som alto, receberem outras visitas e fumarem. O comportamento deverá ser adequado e educado. Usar a cozinha apenas para refeições rápidas ou lanches. Não é permitido cozinhar todas as refeições usando fogão , panelas e serviço da auxiliar para cozinhar. Há micro ondas que pode ser utilizado para aquecer refeições ou alguma coisa necessária.  Há café da manhã .  Há TV no quarto. Não se pode desliga-la da tomada . Idem o aparelho da NET. Isto desconfigura o aparelho . Basta não liga-la caso não deseje ver. Não grudar , pregar, imagens , figuras ou qualquer símbolo no mobiliário que é envernizado . Os objetos podem ser colocados nas mesas de cabeceira apoiados. Jamais colados.

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about: Uma das coisas mais importantes para nós são as boas relações humanas. Receber um hóspede nos da oportunidade de conhecermos novas idéias, culturas,trocarmos experiências e fazermos a vida melhor com bons e agradáveis relacionamentos. Gostaria que amassem o Rio de Janeiro como eu. com seus defeitos, qualidades e belezas. E isto começa pela minha casa. Desejo que a estadia comigo, reflita todo o carinho que tenho pela cidade e pelos que a visitam.

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation 76 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
I had a great time with Ida, she is a lovely host and the room was nice, quiet, very clean and cozy. The location is also great and the view, wow! Amazing! I recommend staying with Ida at anytime.

A estadia no apartamento da Ida foi ótima. Ela literalmente nos recebeu de braços abertos. Sempre muito atenciosa e solícita. O apartamento é muito bonito, limpo e a vista então nem se fala. Super recomendo!!!!

O que dizer sobre minha experiência nesse apartamento? Foi incrível! A Ida é uma pessoa adorável, muito simpática e prestativa. O apartamento é enorme e a vista é linda. O quarto é muito confortável, com ar condicionado e uma cama muito boa. O banheiro é bem espaçoso, com ducha, com toalhas limpinhas, shampoo, condicionador, sabonetes novinhos, tudo perfeito para aquele banho relaxante. Todos os ambientes têm uma limpeza impecável. A localização é privilegiada, em lugar tranquilo. Não há barulho. A anfitriã nos fez sentir bem vindos, e nos deu toda a privacidade necessária. Eu simplesmente poderia morar ali pelo resto da minha vida. Meu marido e eu fomos muito bem tratados, e servidos com um bolo de laranja delicioso.
Voltarei mais vezes, e indicarei sempre.

Ida é uma pessoa encantadora, gentil, educada, prestativa e muito preocupada pela satisfação do seu visitante. Recomendo muito! De todas as minhas experiências no Airbnb esta é de longe a melhor. A minha única preocupação é que este achado tenha tanto sucesso que muito em breve não tenha mais disponibilidades para que possa aproveitar quando viajo para Rio de Janeiro :-).
Obrigado Ida, você fez do nosso final de semana olímpico um momento inesquecível.
Tudo perfeito, superou muito a minha expectativa, a anfitriã é de uma simpatia fora de (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza voltarei a hospedar lá.

A Ida é simplesmente fantástica , prestativa, inteligente , de ótima comunicação , foi solicita o tempo todo . O apartamento é maravilhoso, cama deliciosa, ar condicionado/tv e sem barulho nenhum, com uma vista fabulosa. Além de tudo isto, ainda acordamos um um lindo café da manhã e passeamos com ela pelo Rio. Nota 1000!

O sentimento que tive nesses dias foi de todas as expectativas superadas!
A Ida é um doce de pessoa!! Amável, prestativa, "pra cima" e desde a minha chegada me deixou muito a vontade, com total liberdade em sua casa. Me recebeu como se eu fosse uma pessoa de sua família.

Conforto, aconchego, praticidade, comodidade,...  tudo muito limpo, toalhas cheirosas, amenidades de banho de excelente qualidade! 
A cama é uma delícia e nada atrapalha o seu sono, pois é um local silencioso.
Sobre a localização, gostei muito! Além de ser um lugar lindo, tem shoppings perto e fácil acesso para outros lugares.
Sempre que for ao Rio é lá que quero ficar!

Ida é uma anfitriã ótima! Bem humorada, pessoa agradável e muito atenciosa! Dá ótimas informações sobre tudo no Rio. Minha estadia foi breve, mas sem dúvida voltarei ao apartamento da Ida com mais tempo! O apartamento é lindo, bem localizado, espaçoso, muito limpo e aconchegante! Recomendo a todos!

Adorei tudo! A recepção foi ótima, Ida é uma pessoa maravilhosa.
A localização do apartamento é excelente, a vista é lindíssima, de frente para o Pão de Açúcar, Iate Clube.
O apartamento é grande, o quarto em que fiquei hospedada estava organizado, limpo, banheiro também era exclusivo e bem limpo. Ida me ofereceu café da manhã, me deu explicações sobre a cidade, foi maravilhosa.
Super indico, e espero voltar em breve!

Ida is a wonderful lady, I felt like home at her place. It´s my first time to book on airbnb, and which was so nice. I was there for a international theatre conference at UNIRIO, the location is awesome, like 10 mins walk to UNIRIO and pão de açucar. The area is safe, I walked back to her place around 10 to 11pm with no problem for security. She even prepare breakfast and some cakes for my tea time when I back for a nap in the afternoon. The house is clean, the area is quite and with beautiful view to see the ocean and pão de açucar in her living room. At her place, I don´t have to worry anything, I can get anything I need from her, like printer, umbrella...etc. you never know what you will need and always forget to bring with you when traveling. I definitely will choose her place again next year for the conference.
Simplesmente excelente! Apartamento com uma vista linda, muito espaçoso e impecavelmente limpo! A Ida nos deixa muito à vontade, além de ser um amor de pessoa. Certamente voltarei!

Minha estadia no apartamento da Ida foi muito boa. Ida é uma pessoa muito atenciosa, generosa e bem humorada. Me deixou muito à vontade e com muito conforto. O apartamento é excelente, a localização para mim é ótima. Recomendo!

La estadia en la casa de Ida la cual cabe mencionar es super espaciosa y de muy buen gusto, es el lugar ideal para hospedarse si uno quiere explorar la ciudad de Rio de Janeiro, ubicada en un punto central y con una vista desde su sala a la bahia excelente. Ademas de que a unos pocos minutos a pie se encuentra la playa de Copacabana, la estacion de metro y un centro comercial. Por otra parte debo hacer especial mencion a la predisposicion de Ida, para aportar la informacion necesaria ya sea para movilizarse en la ciudad, que lugares visitar o bien evacuando dudas o problemas que puedan presentarse. Recomendable 100 % sin ningun tipo de objecion. La estadia en Rio de Janeiro supero mis expectativas gracias a su colaboracion...

Ida war eine äußerst zuvorkommend und hilfsbereite Gastgeberin. Sie stand mir jederzeit mit Rat und Tat zur Seite um meinen Aufenthalt in Rio so angenehm wie möglich zu gestalten. Dabei wahrte sie ihre unkomplizierte und lebensfrohe Persönlichkeit. Die Wohnung war in einem sehr guten Zustand und sehr schön eingerichtet. Einziges Manko war die etwas laute Klimaanlage im Schlafzimmer. Die Lage hat mich besonders überzeugt. Der morgendliche Blick auf den Zuckerhut war sicherlich eins meiner Highlights. Ich würde jederzeit wieder meine Zeit in Rio bei ihr verbringen.

Memorable staying. Ida's place was Very clean and tidy and good view from the house. You can see the sugar loaf. Ida really looks after me while i was staying in her house. She was like my mum in Brazil. I felt safe and secured.
Ida es excelente anfitriona. El departamento es hermoso, espacioso, luminoso, limpio, confortable, cómodo. Buena conexión a internet.
A estadia foi perfeita. Todas as descrições condizem perfeitamente com o local e, além de tudo, a vista é algo impagável. A Ida é gentil e atenciosa e preza pelo bem-estar do hóspede.

Estar no Rio na casa da Ida, foi muito especial! Fui muito bem recebida, casa limpa e cheirosa. A Ida teve todo o cuidado de respeitar a privacidade, a higiene e limpeza do ambiente. Ela dá toda a assistência solicitada, dá dicas de onde podemos passear, comer e como se locomover na cidade. Foi uma satisfação. O local além de muito aconchegante, é perto de bares, locais para comer além da proximidade com pontos turísticos. A vista do apartamento é de tirar o fôlego. Realmente foi ótimo!!! :)
Muito bom, fui bem recebida, ambiente limpo e aconchegante com total (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza voltarei.
Ida is simply the best. She is a nice person and an excellent host. This apartment was a 'home away from home' and I would highly recommend it.

O apartamento e o quarto são amplos e confortáveis. Ida adora receber seus hóspedes, é uma pessoa amável e sua postura ética nos dá segurança e liberdade. Ah, e ainda tem a inesquecível vista da Enseada de Botafogo e da Urca!

Simplismente maravilhada com essa pessoa extraordinária, Ida é a anfitriã perfeita, pessoa amiga, de confiança, ótima, com um coração sem tamanho, nunca deixa nada faltar, sempre feliz e disposta! Obrigada pelos pequenos passeios e pela companhia esses 3 dias ao seu lado ! A apartamento e lindo, perfeito, design e conforto total, limpíssimo, arrumado , bastante calmo e tem uma vista na sala que nossaaa sem palavras! Em resumo, tudo perfeito tudo lindo! Recomendadíssimo!

O apartamento é grande, com decoração de bom gosto, uma vista incrível da baía de Guanabara e fica muito bem localizado no bairro de Botafogo, muito próximo a UFRJ, cheguei a caminhar até a praia de Ipanema em um dia de energia mas indo de bicicleta(todo caminho tem ciclofaixa e estações do Rio Bike) levava cerca de 30min apenas. Há um shopping muito próximo também, estação de metrô e supermercado distante cerca de 1km (sempre caminhava até lá). Pode-se caminhar sem dificuldade até a praia Vermelha e o Pão de Açúcar. O bairro de Botafogo me pareceu bastante central no Rio de Janeiro.
É absolutamente limpo e organizado, a casa tem suas regras de funcionamento e seguindo elas não há problemas. As duas gatinhas já são idosas e basicamente dormem o dia inteiro, certamente não representam um ponto de tensão. Tinha minhas roupas lavadas e passadas impecavelmente, e sempre havia algum bolo ou quitute para desfrutar, inúmeras vezes comi pão de queijo fresquinho no café da manhã.
Ida é uma carioca da gema, muito receptiva, conversávamos muito, me emprestou casacos, mapas, jornal com programação cultural, me mostrou a cidade e após um mês de convivência, sentirei saudades. foi um período de muito aprendizado, descanso e diversão para mim.
Lugar muito bonito, limpo, espaçoso e fácil acesso, perfeito para férias. E a anfitriã Ida muito atenciosa e divertida. Recomendo!
Ida ist einfach ein wunderbarer Schatz. Alles super. 100 % zum wohlfühlen. Obrigado Ida :)

Ida is a very nice and warm lady. It´s my second time to stay at her place, not only because her house has wonderful view of ocean, but also her hospitality. I go to Rio de Janeiro every year for international conference at UNIRIO, her place is always my first and the best choice. if anyone goes to Rio de Janeiro, get to her place, you will never regret.

Host Ida is a charming and helpful lady, who always give you a lot of good advice and take care of you like a friend not just host.The house is located at Botafogo, near the beach. You can have best sea view out of window, blue sky, shining sea, shipping boat. And it is closed to sugerloaf mountain , 10 minutes away by walking, which you can see in the house.What is more, the house is super clean and well-decorated. Ida almost prepare everything necessary for me including breakfast.I never thought she was my guest  instead my friend. If I come back to Rio, I must book this house again without any hesitation !

La casa de Ida es mas hermosa que lo que se ve en las fotos, la vista desde su balcon es magnífica, estuvo pendiente de cada uno de los detalles en mi estadía, de verdad 100% recomendada, estadia INMEJORABLE... sin duda  volvería... mil gracias

Ida é uma excelente anfitriã! Ativa, inteligente, atenciosa e educada. Sua casa é linda, limpa e espaçosa. Me senti muito à vontade, o café da manhã sempre preparado com muito carinho e "de gruja" fizemos alguns passeios super agradáveis...

Estamos muy agradecidos por la hospitalidad, seguridad y cariño con el que nos recibió, Ida! Siempre muy preocupada y atenta de lo que necesitaramos. Nos hizo sentir muy cómodos... como si estuvieramos en nuestra propia casa. Sus consejos para recorrer la ciudad y charlas junto al desayuno (muy rico) fueron geniales. Muchas gracias por todo! Volveremos!!! Un abrazo!!!!

O espaço da Ida é excelente, limpo e organizado. Um café da manhã delicioso sempre está a postos, com tudo de muita qualidade. Ida nos deixa super a vontade em sua casa, o que nos faz sentir “em casa”.
I liked this place! The location is convenient and safe. The appartment is always clean. Ps. Ida is the most wonderful host I’ve ever met

Ida é simplesmente sensacional! 
Me senti completamente em casa. 
Muito obrigada mais uma vez por tudo!
Recomendo a todos que vierem ao Rio. Pessoa extremamente legal e apartamento muito organizado.

O espaço de Ida é excelente: amplo, confortável, limpo e organizado. Ela está sempre preocupada com o bem-estar do hóspede. Para completar, a sala tem uma bela vista do Pão de Açúcar.  Botafogo é um bairro ótimo, perto do aeroporto SDU, muitos bares e restaurantes, que atendem a todos os gostos e estilos.

O que dizer da casa de Ida? Talvez palavras sejam poucas para expressar  tudo o que é ser recebida por Ida. Imagine você chegar numa casa muito gostosa, aconchegante, limpa, cheirosa e ser recebida por uma pessoa muito querida e que te espera com um sorriso que transmite prazer e satisfação com a sua presença. Imagine você ser tratado com requinte e simplicidade, com intimidade e privacidade, com cuidado e atenção. Cada detalhe pensado para você, um quarto silencioso, com lençóis brancos e limpos, espaço nos armarios para acomodar suas coisas, banheiro privativo, com todas as necessidades oferecidas, toalhas, sabonetes( no plural mesmo) shampoo, condicionador, etc.  Cozinha com bolo e café quentinho, e para completar: - A sala!  Um caso a parte essa sala, a sala com uma vista de acalmar a alma e encher os olhos, tanto do lado de dentro, como do lado de fora há beleza, Há detalhes, há cuidado. Ida é só cuidados e atenção. Ida é a melhor conversa, o melhor papo, o melhor sorriso. Imagine tudo isso. Imaginou? Então, - Assim é a casa de Ida. A única coisa ruim é ir embora...a partida é triste, despedir de Ida é triste, a gente só agradece por tê-la conhecido e pensa: "Eu vou voltar".
Wonderful space, and yes, the panoramic view of Guanabara Bay is accurate. Ida is hospitable, generous, and entertaining. It really is a special place. Highly recommended, and I'll be back!
Really nice place. Ida is a really good host and the view from the apartment wonderfull. Very well located place. Highly recommended.

quando vi os comentários dos hóspedes anteriores, já percebi que a Ida era uma pessoa muito cuidadosa. Mas só conhecendo ela pessoalmente para vivenciar o que foi descrito nos comentários anteriores. Uma pessoa super alto astral, sempre disponível e cuidadosa com a estadia.  Recomendo a todos!

Apenas palavras nã são capazes de descrever o que é a Dona Ida, mas tentarei! Comecemos pelo local: é excelente, agradabilíssimo, aconchegante e muito estiloso, em minha opinião, melhor que qualquer hotel. E o melhor, acreditem, não é isso! É a Dona Ida: ela é sensacional, uma mãezona, sempre disposta a ajudar, sempre sorrindo! De todos os muitos lugares em que já estive esta foi, de longe, a melhor experiência! Sinto não conseguir escrever tudo, mas estas palavras são apenas uma tentativa de descrever  uma pessoa indescritível
Amplo, organizado, confortável, limpo.. Sempre preocupada com o bem-estar do hóspede. Sem falar da linda vista.

Our stay with Ida was truly wonderful. She made us feel very welcome in her beautiful apartment and was very attentive and accommodating. We had a lovely air conditioned double room and bathroom to ourselves. Ida even provided toiletries and there was always food available for breakfast. The apartment is very close to the Sugarloaf Mountain and there is a metro station 15 minutes walk away. We have nothing but positive things to say about Ida and her home and we wholeheartedly recommend staying with her.
Para sempre grato. A hospitalidade de Ida faz-me sentir em casa.

Everything wrote in the previous reviews is true.. the best place I have ever stayed in terms of location and host!
To add: mattress really comfy, cats are gone, nice beach closeby, walkable in 15 min (Praia Vermelha)

Because of a missing vaccine I was forced to stay longer, no problem for Ida. I needed that vaccine and the paperwork for it and I and the only thing I can say in Portuguese is obrigato.. Ida helped me to get the vaccine which was easy and than helped me through the braslian administrative system, which waiting another day, going to a different neighborhood, doing all the talking, waiting for 2 hours etc.. if I woukd had to do it myself, I would most likely still be in Brasil..
thank you so much again, Ida!

Excelente hospedagem.  Além de muito confortável o local, Ida é uma pessoa agradabilíssima e que nos faz sentir o mais próximo possível do aconhego de casa. Sempre prestativa e presente, nos deixa muito a vontade. Mais uma vez, a experiência que tive com Ida foi excepcional .
Excelente anfitriã.

name: Artist Home by the Sea - a 4 minute walk to Beach!
summary: Our spacious comfortable 1 bedroom condo with original artwork is filled with peaceful and healing vibrations and surrounded by tropical gardens. It comfortably fits two and is in a small quiet complex of 18 units. Just a 4 minute walk across from the Ocean of Keawakapu Beach, listed as one of 5 best beaches in the world!  (Website hidden by Airbnb)
space: Across the street from the exquisite Keawakapu Beach ocean with its long white sandy beaches.  We share our Maui Home with you. It's decorated with the owner's original artwork and is filled peaceful, healing, vibrations and surrounded by tropical gardens. We are located in a small quiet single complex with just 18 units, unlike the large, typical, noisy, busy multi-building complexes.   Discover Steps from the Beach enjoy the relaxing privacy of a small, quiet 18 unit condo is located on a lush, tropical garden including a bamboo grove.  It's an exclusive alternative to the noise, congestion and crowds of large complexes. Home is filled with original art by the owner.Ocean views from the Master Bedroom, Living Area and Lanai. It is a world class beach, with superb swimming and snorkeling, inviting long walks on its sandy shores. Mother Humpback whales rest with their young in these waters that are a sanctuary to Giant Green Sea Turtles as well. Spinner Dolphins can be seen in gracing
description: Our spacious comfortable 1 bedroom condo with original artwork is filled with peaceful and healing vibrations and surrounded by tropical gardens. It comfortably fits two and is in a small quiet complex of 18 units. Just a 4 minute walk across from the Ocean of Keawakapu Beach, listed as one of 5 best beaches in the world! It's decorated with the owner's original artwork and is filled peaceful, healing, vibrations and surrounded by tropical gardens. We are located in a small quiet single complex with just 18 units, unlike the large, typical, noisy, busy multi-building complexes.
