We will provide you with any information you need.

host.host_about: Love to travel and meet new people from all over the world

reviews.comments:
Handans apartment is great and very clean. I would reccomend getting her to arrange the pick up from the airport especially if you are arriving late a night, it is a little more expensive but worth it for piece of mind.
She was a great host.

Die Wohnung war toll, schöne Ausstattung und sehr sauber, die Kommunikation funktionierte reibungslos, Handan war sehr darum bemüht, dass es uns gut ging. Einziger Wehrmutstropfen ist die Lage nicht weit vom Tarlabasi Boulevard, eine sehr große Straße, was etwas laut ist. Aber dafür ist die Lage super zentral und von der Wohnung aus ist alles ist sehr einfach zu erreichen! 
Ich kann einen Aufenthalt bei Handan allen wärmstens empfehlen.

We loved the flat, cozy and perfectly clean. It is well equipped with everything you need for a comfortable stay. 
Handan and the husband were ready to help every moment!! 
Very good choice.

A truly superb apartment - the photos don't do it justice. It's a spacious, two-storey place with two bathrooms and three bedrooms, plus a small terrace. The decor is smart. I was genuinely really surprised to see how good the apartment was upon arrival.
Superbly comfortable beds, great pillows and bedding and fluffy big towels.
Two things that may bother some guests but was not a problem for me: outside can be noisy (the apartment is very central) and there are four floors of stairs to climb (typical in Central Istanbul).
Handan was a superb host - so friendly and bubbly - a real pleasure to be around. I would definitely stay in this apartment again.

Handan was a great host. She welcomed us warmly to the very nice flat which is on the two top floors of the building and has a great balcony. She brought maps, gave good answers to our questions gave recommendations for great places to have breakfast. We would be happy to stay there again!
Great place and location!

Bonjour,

Appartement parfaitement situé prêt de Taksim et des transports/taxis. La terrasse est parfaite pour les soirées couchés de soleil. 
Une très bonne hôte, attentive. 
Merci Handan
Handan was super nice
Exactly as described. A beautiful apartment which suited our needs perfectly. Handan is super nice and helpful. I would stay here again

Amazing flat. Very clean and comfortable with great location.
Handan was a great host, always available and very kind to us.
We will definitely comeback.
Recommended place in heart of istanbul !
Thanks for all  and probably come back again.

I would definitely recommend this apartment for staying in Istanbul. Everything is exactly like on photos. The apartment is cozy, clean and full of light. The second floor, especially the terrace is a wonderful place to start the day with a cup of coffee. First of all, the owner is awesome: communicative, friendly and very helpful. You can ask for help any time and get the answer immediately.
Great place! Everything as described.
Handan has been very welcoming and helpful. She gave us a lot of very good tips. Place is very nice furnished and located.
Хозяйка квартиры великолепна, гостеприимна, отзывчивая. Резиденция очень удобная, чистая. Двумя словами, понравилось все!

Wow wow wow. Staying at Handan's apartment was truly wonderful. It was spotless and beautifully decorated and Handan was extremely accommodating. She has great tips for Istanbul and was always on hand to give recommendation which really made our trip. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED.

Handan is great! She's incredibly helpful and her place is fantastic. We were a group of six, so we shared the three double beds and nobody had to sleep on the couch. 

The location is perfect, it's on the quiet side of Taksim but very close to Istiklal street and the Nevizade area. Public transport is very close by to go and visit the other many sightseeing spots.

I'd definitely stay at her place again, highly recommended.
Handan is very punctual and informative with all the info you need. From info about how to get from the airport to recommendations on local nightlife, cafes and great places to eat. Super host.
It was a bit hard to find and you have to cross a busy road to get to restaurants and shops but it was a beautiful apartment in a dynamic part of Istanbul. Close to the metro and taxis.

L'appartement est très bien situé pas loin des rues très animées de beyoglu.
Il est propre, lumineux et chaleureux:on s'est tout de suite senti bien dedans.
La terrasse est indéniablement le point fort de cet appartement:parfaite pour commencer la soirée et faire l'apéro!
Handan a été très réactive et a tout fait pour faciliter notre séjour.
Je recommande chaudement ce logement qui nous a particulièrement plu.
Highly recommend, great location. Friendly and helpful landlord.
Spacious apartment near the Taksim square.

The location is convenient, only 5~10 mins walk from metro station. The apartment is clean and bright. Handan gave us instant replies and detailed information on how to go there. It was a good experience;)

Handan is a terrific host and for larger parties who want to experience Istanbul as tourists, this is a fantastic location and apartment. What you see in the pictures and the airbnb description is highly accurate and Handan was extremely helpful with checking in and staying in touch during our stay. The house is very clean and the living space is comfortable (the balcony is especially nice). The only small issue we had is that one of the bedrooms is without AC, and so if you're traveling to Istanbul during the summer it can get quite hot at night. However, this is a very minor issue, and overall our party really enjoyed staying here, Handan is a first class host and I would highly recommend you stay here if traveling to Istanbul.

Handan is a great host, she was very helpful and responded on my messages quickly. She made sure everything was prepared for us and she was ready to help if we needed anything else. She also gave us some good tips for restaurants. We had a great time. Thank you

The apartment is super cute and has all the amenities you need for your stay. If you need anything extra just ask she was very accommodating, providing us with an iron and allowing us to check out an hour or so late as we were in town for a wedding. When our cab driver from the airport wasn't sure where to go Handan spoke to him on the phone and gave him directions. The balcony is a great place to watch the sun set over Istanbul. Wifi and tv worked great we were even able to watch a world cup match one night. Would definitely stay here again and totally recommend.
Very great host and house!

Thank you to Hadnan for a great stay in this lovely apartment. It is really well situated close to Taksim Square with plenty of restaurants and practical shopping/supermarkets nearby for anything we needed. We definitely hope to come back one day :-)
Handan est très agréable, l'appartement est comme la, description, bien situé. Le quartier est très vivant.

Handan's apartment was lovely, and the perfect place for our family in Istanbul! It was very bright, clean, and large. There is Air Conditioning in all rooms, with the exception of one bedroom (but there is a fan), which was an added bonus. There were two full bathrooms (each with a shower), which is great. The WiFi worked flawlessly, as well. 

Handan was very kind, flexible, and communicative. The staff working at the building were very kind and helpful, as well. 

The apartment is on the 5th floor, with no elevator access, so those who are not comfortable with stairs should take note. 

We had a lovely stay, and would happily stay again! We would highly recommend. Thank you very much to Handan, and her colleagues!!
Great place. Handan was helpful and always around to help, you receive service like a hotel

The apart is just amazing!
3 min walking from Taksim square.
Very clean and cozy.
Handan was very helpful and always available via (Hidden by Airbnb) !
Highly recommended.
Handan's place is clean and stylish. Its relatively close to Taksim square and the metro.
Clean, and comfortable self catering apartment, ideally situated close to the Taksim square, from where you can access all the attractions of Istanbul, via public transport.

Notre séjour s'est très bien passer Handan été toujours disponible pour toutes nos demandes. L'appartement est très bien situé à 3mn de la place Taksim, très bien équipé, décoré et la vue de la terrasse était juste magnifique!

Отличные апартаменты: удобное расположение, чисто, комфортная планировка. Владелица очень приветлива, помогает сориентироваться в городе. 

Семьям с детьми/многочисленным багажом/аллергией на котов нужно иметь ввиду, что именно эти апартаменты находятся на 5 этаже, подъем по узкой лестнице, лифта нет, на лестнице чувствуется запах кошек (только на лестнице, в комнатах такого уже нет).
DO NOT STAY HERE.

The place is strategically located near Taksim, and few minutes walk away from Istiklal Caddesi. There are plenty of mini markets nearby. The place is very spacious and provides good heating during the winter. The place is ideal for families or multiple families. Handan was also a great host helping us to arrange transport to and from the airport.
Harika bir evsahibi
Very stylish place and comfortable. I enjoyed it. Thank you Handan.
房子很漂亮,离塔克西姆广场和独立大街很近,入住的几天我们都自己做饭,很好的入住体验｡

Amazing! :) In a perfect location, super clean and accommodating. Beds, pillow and blankets are comforting. Handan is a really communicative and quickly satisfied all our needs. Would recommend everyone to stay in this stylish flat.

name: APARTAMENTO PARA AS OLIMPIADAS
summary: Apartamento a três quadras da praia de Ipanema , cerca de  200 metros do metrô e a todas as linhas de ônibus, apartamento claro e arejado, bem decorado e com bastante conforto.
description: Apartamento a três quadras da praia de Ipanema , cerca de  200 metros do metrô e a todas as linhas de ônibus, apartamento claro e arejado, bem decorado e com bastante conforto.

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: Tivemos uma excelente recepção. O Fabio nos deixou muito a vontade. Ótima localização.

name: Studio on main entertainment street
summary: Cozy studio with very high ceilings - room with a double bed, big enough for travelers planning on doing a lot of exploring! Right between St-Denis and St-Laurent - the two lively restaurant and bar streets in the entertainment district of Montreal.
description: Cozy studio with very high ceilings - room with a double bed, big enough for travelers planning on doing a lot of exploring! Right between St-Denis and St-Laurent - the two lively restaurant and bar streets in the entertainment district of Montreal. You'll have the whole studio to yourself. It's not huge, but it's enough for 2 people (you have one double bed though!). There's a bathroom with a shower and toilet. You're free to use the kitchen - the fridge, stove and microwave. I will be out of town - but always reachable via phone or online communication. I know my place well, so don't hesitate to reach me if you need anything :) The apartment is located in the heart of Montreal downtown/the plateau - it's perfect for a weekend getaway to this beautiful city. Some of my favourite places around are: - La Distilerie - fancy cocktails across the road - Nexus Smart Bar - video game bar downstairs - Cinko - retro bar with $5 food! - Sushi St-Denis - all-you-can-eat sushi restaurant (remembe
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in the heart of Montreal downtown/the plateau - it's perfect for a weekend getaway to this beautiful city. Some of my favourite places around are: - La Distilerie - fancy cocktails across the road - Nexus Smart Bar - video game bar downstairs - Cinko - retro bar with $5 food! - Sushi St-Denis - all-you-can-eat sushi restaurant (remember, lunch is cheaper than dinner!) - Cafe Gitana - cigar and shisha bar - Les Trois Minots - karaoke bar with a fun atmosphere and cheap drinks, open till late  - Moosebawr (a little bit further away but worth it) - super Canadian bar with large beers and wonderful sangria jugs
transit: Location is perfect - walkable everywhere. But if you want to go further out of downtown, it's a 5 minutes walk to metro Berri-UQAM (orange & green lines), Sherbrooke (orange line), and St-Laurent (green line). There's also night busses from all directions that go all night (metro closes at 12 or 1, depending on the night!).
access: You'll have the whole studio to yourself. It's not huge, but it's enough for 2 people (you have one double bed though!). There's a bathroom with a shower and toilet. You're free to use the kitchen - the fridge, stove and microwave.
interaction: I will be out of town - but always reachable via phone or online communication. I know my place well, so don't hesitate to reach me if you need anything :)
house_rules: No pets, please. Smoking only outside the building.

host.host_about:
I'm an Australian living in Canada, working for a startup, and travelling when I have time (and money)!

23 countries and counting - get in touch for recommendations, because that's something I can talk for hours about. Over a glass of wine is even better!

South America is my next big dream...

reviews.comments: The studio is nice and comfortable, located just next to rue Saint Denis. Maria was very helpful and responsive. She prepared everything perfectly:) We had no problems with finding the place and move around.

As for location, you can't get any better! It's in the heart of Montreal. A short walk from le Vieux Port/ Old Montreal (1.5km with a slight hill). Be forewarned that since it's in the middle of downtown, it's not going to be quiet.This is no fault to the hostess, just that this city rarely sleeps - which, depending on who you are is a blessing or annoyance. Laundry is 10 blocks away since the hostess isn't in town, the sheets may not be clean so you'll have to do them yourself. Maria is always available via text so very helpful. If you drive, underground parking is a block away. Rental bikes are also close by. I would definitely stay there again for a quick weekend visit to Montreal.
The host left a pleasant note with some directions about the wifi and wished us a great trip. The description matched the room perfectly. The neighbourhood was lively and exciting!
Good home base!
Ultra-quick confirmation, fast communication and the apartment that fits the description perfectly. Great host.

Pros: Great location. Great host. Cozy studio. Bed is comfortable. Clean. Perfect to spend a night or two in.

Cons: Not for light sleepers (loud fridge, loud entrance door that residents tend to slam).
Very convenient and flexible. Thanks maria

We had a great overnight stay here. The location is perfect and Maria had left us with everything we would need for a comfortable stay.  She was very quick to respond when we had a question about parking. We would love to stay at Maria's again next time we're in Montreal :)
Host able to have key ready early thanks

The studio was cute, clean and comfortable. The keys were right where Maria said they would be. The neighborhood, as promised, was within easy walking distance of many bars, restaurants, and other attractions.
Great place. Accessible host. Convenient location. And overall amazing time.
Great host would stay again
Location can't be beat! Great value in a lively and fun neighborhood!

Maria’s place was great! It's a great location, there are lots of bars/restaurants to choose from within a 2 minute walk. If you are coming in by bus, this spot is only a 3 minute walk from the station.
Great location, perfect for a single traveller or a couple!
Central location, suitable for a short stay.
Great little space at a super affordable price! We absolutely loved our stay here
Appartement à 10min à pied de la gare de bus, très pratique pour les personnes désirant faire une étape avant de voyager.

name: Inner City Spacious Loft- City View
summary: This beautiful, sunny loft room is on the top floor of a three storey free-standing terrace in Redfern. The room is very spacious, private, quiet and open. We are a family of 4 adults and will give you as much privacy or company as you would like.
space: We are located in cafe, bar and restaurant heartland. Choose from a wide and eclectic range of eating and drinking holes from the very reasonable to the 3 star. Similarly you will have ready access to: - the CBD by bus ( (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) ) or train or on foot;  - the universities of Sydney, NSW and UTS by bus or on foot; - Bondi Junction or Newtown / Marrickville (352/355 bus) - Coogee (372 bus) - Maroubra (393, 395 bus)
description: This beautiful, sunny loft room is on the top floor of a three storey free-standing terrace in Redfern. The room is very spacious, private, quiet and open. We are a family of 4 adults and will give you as much privacy or company as you would like. We are located in cafe, bar and restaurant heartland. Choose from a wide and eclectic range of eating and drinking holes from the very reasonable to the 3 star. Similarly you will have ready access to: - the CBD by bus ( (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) ) or train or on foot;  - the universities of Sydney, NSW and UTS by bus or on foot; - Bondi Junction or Newtown / Marrickville (352/355 bus) - Coogee (372 bus) - Maroubra (393, 395 bus) You're welcome to access all public areas of the house : kitchen, lounge room, back patio and courtyard We're happy to discuss your travel plans or provide ideas for things to do during your stay but recognise too that you're likely to be a technological whizz with all information just a click away and in no ne
neighborhood_overview: Our neighbourhood is unique by its closeness to facilities interesting to a traveller. As well it is a wonderful sociopolitical mix of the young and old, the professional, the retired and the student of all sexual preference. If it's the Gay Pride Mardi Gras you're here for, this is a perfect space.
notes: Please note that we live in the Inner city where public transport is excellent and more cars are not encouraged as there are already too many. There is limited free parking close to the house but most parking is restricted to 2 hours between 8am and 8pm. At night however there is unlimited parking and mostly available fairly close to house except if there is an event at the nearby sporting venues.
transit: You will have ready access to: - the CBD by bus ( (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) ) or train or on foot;  - the universities of Sydney, NSW and UTS by bus or on foot; - Bondi Junction or Newtown / Marrickville (352/355 bus) - Coogee (372 bus) - Maroubra (393, 395 bus)
access: You're welcome to access all public areas of the house : kitchen, lounge room, back patio and courtyard
interaction: We're happy to discuss your travel plans or provide ideas for things to do during your stay but recognise too that you're likely to be a technological whizz with all information just a click away and in no need of advice
house_rules: Our neighbourhood is quiet, friendly and respectful and we expect you to be mindful of that as we are.

host.host_about:
I am a retired solicitor living in our home with my wife Judith who is a high school French teacher. Currently two of our three grown-up children live with us and we have a spare room. We have always had guests in our house since the children were very little and it is something that we would like to continue doing as I believe connecting with other people and learning about different cultures is wonderful. 
We love film, food, travel and music. This is a very musical household. Sport is also a very big thing- you will always find somebody watching the tennis/cricket/football on the television or going for a wok or bike ride. 
We ourselves love Airbnb and have used it all over the world in recent years. In Canada, France, South America and of course all around here in Australia. 
My life motto: you could die tomorrow so live life to the full!

reviews.comments:
Besides the location is very convent not only near the city center but also surrounded by 2 Coles market. This is the most fantastic and lovely experience I ever had.
Paul and his family are very good at taking care of their guests, they prepare milk, honey, orange, cereal for us. During the 2 weeks, they just treat us as same as a part of the family, inviting us to their festival dinner, introducing us to their best friends. Every morning they would ask if it was a good sleep. Every evening, they would say good night before we go back to the room. 
If ever I will go back to Sydney again, this would be my only choice. 

这是我在Airbnb中最最满意的一次住宿体验｡
不仅仅这个地理位置很好,去市中心,悉尼歌剧院,门口的公交车直达｡而且周围的配套设施齐全,十分方便｡
Paul一家人待客非常之好,如若对待家人｡一直给我们买牛奶,橙汁,谷物,蜂蜜等等｡尽可能地提供信息帮助我们｡
只要去悉尼,对于住处,这永远会是我的第一,也是唯一的选择｡

Paul, Judith et ses enfants nous ont très bien reçus, la maison est agréable, le jardin également. La chambre est spacieuse, lumineuse et au calme. Le quartier est bien desservi en bus et proche de cafés, restaurants. La famille nous a très bien conseillé sur Sydney et ils sont très attentionnés. Nous avons même eu de la baguette au petit dej! Merci encore de nous avoir accueillies, c'était très bien!
I had a lovely stay at Paul and Judith's beautiful home. The house is in a great area and as hosts Paul and Judith were extremely hospitable.

Paul and his family were incredibly welcoming, hospitable and really helpful as I started to find my feet in Sydney. The room was lovely and spacious with a very comfy bed. The family were always happy to chat and share a meal but likewise you could have your own space if needed. I cannot recommend this Airbnb more highly.

Paul was not there to receive us , however he got his son, Tim to help us with the check in procedures. Both Tim and Nicole are very helpful and friendly, sharing with us food places around the vicinity.  

The city is easily accessible from the place.
There are lots of food choices in the location as well. 

The room and toilet is true to picture, it was really comfortable and spacious. We enjoyed our stay there.

We especially love the two dogs; really friendly and cute:)

We had a wonderful time at Paul and Judith's lovely, spacious and peaceful home. We were well looked after by Nicola and Tim in Paul and Judith's absence and enjoyed having their home for us alone. We felt very much at home, enjoyed a cosy room upstairs and the location was perfect for my work and close to some wonderful cafes and bakeries in Redfern and Surry Hills. Paul and Judith were especially kind to send me something that I unfortunately left behind. Truly generous hosts and we can absolutely recommend anyone to stay at their beautiful home!!

Paul and his lovely family were very hospitable and more than accommodating. Everything from the room to the kitchen to the rest of the house had personality, charm and above all, a wonderful homey atmosphere. The best part about our stay was Judith's (Paul's wife) excellent selection of coffee and of course, their two very friendly dogs.

Beautiful house in a great location of Sydney. The room was very nice, clean and tidy, in a private spot of the house on the top floor. Also, guests have their own bathroom.

My mom and a friend stayed with Paul and his family and I also had the pleasure to meet him one day.

Paul is a great host, very hospitable and absolutely helpful, it was great staying with him! 

Thanks so much for letting them have a great time in Sydney :)

A lovely family,  very friendly and welcoming. We felt comfortable as being in our home. Excellent location with good transport connections. City centre and Airport 15 minutes faraway. Wonderful dogs, we loved stay with them because they are easygoing and affectionate
Judith and family were wonderful hosts. Great location and very comfortable room .

Perfect location for an affordable stay in Sydney! Grocery, liquor, and pharmacy  nearby, and commute to Circular Quay or Central train station is easy with a 5 minute walk to 2 different bus stops. Additionally, an Uber to the airport from this location can cost less than public transit! The space is great for single or couple use, with a comfy bed to fall into after a day of sightseeing. The family is very welcoming and resourceful if you need help with anything. The dogs are a great bonus, if you're pet lovers like us. Judith was very flexible with our arrival time considering our flight schedules which made logistics that much easier.

We spent 10 days at Paul's and Judith's house and felt welcomed from the very first moment. The house is very nice and in a great location. There're many restaurants around and a bus stop just by the corner. The room and bathroom are  spacious, clean and nicely decorated.
Paul and Judith, as well as the rest of the family, were very nice, friendly and interesting to talk to. They also gave us many tips about things to do and places to visit in Sydney. We shared many good times with them and we would definitely book this room again.
Highly recommended!

I had a lovely time staying with Paul and his family in gorgeous Redfern! The location is fantastic - not too busy but super conveniently located. Paul, Judith, Tim and Nicola treated me like one of the family. Highly recommended.

After a long day in the city it always felt like coming home, because Paul was so friendly and kind. When we arrived he invited us to watch the Melbourne Cup together and explained us the importance of this event in Australia, which was in fact very new for us and interesting to learn. Paul did everything he could to help us navigate through Sydney and even had Opal cards prepared for us. He and his wife Judith are wonderful people who we enjoyed a lot to stay with. Thank you for a wonderful week!
Paul, Judith and Tim were really friendly and welcoming and I felt at home immediately. The house is so well situated for travelling to city or beaches, its a great place to stay in Sydney.

Paul, Judith and Tim were welcoming, friendly and completely lovely. They allowed me the space I needed yet were open to a nice chat each evening too. I highly recommend this AirBnB. It's delightful and so are the hosts.

We were attending a conference at Technology Park in Redfern, we walked their every day, we were only 5 minutes walk to an amazing array of eateries, Paul's house is a beautiful old terrace in an historic area and as hosts, he and Judith treated us like old friends. Just be aware the room is on the third floor and the stairs are steep. Would highly recommend
Lovely house owned by delightful people in an interesting location

Paul et Judith se sont immédiatement montrés très accueillants et chaleureux. Ils n'ont pas hésité à converser avec nous, nous ont donné des conseils quant aux transports en commun et ils s'intéressaient à ce que nous faisions la journée. Nous avions même le droit à du pain frais tous les matins. Le quartier était conforme à nos attentes: proche du centre-ville en utilisant les transports en commun et très tranquille pour y dormir. Une adresse à recommander les yeux fermés!
Chez Paul vous serez reçu comme si vous faisiez partie de la famille tout en respectant votre intimité. C'est une fabuleuse expérience d'intégration.
Highly highly recommend!! Wonderful hosts, beautiful house, great location. Feels like a luxury hotel with family warmth. Just wonderful!
게스트에 대해 많은 배려가 있습니다ᆞ 위치는 중심가와 조금 떨어져 있지만 단독으로 사용할 수 있는 깨끗한 욕실과 넓은 방, 그리고 그 곳에 살고 계시는 폴과 주디스의 자상함 때문에 편안하게 지낼 수 있는 집입니다

I stayed with Paul and Judith for a week and enjoyed meeting them and staying in their home. They have 2 sweet dogs..the bigger one being calmer than the rather noisy smaller one (noisy at 11 at night and possibly at 6am too when I was woken a couple of times by continuous barking though that could have been in the neighbourhood ). I knew the neighborhood because my daughter and family live there and it is great for shops and restaurants and transport everywhere.
Visitors should be aware that the room is on the 2nd floor up some narrow, steep stairs. This makes it a bit tricky with suitcases and in the night when you are half asleep and need to go downstairs to the bathroom! The family generously give up their bathroom for guests and use another one downstairs. 
Great bread for breakfast, particularly the last couple of days!

Great place to stay. Paul and Judith were very kind and helpful. It is a perfect place to stay if you want to know an Australian family. The breakfast was very good, the house was clean... good shower and a comfortable bed. Highly recommended!!
Paul和Judy,非常友善,也非常樂意幫忙你所需要的問題,Paul會給予很多行程建議,相當有幫助
We had a fantastic time here. The house is in a great location, and provided us with a brilliant base from which to explore Sydney. Paul and Judith were very welcoming - would definitely recommend.

The journey was very nice. The location of the house is perfect, near a bus stop and you can walk into the city easily. The house was clean. We felt like home!
thank you again.

Judith an Paul are awesome hosts. We deeply appreciated they stay in there charming and pretty well maintained house. They served fresh baked bread every morning and we celebrated our coffee at the cosy terrace. Judith and Paul are quit entertaining and warmhearted people. We highly recommend to stay with them. JUST GREAT!

Great location. Nice walk to CBD and many shops and restaurants very close by if you want a (very) short walk. Busses very close as well though I didn't have a need to use them. Hosts were very friendly and help out with any info you need. Highly recommended.

From beginning to end, Paul and Judith made us feel welcome. From the lovely continental breakfast to individual bedside lamps, you can tell they have thought of every detail to ensure you have a comfortable stay. Their place is in a great location, only a half hour walk from the city centre, very close to bus stops and 5mins walk away from two great cafes. We also enjoyed spending time with Bonnie and Benny, their two very friendly dogs :) Absolutely recommended and hope to stay here again next time we are in Sydney.

The home is situated on a corner by a small cul de sac park and is as advertised in the photos. The neighbourhood is gentrified with a number of hip boutique shops, a bakery and cafes nearby with bus stops and a supermarket within walking distance. Paul and Judith were on holiday during my stay but I was well looked after by their daughters who popped in to help if needed. Even the nearby neighbour chipped in to help with getting inside when I arrived late at night and couldn't find the key. During my stay and chats with the eldest daughter and neighbour I could tell that this house had character and raised a nice and respected family. Be careful with the stairs though, they are a bit steep but I only carried a backpack with me. Lastly, the dogs Bonnie and Benny are very obedient, well-behaved and cute! I'd definitely like to come back should the opportunity present itself in the future.

Paul and Judith :
Thank you very much for everything you have done for us, please forgive me, because my English too bad, can't express my thanks to you.House clean, beautiful, convenient and provide us with a lot of help.Very happy to be living here.You are welcome to come to China ,I miss you guys paul  Judith and every things in the house.living here days will be the best pary of my memory.
Paul and Janet are very welcoming and friendly. Location is close to buses and Crown Street in Surry Hills. Perfect for a weekend away!

Paul's place is centrally located and very close to the CBD area. If you're looking for a place to stay that's close to the center of the city, a stones throw away from the bus stops, close to a couple of restaurants and a place that says 'You are welcome to stay with us in our house, please make yourselves comfortable' then this is the place to be. Both Paul and Judith go the extra mile and help you get around the city with Opal cards and with suggestions on what you can probably do with your day. We had a lovely time staying at their place and certainly enjoyed their hospitality.
Warm friendly hosts. Made us feel very welcome. Room was very nice and comfortable. Not too far to walk to the city.

Paul and Judith were incredibly kind hosts who made me and my partner feel incredibly welcome during our stay in their beautiful home. They helped us tremendously in finding our way around Sydney and offered wonderful suggestions for us to do. 
The room itself was lovely and spacious, and the house is located in such a great neighbourhood, chock full of great shops and restaurants. I'm so happy to have come across this true find and I highly recommend staying here!

Paul and Judith were wonderful hosts, their place truly felt like home away from home, one of the best airbnb experiences we're had (and we have had quite a few good ones).

Gerard and Blanca
Paul and Judith t amazing! The local s so good. What a beautiful home.

Paul and Judith are kind and friendly hosts who loves to meet new people. Judith is a still working teacher and Paul is at home. They give You good tips what to do in Sydney and are very helpful! Our stay was a Nice experience with interesting conversations with this two. 
Their Apartment is in Redfern, by feet You Need about 15 minutes to Sydney Harbour Bridge and Opera House. There are some cool restaurants in the area for a typical Aussie-Breakfast. The Supermarkt is just around the corner. 
We really enjoyed our time with Paul and Judith and hope to meet them again in the future!

A lovely old house situated in a lovely part of Sydney.  Paul, Judith their dogs and their grownup kids are all wonderful people who were a real pleasure to chat with every morning over breakfast and every evening after a long day of sightseeing.  This is one of the nicest experiences I've ever had with Airbnb, keep up the great work, guys, and continue to be awesome smart classy people.
Best experience ever, quiet and nice. Fantastic hosts with high detail explaination for every thing you need and two lovely dogs always waitting for you. Go there without any second doubt.

Paul is a charming and thoughtful host. He was incredibly kind and helpful and I really enjoyed our little chats. The house is in a great location in Bourke Street so really close to Surrey Hills, Centennial Park and for getting in and out the city. The room is very nice and a little away so you have your own privacy.  I would highly recommend this airbnb.
Paul and Judith were very welcoming. Always happy to help. They even lend us their opal cards for public transportation. A really nice place to stay  when you go visit Sydney for a couple of days.
What an amazing house! Beautiful rambling lovely old place in a brilliant neighbourhood in Surry Hills. Just a few minutes walk to cafes, pubs etc...wpuld definitely come back!

I had a great time staying at Paul & Judith’s place!  They are very nice and fun to be with. The house and the room  are both clean and filled with character, meaning very comfortable. It’s also close to quite a few restaurants and bus lines. You can make a turn or two and walk for 30 minutes or so and be at the Opera House!  I recommend it highly.
Paul en Judith waren zeer gastvrij. De locatie was prima. Op loopafstand, ongeveer 45 min. van het centrum.

Paul & Judith were wonderful hosts - we enjoyed staying with them in their beautiful home! We also loved the small conversations with them - they were so nice & open to answer all our questions : ) But they also respected our privacy. The location is perfect - so close to many good restaurants, bars & cafés. Highly recommended!
一对善良可爱的老人,很喜欢和我们聊家常,对我们的出行也很关心,指导我们的行进路线｡在他们家三天,入乡随俗,体会到了悉尼居民的闲适生活｡

Wenn ihr nach Sydney reisen wollt und euch wirklich mal in der Fremde zu Hause fühlen wollt, dann wohnt bei Judith und Paul.
Unserer Meinung nach findet ihr hier eine echte AirBnB-Perle. Hier vermietet nicht ein größeres Unternehmen mit einem fingierten Besitzer, sondern hier wohnt ihr bei echten Sydneysidern und habt die Chance bei warmherzigen, wundervollen Menschen einen kleinen Einblick in das Leben in Sydney zu bekommen.

Nous avons été vraiment bien accueillis et pour notre première expérience avec rbnb, nous avons été très satisfait.
Merci de tout notre cœur, de nous avoir permis de passer un séjour très agréable dans votre beau pays. Jean-Marie et Caroline.

I absolutely loved staying here, the hosts are amazing and the location is great. The house has great charm about it and I loved how the neighborhood  is so neat and quite, yet so close to shops, restaurants, cafes, and public transportation for city access. I had access to buses within a few min walk. The room was great, private and comfortable. The dogies are very nice and kind if you like dogs. Overall, amazing stay, would love to come back for sure.
Paul and Judith are wonderful hosts and their home is a great base to explore Sydney from! Redfern also has tons of great cafes and restaurants. We would definitely stay here again!

We had a great time here. It is far closer to the CBD than we anticipated so being able to walk to the Opera House on our first night in Sydney was an added bonus. If you're up for the walk Paul knows a lot about the city and gives great advice on how to get about.

Paul and Judith’s house is in a great location, close to loads of cool shops and restaurants and an easy walk/bus ride into the CBD. We stayed for a week and the house had everything we needed. It was very peaceful and the whole family made us feel very welcome and gave us loads of tips on what to do.

Paul and Judith really went out of their way to make the stay pleasant and comfortable. They were friendly and sociable as well as leaving you to your own devices if you wished.

The house was clean and tidy, with a large bedroom and comfortable double bed. The room did get slightly hot some days but that was to be expected in the middle of summer and a fan was thoughtfully provided,

Plenty of space for clothes and other items in the room. Check in was very easy and I was let in by one of their friendly (adult) children.

They have two well behaved dogs who didn't cause any fuss. It was a large and extremely friendly house and would definitely recommend to anyone thinking of staying.

Paul and Judith are lovely people and wonderful hosts. I stayed for a month and they were very kind and helpful and we became good friends. The house is in a great location being near useful bus routes, supermarkets and restaurants. The accommodation is excellent value for money. I would recommend it for any length of stay. Be aware that the bathroom is on the floor below. The room is large  with a bed, reading lights,lots of cupboards and a hanging rail. .The park outside is lovely but occasionally you can get people talking there late into the night, so make sure you have earplugs.

Lovely friendly warm couple who went out of their way to help us find our way around Sydney :) suggested us places to go and even let us use their public transportation cards and wrote down the bus routes for is in detail so we wouldn't get lost!!! Clean and pretty house. We were very comfortable and had nice chats with them :) we would definitely recommend staying there! Plus their dogs are so friendly :D Thank you Judith and Paul :)

Paul and Judith are the best hosts and the loveliest couple! Of course we enjoyed the private room at the loft, the comfortable bed, the private bathroom with hot shower, the kitchen and the lovely garden for meals and a beer - but not as much as the heartwarming hospitality by Paul, Judith and their 2 adorable dogs! Everything made us fell like home in Redfern, a lively yet peaceful neighbourhood with lots of wonderful eateries in Surry Hills. One not to be missed is Bourke Street Bakery. Coles supermarket is at doorsteps and Sydney CBD is easily accessible by bus in around 20min. No doubt we will choose to come back there whenever we visit Sydney again.
Toller Service, einfach nur klasse. Danke Paul und Judith.

Paul's place was very convenient for getting us around Sydney.  He and his wife were happy to speak with us and help us out as needed, including use of their washer which was much appreciated.  We highly recommend staying with them.  

Only issue that jumps out for folks to be aware of is that the room is up two flights of stairs, so if that might be a problem for you, be aware.  This wasn't a problem for us.

Great hosts!  Welcoming and friendly. Love their home oozing great charm and character! Close to transport and if you like walking its only 35 minutes to Darling Harbour. Plenty of colourful, local restaurants. Thank you Paul and Judith... would definitely stay their again.

Wir hatten eine tolle Zeit bei Judith und Paul. Sie waren wunderbare Gastgeber. Das Haus war sehr sauber und die Lage der Unterkunft ist perfekt. Paul hat uns viele hilfreiche Tipps für Sydney gegeben und wir haben unsere Zeit sehr genossen. Viele lieben Dank!

We had a wonderful time at Judys and Pauls home. We stayed for 4 weeks, because we attempted an English class to improve our language skills. Judy and Paul are lovely hosts, they are very kind and helpful. It was always a pleasure to talk to them. The house and room is welcoming, comfy and clean. The neighbourhood is picturesque, calm but with a lot of nice bars and restaurants. There are plenty of busses running to the city center, main station and the beaches.
Thank you for the great stay!

Paul and Judish's house is so beautiful and tidy. They are the  best hosts ,caring for everyone and  giving travelers the warmth as home. The location of this house is so good ,there are a lots of buses going around Sydney. The markets and Cafes are all around, the streets are beautiful and quiet. walking along the big trees and beautiful houeses is a very comfortable feeling. Highly recommended!

Paul and Judith offered very helpful recommendations throughout our trip and gave us helpful tips for getting downtown, as well as finding great restaurants. The kitchen cart for guests was very convenient, with tea, coffee, chocolate, and muesli included, as well as use of a mini fridge and dishes. I especially enjoyed the muesli! Meals out in Sydney can be quite expensive, so it was nice to be able to prepare lunches in the morning and set out for the day. Paul and Judith’s is conveniently located near two grocery stores, several coffee shops, and numerous pubs and restaurants. It usually took us 30-45 minutes to walk to Hyde Park. We felt that the walk to and from downtown was manageable, though public transit is an option, too. Lastly, the room is very cozy with a wonderful down blanket that’s perfect for chilly, rainy nights. We loved our time in Redfern! Thank you both!

Judith and Paul are very nice hosts. They live in a beautiful old house in one of the hipper parts of the town with lots of nice little cafes and interesting shops just around the corner. We had a quiet room and a bathroom on our own.  
Public transport is perfect, three bus lines are operating nearby and also one station of the local trains is in walking distance. They even gave us a "rechargeable" ticket for the busses and boats which was very useful. Don't miss a ferry tour with the boats on the Sydney harbour. They operate between the different suburbs and start at Circular Quay, for example.  We can recommend Judith and Pauls house definetly for your visit in Sydney.

Paul and Judith's house is amazing and comfortable, the bedroom is quiet and charming. They were helpful with everything that I needed. The house is very well located. One of the best airbnb experiences I've had so far, I totally recommend it!

The place was as described. Very well located for public transportation, groceries, and eating. Paul and Judith are very kind and are very willing to help you navigate Sydney, they are very very sweet. Everyone else in the family was also very helpful and nice. The dogs were very friendly and happy. The bathroom was shared, but we have not issued at all. All in the house was very well supply. We really appreciate al the nice touches to make our life easier in Sydney, like the opal cards.

Wir hatten eine tolle Zeit bei Paul und Judith. 
Da wir sehr spät landeten, konnten wir erst gegen Mitternacht einchecken, was Paul nicht daran hinderte uns herzlich zu Begrüßen. Das Haus war wunderschön. Die Lage perfekt um die Stadt zu erkunden. 

Jederzeit wieder.
The home is in a fantastic location and Paul + family are wonderful! Great stay in Sydney.
Great value for your stay! It felt like a very authentic Airbnb stay with hosts very open to helping you out and making some good conversation. Basic amenities, price reflective of this :)
Beautiful leafy suburb close to the city. Gracious and friendly hosts.
Such a lovely place and village. Also, very good location.

name: STUDIO APARTMENT + WIFI!!!!
summary: This fully furnished apartment includes marble bathroom with shower, kitchennette, Laundry and full access to a spacious gym and pool with a view!
space: - Studio to yourself - Queen Bed  - Comfortably sleeps 2 guests - Built in wardrobe  - Marble bathroom with shower  - Flat screen TV - Kitchenette - Internal Laundry - Linen and Towels included - Some provisions provided - All you need is your luggage!
description: This fully furnished apartment includes marble bathroom with shower, kitchennette, Laundry and full access to a spacious gym and pool with a view! - Studio to yourself - Queen Bed  - Comfortably sleeps 2 guests - Built in wardrobe  - Marble bathroom with shower  - Flat screen TV - Kitchenette - Internal Laundry - Linen and Towels included - Some provisions provided - All you need is your luggage! A lively ambience restaurant / bar, as well as Authentic Asian Cafe offering authentic meals in day time are nearby.  Apartment Swipe key will grant you access to fully equipped state of the art recreational area. Complete with Full Gym Equipments, Steam Rooms, Spa and indoor heated swimming pool with Harbour View. We are available to assist you with our local area knowledge and to ensure you have a pleasant stay at our apartment. Situated in a superb location that allows you to enjoy a relaxing luxurious lifestyle on the edge of the CBD and within easy walking distance of Sydney's finest attr
neighborhood_overview: Situated in a superb location that allows you to enjoy a relaxing luxurious lifestyle on the edge of the CBD and within easy walking distance of Sydney's finest attractions, you have the Darling Harbour, Sea Life Sydney Aquarium, King Street Wharf, The rocks and The Star just to name a few. Restaurants and bars to definitely try whilst in Sydney: - The Baxter Inn (drinks) - Opera Bar (food & drinks) - The Star (food & drinks) - Mr Wong (food & drinks)
notes: SELF CHECK IN AVAILABLE Keys can be collected from 2pm - 3am. Keys must be returned by 10am in order for rooms to be cleaned.
transit: Perfect Location in Walking Distance: 5 minutes to Wynyard Station 5 minutes to Kings St Wharf /Darling Harbour  8 minutes to Circular Quay (Harbour Bridge & Opera House) & The Rocks.
access: A lively ambience restaurant / bar, as well as Authentic Asian Cafe offering authentic meals in day time are nearby.  Apartment Swipe key will grant you access to fully equipped state of the art recreational area. Complete with Full Gym Equipments, Steam Rooms, Spa and indoor heated swimming pool with Harbour View.
interaction: We are available to assist you with our local area knowledge and to ensure you have a pleasant stay at our apartment.
house_rules: - There should be no smoking inside the apartment. Outside in Balcony only, with door closed. - No pets allowed. - STRICT NO PARTY POLICY.

host.host_about:
Hey! I'm A, absolutely love travelling, eating carbs with some good wine and helping people. 
First encounter with Airbnb was in Japan and loved the concept, our hosts helped us through and through. 
I thought to myself, why not help people with their holidays in my favourite city in the world, Sydney!! So here i am!! I will do my very best to make sure you enjoy your stay!! One Love! x

reviews.comments: The apartment was neat and tidy. Very close to transport and good location of you're working in the CBD. The check in procedure was very flexible and Angela was very easy to get in touch with and followed up. She even left me a box of chocolates as a warm welcome. Will stay again.
Great area and beautifully presented apartment, very clean. Angela was extremely helpful and easy to deal with. Loved staying here.

Angela was an excellent host - extremely welcoming and helpful throughout my stay. The apartment is immaculate - extremely clean and new, central location, close to shops and the train station. A perfect apartment for people who want to explore Sydney. I highly recommend this Airbnb without any reservations.
It was a perfect stay. The location was great as was the friendly service. It was meticulously clean and had the most comfy bed IVE EVER SLEPT ON!!!
Really enjoyed my stay and I am looking forward in staying again, it's clean, great location for my needs .. Prefect and great wonderful hospitality best regards
Outstanding communication prior to and during the stay. The apartment was great - would stay again!

Angela was a fantastic host! She was very friendly and responded to any questions that I had.

The apartment was nice, clean, and most of all comfortable! It had all the amenities that I needed. Wifi worked perfectly. Great location as it was within walking distance to many sights such as the Rocks, Opera House, Harbor Bridge, Darling Harbor, and George Street (shopping district). It was also conveniently located near the train station if I needed to head someplace far and to the ferries (that I took to Taronga Zoo and Manly Beach).

Would highly recommend Angela as a host and her apartment to others!

Fantastic apartment in very convenient location. Getting the keys wasn't a problem at all and was a pleasure to walk into a very clean apartment and have 2 cold beers in the fridge awaiting me too. I was very quiet which suited me as I was staying for business.
I would highly recommend this apartment to anyone visiting Sydney.

Great location!!!! 10min walk to Pitt at and 10min walk to circular quay. Great little apartment, especially if you're staying in Sydney for more then a weekend! Has a washing machine/drier, which was super convenient. Also a little kitchenette so we could have breakfast etc in. Also Angela left us a cute little gift on arrival, which was the sweetest touch. Definitely will be staying here again next time and recommending it to friends. 
Thank you!!!!

This was my first Airbnb experience and I feel so fortunate to have stayed at Angela's property.  Angela is extremely responsive and friendly, and the studio is just perfect - so clean and spacious with everything I needed.  Staying here was a breeze :). She even provided me with chocolates and grocery items when she found out this was an extended stay!  I would definitely love to stay here again and highly recommend Angela and the property to everyone visiting Sydney :)

I booked for an extended stay at Angela's apartment and it was everything I could hope for in an Airbnb stay and more! The apartment was extremely clean and well-kept with all the amenities included.  I loved the beautiful marble bathroom and the spacious living space.  The kitchen included a stove top, microwave, toaster and kettle so I was able to easily prepare simple meals and breakfast.  The neighborhood is quiet, safe, and there are various cafes and restaurants just around the corner.  It is also within a short walk to Wynyard station and major shopping spots.  This apartment was perfect for my stay in Sydney and I highly recommend it to everyone looking for a home away from home :)
Angela's place was exactly as pictured in a nice and secure building. I enjoyed the quietness, and she was very respectful of my needs and privacy. I'd return to her place next time I visit Sydney!
Angela was fast to respond to any queries, and provided excellent directions and arrival instructions.  The apartment was as described, and the location suited me perfectly.  I will be booking again.

Could not speak highly enough of the host! I let her know it was a surprise for my husbands birthday. She went out of the way to put up banners and purchase a cake as a surprise for us! Communication was A+! The room was fabulous and so clean and comfy! Thanku so very much!
The studio is comfortable and really clean.  Great location for exploring Sydney.  Quick walk to The Rocks, Sydney Harbor Bridge and Circular Quay.  Host is very accommodating.

Angela was extremely easy to deal with and was wonderful in going above and beyond to ensure we had a comfortable stay. Her communication was amazing and the overall experience was very positive. 

We felt very welcomed and can't speak highly enough of her kindness and professionalism.

The property is located in an excellent spot - very safe and super close to Darling Harbour, Circular Quay and the CBD (all within 5-10 mins walk).

The building has excellent facilities and the apartment is very clean. This was our first Airbnb experience and most definitely will not be our last.

We highly recommend Angela and the apartment. Thank you so much again for everything :)

A gem for any discerning traveller to Sydney! Lovely well appointed apartment with everything you could ask for in a stay, the marble bathroom was a bonus. Private but convenient location in the city - ten minutes walk to Wynyard's main attractions and the shopping district. Angela was a wonderful host, leaving some groceries in the fridge and communicating well to ensure I had a smooth stay. I'd love to be back the next time I'm in town!

My husband and I had a great time staying at A's place. It was super cozy, clean and in a good location close to the rocks, circular quay, transit and a grocery store. A was very responsive whenever we had a question. Definitely will recommend this place to anyone visiting Sydney CBD

This was the perfect place for my friend and I for our first trip to Sydney! The place looks exactly like the pictures and was as clean as a hotel room when we arrived! Angela was very accommodating and even provided some basic foodstuffs for us in the fridge when we arrived. 

You could not ask for a better location staying here. It's only a few blocks to Darling Harbour and a short walk to The Rocks and Circular Quay. It was easily accessible and we had no issues throughout our time staying there. I highly recommend this studio and would definitely stay here again!

I've never used Airbnb until this trip, and I was a bit nervous my first go around in an international city, but Angela made the process very smooth and saw to it that everything was taken care of for me. Very clean place and comfortable to stay in.

We had a wonderful stay for 3 night in this apartment. Angela was wonderful and extremely helpful. Her little touches really made it a special stay and the apartment was very conveniently located. We would highly recommend this place !

Didn't had the chance to meet our host, but she was extremely helpful and provide us great suggestion on places to go and how to get around.

Went the extra mile by providing us some basic groceries as we had an extended stay. Which was a pleasant surprise :) highly recommend 

Place was very clean :)

My wife and I spent 5 comfortable nights here. We were completely satisfied with the studio's location, security, cleanliness, spaciousness, and amenities, including the WiFi connection. Andrea communicated well with us, and kindly left us a few food items in the refrigerator.

Best value for the money!  Great location - walking distance to many of Sydneys best attractions. We loved the fitness center in this building!
Very easy check in/out process- pick up key, and leave key!
The place was great, close to everything and just like a hotel. The apartment was well equipped, clean and easy to access. We loved it and would stay there again! Thank you!
Roomy & well equipped studio apartment. Great location! Very close to the Opera House & downtown! Very good contact with host!
Very convenient, cute apt. Great looking bathroom.

The perfect place for a stay in Sydney. Great location and good communication with the host. Would definitely recommend to others and stay here again myself. Thanks for the special birthday welcome for my daughter Angela.

All we can say is this apartment and location is amazing.  The proximity to everything is just perfect -- walking distance to just about anything.  The apartment is a good size, extremely clean, and very quiet.  Andrea's communication before our arrival and during out stay was great.  We loved our stay here and when we return to Sydney, our favorite city in the world, we will definitely stay here.

A's place is amazing, a great location to easily walk to Darling Harbour, Circular Quay and the CBD. 
The apartment was incredibly clean and well presented on arrival. Getting they keys was really easy, we were settled in within minutes of our arrival and didn't want to leave at the end of our stay!
I would definitely recommend A's place to anyone looking for a great weekend in Sydney. We will definitely be back!

Apartment was exactly how described & the extra information given re: keys / directions to the apartment  etc was very helpful. 
Only complaint (it's a very small one) would be the lack of towels in the room. 
Good price. Good location. Clean & - lovely host! Will defo be back & have already recommended to friends & family
A was super helpful and always responded quickly to any enquiry. She even booked a car for us to get to the airport early on a Sunday morning  and was very welcoming in every way.

Apartment is in the perfect spot to explore Sydney with the main attractions all within walking distance. We were able to walk to darling harbour for dinner and the cruises around the harbour, harbour bridge is a 10minute walk and the opera house 20 minute walk. We loved the apartment, and it was great to come back after a day out exploring and jump in the pool! Angela was a great host making sure we had all our details prior to arrival and the details left about amenities nearby and places to explore was amazing. When we are back in Sydney we will be returning to this apartment! Thanks Angela!
Excellent communication from Angela re access to the property. Walking distance to great restaurants, circular quay.
Angela is helpful! My family and I love the SPA in the building. Everything from collecting the key to returning the key was going smoothly. The bathroom is very spacious and so clean.
Great location and fantastic apartment. I'd definitely stay again
Very tidy and clean apartment, helpful host

Angela was a terrific host!  Great communication and the condo was exactly as described...clean, great location and easy in & out.  We stayed for a week and a half and really appreciated the close acces to public transportation as we explored Sydney.  Highly recommended!!

After reading the reviews I had high expectations about the apartment.
Yes the location is great but the apartment is ok. Way over priced for the quality of presentations offered.
Not enough towels for everybody, dishes and cutlery dirty, dusty furniture and kitchen, remote controls were not working, carpet floor dirty. We asked for shower gel as the one provided by the host was empty we got shampoo instead because "no more available".
When you pay $1,200 for 3 nights in Sydney you can expect a minimum of standard this apartment doesn't offer.
Disappointing.

Thanks Angela for fabulous location to kick-off my adventures in Sydney...the opportunities for exploring were great. And love love love the cold showers & aircon during recent hot weather. I even did a spot of cooking...great to have cooking facilities & would have loved a blender for smoothies. I definitely recommend your place to other business travellers...very accessible to CBD, Darling Harbour, The Rocks & Barangaroo precinct.

The apartment was great! The bed was very comfortable, the kitchen was well equipped, and the gym and pool were one of the best I ever had in an apartment stay. While being next to a busy street, the apartment is quite and serene, and the bathroom provides a bit of an oasis with a full-size tub and separate shower. The host was very responsive and extremely helpful. Overall, a great experience.

Location of this apartment is ideal for a trip to Sydney. Very short walk to Wynyard Station, Darling Harbor and Circular Quay. While the apartment is on the 2nd floor of the building (view of street) there is no street noise at night - very quiet. The apartment is more like a hotel room than an apartment - nicely decorated but with no personal effects from the owner. Washer and dryer were convenient to have as well as a small kitchen space. Host was easy to communicate with before and during the stay.

Best host ever!! The house is really nice and cozy and clean with wonderful location. We really like it. Angela is thoughtful and good communicator, best wishes to her. Hope we didn't bother too much.
The apartment was fairly central. Bit noisy near the bridge. If you are looking for a studio apartment close to town and don't mind a bit of occasional noise then this should be fine.
Great location. A was quick and clear with the responses to any questions I had. The place was very clean and comfortable.

This apartment has an excellent location, great access to shops, transit, 
restaurants. The unit was clean and the bed was very comfortable. Loved Sydney and A's place.

Conveniently located and the host was impeccable. Couldn't have found a more accommodating person if I tried too. Comfortable living space and had some good snoozes while on holiday. Thank you again, A! :)
Great location!
Overall a great experience . Was bounced out when touched down , Athena was really helpful in locating another available room on the spot .
Central location.

Nice modern flat close to city centre. Spotlessly clean and with great amenities including indoor swimming pool. 

Athena was very helpful over arrival and departure times - we had a great stay!!

Athena was very thoughtful with accommodating my needs. I needed to check in early and she was able to let me do so. The actual apartment is spacious and has everything someone would need for a stay in Sydney. It’s also very close to one of the harbors so it’s very easy to hop on a ferry and go to the beach.
Great location. close to all nice places in Sydney.  Clean and tidy. good communications
Perfect location! Right in the middle of Darling Harbour and Opera!
Great location
Great location near the harbour. Great value
The place was in a great location and is good value.

brilliant location and fantastic pool and spa and gym. the comfort and cleaningness of the room itself needs some attention. a good stay overall for a premium location. very responsive host, thumbs up for the lovely attitude!
Athena’s place is great. Very clean and well located. Would return for sure. Check in was a breeze!
这家民宿地理位置很好,距离歌剧院､岩石区､市中心都很近,本身附近也有餐馆和超市｡住宿环境也很好,居住比较方便,推荐作为短期旅游的首选

Our stay at Athena’s place was great! It was our first stop in Australia and it did not disappoint. It was THE best location for a good price—walking distance to Circular Quay as well as other local transit lines, convenience stores and restaurants (check out the Barangaroo area for some great new restaurants!) The bathroom was spacious and had some good amenities (laundry, extra toilet paper, hair dryer, shampoo and soap). Of note, there is only 1 towel per guest. There is also a kitchenette which has a tea kettle, silverware/plates, coffee, tea, sugar and fridge. The bed was comfy and apartment was clean. We felt it was very secure as you had to swipe in to get into the building and elevator. Athena also made the check-in process seamless. 
We would stay here again and recommend it to others!
Great location,  great pool and spa,  and good amenities. A very pleasant stay

Athena’s apartment is very nice and facilities are excellent. It is very well located close to Sydney CBD and train and ferry stations. It is also very quiet. Check in was easy and Athena answered my questions quickly. For two people, I recommend the place and would return if I had to stay in Sydney CBD.
Excellent location!
Awesome location!  Liked our private apartment. Very clean. Our host was very nice and pleasant.  Had great amenities . Definitely would come back!

L’appartement d’Athena a un emplacement exceptionnel. Tous les services sont à proximité ou bien le transport est disponible tous près de l’appartement . Le secteur est très sécuritaire, tout près de Darling Harbour. Plusieurs sympathiques restaurants et cafés .
Nous avons adoré notre séjour.  Le seul élément est le manque d’espace dans la pièce principale. Il n’y a pas de sofa et le coin cuisine est au minimum pour une semaine.
Location is very good
Logement très bien situé dans un bel immeuble ! Produits de première nécessité fournis . Bonne base pour visiter Sydney .

I loved the location of this apartment.  I was able to walk everywhere or walk to the nearest train station which was super convenient!  I liked having the mini-kitchen of which I made use.  There was butter, nutella, ,and vegemite spread available for my use as well.  I chickened out and didn't try the vegemite, but I should have!  The place overall was very comfortable and I would highly recommend staying here!  I actually used pool and spa one night and had it all to myself.  Nice views of the bay there.  Thanks for a great stay!

Perfectly ok for the business trip I used it for. It is obviously a former hotel. its a little tired but comfortable enough. It's on the fringe of the city rather than central cbd but train station fairly close. Lots of cooking smells from adjoining apartments which was a bit annoying. It has a good gym with equipment that seems pretty  much brand new. I didn't use the pool but it looked good.

name: IPANEMA VILLE RESIDENCE
summary: Excelente flat próximo à praia de ipanema, todo mobiliado, incluindo ar-condicionado, tv a cabo, internet, com vista parcial da lagoa Rodrigues de Freitas, perto do comércio e metrô. Estrutura com piscina, sauna, sala de tv e lavanderia.
space: O imóvel possui sala, quarto, banheiro, varanda e cozinha americana, internet, 2 tvs, 2 ar-condicionados, microondas e forno elétrico.

space: The large space Sudio Dolbeau near Mont-Royal, the university campus, major schools and hospitals, a nice apartment with all inclusive access to the garden, in quiet area, including 1 bathrooms, wood flooring, 1 kitchen acting fully equipped common room with wireless internet. Tastefully furnished, it includes: bed (bedding: duvet, mattress cover, pillow) nightstand, dresser-desk-chair-work light - wardrobe, desk • kitchen: stove, fridge - microwave wave-pot dishes, linens, dining table, chairs -1 bathroom with shower • Heating included, electricity included, wifi included Internet (DSL). access to the garden. neighborhood_overview: LOCALISATION de la Maison Dolbeau:  située dans la Côte-des-Neiges, le quartier est maintenant joint à Notre-Dame-de-Grâce au sein de l’arrondissement Côte-des-Neiges-Notre-Dame-de-Grâce depuis 2002. Son origine remonte à l'époque de la Nouvelle-France, aujourd’hui  il est l'un des quartiers le plus multi-ethniques et populeux de la ville. La diversité ethnoculturelle de Côte-des-Neiges est le reflet du Montréal d’aujourd’hui, il est situé au pied du Mont Royal.Le Sudio Dolbeau est adjacent à Outremont, on qualifie l’arrondissement de quartier étudiant car il vit au rythme des sessions scolaires en raison de sa proximité avec le campus de l’Université de Montréal et de ses écoles affiliées la Polytechnique et HEC Montréal ainsi ses collèges privés de grande réputation (Notre-Dame, Brébeuf, Saint Nom de Marie. Ses cafés et restaurants sont populaires auprès des étudiants qui s’y donnent rendez-vous. On y retrouve de nombreux restaurants et commerces ethniques. Plusieurs stations de métr
access: Les voyageurs seront seuls dans le studio, ils peuvent avoir accès à une laveuse, sécheuse sur demande.
interaction: Si les voyageurs le désirent je peux leur faire visiter le quartier et les sites historiques de l'arrondissement.
house_rules: Non fumeur aucun bruit après 23.00 hres

host.host_about: Bonjour, je suis heureuse de vous accueillir à la Maison Dolbeau, la maison comprend trois étages et 3 appartements soit un étage au deuxième avec ses 6 chambres, 2 salle de bain et un rez-de-chaussée sur deux étages avec 7 chambres et 3 salles de bain  et un studio. la maison se loue par étage et au complet à moins de me faire une demande particulière. il existe un jardin devant et un jardin derrière. La maison est grande et accueillante et elle a tout le confort que l'on retrouve chez soi. Si cela vous convient je serais ravie de vous héberger. Vous pouvez me contacter Céline (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)

reviews.comments: My husband and I stayed at Celine's studio on Rue Dolbeau for a few days at the beginning of August. It was a perfect setup!  The studio was comfortable, immaculate, and close to public transportation, cabs, and places to grab a bite to eat.  This was our first time using Air B&B so we were a little nervous, but Celine was an ideal host!  She was easy to communicate with, kind and welcoming.  She even left us some coffee to brew in the mornings.  Celine is wonderful and so is her place!
The reservation was canceled 7 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Nice large studio in a quiet area. Very close to a bus stop which can take you towards the eastern part of the city, fairly close (~15 mins walk) to a few subway stations. Fairly cheap for that time of the year, considering what you get.

The host was very nice and responsive. Our flight was delayed by 2 hours so we got there at midnight and our check-in was still very smooth.

Celine was a great host.  She accommodated a last minute reservation and an early morning check in and went out of her way to solve minor house issues.  The place was clean and well supplied with utensils, coffee/tea, and all the things to make it easy to live away from home for a few days.  The place is close to transit and a nice 24 hour farmers market.  The bed is a futon -- so not perfect for everyone.  Overall, good experience.

name: Beautiful 3BR flat in the Center
summary: Historic comfy apartment enough to accommodate up to 7 people, very spacious and bright. Best location in the centre of Istanbul. Has all the comforts: kitchen, bathroom with shower, heating, bed line & towels.
description: Historic comfy apartment enough to accommodate up to 7 people, very spacious and bright. Best location in the centre of Istanbul. Has all the comforts: kitchen, bathroom with shower, heating, bed line & towels.

reviews.comments: Great place, and very friendly host!
lovely apartment!
Grand appartement très bien placé. Clair, chaleureux et très agréable. Hôtes charmants
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Very kind and always predisposed to help us in everything. It is a very nice apartment a few meters from the Galata Tower. It is an area with many bars and restaurants. the train and the metro are nearby. Highly recommended!

Great location: near Galata tower, but our street was nice, clean and quiet. Absolutely gorgeous interior - antique & modern, stylish, cozy, incredibly comfortable for 5 persons. 
Great host - Ayse is very nice and patient person. 
First impression of the day - stay home, don't get walk, just seat on sofas, read books, look at the window to people's stream, drink tea, because apartment is so cool. That apartment was definitely help us to fall in love on the city.
Thank  you so much!

Nice flat in an old building - typical of the area, so you feel like a local. The flat has everything one may need and the location is superb. The neighborhood is lively and friendly to tourists. Ayse was  a great host and readily available.

Ayşe’s place is absolutely wonderful. From the first contact, to check-out, she has been very friendly and helpful, so that the whole logistics went smoothly for the entire weekend we spent in Istanbul. 
The place itself is lovely, the location super central (you can see Galata tower from the comfy couch), and exactly as advertised. It's obvious that this is a home, which is a rare find these days on Airbnb, and we loved it! Couldn't have hoped for a better place, and warmly recommend it to everyone!
Thank you so much, Ayşe! We'll be back for sure!
Great apartment, great location. We can see the Galata tower from the living room. Istanbul is truly a beautiful place and we had a great time in Ayşe's place.
Everything clean and stylish. The flat is in a nice touristic centre place. Ayse was very kind and responded quick to our messages.

Ayşe’s place exceeded our expectations. The apartment was beautiful, the beds comfortable, good shower, nice big table for meals and playing cards, big living space to hang out, good towels, great selection of literature, a washing machine and a PERFECT location! 

Ayşe and Reyhan were great hostesses, and shared lots of great local tips with us. We LOVED the location, being only 100 feet from Galata Tower. It was within walking distance to all the main hotspots, and the neighborhood itself was perfect! 

We would highly recommend booking this Airbnb!!! :) 

*note: there are a few flights of stairs to climb, so this is not the place for you if you're not cool with stairs / unable
We had a great time in Istanbul and Ayşe's apartment was lovely. The communication went smoothly, Ayşe was very friendly every time and gave us some very good tips.

L'appartamento è grande, spazioso, completamente accessoriato e in una posizione davvero straordinaria: dal salotto si vede la torre di Galata. Si ha davvero l'impressione di essere a casa di amici. La pulizia è migliorabile.
Good place - conveniently located for exploring!
Très bon accueil. Appartement conforme à la description et très bien situé. Ayse est facilement joignable en cas de besoins et donne de bons plans. Je recommande.
Amazing location and super quiet at night !

Ayşe was a great host! We were a party of four and we truly felt welcomed and comfortable at Ayşe's place. We found it was very clean and everything was easily set for us. 
The flat is very well located, just 1 min walk from Galata tower. The neighborhood is cool and has a variety of nice restaurants, cafes and shops to offer. The flat it self has a large living room, with very large sofas - perfect for lounging after a day of walking around. There were 3 well sized and comfortable bedrooms. The kitchen is well equipped and Ayşe was kind enough to leave us a huge supply of mineral water for our consumption, as you should not drink tap water in Istanbul. We found this extremely nice and considerate of her. Bathroom was perfect and shower works nice. 
We stayed here in begging of October. The days were warm but the evenings were a bit cooler. Inside the flat we were not cold at any point. 
The only downside is having to climb up four flights of stairs, but that's the reality of staying in a flat in the older neighborhoods of Istanbul: no lifts. We welcomed the exercise to burn out some of the calories put in by all the baklavas... 
All and all a 5 stars experience. I wouldn't hesitate to recommend Ayşe's flat top my friends and family in the future.

Fantastic location for Istanbul with some great cafes, bars and restaurants in a very short distance from the flat. It's in an old style block so while not shiny and new it does have great period features,  equally large amounts of space in every bedroom, high ceilings and great spaces for dining and lounging. I hope to come back to Istanbul and I would love to stay here again. Perfect for a few friends to share.
The appartment is sunny, fully equiped and exceptionnally located for visiting easily Istanbul. Ayse is a very good host and her communication is very fluent and efficient. Sincerely recommended!

Ayşe is a wonderful and welcoming host. We had a smooth communication and on request she would give us recommendations and tips. The apartment was, as described, super spacious, fully equipped and homelike. Besides it’s perfectly located for discovering the  vivid streets of Istanbul. Highly recommended!

Lovely home, very large spaces and comfortable for a whole family. Small things like having travel adapters ready at home was very much appreciated. Ayşe was also extremely helpful with answering all our enquiries and even assisting us with a late check-in.
vivement recommandé, super emplacement, super appart, décoré avec goût et Ayse nous a aidé au-delà des espérances ! réservez vite

name: Alugo suíte prx Parque Olimpico e Rio Centro
summary: Alugo suite Quarto com cama de casal, armarios, TV, ar condicionado e banheiro exclusivo. Perto do parque olímpico, shoppings e estação do BRT. Perto também das praias da Barra e Recreio. Alugo suíte no Parque Olímpico / Barra da Tijuca, próximo ao Recreio e Rio Centro. Condominio próximo a estação Pedro Correa do BRT (ônibus de faixa própria) com piscina, quadra e jardins. Perto do Shopping Metropolitano e supermercados. Fácil acesso à praia da Barra da Tijuca e Recreio dos Bandeirantes.
