address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: O apartamento é lindo e espaçoso. Me senti em casa com meu namorado e pude aproveitar as Olimpíadas muito bem, pois é bem localizado.
Adoramos nossa primeira experiência no Airbnb! Gostamos de tudo: recepção, localização, dicas e simpatia. Recomendamos a todos!
Fomos muito bem recebidos, estadia muito agradável, recomendamos a todos !!!!

Apartamento muito legal! Tudo muito bom, o anfitrião nos recebeu muito bem, foi até nos buscar na estação do BRT quando fomos pro Rock in Rio. Localização ótima para quem vai ao Parque Olímpico, pois enquanto todas as pessoas estavam fazendo filas imensas para taxi/BRT nós estávamos indo embora a pé, mesmo de madrugada, bem tranquilo. Foi minha primeira experiência com o Airbnb e gostei muito! Recomendo!
Local de acordo com a proposta, organizaçao excelente, localizaçao melhor do que imaginei. Aconselho a estadia.

name: Unit 310 Hawaiian King condo Waikik
space: Unit 310 is a 455 sq ft apartment in the Hawaiian King condo building. It has one bedroom, a living room, a full size kitchen, a small dressing room, bathroom, and additionally a 90 sq ft lanai. It is on the third floor of an elevator building. There is a queen size bed in the bedroom and a double size fouton in the living room and a small love seat. Located in the heart of Waikiki, one long block from the beach and ocean. Expect comfort, proximity to stores, restaurants, night life, golf, zoo, aquarium, parks, bus stops, conference center, Ala Moana Shopping mall, and easy, casual Hawaiian style living.
description: Unit 310 is a 455 sq ft apartment in the Hawaiian King condo building. It has one bedroom, a living room, a full size kitchen, a small dressing room, bathroom, and additionally a 90 sq ft lanai. It is on the third floor of an elevator building. There is a queen size bed in the bedroom and a double size fouton in the living room and a small love seat. Located in the heart of Waikiki, one long block from the beach and ocean. Expect comfort, proximity to stores, restaurants, night life, golf, zoo, aquarium, parks, bus stops, conference center, Ala Moana Shopping mall, and easy, casual Hawaiian style living.
house_rules: No more than 4 people in unit. No loud parties. Must be quiet after 10 pm. No roughhousing in unit. No jumping on beds.

host.host_about: I am an attorney who now lives in California after residing in Hawaii for 5 years. I have enjoyed upgrading my units in Hawaii and meeting and talking with many of the guests who have stayed in my units for the past 9 years. Guests come from all over the world, and many stay in my units every time they visit Hawaii. Even many residents from other Hawaiian islands stay there. I am now listing a room in my house in lovely Moss Landing CA two blocks from the ocean, and 20 minutes from Monterey and Carmel a little farther away. Santa Cruz is 20 miles to the north.

reviews.comments: Great location!!! Paris was nice and easy to communicate with. The place is great for the price. Its an older building, so don't expect fancy hotel quality. I loved staying here and would stay again!

L'appartement de Paris est exactement comme décrit sur le site : propre, bien placé, bien équipé!
Il mérite donc 5 étoiles.
The location was ideal. I loved the funky vintage feel of the place, and there was plenty of space to cook and enjoy a meal w a few guests. I would love to stay here again. Thank you!

Full of warmth and aloha, this cozy apt will be a highlight of your trip to Hawaii.  The room is quiet, allowing you a good night's rest, even though it's only a few blocks from excitement of Waikiki and the ocean.  Paris, the owner, is generous and quick to answer questions and offer help.  

Wonderful experience in every way.

Vi är supernöjda med vårt boende!! Det var rent och fräscht. Allting fanns i lägenheten som man behövde, från strykjärn till strandleksaker till komplett köksutrustning. Läget var optimalt med gångavstånd till strand och shopping. Buss till down town Honolulu fanns runt hörnet. Om man inte orkade ta sig till stranden kunde man ligga vid poolen som hade bra med plats för att sitta och läsa eller surfa på nätet. Barnvänligt vilket var ett stort plus för oss! Kan varmt rekommendera denna värd och detta boende!!

We loved Paris Morgan's Condo in Waikiki. I'm going to start with the cons since they really aren't bad at all; Be careful when using the small parking lot across the street next to the car rental place. One nite I put the parking ticket in the car but I either put it in upside down or the wind blew it upside down. The next morning the car was gone. It cost $160 to get a 25 car rental out of the tow place. Also the tow place and taxi ($40) only took cash. (bit of a racket). But on the plus side a very nice local Hawaiian paid for the taxi out of the kindness of his heart.The only con on the condo was the WiFi. I could not get it to reach the Condo. My wife had a college paper that she decided to postpone. We planned on this happening just to be safe so her professor was fine with it. Please dont let the parking and WiFi thing deter you. Its merely a heads up.  We would do it all again to be back in Hawaii and this amazingly priced location. The condo is bug free and has a lot of things one needs. Snorkels, mask, beach umbrellas. Not sure if others left these or if Paris provides them but they are nice. Also the clothes line on the balcony was very helpful too. We found a Frisbee in Hanama bay and added it to the collection. Thank you Paris.

Really enjoyed our stay at the Hawaiian King. The location is close to restaurants (Marukame Udon!) and 2 blocks to the shopping strip and beaches. Trolley and bus stops are super close too.

Condo was really well kept with all appliances and homewares. The centre pool area was rad too! Could not get wifi in the room only in the pool area.

Great little pad, excellent location. The complex was a bit dodgy at the entrance sometimes with the drunkens at the bar but not a reflection on the accommodation. The apartment was everything we were after, thanks so much!!!!

We had a wonderful time in Oahu and this quaint and comfortable apartment was a big part of it. It has everything you need including beach towels, umbrellas, even snorkel gear. Paris was a great host and left some great tips for apartment living. There is a store downstairs that has some things you might need and if you're thirsty there is a nice little bar down there as well. Everything is close, beach, shopping, restaurants. The apartment is clean and very nice. Thanks again Paris!

The location of the condo is awesome.  We loved only being 2 blocks from Waikiki and it was easy to access bus routes and shopping.  The staff at Hawaiian King were very helpful with local information and they took very good care of the pool area.  The condo had everything we needed and other renters had added some amenities like beach umbrellas, sand toys, and some essential condiments.  The laundry on-site was also very convenient.  The bar downstairs was a drawback but we never felt unsafe.

Very good older style unit in complex with pool.  Unit had all necessities and also provided with handy bus timetables and local information.  Unit very clean and suitable for two people.  Paris very easy to communicate with and provide any assistance.  Great location in the centre of Wakiki, can be a little noisy but you are where the action is.  Major bus stops around the corner.  Five minute walk to the main beach.  Minutes to restaurants and shopping.
L'alloggio ha soddisfatto le nostre esigenze. Vicino al centro e ben attrezzato. Unico neo il parcheggio (abbiamo preso una multa per sosta vietata).

Das Hawaiian King in Honolulu war genau so wie im Inserat beschrieben. Es liegt zentral und ist gut ausgestattet. Fön oder auch Putz- und Waschutensillien waren vorhanden. Die Wohnung war sauber und ordentlich, allerdings war das Gästesofa im Wohnzimmer sehr unbequem. Die Lage und der Preis waren super. Der Kontakt zum Vermieter ist jeder zeit möglich und man erhält eine rasche Antwort. Sehr kurzer Fussweg zum Strand. Ich würde das Hawaiian King weiterempfehlen.

Firstly thanks for renting your condo to us and thanks also for your helpful communication prior to arriving. Settling in was a breeze, particularly with the early checkin. The condo was very clean with good space for the two of us. It's location close to Kuhio Av was excellent with close access to the bus and the beach. David in reception was very helpful.
We were disappointed by a couple of aspects of the accommodation some of which are fixable. The condo is dark even in day, needing lights 24/7. There is no working light in dressing room and only a lamp in the bedroom, thus necessitating a flashlight to find things in luggage. The aircon is pretty noisy. I got a 2 inch splinter of wood from the floor flashing in my foot.  The puncture hole was quite significant. There are loose louvres in the bathroom and the aluminium bolt which locks the door to the lanai is very flimsy, so the unit is not particularly secure. It's a shame that the lanai has odd pieces of building materials on it. The double bed is very old and needs replacing and the sheets for the futon had holes. I think the condo needs some basic maintenance, some money spent to make it a reasonable renting proposition.
The things which are not fixable which I am sure Paris is aware of are the dumpster bins just below the lanai which become increasingly smelly as they fill, the view from the lanai itself into  the very close apartment walkways next door and the lanais below, which are unsightly. Sleep was interrupted by noise from other residents as this block is occupied by students and locals some who like to party. I guess this condo would be a little more loved if Paris lived here. Mahalo and aloha.
Great location at Waikiki! The apartment is clean with everything you need. Paris was easy to communicate with.

The Apartment is very cosy and clean. I really loved the vintage touch it has. Beds are both comfy and there is plenty of space. We only had Wifi in the pool area, which wasn't really a Problem. The condo is centrally located so everything is reachable by walk in and around waikiki. Bus stops right around the Corner are also a plus. The bar downstairs can turn very loud and weird on Weekends but it didn't really bother me. I would reccommend the Apartment for People who aren't looking for the quietest place and want to live centrally. Thank you Paris, I will be back for sure. :)
great location

Thank you for allowing us the opportunity to stay in your wonderful home. Located near the beach and shopping, we couldn't have asked for a better location. And when we asked if we could check out late... Paris was more than accommodating. Thank you for helping to make our trip so great.

Wonderfully priced condo with great people in the area.
Absolutely perfect for one person and excellent if you want to be just outside of the Waikiki traffic area.

This flat is basically exactly as described. I loves how kitsch it was. Brilliant decor and lots of fun to stay in. Super close to a big supermarket and to town/the beach. We had three adults staying here and unless you're all going to bed/waking up at the same time, that's probably one too many. The sliding doors offer very little privacy. The sofa bed was comfy enough though. The balcony doors and blinds stayed closed. They look out onto the doors of other flats and over some dumpsters. So the smell wasn't great, with the heat. The Internet didn't reach the flat for any of us (and we had 6 devices between us). So we spent a lot of time on the landing when organising stuff online. 

A great little flat for a twosome, who aren't bothered about flash and bang, but want all the amenities covered and are willing to get Internet elsewhere

Our stay in Waikiki was incredible. The location couldn't be better in our eyes. The pics don't do the pool area justice, it's a great size and our 12 year old loves it. Everything you need is provided, we had 3 in the apartment with daughter on the fold out. The neighbors are friendly, and there is a cute little bar in the complex with interesting locals who love to tell a tale or two. It's loud at night, but when you're right amongst it, it's part of the experience. The unit is older but spotless, and full of charm. Paris is the best host I've come across, great with communication and hassle free travel. Thanks for the hospitality
Very nice flat. Central located. Responsive host. Would be great to have wifi in the flat.

The host was as accommodating as possible! When we first arrived, the keys were not in the lockbox, so we had to wait for the housekeeper to come back and drop them off to us. Two young girls met us at the lounge area, and handed us the keys. The communication with the owner was very prompt. She apologized for the keys not being where they should have been and kept calling/texting us regularly with updates. We appreciated her immediate response and caring replies. 
There's no wifi in the unit but there is wifi downstairs by the pool area, and that was never an issue for us. 
The location is superb! It's walking distance to Waikiki Beach, many attractions and tons of bus stops. Overall, it's really in a great location. The downside is that downstairs in the lobby area, there's a bar and it could get kind of rowdy and chaotic. We stayed there for a week, and three times we heard some really big fights, twice the police had to intervene but we did feel safe inside the unit. The area during the daytime is completely safe, it's just around midnight that things could get a little rowdy, not always though. 
The owner, Paris, was very attentive to our needs via phone, because she is based in another state. When we first arrived, we had a cleaning issue because the place was not properly cleaned, and she did her best to accommodate us. The toilet had been used and had not been flushed (which made us wonder if it had been disinfected), there was fresh gum on a living room chair, the mirrors were not wiped down from the previous renter, there was a sticky spill that was not cleaned on the kitchen floor, bottles were left and used tissues were not thrown away. Overall, the place is dusty and needs a serious cleaning, but apart from that, we enjoyed our stay at Paris's apartment. We asked her permission to buy cleaning products so that we could clean and disinfect the place ourselves, and she agreed to reimburse us. However, we didn't ask for the reimbursement. The keynote is its location. We would just double check to make sure the place has been cleaned.

Great host, friendly easy to contact. Old world charm apartment,  nice pool area. Only 5 minutes walk to the beach, 1 minute walk to main street/shopping area if you are into shopping. apartment was well maintained with everything you need for your stay, excellent kitchen facilities comfy bedroom. lots of clean lining and towels

Great spot in Waikiki - walking distance to the beach, shopping, restaurants etc. 
Plenty of towels including beach towels and inflatables. Plenty of room for the two of us!

Paris was a great host. We had all the info provided to us and helpful hints to get along in Waikiki! Everything went smoothly and we had an awesome time ! The apartment was great and in the perfect location ! Everything is within walking distance....... beach, groceries,  good eats and bars! If you're trying to save money, you can buy groceries at a market right around the corner, and the apartment has everything you need! The only thing, which Paris did tell us, is if you have a car there is no parking.  Parking in Waikiki is expensive and very challenging,  so keep that in mind. We would definitely recommend this place,  we had a great experience from start to finish!!!
Paris was very easy to deal with, she sent me instructions on everything needed and I loved the location :) the only thing I couldn't find was an iron and ironing board.

Great apartment, right near the action of Waikiki. There is a Nordstrom rack at the end of the road and a Ross round the corner. Cheese cake factory is 3mins walk an 5 mins walk to beach

The place had good supply of towels and beach stuff, full kitchen. Only negative is the A/C could be larger for the size of the place and its a little Dark inside. 

Overall the complex is great with its own pool and BBQ which we had mostly to our selves. 

I would happily stay here again

This place is really centrally located and there are lots of stuff to do in the area. The studio was perfect for a crash pad, if your looking for some where to sleep this would be perfect. It is outdated but who cares if your just sleeping there. Paris was really lovely and great help, made everything really easy.

This is a spacious one bedroom apartment that is centrally located. Great beaches, restaurants and food stores are within walking distance. I did not rent a car and walked everywhere or took the bus. As noted, the kitchen is fully equipped and the host offers beach chairs and an umbrella. You do need to purchase dish soap and bring your own toiletries. Wifi access was only available downstairs when the pool was open. Nevertheless, I would definitely stay here again.
Close to Waikiki Beach all the restaurants and stores. All major transportation one block from the place nice and quiet building with a nice grill  and pool area.

Paris's condo was a great location for my friend and I, who went to Hawaii for school for a month. I like that it had a full kitchen because eating out can be quite expensive. The format of the place was convenient for more than one guest with the bathroom situated outside of the bedroom. The beach was a 10 minutes walk away. We went in February so the water was a little too cool for us, but many people were in the water while we were there. 

As for transportation, the bus system was pretty easy to navigate and affordable. It takes twice as long than having your own car, but we weren't in too much of a hurry most of the time. We had rented a car as well and it was a bit of a hassle finding and paying for parking. There were plenty of parking space on the street and across the street in a paid parking lot, but they quickly filled up. Average parking rate was $2-4/hour. 

Overall, I think we got a great deal for the place and location.

Great location, just next to busy central streets of Waikiki with bus stops around the corner. A bit old and dark, but comfortable and safe apartment, with everything you need apart from an iron. Plenty of towels supplied but bring soap. Wifi signal doesn't reach into the flat so you'll have to go to the main terrace in front or down to the pool area. The housekeeper is not there at all times, which might be a problem if you have to check out but want to leave your luggage under watch. Overall very friendly and helpful staff and a good place to stay.
Excellent for the beach(short walk)also well situated for shops etc.Pool on complex a plus

It's a good condo in the middle of Waikiki, close to everything. We never met Paris but had to call her in the middle of the night when we arrived due to the key was missing in the lockbox. She fixed it fast and we didn't had to wait too long to get the keys. Since there is no parking we never rented a car and got bycicles instead (which was one of the best decisions). Everything we needed was in the apartment, the only thing we wished for was Wi-Fi access in the apartment.
Great location and fabulous host

Paris répondait très rapidement  à chaque questions-réponses que
 nous avions par textos et nous a accomodé pour notre départ qui était plus tard que nous devions quitter originalement. Service Wow!! Merci Paris pour tout et John la personne sur place. 
BBQ piscine près de Waikik beach etc....c'était perfect!! On a hâte d'y retourner
Paris was a great person.  Her responses were very quick.  The location was great, but I wasn’t impressed how this condo was maintained.
Super close to the beach and all stores great location

name: Quarto simples, centro do Rio.
summary: O quarto é confortável, mobilhado e dispõe de uma bela varanda.  A pessoa terá  acesso aos demais cômodos sociais do apartamento. O condomínio tem porteiro 24h, é bem localizado com metrô, ônibus, mercado, banco e todo tipo de comercio aos redores.
space: O quarto é simples e possui uma varanda que é muito agradável. É ideal para quem quer transitar pelo Rio, estando em excelente bairro e pagando pouco.O hóspede poderá cozinhar, lavar roupa, fazer uso de um banheiro compartilhado e  desfrutar das dependências do condomínio Cores da Lapa.
description: O quarto é confortável, mobilhado e dispõe de uma bela varanda.  A pessoa terá  acesso aos demais cômodos sociais do apartamento. O condomínio tem porteiro 24h, é bem localizado com metrô, ônibus, mercado, banco e todo tipo de comercio aos redores. O quarto é simples e possui uma varanda que é muito agradável. É ideal para quem quer transitar pelo Rio, estando em excelente bairro e pagando pouco.O hóspede poderá cozinhar, lavar roupa, fazer uso de um banheiro compartilhado e  desfrutar das dependências do condomínio Cores da Lapa. Terá um quarto privado, com acesso a varanda. Uso de um banheiro compartilhado, cozinha e uma saleta de convivência com mesa e cadeiras onde pode fazer as refeições e outras atividades. Na casa terão 3 estudantes que trabalham  e estudam durante o dia, dominam língua inglesa o que pode facilitar na comunicação de um estrangeiro se necessário. São pessoas atarefadas porém muito solicitas se necessário. A Lapa é um bairro tradicionalmente boêmio e é o lugar com
neighborhood_overview: A Lapa é um bairro tradicionalmente boêmio e é o lugar com a maior concentração de (Website hidden by Airbnb) uma vasta programação cultural o bairro traz em suas noites variedade de programas para se divertir e conhecer.
transit: O condomínio dispõe de duas saídas: Riachuelo e Men de Sá, ambas com pontos de ônibus, logo em frente as saídas. Oferecendo acesso a fácil a muitos lugares da cidade. Temos duas estações de metrô, Gloria e Cinelândia bem próximas é só escolher.
access: Terá um quarto privado, com acesso a varanda. Uso de um banheiro compartilhado, cozinha e uma saleta de convivência com mesa e cadeiras onde pode fazer as refeições e outras atividades.
interaction: Na casa terão 3 estudantes que trabalham  e estudam durante o dia, dominam língua inglesa o que pode facilitar na comunicação de um estrangeiro se necessário. São pessoas atarefadas porém muito solicitas se necessário.
house_rules: A limpeza é compartilhada com outros (Website hidden by Airbnb) um rodizio semanal.  É proibida a entrada de animais domésticos.

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

name: Hibiscus Hideaway in Kihei
summary: This beautiful one bedroom one bathroom cottage is completely brand new and is kept immaculate. Tile floors throughout, granite counter tops in the progressive yet traditional fully appointed kitchen and state of the art appliances.
space: The artistically designed bathroom has details like a granite counter, a beautifully artistic tile shower and so much more! The wall mounted flat screen TV/DVD/CABLE in the living area makes watching a movie after a day at the beach very comfortable. If you need to check your emails or just surf the web we also supply wireless high speed internet. This private cottage is ideal for your dream vacation, island getaway or simply a lovely place to spend your honeymoon. The decor is traditional Hawaiian done in a tasteful modern setting. The walls are adorned with unique art all of which are done by local artist here in Maui! The convenience of a washer and dryer, fully-equipped kitchen, and all brand new furnishings make this your home away from home. There is also a fabulous new BBQ for those nights when you just want to stay in. High thread count sheets, a plush pillow top bed, over sized towels, toiletries such as soap, shampoo and conditioner, blow dryers, iron and ironing board, and b
description: This beautiful one bedroom one bathroom cottage is completely brand new and is kept immaculate. Tile floors throughout, granite counter tops in the progressive yet traditional fully appointed kitchen and state of the art appliances. The artistically designed bathroom has details like a granite counter, a beautifully artistic tile shower and so much more! The wall mounted flat screen TV/DVD/CABLE in the living area makes watching a movie after a day at the beach very comfortable. If you need to check your emails or just surf the web we also supply wireless high speed internet. The convenience of a washer and dryer, fully-equipped kitchen, and all brand new furnishings make this your home away from home. There is
transit: Although we encourage guest to rent a car as this will greatly impact the quality of their stay, there is a public bus stop very close.
access: Guests are renting a complete one bedroom, one bath cottage on the owners property. The hosts occupy the main house on the property Guests have fun access to the completer one bedroom cottage including your own  off street parking area
interaction: As both hosts work full time, guests do have access to hosts although it is limited.
house_rules: We are contained within a family neighborhood. We ask that guests are respectful of the family neighborhood atmosphere

reviews.comments: Loved staying here! My first time to Hawaii and Maui Island so I really didn't have much of an idea where everything was apart from approximations using a map. The location is perfect! Right near the ocean/ beach, key spot to get to the airport or other parts of the island. Additionally, Samantha thought of everything right down to ensuring there is a hookup for a hose off the driveway so you can wash the sand off your feet. I will definitely stay here again!
Hibiscus Hideaway is a great place to stay. It's very well located and it has everything you need for a pleasant stay in Maui. Aloha.

In a few words perfect, in a great location and reasonably priced.  The pictures do not do it justice.   It is truly an oasis. Before you enter at the cottage, there is a beautiful stamped concrete patio complete with outdoor dining area and separate sitting area for relaxing with your morning coffee or afternoon cocktail.    There is a very nice feeling of privacy provided by a privacy wall and a line of small palm trees that separates the property from the property next-door. There is a full kitchen, a beautiful bathroom, separate bedroom, and living room with flatscreen television and pull out couch.    They provided boogie boards, a cooler, two beach chairs, a Sunbrella,. Everything was clean, even the barbecue.   I would certainly stay there again if I had the opportunity to return.
We had a very pleasant stay in this apartment. Very comfortable. Convenient location. We loved it!

Samantha's little hideaway is fantastic!  Very cozy!  The place has been updated with all of the amenities you need.  Plus, all of the little touches make it a great say.  From the island magazines to help find good recommendations to the island map sitting out to help you find your way, Samantha put a lot of effort to make the stay very welcoming.  The place is on a small side street in north Kihei which is out little outside of the main town area, perfect for what we were looking for.  A short walk from the beach where you can see the sunset, but also very central on the island to get around.  Definitely would stay here again.

Mahalo!

This place was absolutely perfect! Everything was just as shown in the pictures. The cottage is very clean and comfortable. All that you could need was provided (towels, beach chairs, washer/dryer, kitchen items, etc.) The neighborhood is very peaceful and I enjoyed having breakfast on the private patio. On my last day I went to the big beach in Makena that was recommended by Samantha and it was wonderful. I would definitely stay here again!
Good place to stay.
Perfect location. Beautiful place, excellent host.
Great place in a beautiful location

It was our first visit to Maui, Hibiscus hideaway is an excellent place as pictured, with everything thought of as mentioned in other reviews and conveniently located to all places in Maui. Despite last minute booking the place was ready and Samantha responded within few minutes to all clarifications.

name: Affordable and close to the city!
summary: Comfortable room in a modern apartment near city.
space: This is a split level apartment with 2 bedrooms.  The master room and laundry room are located downstairs.  Upstairs is your room + bathroom, kitchen, dining and living area and 2 balconies. Your room has a built in wardrobe, balcony and own private bathroom. It is equipped with a queen size bed, ceiling fan and wifi.  Located on the borders of Alexandria and Redfern, the apartment is an easy 5 mins stroll to the Redfern train station. From the station, you're only 1 stop away from Central station where you can catch direct trains to the airport and 2 stops away from the heart of the city. Commuting to the city is quick and convenient either by train or bus. The nearest bus stop is 200m from the apartment and there are regular buses to the city.  The bus ride should only take 10-15 minutes. A taxi ride from the airport takes about 15 minutes and costs less than AUD30 with Uber. The neighbourhood has a great selection of trendy cafes, bars and restaurants and is home to various outlet s
description: Comfortable room in a modern apartment near city. This is a split level apartment with 2 bedrooms.  The master room and laundry room are located downstairs.  Upstairs is your room + bathroom, kitchen, dining and living area and 2 balconies. Your room has a built in wardrobe, balcony and own private bathroom. It is equipped with a queen size bed, ceiling fan and wifi.  Located on the borders of Alexandria and Redfern, the apartment is an easy 5 mins stroll to the Redfern train station. From the station, you're only 1 stop away from Central station where you can catch direct trains to the airport and 2 stops away from the heart of the city. Commuting to the city is quick and convenient either by train or bus. The nearest bus stop is 200m from the apartment and there are regular buses to the city.  The bus ride should only take 10-15 minutes. A taxi ride from the airport takes about 15 minutes and costs less than AUD30 with Uber. The neighbourhood has a great selection of trendy cafes, ba
neighborhood_overview: Proximity to public transport and lots of cafes and bars. There's also a small supermarket (IGA) across the road.
transit: The nearest bus stop is an easy 3 min walk (buses go to the city from here) and the Redfern train station is 5 mins from the apartment on foot. If you prefer to walk to the city, it should only take you 30 mins.
access: Unlimited wifi, washing machine, use of the kitchen (no cooking), living and dining area.
interaction: My boyfriend and I work Mon to Fri so are usually not at home during the day. We can easily be reached on our mobiles if you need any assistance during your stay.
house_rules: No smoking or visitors in the apartment.

host.host_about: Sydney has been my home for almost 8 years now and I’m still loving this beautiful city.  Glenn grew up here so he’s as local as one can get. We both work full time and enjoy spending the weekends doing outdoor activities or just chilling at home on a wet rainy day.

reviews.comments: Irene is a lovely and very helpfully host with a very nice place, tidy and clean. Recommended!
It was a great stay in Irene's place! The apartment is clean and cozy, located within walking distance from a train station as well as bus station. Both Irene and John are very helpful and welcoming.
Lovely apartment great location Irene was very friendly definitely would recommend
Perfect place to stay a couple of days to visit Sydney ! Irene is an amazing host !
Very clean and comfortable house. Location is  very close to city . The house lady is good to us when we stay there. Lovely Sydney.

Clean , Spacious and comfortable room.
Very close to staion and up and comming REDFERN CAFES .
Great communication and flxible peerson .

Freat host and Room

Lovely & very neat apartment with a really comfortable bed & that's really conveniently located. We loved the close proximity to Redfern Station & small shops nearby. Irene was very friendly & hospitable to us & responded promptly to any questions we had prior to our arrival. Highly recommended host!
The reservation was canceled 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

NICE to meet Irene&Glenn! I had a good time in their home.They provided all that we need, the location for their apartment is convenient for us, room and bathroom are both clean. I had a great trip with my friends in Sydney.
Very friendly and helpful couple, also the place is great and looks like the pictures. Would recommend it for people with smaller luggage though because the room is on the 2nd floor

Irene and Glenn were the perfect hosts, period. Their home was perfect, they made us feel welcome every step of the way and even for NYE standards, our stay was absolutely worth the money. Definitely recommend to other guests! Thank you!

I stayed here for 5 nights. Glenn and Irene were really friendly and accommodating. I was running a little  late with check-in but Irene kindly waited for me. The bedroom and private bathroom were spotless and comfortable. The room itself was also very quiet. The location is very convenient, about 7 mins walk to Redfern station. Overall, highly recommended. Thanks for the stay!

name: Charming StanleyBeachFlat w/rooftop
summary: A charming,funky cool 1 bdrm flat in older walk up bldg close to Stanley beaches,mountain trails. A huge shared BBQ rooftop. No lift, 4 floor stairs Light,airy floor/ceiling windows. Buses at door,cafes.shops.wireless.full cooking kitchen.great spot!
space: right next to the beach and nature..plus all the cafes and "vacation" life of charming Stanley!
description: A charming,funky cool 1 bdrm flat in older walk up bldg close to Stanley beaches,mountain trails. A huge shared BBQ rooftop. No lift, 4 floor stairs Light,airy floor/ceiling windows. Buses at door,cafes.shops.wireless.full cooking kitchen.great spot! right next to the beach and nature..plus all the cafes and "vacation" life of charming Stanley! the rooftop is huge and you can entertain a number of guests to an afternoon BBQ with rooftop music! Marcos is always available to help host and answer guests needs. Like a "holiday" every day...a definite tourist location..great for a weekend or week getaway. Yes, right at below doorstep are the major buses to Caueway Bay, Central and Kowloon and Aberdeen...plus the fast minibuses
neighborhood_overview: Like a "holiday" every day...a definite tourist location..great for a weekend or week getaway.
transit: Yes, right at below doorstep are the major buses to Caueway Bay, Central and Kowloon and Aberdeen...plus the fast minibuses
access: the rooftop is huge and you can entertain a number of guests to an afternoon BBQ with rooftop music!
interaction: Marcos is always available to help host and answer guests needs.
house_rules: Please No crazy parties as we have nice quiet neighbours. No extra guests staying overnight eithout advance notification..take care of artwork in flat...turn off aircons and lights when not in flat

address.street: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: Marcos had been most helpful, trying his best to make my stay a pleasant one even when he was away on holidays. The apartment was very cozy, the bed was especially comfortable and the place was warm even in the winter. Just opposite the busstop, with plenty of restaurants around.

It was the second time I was renting a flat from Marcos. No surprise. Marcos is a great host. Always available if you need anything and making your stay as nice as possible.
The flat is of perfect size with its separate bedroom and good living room space. The walk through dressing room is also very convenient. Plenty of room to put your stuff (which is not always the case in Airbnb flats in HK).
Stanley is great, you'll meet people easily just by going down at one of the bars. I recommend Verns for their beers and Smugglers for the atmosphere. ;)
Marcos's flat is in a good location. It is easy to find and very convenient to go to downtown. I like Stanley very much and will stay in his place again in the future.
很方便的地點,很舒適的屋子!

We found the appartment as advertised on airbnb. The place is cosy, clean (for long time visitors: the cleaner comes once a week), and the location could not be better (5 minutes walk to the beach, restaurants, shops, Stanley market; half an hour by public bus to central Hong Kong).

Marcos is a very nice and helpful person. He answered all our questions quickly both before and during our stay. He even came up with a few beach toys for our children and offered them participating in a tennis lesson for kids free of charge.

Perfect appartment offering value for money, perfect host, perfect stay - thanks!
It's such a nice place for a holiday, the location is great and the beach is just 10 mins walk, Macros is very nice and helpful, we had a good time at Stanley.

Very nice flat, in the heart of Stanley village. Home away from home, the flat is very cosy. Thank you Marcos for your welcoming and your advices about Stanley. We could not have gas in the kitchen, but that was a minor problem given all the very nice restaurants around very very close, eg in Stanley plaza.

Marcos gave very specific instruction on the location of the flat before our arrival via phone and message.  Altough we made some misunderstanding about "the room on left side of the stair" , no one answered while knocking the exact door (with TV noise). And we found a key in the running shoe for the other room as instruction. That confused us.  But he is warm and very nice after all.

Except the air condition is a little noisy, the room is as comfortable as our home and extremely convenient, close to the bus station and shopping area,with a wonderful rooftop.

Marcos' place was terrific. A comfortable 1-bedroom, an incredibly comfortable bed, and an awesome location right next to Stanley Market. It was the second time Marcos was kind enough to host me. He's quick to respond, and has an easy-going personality as well. I'd highly recommend a stay there. Thanks again, Marcos!
Really good place to stay. Great host

Nice one bedroom flat in one of the best neighborhoods in Hong Kong. A good  escape from the busy city centre but still with easy access to everything. Marcos is a nice host. He kept checking if things were ok during our stay. Thank you for hosting us, Marcos.

Marcos' place is a perfect location for being in Stanley, right near the market, waterfront restaurants, the bus station and shopping.  We were not able to use the grill, which was disappointing, but his place was clean and adequate for our stay.
This was a great location in Stanley, near bus depot, coffee, and market. Bed was very comfortable. Ma cos was easy to get in touch with via email.

We had a great time in Stanley staying at Marcos' flat!  Awesome location... walk to both beaches and restaurants and shops and bars and the market and coffee houses and... well, everything!  For trips to the city, the bus stop that takes you right to downtown Hong Kong is literally across the street and very easy to navigate.

Marcos is a great host, very friendly and welcoming and there to answer any questions you have and/or give you great recommendations.  Would definitely recommend.

The property is very well located in Stanley market. Short walk to the Beach. Instructions were accurate and made it easy to locate - it's on the 5th floor with a nice staircase. Marcos apartment was neat & clean, exactly like the pic and I enjoyed my stay with him. Thanks.

Marcos, the host, has been extremely kind and helpful during our stay.  The flat is excellent and exactly what we need for a mini family vacation in a quiet seaside place. We love Stanley very much, and Marcos' flat would be our definite choice for our next trip there.

We are a family of three with a young toddler. Marcos was very friendly and he prepared a teddy for our daughter to play with during the stay. He upgraded us to another apartment of the same building and he attended to our requests even at night time. Thank you.
Had a little confusion with the key, but the overall place was very nice. Great location as well

Marco's place …is simply perfect!! A very nice place for stay-cation! Located at a great location which allow accessing bars around pier, the beach and the market in walking distance. 

For the house, it's with artistic decoration and fully equipped kitchen! The rooftop makes the perfect place being incredible!!

I enjoy my time there so much and would definitely return!!
Marcos was a great host and always responsive. The flat is very nice. Would recommend to stay there!

As a family of 4 (8 and 4 year old) we thoroughly enjoyed our 5 night stay in Stanley. The flat is in an excellent location, within metres of the town and the beach. There are a few flights of stairs to test out your fitness, we found them fine though ! The flat is basic,  but very homely, so ideal for our young family. Our children slept together in the living room, which was good fun at their age, but did make it all a little tight on space. This wasn't much of an issue for us though as we spent most of the time outside. We'd have no hesitation on returning here in the future.
很棒的房间,交通便利,离海边很近｡

This was my second visit. Marcos is a great landlord and keeps his word. It's on the 5th floor (no lift!) but Beautifully located in the heart of Stanley Market. Appreciate the new touches- slippers, umbrella and the garbage bags. Apartment is neat & clean. Looking forward to my next visit here on 01.01.2017.
Perfect location. As others said about no elevator in the building but everything is closeby. So convenient. Marcos is responsive to our queries.

Marcos is a wonderful host. He keeps his word and completely trust worthy. It was my 3rd visit to his apartment which is conveniently located in Stanley Market. The flat is on the 5th floor and if you have a heavy bag like I had you can get a good workout! Marcos has added small touches since my first visit in early 2016 which make your stay comfortable. I enjoyed my stay and shall be back hopefully soon.
Great great location! Flat was bit old but okay for staying.
convenient place and helpful host
就有赤柱市中心,很方便
Very cosy appartment. Very good location...

This is a surprisingly spacious apartment for Hong Kong and, given how central it is in Port Stanley, it's actually pretty quiet. It has every thing you could need and is clean and well decorated. The only downside is that it's on the fifth floor - you need to be pretty fit and keep those suitcases light!

Marcos's flat is located in one of the most popular spots in Hong Kong, Stanley.  We were returning to HK after being away for 3 years, and this location was perfect for us.  The roof top provides a lovely view of Stanley Market and the bay, and in the opposite direction a view of The Twins, one of the finest hiking spots on HK Island.
Immediately across the street is the main bus terminus for transport to other areas of HK Island; a mini bus stand adjacent to the terminus whisks to Chai Wan to connect with the MTR (HK's subway/Metro system); 3 minutes away is a grocery, and in the market itself, there are numerous shops and restaurants along the water front.
In short, this flat is ideally located.
The bed was very, very comfortable, and Stanley becomes very quiet after the shops close around 6 pm, so we rested very well.  We lacked for nothing inside the flat.
I highly recommend this Airbnb!  Marcos communicated with us frequently and was available if needed through our week's stay.  He's very friendly and enjoyable to talk with, and he really knows Hong Kong!
The apartment is very clean and comfortable, a really good place to chill. Nice design and huge windows open up to nature, but still so close to the transportation and beaches.
Stanley market이랑 가까워서 좋았습니다. Marcos가 추천해준 해변은 조용하고 쾌적해서 수영을 즐기기 좋았습니다. 에어컨이 조금 시끄러웠는데 다른 부분은 모두 좋았습니다
Cozy but not small and quite comfortable. Location is best in Stanley (easy to get there. Welcome mart and seven eleven is ver close. Can go to stanley market and street. )
Great place
Marcos is a good host. Very responsive with clear instructions. The flat is in a good location and very easy to get to. Will book again next time!
Appartement bien situé et agréable.
Perfect location in charming Stanley!

We definitely like Marcos's place located just opposite of Stanley's bus station! Location is superb and easy to find based on Marcos's detailed guide. However, this place not suitable for people who have leg injury as need to climb up to 5th floor~ we love the scenery and very cozy place to hang out during weekend!
Good location. The appartment could use some fixing. Lot's of stairs to get to the appartment. Close to beaches and Stanley market.

Very convenite adress where near the Market and the bus station. 
 The clear guidelines made it is very easy to access.
The flat is quite clean although the decoration and the furnitures are not new.
Wonderful!
The flat is really cozy ,clean and unique.near to the market and beach. Marcos are nice and will give you clearly instructions to find the flat.

First: Marcos is a great host. Then: Conveniently located a few steps away from Stanley Market bus station & taxi station with lots of convenience stores within walking distance, this cozy apartment is ideal for young (5 floors to climb ;-)) couples with one kid. Having checked out late in the evening, we had the great surprise to find a full pot of ground coffee when we woke up. But the best surprise was: total silence at night, so we could really rest and enjoy our stay. Highly recommended.

Great host
Great location in the heart of Stanley market

Good host ,Great location and very convenient to all main places in Stanley 
This is already the 2nd time that I stayed at host ‘s property and sure that I will come again

There is a small dream in my deep heart when I was young. A warm apartment with love nearby the seaside, this one really calling my memory. Great location, private respect from the owner. We had wonderful hiking trip stay. Thanks
位置非常好,就在屈臣氏上面,到各个地方都方便

위치가 좋아서 편리하고 요리도 가능해 좋아요.
5층까지 올리가는건 힘들었어요.
시설에 좀더 신경쓰면 좋겠어요.

A great place right in the middle of Stanley. It had everything we needed and is spacious and well laid out for a Hong Kong apartment. Unfortunately we didn't get to meet Marcos, but all the instructions were clear and he was quick to respond to questions and emailed us a few times to make sure everything was ok and we had all we need. Only down side is all the stairs, but that just helped work off all the dim sum.

Perfect location! Apartment is basic but comfortable, quiet and clean. 5 floors without a lift was a bit challenging with a baby but doable. We didn't get to meet the host but the explanations were very clear.
위치좋음 오래된건물이라 엘리베이터 없음 시설이 노후된편  냉동고없음 에어컨은 후지지만 잘나옴

Muy buena ubicación 
el Flat tiene todo lo necesario
一切都好,赤柱非常适合休闲之旅｡吃/逛街很方便｡美中不足是卧室对公路,晚上睡觉吵｡睡眠质量好者可以忽略

Marcos flat is a perfect location for being in Stanley - near market, beaches, restaurants, bus stop, supermarkets, shopping area. Some things need a bit fixing, but we where happy to see, that the damage after the typhoon hadn't been that bad as feared. The flat was clean and had everything we needed for our stay. Marcos was a great host, very helpful with everything.
nice place in the middle of Stanley Perfect for what we wanted
Great location in Stanley, basic apartment but was enough for a sleeping area.

The flat is a good basic flat in the middle of Stanley.  We stayed there for 8 nights and then another 3.  We cooked for our selves allot of the time but also out.  Being placed in the middle of Stanley there is plenty  of hustle bustle and a plethora of places to buy stuff, food, eat, drink etc.   Additionally easy for the beach, the city and walks in the amazing Tia Tam country park.  In short a good place for me to revisit an area of Hong Kong in which I was brought up.  Marcos communicated effectively and clearly, he was helpful & kindly.  We would come again if the opportunity arose.

What an amazing location! We were so appreciative of Marco's responsiveness as we had some last minute travel changes, and unfamiliarity with the area trying to find the unit. He had great recommendations and was very helpful and friendly. Would love to stay here again!

Great professional landlord. What you see is what you get. Great location in the middle of Stanley Market. I have had the pleasure of staying with Marcos every year since 2015. Very positive experience.

name: A1 Tradewinds Ranch House (2 story)
summary: Tradewinds Ranch is a 30 acre ranch that resides in the quiet rural community of Punalu'u, the Ko'olauloa  Mountain District on the island of O'ahu. The ranch sits Mauka (mountain) side in front of Sacred Falls and is about 2 blocks (walking distance) from the iconic beaches of the north eastern shore of Oahu. Tradewinds Ranch is a ranch with farm animals:  cows, horses, chickens, ducks, sheep, goats, dogs, cats, frogs... etc.!  We are excited to share our slice of country with you!
space: We offer a very private Hawaiian country abode, free from crowding in urban centers in Hawaii that is truly a tropical-country style experience.  Our 30 acres working ranch features horses, dogs, cats, cattle, goats, sheep, chickens, donkeys, pigs, and peacocks. Our animals are apart of our family and roam free among us and there land. We hope our guest feel free and comfortable to enjoy our beautiful mountain views and walks down our country road.  We are a working ranch that is located in the mountainside of the jungly, rainy side of the island.  This can mean at times we'll have ants, termites and other critters or pests that are above and beyond the norm.  We do routinely exterminate and if ever there's a problem, you can give us a call. FULL DISCLOSURE: ABSOLUTELY NO EVENTS OR PARTIES CAN BE HELD ON THIS PROPERTY. Only the number of guests noted on the contract and the registered vehicles are allowed on the property.
description: Tradewinds Ranch is a 30 acre ranch that resides in the quiet rural community of Punalu'u, the Ko'olauloa  Mountain District on the island of O'ahu. The ranch sits Mauka (mountain) side in front of Sacred Falls and is about 2 blocks (walking distance) from the iconic beaches of the north eastern shore of Oahu. Tradewinds Ranch is a ranch with farm animals:  cows, horses, chickens, ducks, sheep, goats, dogs, cats, frogs... etc.!  We are excited to share our slice of country with you! We offer a very private Hawaiian country abode, free from crowding in urban centers in Hawaii that is truly a tropical-country style experience.  Our 30 acres working ranch features horses, dogs, cats, cattle, goats, sheep, chickens, donkeys, pigs, and peacocks. Our animals are apart of our family and roam free among us and there land. We hope our guest feel free and comfortable to enjoy our beautiful mountain views and walks down our country road.  We are a working ranch that is located in the mountainside
neighborhood_overview: The property is located on a 30 acre land and has amazing mountain views, farm animals, gorgeous sunsets and a true love of animals can be found here!
notes: There are beautiful beaches just down Kamehameha Hwy that you can walk to. The nearest grocery store, Tamura's Market, is located about 4 minutes up the road. The shopping center also has the following: Domino's Pizza - and they do deliver to the ranch Papa Ole's - amazing Hawaiian food Post Office Longs Drugs Hauula Clinic
transit: A rental car is STRONGLY recommended.  There is a bus stop off Kamehameha Highway in front of Puhuli Street. The bus service in Hawaii is very reliable.
access: To access the ranch:  Drive to the nearly the end of Puhuli Street.  On the left-hand side you will see a large Palm tree and American Flag.  The ranch is surrounded by a white fence.  Turn left just before the flag.  You will come to the main ranch gate that says "Tradewinds Ranch" on the posts above the gate.  Just prior to arriving, I'll be sending you detailed instructions on how to navigate to the ranch house once on-property.   The home is free standing and you will be the only people staying in the house. It has a private driveway with a gate you can close behind you to keep the farm animals at bay if you choose.
interaction: I also live on the property down the road and can assist you with whatever you need during your stay. Just shoot me a text or give me a call!
house_rules: FULL DISCLOSURE: ABSOLUTELY NO EVENTS OR PARTIES CAN BE HELD ON THIS PROPERTY. Only the number of guests noted on the contract and the registered vehicles are allowed on the property. The main ranch gate MUST BE CLOSED UPON EVERY ENTRY AND EXIT OF THE PROPERTY Smoking is allowed outside only. Please use the ash trays provided. Turn off all lights and power (such as fans, appliances, etc.) when leaving the house. People other than those in the Guest party per the reservation agreement may not stay overnight in the property.  Any other person in the property is the sole responsibility of Guest.  Guests are not allowed to exceed the occupancy limit agreed to above. Guests should not create excessive noise at a level that disturbs neighbors; Code-enforced neighborhood quiet hours are from 10:00p.m. – 8:00a.m. All of the units are privately owned; the owners are not responsible for any accidents, injuries or illness that occurs while on the premises or its facilities. The Homeowners are not

host.host_about:
My name is Joyce Lignell and I'm the partner of David Thielen who is the owner and creator/builder of our beautiful, private 30 acre ranch.  We're proud of this peaceful, rural place that is so rare on the island of Oahu.  There are very few places you can stay here that is an actual ranch yet only a couple of blocks away from the beach!  We have horses, cows, chickens, ducks, goats, sheep, frogs... you get the idea!  

We're excited you are considering staying with us in what we think is the most beautiful place on earth.

reviews.comments: We thought we were in heaven at Tradewinds Ranch!  I admit, that on approach to the house we were initially a little unsure as to what we were getting in to, but once we got to the house we could not have been more pleased!  The setting and location was absolutely perfect for us, and we just wish we had made more time to just "hang loose" at the house.   Our host treated us with a welcome gift of smoked ono that just came off the smoker that morning - and it was absolutely delicious!  The rooms were clean, and spacious.  We will DEFINITELY do this again!
Listing was as described.
Beautiful house. Just wish it worked out with my group. Abby was very helpfull with all the questions I had.

My (now wife) and I are transplants to the island for a year and a half now, and were getting married the day after Thanksgiving.  We had 22 friends and family flying out for it, 16 of which needed a place to stay.  Since we were getting married at Kualoa Ranch, we wanted something close by.  I put 7 of my friends up in the Loft, and 9 of my friends in the rental house on the same property.

Since my friends and I stayed at the Loft down the hill, I will be reviewing on part of my wife and her family.

All the feed back I received was the love of this home.  I was only in it twice during stay, once for a Thanksgiving dinner the night before the wedding, which will forever be a Thanksgiving dinner I will never forget, both for it's ability to accommodate the family, and the beautiful home it is.  It was beautiful, very clean, and decorated in a way you felt at home.  The deck was great, and the jungle back drop provided awesome sounds to wake up relaxed to.

Abby was great, very helpful through the booking process and getting us checked in.  If she is the property manager of a listing you are interested in booking, you will not go wrong working with her!

Abby is a terrific communicator and administrator of this location:  punctual, professional, accommodating.  The owner is equally enthusiastic and generous to make your stay the best.  The home was wonderfully spacious for our needs and if we needed anything, it would've been provided.  It took a few days to get used to the early morning rooster alarms but ear plugs helped.  Comfortable beds.  Many bugs outside.  Beautiful backdrop of mountains. Ranch is the perfect name for this location with all the animals.  Our group unanimously enjoyed the experience!

The house was very nice, very Spacious and less than a mile walk down the hill to a Beach. Don't be afraid of the Drive up, once your there it's Beautiful. It's On a Farm so there are Animals around but we Loved that.
This house was amazing. The place was spacious and located on a ranch. We were able to walk around and see all the animals.

Stayed here for 5 days with a group of 13 people. On the way to the location I agree with everyone that it seems a bit sketchy with the junk cars on the side of the road. The place is a bit hard to find during the day I couldn't even imagine in the night time, I would highly recommend checking in during day light as there is no lights on this unpaved road. Once inside the ranch is where the magic happens, you see the horses, cows, goats, donkeys, ducks, roosters... This place is lovely in the sense that you feel you are in the middle of nowhere and that's a good thing. The house itself is roomy and has been upgraded. The only real downside is you can't really have anybody over and you can't be too loud... What I mean by too loud is, we got a noise complaint when 4 of us were talking on the balcony past 10pm... Aside from the extremely strict rules, the house was great

If you like country living, seclusion and a true island experience,  this is the place for the family.  It fit our budget and accommodated a large family.  The owners were very responsive to our needs and communicated well.  The place is a bit tricky at first to find so make sure to check in during the afternoon.  Had a blast here!

The best part of the ranch house is the location. The area was close to the North Shore which is my favorite part of the island. I love that we were on a ranch with animals and surrounded by nature and very close to the beach. The host was also very nice and brought us fruit. I would definitely recommend this place.

Awesome place, great host, made our anniversary celebration special.  Animals were amazing and it was great to have 3 showers and so many beds.  We enjoyed the decks in the evening as well.  Sincere appreciation for host for hospitality.
Joyce was easy to work with. The place is beautiful and we enjoyed being in the country, away from the city.

Joyce is very sweet and a great host. Response was quick and the surroundings were beautiful. The animals are adorable and friendly. We were outside everyday looking for them as they roamed the ranch. Just what we needed to get away! Thank you Joyce!
It was really nice to be away from other people in a secluded place like this

Absolutely amazing place to stay. The hosts are fantastic and so kind. The ranch is beautiful, peaceful and definitely a place to stay if you want to relax. Very close to the beach, a short drive to stores and very much a true Hawaiian experience. Highly recommended!

We very much enjoyed Tradewinds Ranch. The house is very spacious and close to many attractions on the North Shore. Seven Brothers was recommended to us in the guidebook and we loved it. Their burgers were awesome and absolutely worth the price. We highly recommend the milkshakes and açaí bowls as well. Joyce was wonderful about communicating with us and Greta gave us some great tips too. Our favorite memory is definitely the morning we got up to go watch the sun rise on the beach and we had to get all the animals to move from the driveway. We found it quite entertaining and hilarious! Definitely recommend staying here.

The ranch house was a perfect place for our family’s thanksgiving trip. We weren’t expecting such an amazing experience for the great price! We were able to cook a full thanksgiving feast using one of the two fully loaded kitchens in the house. The area was really cool and secluded, with visits from the horses, goats, cows etc. Not only was the place great but Joyce and Dave are so fun, kind, and hospitable, hosting our whole family for drinks and pupu’s on our last night! I highly recommend Joyce and Dave’s place and we will be back!

My husband and I got married at Kualoa and were looking for somewhere to stay with our line for a few days. This Airbnb was the perfect spot for all of us! It was so spacious to get ready and have fun with our friends. The property was quaint and the house itself is beautiful! We didn’t want to leave! Thank you Joyce for being a wonderful host :)
Very quiet place close to the north shore.
Excellent 2 story ranch house for 8 people. Very well thought out decorating and flow plan. The Air B & B pictures don’t do it justice.
The place to go to feel the mountains spirit of Hawaii and to be 5 minutes away from the beach. Huge, huge house with 2 full kitchen, lots of beds and space. Safe and really charming .
A wonderful home away from home!

Off the beaten path - just what we were looking for.  The ranch is conveniently located close to the beach and near all the North Shore has to offer.  It is easy to get to and yet is not in a noisy, congested area. It was really a home away from home. 

Dave and Joyce were very welcoming and responsive.  They invited us to feel at home at the ranch and invited us to their home for a social gathering one night.  They gave us local pointers about the island and told us about a private waterfall on the ranch that we were able to find on one of our many walks.  

The house is well appointed and the materials are high end.  We rented the entire house and it worked out perfectly for our big family.  My kids loved the large tub with TV in the master bathroom. Rental of the entire house includes two separate kitchens and living rooms.  

When you first drive in the main road that you take to the Ranch has a number of abandoned vehicles  - which is quite common for Hawaii.  Apparently, people abandon cars because it is too expensive to get rid of them through legal means on the island. This is an ongoing issue and the owners are working on ways to eradicate this continuing problem. 

I would definitely recommend the Ranch.

Tradwinds ranch is a lovely place in a very scenic, rural area with the mountains in the back ground and the beach is 10- 15 min walk away. The house is clean and beautiful inside. There is a closed off balcony on the first floor which is perfect for wondering toddlers, and two upstairs balconies that are very peaceful at any time of day. Both Joyce and Dave seem very pleasant and all of the free wondering farm animal were friendly just be smart about kids around large animals. Overall very happy with our stay!

Our entire family had an amazing stay at the Tradewinds Ranch house. Joyce was extremely attentive and welcoming. The kids had a blast with all the animals on the farm. The property is a super relaxed environment- perfect for our family getaway!

Tradewinds Ranch was a dream for us.  It was absolutely perfect and exactly as described.  I would highly recommend this location for any family or group looking for a beautiful location away from the crowding and craziness of Waikiki.  Joyce was a truly exceptional host who made us feel like family guests far more than just customers.  We were welcomed on to the beautiful property and literally enjoyed every moment there.  The house was very clean, well maintained, and comfortable.  All beds were comfortable, and the layout was perfect for our family.  Joyce shared some farm fresh eggs with us, which we enjoyed very much.  We truly have nothing negative to say.  For those who have not been to Oahu, they should know that the ranch is in the "country" of Oahu, so it is a bit longer drive to some of the tourist attractions on the south of the island, but it offers easy access to the North Shore, and there are many beaches, the Polynesian Cultural Center, and other attractions very close.  The bottom line is that we had high expectations, but even our lofty expectations were exceeded by both the property and the host.  Both were exceptional.  Joyce is as good of a host as you will ever find on airbnb.

This is the perfect getaway location—set at the base of the mountains near Punalu’u. We loved the seclusion after being around people all day at the beach. Joyce is an excellent host and will do anything to make sure that everything is taken care of (she even left us a basket of fresh eggs and chocolates to welcome us). The house is a 20 minute drive to Kualoa Ranch, 10 minutes to Laie and the PCC, 45 minutes from Honolulu.
Beautiful ranch! loved our stay.

It was an amazing house, worked well for all of my family of 8. The up stairs and down stairs was just perfect. The rain in the am made the house cooler which made it better. The animals were really cool walking around. The time of year that we went was mosquito so bring stuff for that for sure.  Over all perfect

The place is spacious, both floors have full kitchens, baths and at least one bedroom. Lots of room to stretch out, if you need some “me time”. Loved hearing the chickens in the morning and seeing the other animals run around. 

Simply remember to give PLENTY of travel time when planning your activities. While distances aren’t far, traffic can get extremely heavy during the day.

Regardless, we LOVED staying here.

The Ranch House is very comfortable, is located in a quiet and beautiful zone. Joyce was very helpful and friendly, every time attentive to support our request. Me and my friends spent a great time in theTradewinds Ranch.

We were so glad that we were advised to stay on Oahu's north shore, and that we found Tradewinds Ranch on Air B&B. This is the real Hawaii, where the local folks live, while also providing easy access to several must-see tourist destinations like beaches, the Hawaiian Cultural Center, state parks, surf towns, hiking, and shopping. The house was wonderful and breezy, super clean and well-appointed. We were able to cook a full traditional Thanksgiving dinner for 8 with no problem, which we ate on the outdoor dining table on the deck; the fact that folks at home were experiencing the coldest Thanksgiving on record, with wind chills below 0, was just a bonus ;-) Comfy couches  and large TVs (with cable, WiFi, and a huge DVD collection) were perfect for rainy day movies, and a highlight was meeting the lovely and welcoming Joyce and Dave for a drink. The animals on the ranch were a fun touch, and the setting of the house, nestled in the jungle, was idyllic.
Joyce is quick to respond and is very kind.  House is large and comfy.  Chickens were fun and we felt at home.  Thanks so much.

This place is AMAZING. The house is beautiful with plenty of space. The entire property is so great. All of the animals on the ranch are so friendly too, we loved that part! For a unique and relaxing Hawaiian experience, we couldn’t recommend a better place to stay. We can’t wait to come back and stay here again. We can’t say enough about how great the entire experience was. Thank you Joyce & Dave!

Having stayed in the busy Waikiki area in past times, Joyce's place was the exact opposite.  It is country with a touch of luxury, with generous and spacious amenities, friendly neighbors, plenty of farm animals to feast your eyes on, and the list goes on.  Dave hosted us for an evening of drinks and tasty fresh catch, and stimulating conversation!  A shout out to Noah!  Our party of six Would definitely stay there again

name: Newly Renovated Studio Midtown East
summary: This furnished apartment is a stunning, newly renovated, private and luxurious, studio apartment in the heart of Manhattan. Residential, safe block that is VERY close to all! Fully furnished apartment, with everything one might need!
space: This furnished apartment  is a stunning, newly renovated, private and luxurious, studio apartment in the heart of Manhattan. Residential, safe block that is VERY close to all! Fully furnished apartment, with everything one might need! Just 2 flights up! Please note that the apartment is a studio and has 1 very comfortable queen-size bed and one double size firm sofa bed. The apartment is practically brand-new as everything was completely renovated in 2016. No expense has been spared to make your stay enjoyable and comfortable. All new kitchen with stainless steel appliances including microwave. All new bathroom with rain shower. Hardwood floors, Queen size pillow top mattress, sofa bed for additional guests. Full cable TV w/ WiFi and universal smartphone-tablet charging station. Thank you in advance for your interest.
description: This furnished apartment is a stunning, newly renovated, private and luxurious, studio apartment in the heart of Manhattan. Residential, safe block that is VERY close to all! Fully furnished apartment, with everything one might need! This furnished apartment  is a stunning, newly renovated, private and luxurious, studio apartment in the heart of Manhattan. Residential, safe block that is VERY close to all! Fully furnished apartment, with everything one might need! Just 2 flights up! Please note that the apartment is a studio and has 1 very comfortable queen-size bed and one double size firm sofa bed. The apartment is practically brand-new as everything was completely renovated in 2016. No expense has been spared to make your stay enjoyable and comfortable. All new kitchen with stainless steel appliances including microwave. All new bathroom with rain shower. Hardwood floors, Queen size pillow top mattress, sofa bed for additional guests. Full cable TV w/ WiFi and universal smartphone-t
neighborhood_overview: The area is extremely safe with five 24 hour doorman buildings on the block. Only a seven minute walk to the metro / subway and 2 blocks from the United Nations. Located at the crossroads of some of NYC's finest and most convenient neighborhoods including Turtle Bay, Beekman, Sutton and Midtown East. Prime location, safe and accessible to everything. In walking distance, you will find some of the finest restaurants and shopping in NYC. The ease of access to Broadway Shows and Times Square just across town makes this unit a wonderful starting and ending point for any holiday or business trip. Whole Foods is just 7 blocks away and 2 local supermarkets are within 2 blocks. The East River Promenade is 1 block away, having one of the city's best dog runs, water views and running paths. We look forward to your stay!
notes: or your additional comfort, we have also supplied a HEPA Air Purifier with UV-C which offers multiple levels of cleaning to help improve the indoor air quality. It features multiple levels of cleaning including HEPA, UV-C and charcoal. This air purifier captures 99.97% of particles down to .3 microns in size.
transit: This furnished apartment is only 4 short blocks from the 6, E and M subway lines. The crosstown bus is located on the block just a few steps from the apartment.
access: We try to personally greet each and every guest and help them enter the vacation rental unit. In the rare instances that we are not available, keys are made available for easy, worry free access.
interaction: We would love to meet you ;)

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: NYC Real Estate licensed broker, property owner and property manager professional with over 20 years of experience  and service.

reviews.comments: Evan & Maria were great. Their studio apartment had been recently renovated so everything was new and fresh. The location was fantastic and so was the service. I would definitely stay here again and I suggest that you stay here too.

4 girls in this studio over 5 days. This was perfect for us. The location is amazing and you have great bars and restaurants in walking distance! Evan and Maria are the nicest hosts I've ever had the pleasure to interact with. Soooo helpful and attentive! Would I stay here again? YES absolutely!!! 5 stars for this listing and the hosts and the location :) exactly as appears in the pictures. Thank you again Evan and Maria!!!

Evan & Maria were great hosts. They answer all my question and always show interested if i had any doubts of anything. I stay at the apartment with my parents and my sister and it was great! Perfect please and perfect location! I'll totally recommend this place for 2 or 4 people!

Great place, and Evan and Maria were very welcoming. This was my first Airbnb rental and I didn't know what to expect but I will be back. I came to NY for 2 weeks of work and found that I prefer the privacy and the availability of a small kitchen over a hotel any day. The studio is within a minute of several restaurants and a well-stocked small supermarket, and in walking distance of major tourist attractions.
From the beginning to the end the process felt really professional, I enjoyed the availability of our host. The neighborhood is great and the apartment was perfect.
The host made me feel very welcomed, wanted to know when I arrived and was there to greet me. The place was better than advertised and the neighborhood was great for someone who is visiting.

Evan and Maria greeted me when I arrived and helped me carry my bags up the stairs to their beautifully renovated apartment. Although it was a tiny bit smaller than I expected, the apartment is very thoughtfully arranged with plenty of storage space.  I stayed in the apartment for 2 weeks and never felt cramped.  In fact I hated to leave!  This lovely apartment is located in a very convenient neighborhood, and I'm certain I will return.  Thanks for a great stay!

Perfect rent in NYC! The renters are charming and try their best to accommodate with your check-in/out hours. The bed furnitures are excellent and the house offers clean and high-end kitchen equipment. Do not hesitate to rent!

I had a late check in and Evan was gracious enough to allow me to do this. The location of the apartment was convenient and the apartment itself was immaculate.  My first time in New York was great, and I would recommend this location to anybody here a stay.  They are a very nice couple and will give you great advice on where to go in the city.

Appartement cosy, refait à neuf et très bien placé.
Evan & Maria ont été des hôtes parfaits, toujours disponibles et très arrangeants.
Je recommande vivement cet appartement.

We loved our stay at Evan and Maria's chic home in Midtown! It was our first time in New York and enjoyed that it was central to so many things. The home is extremely well thought out as well. I liked how they maximized the entire space! And Evan was extremely helpful and accommodating! He responded back to all my messages promptly with very clear communication. I would highly recommend staying here again for our next NY visit!

Let me start by stating that it was my family's first time in the Big Apple and also our first time using AIRBNB so we have no idea what to expect when we arrive. Before I started with the inside of the apartment, like any property the most important is location, location and location. Evan & Maria's apartment is located at the heart of Manhattan. It is a walking distance to the Rockefeller Plaza and also to Times Square. There are several restaurants near the apartment and a deli just around the corner to get anything you wanted. 

Okay, now we begin with the apartment. It is very beautiful. Not only you can get anything you wanted but also you can tell the owner put a lot of their heart in to it. It is beautifully decorated and also very clean. 

On a personal note, we have the booking wrong, so we have to checked out a day earlier than we intended to. Evan and Maria were very nice and courteous about it. He texted us to let us know that we have to check out and patiently await our arrival, since we're on a ferry to Liberty Island, and help us find a hotel to move.

All and all it was a great experience even with the moving around and one thing for sure, if I ever in NY I will most definitely try to book Even and Maria super homey apartment.

Thank you Evan & Maria and good luck with the baby ...

yours truly,

The De Haans

Evan and Maria were accommodating with my check in and check out. They were clear with their instructions and welcoming. The apt. had a bottle of wine and chocolates which we appreciated! We had a chance to meet Maria and she gave us wonderful food recommendations!! Thank you Maria for telling us to call in our bagel order vs. waiting in line! The actual apt. is well decorated and very functional. We were very comfortable. 
Great location and lovely hosts!

We had the good fortune to stay in this amazing apartment for 4 nights while vacationing in the city for our 25th wedding anniversary.  The apartment is just as it appears in the photos: impeccably clean, modern, updated and cozy.  The bed and pillows were incredibly comfortable and provided a restful nights sleep after long days exploring the city.  Our adult daughter slept on the futon, and she was in heaven!  There were extra pillows, sheets and a comforter in the closet, and I'm not exaggerating when I say that she was more comfortable here than in the hotel room we stayed at during our first half of our trip.  The apartment had everything we needed: dishes, Keurig coffee and coffee maker (my #1 priority!), iron, hair dryer and much, much more!  There was a fantastic bottle of Pinot Noir that I thoroughly enjoyed and a jar full of Hershey's kisses (which we ate entirely too many of)!  Evan and Maria thought of everything; there is even an iPhone charger to use!  For NYC, it was very quiet and peaceful, which came as a pleasant and unexpected surprise to us.  The location can't be beat, close to great restaurants, parks,  & subways.  I'm sure I'm forgetting something, but let me end by saying that this apartment is so great that I want to live in it!  In fact, our daughter hopes to relocate to the city soon, and she took note of just how well Evan and Maria utilized the space and all the most wonderful details.  Well done.  Bravo!!!
Really clean updated apartment and the communication from both Evan and Maria was fantastic.
Room was very clean. With the queen bed and a sofa bed, our family of four were pretty comfortable. It's within walking distance to UN and other fun things in NYC.

Very nice, clean, new Studio at a quiet location @manhattan.  Nice shower, airco, complete kitchen. We were here with our 2 kids, what works really good. Easy to find, always accesible because of doormen next door. Friendly chat with Evan.

We had a wonderful stay at Evan and Maria's studio. 
From the very first email to checking out everything was smooth and pleasant.
The apartment is ideally located for visiting the Big Apple.
It is very well equipped, the bed is very comfortable, the bathroom is spacious and most importantly the apartment is very clean.
We hope that on our next stay in the city the apartment will be available.
