Highly recommended!!!

Perfect Location!! This beautifully furnished, modern apartment in New York was exactly what we were looking for. We were within walking distance to Time Square, Fifth Avenue, Broadway  and there was a little supermarket close by too. 
The hosts were super accommodating allowing us on short notice to check out later, and sorting out any problems or queries we had straight away. Loved our stay in New York. Would recommend this place and the city to everyone.
Very nice tiny apt in the middle of NYC. Just remodeled and very clean. Too tittle if you're planning to stay with a bigger group of friends.

Beautiful apartment, modern, clean and near of everything : subway, bus, 7min to Rockefeller center and 5th avenue! Evan and Maria were available all the time, and it was possible to store our luggages  because we are arrived before 3pm.
I would recommend this apartment to visit New York. 
Louise, Julie, Paul and Ludo

My time in NYC was amazing. Maria & Evans newly renovated studio was beautiful and clean. They were amazing host that made sure we had everything we needed. I would definitely stay again or recommend anybody to stay. It's close to any of the tourist attractions and close to a subway stops.

El apartamento es tal y como se ve en las fotos. Nuevo y muy bien equipado (hasta el último detalle). La estancia fue perfecta para nuestra familia de 4.
El colchón y los cojines muy cómodos.
Bien ubicado y próximo a metros.
Al disponer de calefacción central, nos lo encontramos caliente cada día al llegar, lo que se agradece cuando viajas con niños.
Evan & Maria have a beautiful apartment very well located in Manhattan, they've been great hosts as well, very communicative and always willing to help or guide us with everything. Very recommended.

Anything you want to do in Manhattan was easily accessible and most places were within walking distance. Grocery was around the corner, restaurants were just steps away and convenience around town was great. The hosts were kind, responsive and made our visit very comfortable.  The accommodations were very cozy. We would definitely return. They are also Foodies so ask them to hook you up!

Evan and Maria are great hosts they are easy to communicate with and answered every questions we asked and even gave us tips. Their unit is newly renovated and is close to everything. I recommend Evan and Maria's place to travelers who wants to explore the city and visit key spots and even less crowded spots in NYC.

Evan and Maria have been wonderful hosts during our stay in New York! We enjoyed very much staying at their place - thank you for your support and kindness! If we are going to visit NYC again, we for sure would like to be their guests again!

Evan and Maria's place is so amazing! it's close proximity whether you're trying to take the transit, or just wanna walk to Times Square or Rockefeller Plaza. There's also a good amount to do within the area, including restaurants and pubs. Evan and Maria are also amazing hosts who are great with communication and make sure that your stay is perfect.

AMAZING!!! Truly one of my fav airbnb experiences. I had the pleasure of meeting Evan in person after I was graciously allowed to check in early. This cozy space was nicely decorated, clean, and SO comfortable. The bedding was insanely soft. Not to mention full of thoughtful extras such as chocolate and a bottle of wine :) The location is also prime -- I know my way around NYC but for anyone who doesn't I'd highly recommend staying here, you're quite central and it's very easy to get around. I cannot say enough good things! Absolutely zero complaints. I hope to return!!

It is a great place to stay in New York. Very close to everything, nice neightborhood. Evan & Maria are great hosts, and always available to us. Definitely we wish to rent this apartment for the next travel to NY.
Evan & Maria were phenomenal hosts from booking to check out. Their place is beautiful with everything you need. Very close to major attractions.

We had a lovely visit in Evan and Maria's appartment. The location is perfect and you have walking distance to many great activities and restaurants. The flat was clean, roomy and well equipped. We would really recomend this appartment to all our friends and family.

We really enjoyed our stay in this apartment. It is absolutely beautiful and in a perfect location where you can reach a lot of things by foot in a couple of minutes. Evan & Maria are very lovely hosts and the communication was always great.

Emplacement idéal pour profiter de NewYork à 100%. Très bel appartement, magnifiquement décoré et équipé. Evan et Maria sont très arrangeants et réactifs. J'y retournerai lors de mon prochain séjour à New-York.

Very clean, functional, well situated, easy check in and some small attention that make you feel welcome. This was our first air b&b experience and it was better that what we expected. We recommend this place.

Evan & Maria's place is extremely well designed for guests; everything you need, and nothing you don't. The comfortable bed and huge shower were my favorite features. There are lots of restaurants nearby and transport to other parts of the city is easy. Communication with Evan was responsive and efficient and the check-in and out could not be any smoother. Highly recommended.

Wonderful stay!  The upscale residential neighborhood is gorgeous with enough restaurants/grocery/bars to be convenient, but also a nice break from the crowds of Times Square, Fifth Ave, etc.  Great public transit nearby and a quick walk or subway to the main sights.

Maria & Evan's place is newly renovated and super clean with high-end finishes.  It feels like a boutique hotel with charming touches for your comfort and while a studio - is very adequate for 1-2 persons.  There are zero personal items of the hosts and plenty of storage so you're not jamming your things in with their winter coats!  #beenthere

Communication was fast and smart and this is one of my fave Airbnb stays ever.  Please don't book when I want to come back!!
Great stay! Great hosts! Very nice flat.

Evan and Maria are the most responsive hosts we had so far! Sometimes in seconds, always really quick.... In between they kept in touch and helped us with every question that occurred. Evan was very generous with the checkout: oour flight was at 11 p.m. and we could stay till evening for there was no booking for that day. So we felt absolutely good.
The Appartement itself is REALLY good. New, nice and clean. For Europeans: A studio is a one room flat. Ideal for two persons, but you COULD cramp in more people. Kitchen is small but convenient. Everything you need is there. The whole process of checking in is really easy and 24h service is provided through a doorman. So arriving at night should be possible. The flat is two flights up and no elevator. The surrounding area feels safe at night. Metro is 700 m. away, the next grocery at the corner. Here you will find a really good choice of food and stuff.We liked this place a lot and felt very much at home. So we highly recommend it.

Perfect location in midtown east. Apartment was gorgeous and very well equipped with most everything you'd need.  Close to times square and metro.  Evan and Maria were easily accessible.  Just a fantastic trip.  Thanks again for the use of your apartment!!

The flat is in a perfect location and very safe and quite. You can sleep very good and the flat is absolute comfortable. We were 4 girls and had a great time with cooking and chilling in the flat after 12 hours walking in nyc. We came "home" in evan and marias flat! So it is a very, very nice and real nyc appartment that make your stay perfect!
Wonderful! Great location, communication, very clean and the best hosts. I would count myself lucky to have the opportunity to stay here again.
Great place.  Attentive hosts next door.  Great restaurant right below.  Close enough to theatre

Evan and Maria's apartment is perfectly located, with only a short walk to Times Square we had no trouble getting around. The apartment was a great size for my girlfriend and I, which had ever we needed. Freshly renovated and felt very private.

A perfect spot to spend three days with our daughter in NYC! Comfortable, well-appointed, and chic, this apartment had everything we needed and more. It was so nice to have a kitchen, as we made breakfasts every morning. Evan checked in with us often, and was very hospitable. A small mixup with the key at the beginning, but it was quickly solved. We would definitely stay here again on our next trip to NYC!

This apartment is so cute and clean and tastefully decorated. We were very comfortable during our stay.   The location is great, near great restaurants and shopping. Evan and Maria were great hosts, very accommodating and friendly. We would definitely stay here again.

Very Happy.  Clean and only two short flights up.  Near many good local eateries of different countries.  Loction was pefect fr our needs, only sort wlk to subway and othe attractions.  Will sty with them again.

Great value for money and overall experience! The place is a gem - many tourist attractions are within walking distance while the neighborhood is calm and quiet. Apartment itself is brand new and Evan and Maria provide all necessities - best Airbnb experience I've had!

Very nice apartment with hotel-like amenities, including strong WiFi.  Evan was incredibly responsive to booking and check-in/check-out questions. Apt. is on 3d floor so you have to use stairs as there isn't an elevator. It wasn't a problem for me, but it might not be to the liking of some. Great mid-town location was perfect for business travel. I will definitely be back!

Wonderful choice for me and my three friends who wanted somewhere to stay for our first trip to New York! The place is amazingly well equipped (kitchen stuff, bathroom stuff, extra bedding, nice TV with Netflix, even a jar of Hershey's kisses on the table). We loved the decorations especially! Check in and check out was flawless with good communication over text and email. We had a late flight and the hosts were above and beyond accommodating with letting us store our luggage downstairs so we didn't have to lug them around during or last day. The neighborhood is very nice and pleasantly quiet, which is a rare find in the city. We got around fine the whole week with our subway card and walking. Will definitely make sure to look at this place again if we come back to New York. Don't forget to sign the visitors book if you decide to book!

We had a great stay in the appartement. Everything was like we expected it to be, the pictures and descriptions fitted very well.  As Evan and Maria told us before, it might be a bit small for four person, we would agree on that, for two or three it is perfect, but for us four it worked also. The appartement is located in a very quiet and safe area. 
Thank you very much. We would definitly recommand your place!
Terrific hosts, terrific location and terrific apartment. A well-designed, well-thought space.
Stylish and very clean flat, with a great location to explore the city. Communication with the thoughtful hosts was prompt and easy. Our stay was exactly what we were hoping for!

The apartment is perfect for couples. Maybe a bit tight for more than that. Evan & Maria are the perfect hosts. Prompt, helpful and very conscientious in providing a great stay. Very sweet to find a lovely bottle of red wine waiting for us! The bathroom is beautifully updated with a huge shower, wee sink and a toilet you kind of have to sit sideways on LOL. Spotlessly clean!! All you need in a kitchen and again spotlessly clean. The bed is ultra comfy and we slept soundly until 7am everyday when the neighbor would honk his nose in the shower (like three times, every morning, like clockwork) luckily we were up and out everyday early so it made us giggle. Walls are thin in NYC!
The location is fantastic, just a short walk to the East River and great eateries and bars on 1st and 2nd. 
Quiet residential road. We would definitely book this again!
Great!

This place is perfect. Great location(7 min walk to subway, and next to tons of restaurants and shops), exquisitely decorated and extremely clean. Check in and check-out we're easy. Reasonable price. Definitely recommend this place!

We loved staying in Evan and Maria's place!  Definitely worth 5 stars in every category.   Our favorite thing was the location.   We walked almost everywhere.    It was very convenient to mid town activities including Rockefeller Center, Times Square, and Central Park (south).  There were so many restaurants in the neighborhood that you cannot try them all.  Evan had lots of good suggestions to help us choose.    We liked the pizza place on the corner, the Ideal Cheese Shop and the local grocery store.  The Citibikes also worked well on dedicated bike lanes going north and south along 1st and 2nd ave right by the apartment, along the Hudson and the East River,  and in Central Park.   There is a bike shop across the street if you need a helmet.  

The studio apartment is very well maintained.    It looked just like the pictures.  It was comfortable for all 3 of us;  we stayed 6 nights.  Note, the arrival  instructions only come the day before you arrive.    They were clear,  it was very easy find, and flexible in terms of timing.

Staying at this apartment is the perfect mix between staying in a hotel and a private residence.  The decoration is absolutely top-notch and you feel like you are in a nice, modern hotel but with out the fuss of a hotel experience.  The location of this apartment is fantastic and we were able to walk just about anywhere we wanted to. 

We would stay here again in a heartbeat!

The appartment is excellent, according with the description. Evan & Maria was always connected to solve any question about the appartment. The level of service was oustanding.
The location is great, close to the metro, a supermarket zround the corner and a very beatifull and quite area. An excellent choice for a couple in New York. We would be happy to return in the near future.
We loved how clean and well designed the apartment is. Location is also great.

Incredible use of small space. Charming, comfortable, quiet.  Great location, near subways and buses.  We also walked back and forth from east side to Theater District several times with no problem.  If you’re looking to prepare meals from scratch, the kitchen is really not stocked with enough cookware.  But there’s a big microwave and plenty of dishware for simple meals or heating up meals you bring in.  Bed was comfortable for the 4 nights we were there.  AC and fan kept us cool.  Warning...if you’re large or tall, you might find the bathroom toilet and sink space tight, but the shower is really big and nice.   We managed to get suitcases up the 2 short flights of stairs and going down and up without them was not a problem.  Lobby is a bit dark and not particularly clean, but Evan & Maria’s studio is a little oasis and very tastefully furnished.  Nice big TV.   They responded very quickly to any questions we had.  Check in procedure was easy, even for us first-time Airbnb-ers.

Evan and Maria's place was perfect!  It is such a charming place with great interior design.  Very clean and well laid out.  The location was also great!  The area felt very safe, is close to a subway and very easily navigable.  

Evan and Maria were incredible hosts and communication was very easy, prompt and clear.

I would recommend this place to anyone!
Wonderful experience and accurately described.  Would stay again!

C’était notre première expérience avec Airbnb, et nous n’avons pas été déçus. Pas de surprises, l’appartement est identique aux photos !!
Décoré avec goût, très propre,  silencieux, et surtout idéalement placé. 
Merci encore à Evan pour sa disponibilité, sa gentillesse et sa réactivité.
Nous conseillons les yeux fermés, et nous reviendrons c’est certain !!

Amazing place, loved everything about it. Very nicely decorated, clean and close to everything.  Evan and Marie were very accommodating to our needs. Would definitively return and recommend. Thank you

Beautiful place, great location, useful and prompt communication from the host. 
Accommodation is abit of a squeeze for 4 adults but we didn't spend much time there (as so busy sights seeing)- so it didn't really matter! 
Thanks so much.

Let me just say......I very rarely write reviews but you need to know that this is a great apartment. I’ve just got back to the UK. 
Location. 10/10. Less than 10 minute walk to subway. A choice of 2 stations and one is the E line that takes to to/from JFK. 
Quiet block considering that it is a central location. We walked to Grand Central in about 20 minutes. 
Cleanliness. I’ll mark it down by half a point due to lipstick marked glasses nd dirty coffee cups. No big deal, but others might find it rather unpleasant. Other than that it was IMMACULATE. 
The bed is super comfy. Better than my bed at home that has a £2000 memory foam mattress on it ! Superb. 
Check in. A slight issue when Maria thought we were 2 days early but all was good in the end. Didn’t meet Evan or Maria. Collected the keys from the doorman at their apartment block next door. He was a bit stern but no problem. He allowed us to store our cases in a small storeroom. 
Good shower. Point of note. This is a studio apartment. The bed is in the lounge. You also have a sofa and a small table with chairs and a coffee table. 
Small kitchenette but we only used the coffee maker and put some milk in fridge. You couldn’t really make a meal there as it’s quite small but who goes to New York to cook ??!!??
There are about 18 steps from the street to the apartment front door so if you’re elderly or have bid heavy suitcases you might struggle. 
We had a great time in New York. This was a fantastic apartment that met all our needs.

Logement idéal pour visiter NEW YORK.

L'emplacement, les équipements, la propreté et la déco des lieux sont tops. De plus les propriétaires sont très sympathiques. Je vous conseille vivement!

The location is perfect. It's a quiet block and you can easily walk from the apartment to many sights. The apartment is a bit small for 4 adults but it'll do if you are sightseeing most of the day. Evan replied very quickly to our questions, and check in was very easy and comfortable

Es un apartamento muy acogedor. Pequeño pero con todo lo necesario para pasarlo cómodo 4 personas. Muy bien ubicado porque es accesible a todo. Me encanta porque es calientito para cuando uno llega.  Hay cerca un supermercado. María y Evan son muy atentos para cualquier información. Definitivamente muy bien recomendado.

This place is the best! Perfect location and perfect amenities. I would stay there forever if I could. 

We had two daughters with us and while it was tight, no more so than any hotel room in nyc plus having access to kitchen was essential.
The location is wonderful, and the suite although small has everything and tastefully done.

Evan & Maria have a fab rental, clean, stylish and the perfect base to have while we discovered New York for the first time! While we were out exploring all day and most of the night it was great to know we had the apartment to return to over a hotel as it was our own private, comfortable space where we could unwind and relax. Initially we used uber to get around but then once we figured out the streets we chose to get the subway or walk it was alot easier tjan a taxi, cheaper and with a good location, everything was easy to get to! Whilst we didnt need Evan and Maria during our stay we always knew they would be on hand to help us if needed, check in and out was quick and easy and they were only a phonecall or message away! If returning to New York again we would definately choose to stay in this apartment and recommend to friends! Some personal recommendations we had would be; 230 fifth avenue roof top bar, ellens stardust diner for breakfast, the comedy cellar for a stand up show and emilys close by to the venue for the best burger I've ever had, red rooster for a gospel brunch, chelsea market, the rockettes christmas show, brooklyn bridge and then eating at Grimaldis the other side and then the black tap for the most indulgent milkshake I've ever had!

Dear Evan and Maria,
we had a great stay in your flat in New York City. It was very comfortable and beautiful. Thanks that you was always so kind to us. You was a very good host. Greetings from Germany,
Christian & Sandra
This place is amazing! It is very clean and orderly. We were very pleased with the space!
This place is a gem in New York. Safe place. Good location. Amazing hosting and constant communication throughout our stay. Phenomenal. Thank you Evan and Maria for everything.

We enjoyed our stay at Evan and Maria’s place over the New Years period. The place was very clean and organised with everything we needed inside. I loved having a hairdryer and hair straightener to use after travelling for a few weeks!! 

Their communication was excellent as they responded to all messages promptly and provided some good suggestions of places to visit. 

As we were staying during the cold snap we did find that the studio apartment was a bit  chilly. Once contacting Evan and Maria they explained how to turn the old style heater on. It was easy to follow the instructions however we did find that the heater was quite loud and sounded like a steam machine. If we had the heater on at the same time as the tv it was quite hard to hear what was happening on the tv. Other than the noise of this heater, it did work quickly to heat up the studio apartment. 

Overall we had a great time visiting New York and would stay here again, preferably in summer as we are not used to this kind of cold weather in Australia! 

Thanks for having us :)

The studio was comfortable and well located. The subway entrance is close and there are many restaurants around the apartment. The place was clean and Evan and Maria offered help and recommendations about anything we asked. I would say It is a good place to stay!
Really beautiful place. I d stay there again.

Evan and Maria’s place is wonderful. An amazing value in New York with everything you need, down to the bottle opener, power converters, hair dryer and matches for the lovely candles. They also had a bottle of wine and some Hershey kisses waiting for us, which was a beautiful touch. I had to use the WiFi for work and was able to seamlessly get a few things done while on vacation. Great for an all-purpose stay and in a great location close to Murray Hill/Grand Central. Check in was super easy and baggage storage came in handy on the last day since we had time between checkout and our bus home. Overall, fantastic!

All that it appears to be in the photos and site description.  Super clean and nice touches. Very clever remodel, uses every inch of space and it’s very comfortable. Third floor walk up, no elevator, but not a big deal.  Charming oasis, great communication.

We had at a conference at the UN and this couldn’t have been a more perfect location. The apartment was very clean and modern and the hosts have done a great job stocking it with the essentials for a short trip to nyc! We will definitely be coming back!
Evan and Maria were excellent hosts, responding quickly with any needs or questions we had. The space was super clean and really comfy. The location of the apartment is quiet and easy to get to.

Very comfortable place even for 4 adults. We had a very good time in the appartement. 
The hosts are reactive and professional.
Thanks to Evan, Maria and the 333’s doorman :)
Wonderful hosts and a beautiful space!

A mi parecer la mejor opción para alojarse en Nueva York para 2 o 3 personas, el departamento esta perfectamente bien ubicado, completamente amueblado y no le falta nada, es un piso por escalera pero en ningún momento genera una incomodidad, Evan & Maria son excelentes anfitriones, el departamento estaba listo 3 horas antes del ingreso lo que hizo super facil la llegada ya que no tuvimos que estar esperando en la calle con las valijas (aunque Evan & Maria ofrecieron quedarse con las maletas hasta hacerse el horario de ingreso pero no fue necesario), una opción la cual no tiene ni desperdicio ni van a encontrarle una contra.

Loved our stay at Evan & Maria’s place! Great location, within walking distance to trains and great eats (The Smith!!!). They even left a complimentary vino bottle & voucher to a nearby restaurant and bar. They were always quick to respond & went further to accommodate our luggage we hoped to leave in storage for a few hours.
There’s a box under the coffee table with guides and great info for exploring the city. Definitely use em!! As a resident of Manhattan the past 5 years, I was pleasantly surprised at how up to date their guides were. 

Thanks Evan & Maria for making my boyfriend’s NYC trip a great one!! Have been recommending to all our friends & family already:)
Evan & Maria reached out to us as soon as the reservation was made and there was great communication throughout the entire visit.
Manhattan studio space with luxurious feel and great location. Close to pubs and restaurants but far enough away to not being bothered by noise. Can only recommend.
Very good location for theater goers, many excellent neighborhood restaurants, clean, comfortable, and spacious apartment.

El apartamento era muy acogedor, silencioso y limpio. Evan y Maria nos ayudaron con todas la dudas que tuvimos antes y durante la estancia en New York. 

El apartamento era igual que las fotos del anuncio y las camas muy cómodas, sobretodo la cama de matrimonio, el sofa-cama también era muy cómodo.

The studio was spotless!
It was beautifully decorated.
The bed was very comfy.
The location was SUPERB!
Easy check in/out.
Fabulous communication with the hosts who helped us with planning restaurants etc.
The hosts had wine, chocolates & coffee pods waiting for us :)
We had an EXCELLENT stay & will definitely return.

Clean, modern studio close to some GREAT restaurants. The three of us were very comfortable. Not too far from the subway and about a half hour walk to Times Square. Windows faced the building next door, but we were out exploring during the day, so it didn’t bother us. Evan and Maria responded to emails promptly and we enjoyed the sweet little extras!

Evan and Maria's place was perfect and exactly as described! The neighborhood felt safe and was a short walking distance (a block!) to a 24-hour grocery store, a coffee shop, and great restaurants. Check-in was really easy and Evan and Maria were in touch the entire time to make sure the process went smoothly. The apartment is only two flights up and was sparkling clean when I arrived. The apartment exceeded my expectations- the space was nicely decorated, the bed felt new and was extremely comfortable, the kitchen was well-equipped, the shower had great pressure and hot water, and the building/surrounding area was peaceful and quiet after dark. It was a great place to come home to after my conference meetings and visiting the city. I can't think of a single drawback except that the apartment doesn't get a lot of natural light and the space around the toilet would be tight for someone six feet tall (but these things didn't affect me at all).  I've stayed in NYC a few times now and this was one of the most easiest and relaxing experiences thanks to this great airbnb. I would highly recommend Evan and Maria's place and would love to stay there again!
Great!
Enjoyed visiting NYC and staying at Evan & Maria's place. The apartment was clean, the hosts were responsive and the location was convenient.

Evan and Maria are warm and responsive hosts who provided a lovely clean and well appointed space as described. Excellent location with a wide choice of restaurants in the immediate vicinity and convenient to a supermarket on 2nd Ave. Easy walk to subway and the heart of Manhattan. The box of maps and travel hints was a welcome bonus to help get around the fabulous city.

Absolutely loved the stay at Evan and Maria’s place. The apartment was spotless and matched its description perfectly. The neighbourhood was safe and surprisingly quiet considering it’s central location. It’s within walking distance of a lot of tourist attractions and a subway station. The box of maps under the coffee table came in very handy too! Evan was lovely and quick to respond to any messages. Overall we couldn’t have asked for a better experience on our first trip to NYC. I would highly recommend this place.
최근에 리모델링된 이 숙소는 깨끗하고 예쁜 아파트입니다. 안전한 지역에 위치하고 있고 주변에 레스토랑과 마켓이 있어 매우 편리합니다. 호스트는 게스트를 세심하게 신경써주었고 게스트의 요청에 바로 답변을 주어 지내는 동안 아주 편안했습니다. 뉴욕을 또 방문하게 된다면 다시 묵고싶은 집입니다.
The location is great with delicious restaurants nearby, a 24 hour grocery and an easy walk to the subway or grand central station.   The apartment is clean and quiet.

la casa di Evan e Maria è molto graziosa, ben arredata e moderna. Evan è stato estremamente disponibile nel risolvere un problema di linea internet e tv via cavo che si era presentato una sera. la casa presenta tutti i comfort ed è ben posizionata in una via tranquilla.   La casa ha una cucina molto moderna e super attrezzata. un bel bagno con una doccia bellissima. 
unico piccolo neo: è un po' piccola per 4 persone e il divano letto non è proprio un matrimoniale. In ogni caso ci siamo adattati e siamo stati benissimo

My mom and I spent a week in NY and Evan & Maria’s place was perfect for us. Walking distance to a lot of restaurants, we walked back from Times Square a few times and it was easy and felt safe all the time. Their place is just like the pictures. The bed is super comfy as well as the sofa bed. Soft sheets. Little cute kitchen if you want to make something quick before you leave. Spacious shower. Over all, it was perfect. Thank you Evan and Maria!!

We enjoyed our stay in this apartment very much. Perfect location, attractive furnishings. The apartment was very clean. Communication with the owners went smoothly. Questions were answered within a very short time. The accommodation is worth 5 stars!

Evan & Maria’s place is perfect! We stayed for 1 week and couldn’t get enough of our apartment and the comfort we felt coming back home to this space after busy days spent taking in Manhattan. The apartment had the feel of luxury with super soft bedding and towels, mod cons and a lovely bottle of wine and Chocolates to welcome you. The location is ideal, east 49th street, only a short walk to the Rockefeller and Times Square and subway nearby means nothing feels inaccessible from your room. Before travelling to New York we considered whether a hotel would suit us better but having stayed here no hotel in this price range would match the standard we received. Thank you again to Evan and Maria for a wonderful first visit to New York!
Brilliant location, fantastic studio and such a comfy bed. We loved how quiet the apartment was. Everything was just a short walk away. Highly recommend staying here

Evan and Maria were the perfect hosts. They are extremely friendly, helpful and quick to reply to queries. We especially appreciated their flexibility and bag storage as we had inconveniently timed flights. The actual apartment was well located, clean, modern and beautifully furnished. It also had every amenity you could think of. There were things like extra towels, napkins, an ironing board, a bag of ice in the freezer and so many more that you wouldn't typically be provided but were so handy to have. As I was travelling with a friend, we made use of the sofa bed as well. This was very comfortable (although a little squeaky!) and allowed us our own space within the apartment over our 2 week stay. The area was quiet and safe with plenty of restaurants and the subway nearby. The Smith was a favourite just around the corner! Our entire stay was a joy and could not have been easier, we recommend staying here highly.
Super gelegen, blitzsauber und unkompliziert. Restaurants direkt vor der Haustür (Ramen gegenüber, top).

El departamento muy bien equipado y ubicado cerca de muchos lugares que queríamos conocer. A pesar de ser un departamento chico, contaba con todo lo necesario para la estadía y muy bien ambientado. Muy limpio y contábamos con los accesorios para poder mantenerlo limpio, lo cual es muy importante para nosotros. La atención de Evan y Maria inmejorables. Definitivamente volveríamos.
Appartement conforme à la description, propre, bien décoré et surtout très bien situé pour visiter Manhattan. Hôtes sympathiques et disponibles. Bref, une bonne adresse pour ses vacances !

l'appartamento è pulito e confortevole per due persone. Abbiamo avuto qualche problema con il riscaldamento (la prima notte era caldissimo mentre le sere seguenti abbiamo avuto un po' freddo) ma Evan ci ha informato tempestivamente che purtroppo si trattava di un problema di tutto l'edificio e stavano cercando di risolverlo. l'appartamento è in una posizione strategica per visitare la Midtown. A pochi minuti di cammino dalla 5th Av., Rockfeller center, MoMA e Central Park. Consiglio l'appartamento al massimo per due persone visto che si tratta di un monolocale.

This space was beautiful and well designed.  Everything we needed was provided.  Location was very walkable.  The building entry was plain and historic, but everything in the space was perfection. 

The restaurant downstairs was also beautiful. 

Great hosts!

Sheryl

The location is perfect step off point for anyone wanting to explore the area around Rockefeller Plaza. Everything one could want is within walking distance of the apartment. Comfortable warm studio  in a quite neighborhood. We will be back!

This was a great place to stay! It was clean and cozy, a great location which was easy to either walk or take transit to attractions and was on a nice quite street. Lots of really good restaurants and shops around which was convenient if you needed something close by. Evan was quick to respond to any questions or concerns. We really loved this place and would definitely stay here again.

We really like this place. Well located, it is not too close to the metro stations, but the walk is a pleasure. We went to almost all the sights on foot. It is a single place, small but comfortably accommodates a couple with 1 or 2 children. There are a lot of Supermarkets close . Comfortable bed, good bedding, good shower, heating, wifi, TV. Evan and Maria were extremely attentive and promptly responded to our contacts. We certainly recommend this appartment.
Place was grate for a studio close to many restaurants and about 7 blocks from time square . I would definitely recommend this place .

At the risk of being overly effusive, Evan and Maria’s place was exactly as described and more. It’s ideally located in an attractive, vibrant-and somehow at the same time-quiet neighborhood, in proximity to transportation, restaurants, grocery stores, shopping, museums, theatre, and cultural attractions of every sort. The unit itself is like a luxurious little Midtown pied-à-terre. It has a well appointed stainless steel kitchen, full sitting area, comfortable bed, dedicated work space, and the shower in the bath is nearly a religious experience. The building is quiet, and the schlep is only two flights up. Evan was efficient, prompt, and even warm in his communication. Our stay there allowed us to focus on the experiences we value most during our trip to NYC.
I stayed here for a week for a solo vacation in New York, and I couldn’t have asked for more. This is in a great location, is super clean, and feels so homey. It felt like a home away from home.
Evan & Maria's place is lovely, and located in a great part of NYC.  I'll be back!
Fantastic place and absolutely spotless. I really appreciated the quiet in the middle of a bustling urban environment. Highly recommended.

name: Very Convenient Apartment
summary: Very convenient and well equipped apartment close to the City. Fully Firnished Bills included, including Internet Bus stops outside the front door- 10 min walk to Redfern Train Station/ Go Get outside the apartment.
description: Very convenient and well equipped apartment close to the City. Fully Firnished Bills included, including Internet Bus stops outside the front door- 10 min walk to Redfern Train Station/ Go Get outside the apartment.

name: 2017 , férias no Rio
summary: Casa com excelente espaço, localizada no meio da natureza, próximo ao um dos acessos do Parque Estadual da Pedra Branca, que conta com cachoeiras e trilhas na Mata Atlântica e a 10 minutos de carro ou 35 minutos a pé do Parque Olímpico (3.5km) e 3 minutos de carro ou 12 minutos a pé da Vila Olímpica. A casa pricipal conta com 2 quartos com suíte, 2 salas, cozinha, 1 banheiro social e área de serviço.Também contamos com um anexo com 1 quarto com suíte. Os quartos poderão ser compartilhados!

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: Ótimo para relaxar! O espaço de Alice é confortável e tranquilo, onde podemos caminhar com segurança desfrutando de uma linda paisagem com serras.Uma vegetação exuberante. Além da possibilidade de fazer uma trilha para cachoeiras.  Alice e sua família foram bastante prestativas e nos ajudaram no que precisamos. Grata por tudo!

name: Beautiful views of Sugar Loaf
summary: Room with view of Sugar Loaf. Private bathroom, TV, air conditioning (split), WiFi, breakfast. 130 m from the Metro and Shopping Botafogo. One metro station from Copacabana Beach and next to the gastronomic district of Botafogo.
description: Room with view of Sugar Loaf. Private bathroom, TV, air conditioning (split), WiFi, breakfast. 130 m from the Metro and Shopping Botafogo. One metro station from Copacabana Beach and next to the gastronomic district of Botafogo.

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: It was a great experience. Ione gave me a lot of help on knowing the Rio and my travel plan! The room is very nice and clean. Every stuffs in the room are nice clean and beauty.

A Ione foi uma ótima anfitriã, altamente receptiva e bastante atenciosa. Deixou-nos muito à vontade durante a nossa estadia e inclusive foi flexível em certos aspectos. Sem contar que o papo é ótimo...
un exelente alojamiento, muy buena ubicacion ,seguro, todo cerca, ione prepara el mejor desayuno. la vista que tiene  su departamento es unica. nos sentimos muy comodos en la estadia.
