host.host_about: Muy deportista, tennis es mi pasion, caminar por la ciudad, hacer amigos internacionales con buen gusto y educados, hacer relaciones familiares de por vida y viajar mucho.

reviews.comments:
La experiencia de estancia en el departamento fue excelente, Oscar fue muy atento, incluso días antes de mi llegada a Barcelona, sus atenciones hacia mi y mi roomie fueron excelentes. El departamento esta muy bien ubicado, puedes encontrar todo tipo de tiendas, transporte público, restaurantes, etc a la vuelta de la esquina. El departamento está en excelentes condiciones y está increíble, muy cómodo y espacioso. 

Fue una excelente experiencia!!! (:

name: Room on the waterfront
summary: Welcome to Manly and our beautiful seaside apartment. I hope you will enjoy your stay here being only a short walk to Manly while being so close to the beach.
space: Go to sleep listening to the waves from your queen size bed looking over Fairy Bower Beach.
description: Welcome to Manly and our beautiful seaside apartment. I hope you will enjoy your stay here being only a short walk to Manly while being so close to the beach. Go to sleep listening to the waves from your queen size bed looking over Fairy Bower Beach. You have your own private room with shared bathroom and kitchen facilities I will be around to offer any suggestions on the best local spots/things to do.  While always available I also respect my guests privacy so that they can enjoy their seaside stay. A 7 minute walk from all the cafés in Manly. Across the path from Fairy Bower Beach - a marine reserve waiting for you to swim, paddle board or snorkel 12 walk to Manly Ferry, buses and taxis
neighborhood_overview: A 7 minute walk from all the cafés in Manly. Across the path from Fairy Bower Beach - a marine reserve waiting for you to swim, paddle board or snorkel
transit: 12 walk to Manly Ferry, buses and taxis
access: You have your own private room with shared bathroom and kitchen facilities
interaction: I will be around to offer any suggestions on the best local spots/things to do.  While always available I also respect my guests privacy so that they can enjoy their seaside stay.
house_rules: Considerate guests are welcome to treat the place as it was their own.  Its easy - Respect all shared spaces and clean up after you to leave the room as clean as you found it.

host.host_about:
Outgoing  New Zealander who after living in the UK and in France decided to return to the beach life at Manly.
I've spent 20 years in Manly and have become part of the community.
I love the outdoors and swim all year round at the beach at my doorstep.
My favourite time is being at the outside  but being
a kiwi I love being anywhere to watch a rugby match.

I'm looking forward to sharing my home with considerate, outgoing people who want to make the most out of life.

reviews.comments: This place is a gem. Maria is super friendly and generous with her time and pantry supplies. The water really is that close!! The location spectacular to look at and snorkel or just chill out with a coffee on the walkway. The room is very spacious and the window seat just makes you want to connect with your inner cat. We had an amazing time and can't wait to plan another trip to Sydney.
Maria is a great host made us feel at home straight away. The room is amazing and makes relaxing a breeze.

Maria and her partner Gerry were warm, quiet and friendly. I was made welcome and provided with plenty of directions to find the beautiful space which was shared with me... The bay window photo says it all about the iconic building and the sensational location. For me , real is what I love to experience, and real is what I got... The location and neighbourhood  make this a perfect relaxation point... Older style building with charm and character and great food and coffee right under the window and 5 mins oceanside walk into Manly...

First experience in Manly with Maria is really wonderful. The room is so spacious and bright just as displayed in the album. We enjoy the sunrise and breakfast on that colourful balcony very much. Maria and her husband are warm sunshine in chilly windy Sydney. We really appreciate their hospitality and kindness. Looking forward to our next visit to that shiny sea and this cute accommodation.

We loved our stay at Maria's. You could not get any closer to the water and her and her hubby were super friendly and welcoming.

We will be back!

Maria's hospitality is amazing and makes her guests feel most welcome. We arrived a little later in the evening, and she had all our needs taken care of. Her apartment is in an amazing location, 10min walk to the centre of Manly, and overlooks the ocean. It was a pleasure to stay with Maria and would like to return to experience the location again.
Very well presented and an amazing position !
Very good - great position and Maria and Jerry were lovely

Maria's and Jerry's place is a real gem!! I've Airbnb-ed a lot in the past months here in Sydney and I must say this place was my absolute favourite of all :) It's a cosy piece of paradise with the most beautiful view, directly above the ocean, super huge bedroom that feels like its own little apartment, incredibly cute decorations, a super comfy huge bed, extremely lovely hosts and a neighbourhood and area that is truly feeling like a millionaires paradise :) Sitting in the pillows at the huge window, or hearing the ocean in bed and having a coffee, ocean breeze or swim right below the apartment felt like the ultimate vacation, I can't recommend it enough!! :) Thank you to both of you for sharing your little paradise :)

Amazing location, snorkelling, surfing & gorgeous shelley beach right on your doorstep. Loved coffee at the boathouse and falling asleep to the sound of the ocean. Maria & Jerry are great hosts,very friendly and helpful. Their apartment is in a worldclass location. Stunning. Felt priviliged to stay there.I had a great time. Thanks guys,will see u all soon! X

La habitación es muy cómoda, y la vista es espectacular! Muy cerca del Corso de Manly, la playa y cafes. Muy buena comunicación con María y con Jerome. Si volviera a Manly seguro alquilaría de nuevo la habitación!
Fantastic room. Fantastic location. Although I never got to meet Maria who was away, Jerry was a fantastic host. A not to be missed room and location.

Maria was off jetsetting when I came to stay ( half her luck ! ), but ensured that I was in good hands with the charming Jerome - well, he's French, so charming of course ; )

It's difficult to think of a more stunning spot in Sydney than this iconic building, above the cafe along the Shelley Beach board walk - tranquility itself, no matter the weather.

Thank you so much guys - I'll certainly stay again.
Amazing stay!

Wow, what a view for such a great price. It was like being in the ocean. Amazing room so very comfortable and the hosts were super duper hosts, never there but always checking in. Loved my stay.. it was a special time. Thank you

Maria and Jerome's place was absolutely fantastic... the location was perfect for our long weekend trip away. Close to fabulous cafes, restaurants and the most beautiful beaches.

The window seat is to die for... the activity outside in the water of swimming, surf skis and divers is very cool to watch before starting the day's activities.

I didn't get to meet Maria but her commutation and friendliness was amazing, she gave us tips of where to go, where to eat and things to do.

We met Jerome half way through our stay and he was so lovely and made us feel very welcome.

Would absolutely recommend... I want to go back already!

Maria and Jerome are such lovely hosts. They really know how to give you your privacy for your holiday (which I very much appreciate), but they are always there when you need them via text/call/Airbnb message, which is greatly assuring. They have awesome recommendations on local places (including places with local deals) and the room does not let your expectations down. The view is absolutely amazing, no matter the weather. The room and amenities are very clean, with extra towels and sheets in the cupboard, should you need them. I was worried about heating since it's winter and the listing didn't have heating ticked, but they provided a thermostat heater that kept us nice and cosy. Another cute thing to note was the deco. There's an adorable kiwi bird toy and some binoculars that we took advantage of with the great view from the window. Also, go up to the terrace! You definitely won't be disappointed at Maria's :)
Thank you so much for sharing your awesome accommodation, "a piece of heaven on earth " ! Hope to come back one day...
Magnifique endroit et vue de la chambre ! Accueil très chaleureux ! Tout était parfait ! N'hésitez pas !

Perfect location at Manly with a stunning view.  An easy stroll to Manly and the wharf with breathtaking views along the way.  Maria and Jerry were charming and friendly and willing to share their knowledge of the local area.  So much to see on the beach side of Sydney and away from the crowds of the city.  Highly recommend.
The sweetest hosts in THE best location in Sydney. My second visit was ever bit as good as the first. I'll definitely be back for a third...

Maria's place is just as it is described. The most beautiful place to wake up in Manly. Maria and Jerry are very friendly hosts. It was a bit wierd for me sharing a kitchen and bathroom with them but everything is clean and tidy so it really is a nice place to stay.

comforting place
I was very happy to find this place. Wave sound · Beautiful blue sea · Sea and starry sky · Delicious restaurant · Wonderful spectacular walking course.And even a wonderful host! Husband feels (Website hidden by Airbnb) wife was a bright, smart, always positive, active and spiritual person.I stayed at this house, what should I do now? I got comfort and courage. I highly recommend it.
Once I went there, it was a place I wanted to go again.
Top spot
Great location, best view. Friendly hosts.

No place in Manly is better than this. Such a lovely space, beautiful hosts, easy communication. Perfect location for swimming. Convenient distance to groceries and all the restaurants. Minutes from the Ferry. Best location, best hosts. Privacy is respected. I hope to come back again.
María and Jerome where the greatest anfitrions we could have hoped for. The room Is just as seen in the pictures, very spacious and an incredible view.

Great! Such a lovely location, with the most amazing view out of the window. Try and be up for sunrise, it's a special time of day, the locals are in the sea before the sun even comes up! You can't help but feel relaxed watching the ocean and wandering along the walking track. There's also loads of good places to eat! You're only a 15 minute walk to Manly Wharf, then half hour straight into Circular Quay on the ferry. The commuters obviously take it for granted, but it's such an amazing ferry ride! Last but not least, Maria and Jerome are both lovely and very hospitable. Loved it!

Maria & Jerry were great hosts & very welcoming. The room was clean & had a beautiful view of the ocean. Would recommend this place to anyone looking for scenic views or looking to be close to the sensational beaches of manly.

Maria and Terry, are the most amazing hosts I've ever had!!They made me feel like a friend more than just a guest...  The room is more awesome than how it looks in the photos.  The decorations are flawless, the bed is very comfortable and the cleanliness is impeccable!!! The location can't be more perfect, right in the middle of the 2 best beach spots in Manly and literally in front of the ocean. I still can't believe how lucky I was to be able to stay there.
Great place to stay, very close to beautiful beach and snorkeling spot. Wonderful host.

As my first airbnb experience in Sydney, Maria's place has reached all expectations & set the level (top rated) for my future bookings. I've only airbnb'ed overseas. Not only was the room palatial but comfortable with excellent views to boot plus the beach right at their doorstep. It was very central to everything I needed. I hope her room will be available with my next trip to Manly. They are excellent hosts, passionate about their area in Manly, great communicator, making sure my stay was hassle free. Thanks again Maria & Jerry.

L'endroit est tout simplement extraordinaire, quant à la vue depuis la chambre et bien c'est magique. C'est idéal pour sortir de son quotidien. Maria est très sympathique , bref j'adore et j'aurais aimé rester plus de temps.
Great spot, clean room and an amazing view.  Very comfy and Maria and jerry are so welcoming. So easy to checkin and a great central location.
Maria is a very gracious host and her place is fantastic!  I️ highly recommend it if you want an idyllic setting with unbeatable view and perfect location at Manly Beach.

Maria and Jerry are incredible hosts - super kind and helpful.  And the view from the clean simple beachy room is one of the best in the world! (if you love oceans and beaches and things that are amazing)
It is one of the most beautiful parts of Australia. Not for sleeping in. Get out and enjoy the day.

We had a fabulous time here, enjoying the positively amazing views from the beautiful window seat, sipping wine and munching chips, while enjoying the exciting passing parade of people walking along the promenade.  

The bed was super comfy, the decorations delightful and appropriate and pretty.  There was no problem with sharing amenities with Maria and Jerry, and we would highly recommend their lovely beachside home to all, so don't be shy about the share bathroom and kitchen; it worked out beautifully.

Fantastic place, amazing hosts!!

I would highly recommend staying at Maria’s place. Fantastic location with everything at your doorstep. But more importantly Maria and Jerry are brilliant hosts. Was a pleasure dealing with them and they made everything as easy as possible.

Maria and Jerome's place was exactly what I needed. An amazing location. I went snorkeling every day and it was just a short step out the front door and you're in the water swimming around big fish and little stingrays. It was fantastic. It was also create just to still in the window and watch people pass by as you listen to the sound of the little waves breaking. I can't wait to come back.

Fantastic place! Gorgeous location right on the water over looking the bower!  Close walk to town proper and to Shelly beach. Maria was an excellent host, full of info about manly. We thoroughly enjoyed or time there.
Probably the best view in Manly! Great hosts and super friendly couple. Everything else as described and really enjoyed my 5 night stay! Thanks Chris
Supernice host & place to stay, highly recommended!
Beautiful space. Maria is very communicative and helpful. The location is prime!

Fabulous location and view! Spectacular! Clean and tastefully decorated. 
Maria was easy and quick to communicate with . 
She has set up everything for an easy enjoyable stay ! Thank you Maria !

Lovely clean and well decorated large room with fantastic view of blue sea.Is situated between two beaches with lovely walk to both. Shared bathroom and kitchen was easily managed with access to fridge and cooker if you wanted to cook.Maria provided excellent and helpful information and is a wealth of local knowledge.Highly recommend this property and host
Perfect view lovely host great location
如果你是海滩男孩儿或者女孩,住在这里是一个明智的选择,房东热情好客非常好,但是由于房子楼下是餐馆卫生不是很理想,在房间内踩死两只虫子,有些家具有点久,在未使用过的床上发现毛发,最重要的是4个人使用一个小的并且不明亮的洗手间和浴室联在一起的不是很方便,并且没有特别的停车位,路边很难停到,很抱歉maria,但是确实从进门为止低过我们的预期,希望稍做改进,接下来会更好｡
An unforgettable location and hospitality that can't be faulted. Thank you!

유쾌한  jerome과 활기찬 maria를 만나보세요. 인생 최고의 바다경치는 보너스입니다.

에어비앤비 최고의 숙소 중에 하나라고 자신합니다.

최고의 경치, 편안하고 아름다운 숙소, 바다를 좋아한다면 주저하지 말고 선택하세요.

숙소에서 세발자국만 뛰면 시드니 최고의 스노클링 포인트가 당신을 맞이 할겁니다.
Great room in a cool flat with top views over the bay. Maria and her husband were more than hospitable hosts - can only recommend to anyone in the area
Great view and close to the water

name: Beautiful Apt, Tropical Resort, Steps to the Beach
summary: Our nightly rate includes already the mandatory Hawaii State Tax of 14.42%. Spacious 2BR/2BA Vacation Rental Condo in a Beautiful Resort with well-manicured Japanese zen garden. directly across the street from the beach.
space: Beautiful and spacious describes this 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom condo at the Kihei Resort. This 1000+ square-foot, fully furnished condo has all of the amenities of home and overlooks the pool and spa areas. This Condo is just minutes away from restaurants, shopping and many other first class South Maui beaches. Kihei Resort is a small intimate complex of only 64 units that is lushly landscaped to give you a true tropical Hawaiian experience. The Resort offers a very nice Pool, Hot Tub & BBQ Area. Highlights of the Condo: - Fully equipped kitchen - Washer and dryer. - AC in the living room and upstairs bedroom - Ceiling Fans in all of the rooms - Queen size sofa-sleeper in the living room - Tub/shower in both bathrooms - 32" Flatscreen TV - DVD player - Free wifi - Free parking spot - Pool, hot tub and BBQ area on the common grounds Maximum occupancy of 4 people. We do not accept 3rd Party bookings.
description: Our nightly rate includes already the mandatory Hawaii State Tax of 14.42%. Spacious 2BR/2BA Vacation Rental Condo in a Beautiful Resort with well-manicured Japanese zen garden. directly across the street from the beach. Beautiful and spacious describes this 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom condo at the Kihei Resort. This 1000+ square-foot, fully furnished condo has all of the amenities of home and overlooks the pool and spa areas. This Condo is just minutes away from restaurants, shopping and many other first class South Maui beaches. Kihei Resort is a small intimate complex of only 64 units that is lushly landscaped to give you a true tropical Hawaiian experience. The Resort offers a very nice Pool, Hot Tub & BBQ Area. Highlights of the Condo: - Fully equipped kitchen - Washer and dryer. - AC in the living room and upstairs bedroom - Ceiling Fans in all of the rooms - Queen size sofa-sleeper in the living room - Tub/shower in both bathrooms - 32" Flatscreen TV - DVD player - Free wifi - Free pa
neighborhood_overview: Safe and quiet neighborhood! Shopping, restaurants and golfing just minutes away! Nearest Beach: Kihei Beach, across the street - approx. 0.16 miles
notes: Beach chairs, beach umbrella, a cooler and beach towels are provided for our guests use. This is a family owned condo. Please treat the condo how you would treat your own home. This is strictly a "non-smoking" rental unit. Maximum occupancy of 4. We do not accept Third Party bookings. Children are welcome but the unit is not childproofed and does not have a crib, high-chairs or Pack 'n Play.
transit: Car Rental recommended.  Local Bus service throughout Maui.  Shops, Restaurant just min. away per bus or car.
access: Resort Amenities: - 1 Pool and Jacuzzi, - Free parking - BBQ Area with outside dining area
interaction: After booking, we will send you all of your check-in instructions via email. We are available during your stay via email and cell phone.
house_rules: 1) CHECK-IN AND CHECK-OUT:   Check-in time is 4:00pm and later, check-out time is 11:00am or ealier on your departure date. You will receive an email with the check-in instruction of the unit once the reservation is complete. 2) CHECK-OUT PROCEDURES:    Upon check-out please  a) put all perishables and food items in the refrigerator.  b) turn off all lights, fans and air conditioners.  c) place all trash in the trash cans.  d) lock all the doors and leave the keys on the kitchen counter and put the key from the lockbox back into the lockbox. 3) DAMAGES:  Please notify us immediately of any damages to the property. Guests agree that any of her/his group members, including children, and or those who are legally allowed onto the property, shall pay a replacement value and or repair cost for any furniture, fixtures and or fittings being damaged during the term of their stay.  4) NOISE:   Please keep in mind that you are in a long and short term neighborhood. Noise carries easily and we ask

host.host_about:
Anke Kirchner, R(S) & Property Manager - Next Maui Vacation LLC/ A Division of SRH Inc.

Aloha, I'm Anke, Realtor, surfer, runner & kiteboarder living on Maui. I specialize in buying and selling homes and condos on Maui and I love what I do! 

Love, Live Aloha!

reviews.comments: The codo is very nice, beautiful and spacious. Two bedrooms, which both stayed a decent temperature at night. Also has 2 AC units. Pretty cool balcony. I enjoyed staying on the balcony on my laptop and watching the sunshine or the rain falling. Washer/dryer were nice to have. Anke was extremely responsive to my calls, and even brought over garbage bags when we ran out. I also enjoyed the pool. The condo is within walking distance of a beach, which is nice.

Anke, 
Your place was wonderful for our family. The kids used the pool every day, my parents participated at the ukulele jam session at Keolahou Church, and my wife and I loved running by the beach.  Thank you again for making our stay memorable. 
Aloha, 
jason

We absolutely loved the place! It has everything you might need during your stay. Close to the beach and a short driving distance (~10 minutes) to a number of good restaurants. Anke was super nice and helpful. I highly recommend this place for staying in Maui.
Everything was great!

This condo is amazing and perfect for a one week plus stay. It's very spacious and, with the two AC units plus the ceiling fans, can stay cool despite the hot weather. It's right across the street from the beach and kitty corner to 2 parks. It's also really close to a lot of good eats! It has a full kitchen and comes with cooking utensils which allowed us to cook and prep meals for extended days out (i.e.  Road to Hana). To our surprise, the condo came equipped with beach chairs and a boogie board which we took full advantage of.  It also comes with in-unit laundry and dryer as well as soap and dryer sheets! The resort is very quiet and the people who live there are respectful of quiet hours. You get to meet fellow travelers and residents in the pool / jacuzzi area which is also a plus. All in all, we enjoyed our stay. Just don't forget to bring your own soap and shampoo!
Everything was as described! A very beautiful and clean condo directly at the beach in Kihei. Anke was also very responsive and helpful, would love to come back any time!

Anke communicated very well with me prior to arriving.  She sent me documents that gave me clear directions to the condo.  Once I arrived I noticed that I did not need anything as everything I could possibly need was at my finger tips.  I will definitely stay at this condo again.   Thank you Anke.

Our stay at Kihei Resort was wonderful. The place was perfect for the 4 of us. The place was spacious, clean, comfortable, quiet and well located. The condo had many amenities such as the community pool and free guest parking and was situated 5-15 mins drive from many eateries and stores. The beach is walking distance away across the street and Wailea is only about a 10-15 drive away as well. Anke was a great host giving us all the necessary information we would need as well as checking up on us via message during our stay to make sure all was fine. Definitely recommend this place for travelers! In the heart of Kihei and close to the airport and other attractions.

This is a beautiful place by a beautiful beach with great amenities, like hot tub and swimming pool. You probably don't need them though. Just walking across the street, you can snorkel in waist deep blue water, where I saw five turtles and a lot of fish. It is very safe for kids or people don't swim. 

The place provides enough towels so you don't need to pack them. Washer and dryer is conveniently located in the unit - not those coin operating ones. 

Anke is very nice too. We got a box of chocolate as gift when we arrived :)

Everything was exactly as described and we were made to feel welcome immediately with a nice little care package and local tour guide notebook!

The Kihei resort is amazing and very private and low key and relaxing.  The spa and pool area is great at the end of a long day of adventures.

I would recommend Anke and her property to anyone!
Anke was very helpful and the apartment was everything you'd expect and more. We had a great time I would highly recommend this place to others.

This place has beautiful gardens and a nice pool and hot tub in a quiet community. We really enjoyed our stay and it was a very short drive to the south or north to get to great beaches. You can easily walk to the beach as well if you don't mind using the shoulder. We did a good amount of cooking and had everything we needed.

Pros :
Close to the beaches
Quiet
Beautiful garden
Having own Washer and dryer
Beach toys, umbrella, small surf board, beach towels, beach chairs provided

Cons :
Kids under 14 years are not allowed in the hot tub (The policy we received before we got to the condo didn't mention anything about kids not allowed to use the hottub)
The sink and bathtub drains don't work very well
Old and dated property 
Restaurants, grocery stores, coffee shops are in driving distance (you can only walk to the beaches and one Korean restaurant that I wouldn't recommend anyone to go. 
Poor quality kitchen equipment  (if you try to cut or cook anything, it will be challenging)
I broke $40 blender and I got charged for $80.73 for it so don't break anything :) 

This place is ok but not if you have young children. It's more suitable for people without children, retired people. 
Oh, they also don't recycle or compost so if you have any environmental consciousness, it is probably not suitable for you.

Beautiful condo in a gorgeous development full of well manicured gardens.  The view over the tropical garden and overlooking the pool is lovely.  The condo was super clean and quite huge.  Everything you could possible need and perfect for a group of 4!  Very smooth check in and communication process.  Thank you Anke for everything!
A great location and nice and spacious condo. We loved our stay here, and Anke was very quick to help us with anything we had questions about!

Anke's Condo was amazing! A beautiful two bedroom, walking distance to the water, and came with every amenity possible. Unfortunately, our flight was canceled so we did not arrive until the next day and our travel was extended. We were very nervous, because we thought we would have to arrange an extra night stay else where, but luckily Anke was very understanding and allowed another night. We could not thank her enough for her time and help. I would highly recommend Anke and her condo to anyone and everyone.

This property has it pros and cons.

Pros:
Anke was very responsive and nice.
The place is nice and clean.
The condo is right above the pool which was nice.
People there was very nice.

Cons:
It's a older property which was fine but the condo was old as well.
AC units are on the top floor and middle floor but not in the middle bedroom. Which got hot in the room but it was humid when we stayed at.
There was no sideway outside the resort which was not safe to walk outside.
There were some bikers staying there as well which was loud sometime because of the bike. 

If you to want walk around in Kihei then I would recommend another place near the kamaole beach 1-3.

Overall, it was a ok stay for us but my kids loved the place because they had the upstairs to themselves. Lol

The condo is beautiful and well-furnished.  All appliances worked.  The supplies were more than adequate and easily found.  The host was always available via telephone and answered all questions clearly and quickly.  Would book again tomorrow if I could!

Anke's place is awesome, just as advertised. Mellow, low key and quiet. More over its beautiful and close to everything you'd need. Inside the complex it's like a little tropical village with plenty of greenery and birds gently chirping in the trees. Pool, hot tub, BBQ area,etc, etc. If you never left the complex you'd still have a great vacation! Outside the resort everything you need is close: supermarket, coffee shops, gas station. Great location to access roads for any point you'd want to go. Two thumbs up & 5 stars !!! I want to stay here again.
Thanks Anke.
We enjoyed our stay.
This condo was as described. A little worn but quite comfortable and clean. Good location.
Great place to stay at a great value!
This is an awesome condo. It was definitely one of our best vacations. We loved it!

This place really is across the street from a great swimmable beach (complete with a 500-year-old stone wall to hold off big waves), and is a twenty-minute walk to groceries, restaurants and other shops. Two bedrooms plus a futon in the living room, two bathrooms, laundry in the unit, full kitchen, and a closet full of beach equipment; plus, the condo's pool is twenty feet from the front door. Anke was great to work with; per her instructions, we let ourselves in, but when we had an issue with the shower (nothing broken, we just couldn't figure out the knob) she was over within minutes to help us out and say hi. Very recommended!
As advertised.

The place is spacious and central to both north side and south side of the island. The bedroom does not get a lot of AC since it is on the opposite end from the AC wall unit. There is an additional AC unit for the loft so that helps. We really enjoy our stay here, check in was easy and everything we need are there.
The apartment was clean and spacious. It is only a short walk from the beach and has a beautiful balcony. We can highly recommend this AirBnB.

We stayed there as a couple for 3 nights. Nice apartment and a big comfy bed. Well equipped with everything one needs for a stay at a condo in Maui. Unfortunately the jacuzzi was closed the other night, so we only got to use it once. However, Anke’s place is not the cheapest in Maui, you get a lot for what you pay for. 

Thanks Anke for our stay at your place

My stay was great. The condo was in great shape, supper clean, and well appointed. The location and the gardens in the main area were fantastic. I had a wonderful time and will likely rent this unit again on my next trip…if it is available.
Wonderful quiet and cozy place to stay with family.

Great location, very quiet, clean and spacious.
Walking distance to the beach and close to town. I really enjoyed my time there and I would stay there again.

The pictures are an accurate representation of Anke's place. Spacious, clean, and homie. Location is a little outside of town so you'll have to drive almost everywhere but it is quiet and the neighbors are friendly. Good spot for a getaway, with friends, or for a family.
Nice place in a good location.
Great location and it felt very homey.  I would recommend this to anyone visiting Maui!

The condo had a great location in southern Maui, close to everything. It had everything we needed and more. Everything was organized and well laid out and the condo was perfect for what we needed and expected. I would definitely stay there again and highly recommend the unit.

Anke was a great host, the place is very clean has all of the amenities you will need. The location is perfect, there is a beach and a great "cove" to snorkel across the street. Lahaina, Road to Hana and plenty of great beaches are within driving distance to make the most out of your time while in Maui.
My family loved this condo so much! It is adorable and perfect. It has everything we needed. We would definitely recommend this place! Hopefully we will be back soon!
Great location on Maui, easily accessible to beeches and any driving you wish to do around the island. Great local amenities, wonderful condo, fabulous, would highly recommend

Your host Anke is one of the most professional and promptly responsive owners you can only hope to deal with on your travels. 
The property is welcomingly quiet. Except for the grounds maintenance crew and their trusty leaf blower. It is far enough away from the regular hub-bub about 5mins further up the road where you will find all the shops, businesses, restaurants and resort/hotels. 
The beaches within walking distance are just ok. Nothing to expect from any Maui postcard. Great for a nice walk from the property to watch the sunset. 
Kihei Road is always busy, so watch for traffic when walking on the side of the road. 
Anke’s place has everything you will need. It is a very spacious, two level property with sleeping arrangements for numerous guests.

Anke's place is a great place to stay! It is easy to find and the location offers great access to many nearby beaches, stores, snorkel rental, local foods, etc. The condo is very spacious, clean and comfortable with more upscale amenities and all the personal toiletry items you need. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay there and highly recommend Anke's condo if you want to stay in the Kihei area.
Anke is a great host driven to provide you with the best experience and service. Thank you Anke!

Our family absolutely loved the Kihei Resort. The folks that live there full-time were friendly and easy to talk to. My children really enjoyed their company.  The onsite manager and his wife were amazing people. We had an issue with the pool key and Anke and the manager were very responsive and prompt.  I would absolutely highly recommend staying at this wonderful place in Kihei. Mahalo

Das waren paradiesähnliche Zustände!! Die Unterkunft ist wunderschön! Keine 3min zu Fuß - Straße überqueren - und man ist am Strand. Das Haus gehört zu einer sehr gepflegten Reihenhausanlage. Mit Pool und Jakuzzi. Es wird sehr auf Ruhe und Ordnung geachtet. Was wir sehr zu schätzen wussten. Die Unterkunft ist mit allen Utensilien ausgestattet, die zu einer Küche gehören. Dazu gibt es eine Waschmaschine und einen Trockner. Anke hat uns super umsorgt, zur Begrüßung gabs u.a. Ananas, Mango, Pralinen und Kaffee(!!). Und auch sonst konnten wir sie ansimsen wann immer wir wollten und bekamen, spätestens nach 5min eine Antwort! Anke gehört zu den fleißigsten, gastfreundschaftlichsten und freundlichsten Menschen, die wir überhaupt im Leben kennengelernt haben, wenn wir auf Reisen gehen. Und wir reisen sehr viel! Danke Anke!!!! :))) Kiss&Huge!!! :)))

Es war eine wirklich tolle Zeit in der Unterkunft von Anke. In der Wohnung sieht es wirklich so aus wie auf den Bildern. Super viel Platz zum Sitzen, Schlafen und für die ganzen Koffer / Klamotten. Die Wohnung ist liebevoll eingerichtet und besitzt alle notwendigen Haushaltsutensilien, so dass das Kochen in der Wohnung kein Problem darstellt. Der Weg zum Strand und Meer dauert 1 Min, also eine gute Lage. Zur Anlage gehört auch die Benutzung des Pools und Jacuzzi, die gut gepflegt sind. Es gab keine Mängel oder defekte Sachen in der Wohnung.
Nice spot. Good location.
great condo just across the street from a beautiful sandbarred beach, where you can swim with turtles! it was clean, comfy, and perfect for our family vacation.

We had a great time staying at Anke's place. There was a kitchen, air conditioning and 2 bathrooms, which is appreciated. The home is a bit dated but is very clean and has the amenities we wanted. The home was also in walking distance to the water and had a pool as well. We were very comfortable here. Anke was great in fixing minor issues. The power to the loft was not working when we arrived and we could not find the cooler or hand soap. Anke had some dropped off and fixed the power while we were away after notifying us that she intended to do so. We appreciated her fast response. She left a little welcome basket as well which was nice after traveling. One disappointment I had was that the dryer was not working. I had to air dry and blow dry my clothes over night before flying out early the next day.
We enjoyed our stay in Kihei immensely, and Anke's place was great.  It's very close to the beach, and we appreciated having the selection of beach items that were available in the condo.

Overall a solid place to stay, missing a few details (toiletries, spotty WiFi, beach supplies). I would not recommend it for families or anyone noise averse, but it would be great for couples or friends traveling together. There was a pesky rooster nearby that was constantly crowing, and the regular construction/lawn maintenance noise was fairly substantial. The upstairs loft is very pleasant and well furnished, but completely open to the downstairs area with no way to block sound or light (we knew this going in but didn’t realize how taxing that would be). The patio was great and we enjoyed being central on the island and the lot always had parking. There was a washer/dryer in the unit, which was a pleasant surprise, but the dryer wasn’t terribly reliable. The kitchen was equipped well enough for simple meals and it’s not too far from a grocery store!
My friends and I had a great experience staying at Anke’s place. It’s clean, has everything we needed and is at a convenient location. I will definitely recommend it to my other friends!

This is a perfect property for a small family with essentially 2 bedrooms and 2 full baths located only a couple minutes walk to Kalepolepo beach park where you can swim with sea turtles in a calm , shallow water environment. The property  may have somewhat outdated decor but is well appointed and clean.

Beautiful quiet tropical property. Walked across the street to a great beach that wasn’t too busy (saw turtles multiple times - plus). Easy drive to nearby restaurants. The beach supplies were just okay. There was really only one “good” beach chair. The rest were more like camping style chairs - we ended up rotating who got the good chair - not ideal. We were also disappointed that there wasn’t better seating for a place that hosts up to 4 guests. There wasn’t anywhere for all 4 of us to sit together and eat or play a card game comfortably. We loved the pool and the hot tub - it was never too crowded and just steps from the unit (we were here during a peak time - New Years). We also ate at the beach front Indian restaurant across the street which was nice. The unit is a bit more dated than the images portray. The AC units (one in the loft one in the living room) worked great but the downstairs bedroom does get a bit warm.  Anke was very responsive whenever we needed anything!
Very nicely appointed, great location.
Anke is a lovely host.  She makes effort to correct any problem.  The unit is comfortable and in a great location.  Enjoy your stay.

We had a wonderful stay! The unit has great access to the beach and is close to grocery stores and restaurants. The space had everything we needed including sand toys for our kiddo and beach towels and beach chairs/umbrella. We had an issue with internet service mid way through our stay and Anke took care of it immediately. The grounds are very well cared for and we enjoyed the pool and hot tub. The complex does not have recycling but we found a recycling center nearby.

name: Luminous for 6 apt @ Rnda Sant Pau ¦
summary: Enjoy your holiday in super bright apartment in the centre of Barcelona. Ideal place for 2 couples or families Please read carefully our house rules before booking in order to avoid potential problems and miscommunication before and during your stay
space: This freshly renovated, bright two bedroom flat located right in the heart of Barcelona is very modern, suitable for up to 6 people. The flat has a fully equipped open concept kitchen opening up to a spacious living and dining area with fantastic views of the most impressive sights of Barcelona. The apartment has two bathrooms, each with a  rain shower, an environmentally friendly dual flush toilet and natural light. As for the bedrooms, there are two double bedrooms and the leather sofa in the living area opens up to a confortable double sofa bed.
description: Enjoy your holiday in super bright apartment in the centre of Barcelona. Ideal place for 2 couples or families Please read carefully our house rules before booking in order to avoid potential problems and miscommunication before and during your stay This freshly renovated, bright two bedroom flat located right in the heart of Barcelona is very modern, suitable for up to 6 people. The flat has a fully equipped open concept kitchen opening up to a spacious living and dining area with fantastic views of the most impressive sights of Barcelona. The apartment has two bathrooms, each with a  rain shower, an environmentally friendly dual flush toilet and natural light. As for the bedrooms, there are two double bedrooms and the leather sofa in the living area opens up to a confortable double sofa bed. There are two subway lines (L3 (green) and L2 (purple)) both at about 50m from the apartment. The apartment lies in the heart of Barcelona city center. Raval, the Barri Gotic, La Ribera (El Born)
neighborhood_overview: There are two subway lines (L3 (green) and L2 (purple)) both at about 50m from the apartment. The apartment lies in the heart of Barcelona city center. Raval, the Barri Gotic, La Ribera (El Born), and Barceloneta can be explored on foot from the apartment. The L2 line brings you directly to La Sagrada Familia. Business travellers visiting the Fira Montjuic or the Fira Grand Via can reach their destination within 10min to 25min. Next to the apartment you can find the beautiful Montjuic Gardens, the best museums such as MNAC, Fundació Joan Mirò, Caixa Forum... “Las Ramblas” and Plaça Catalunya are just a stone throw away and the beach 20 minutes walking. In addition, for shopping lovers, there is a shopping mall called “Las Arenas”, Las Ramblas and Portal de l'Angle at walking distance.
notes: HUTB-7864
transit: Parallel (L3, L2), Sant Antoni (L2)
house_rules: *  NON Smoking apartment!! *  Please be aware that noise after 21:00 / parties are strictly forbidden in this building. *  Groups of young people below 25 years are not allowed due to earlier experiences. *  It is not under any circumstance allowed with more people in the apartment than what is stated in the reservation. Violation of the rules will result in immediate evacuation without any refund of remaining nights. *  After 21:00 there is a late arrival fee of 20€, and 50€ after midnight. *  A local touristic tax of 2,48€ per adult and night needs to be paid and is not included in the price. This amount can be either paid via resolution center prior arrival or by cash/card during the check in  (Law 5/2012, of 20 March, on tax, financial and administrative measures and creating the tax on stays in tourism establishments.) *  Also I´m obligated to register all the guests who are staying in the apartment so I will request to provide full names, dates of birth and ID/passport numbers of

host.host_about:
Hi there,

My name is Enrique and I am a Barcelona Local. I have always loved traveling myself, but also sharing the beauty and wonders of Barcelona with others, so a few years ago I started renting out 2 apartments to travelers coming to the city, always meeting everyone in person so I could share my insights and hidden secrets about Barcelona :)

Now I rent out a few more apartments and it is no longer just me, but we are a small team of people managing the apartments together, but with the same focus on personal and attentive services in authentic apartments that allow for the genuine Barcelona feel for your trip! We call our little team Stay U-nique, because of this focus on a unique feeling when staying with us.

If you have any questions, want to hear about an apartment or just say hi, don´t hesitate to reach out :)

Have a great day!
Enrique

reviews.comments: Nous avons passé 3 nuits formidables chez Enrique. Il nous a bien accueillir avec une bouteille de cava et des super gâteaux  l’appartement corresponds toute à faite aux photos et très propre. Avec 5min de marche jusqu'au centre-ville dans un résidence familiale et propre.  Je le conseille fortement. Merci Enrique ;)
The apartment is well located and all furnished. It was very clean and Enrique was kind. I would come again.

Very nice host. Just a beautiful apartment in the center of Barcelona, very clean and very lightfull.   
Thanks Enrique for your kindness

My friends and I arrived at Enrique's place and although we did not meet Enrique in person he was easy to contact and his friend met us to let us in to the apartment and gave us some tips on where to go. The apartment is clean and large, exactly as it looks in the pictures and we had a lovely stay here while in Barcelona! Would definitely recommend this apartment to anyone looking to visit Barcelona :)

The host (Clementine) was very nice and spent time answering questions about the apt. and area.  She had cheese, bread, cherries and champagne waiting for us which was very welcoming.  We felt good in that we could call on her or Enrique anytime for questions and advice.  The safe was not operable when we arrived but after a few days it was fixed.  The listing pictures are exactly as they appear.  The apt. was very clean and updated.  Very comfortable!  The neighborhood was nice, with a grocery store very near and a coffee shop in front.  We felt safe there although my husband was pickpocketed close by in his front pocket first day we were there.  My advice is to stay away from smaller roads in this area. I know this can happen anywhere, we travel a lot and are very vigilant in keeping our belongings safe.  We were lucky this time, they only took his cell phone.   I would stay in this apartment again when I return to Barcelona.  Host was very responsive and helpful with all emails.

the place was luvly..just like the pics. the apartment entrance was dingy and dated but we were pleasantly surprised when we entered the (Website hidden by Airbnb) was clean, well lit, modern and luvly. location was also central .....metro very close by. recommended!

We loved the apartment! Very clean, fresh, modern, equipped with anything we needed,  and comfortable for our family of 7 (5 adults & 2 babies). We were welcomed with big smiles of two girls that showed us around and offered us local tips, as well as wine, fresh water, muffins and fruits! They even arranged our airport transportation! The location is great, only 5 min walk from the Gothic Quarter and two minutes walk from the metro station. We would stay again and we highly recommend this place to other visitors.

Apartment was exactly as in photos - Enrique very kindly left us a 'welcome gift' of a bottle of Cava in the fridge. He was very understanding and helpful, despite us having to re-arrange our arrival time at the last minute.

Never having been to Barcelona before we didn't know what to expect from the area we were staying in. Using the hop on/off bus was a great way to get our bearings as well as see other areas of Barcelona. 
Our apartment was just as pictured in the photos. 
The beds were comfy, the showers were great and the all important washing machine (& dishwasher) were easy to use.
We didn't get to meet Enrique but were met by Luanna, who was a bundle of energy, enthusiasm and information. 
She suggested different sights to see and things to do. She (& Enrique) even purchased tickets for the Sagrada Familia and the hop on/off bus for us. Fantastic!
The Metro is close by & easy to use. 
There are also plenty of great restaurants close by. 
We visited for 4 days, two of which were the weekend. We had some people in the adjoining apartment who enjoyed their music until a late hour - luckily we were too tired from our day & nighttime sightseeing for it to bother us too much but if you are a light sleeper, maybe pack some earplugs. 
Would we stay here again? Definitely yes.

Avec Enrique nous avons pu  définir notre heure d'arrivée au logement, qui était plus tôt que celle prévue dans la page de présentation pour y déposer nos valises et visiter la ville dès l'après-midi. Le ménage était fait. Et sur la table, de l'eau, du bon vin, des biscuits, du fromage et du chorizo ! C'est très agréable.

 Vinnie et Charlotte nous ont accueillis avec beaucoup de gentillesse et ont répondu à toutes nos questions. Vinnie s'est proposé d'acheter les billets d'entrée à la Sagrada Familia et nous les a apportés  le lendemain matin. Merci encore.

L'appartement s'appelle "Luminous", il porte bien son nom !

Métro à côté. Le logement n'est pas loin des Ramblas, du Musée de la Marine, du Port, du Marché Boqueria, du Palau Güell et d'une grande partie du centre historique d'une manière générale.

Le soleil nous a accompagné pendant ces 5 jours. Température idéale. Pas trop d'attente pour prendre les billets. Pas trop de monde pendant les visites. Saison idéale sûrement. Plein de bons souvenirs à engranger. On pourra revenir, il y a tant de choses à voir.
Great apartment. Great neighbourhood. Beautiful. I recommend heartily.

Apartment very nice, consistent with the description and photos, in a good location. I do not have any remarks. Clean, lots of space, there is everything you need: dishwasher, cleaning products, even umbrellas. Enrique was helpful.

The communication with host was very efficient. The apartment itself was great, however the area were it is situated is not very safe at night (especially if you are by yourself) in my opinion. We celebrated New Year in Barcellona, and the position of an apartment was good to go by foot to the main square, where fireworks were, near Montjuic.
Recommended apartement.

Logement lumineux, très propre, confortable et agréable, conforme à la description et aux photos, tout le nécessaire de toilette... Adapté aux petits, merci pour avoir installé le lit bébé, nous n'avons pas rencontré Enrique mais il est resté en contact avec nous jusqu'à notre arrivée, très proche du bus et métro.

The apartment is in an apartment block in a moden residential area right on the border with El Raval. La Rambla is close by (less than 10 minutes walk), about the same to Mercado de La Boqueria.  Also very convenient if you're coming to Barcelona by train -- it's 3 or 4 stops on Metro.  It's a bit of hike to restaurants and attractions in El Born and Latin Quarters but it's a pleasant walk.

The apartment is in great condition and has all amenities, even a washer/dryer -- good for families. While not super spacious, it fit a family of 5.
Très bel appartement, très propre, très bien équipé. Un surcoût est demandé après une arrivée à 21h00. Toutefois l'accueil par la personne responsable du check in a été très chaleureux et prévenant.

Our stay in Enrique's apartment was great. The apartment is in a strategic zone, near metro and bus stops that can bring you anywhere in the city. The neighbourd is not so tranquil and could be little scary if you are girls alone walking at night like me and my friends...but it can be easly avoide just not do late at night.
The comunication with Enrique and his staff was great and the apartment very cosy and confortable with all you need. The only problem was that during the first and second nigths at the apartment there was so much noise from the upstair apartment...but of course it was not Enrique's fault...
I really recomand this apartment and Enrique who is so friendly and helpful!
Nice apartment with everything needed for comfortable stay, close to La Rambla, and Paralel street, with lots of fine restaurants and things to do nearby.
Apartment is located very close to the metro and Sant Antoni Market. It is a great apartment for 4 people. It is sun filled and has a pretty good view.
The apartment was very clean, and matched the description well. Lots of bars, cafes and supermarkets around us. Great location as clubs etc were a quick cab journey or walk away
Très bon logement a proximité de tout  nous vous le conseillons
Perfect.

We had such a wonderful time in Barcelona, and this apartment only added to our enjoyment. It is clean, cozy, and so close to anything you may want to do! Enrique was easy to reach if we had any questions, and someone was there for us to check in when we were ready and was very helpful in recommendations for food and activities. We had a wonderful time and would definitely recommend! Thank you!

Nice appartement.
The ckeck-in was easy.
I would recommend the appartement.
Enough Space for two couples and a baby.
Thanks for  having us.

The apartment was as in pictures, clean, bright and spacious.  We were 3 adults, 3 kids and a baby but didn't feel cramped.  Having 2 separate showers were very handy when at the end of a long and hot day, everyone just wanted to quickly shower and relax.  Metro and bus stops were within a few minutes walk.  Supermarket, bakeries and restaurants were also nearby.  We didn't feel the area was unsafe as what was described on the internet about El Raval.  Would def stay here again!
Parfait! Super appartement. Bien localisé, parfait avec des enfants, tout à proximité. Rien à redire
L' appartamento e' come si vede nelle foto, luminoso, molto confortevole e ben tenuto, la zona è centrale, ritorneremo.

Bel appartement, très bien situé. 
15 min à pieds des Ramblas, 5 min du métro. 
Nous avons passé un très bon séjour.

Enrique's apartment was lovely, had everything we needed for the 5 of us. Neil and Seema who checked us in were very welcoming. Enrique had even pre purchased our bus tour tickets for us which was helpful! Good location, supermarkets close by and walking distance to most places but can also get taxi's into centre which are around €6-€9.

Enrique's apartment is as you can see in the pictures: modern, clean, tastefully furnished and well equipped. it isn't too big, but it has all you can need during your holiday, including washing machine and dishwasher. Near to a metro station and in front of a market, it also has a beautiful view through the big windows in the living room. 
I'll suggest it!
Nice clean place. Would def stay here again if I'm back.

Great apartment that was really close to the Paral-lel metro station making it very convenient to access all the sights in Barcelona. The check-in process was really noteworthy, with someone there to check us in, explain key things to know and offering information about Barcelona and leaving a welcome basket with crackers, olive & wine.

We were in Barcelona on the day the terror incident happened on Las Ramblas and it was really comforting to get an email from both AirBnB and Enrique to check on us, offering information about the incident as well as how to get more information as the event developed through Emergency numbers, (Hidden by Airbnb) feeds etc.

Overall, had a really great stay at Enrique's apartment and would recommend to other travelers.

Enrique was a great host and put a lot of effort into making my stay with four other friends as pleasant as possible. He reached out to me a couple times before we moved in to ensure our check-in went as smoothly as possible. Upon arrival, we were greeted with a welcome basket of snacks and wine. His local contact also provided a lot of useful tourism information.
The room's location was great for us. It was only a couple minutes walk away from the L3 line, which was pretty much the only metro line we needed to get around the city. It was also within walking distance for late night drinks and tapas.
Though the room was on the 5th floor, getting there was not a problem because of the convenient elevator nearby. As for the room itself, it was clean and well stocked with towels when we arrived. The beds were soft and comfortable and the washer in the room was very helpful for cleaning all our dirty laundry. 
Our group of five were very pleased with the room and hope we can stay in it again when we return to Barcelona in the near future.

What a lovely time we had staying in Enrique's place! Great location, the apartment was very clean and beautiful. Also, the check-in time was perfect, the girl who met us was very kind. I couldn't recommend it enough!

Basic apartament without balcony,well furnished,all utilities,wasching maschine,Wi-Fi perfect,good location near Metro,Bar,Restaurants,Supermarket.Family friendly.Communication with the host and his employees was good.
Unfortunately the apartament was dirty,the sheets,the bathrooms,the floors and the showers were not cleaned at all.The next day someone came to clean but still all the hair on the floors and in (Website hidden by Airbnb) had to do a good cleaning.This aspect must be very well cured,the most important thing is how the apartament looks and how clean is it.We were looking forward to this trip and to stay in this place cause in pictures looks great,unfortunatelly we were dissapointed.
Next time we will stay in another place.
Muy bien ubicado, espacioso, ordenado y limpio.

Logement très agréable, clair, bien équipé.
Il est très bien placé, le métro est tout près, il permet d'aller dans tous les quartiers de Barcelone.
Enrique offre un accueil très plaisant par mail ou sur place.

I stayed here for 3 nights as part of a group of 4. The apartment is as advertised in the pictures. It's clean, well-maintained, and quite spacious. The beds are comfortable, the bathrooms are in great condition, and the AC seems to work well. However, it wasn't too hot during our stay so I'm not sure how it is during the summer months. One thing to keep in mind is the apartment is on the 5th floor and the elevator can hold 2-3 people. My group only had backpacks so it wasn't a big deal for us but if you have a lot of luggage, it could be annoying.

The location is great. It's very close to a lot of late night bars and tapas restaurants. Public transportation is close by and it's easily within waking distance to La Rambla, the Gothic Quarter, and even Barceloneta.

Enrique was an excellent host. He reached out to us well before our stay to make sure check-in would be smooth and easy. While he wasn't able to meet with us upon arrival, a local colleague met with us in person to hand us the keys and show us the apartment. There was also a basket of snacks, water, and wine ready for our arrival. Enqrique responded very quickly to our messages and made sure we had everything we needed. I would highly recommend this place for groups of 4 to 6!

Niveau de services et d’acceuil Excellent 
Nous vous recommandons ce logement
Nous avons pleinement profiter de notre Séjour grâce à un logement de haute qualité 
Merci !

La casa está decorada con gusto y muy bien equipada y limpia. Su localización es perfecta para poder explorar el centro de Barcelona sin necesidad de transporte público, aunque está a 3 minutos de la parada de metro Paralelo desde donde puedes ir  a cualquier sitio. Muy buena relación calidad- precio.
Simply great place !!! Nice apartment. Highly recommended & enough Space for couples with baby. The check-in was quiet easy.
Чисто, но высокая слышимость
Great location, beautiful apartment, very nice host. Loved our stay in Barcelona. I would definitely recommend this place for families.
Excelente apartamento,  todo tal cual aparece publicado. Muy bien ubicado para conocer la ciudad. Excelente recepción. Muy limpio.

Perfect location for our needs. Urban and central, local and lively. Well equipped, clean and spacious. Two bathrooms was a plus! Service and support both prior to and during our stay was quick and positive. 
Highly recommended!
Ha sido una estacia perfecta. El apartamento es tal cual las fotos. La ubicacion perfecta y el anfitrion inmejorable.100% recomendable.

Apartment was exactly as it appeared in pictures on the inside. One area we walked through not the best but we learnt a different route and this was fine. Stay unique team very helpful with recommendations and directions. Would recommend this apartment to others

El departamento de Enrique se encuentra muy bien ubicado, con varios supermercados, tiendas y restaurantes cerca. Puedes ir caminando a varios lugares turísticos, tiene una excelente ubicación!! Muy limpio y amplio. Enrique muy atento y amable con nosotros. El vecindario muy seguro y perfecto para pasar unos días en barcelona. Muy recomendado!!
A great clean modern apartment, location was perfect, would recommend to anyone  if your looking for great place to stay can't get better.
Appartamento molto bello e confortevole, host eccezionale e disponibile. Tornerò quanto prima.

La casa esta fenomenal.Todo nuevo.Las camas (Website hidden by Airbnb) confundir Carrer de sant pau con Ronda Sant Pau.Pone claramente que esta en la ronda pero puede llevar a equivoco si te quedas solo con  sant pau.La entrega se retraso 20 min pero lo demas muy bien.La comunicacion con Enrique muy fluida y contestanfo rapidamente a las dudas.

Great place! Super clean and beautiful, equipped from soap and shampoo to cook ware, blankets and sheets. Wonderful place close to the metro and close to all the main places . Definitely recommend anybody to stay in this beautiful apartment.

It’s a very nice place, clean cozy and bright, kitchen is fully equipped, specious with the living area.  Thanks Enrique and the team for the warm hospitality.  We definitely would like recommend this flat to our friends.
Una casa preciosa, limpia y muy accesible. Lo recomiendo.
A lovely central apartment. Clean, well stocked and included a warm welcome! Highly recommended!

Enrique’s apartment is wonderful. It’s a beautiful and stylish place situated in a lively locals oriented neighborhood. It is right between two easily walked to metro stations, and is a short walk to the rest of the city center as well. Plenty of room for my family of four and stocked with everything you’ll need. Thanks Enrique!
great location, good communication and does what it said on the tin. Enrique and his team communicated throughut.

Super séjour super cadre appartement moderne  bien situé en face d’un arrêt de bus,les chambres et le salon sont climatisés .. bien équipé très propre et nous avons été très bien accueilli,merci bcp Léa et Enrique ... je vous recommande cet appartement.

Very sketchy area of Barcelona to stay in. Right across the street from a children’s park and noisy until 2am every night!  Apartment appears clean until further inspection. Dirty linens. Wouldn’t recommend!

It was a lovely apartment with everything you need for a trip away. Being greeted by Maran and Nicole also made it feel extra welcoming :) We all very much enjoyed ourselves and felt relaxed in the apartment! Would highly recommend!

It was nice and cosy very clean, about 10 min walk from the las Rambla street from the port is only 7 min by car, from the beach is about 20 min. Overall it was really nice flat and very clean. Host is communicating quick.

The apartment is very nice, clean and complete with whatever is needed.
The furnitures are modern and the kitchen is equipped with everything you might need.
The position is in my opinion the best possible in Barcelona, close to very nice restaurants (go to Carrer De Blai) and to the city center (Raval and Barrio Gotico). We took the public transports just to get to Gracia and Segrada Familia.
Good location, lots of nice restaurants and bars nearby with a short walk to the gothic quarter. Host was very helpful and would recommend.

We had a wonderful stay! The Stay U-nique team was responsive to all our local questions. The home was clean and comfortable. All essential amenities were provided. This home is surrounded by tons of restaurants, grocery stores, coffe shops and small shopping stores which was convenient for us. We highly recommend this place.
Convenient location. Excellent communication and easy check in.  Would book again!

Es war super. Das Appartement hat alles was man braucht. Hier hätten wir auch länger bleiben können, da die Ausstattung keine Wünsche offen lässt. 40 Meter weiter ist ein Supermarkt was für uns sehr gut war. 
Die Lage insgesamt fanden wir super. Man war in kürzester Zeit auf den ramblas. Eine Metro in direkter Nähe und zum Flughafen sehr günstig gelegen. 
Die Kommunikation hat perfekt funktioniert. Vor Ort der Check In war einwandfrei. 
Selbst während des Aufenthalts war das Team erreichbar. 
Dickes Lob. Daumen hoch!!
Un accueil chaleureux et un service parfait!
Le logement est bien situé. Kim nous a très bien accueillis. Joli appartement, bien équipé, petit bémol pour les voisins bruyants.
Great apartment, great location and a great host.  Definitely recommend.

Lovely bright, clean apartment close to La Rambla. Stay Unique communicated very well throughout and check in was very smooth. Evelyn welcomed us and gave us some great tips about where to visit and how to get there. Well stocked with toiletries and they even provided a bottle of wine and some snacks on arrival!

Wir haben uns sehr Wohlgefühlt!
Die Lage ist super - wir konnten überall mit dem Fahrrad hinfahren
Sehr zu empfehlen !

Good location, close to metro stop. Very clean apartment, lots of utensils to use, filter coffee and Nescafé dulce gusto options, comfy beds, good showers, good heating and insulation. No complaints at all and will stay again. Thank you!

Great location and lovely apartment. 
They go out of there way to make check in easy and are really helpful in getting any tourism related things you may want to do in Barcelona organised. 
UNFORTUNATELY 
We had a terrible experience with the neighbours with them being so noisy that on the 3rd night of noise we had to get the Airbnb hosts to call the police. The hosts did everything they could to help but as this happened 3 of the 4 nights of our stay we felt it was important for other future guests to be aware that this had happened to us. Hopefully the horrible noisy neighbours can be dealt with quickly as outside this the place was perfect.
l appartement était mal isolé du bruit extérieur... à part ça tout était parfait!
非常好的公寓,位置好,周围很多不错的餐厅｡去景点也很方便,公交打车巴塞都和很棒｡

Ho soggiornato in questo appartamento per il capodanno con un gruppo di cinque amici. Non siamo rimasti delusi dall'appartamento, molto carino e bene arredato e  in un'ottima posizione  per raggiungere il centro storico sia a piedi sia con la metro; inoltre la presenza di doppi servizi si è rivelata estremamente utile. Tuttavia il nostro soggiorno ha preso una brutta piega quando la notte del 31 dicembre per un problema tecnico all'intero stabile è andata via la corrente, lasciandoci per due giorni senza luce in casa. Naturalmente il problema e la sua risoluzione non sono dipesi dallo staff di Stay-unique, tuttavia non siamo rimasti soddisfatti di come tutta la questione è stata affrontata. 
Innanzitutto al nostro arrivo siamo stati accolti da un ragazzo italiano, Andrea, che ci ha assicurato che avremmo potuto contattarlo in qualsiasi momento per qualsiasi problema, ma (non a caso) non ci ha lasciato il suo numero dicendoci che avremmo potuto contattarlo chiamando il numero per i clienti di Stay unique. Peccato che la sera del 31, quando si è verificato il problema, non è stato possibile parlare con lui perché ci è stato detto che non lavorava quella sera. Ad ogni modo abbiamo parlato con una ragazza molto gentile che ci ha proposto di mandare un tecnico la sera stessa (stiamo parlando del 31 dicembre alle 23.00), ma noi data la serata particolare, in cui dubitavamo che sarebbe arrivato realmente qualcuno, abbiamo chiesto di mandare il tecnico la mattina successiva. Il primo gennaio ci siamo svegliati prima del previsto per aspettare il tecnico e siamo rimasti a casa tutta la mattina ( sottraendo tempo alla visita della città) per poi sentirci dire che il problema dipendeva dalla società elettrica che gestiva il condominio e che quindi bisognava aspettare che fosse la società e riparare il guasto. Dato che la sera dell'1 gennaio il problema persisteva, ci hanno offerto un altro appartamento per passare la notte nel quale ci siamo trasferiti all'una di notte, pagando un taxi, perché quella sera avevamo un concerto prenotato al Palau della Musica. Da notare che l'appartamento datoci in alternativa non aveva le stesse caratteristiche di quello che avevamo prenotato (niente doppi servizi e secondo letto da una piazza e mezza, quindi neanche matrimoniale e per di più in uno spazio comune). La mattina successiva abbiamo chiesto di poter restare nel nuovo appartamento anche per l'ultima notte (il giorno successivo saremmo ripartiti) ma ci hanno detto che non era possibile, quindi siamo tornati nuovamente nell'altra casa, dove il problema si è risolto verso le due del pomeriggio. Nel frattempo abbiamo dovuto pulire tutto il frigo che si era sbrinato e buttare la spesa al suo interno perché andata a male).
Come risarcimento per la vacanza rovinata, i disagi e il tempo perso Stay unique ci ha proposto un risarcimento del 20% sul totale del soggiorno. Quando abbiamo fatto notare che non era adeguato al danno subito facendo notare anche la spesa che abbiamo dovuto buttare, ci hanno proposto solo un risarcimento del costo della spesa e del taxi per lo spostamento nell'altro appartamento e anzi, hanno pure avuto il coraggio di dire che noi abbiamo rifiutato alcune soluzioni che ci avevamo proposto, cioè mandare un tecnico il 31 dicembre alle 23 (che, come no, sarebbe di sicuro venuto!) o trasferirci le valigie nel nuovo appartamento (non sarebbe servito a niente dato che avremmo comunque dovuto lasciarlo la mattina successiva); inoltre hanno pure avuto la faccia tosta di dire che il frigo era in ordine (ci credo, abbiamo passato noi la mattina a pulirlo!). A conclusione di tutto questo, non hanno nemmeno aspettato che accettassimo la loro proposta e hanno provveduto a fare il bonifico del rimborso, per mettersi le spalle al coperto.  Non è questo il modo di fare.
Capisco che questo problema non sia dipeso da loro, ma non ci è piaciuto il modo in cui siamo stati trattati, siamo stati presi in giro.
Nice and clean place. In a 10 minutes walking distance from La Rambla street. Recommended for guests up to 6.
Bardzo dobra lokalizacja. W pobliżu market z bardzo dobrymi cenami. W okolicy bardzo dużo kawiarni i puby. Mogę serdecznie polecić to mieszkanie.

We had a great experience with this apartment. The location is great, the apartment is nice and modern, and the communication with the host was good. They responded quickly and fixed any issue we had as soon as possible.

At first we were a bit worried that this apartment is run by a private company which 
presumably owns and rents out many apartments around Barcelona, but in the end this did not play a factor at all and we had a great experience.
Amazing place
Great stay and service.
recomendable
Todo genial!! Gracias!!

Świetne miejsce dla rodziny z dziećmi. Blisko La Rambli i parku na wzgórzu MontJuic. Blisko również plac zabaw i dobrze zaopatrzone sklepy. W mieszkaniu były wszystkie potrzebne sprzęty do przygotowywania posiłków na miejscu. Jedyna uwaga to, że w jednym z pokojów może być słychać sąsiadów poprzez cienkie ściany ale akurat nam to mocno nie przeszkadzało.
Tres bon accueil, de gentilles attentions à l'arrivée (petit mot personnalisé,  gateaux, vin...). Tout est mis en place pour que le sejour soit le plus agréable possible.

The apartment was bright and clean and perfectly sized for our family of four. I was able to arrange for someone to be on site when we got there and the check in was easy. It's in a great location, just a short walk to the metro and Las Ramblas. Though we had our own agenda, I felt that if we needed anything the Stay U-Nique staff was ready for tips and other advice. The one thing that I would complain about, of which the host has no control over, is that the wall between the back bedroom and the adjacent apartment seems to be pretty thin and when we were the neighbors liked to stay up late and talk. Overall though, a great choice for a place to stay in Barcelona. Recommended.

Alojamiento impecable, moderno y limpio. El problema que tiene es que desde la habitación principal se oye al vecino perfectamente incluso utilizando un tono de voz normal. Nosotros dormimos con auriculares.  A pesar de eso, repetiriamos.
El departamento es tal cual está descrito en la publicación. Muy bien ubicado, cerca del metro y buses. Es una zona tranquila y cómoda. El apartamento limpio y completo

name: Quarto no rio de janeiro
summary: Quarto localizado no bairro da Tijuca , bairro tradicional do Rio de Janeiro, perto de estações de metro diferentes e Maracanã . O quarto tem ar condicionado, armário, cama de casal , além de uma bela vista da floresta de Tijuca.
description: Quarto localizado no bairro da Tijuca , bairro tradicional do Rio de Janeiro, perto de estações de metro diferentes e Maracanã . O quarto tem ar condicionado, armário, cama de casal , além de uma bela vista da floresta de Tijuca.

name: Private bedroom in BORN
summary: Nice and lightly bedroom in a 165m2 flat sharing with 4 people. Very confortable and placed in the center of Barcelona. 10 min walking to the beach and near to parque Ciutadella and Arc de Triomph.
space: Big and lightly bedroom. Our flat is near to Born and Parque Ciutadella. 10 min walking to the Barceloneta (beach). You can use the kitchen and also the washing machine.  All nationalities to practice your languages :)
description: Nice and lightly bedroom in a 165m2 flat sharing with 4 people. Very confortable and placed in the center of Barcelona. 10 min walking to the beach and near to parque Ciutadella and Arc de Triomph. Big and lightly bedroom. Our flat is near to Born and Parque Ciutadella. 10 min walking to the Barceloneta (beach). You can use the kitchen and also the washing machine.  All nationalities to practice your languages :) Shared bathroom and kitchen. Near to metro Arc de Triomph but you can also approach any barrio walking: 10min to Gothic, 15min to Raval, 10min to Passeig de Gracia and shopping zone!!

house_rules: 1) Do not smoke in the bedroom. 2) Silence from 00pm to 8am during working days, no parties or events. 3) Check-in 24h/7 subject to availability 4) You can use the kitchen and whashing machine ;) 5) Keep your space clean and tidy :-)

host.host_about: Happiness, travel, fun, party it's all we need in that word :)

address.government_area: Sant Pere, Santa Caterina i la Ribera

reviews.comments: Apartment is in a great location! The place is clean, quiet and bright. The roommates where amazing and would definitely stay here again. Max was always in communication and check-in was super easy!
The host canceled this reservation 7 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

I really enjoyed staying at Max's place. Before my arrival the contact was extremely good and Max always kept in touch. Since my flight to Barcelona arrived extremely late on Saturday, Max luckily was very flexible in welcoming me, also in the middle of the night. He's an awesome Airbnb host and I highly appreciated staying at the flat as the (Hidden by Airbnb) were extremely friendly, the location of the apartment just perfect and the everything as promised in the advertisement. 

I would definitely recommend staying at this Airbnb Apartment as Max will make sure that you have a wonderful stay!
Host was amazing !!!

Nous avons très bien été accueillis par les colocataires de Maxence. 
L'appartement est beau et typique et assez grand pour être partager et avoir une grande intimité ! 
Le bâtiment en lui même vaut également le détour avec des volumes impressionnant. 
Je recommande pour un couple ou deux amis, il est en plus situé dans un super endroit, très bien placé dans un quartier beau, vibrant et plein de vie

Max was away at the time of our arrival so his friend Daniella coordinated things. Everything went smoothly and both Max and Daniella were very friendly and responsive. No problems at all with the room. We don't know Barcelona very well but we really liked the neighborhood of the apartment and found it convenient for getting to other parts of the city.
The place was very nice and clean. Perfect location and the hosts were very friendly.
Very nice place with a great location
The host canceled this reservation 28 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: Elegant suite in historic center
summary: LOIOS SUITE As traditional and romantic as the heart of Porto can be. This elegant and cozy suite is close to the shopping and historic district nearby lots of cafes and restaurants.  Access to living room and kitchen. There will be Maria, the cleaning lady, who maintains every morning all the shared areas tidy and clean ! Breakfast not included.
description: LOIOS SUITE As traditional and romantic as the heart of Porto can be. This elegant and cozy suite is close to the shopping and historic district nearby lots of cafes and restaurants.  Access to living room and kitchen. There will be Maria, the cleaning lady, who maintains every morning all the shared areas tidy and clean ! Breakfast not included. Surely Porto will bring you the happiness and the relax time that you want for these days. We are located in the spot of all the monuments, the best eateries and shops. The famous CLERIGOS TOWER is just a 100 m away! GETTING HERE BY METRO Take the metro from the airport to SAO BENTO station, then walk 3 minutes to Rua de Trás, 48. PARKING PLACE As we are located right in the heart of the oldtown of Porto, parking is always paid. There are a lot of public parking places. The two best are CLERIGOS or CARDOSAS, both 2 minutes away from us. The price, asking for the touristic card, is about 20€/24h. CLEANING MAINTENANCE You can enter the building
neighborhood_overview: Surely Porto will bring you the happiness and the relax time that you want for these days. We are located in the spot of all the monuments, the best eateries and shops. The famous CLERIGOS TOWER is just a 100 m away!
notes: CLEANING MAINTENANCE You can enter the building to leave luggage from 08:30 till 12:00 on the check in day. There will be Maria, the cleaning lady, who maintains every morning all the shared areas tidy and clean ! If the room is already cleaned you can do the check in as well. LEAVING LUGGAGE  If you have any luggage that you want to guard in the building the check out day, leave and pick it later.
transit: GETTING HERE BY METRO Take the metro from the airport to SAO BENTO station, then walk 3 minutes to Rua de Trás, 48. PARKING PLACE As we are located right in the heart of the oldtown of Porto, parking is always paid. There are a lot of public parking places. The two best are CLERIGOS or CARDOSAS, both 2 minutes away from us. The price, asking for the touristic card, is about 20€/24h.

host.host_about:
love traveling, tourism, speak different languages and meet people !!
favorite sports: surf and alpine skiing :)

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments:
Elegant room indeed, very stylish and exactly as on the picture. Everything new and clean. The breakfast was very nice, fresh bread and sweets from the bakery across the street.
The location in the centre was perfect. In 15 minutes you can walk to the river Douro and lots of points of interest. Fred was helpfull and was open to suggestions.

Our stay was perfect! Room was very nice, clean and a decent matras. The location was Excellent. Situated next to the main train station. And only a small walk to the city center! All in all, it was a great stay with and the breakfast is a plus. Not really an air bnb, but more a hotel, which is great

Fred hat uns sehr freundlich empfangen, das Zimmer war sehr schön, direkt im Zentrum von Porto. Würde es jederzeit weiterempfehlen.
Das Preis Leistungsverhältnis war einfach Top.
