A estadia na propriedade do Fred foi incrível. A localização é extremamente ideal para quem quer ficar próximo do transporte público (comboio) e das principais atrações que a cidade do Porto tem a oferecer. Vale destacar a pessoa que é o Fred, um cara extremamente simpático e correto, fez o possível para que nossa estadia fosse perfeita, sem nenhum desacordo. A suit estava extremamente limpa e organizada, sem contar que o prédio como um todo é limpo e organizado. Fomos surpreendido ao chegar, sabendo que tinhamos direito ao café da manhã, uma boa gentileza! Ao final da estadia o Fred foi bastante solicito e até nos ajudou, levando-nos em seu carro até a estação de comboio, de onde seguimos (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza, recomendo a imóvel do Fred!

We didn't actually meet Fred, though he sent us an exuberant electronic welcome, but a nice lady met us and showed us around. The room was fine and astonishingly quiet given that Fred's place caters for quite a few people.
People travelling with cars note that Fred's place is extremely difficult to reach because of narrow little streets and the GPS is not quite up to date and tries to send you the wrong way down one-way streets. Parking in a pay parking garage a stone's throw from Fred's.

Wonderful! the stay in Fred's hause was really special! the room is beautiful, very clean and well furnished. The position is great, in one of the best part of Porto. we had the car and we found very easy free park, but is near also to the station.
Porto is AMAZING! we loved the city.
Fred is a special host, attentive, willing and very helpful, he suggested us different restaurant and attraction of the city! I absolutely reccomend Fred's haus! 
Grazie mille di tutto Fred, siamo state benissimo, spero di tornare un giorno a Porto, magari per un soggiorno più lungo.
Bellissima esperienza, incontro davvero piacevole con Fred. Grazie
stylish, clean and comfortable room in a great location – we are happy customers!
Place was great; exactly as pictured. Central location, close to everything, train station, metro, bus , walking and shopping.

The place is very clean, and is located in the center of the city. Close to everything. It is just not so easy for parking. 
The host is very helpful.
The place is very clean and new. It is located at the center of Porto, you can go tourist spots by walking from Fred's home. Also Fred is very kind ^^

Ha sido una estancia estupenda. Toda tal y como habíamos hablado y visto en Airbnb. La localización esta genial, en todo el centro, cerca de paradas de autobús, metro, taxi y trenes. Una limpieza inmejorable en la habitación, baño y cocina. Respecto a los anfitriones sólo puedo decir palabras bonitas, nos recibieron espectacularmente y estuvieron dispuestos a ayudarnos en todo. La chica que sirve los desayunos es muy simpática y eficaz. El desayuno incluido esta muy bien, ademas de tostadas y zumo ponen un pequeño pastel típico de Portugal para que degustemos las delicias de la zona. Cuando volvamos a Oporto no dudaré en repetir.
Todo perfecto! Preciosa habitación y localización inmejorable. No dudaremos en hospedarnos de nuevo aquí cuando volvamos a Porto.

We had a great time staying at Fred's place. The staff takes great care of the rooms and common areas (everything is professionally cleaned, which we enjoyed) and the daily breakfast was a very nice touch. The house is walking distance from many great viewpoints, restaurants and the famous Livraria Lello library. Thank you for an awesome stay in Porto! :-)

Nous avons passé un super séjour dans l'hotel particulier de Fred.
On vous conseille de venir séjourner ici et de prendre les petits déjeuners car ils sont délicieux. 
Les lieux sont très bien tenus, c'est très propre et très agréable d'y passer du temps. Fred et Maria nous ont accueillis comme des rois.
Nous n'hésiterons pas à y retourner si l'occasion se représente. 
Gros plus la suite est située en plein centre et à proximité de tout, parfait.

Dimitri & Marie-Camille

We did receive a very nice welcome from Fred, he explained everything very nicely.
Fred's House is located right is the centre of Porto , very well connected and close to all the main attractions of the city.
Apartment is very clean as present in picture, more like a hotel.

Fred was an absolute star having to wait up until 1am, due to our delayed flight, to welcome us to his apartment. We couldn't have asked for much more, our stay was perfect. Photos very accurate, very clean and AMAZING location. Generally an absolutely lovely place to stay. Highly recommended.
wonderful location and room.
Unterkunft war super, genau wie beschrieben. Küche zur gemeinsamen Nutzung gibt es auch. Alles super sauber und top ausgestattet.

Forgot Lisabon go to Porto :)
Fred and Maria were great hosts. Their house is at amazing location in very centre of the city. The room is beautiful :)

Très belle petite chambre en plein cœur de Porto, très charmante. 
Organisation au top avec Fred.
Un excellent week-end !

La chambre est belle et très propre. L'endroit est idéalement situé pour découvrir Porto à pied. on revenait fréquemment à la chambre. C'est au milieu de tout. Un bonheur. 
Fred est très bien organisé et a été arrangeant avec nous. il parle très bien français et nous a très bien reçu. 
Bref, un sans faute. 
Nous le recommandons vivement.
Nice and clean room. Great location. Highly recommendable.

Fred's house is in a very handy location, in a little street only a few minutes' walk from Sao Bento station, the Lello bookshop, lots of bars and cafes. The room is clean and modern, The breakfast was lovely and Maria (who let us in) was helpful. Thank you!

What a nice stay in Porto! I really like this guy. Fred is an charming uncomplicated host and took care of everything we need. The room was nice and clean. I really recommend this place in the middle of Porto. It's worth it!

Un très très bon accueil. Chaleur humaine assurée! 
Le lieu correspond tout à fait au descriptif. Le petit déjeuner complet avec ses fraîches oranges pressées.  Une très bonne literie. Très propre et très charmant. 
Tout autour du lieu beaucoup de vie, très pratique si on est sans voiture.
Nous avons adoré! 
Merci, Obrigada

Die Lage der Unterkunft war perfekt! Das Zimmer sehr modern eingerichtet und sauber. Leider war es sehr laut, da wir immer die Fenster öffnen mussten, da es keine Klima hatte. Aber ansonsten würde ich das Zimmer jederzeit weiter empfehlen!
Maria und Fred waren sehr freundlich und haben uns jederzeit weiter geholfen!!
Can't think to a better place to stay in Porto! Fred has even been super welcoming and helpful suggesting us restaurants, bars etc. He definitely made our staying in Porto perfect!

Bellissima stanza con bagno privato in un'ottima posizione a Porto. Tutto molto pulito, nuovo e curato nei minimi dettagli. Ve lo consiglio. Grazie anche a Fred una persona molto simpatica e disponibile

We had a fantastic time in Fred's guesthouse. It's very well located right in the centre and we enjoyed the comfortable bed as much as we enjoyed the tips Fred gave us for dinner. He also speaks German very well.

Fred's apartment is exactly as described! The room was beautifull, very clean and is located in the center of Porto. Fred made sure there was a spare key for us to enter the house since he couldn't make it to receive us. And even when we checked out, we could leave our luggage in the house and he gave us a spare key for us to use. From the house the center is easy accessible and there a lot of nice restaurants and bars in the neighbourhood. Overall, we had a fantastic stay!

Great room, great location, Fred was great. We arrived early in Porto but that was no problem for Fred. He also gave us great tips for Porto. 
Next time we would definitely stay in Fred's House again.

Fred è un padrone di casa discreto e puntuale: ci ha fornito indicazioni chiarissime e abbiamo trovato una sistemazione deliziosa, pulitissima e assai comoda per muoverci a Porto. La camera Loios è bella, luminosa e funzionale. Siamo stati benissimo!

Fred is a very nice host. He was helpful and the room was very beautiful and modern. The room is very nice decorated and the bathroom was excellent. The house is located very well in the city centre. 

All in all we had very a comfortable stay. 

Best Joséphine and Rico

O Fred foi um anfitrião muito agradável e esteve sempre disponível para nos ajudar e recomendar os melhores lugares do Porto.

O quarto é exatamente como aparece no anúncio e a localização é excelente.

Muito recomendável!

Fred's place was perfectly located, spotless, and looked brand new. The bathroom was in the room which was great. Fred was very interesting to talk to and gave us good pointers about where to go and what to do. We would definitely stay there again.

Perfect location in the center of Porto. Very convenient to visit everything.
The room is bright and quite high in the building (no lift!)
We did not meet Fred in person as we arrived very late but he kindly arranged everything to make our arrival very easy.

La chambre est idéalement située en plein cœur historique et est très sympa. Même si nous n'avons pas pu nous voir physiquement, Fred est toujours disponible et nous a renseigné sur les bonnes adresses locales (et en français ! :) merci Fred).
Le seul bémol est le bruit la chambre que nous avions donnait sur un des axes principaux de circulation... 

Nous ne regrettons pas notre séjour,

Un grand Merci,

Romain

Wir hatten einen tollen Aufenthalt in einem der Zimmer in Fred's House. Toll war die zentrale Lage mitten im Zentrum, der reibungslose Check-in und die Hilfsbereitschaft von Fred, der sogar super deutsch spricht :) Das Frühstück von Maria konnten wir leider nicht bewerten, da wir uns unser Glutenfreies Frühstück in der Gemeinschaftsküche selbst zubereitet haben.

Wir hatten das Zimmer LOIOS mit eigenem Bad. Es war toll eingerichtet und hatte ein bequemes, großes Bett. TIPP: Oropax nicht vergessen! Das Gebäude ist alt und man hört durch die Fenster die Straße und den Trubel der Stadt ;)

Porto hat uns sehr gefallen und es gibt viele tolle Restaurants und Bars in der näheren Umgebung. Ein Auto ist in Porto eigentlich überflüssig, da man alles gut zu Fuß erkunden kann! 
Fred hat uns vorab auch tolle Empfehlungen geschickt und ist ein super Gastgeber.
Ein gemütliches, sauberes Zimmer in sehr zentraler Lage.

Freds house was central, clean, easy to acces and Nice to stay. The information Fred gave us was easy and usefull including tips like natives. You could have breakfast in the livingroom and there was a kitchen where u could make your own food if you want to. Definitly a place to go back!

Everything was alright, check in was easy and as descriped in the messages from Fred. We didn´t met Fred, but the room, bathroom and the possibility of using the kitchen was great! We can recommend this hostel!
Muy buena ubicación, limpio y habitación comoda con todo lo necesario.

We had a great stay. Fred was extremely friendly guy which was really easy in the communication. Within a day I got a reply to all me answers.

The apartment was perfect. The location is in the city centre so you can walk everywhere. 

I can recommend this apartment to everyone.

Fred's house is a beautiful, clean, and central Airbnb that I would absolutely recommend to anyone visiting Porto. We met Fred when we checked in and he gave us several wonderful recommendations for our time in the city. Overall an exceptional experience!

Chambre avec salle de bain très sympa, au cœur de porto,
Logistique de check-in et out très flexible, très bon état des équipements, propreté impeccable! Très bon accueil de Fred.
Apartment was conveniently located to the train station.  Check in/ out procedure was great.  Room was clean and well maintained.  No complaints.

What you see in the pictures is what you get: a nice, comfy room with an awesome bed and a clean, private bathroom. What you don't see in the pictures: extremely central location, close to bars and a 10 min. walk away from the Douro river. But if you close the windows, there is no noise from the street. Tip: if you enter the park across the 'Torre dos Clérigos', on top of the hill you'll find an awesome bar called BASE where they serve good coffee and cocktails.

Tout d'abord un grand merci à Fred pour cette jolie chambre pleine de charme. Nous avons passé un excellent séjour de 5j à Porto et nous avons pu facilement visiter la ville grâce à la localisation idéale de ce logement. La chambre est extrêmement propre. Le système que nous avait proposé Fred pour récupérer les clés a été tres simple pour nous et tres bien expliqué. Seul bémol, le bruit nocturne du logement mais qui est un peu inévitable vu l'excellente localisation!

Trata-se de prédio com estrutura e perfil profissional de hostel, porém sem funcionários, totalmente reformado, limpo e organizado. O quarto é muito confortável e a localização é excelente! O único ponto é que não fica ninguém no prédio, então caso queira a experiência de interagir com o morador, isso não é possível.
The place is very well located, it is ran like a hostel where you do your own check in and out. Very efficient, just unfortunately that we did not get to meet Fred.
The location was good and clean. The bed was also good. Porto is a nice city to visit for 3 to 4 days

Fred is an amazing host and made great efforts to ensure our comfort. During our stay, Fred stopped by multiple times to bring us more blankets and later our boarding passes, which he offered to print. He even welcomed us to stay after check-out because we had a late flight. 

The location was great, just off the metro, within a less than a five minutes walk to the station and the Livraria Lello. 

The design of the space is elegant but sensible, and I loved the skylight and white interiors. 

Overall, I'd absolutely recommend this place.
Die Unterkunft liegt mitten im Zentrum von Porto,nicht weit von der Metro Station entfernt. Man fühlte sich ein wenig wie im Hotel,echt super ordentlich und vor allem ein sehr schönes Zimmer.
Amazing apartment that is clean, beautiful and close to everything. Fred's recommendations were all great as well. Definitely recommended!

This place was great, right in the heart of the city. Did not spend any money on public transportation. The room is clean and neat. Fred is really nice and very helpful. We had not planned anything for this trip and he gave us great suggestions. Overall we had an amazing time in our short stay.

It was perfect! The room was small but great, a Luxe and clean bathroom ! The neighborhood is fine, in the centrum, all the nice restaurants on the corner or easy to walk! The room was clean en modern, feels like home! It's a perfect place when you are going to Porto! Enjoy

Fred's place is a perfect place to stay, particularly if you want to be in central Porto. It is exactly as described/seen in the photos - very quaint, clean and perfectly located - about 3 mins walk from the metro station, 10 mins from the Douro River and pretty much next door to the Clerigos Tower (which you can climb and get fantastic views of the city). We had breakfast on the last day which was also very nice! Fred could not have been a lovelier guy - really keen to make sure you have had a perfect trip and obviously very passionate about providing affordable but very comfortable accommodation, which this absolutely is!
Good choice if you are looking for something well located

Wow, what a great AirBnb to stay at in Porto!

Freds house is super central located within walking distance of all the major tourist attractions and close to nightlife and restaurants. I believe you cannot find a better location!

The house is an old building but recently renovated with a lot of attention to detail. Very modern and nice looking. The room we had was very clean and ready when we arrived. Each room as a bathroom and all rooms share a living room and kitchen. You can have a great breakfast that is being served by Maria, the woman that takes care of the house.

Although we did not meet Fred in person all went really smooth! We had the feeling we could reach out whenever we needed anything. But that was not necessary as everything was arranged just perfect. Highly recommended host. 

Looking forward to come back to this beautiful city and the great host Fred!
Die Lage von der Unterkunft ist perfekt, mitten im Zentrum von Porto. Die Zimmer waren super schön und sauber. Wir haben uns sehr wohlgefühlt und würden jederzeit wiederkommen.

We didnt get to meet Fred but he left us very detailed instructions on how to get to the accommodation and some lovely recommendations for food and drinks . The apartment is very clean and tastefully decorated. Location was excellent! Everything was within walking distance to us . Only minor issue was the noise from the street late at night eventhough we had the windows closed but seeing as the location was prime, we didn't mind it too much. Thanks for a lovely stay Fred!
Excellent location, walking distance to everything. Apartment was very clean and as described. The en suite bathroom as a bonus. Would stay here again!

Fred's place is exactly like pictures show. The room was clean and cozy, sited in a great location, it couldn't be more central. the only flaw was the noise in the nights of the week end. We did not meet Fred in person, but he took care to give us detailed information about how to check in and out, and also many advices on the things to visit and where to eat or drink. 
Check in and check out process worked perfectly. 
We did not book the breakfast during our stay and did not make use of the kitchen. Nevertheless we saw it was perfect equipped and the house had also a nice living room. 
Wifi connection worked fine. 
We can just recommend this place.

Eine super zentrale Unterkunft in einem schön sanierten klassischen Portuenser Haus, das komplett als Guesthouse genutz wird. Ein- und Aus-Checken ist wunderbar bequem und jeder Zeit möglich. Das Zimmer war zweckmäßig und nett eingerichtet. Perfekt für einen Städtetrip! (Es gibt auch eine wirklich gut ausgestattete Küche und einen Aufenthaltsraum.) Was man vielleicht wissen sollte: Es sind u.U. ziemlich viele Treppenstufen zu bewältigen (kein Aufzug) und wenn man ein Zimmer zur rückseitigen Rua dos Clérigos (führt vom Bahnhof quasi direkt ins Nachtleben und zurück) erwischt, kann es nachts etwas laut sein. Insgesamt aber eine sehr empfehlenswerte Unterkunft.
A casa do Fred é bastante confortável e muito bem localizada. As sugestões do que visitar no Porto são muitos boas. Bastante agradável para passar uns dias na cidade invicta!

Great location, with pretty much everything you would like to see in Porto at a walking distance. Fred's tips and suggestions for places to visit and things to do around the city are also quite helpful!

It was my first time in Porto and Fred's house is located in a perfect place to visit the whole city :D 
I could walk to the rivet, famous market, beautiful station etc
Clean and lovely room just same as the pictures. 

I will definitely choose Fred's house when I come back to Porto. 

Well just one thing yoy might consider, stairs are pretty stiff and if you have really heavy luggage, then it would be little bit hard to go up with it.
Wir fühlten uns in Freds Haus sehr wohl. Die Ausstattung ist sehr geschmackvoll und das Badezimmer super.

Die Unterkunft von Fred liegt ideal, ist prima sauber, liebevoll und richtig schnuckelig. Alles hat bestens geklappt und Fred war schon im Voraus sehr hilfsbereit. Die Reisezeit Ende Mai war ideal. Je nach Jahreszeit muss man am Standort von Fred's house mit den Nebeneffekten der nahen Baustelle, der Hitze und dem nächtlichen Lärm in den Strassen leben können. Abgesehen davon würde ich jederzeit wieder in Fred's house zurück kehren.

Freds House liegt sehr zentral. Von dort aus waren wir zu Fuß in fünf Minuten unten. Das Zimmer war sehr sauber, genauso wie die ganze Wohnung. Die für die Sauberkeit zuständige Dame war immer freundlich und hilfsbereit. Alles in allem sehr sehr schön dort!

Die Informationen im Vorfeld waren sehr detailliert. Die Wegbeschreibung sehr ausführlich. Check-in und Check-our war problemlos. Das Zimmer ist neu und wunderschön möbliert. Zimmer und Badezimmer waren sehr sauber. Wir können es nur empfehlen. Die Lage ist optimal - mitten in der Stadt. Für eine Städtereise könnte es nicht besser sein. Wir haben uns sehr wohlgefühlt und können es nur empfehlen.
Lovely place to stay; simple but definitely value for money. Lovely breakfast, great location and informative host! Would 100% stay here again.

Fred's place is definitely in a good central location. It is closed to a main train station and metro station which makes the transport for day trips and airport very convenient.  The room has offered everything I needed. I especially like the big shower room, the common kitchen for making coffee every morning and the cozy living room for a short rest during the day. Saying thanks to the kind lady to help keeping the place clean too.  I'd definitely recommend Fred's place for anyone staying in Porto!
Excelente alojamiento. El lugar maravilloso, moderno, iluminado, cómodo, limpio y en una excelente ubicación! Muy recomendable!!
Very Nice place! It was clean and everything you need was there. Simple breakfast for a good price.
Highly recommended !

Fred's huis ligt letterlijk in het midden van de stad. Ik was verbaasd dat (bijna) alle bezienswaardigheden op max. 5 minuten loopafstand is. Fred is een aardige man en communiceert snel en helpt je meteen!
De kamer (Loíos) was net een hotelkamer (met aparte badkamer) en ziet er net uit als op de afbeelding: karakteristiek, schoon en compact.

Excellent apartment, great location near the train station and attractions, great restaurant and coffee shop in the same street. The cleaner was lovely, room was small but well equipped, bathroom private and shared were excellent. An absolute bargain

Hi All,
Fred's appartements are really nice. Tastefully decorated in an old town house. All is fine. You are in the middle of the things you want to visit in Porto. It's ideal when you travel with public transport as it's close to the Metro and you can leave your luggage also after check out. It's in the very center of Porto so be prepared for some sounds from the street. 
I can highly recommend it!
Uli
Nice apartment! Clean and really in the city center close to everything!

Système de récupération des clefs idéal. 
Logement ultra central. Quelque peu bruyant car donnant sur une rue passante mais sans plus de désagrément. 
Décoration du logement minimaliste et soignée. 

Une très bonne  adresse pour séjourner à Porto !

위치가 너무 좋고 진짜 깨끗했어요 
다만 룸이 있는 층이 3층이상이라 짐들고 올라가기 힘들긴했어요 ㅜ 그리고 에어비앤비 에 찍혀있는 주소는 사무실주소여서 언덕받이를 오르락 내리락하느라 너무 힘들었구요 ㅠ 숙소 주소 꼭 다시 확인하세요~ 그 외에는 위치 청결도 시설 너무너무 좋았습니다~
Super, limpio, excelente ubicación, cómodo, en fin recomendable 100%
Great Place for a trip to Porto! Easy Checkin right in the middle of Porto! Would definitely recommend this place!
Clean, modern rooms in a great location. Very straight forward check in and very communicative host! Be prepared for lots of stairs if you have heavy luggage!
Perfect accommodation, just don't mind the many steps to get to the rooms :). Nice neighborhood, a perfect spot to start sightseeing. Good restaurants near by.
Fred is very nice and helpful. The accomodation is perfectly clean and Really pretty. We would stay with him Anytime!!! Perfect!
Nice place, very clean and well kept. Very central, easy to get around, near the train station.

La nostra permanenza da Fred é stata  perfetta! Posizione centrale e comoda, appartamento pulito. Inoltre Fred é disponibilissimo nel dare tutte le informazioni utili per arrivare. Speriamo di tornare!
Emplacement et chambre correspondant parfaitement au descriptif. Idéal pour découvrir la ville. Seul bémol en cas de chaleur estivale fenêtre ouverte le bruit de la rue est incessant.

Perfectly located in a cool neighborhood with lots of nice cafés and restaurants, really clean, nice design and a super friendly host. A lot of small and steep stairs inside the house. Can be a little bit loud because of the big streat outside.

Die Unterkunft war einfach toll. Sie war mitten im Zentrum von Porto und alles war zu Fuß zu erreichen.  Die zusätzliche Küche bietet die Möglichkeit sich selbst zu versorgen.  Gerade wenn man sich mal einen Kaffee oder Tee gönnen möchte.  Ganz besonders gut fanden wir dass es am Check out Tag die Möglichkeit gab das Gepäck in der Unterkunft zu lassen.  Bedingt durch die Lage ist es natürlich nachts auf der Straße vor dem Haus sehr laut. Lässt sich bei geschlossenem Fenster gut ertragen. Wir würden immer wieder kommen.

We stayed at Fred's place for 1 night. The apartment is well located, clean and has a good wifi. 
Like all well located flat, it can be noisy during the night.

Toplocatie
Overal dichtbij op loopafstand
Fred gaf goede tips m.b.t. Activiteiten
Great location, great appartment, great city
Accurate description of property, clean and well appointed rooms, helpful host, very central location and great value for money.

Fred's place is very well located in the center of Porto. It's close to public transportation, restaurants & bars and most of the must-see places in Porto are within walking distance. 

Although we didn't meet Fred in person, he was always available for tips and those tips are definitely worth following!

Fred's place is bright, nice, clean and ideally located; you won't need public transportation as the apartment is in the city centre so it's easy to walk everywhere.
Fred has designed a smart way for checking in so read and follow his instructions, you'll find them pretty easy and convenient.
I totally recommend his place!

Super central apartment right in downtown Porto with lots of shops, bars, cafes and restaurants nearby. 5 min walk from Sao bento train station. Clean twin bed modern ensure room with a shared kitchen and living area. It's up a few flights of stairs but a great, lovely place to stay. Will be back. Thanks  to Fred for tips and advance information prior to our arrival.
The flat is great and also the whole house. Also the location of the flat is very good and in the centre of Porto.

We really enjoyed our short stay in Porto. Fred's place was perfectly located in the heart of the action, was tastefully designed and well-appointed. As a delightful bonus there were interesting shops, coffee stops and restaurants within minutes of the flat. Would gladly stay again - thank you!

Excelente ubicación. Recién renovado. Muy limpio. (Website hidden by Airbnb) apto para personas con movilidad reducida o, viajeros con equipaje grande o pesado. Apto para michleros o viajeros sin equipaje. No tiene aacensor pero si muchas escalas.

The location was great and the private room with bath was very clean. The entry/exit works very well so you even have access to the common space when you've checked out. Keep in mind that the rooms are up stairs and staying in an old city means the noise level is high as buildings are closer to each other. But overall it worked well.

Very clean and well maintained. Very central location, easy to access everything by foot and metro close by as well. It can get a bit noisy outside though on weekend nights, so not the best option if you're a light sleeper, but noise was not an issue on our weeknight stay.
Fred is also easy to get a hold of if you have questions and upon initially booking, he had sent us an email with suggestions for restaurants and sights (a few of which we checked out). Lastly, there were quite a few stairs to get up to our room, but we had read this from a previous review and were mentally (and physically) prepared ahead of time.

O lugar de Fred foi perfeito para nós. Em uma região próxima de tudo que é histórico no Porto, a pequena suíte tem tinha que precisavamos em excelente localização. Silenciosa e limpa. Única observação é que não há elevador. Ficamos no terceiro andar e eu subi com minhas malas e da minha mãe. Para quem não tem condição de subir fica mais difícil.
The room and all parts of Fred’s house are beautiful. The noise from 3-5 am out on the street is annoying.  Bring ear plugs.

Een prima onderkomen, schoon, netjes en biedt wat de plaatjes beloven!
Centrale ligging in de stad kent ook schaduwzijdes.
Groot voordeel: tegenover kun je heel goed ontbijten, bij de voordeur een eenvoudig doch zeer fijn restaurant. Aanbevelenswaardig!

This house is a superb example how to build up and run an airbnb hostel. Clear & fast communication, clean and light rooms, well-thought lightning system and equipped kitchen.
Recommended!
Fantastic location. Lovely room with ensuite bathroom.  Highly recommend. Just be aware that there are lots of stairs to climb.
Logement propre et très bien placé. Aucun reproche à faire. Je vous le conseille.
Local recommendations were top notch! Apartment was clean and tidy! Great location!

La habitación es correcta, muy bonita, las camas cómodas y la ubicación inmejorable. Pero considero que a 60 CHF la noche deberían hacer la cama cada día, darle un toquecito de limpieza al baño de la habitación cada día también y el radidador que hay en la habitación no es suficiente, hace un poco de frío dentro.

Fred is a kind and super solar person, he gives all the details you need in order to have a precious stay in Porto.
Choose Fred's home becuase is nice, central and comfortable. 
I will be back asap !!! :)

I'm a Airbnb "Super Host" and I know a good Airbnb when I see one, and trust me, I've stayed in many.  Look no further and book Freds House.  This accommodation is a "MUST STAY" if in Porto.  Its location was key.  Just 2 blocks from Sao Bento station, It was easy to catch the metro, or in my case train.  Fred has thought of everything, and the Self Check In process was clearly communicated, and easy.  If ever in Porto again, I won't stay anywhere else!  I needed the 6 flights of stair climbing with my luggage to burn all that Bacalau I ate!!!  Thank you Fred!  Ann

Highly recommend to everyone visiting Porto! We could not have chosen a better place to stay during our visit. The flat is in a super walkable, centrally located area that made visiting and enjoying all of Porto’s lovely attractions extremely easy and enjoyable. Inside, the room is exactly as pictured with a lovely view of the street below, private bathroom and shower with wonderful water pressure, and comfortable/clean bed and linens. Everything was very clean and tidy, and the building itself of organized and functional (has a fully equipped shared kitchen and cute living room for guests). Thanks for Fred’s pre-arrival messages, the check in/out process was super easy.

Helpful hints: The building is about a 5 min walk from the train station (perfect for those like us who came from Lisbon for a few days in Porto) and metro stations are also a very short walk away; the area is really safe and we never felt strange or scared at any time of the day/night; there is no elevator in the building so luggage will have to be carried up a few flights of stairs, but it’s a very easy staircase with landings around every curve; for a great place to eat modern and delicious Portuguese food at reasonable prices, enjoy a meal at nearby Brasao Cervejaria Aliados!

We cannot recommend this flat enough and we hope all who stay with Fred will enjoy their stay as much as we did :)
Ubicación perfecta, casa tal cual se ve en las fotos, habitación muy cómoda, súper limpia, acogedora, ducha increíble. Sin duda, si tengo que volver a Oporto repetiré. Muchas gracias Fred

Chambre très belle et idéalement située qui correspond exactement au descriptif. Nous avons pu visiter porto à pied tout le long du séjour (à part la mer). Quartier très agréable (bars, restaurants et monuments). Le seul inconvénient, le radiateur trop petit donc la chambre n’arrivait pas à chauffer. Un peu bruyant le samedi soir (soir de fête oblige).

Fred’s place is perfectly located in Oporto, very easy to get around. Wonderful view from the windows, good beds and shower. It is like a small hotel rather than an actual home. Fred was very friendly and made sure the room was warm during an unexpected cold spell.

Muy buen alojamiento si buscas un lugar donde descansar en una zona céntrica. Nuestra habitación tenía baño y ducha individuales, la cocina es común. Tanto las zonas comunes como las habitaciones estaban impolutas. Recomendable.
Repetiremos si volvemos a oporto.
这里交通非常方便,距离火车站很近,到各处游玩也很方便｡房间很小,但很干净,就是提着箱子上三楼有点吃力｡公共设施很完备,很方便,很舒适!

I loved the location of Fred’s House. Short walk from the Trinidade Metro Station and all points of interest are in close walking distance with Clérigos Tower on the same road. Make sure you where flat comfortable shoes as Porto is VERY hilly and possibly earplugs if you are a light sleeper as Porto never seems to sleep.
Our room was light and airy and spotless. Our room had an W suite with a fabulous shower with shower gel and hairdryer provided. There is also a communal living space. Kitchen and separate shower room that are also very clean. Lots of steps though so not good for those who struggle on their feet.

Fred’s Unterkunft war genau so wie beschrieben: sehr sauber, schick eingerichtet, mitten im Stadtzentrum und mit allem ausgestattet, was man eventuell brauchen könnte. Die Kommunikation hat super funktioniert. Wir hatten hier ein paar schöne und entspannte Tage und haben unseren Aufenthalt sehr genossen. 
Thanks again Fred for having us!

This is a wonderful space in the heart of Porto. We loved that we could come early and leave our luggage while we explored before check in. The location is amazing, however, the street outside can be quite noisy, so make sure to bring some earplugs if you are a light sleeper. Overall we were very comfortable and felt at home in this clean space. We would definitely stay again.
A lovely clean, tidy room right in the centre of Porto, almost everything we wanted to see was within 15 mins walk.

Le logement de Fred est absolument conforme aux photos ! Très propre et design, et surtout idéalement situé en plein coeur de la ville, ce qui nous a permis de tout visiter à pied. Parfait pour un week-end à Porto !
Tolle Unterkunft und perfekte Lage um Porto zu erkunden.

Fred's House is clean and located centrally in the city of Porto. It has a nice and modern interior design, including bathroom, and you can make use of the joint living room and well-equipped kitchen. A good place to stay!

Great place in central Porto! Clean and quiet. Check in super easy. Slightly fewer space than expected.
Even if we didnt meet the host personally, we have been provided with good information about things to do in Porto in advance. Totally fine for a couple of nights in town. Would come back anytime. Thanks Fred!
The room is clean, comfortable and in a great location, close to the metro and the city centre. The instructions for the check-in are pretty clear and Fred was very kind with us.

Die Unterkunft in Freds House liegt sehr zentral und ist von der Metro wie auch mit Bus und Tram sehr gut angebunden. Das bringt allerdings auch mit sich, dass es in der Wohnung z.T. recht laut ist, da sie an einer viel befahrenen Straße liegt. Check-in und Check-out ist unkompliziert. Fred reagiert sehr schnell auf Nachrichten und kümmert sich. Die Wohnung selbst ist sehr schön, aber klein. Es gibt einen Living Room zwei Stockwerke unter der Wohnung und eine separate Küche, die genutzt werden kann. Wir können die Wohnung auf alle Fälle weiter empfehlen. Schöner Aufenthalt.

Die Unterkunft liegt sehr zentral, alles ist fußläufig zu erreichen. 
Die Zimmer sind richtig schön gestaltet und sehr sauber.
Wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt, Fred war ein toller Gastgeber, er ist jederzeit erreichbar und hat uns gute Tipps gegeben!
Great location, bring earplugs to avoid noise at night, intense street is outside
Really nice apartment and a great location!
A simple, yet clean room with all that you need for a stay in Porto. Tucked in a quiet street with lots of great bars and restaurants close by, and only a short walk to Sao Bento station.

Fred's place is centrally located, beautiful, and easy logistically to check-in/check-out/come and go. He gave us lots of local tips and was a great communicator. I would definitely recommend this apartment.
Merci pour votre logement

Een mooie, nette kamer in een leuk appartement in hartje Porto. Met alle bezienswaardigheden op wandelafstand.  Het metro- en treinstation ligt om de hoek.

De eigenaar communiceert snel en correct. En levert vele tips aan omtrent activiteiten, restaurants en bars.

Heerlijk verblijf op een toplocatie.
Central, chic, convenient at the heart of Porto.
Sehr schön und nett. Mit Fred hat die Verständigung super geklappt. Das Zimmer ist sehr schön und freundlich eingerichtet.
Super Lage der Wohnung, flexibles einchecken, etwas laut - Fenster zur Straße hin aber dafür in top Lage. Kleiner Supermarkt gleich in der Nähe....gerne wieder

Soggiorno molto piacevole, stanza molto pulita, minimalista ma con tutto il necessario per un breve soggiorno! La posizione è eccezionale in un palazzo storico in pieno centro. Ci è dispiaciuto non aver incontrato Fred e non aver potuto chiedere di persona qualche consiglio sulla città! Comunque consigliatissimo!!

Perfect place for a week end in porto. 
Great equipments and really easy access

Although the room appeared a little smaller than on the photos and although  it was quite difficult to carry a heavier bag up to our room, we loved Fred's B&B! It is so close to all the sightseeings and the equipment is quite modern. 
We really appreciated that despite high temperatures outside the temperature in our room stayed quite low due to the window shutters!

the location was in the city center and great to do all by foot.
you have to carry all the luggage in the 4 or 5 floor which we didn't know before so think about it when you pack the luggage:)

Tolle, geschmackvolle Unterkunft in Toplage, alles schnell erreichbar, viele Restaurants in der Nähe.
Sehr sauber, problemlose Abwicklung.
Einziger Kritikpunkt: Leider Zimmer zur Strassenseite - die ganze Nacht sehr laut, da auch Nachtklub in der Nähe und Taxistand vor dem Fenster.

"Fred´s House" liegt super zentral. In 5 Minuten an der Metro Sao Bento und der Rua de Flores. Supermarkt 1 Minute. Frühstück in einem der bekanntesten Cafés der Stadt  direkt gegenüber - Portugal live. Mit den anderen Gästen haben sich in der gemeinsamen Küche schöne Gespräche ergeben.
Sehr sauber und zentral.Sehr guter Kontakt.
A great, comfortable base for discovering Porto.
Excelente localização, Fred é um ótimo anfitrião, atencioso e prestativo! Fez nossa estadia em Porto a melhor possível.
perfekte Lage. Schönes Zimmer. Alles sehr unkompliziert!
Logement très bien situé et très propre. Très bon séjour passé. En plus Fred nous donne des explications claires pour arriver au logement et aussi de bonnes adresses. Je reviendrai sans hésiter !

Beautiful apartment in the center of Porto. The room was super nice, very clean and tidy! Fred and Maria were really nice hosts! The location is perfect for sightseeing as you can reach everything in about 10 minutes from there! We definetely recommend this Air BnB and would love to stay there again:)

Wir hatten ein schönes Zimmer mit Bad, guten Betten, sehr sauber. Auch eine Küche und
ein Aufenthaltsraum standen uns zur Verfügung. Maria hält alles sehr ordentlich und sauber. Die Lage ist super, direkt im Zentrum, im quirrligen Leben Portos. Alle Ziele
sind gut fußläufig zu erreichen. Fred hat uns freundlich empfangen und gute Tipps
gegeben. Wir kommen wieder (Website hidden by Airbnb) Danke Fred und alles Gute (Website hidden by Airbnb) Angelika und Manfred
Make sure Fred has not double booked your room then has no understanding if you’ve waisted your time in getting there and seem upset. Also this accommodation is more like back packers not AirBnB
Location exceptionnelle, un hôte à l’écoute et très sympathique. Nous avons passé un excellent moment à Porto. N’hésitez pas à vous loger chez Fred.

We had a great time at Fred’s place! Great location close to loads of shops and restaurants and bars and close to all the sights and public transport! Really clean and comfy beds! Nice kitchen to use if you need it and easy check in and check out. Would definitely stay there again.

I highly recommend staying at Fred's place. My friend and I were in Porto for 3 nights, and the location of this accommodation (right in the heart of the city, close to all major attractions) was perfect for exploring! 

The room and accommodation was excellent - along with your private room and bathroom, you have access to another communal bathroom, a living room, and kitchen. The check-in/check-out process was intuitive and easy (both are self-serviced but Fred is very easy to get  a hold of if there are any issues). He also gave us restaurant, bar, and dessert recommendations in Porto that were all amazing. 

Overall, I highly recommend staying at Fred's place and would 100% return if I'm visiting Porto again. Thanks, Fred!
endroit confortable et très propre mais pas de hote sur place.
Good location. Very, very clean. Host gave good instructions. We stayed one night. Perfect for what we needed.
Perfect location,a little noisy,nice house

Wonderful, hostels-alike apartment in the city center of Porto! Really enjoyed it, check-in was quite easy, the room was cosy but there was no chance to sleep with open windows (for us this was totally ok). There‘s a kitchen for cooking and the bathroom was clear. Nothing to complain about - wonderful!:)

WOW! What a fantastic location centrally located in Porto. Since we were only staying one night and did not book far in advance, we snagged this awesome place as a "rare find" listing. Fred's Place is a full building with a few small units that share a kitchen and living room. Our room had a private bathroom but we noticed not all do. Check-in instructions may sound a bit sketchy but it was actually very safe, simple and secure. The room was the perfect size for those just needing a place to store their belongings and comfortable rest their heads. I would recommend this listing to anyone traveling to Porto. This place truly had a boutique hotel-like feel. Give it, and Porto, a try! You will not regret it!

Fantastic location, stylish decoration, super easy check-in.

Would definitely stay here again when in Porto. Thanks Fred!
Best first airbnb stay! Thanks Fred!

A Fred house é extremamente central próxima a tudo em Porto, diversão e comodidade, pode ser um pouco difícil para dormir pelo barulho da agitada vida noturna da cidade. Fred foi muito amistoso e certeiro nas dicas.
A cozinha coletiva esteve sempre limpa
Lovely, stylish room with ensuite. Great location. Very easy check in. Perfect for a night in Porto!

Very nice and clean place ideally located in the historic center of Porto. Fred provided us with very useful informations about the “must seen/do” and also great bar/restaurant in the neighborhood. 
I would not hesitate to recommend this place and to come back!
The space was perfect for what we needed for our stay, Thank  you!!
We didn't get a chance to meet Fred (he left the keys), but everything went smoothly! Great location and exactly how it looks online. Thanks for a wonderful time!
Appartement très bien placé, mais très bruyant a cause d une rue très fréquentée de nuit
Beautiful room ! Perfect for young couples.

I didn’t meet Fred personally, but his assistant Marina was very helpful. Fred’s place is very clean and hotel kind of accommodation with white and fluffy bed linen. Room is small, but fuctional. There’s a heavy and noisy traffic on the street side of building, but it doesn’t bother if you have ear plugs. This is a good place to stay a couple of nights in Porto!

Fantastic location, great communication and a good value for a terrific guest house. Highly recommend! There have been posts regarding noise, and there are definitely “city sounds” but we did not have any issues with sleep interruption. If you are a light sleeper, ear plugs may be a good idea. Also note this is a 5th floor walk up so be prepared but again- this was not an issue for us. Fred also provided us with perfect directions to guest house and fantastic restaurant recommendations.

Das Haus von Fred ist einfach nur super.
Tolle, mega zentrale Lage - gemütliche Einrichtung - eine kleine Küche zur Selbstversorgung uvm. 
Ich würde jederzeit wieder hier meinen Urlaub verbringen! Fred selbst ist ein unkomplizierter, gastfreundlicher und gut gelaunter Host!:-)

Thanks for the fantastic stay in Porto! We liked the accomondation so much. Especially the easy and early check in and the position of the flat were awesome.

Everything was clean and cosy. Restaurants and bars were so easy to reach. All activities were within walking distance.

Our stay at Fred's was very pleasant, the room is elegant (and also the entire building) and the position is very central, near the station and one of major streets.
We thank Fred so much for his kindness, he explained us everything we needed.

Fred’s place is in a great location! Check-in and check-out are super easy and great if you need to leave your bags for a day while you continue to explore. There is no AC and no fan so it can get hot—and because the window faces a Main Street, it can be a bit noisy, but the central location is great!

Located in the historic centre of porto, this apartment is perfectly situated to explore the city of porto.
The rooms are all very clean and nicely decorated!

Super gezellige smaakvolle kamer. netjes inorde. Kraaknet sanitair. Perfecte ligging. S nachts behoorlijk veel straatlawaai. Fred is zeer behulpzaam en vriendelijk. Leuk huisje met verschillende kamers. Eerder gericht voor een jonger publiek.

Ideal location in Porto! Walking distance to shops, river, restaurants etc. 
Accomodation is perfect, clean & modern. 
Easy to check in.
The best position and location in all of Porto. Comfortable, clean and safe. Will definitely recommend to friends and will definitely be back! Thanks Fred
great location, clean and easy check in

Fred’s place is the best for seeing and connecting to everything. Great cafe just outside the door. Only thing is the stairs are a bit scary for bringing bags up and down. I’m a 69 year old female and relatively fit but I found the stairs aren’t to code that we’re used to so just be aware if you’re in that retirement age category. The noise from the street outside on the weekend was pretty loud even with ear plugs but Sunday night it quieted down. I’d still say that anything that could be considered a negative is far outweighed by the positives of this place.
Polecam. Czysto , lokalizacja bardzo blisko metra , stacji kolejowej i autobusów.  Plus napewno za to że można zostawić bagaż w dniu wymeldowania do wieczora i odebrać później.  ;)

Great place to stay if you want to be right in the center of Porto. The room and bathroom are small with very limited storage space so might be challenging if you are planning on staying there for more than a couple of nights. The room and bathroom were both clean and comfortable. With the windows open at night the street below is noisy. Check-in/out is very easy and it’s an overall great place for a couple nights to really see Porto.

La chambre lumineuse est très bien située en plein centre. Le lit est confortable. Nous avons bien dormi. Comme tout appartement en ville, dormir avec les boules quies c'est mieux mais pas obligatoire ! Nous reviendrons avec plaisir !

Fred is a great host and provided detailed and very helpful information prior to our arrival. The accommodation is so centrally located which meant that going back for a rest or stop off was a great option ;)!
Petite chambre bien décorée et très bien située. Check-in facile, propre, nous recommandons! Merci :)
Apartamento extremamente bem decorado e muito muito bem situado. Fica a 1-2 minutos a pé dos Clérigos, sem dúvida para voltar. O Fred apesar de não o termos conhecido foi sempre super prestável.

Fred's place is located in historic Porto, close to all the important locations. The building itself is centuries old, but modernized with the comfort of the traveler in mind. However, be prepared to climb up to five floors of narrow stairs and also for a noisy street outside, especially on weekends. But inside, everything was sparkling clean, thanks to Maria. And Fred was always accessible  and responded with little delay to any message I sent.

Great location, 5 minutes from Sao Bento train station. Lots of stairs but nice view. Loved my stone wall and great design. Kitchen a plus. Shared space and room could use some chairs.  I highly recommend this place. Great that the cleaning woman was there when I arrived and helped me check in right away. Would stay there again.

Fred is the best host I ever had in Airbnb. Why I say this? After our stay in his apartment for a couple of days we left to the airport. Our flight was canceled so I asked Fred if he has availability for one night. He offered as a room and he also came to the airport to pick us up!!
Apart from his kindness, the communication and recommendations were great. 
The apartment is very minimalist and with nice design. Comfortable bed, plenty of light and very good shower. Maybe some noise at night in the mains street and no elevator, but this was no problem for us.
Again, best host ever. Obrigado Fred

We had an excellent experience staying at Fred’s house. 
Location is super cool, 3-5 min walk from São Bento railway station. 
Room with private bathroom was spacious, with big windows. 
Everything was sparkling clean and smelling fresh. 
House also has nice living-room and shared kitchen.
Though I didn’t have chance to meet Fred in person, I can say about him that he is a very thoughtful host, he sent me many local tips and was very quick on responding messages. 
Totally recommend Fred’s house. 
Thank you, Fred!
Lovely place, in an amazing central location.
Excelente
We had a great stay. Thank you!
Espaço fantástico! Com certeza irei voltar
Great location in Porto, walking distance from everything. Safe and very clean. Comfortable bed and nice shower. Would recommend!

Fred is really nice and easy to communicate with. Everything was really clean and well organised. Fred recommended us some places that we should visit and these places, restaurants were also amazing. Thank you very much for everything!

Excellent location, chic room, very clean, tidy and well done up. Everything you’d expect in a good room!

Though, I wouldn’t recommend if you’ve got a big/ heavy bag with you. Big and narrow stairway makes it extremely difficult to carry your stuff up, especially if you’re on the 3rd floor like I was. Also, the place gets a little cold in the winter as its not properly insulated and the electric heater doesn’t do a great deal to keep the place warm.
Lovely room and useful shared rooms

Everything was good: room has separate bathroom, comfortable bed, we was in the winter month - and we get heater for our room. In the common area are kitchen where possible to cook something,  living room where you can eating or seating. Appartments has very good location

name: BOMBARDA Room
summary: As traditional and romantic as the heart of Porto can be.  This dream-full double room with shared bathroom is close to the shopping and historic district nearby lots of cafes and restaurants. Access to living room and kitchen. There will be Maria, the cleaning lady, who maintains every morning all the shared areas tidy and clean ! Breakfast not included.
description: As traditional and romantic as the heart of Porto can be.  This dream-full double room with shared bathroom is close to the shopping and historic district nearby lots of cafes and restaurants. Access to living room and kitchen. There will be Maria, the cleaning lady, who maintains every morning all the shared areas tidy and clean ! Breakfast not included. Surely Porto will bring you the happiness and the relax time that you want for these days. We are located in the spot of all the monuments, the best eateries and shops. The famous CLERIGOS TOWER is just a 100 m away! GETTING HERE BY METRO Take the metro from the airport to SAO BENTO station, then walk 3 minutes to Rua de Trás, 48. PARKING PLACE As we are located right in the heart of the oldtown of Porto, parking is always paid. There are a lot of public parking places. The two best are CLERIGOS or CARDOSAS, both 2 minutes away from us. The price, asking for the touristic card, is about 20€/24h. CLEANING MAINTENANCE You can enter the
neighborhood_overview: Surely Porto will bring you the happiness and the relax time that you want for these days. We are located in the spot of all the monuments, the best eateries and shops. The famous CLERIGOS TOWER is just a 100 m away!
notes: CLEANING MAINTENANCE You can enter the building to leave luggage from 08:30 till 12:00 on the check in day. There will be Maria, the cleaning lady, who maintains every morning all the shared areas tidy and clean ! If the room is already cleaned you can do the check in as well. LEAVING LUGGAGE  If you have any luggage that you want to guard in the building the check out day, leave and pick it later.
transit: GETTING HERE BY METRO Take the metro from the airport to SAO BENTO station, then walk 3 minutes to Rua de Trás, 48. PARKING PLACE As we are located right in the heart of the oldtown of Porto, parking is always paid. There are a lot of public parking places. The two best are CLERIGOS or CARDOSAS, both 2 minutes away from us. The price, asking for the touristic card, is about 20€/24h.

host.host_about:
love traveling, tourism, speak different languages and meet people !!
favorite sports: surf and alpine skiing :)

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments: Super logement au centre de Porto, prix très abordable avec le petit déjeuner compris. Idéale pour un séjour court à Porto.

Nous avons passé un agréable moment dans la chambre que Fred à mis à notre disposition. Il s'agit d'un logement neuf qui a été décoré avec beaucoup de goût. Il n'y a pas de bruit et c'est très cozy. Le petit déjeuner est très copieux et varié. A recommander. Autre point positif : Fred parle français et il nous a indiqué des restaurants où on mange super bien.+++

100% por 100% recomedable! Nos sentimos como en casa! Todo es perfecto: la localización, la habitación, el desayuno, etc. Fred nos aconsejo sobre la ciudad, que hacer, donde comer... Muy atento y detallista! Genial!! Volveremos!!*
Nice location in centre of Porto. Clean rooms and bathroom, good breakfast...we recommend absolutely.

We spent 2 night in the very nice and confortable room very well located in the center of Porto. Only 2 min away from Sao Bento train station! The separated bathroom was cleaned everyday.
Fred was very welcoming and flexible with the arrival time even if we were late. 
I can only recommend Fred's rooms! We really enjoyed our stay in Porto.

Had a lovely stay for three nights at Fred's place close to Torre Clerigos.
I would come again and recommend it to anyone who is not bothered about sharing a bathroom (if you are, look twice at the room you're renting, as some have en-suit bathrooms and some don't). Bombarda is just one of the several rooms for rent in the same building, functioning as a small cozy guest place.
Everything is very clean and the small included breakfast was a welcome surprise.
Fred was pleasant and helpful so do ask him for tips!
There was no wi-fi coverage in the bed room.
very nice en clean place in the city center! 2 nice restaurants/ bars across the street where you can spent lots of hours!

Freds apartment in Porto was an amazing experience, typical House style, but in a beautiful way renovated - newly construced. The room itself was small because of the typical house size, but it felt very comfortable. We had a kitchen, a living room and a shared bath(beautifully built). 
The house is in direct town center, easy access to all the important places to see. Maria was giving us the keys, and we got an extra key so we could leave our luggage for the next day. Thank you guys!
Amazing central location in a very nicely renovated and clean apartment, great short stay in beautiful Porto. Fred was busy and not around but always reachable and helpful as well as Maria.
Nos hemos sentido como en casa hemos recibido un trato muy bueno

Great stay in a beautiful, central part of porto. Fred was friendly and welcoming and the place was clean and nicely decorated. Lots of building work across the road, but we were only there for one weekday so didn't affect us that much. 
Thanks again Fred!

Fred's place was in great shape and could not be in a better location. He was very accommodating despite our very late arrival. It is very clean and professionally maintained and we would not hesitate to stay there again. Thank you for helping us discover Porto!
Très bien situé, dans le centre de Porto et près de la gare et du métro. Fred est très accueillant, plein d'énergie et donne des bons conseils pour visiter la ville.

Wonderful! Fred's was cozy, clean and comfortable, breakfast included with nice and kind service. The room was sunny, full of light and with nice views. Will be back to this wonderful city.
Thanks for everything.
Manuel
Hôte très prévenant et disponible. Très bon lit, chambre et petit-déjeuner à la hauteur de nos attentes. Nous avons passé un très agréable séjour chez Fred. Nous recommandons cette adresse.

Mitigés....
 Appartement propre, sobre, neuf, silencieux et idéalement placé. Petit déjeuner correct. Fred parle bien français.
Cendant flexibilité sur les horaires de check in à revoir ( soit 14h soit 19h sans compter le retard de Fred ), donc quand on arrive en pleine après midi avec des gros sacs après 8h de bus on est ravis de devoir poireauter 3h ... sachant que d'après Fred il y à "20 entrées par jour et que donc on ne peut pas s'adapter à chacun" ... nous avons donc eu du mal a comprendre qu'avec un débit pareil il ne soit pas justifié qu'il y ait quelqu'un de disponible sur place dans l'après midi pour nous accueillir... 
De plus impossibilité de se connecter au wifi et tv qui ne fonctionne pas, 5eme étage ..
Great room, perfect location, nice hosts! We will be back :)
Trés bien reçu et de bons conseils pour visiter la ville et se restaurer.
Porto est une ville magnifique, tant de choses à faire et à découvrir...

Fred's house is really central located and you can walk from here to every highlight in Porto. We enjoyed our stay at this Airbnb, it was very neat and modern. The only downside is that it's on the top floor, which is 73 steps up.

Très bien accueilli et quartier proche de tout;
Absence d'indications sur les 5 étages...

Fred's House is a very simple and plain, recently renewed old building in Rua de Trás. Bombarda is a comfortable little room, which shares the bathroom with the other room facing the Rua. Common areas, including the bathroom, the kitchen and the living room are cleaned every day. The position of the building is perfect for starting the exploration of the city, looking for a café or just wanting to get lost. Fred is very organized and gives you the opportunity to leave the luggages in the building on the check-out day.

Fred's place was really nice and well located in the city. 
Many Thanks!
Fijne plek, erg leuke stad!

Die Unterkunft liegt optimal in der Altstadt von Porto. Ideal, um mit kurzen Wegen die Stadt zu entdecken.
Das kleine Haus ist modern eingerichtet. Es gibt ein gemütliches Gemeinschafts-Wohzimmer und eine Küche.
Unser Zimmer war sehr schlicht und stilvoll eingerichtet, klein und sauber.

Unser Aufenthalt in Porto war super geil. Freds Gästehaus war genauso wie beschrieben. Es liegt sehr Zentral, sodass wir alle Sehenswürdigkeiten zu Fuß erreichen konnten. Die Abwicklung war sehr einfach und Fred konnte sogar deutsch.:-) Danke Fred

Es war alles top organisiert, sodass wir jederzeit einchecken konnten.
Besonders gut war die Lage, da man alles fussläufig erreichen konnte.
Ich kann Fred's Unterkunft für einen Porto Aufenthalt nur weiterempfehlen und werden beim nächsten Portugal Urlaub definitiv wieder bei Fred einchecken :-)

Freds house is very centrally located, modern and well furnished. The room is quite little but really lovely, so we were really happy with the BOMBARDA room. We were a little bit unlucky with a building site directly opposite our window and the WIFI did unfortunately not work. 
Still we would recommend Freds house to everyone who wants to explore the city of Porto (it's the best starting point), but obviously not for anyone seeking for quietness... Thank you Fred!

Great place to stay - great location, easy to get to, easy check in process, the rooms were clean, bright & welcoming, good facilities, and a great host! Would definitely recommend it and hope to go there again!
Tout est fait pour nous rendre le séjour agréable, l'appartement est proche de tous les coins sympa à visiter.
숙소는 쉽게 찾아갈 수 있었습니다. 방도 깔끔하고 화장실, 주방, 공동공간도 계속 청소해서 깨끗했구요! 위치도 좋았습니다. 다만 엘레베이터가 없어서 4층까지 짐을 들고 올라가야했던 것, 제가 머물렀던 층에는 무선인터넷이 되지않는 점이 아쉬웠다.
Muy recomendable. Céntrico, acogedor y muy limpio. Repetiremos seguro :) todo genial! Y Fred muy atento con todo

Freds Unterkunft liegt sehr zentral, perfekt um Porto zu erkunden. Die Kommunikation mit ihm war sehr gut und die flexible Checkin Zeit sowie die Gepäcklagerungsmöglichkeit nach dem Checkout, kamen uns sehr entgegen! Klare Weiterempfehlung!

Freds place is really nice. The sanitaries are especially clean and comfortable. The location is great (3 mins walk to Base, where you can lounge and drink perfectly). Fred is helpful, has perfect tips for Porto.

O espaço é agradável como no anúncio, o Fred tem um sistema de check in que nos possibilitou chegar no horário que pretendíamos e entrar sem problemas. Tivemos problemas com wi-fi, que no anúncio dizia ter em todos os ambientes, porém no nosso quarto não funcionava, tinhamos que descer no living, que fica no primeiro andar, para usar. Ahh, o quarto que ficamos é no quarto (4) andar. Depois de nadar por Porto, com suas ladeiras, e subir e descer escadas pra usar internet, não foi muito agradável. Ficamos dois dias sem solução problema, que foi comunicado assim que chegamos. Fora isso, tem uma cozinha bem equipada e fica no coração do centro histórico de Porto, dá pra fazer tudo a pé.

Everything beautiful according as agreed. Easy to find.
Nice location, very central heart of Porto
Fred is a sympathetic guy

Sehr gastfreundliche Kommunikation ab der ersten Minute - Freds Gästehaus ist hell und durchdacht - es wird in den Gemeinschaftsräumen täglich gereinigt - trotz der zentralen Lage ist es nachts angenehm ruhig.
Werde wiederkommen!
Vielen Dank, Fred!

Die Unterkunft ist super schön und wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt. Alles war sauber und die Lage ist einfach nur perfekt um die Stadt zu erkunden. Von Freds House aus kann man so gut wie alles zu Fuß erreichen. Leider war es an den Wochentagen morgens schon etwas laut, da sich momentan eine Baustelle direkt gegenüber befindet. Doch der Ausblick von diesem Zimmer aus, macht alles wieder wett.

Freds house is in the best location, close to the main sights but also in an area where you get a felling of the local life. Maria was there everyday to clean the place specially the comun areas. The room was very clean, maybe a little small but it had  space for the luggage. The room was super light as well so that was very nice. On the second day we ask Fred for some extra covers since it was a bit cold and he brought one for that night, so even though we never met him cause the place is more like a guess house, he doesn't actually live there, he was always aware of what was happening. Overall it was a really good experience, like a said is more like a guess house not the whole local host experience, but I was ok with it, if you are looking for some privacy then this is a really good choice. I'm not sure wether there were bathrooms in the other dormitories because there is only one toilet and two showers in the house, (thats what I saw) we were there for december so there was hardly any other guesses but I'm not sure how it would work in the summer, with the house full of people, so you might want to check that out. But well at the end we had a really good stay, Maria is really nice and finally make sure to follow Freds advices about the places to go.  Thanks Fred we definitely recommend this place.
엘리베이터가 없어서 28인치 캐리어를 끌고 올라가느라 너무 힘든점 빼고는 매우 만족 했어요. 상벤투 역, 클레리고스 탑, 렐루서점 등 위치가 포르토 여행의 핵중심에 있어서 정말 편하게 다녔어요~

La chambre est d'un calme reposant, le tout est d'un confort de qualité. Une proximité de tout idéale et une autonomie appréciable. On a adoré notre séjour ! Un grand merci pour l'hospitalité de Fred et sa confiance ! On recommande vivement Fred's House
Wonderful place, all clean and new, got everything you need. In the middle of the city center, but still quiet.

Nous n'avons pas vu Fred et il n'a pas répondu à notre dernier email mais Maria nous a bien reçu. 
Le logement est propre, lits de bonne qualité, douches partagées propres, dernier étage. 
Situé en plein centre, pratique !

We had an amazing time in Porto. We had a short chat with Fred and he was really supportive and kind. Everything was clean and looked exactly like the pictures. But the best thing about the room is the location. Really close to the Center and a supermarket, restaurants and everything else that you need is right around the corner.
Very good location, but not the best room
Beau logement que je recommande malgré ne pas avoir rencontré l'hôte
Nothing short of excellent. Location is right where you want to be, Maria was lovely and the place is spotless and professionally managed.

beautiful, typical "Porto stye" small & tall house right in the center, very clean rooms and bathrooms, all is brand new. small but efficient and very minimalistic rooms, hence not much space for luggage. 
a small kitchen and living room is part of the common area. 
top rooms require walking up 5 flights of stairs.
location really could not be better for exploring Porto on foot - so don't bring a car!

Fred war ein sehr netter Gastgeber und hat bei Problemen immer schnell geholfen und war gut zu erreichen. Maria war auch toll und sehr nett - es hat uns sehr gut hier gefallen. Allerdings muss man zum Raum Bombarda viele Stufen hinaufgehen, also ist es vielleicht nichts für Leute, die nicht so gut zu Fuß sind  Ansonsten war alles super! Die Lage könnte nicht besser sein und gegenüber vom Hostel ist eine nette Bar mit tollem Wein und leckeren Desserts

Lovely stay in Porto ! The Room is located perfectly in the heart of the city. We had a wunderful time and the room itself was really pretty and exactly as shown in the pictures! Thank you very much Fred for making our stay even more wunderful !

Todo impecable, la limpieza y el lugar es tal cual las fotos, la ubicación es perfecta. Tuve el placer de conocer a Fred y fue muy amable, nos enseñó todo y siempre estuvo a disposicion. Definitivamente volvería

Fred takes hosting to the next level. Not only is his place fantastically located, the rooms and shared areas are tastefully decorated and comfortable. Fred is full of tips and brilliant at answering questions and communicating directions etc. He is also well informed about Portugal as a whole . Would definitely recommend Fred's House when staying in Porto.

Porto é uma cidade maravilhosa e mágica! Estou encantada com tudo o que vi! 
O quarto foi super confortável e limpo. Além da localização perfeita. Indicarei sempre!! Muito Obrigada!!

This is a hostel/air bnb mixture, meaning that we never met Fred, so it was a bit less personal. We shared a bathroom with the guests on other floors and had our own private room, much like an upscale hostel. The room was very charming with great natural light and views. Next time I would rather spring for the room with the private bath because those rooms have a better view, beautiful stone wall and a nice private bath. The common spaces (kitchen, living room) were comfortable and very clean. Maria, the house cleaner, was kind and helpful. Overall great experience!
Logement idealement p,ace plur visiter Porto a pied! Chambre propre et simple.hote arrangeant pour poser les  valises et de bon conseil pour les choses a faire a Porto!
The Fred's house is very clean, comfortable and well located. Fred was very kind and helpful. I would highly recommend.

Gostei muito do espaço! Bem localizado, limpo e o atendimento do Fred e da Maria, excelente! Da próxima vez que vier ao Porto, pretendo ficar aqui. Apenas tomarei o cuidado de escolher um dos quartos com banheiro individual.
Nice and clean appartment, good location and nice neighbourhood

Great place, good location, modern and Newley renovated.

Cons:
No fan or AC in the room--can get hot, no attached bathroom.
Nice room, very central

Best location
No elevator
Poor draining in the showerbooth

Overallay good choice..
Great location. Clean rooms and bathrooms, the space was big and comfortable. Would definitely visit again.
Nice and small room near Clérigos
The place was great! Right in the center of all the places to see. Host was very nice as well! I had a great time
Local fantástico, mesmo no centro do Porto. Recomendo

Semplicissimo da raggiungere, l'appartamento di Fred è una palazzina su 4 piani con una cucina accessoriata e un soggiorno, 5 stanze e un bagno sempre pulito e fornito in comune.
Da questa posizione potete raggiungere tutti i luoghi principali a piedi che è il modo migliore per visitare la splendida Porto, fatta di strade, stradine e piccole vie in saliscendi.
Mi è spiaciuto non conoscere Fred di persona, ma ci ha riempito di consigli e cose da fare via mail. Un punto strategico per Porto.
Excelente ubicación cerca de toda la zona turística . Decoración de buen gusto y Fred siempre dispuesto a ayudar.

We had a great stay in Fred's house! The location is right in the historical centre but on a quiet street so it is nice and quiet. Rooms were very clean and we found everything we needed. Only thing was difficult to carry suitcases up so many stairs! We enjoyed Fred's recommendations for dinner! Thanks for a lovely stay :-)
Fantastic!! Great house!

We arrived in Porto 8am and was allowed to check in and put down our bags! There is Maria cleaning the home everyday so the shared washroom and kitchen area is really clean! Lots of glasses for you to use if you want to buy wine and bring it home. Shower pressure is really strong. Great location tons of food and bars around, close to train station ! Thanks Fred !

What a great place to stay! Located in the middle of the centre so you see everything easily by foot. It was really modern, clean and quiet. Nice showers (there are 2 showers to share with 5 rooms) and kitchen with everything you could need. 
Supermarket and different bakerys around the corner for breakfast. Go and have dinner at Taberna Folias de Baco just around the corner or at Cantino de avillez (make sure to book a table for this one).
Altough it's a building with several rooms it was peaceful and clean.
Highly recommend this place!
El apartamento está muy bien ubicado, es limpio y confortable. Fred ha sido muy claro y disponible con la información.
I stayed at Fred's place for the second time Because of the great location, cleanliness, smooth and extremely nice communication with Fred. I do recommend his place to other guests!

très bon emplacement, très propre
la chambre peut-être au 5è étage sans ascenseur!
mais nous sommes satisfaits
Nice room with all you need for a holidays. Is in the centre and super nice if you want to hangout at night with your friends.

Joli petit cocon dans Porto. Intégrer le logement est très simple grâce aux consignes envoyées en amont par Fred. Literie impeccable. Propreté nikel. Situation parfaite. Il aurait été bien de croiser l'hôte, ne serait-ce que quelques minutes.
Rooms look bigger in the picture than what they actually are. Location is great though. A bit expensive for the services received.

Belle maison, très bien située, ultra confortable et très propre. Rapport qualité-prix imbattable. 

Sauf que, J'aurais aimé rencontré quelqu'un pour nous accueillir, cela m'aurais évité de me tromper de chambre. J'ai mal lu le nom de la chambre dans la réservation et j'ai été gêné de cette erreur pour les autres occupants. 

Pour nous l'esprit Airbnb ce n'est pas une maison sans les habitants, car c'est sans âme où on va et vient comme un hostel ou auberge de jeunesse. 

Fred n'a pas été très sympa au téléphone quand il a appris que nous avions pris une chambre qui n'était pas la notre. 

Cela n'excuse pas tout, surtout quand on est un businessman, il du avoir plus de tact. 

Cela a gâché ma première nuit de voyage !

Logement très bien situé au coeur de la ville, chambre calme et très jolie, cuisine pratique. Fred n'etait pas là à notre arrivée mais ses explications pour recuperer les clés étaient très claires ! Je recommande
Fred's house is a perfect accomodation for a visit to Porto. The house is centrally located, the beds are really comfortable, and the room was nicely decorated! We loved our stay!

The house is well located enter main sights of Porto, nearby the bars and restaurants around the university and easy to reach by public transport.
The house offers a spacious living room and a well equipped Kirchen, enough for  preparing easy dishes  even for a group of people and a relaxed glass of wine on the couch.
Everything is tastefull furnished. However storing your luggage in the room easily gets challenging if you travel with more than cabin baggage. So perfect for a short trip, probably a bit cosy on a  more excessive journey.

Fred's house is the coolest place to stay! It's a great location, a clean room, an easy-going host with very easy to follow directions... what more could you ask for? Fred was so accommodating with check in and check out times and he allowed us to leave our luggage there once we checked out which was such a help!! The room and bathroom is super clean and I'm very OCD but I was a happy camper at Fred's house. Depending on which room you get, you may have to walk up a few flights of stairs which is normal in these areas... totally worth it!
Guesthouse in super zentrale Lage! Einfache, aber sehr modern und schick eingerichtete Zimmer mit top Betten. Zimmer sowie gemeinschaftlich genutzte Räume (Bad, Wohnzimmer, Küche) sind sehr sauber.

The flat can not be more perfectly located ! 100 to 300 mètres to the best bars, restaurant and things to do. Thank you for your precious tips, very useful to have a great experience like real Poeple from Porto !

Fred's House was great. It is a Guesthouse with 5 rooms, some with private bathrooms and some that share a communal bathroom. We were in the Bombarda room on the top floor. It's a very light space and the design is great. The view is amazing. There are two showers in the bathroom. Unfortunately the showerheads were very loose, so when the water was turned in fully the pressure was a little to much and the water sprayed everywhere. We tried to apologize to Maria the cleaning lady for the extra work, but unfortunately her englich wasn't too great. Maybr that could be fixed so it doesn't happen to other guests in the future. 
Other than that,  everything was great and we had absolutely nothing to complain about.

The stay was perfect, great location, clean and very comfortable. 
Francisco received me and explained everything we needed. I recommend the place 100%. 
Thank you very much.

Die Unterkunft ist sehr schön und modern. Alles im Haus war sauber und die Lage ist sehr zentral und somit perfekter Ausgangspunkt für eine Stadterkundung. Man kann Porto´s Sehenswürdigkeiten sowie Bars und Restaurants sehr gut fußläufig vom Haus aus erreichen. Täglich kommt eine Putzfrau und macht die Gemeinschaftsräume sauber. Die Unterkunft ist absolut empfehlenswert.

we had a really great time in freds beautiful house! the description was perfect, check in and out were no problem, everything very uncomplicated! 
Fred is a nice guy, helpful and very fast in answering! Maria prepared everything and it was really clean and tidy! :) Thank you for being such a good host! 
We would recommend Freds house to everyone! :)
Cheers, Anka & Michael

We had such a good time in Fred's (Website hidden by Airbnb) lived in Bombarda room and it was very cozy! We shared bathroom with the rest guests in apartment, but still we have a lot od privacy there and we didn't meet them there so many. The best thing on Fred's accomodation was localita!everything was so closed!we enjoyed so much and we will be back in Fred´s house next visit in Porto. Obrigado! M&B

HIGHLY recommended - wonderful place to stay with an excellent and friendly host who had many recommendations for things to do in Porto, all worthwhile and made the trip extra-special. The house was impeccably clean and tastefully furnished. Would definitely stay there again in future.
excellent stay!
Alloggi in zona nella zona più centrale e vivace di Porto ...l'ordine e la pulizia sono da premio !!! Locali semplici ma accoglienti!consigliatissimo

Fred's house is with very good location, easy to train station and anywhere in the city. We didn't even buy any metro tickets during the stay, just visited the city by walking. The house was very cozy and clean, comfortable for staying couple of days. The only weak point I could say is the room is on 4th floor(5樓), and no elevator, so if you have a huge luggage would be not convenient. Highly recommend and would love to stay there again.
La habitación está muy bien situada, en pleno centro y con muchos comercios alrededor. Repetiría, sin duda.

Clean, cool place, fabulous location and great price . As anywhere in Porto, lots of stairs ! Backpacks are better than roller luggage in Portugal - unless you are strong enough to carry your luggage up 4 flights of spiral stairs 

Would recommend !  Good value

Fred's place was awesome! We stayed there only for one night, but it was great. It was so easy to find, in a beautiful neighbourhood and Fred also gave us advice about places to see and things to do. Definitely recommend!
Impecable todo, Fred muy atento! Cerca de todo! Muy recomendable
Perfect stay, near the city center, clean & good. Perfect Check-In and Check-Out.

Sehr schönes Zimmer mit Aussicht über der Stadt. Für eine Städtereise in Porto perfekt, da man von dem Haus alles sehr schnell zu Fuß erreichen kann. Einkaufsmöglichkeiten sind direkt nebenan. Wir haben leider nur zwei Tage in Porto verbracht dafür war die Unterkunft aber bestens geeignet. Sehr sauberes Gemeinschaftsbad! Die Küche war auch sehr gut ausgestattet. Wir würden auf jeden Fall wieder kommen :)

Very clean apartment
Very well situated 
The room Bombarda was quite small
Sehr schöne Zimmer über mehrere Ebenen, sehr sauber und gepflegt!
Beautiful rooms, super clean, great view, everything was perfect
Check-in was fuss free. Apartment and bathroom was clean and even though it's a shared house, it was very quiet. Definitely back to stay again!
It was a great stay! :)
Uma simples pernoita, limpeza ótima, bom quarto e simpático host. Pena só a frequência da zona à noite.

Ótima estadia! 
Certamente uma morada a fixar para as próximas visitas ao Porto!
