Fred's house is in the centre of Porto, near all the points of interest. It was also really clean and comfortable
El lugar Está supar ubicado,limpio y muy agradable excelente

Great location, right in the city centre. Quiet street and no cars. We stayed at Bombarda room, on the top floor, with amazing views over Porto skyline. Room was a bit small, but still okay for 2 people. The only minus was not having Wifi in the room, only in the living area.

Right in the heart of the city, next to Torre dos Clerigos.
The room (Bombarda) was very clean and bright on the top floor. Great views from the window.
Bathroom shared and really clean. It also has a clean kitchen but we didn't use it.
Check in and check out very easy.
Would recommend for sure staying at Fred's

No sabia que habia tantas escaleras... Muchisimas y sin ascensor. El baño compartido por todas las plantas y solo un wc... Nose, pero bueno muy centrico, limpio y moderno, a la última. Habitaciones pequeñas pero bonitas y con lo necesario. Lo bueno es que está muy céntrico.
Es súper céntrico y las recomendaciones son top.

The stay at Fred’s house was great. Pretty spacious rooms, clean kitchen and bathroom and very close to the center en the river where you have a lots of great food and drink places. Also close to a bar street for drinks in the evening and midnight.
Situación òptima y afitrión muy atento.
Great place in a prime location. Only negatives were a shower that was very quirky and the host did not respond to messages. I would still recommend the place for its cleanliness and location.

The place was really well located. It's really comfortable if you're just looking for a place to crash. Pity it's just a shared bathroom in the whole building and some of the other guests might be a little loud. Overall, though, pretty cool.

I recommend absolutely the rooms in Fred’s building. It is clean, simple and confortable. Very well located in the city center. It is perfect to visit the city ! Even if we didn’t meet the host, it was not a problem for us because he stayed available for all questions and gave good advices.

숙소는 엄청 좋았어요. 위치도 너무 좋구요! 맨 꼭대기 층이라 그런지(무꺼운 깨리어 뜨시는 뿐 쪼심하쎄요) 창문으로 보이는 경치가 너무너무 좋았네요.
땬지 쩌희까 쌰워씰 빼쑤꾸 맊힌따꼬 해껼해딸라했떠니 끄렇겠따고 했는떼 안해쭸어요ㅠ 끄께 은끈 많이 뿔편핶어요 :)

Fred was a very friendly host and communication was great. Although we did not meet in person, his instructions were very clear and was available at all times if we needed anything. The room we had was beautiful and clean and sharing the bathroom really isn’t a problem as didn’t run in to any of the other guests. So all in all it was very private experience. Location is perfect, near the main station and many restaurants, bars and super markets near by.   We would definitely stay here again and recommend to friends.
Centrally located, easy check-in, clean, friendly host and value for money! Would definitely stay there again!

Fred e’ stato particolarmente attento nel fornire ogni minimo dettaglio utile per un soggiorno davvero piacevole nel suo alloggio. La casa e’ in centro ed e’ perfetta per gli spostamenti. Si trova a pochi minuti dalle maggiori attrazioni di Porto. Lo consiglio!
我们住在顶楼的房间,透过窗户看出去风景很好｡房间的地理位置很好,去哪里都很方便｡

Leider verbrachte ich nur eine Nacht in Freds Appartement. Ich war aber sehr zufrieden. Geniale Lage direkt im Zentrum und trotzdessen verhältnismäßig ruhig. Super easy Check In und Check out. Sehr zu empfehlen.
Fred's place was clean and easy to access in the city. The other guests we met were quiet and nice and it was a good place to stay.

Die Lage des Hostels ist perfekt, absolut zentral! Es ist sehr sauber, es wurde täglich gereinigt. 
Wir haben uns wohl gefühlt und hatten einen schönen Ausblick auf die Stadt von unserem Fenster aus.

The best thing about these rooms is the superb location, it's literally 2 minutes from a number of the main tourist sites and about 10 minutes walk from the river.  Everything was super clean and we had a nice sense of privacy and seclusion in our individual room (with a view). The bathroom and kitchen were shared but to be honest, when we were there, there was a real sense of calm and we didn't actually see any other guests. We didn't meet Fred in the end, so no local tips to speak of, but as our stay was only for one night this room suited our needs perfectly.
Location is amazing, Fred is super nice. This facility is maintained with cleanly everyday. Loved it's living room.

Schönes Zimmer. Bequeme Betten. Alles hat gut geklappt. Fred ist ein sehr aufmerksamer Gastgeber mit guten Tipps. Wir haben uns richtig wohl gefühlt in einem für Porto typischen alten Haus im Herzen der Stadt.  Danke Fred!
Very nice place, very nice host
Klasse Lage, schönes, schlichtes Haus und eine nette Kommunikation. Ich würde jederzeit wieder kommen!

The location is really great, only 4mins away from the metro station and 2-3mins away from the São Bento train station. Room is very clean, so are shared kitchen and bathroom. Maria helped us a lot. Fred can speak many languages :) He was really nice to explain things to us. We had a great stay here at Fred’s House!
Foi maravilhosa a estadia, é muito bem localizado, o local é moderno e eles são muito cuidadosos com a higiene do espaço. Voltaria com certeza.
This is a clean and stylish room. We had a hard time finding it. All great but for that our room was 7 floors up and the Saturday night noise was considerable!!
Great place! Clean, cute, central and close to everything! A little bit noisy at night but that’s it, the rest was as expected :) p.s would be useful to have a bin in the room
Located very central in Porto, the place was very clean and comfortable.

J'ai eu l'occasion de aller chez Fred house il y a juste deux ans, j’étais très content de pouvoir constater que le quartier s'est vachement valorisé. 
Bravo Fred très bon pari !
Arrivée pratique et rapide. Les chambres sont disposées sur 5 étages et sont toutes très propres et bien décorées. Chambre très bien placée. Fred est très sympa.

Perfect location. We didn't saw Fred but the description to enter the appartment was very clear. The appartment was clean and it's a good startpoint from where to discover Porto. If you are looking for a simple but good stay, this is the place.

Inmejorable ubicación. Cerca de todos los atractivos de Porto.
Fred es un anfitrión amable y servicial.

제일 꼭대기층을 이용했어요!
거의 5,6층 정도이고 캐리어 들고 올라가는데 힘들었지만 숙소는 깨끗했어요 
화장실과 샤워시설은 공동 사용인데 다른 게스트들은 못봤고 잘 이용했습니다. 
캐리어 무거워서 짐 많으신분은 봄바다 방은 추천하지 않아요 ! 호스트에게 물어보고 낮은층이라도 받는게 좋을거 같아요

Schöne Unterkunft direkt in der Altstadt von Porto.
Günstige Frühstücksgelegenheiten um die Ecke und in der 
Nähe mehrere Restaurants, alles fußläufig zu erreichen.

-- Perfect location in the historical center of the Porto, near the main station, metro and main attractions.
-- The room is beautiful and clean.
-- Sharing the bathroom and kitchen wasn’t a problem as we didn't see other guests.
-- Check in was flexible as we arrived early/
-- Fred is a very friendly host. Although we did not meet in person, his instructions were very clear.
-- Recommendations:
1. It would be very useful to add in the room a small bedside table or even small shelf
2. I would recommend to specify in the room description that the room, kitchen and bathroom are on the different floors and stair quite steep (not very suitable for the elderly)
-- We definitely recommend rooms in Fred’s building. It is clean, simple and comfortable.
Bien que nous n'ayons pas vu Fred, l'endroit était très beau, propre et bien situé. Les indications pour l'arrivée étaient claires et nous avons apprécié notre séjour !
We stayed here for one night, the room was clean and comfortable and in a great, central location. Perfect for a short city break!
Apartamento limpo e comfortavel, muito bem localizado, mesmo no centro da cidade.
We only stayed 1 night and loved the location and the friendliness of this space. Fast WiFi, well equipped kitchen. Great showers and Maria is sweet and helpful. Definitely recommended
Perfectly as described. Really nice property; clean rooms and comfy beds. Location is also fantastic - great transport and right in central Porto.
Great place in the centre of Porto!
We had a great time in the Lisbon and our room. It was clean and tidy. It’s on the 4th floor, so you have a great view and also some stairs to climb :)

Fred’s house is probably the best accomnodation you can get in Porto. Amazing location in the city centre, spotless clean both bedroom and bathroom and though it’s in the city you don’t hear any noise from the street. We didn’t meet any guests, so privacy is really not a problem either. Would definitely stay at Fred’s again!
5층이어서 뷰가 생각보다 좋다. 다만 5층이어서 힘듬. 프레드의 숙소들은 전부 평타 이상임
Fred foi um ótimo anfitrião nos recebendo com carinho e dando-nos muitas dicas úteis. Super recomendo.
Great place to stay in Porto. So close to everything and the apartment is sparkling clean ! Highly recommended!
Sehr zentrale Unterkunft.

Fred's house is located in one of the best parts of the city, you can walk everything! Really nice bed with crispy white bed sheets and everything was very clean. Also checkin in and out was easy. But to be honest, I would not return to Fred's house because it is more of a hotel than a personal and cosy airbnb, which is more that I am looking for when I am on a city trip. But if you are just looking for a super clean, super central bedroom, this is your place!
Great place to live the historic Porto! We recommend it!

Adorámos estar no espaço do Fred. A casa fica perto de tudo na baixa do Porto. Preço incrivel.
Super limpo e quartos incriveis!
Freds House is located in the middle of Porto. Everything is nice and clean - just like on the pictures. We would always come back!
Great guesthouse with a top location, because you can get everywhere by walking!

Great place to stay when you are in Porto! 
Good in the centre between the river and the parks and shopping area.
Stylish & cute! Thanks for the great stay! Great area too.
Very good!
Great location, very clean and nicely decorated. Fred is very friendly and helpful. Our stay was amazing.
Lovely room in a very central location of Porto

Diese Wohnung ear super zentral gelegen und sehr sauber! 
Definitiv werde ich wieder diese Wohnung wieder besuchen!
Top 5 Sterne! Danke!
Alles wie erwartet

Fred's place is perfectly located, really comfortable, impecably clean and we were very happy to stay there. Communication was easy and fast, and Fred was helpful with everything. I can absolutely recommend this place!

Eine tolle Unterkunft im Herzen von Porto, mitten im Leben, mit tollen Restaurants und Kneipen, Bahnhof, Bus, Metro, alles in weniger als 5 Minuten zu erreichen, mit Metro zum Flughafen, mit dem Bus zum Strand,, und nach einer tollen Nacht in einem unglaublich bequemen Bett einschlafen.

Fred's huis ligt zeer goed gelegen. In de buurt zijn veel restaurants, bars en alles is op wandelafstand. Het huis was heel proper, ook de gedeelde badkamer was geen probleem! Wij zouden dit zeker aanbevelen voor een verblijf in Porto!

To be honest the Stay at Freds house was disappointing. The house is excellent located, it looks tasteful and its very clean. Unfortunely youve to share the facilities with 4 other rooms, you have to go down two floors to reach the shared toilet and bathroom, youve soms noise from the street and the room was not as spacious as suggested

1 NACHT IN FREDS HOUSE
Sehr schön eingerichtete Zimmer in Mitten des Zentrums. Das mehrstöckige Haus hat mehrere Zimmer und ist sauber.
Check in und Check Out usw. hat alles super geklappt.
Fred ist eine herzliche und Gastfreundliche Person, ich werde wieder kommen!
We recommend Fred’s place, perfect location, very clean and nice design :) Easy check in.
Tolles sauberes Zimmer in zentraler Lage!
Great location, everything is just minutes away. Clean apartment, rooms, kitchen, and bathroom.
Fantastische plek om Porto te verkennen, pal in het centrum en toch rustig! Nette en moderne accommodatie! Een aanrader!
Ottimo alloggio. Posizione centralissima comoda per tutte le attrazioni del centro. Camera molto pulita e gli spazi condivisi come bagno, cucina e salotto. Possibilità di cucinare i propri pasti.
Had a great stay in Porto at Fred‘s Apartment! Especially the Location is world Class! And thankfull for the good tips from Fred :)

Wir haben uns wirklich sehr wohl gefühlt in dieser Unterkunft! Vor allem die Lage ist wunderbar und es sind unheimlich schöne Räumlichkeiten. 
Da sich unser Zimmer im 5. Stock befand ist sie jedoch sicherlich nichts für Lauf-Faule. Das einzige was ich verändern würde sind die Check in Bedingungen. Die Schlüssel sind von außen zugänglich. D.h. Jeder der darum weiß kann problemlos in das Haus gelangen. 
Unser Fazit:
Wir würden jederzeit wieder kommen und haben es sehr genossen !

The location was amazing, only note is be careful if you have lots of luggage because it’s a good 5 floors up by stairs, everything excellent cleaning lady was nice, check in and check out went smoothly

Das Zimmer von Fred war in perfekter Ausgangslage gelegen. Wir hatten das Zimmer im obersten Stockwerk, hier war der Anstieg mit Koffer etwas schwierig, was aber mit einem schönen Ausblick über Porto‘s Dächer belohnt wird. Das Zimmer war etwas klein aber dafür super schön eingerichtet. Betten waren bequem. Das Gemeinschafts Bad, welches man sich noch mit einem anderen Zimmer im Haus teilt war jeden Tag blitze sauber :). Wir danken Fred für die super Unterkunft und einen tollen Aufenthalt in Porto.

The room was located in the heart of Porto - location could not be better. There was one shared bathroom with 4 other rooms, as well as a shared kitchen and a "livingroom". It felt more like a hostel.
Great place, great location!

Fred的房子就坐落在波尔图的中心,不夸张,就是在中心!整个方便的不行,随便去一个什么景点､什么餐厅都是只要步行三四分钟!!(除了酒庄们,因为酒庄们在另一头)

整栋房子有设计感且干净,我们住得很舒服~如果再来波尔图的话我还是会选Fred~~

只是因为这次我们住顶层,第一天抬箱子上去的时候,可能抬掉了我两年的寿命= =

Freds place is perfectly located for a sightseeing trip to Porto. You are in the middle of the city with a lot of bars and Restaurants in walking distance. Check in and communication was easy. Thank you.

The three days we stayed at Fred's have been simply amazing. The house is located super central and you can walk to everything downtown and get lost in the little side streets of Porto. Fred is a super hospitable guy and was simply amazing when we faced unforeseeable trouble with our room by coming up with a quick solution. On top of that Fred's local tips gave us nice inspirations on what to do around the city. The rooms are located in a nice narrow house in the city center - be aware to carry your luggage a few steps up to your room! Moreover having the possibility to leave our luggage on day of departure for longer has proven to be super convenient for us. :) We will come back!
Logement très bien situé avec des équipements de grande qualité. Très bonne communication de la part de Fred (en français).
Host disponibile e attento al cliente. Alloggio impeccabile e pulito. Tutto perfetto.
I didn't get the chance to stay in the BOMBARDA room but Fred was there when i came to check in
Very clean location, very close to the centre. I liked it!
계단 오를때마다 숨차긴했지만 위치는 좋고 매우 깔끔하다. 왜 유럽은 엘레베이터를 잘 달아놓지않는걸까...흑흑흑 프레드는 정말 친절했다!!

Kleines & sauberes Zimmer im Zentrum von Porto. Alles wichtige ist fußläufig zu erreichen. Fred ist ein netter und hilfsbereiter Gastgeber. Von den anderen Gästen im Haus haben wir nichts mitbekommen. Das Zimmer befindet sich im obersten Stockwerk des Hauses und es ist über ein etwas engeres Treppenhaus zu erreichen. Sonst hat es uns an nichts gefehlt. Für ein Wochenendtrip ist die Unterkunft auf jeden Fall zu empfehlen!

One of the best Airbnb we've experienced during our trip in Portugal and Spain! Great location and very clean - it was also possible for us to leave our luggage there safe due to a very late flight back home after check-out. Thanks again, Fred!!
Fred house is an amazing place to stay in Porto. Beatiful disposition,  nice look and useful option to leave luggage in the living room after check out.
Fred is super hospital and helpful. The place is well located, clean, calm. Loved everything about it!
The room is spacious and clean.  Recommend!

Highly recommend for an easy and good stay in Porto! The house is very nice and the rooms are very well-appointed, it’s well located and close to everything you need and Fred gives some really good recommendations to make your stay comfortable :-)

appartamento comodissimo in zona centralissima e vicino alla metro quindi comodo per lasciare bagagli prima di andare in aereoporto. pulizia sia nella stanza che nel bagno comune. cucina molto accessoriata. lo consiglierei!
Fred was so nice and kind. The accommodation was so clean and cozy. I love this place and I will recommend this place to my friends!! I am sure you would like it!

It was a perfect exprience :) I had two lugguges but Fred helped me to take tem to my room. It’s super close to Sao bento station so I didn’t have any difficuties to get there. I felt so lucked to choose this place. You won’t regret !

Fred’s place is very conveniently located. It’s also really clean and has everything you need for a short trip. Fred’s really helpful too! Communication was smooth throughout. Would definitely recommend :-)
super great place
Amazing location and very clean spaces. We had a great time

Le logement est vraiment très bien situé au centre de Porto et vous pourrez découvrir la ville à pied. WC et Salle de bain sont à l'etage inferieur, mais d'une grande propreté. Piece commune et cuisine equipée encore 2 etages en dessous. attention pour les touristes en hiver, seule la chambre est chauffée! Rua de tras en travaux, donc un peu bruyante, mais c'est Porto! super boulangerie dans la rue Dos Clerigos pour le petit dej'! Fred n'etait pas là à notre arrivée, mais est passé le 1er soir pour voir si tout allait bien.
Bref, nous avons aimé et recommandons ce logement.
Super séjour ! Tout était parfait
포르토의 중심가에 위치해 있으며 침구가 청결하고 호스트가 친절합니다. 매일 주방 및 화장실을 청소하여 깨끗합니다.

The room is very cozy and clean. When it rains, I felt a little bit cold, but there was a heater that I can use. It was very useful. I haven't met Fred during my stay, but he was nice. The location was perfect. It was center of the city.

The Fred's house is a whole building that seems like hostel style. There are 5 different rooms, 1 shared bathroom (1 toilet, 2 shower booths), a kitchen and a living room in the building. The Bombarda room is located the last floor, no lift, so if you have a big luggage it can be problem. But because I have only small luggage, it was fine. The bathroom is downstair of Bombarda.

Everything was very clean because the cleaning lady makes it everyday. She is also very nice. 

The best part of this room was the windows. I could see the city every morning through the window, and it made me very happy.
Fred's place is perfect for your stay in Porto. It's a stylish space and the shared facilities are all excellent! It's centrally located too, so you couldn't asked for more!

This is a self service hostel type accommodation. It was the right price and a fine location, but a bit impersonal. Access to the key only works with small hands, so I had to flag down a random woman to help me get in. Once inside it was clean and bright with all the necessities. There were others staying that I heard but never saw. Great for a group when you might take multiple rooms and make it your own. As a solo traveler it was a rather lonely stay!

위치는 정말 완벽해요. 상벤투역에서 걸어서 매우 가깝습니다! 여기저기 걸어다니기 너무 좋아요. 단 저희가 불편했던 점은 맨 꼭대기 층에 방을잡아주셔서 무거운 캐리어 옮기기 불편했어요ㅜㅜ. 프레드가 체크인시에는 옮기는 걸 도와줘서 너무 고마웠지만요! 주방도 잘되있고, 아기자기합니다. 단 큰 방을 원한다면 부적절할 수 있어요! 호스트가 너무 친절하고 인상깊어서 후기남깁니다.ㅎㅎ 프레드 번창하세요!

neighborhood_overview: Botafogo is a charming neighborhood in Zona Sul of Rio de Janeiro. host.host_about:
Aloha,
Here at Punahoa Oceanfront Vacation Rental's in Kihei, Maui Hawaii.  We offer Studios, One bedrooms, Two bedrooms, and One Bedroom Penthouses that is Ocean front and located right on the beach!  The amenities we provide in Punahoa is FREE PARKING, FREE WIFI INTERNET ACCESS CODE, & FULLY EQUIPPED KITCHEN / KITCHENETTES.  
Inside the units additional amenities such as:

- Hair dryer, Shampoo, Conditioner.

-Small cooler for your usage to take out and enjoy/travel beach or long drive around Maui.

-Beach chair & beach towels

On property we have two outside shower stalls to rinse off after enjoying your time at the beach.

We also have a gas barbecue grill.

Spectacular sunsets and perfect location for surfer's, stand up paddle boarding, and kayak.  Snorkeling from the Cove beach to Charley Young's beach is a must!  We frequently have visits from tired Honu's (Hawaiian sea turtles) resting on our shores / beach.  

***Please be respectful and DO NOT TOUCH/ FEED/ OR BOTHER THE HAWAIIAN SEA TURTLES & HAWAIIAN MONK SEALS!***

Send us a message or any inquires for additional information, we would love to welcome you to be our guest, stay with us here at Punahoa oceanfront vacation rentals, in Kihei Maui Hawaii!  Aloha nui loa!

- Zaldy 

Within walking distances from Fresh local farmers market and produces, outlets and little boutiques, variety of restaurants and bars, rent stand up paddle boards, boogie boards, and snorkeling gears.  Located right on the beach between Maui's famous Charley Young's beach & The Cove.  Close by Kalama beach park and playground.

reviews.comments: If you want to hear the ocean night and day, wake up to breathtaking views, see whales breaching in the distance from the spacious lanai, and end your day in awe of the best Maui sunsets this is the place to be!

We wanted to stay in Kihei and this place was absolutely the best location for us. Kihei market was merely a 2 minute walk away as was the surf school where you can rent out paddle boards or surf boards and other gear. Since it is centrally located, driving to other places in Maui was also convenient. 

Hospitality was outstanding - we knew where we wanted to go but the apt had a Maui guide book on the coffee table for quick reference. There were great amenities to play Music, a nice bookshelf with various reads if you just want to read by the beach and chairs to take to the beach  to relax in between your snorkeling/swimming excursions. 

The views - oh my god. The photos do not do it justice. We had sweeping views of the pacific and saw early morning paddle-boarders, surfers and sea turtles right from the balcony! Im sure if you come during the winter months, you can watch whales literally while drinking your morning coffee. No need to go to an expensive touristy bar to get that perfect Hawaiian sunset :) 

I don't know what else to say. Highly recommend for a great time.
